1b1(rnying rgyud): #/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba dud khrod khu byug rol
1b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang/
1b3(rnying rgyud): ba ma tshig gi bdag po/ thig le byang chub sems kyi rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid/ pad mtshan po rnam par dag
1b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i gsung / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/ yid bzhin gyi rin po che rgyal po'i yon tan mnyam pa chen pos kun tu khyab par mdzad pa/ kun tu
1b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i phrin las ky-i hU~M yangs par smin rgya mdzad pa/ sku gsung thugs yon tan dam tshig chen po mi lus pa'i bdag nyid chen pa/ dus gsum gyis chas ma
2a1(rnying rgyud): lus me lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin/ ral pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna rdzogs par rnam par 'phrul par mnga' brnyes pa
2a2(rnying rgyud): de/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po/ btsun mo'i b+ha ga la pho brang lhun gyis grub pa drar khrod kyi gzhal yas khang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
2a3(rnying rgyud): kha dog dbyibs la stsogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyis/ phyi dang nad med par phyogs bcur 'khrigs par bklubs par rang byung
2a4(rnying rgyud): ba na/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rgyalwa ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa' chen po sems ma dang
2a5(rnying rgyud): bcas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhing gi rdul snyed dang / gzhan yang he ru ka rol pa'i tshogs grangs med pa brjod du med pa rnams dang / sprul pa chen po
2b1(rnying rgyud): sras kyi 'khor ji snyed pa la stsogs pa sems dang sems las byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa rnams dang / thabs cig tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar bzhugs pa ni/ dper na yungs 'bru snum gyis
2b2(rnying rgyud): gang ba bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// yum kun tu bzang mo yang nyid kyi sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar mngon par 'du mdzad do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rdo rje yid kun tu bzang
2b3(rnying rgyud): po yang btsun mo chos sku kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bka' nod cing spong ba can du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
2b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i chos dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa dang / gzhan yang bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa dang / sa'i khyad par la lcogs pa'i chos snang grag la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan
2b5(rnying rgyud): gyis kun tu khyab par gzigs so// rnam par gzigs so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi rgyal ba grangs med pa rnams la yang rnam par gzigs so// rnam par gzigs nas chos thams cad stong pa chen po'i don la mnal te/ snga
2b6(rnying rgyud): bsam las 'das pa de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad stong pa chen por gyur pa ni// dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du yang bskrun du yod pa ma yin no//
2b7(rnying rgyud): nas yum kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la mnal bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo// e e ma'o// stong nyid bdag med rnam dag slong yangs nas/
3a1(rnying rgyud): snyoms pa'i thugs rje 'byung bar mi dmigs kyang // shes rab don dam chos rba dag pa las// ma 'gag thabs kyi snyid rje nam mu kha stan te// zhus pasngal bus/ gsang ba mchog sa bdan du
3a2(rnying rgyud): des/ bskul bar mkhyen nas/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang la ma nal bzhin du/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la khyab pa chen po ting rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe chos thams cad snying rje nam mkha'i
3a3(rnying rgyud): bro tsam du gnas par gyur to// de nas yang yu mu kun tu bzang mos stong pa nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul to// e ma ho// ma ltar byams pa'i snying rje chen po ni// mkha' ltar gro yang 'byed cing kun 'an khyab// rig pa
3a4(rnying rgyud): snying rje nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// a la laM ho zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bskul bar mkhyen nas/ snying rje'i
3a5(rnying rgyud): drang nas rig pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul te/ nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste/ dper na nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas nyi ma 'bum dus gcig tu shar ba'i gzi brjid lta bu'o// de nas yum kun tu bzang mos smin
3a6(rnying rgyud): ring bsgyur te spyan 'dzum byug tu bltas nas/ rmad du byung ba'i gar glus rnam par bskul ba'i phyir glu 'di blangs so// e ma ho// yid bzhin sku mchog nyi ma lte bu las// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje gar mdzad cing // brjid
3a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku mchog yongs su rdzogs pa yi// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag pa bsten du gsol// a la la ho// zhes rnam par bskul bas/ bskul bar thugs su chud de/ rol pa'i sku zhal gsum pa lta bur snang ba/ ye
3b1(rnying rgyud): mo dgu pa can lta bur sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nAs bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ b+h+yo zhes brjod pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khar de dag thams cad nyid kyi rdul bsdu bar mdzad do/
3b2(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar mdzad nas yang nyid kyi sku rnam pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang gar dang bteg pa dang bstim pa dang sbyor ba dang / 'khyud pa'i tshul rnam par rol pas/ yum kun tu bzang mo la sprin ring bsgyur cing / spyan zim dag gi tshul gyis gzigs
3b3(rnying rgyud): yang chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang yum kun tu bzang mosra zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas nas chags pa'i glu 'dis 'phrul te/ e ma'o// rol pa'i cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i lus
3b4(rnying rgyud): khyab pa'i byin dra'as rdo rje gar mdzad cing // gsang ba brug yangs pa'i mkha' dkyil d+ha// re skyong bdud rtsi'i chur chen dbab tu gsol// A la lA ho// zhes rnam par bskul bas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchogs
3b5(rnying rgyud): dadrag po dang / gnyis su med par rol pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / rdo rje'i glu 'di blangs so// a ho// bde mchog 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings nyid ni// 'dzum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma'i b+ha ga chu// dga' mchog rdo rje gas pa
3b6(rnying rgyud): ngadi byang chub sems// dri med rin chen char 'ab rgyan mi 'chad// tsA zhes gsungs so// de nas chags pa yum gyi byang chub sems kyis thabs mchog yang kyi byang chub sems la bskul ba'i cho 'brel gyi gyi 'di skad ces bsgrags so//
3b7(rnying rgyud): chags pa chen po dbang gi byang chub sems// dus gsum bder gshegs rnams kyi rtse gzhi mchog/ dri med skyon bral pad+ma'i 'od zer las// mu tig dro med bsil ba'i 'od zer spos to// yang thabs mchog yab kyi byang chub
4a1(rnying rgyud): dA/ ga bams sanan pa ma sa nan dag/ na // sa /
4a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid de// bsil ba'i 'od zer pad+ma'i gnas su spro// ho zhes spros shing bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog gi bdag po des spro bsdu rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
4a3(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas yang ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o// bde mchog bde ba'i byang chub sems ni rab 'phros pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs bskul zhing // 'gro ba kun gyi rgyud sbyangs te// slar bsdus dbyings su
4a4(rnying rgyud): thim pa las// byang chub sems kyi thig ler gsal// thig le'i 'od kyis khyab pa las// byang chub sems kyis kun tu khyab// ces gsungs so// de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su
4a5(rnying rgyud): gnas so// de nasu bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des btsun mo'i b+ha ga las/ dam tshig chen po'i pho brang gru bzhir byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las snying po 'di phyung ngo // d+hI de nas yang
4a6(rnying rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e mdo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi gnas// 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i rgyun// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang // nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ldani// 'od
4a7(rnying rgyud): 'phros 'bar bas phyogs bcur 'khrigs// gru bzhi sgo khyud rnams kyis mdzes// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje des/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra a zhes brjod de dkyil 'a
4b1(rnying rgyud): 'idabus su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang ba rnyed
4b2(rnying rgyud): hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i ka/ de phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ zhe sdang gi sku rjes su dran te/ sngags kyi yi ge 'phros 'dus pas/ yig 'bru las cho 'phrul gyis sgra 'di skad ces grags so// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung /
4b3(rnying rgyud): be'i rdo rje de nyid ni// zhe sdang rgyud kyi sangs rgyas rnams// bskyod med yi ger gnas pa'o// zhes grags so// de nas snying po yi ge de nyid thugs kyi mtshan ma rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa lta bur gnas par gyur to// rdo rje de lus cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad
4b4(rnying rgyud): grags so// e ma'o sangs kyis kun gyi thugs// 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid// ye shes lnga ru snang bas na// thugs kyi thugs ni brtan pa'o// zhes grags so// de nas thugs de nyid spro ba dang bsdus pa'i ngo bor mngon par 'du mdzad
4b5(rnying rgyud): las mi bskyod pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par bzon te/ ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces glengs so// e ma 'od ni rang byung ste// bde ba thugs kyi mtshan ma yin//
4b6(rnying rgyud): cis kyang mi shigs pas// bskyod med phyag rgya bstan pa yin// zhes gleng ste/ a/ zhes brjod cing sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i sku gsung thugs nyid la bzhugs so// de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ tham
4b7(rnying rgyud): cad gnas par 'byung ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las sku gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // A~M dzi na dzika/ 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
5a1(rnying rgyud): nagrangs su spyan tu/ gsung mig tham ma 'phrul can da rnas gnanan dmasang sangs rgyas rnams da du// gsadu gtu gu rgyal ste// nargyas pa ma par dag/ nam dag dang /
5a2(rnying rgyud): rnam med// rjes grags so// don mi snying po yi ga de dga' gro ba dang rnye pa las/ thugs kyi ma tshan me khong khro zung brgyad pa ka zung gdamipar gyu / de tshe 'i mau las tsho thub kyi khri 'di skad ces zags sa/ ma
5a3(rnying rgyud): ngasakyis can mi thugs chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskur ba// rten mongs du' garjod par byed// phra'i thA gsu'i ban pa'i// zhes zhen naso// de nam thugs she ba pade nyid du zhi ba dang 'drabralas/ mdzad sems /
5a4(rnying rgyud): lngagasung thugs su sbyor ba'i thabs snga rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te 'di skad ces gleng ngo // oM mya'ong ni rang d+hA ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ma 'dog/ sangs rgyas kun ni thams cad kyi// muM mi phyag rgyab tan pa ya/
5a5(rnying rgyud): zhes slong ste/ oM/ zhes brjod cing spyan sngar bzhugs so// de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos// drin chen dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las yid
5a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyi nong bu'i gsung ba'i snying po 'dri byung ngo // sI dza d+h+r-ika/ 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad du rgal gyi pra rjes sudran te/ gsung mig thu mtsho bral kyi blo 'di skad ces blags so// ma'o sangs rgyas
5a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// yid bzhin gsung ni blon med// yin ten kun gyi 'byung gnasagacu// rin chen gsung ni dag nga// nimi migs so// dan gan byed 'thos 'dus pa la sa thugs kyi mtshan ma rin po zur brgyad pa /
5b1(rnying rgyud): gnas par gyur te// dan madran pa med lus tshe 'phrul rtsos/ 'di sang ces grags so// oM mngaran chen kun thugs// na gang rin mnu rab 'bar ba// mo 'gyur nam mkha'/ kha drug 'dra// don chen thugs ni du brtan// na
5b2(rnying rgyud): grags so// de nas thugs kyi mtshan ma de nyid slob dang bsgru ba las rin chen sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'i thabs su rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'dzin te/ 'di skad ces gleng ngo // e ma 'od ni rang byung ste/ yid
5b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i mtshan ma ye nA// zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// yon tan phyag rgya brtan pa yin// zhes gsungs te/ a zhes brjod cing g.yas phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ gsal
5b4(rnying rgyud): ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsung gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // AM A ro l-i ka/ 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dod chags kyi bu rjes su
5b5(rnying rgyud): dran te gsung gr-i yi ge las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad ces grags so// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi gsung ni kun tu grags// nem dag gsung ni bsam mtha' yas// dri ma med pas rnam par dang // ces grags so//
5b6(rnying rgyud): de nas snying po yi ge de nyid 'phros 'dus pa las/ thugs kyi mtshan ma pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa lta bur gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe pad+ma de las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad ces grags so// e ma'o gsung mchog kun gyi bdag/ chags med skyon
5b7(rnying rgyud): byas gos pa med// dri med pad+ma d+h+r-i ga'i mdog/ chos kyi thugs ni brtan pa'o// zhes grags so// de nas thugs kyi mtshan ma de nyid 'gro ba dang 'du ba las/ khyod kyi sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba'i thabs surnam pa mthor thams
6a1(rnying rgyud): cang dang ldan par 'thon te 'di skad ces gleng ngo // e mdzong ni rang byung ste/ pad+ma chos kyi mtshan ma yin// thams cad chags med skyon dang bral// chos kyi phyag rgya brtan pa ldan// zhes gsungs tu/ a/
6a2(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod cing rgyab phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos rdo rje 'phro bces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las dam tshig gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo //
6a3(rnying rgyud): hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phrag dog gi sku rjes su dran te/ gsung yig 'bru las cho 'phrul gyi sgra skad 'di skad ces grags so// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsung 'di mthor phyin
6a4(rnying rgyud): pas// don kun ma lus kun grub pa'i// dam tshig gsung ni dga' ba'o// zhes grags so// de nas snying po yi ge de nyid 'phro ba dang 'du ba las thugs kyi mtshan ma ral gri lta bur gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe ral gri de las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'dis
6a5(rnying rgyud): ces grags so// e ma'o dam tshig kun gyi thugs// mtha' rnams gnyis la mi gnas shing // nyon mongs drA ba gcod par byed// las kyi thugs ni brtan pa'o// zhes grags so// de nas thugs mtshan de nyid 'phro ba dang 'du ba las las kyi
6a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te 'di skad ces glengs so// e ma'o nga ni rang byung ste// dam tshig mtshan ma zhes su bya// kun gyi bya ba byed pa po// las kyi phyag rgya brtan pa po// zhes
6a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs te/ a/ zhes brjod cing g.yon phyogs su bzhugs so// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha lnga// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de la/
6b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las nam mkha'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // mr-id+hA d+hi shwa n+te/ 'di phyung ma thag tu yum dbyings phyug ma'i sgra dang gsung dang thub
6b2(rnying rgyud): su sbyor ba'i thabs su rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te 'di skad ces gleng ngo // e mo'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kun dag pa bdag med pa// nam mkha'i ngang du rab sbyor bas// nam mkha'i tshul 'di brtan pa'o//
6b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs te/ yum kun tu bzang mo'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la thim ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skul 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas brtan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
6b4(rnying rgyud): sa'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // laM de She ra ti/ 'di phyung ma thag tu rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i sku dang gsung dang thugs sbyor ba'i thabs su rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te/ 'di skad ces gleng ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams ca
6b5(rnying rgyud): kyi// chos kun brtan pa'i bdag nyid de// sra brtan dang du rab sbyor bas// sra brtan tshul du brtan pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ snang mdzad sems dpa'i sku la dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas yang sdud pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
6b6(rnying rgyud): par zhugs te nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las chu'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // mi mo ha ra ti/ 'di phyung ma thag tu rin chen dbyings phyug ma'i sku gsung thugs sbyor ba'i thabs su rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te/ 'di skad
6b7(rnying rgyud): ces gleng ngo // e mo'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kun sdud pa'i bdag nyid de// 'khril ba'i ngang du kr-in sbyor bas// sdud pa'i tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes gsungs te rin chen sems dpa'i sprul 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/
7a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'bar ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las me'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // pU rA ga ra ti/ 'di phyung ma thug tu chos kyi dbyings phyug ma'i sku gsung thugs
7a2(rnying rgyud): su sbyor ba'i thabs su rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te 'di skad ces gleng ngo // e mA'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kun smin pa'i ngo bo nyid// gsal dro'i ngang du kun tu sbyor// smin pa'i tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes gsungs
7a3(rnying rgyud): te/ chos kyi sems dpa'i skul 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas yang g.yo ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi srung nga gsung dang thugs rdo rje ldes rlung gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // trA~M badz+ra ra tI/ 'di /
7a4(rnying rgyud): ma thag tu las kyi dbyings phyug ma'i sku dang gsung dang thugs su sbyor ba'i thabs su rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'thon te 'di skad ces gleng ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kun g.yo ba'i bdag nyid de// g.yo ba'i ngang du kun
7a5(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas// g.yo ba'i tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha' sa rgya me dang rlung // ci ltar 'dod bzhin brtan byas par// bsrubs na las rnams thams cad kyang // nges pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang sems dpa' sems sa
7a6(rnying rgyud): dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo dang // sgo skyong sbrul su la phyogs te// bsam yas ji snyed bkod pa rnams// gnyis med bdag po'i byin rlabs las// so so rang rig gsang sngags dang // thugs mtshan dang rtags phyag rgya las// so so yongs
7a7(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs pa'i sku// rang rang mtshan nyid yongs brjod cing // rdo rje gsang ba'i gral 'khod de// bsam yas dag kyang de bzhin no// gnas dag dang ni dkyil 'khor dang // 'gro rnams bkod pa ji lta bang // de 'drar ston pa mchog gis
7b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ ting nge 'dzin rim par bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po rang gi spyan las langs te/ bcom ldan
7b2(rnying rgyud): 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gyi nang gi mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du brkyang phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// e ma'o bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// e mo'o
7b3(rnying rgyud): gsang mchog dgyes pa che// e ma'o rnam dag dag pa'i lam// ngo mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi de nyid don// byang chub sems kyi mchod nyid de// bdag cag rnams la bshad
7b4(rnying rgyud): du gsol// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod zhu bar spobs pa legs so// legs par zhus so// 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad
7b5(rnying rgyud): dang / da lta dang / phyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma gsungs pa gsung bar dka' ba yin te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de kho na nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid de ni brjod du yang med la/ snod du gyur pa yang dkon pa'i phyir ro/ sems dpa'
7b6(rnying rgyud): chen po de bsan khyod kyis dris shig ces bka' stsal te/ cang ma gsung bar bzhugs so// de nus mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' chen po khyod kade bzhin gas
7b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bka' yin pas zhu bar spobs pas na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po the tshom thams cad gcod pa la the tshom dang som nyi yang dang yang du zhus shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni snod ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas na/ byang chub
8a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' blod man pa rnams la yang byin gyis brlab bo// zhes bka' stsal pas/ rnga rdza ma ng+ga kun tu bzung mas rig lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis bskul ba thugs su chud nus/ 'khor mang po rnams snang du chung bar byin gyi
8a2(rnying rgyud): brlab par mdzad nas smon pa'i zhal du bltas nas gnas so// de nus bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' sbal to// rdo rje yin kun tu bzang po me lcogs pa 'dus
8a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ byang chub sems zhes bya ni// brjod dang sbabam yul las 'das// don dam grin rdordzob na mi dang // rang gi lus drag yid rdo // gcig gis gnyis kyi 'ang las byed pa// lus dang gi yid ma grub pa// rig pa/
8a4(rnying rgyud): skyes bu de yis ni// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor 'dus pa rnams la rang rang gi lus dgra yid gsum la sems nas 'khod do// de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol ba btab pa// e me'o bde gshegs
8a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// rtog par dka' ba'i snying po'i don// rab tu mi tog gnas med pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi brjod pas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e mdo gzung 'dzin rnam spangs pa/
8a6(rnying rgyud): dang yi ge'i spyod yul min// chos bdag med pa'i mnyam nyid// rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snang mdzad sems dpas kyang / rang gi byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o
8a7(rnying rgyud): chos kun stong pa'i bdag/ rang gi ngo bo brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// chos rnams kun la khyab par gnas// zhes gsungs so// de nis bcom ldan 'das rin chen sems dpas yang byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//
8b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid byang chub sems// ming du btags pa'i chos rnams kun// mnyam pa nyid la gnas bcas phyir// mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sems dpas kyang / byang chub rgya
8b2(rnying rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// e mdo'o chos su sdang ba sna tshogs kun// rang gi ngo bo brjod du med// de nyid byang chub sems su ni// mkhas pas bsgoms na rtogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das las kyi
8b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpas kyang byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos kun byang chub sems nyid de// nges pa med de dngos rtog bral// de nyid dag pa'i rang bzhin pas// mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms na 'grub// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po
8b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa/ e mdze bder gshegs
8b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i gtso// sangs rgyas yab gyur dam pa'i bdag/ rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // sna tshogs las kyis rnam par mdzad// dngos gru'i kun gyi 'byung gnas che// ngo mtshar khrid la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang // rnal 'byor
8b6(rnying rgyud): can 'thugs brje'i phyir// bder gshegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // 'khor lo can gyi dkyil 'khor dang // rin chen 'dzin dang pad+mo 'chang // sna tshogs las kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// bde bar gshegs
8b7(rnying rgyud): pas bshad du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas ston pa rgyal mchog gis// kun bzang gi ni tshig gsan nas// dkyil 'khor rab tu nyams dga' bshad// rnal 'byor stan la brtse phyir ro// las dang dngos grub thams
9a1(rnying rgyud): cad ni// slob dpon byed dang rjes 'brengs pas// de yi mtshan nyid bshad bya ba// blo yangs rgyud la goms pa dang // ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang // sems kyi rnam rtog choms pa dang // phyi nang sde snod thams cad la//
9a2(rnying rgyud): som nyi med cing the tshomachod// bsran thub mi ldog dad pa che// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan gzhan la mi spel dang // gsang ba'i dbang mchog thob pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las kun dang // dkyil 'khor dag la shis pa yi//
9a3(rnying rgyud): lag rnams ni ma nyams shing // mdog dang gzugs dang stobs dang ldan// 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan// yus la dri zhim ngad ldang pa// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi ni// dkyil 'khor bya bar rab tu gsungs// shes pa che zhing yo
9a4(rnying rgyud): tan ldan// bzo dang rig pa'i gnas la mkhas// yon tan sgo yangs spyod lam dag/ rdo rje slob dpon spun la gdung // rin chen 'dzin gyi bla mar gzung // rtag tu zlos la brtson pa dang // ngag 'jam mgrin pa bde ba dang // glu dbyangs
9a5(rnying rgyud): mkhas shing bde bar smra// chos 'chad pa la rtag tu dga'// tshig 'bru gsal zhing kha dog dmar// pad+ma can gyi bla mar gzung // bya ba las la ma rmongs shing // las dang bya ba'i dbang yang thob// brtson 'grus che zhing dbang po gsal// las
9a6(rnying rgyud): kyi lhag chad skong ba ni// sna tshogs rdo rje'i bla ma yin// de dag yon tan ma lus ldan// theg pa kun la 'byams pa ni// spyi yi dkyil 'khor dag la'o// bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni// bu yis mtshan nyid brtags par gces// rkyen thub mi
9a7(rnying rgyud): ldog dam tshig gnas// yid kyi sgo nas shin tu srung // man ngag lung la rtag dga' zhing // bla ma'i thugs kyang nges par 'dzin// rdo rje can gyi slob mar rung // lus dang yan lag mdzes dang ldan// slob dpon dag la rim tho che// rdo rje spun
9b1(rnying rgyud): 'thur byed cing // was la mtshan dang dab byung ldan// sangs rgyas 'khor mtshan gyis bshad// skrod lam rnam pazhid spun 'jug cong // rin chen nor la rtag ga nga// gser la phyogs pa'i rin chen gyis// blam mnyes par byed pa ni/
9b2(rnying rgyud): rin chen dkyil 'khor dag la'o// dag gi ni shin sbyangs// rdzun dang phra mchog rtsub med// glu dbyings dgel dga' ba ni// brda 'dzin pa'i snod rgya bshad// las la gus shing chos la dga'// dpa' la rtsal rje mkhas shing gsal/
9b3(rnying rgyud): rma mra'i dgos pa kun byed pa// sna tshogs rdo rje'i bu yin no// yon tan de dag kun ldan pa'am// kun gyis bkur zhing kun la mdzes// spyi yi dkyil 'khor dag lnga shis// gnas su bya ba'i rnam pa yang // srang thang gnyis su shes par \u0f7f/
9b4(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin mo yi slar rjes sam// gnod sbyin mtshon chas bshal rjes dang // 'byung po dag gi rgun s+ye dang // klu gdug dag gi rgya srang dang // nyen dang 'brel sa'i gnas dag dang // kha na mthor bcas pa'i gnas// sbyangs na dngos grub
9b5(rnying rgyud): myur bar bshad// gnas su rung ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje'i phrag chen gtams pa'am// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtsi rnams sum// mdangs bzang gangs ri thAg dkar du// rdo rje can gyis bsrub tu rung // phug dang dgon pa'i ri dag dang /
9b6(rnying rgyud): nigs tshal dra bathibs pa 'am// mdangs dkar shar du gzhol ba ni// sangs kyis 'khor lo can gyi'o// rin chen sna lnga'i kha dog gas// rin chen blar brgyad dbyibs 'dra ba// rin chen dag la chung bar bshad// tsan+dan nags tshal me tog
9b7(rnying rgyud): chu khring nyams dga' yid 'ong bar// pad+ma sgrub par de shis so// dur khrod dam grog pa shul ba'i gnas// sum mdo srog gre nub po'i ri// sna tshogs rdo rje can gyi'o// ri zan mang po 'dus pa'i spyi// ri bos bskor ba'i lhag phran
10a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ tshal// de nim tu sbya bshad// yang na dgus padun can// yon tan ma dang ldan par bshad// tha ma slob ma gnas rnams kyang // ma brtags nyen dang ya gang bzlas// dngas grub ring bas blanan tu//
10a2(rnying rgyud): skyes nas spang bar bya ba yin// rnal 'byor blo mchog mi ldan na// gnas dang slob ma la sogs pa// sman yang 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes// bder gshegs rgyal bkun gyis gsungs// blo dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyis// gnas dang slob sa
10a3(rnying rgyud): yo byad dang // cho ga la sogs ma ldan yang // 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'on kyang gnas dang slob ma dang // yo byad ldan na myur 'grub ces// bder dag shegs kun gyis gsungs pas na// mtshan nyid rnams ni bshad pa yin//
10a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i dngos po gzhom pa'i phyir// gnam dang sa dang bar snang dag/ rigs rnams so so'i mtshan ma ltar// brtags te nges par gzung bar bya// ting 'dzin rtse gcig brtan pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya bya ba yis// sbyang bar bya ste dngos
10a5(rnying rgyud): med bya// des kyang sbyong ba'i las su gyur// de tshe dbang bskur lha mo de// mchod de sman par bya ba na// ru dra'i rgol bas mi tshugs shing // tshogs bsags dbang du de 'gyur ro// byin dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi de// snang dang mi snang bdag po
10a6(rnying rgyud): la// thugs thub ras tshod ma yin par// rin dang bden pas bsgol ba sdang // de nas sa stegs gru bzhi mas// bdud rtsi rnam lngas brkyang nul bya// gos rgyun mdzes pa'i grogs mchog ma// gsal bar ldan ni byin rlabs las// tshad ldan
10a7(rnying rgyud): rdoji'i srad bu yis// thig gdab pa yi sbyor babya// 'gro ba blo glongs mi shes pa'am// dang po las kyi blor zhugs la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mtshon pa'i phyir// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// rnam lnga'i tshon gyis bri bar bshad// rab tu zlu ma
10b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// theg pa na gdab pas dkyil 'khor dgu// gru chad par khyams blo khyud bcas// dbus su sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'thil ba'i tshul// drang ga'i gdan la yang dag gnas// rnam par margyan
10b2(rnying rgyud): rnams rdzogs par gsal// kha dog mthing gdod dang bcas// de yi spyan sngar snang mdzad sems// rdo rje dbyings dang thabs cig tu// glang po'i gdan la yang dag gnas// kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar ba'o// rin chen sems dpa' g.yas
10b3(rnying rgyud): nye// rin chen dbyings phyag ma dang bcas// rdzu 'phral d+ha li lI la bzhugs// dza s+pha rA da'i gser 'od 'dre// rgyab tu chos kyi sems dpa' ste// chos kyi sems mar bcas pa yang // khyung chen dag la rnam par bzhugs// 'amang po
10b4(rnying rgyud): dwaga'i mdog/ las kyi sems dpar g.yon du'o// lus sde byings phyugs dang 'dris// nam mkha' sno ga chen la// itA nI la ladog rungango // gyi nang sems dpa' sems ma rnams// gyi nang pA la de zhi gyi// thor ni thob ma dang bcas/
10b5(rnying rgyud): bar thams dag la sprul wa dang // kun bzang yang yum de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyams dga' dem pa'o// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi gnas// 'khor lo srams pa ni mu rgyud bcas// pra N+Dad par thams de/
10b6(rnying rgyud): te// de dri spangs ces na sring mdzad// rnam 'a' cings dang dbyas tshobargya/ sna lugs 'dzin par de 'asmin te// rgyumar mi baspyod yum dang byangs// gzhan rnams kya ni da shin tu// de na 'drub ni/
10b7(rnying rgyud): dkyi 'khor dam pa yin// rin chen bu rab byed ldan pa la// bar khyams blo klung de bzhin no// dbus su rin chen yab yu ma ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa lce phyogs su// 'a 'debs brgyad pa sa// dbu mi bri chos kyisems dpa
11a1(rnying rgyud): rnga 'dzin brlab phyogs sur// gzhan rnams kyang na de bzhin no// nAtshogs las kyi dkyil mdzar ne// las bzhi'i dbyibs dang ldan pa las// dbus stsalas kyi sems dpa' ste// rdo rje la cung rgya
11a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs pa'o// btsun mo dag dang ldan pa'o// gzhan nams kyang 'di bzhin no// spangs rgyas ca kyi dkyil 'khor ni// rdorje rjen dang 'drab ste// dkris sa lags kyi bdag pa ni// gtsog zungs drung drang brel pa rje// mi rjer ya
11a3(rnying rgyud): phra ma thugs pa gnas// gzhan yang de de shin rgyas par bri// dkyil 'khor rnams dag 'di dag la// dus pa brgyad dmya ba rgyad gnyis sam// cing byor btud ba sgom pa'am// bdun rtsi lba'am rin chen bcas// bla buni mang du rgyam sa// gang /
11a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rin zin bum pa ni// dang zig ser gyi bum par bshad// gnyis pa shel dang dngul gyi ste// gsum pa bi mamo'o// bzhi pa zangs kyi rnam par bshad// lnga pa sngags kyi bum par bshad// drug pa la ni sna tshogs pa'o// bum pa gas
11a5(rnying rgyud): ba bya zhag par bya// gzhan yang rgyan gyi khyad par dang / rdol mo yid 'ong ci byor dang // mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang // gtor ma la sogs mdzes par 'akram// de nas nal 'byor can gyis ni// dbyings nis dkyil 'khor spyan drang
11a6(rnying rgyud): mchod// mnyes nas nye bar bsgrub pa dang // las bzhi'i mchod pa brtsam b+ha d+he// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan mar bcas// gzugs sgra ji ro 'thung ba yis// mchod sbyin stob pa'i sras rnams bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog der/
11a7(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// ci la dag 'a zhis dris nas su// bdag ni 'di la dga'o zhes// 'dug pa pos kyang len du byin// tha ma lung ldan des kyang ni// mna' yi de'i byin pa'i byer// dazlas pa'i mun 'a bar bya// gsang 'a'
11b1(rnying rgyud): ka 'di dag bakhrug/ skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi rtsa// khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni// lha dang tham sman mo srang // sngags dang phyag cad bzhin to// gsang ba gzhan la sbrel bya med// bslab pa'i dam rdzas rnam pa'o// rtag tu 'ang
11b2(rnying rgyud): zhing bza' bar bya// sha lnga dag dang chang lnga dang // 'dod pa lnga rnams rtag tu bsten// sbyor dang sgrol dang phra ma dang // mi snyan rkub skud par bya// dka' thub dka' 'a spyad mi bya// khrims dang sdom pas bcing ba min// snying nas slob dpon
11b3(rnying rgyud): da pas ni// dngos grub bsrubs kyang don med 'gyur// de nas bla ma lung ldan des// rdo rje'i tshul du dbang dag sbyin// de yang snod kyi khyad par las// ci dang ci 'os de bzhin sbyin// dkyil 'khor dang por bsgrub pa'i dbang // gnyis par
11b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang // gsum par gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang // bzhi par 'chad pa'i dbang dag sbyin// las kyi dbang ni lnga par sbyin// drug par rab 'byams rgyal po la// stsogs pa'i dbang rnams ji snyed pa// tshang bar bsrung du rung bar
11b5(rnying rgyud): bshad// de nas dbang mchog thob bya'i phyir// rigs kyi bu mchog de dag gis// yon mchog dag ni dbul bar bya// srog lus man chad sras kyi rnams// ma 'jungs pa yi sems kyis dbul// rang gi lus dang sems dag dang //
11b6(rnying rgyud): yang yon gyi mchog yin te// sems kyi dgos pa gang dang gang // rdo rje 'dzin gyi yon du bshad// rin chen dang ni 'dod pa yi// yon tan sna tshogs dbul ba ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi yin// rin po che dang nor gyi dbyig/ ji snyed yodapa
11b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni// rin chen 'dzin gyi yon yin no// ma dang bu mo chung ma dang // sring mo shin tu brgyan pa dang // mo yi ming dang mtshan ma can// pad+ma can gyi yon yin no// glang po rta dang shing rta dang // khyogs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang // theg pa'i bye brag thar
12a1(rnying rgyud): nang dun// san // // gas sa da// sa nan/ byu
12a2(rnying rgyud): nA dpral// dkyil 'khor dag ni de dgaH// sras pa gseng ba'i dbang bskur nas// gzungs mni dang de nams// ma~M ni yang de lta dbum// dpa mchog thob pa'i dumatshig la// da tho btags dgangs par sbyin// dang por
12a3(rnying rgyud): gtan rdzogs sbyin// gnyis par phyag rgya 'byom pa gtad// gsum pa gsang ba'i ngas don bshad// bzhi ba chos kyi glegs pam gtad/ pa mas bzhi'i rgyartags b+hin// drug par rin chen sna bdun nam// ra kyi khyang par can dgags/
12a4(rnying rgyud): yadun na tshogs ma bar byen// dbang mchog thog sa sa kyi// rmi lam dag kyang 'byu // da ge sems pa dam gas rnam pas na/ mag bang du 'das pa dang // rje 'phrul dag gis 'gro ba dang // sa
12a5(rnying rgyud): mthogs chung mi 'bring // nam mkha' dag la bya bzhin 'gyur// sems can mang po bskal pa dang // gsum dod ga las rgyal byedag/ mdzong na rdo rje mdzin pa mo// dbang thob rgya rgyam yin par ngas// lus kyi rwa'i dril nobu pa dang // na mi ma lag
12a6(rnying rgyud): bas pa dang // skye ba gcil por byung bdug/ de ma byed padang // 'gro bganana'i tshig byed dang// rnal tshogs kyi mang / ba na bye pal// byinas pa 'im sa 'dod pa na/ pon bye dpa ba tas
12a7(rnying rgyud): rin chen rnatshogs spyod pa da // khabs tshogs pa pad // can dang 'gabacad pa // don zhan mi ga // dmed kyim nyin ma / tshogs rnarnams thos padag mas sa rgyagathos dang /
12b1(rnying rgyud): 'i dam pa ni// rin chen 'dzin gyi dbang thob stas// badz+ra'i rdzing na rtse ba dang // de la rtse zhing za ba dang // glegs pa ma zab mo rnyed pa dang // de la 'chad cing klog pa dang // 'gro ba dag la chos ston dang // dge slong dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor/
12b2(rnying rgyud): de la rdzogs pa'i lhas rnams zhi// rdo rje chos kyi dbang thob yin// las rnams kun la 'jug pa dang // ral gri lag tu thogs pa dang // ri rab glad la bskor ba dang // nyi zla lag pas bzung ba dang // gsod dang gsad dang rgyal ba dang // theg pa rnams la zho
12b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // de la stsogs pa'i ltas rnams ni// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbang thob ltas// rme ltas mtshan ma ji snyed pa// ji ltar rmi zhing mthong ba'am// yang na ci yang ma mthong ba'am// mngon sum gsal ba thams cad kun// spyi yi dbang thob lhas
12b4(rnying rgyud): su rung // gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di dag tu// zhugs nas dbang thob gang zag de// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyi sa bkur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// kun gyis bstod cing bkur ba dang // sdug cing bsngags pa brjod pa dang // nad med
12b5(rnying rgyud): lang tsho bde ba dang // 'jig rten mthu chen 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis sras su dgongs// rgyal sras rnams kyis grogs su mthong // de la stsogs te bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi// sku yi dkyil 'khor bkod
12b6(rnying rgyud): pA las// rnam pa mtha' yas grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin dkyil 'khor bris pa las// yi ge gsung gi phyag kya'i tshogs// ji bzhin gsal bar bkod pa yi//
12b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu slob ma rnams// zhugs pa yang ni de bzhin no// gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// ji bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang // so so'i rang rtags phyag mtshan rnams// ji bzhin gnas su
13a1(rnying rgyud): bkod pas/ gzhag pa la rdzogs byas na yang // lan ldand dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ spyang dug sa dang grags kyi rnams// gcig la'ang gas pa gsum mang pa 'a// dbasan bya du ldan pas// ngas da /
13a2(rnying rgyud): med par shes par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu jug rol pa'i mdo las/ mu gsung thugs kyi gzugs brtan gyi dkyil 'khor rim par bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
13a3(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che// rnam dag gsung mchog rgyal po des// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang // tshon rtsi dag ni bkye ba yi// brnyan ma yi ni dkyil 'khor de// rnam
13a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpas mi byeng // byas ni dngos grub rnyed par dka'// de bas ting 'dzin nan tan 'asgom// nam mkha'i rdorje dbus gnas par// da'ang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gzhal yis mo 'od 'bar bar bsgom// 'khor lo rgyan dang rim rdo rje/
13a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs// der ni nga sngags pa dge zob sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus smini// darje dkyilang 'o dang rnom po // dang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// bsgoms na rdo rgyan du 'gyur// nam pa 'a'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas
13a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil mapor bsgom par bya// rang sngags 'khor lo can gyi gzugs// bsgoms na 'khor po can du 'gyur// nam ma kha 'i ljongs kyi dbus su ni// rin chen dkyil khor ba sgom par bya// rang thigs rin chen can gyi gzugs// bsgoms na drini
13a7(rnying rgyud): na mingan par 'gyur// nam mkha'i byings kyi dbus sun// ngarje'i dkyil sa 'a zlom par bya// dang rdzags parjo bye gzugs/ sgoms nang 'dzin par gyur// rnam mang sa byings kyi dbus gnas par// las kyi dkyil bapo
13b1(rnying rgyud): dang drags dral gro can gyi gzugs// ba rnams nams kyis mas dpar 'gyur// rnam gapa byongs spyo bus gnas par// sangs sus kun byed kyil mang bsgom// lcags su bdag par ba ba sgoms na// sangs rgyag bran dang ma
13b2(rnying rgyud): par gyur// rab tu dbed pa'i gdus dag gam// pod rgya da dgas 'dabasas// ting 'dzin 'di dga' rnams na ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thog// rnal 'byor can gyis nA drug kyi// bsgoms na de nir grub par 'gyur// glang po nas
13b3(rnying rgyud): stsogs pa yi// shaM lnga dag la byin gyis brlabs// zas phyir 'di dag bza' bya ste// kha zas gzhan la chags mi bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dang sngags mi ge'i rnam pa kun// ji bzhin pasgoms na'ang 'asgrub par 'dubya// nam
13b4(rnying rgyud): myedakyis kyi dbyas gnas par// dung ba thugs kyi mtshan ma rnams// ji bzhin rnam par bsgoms na yang // 'grub 'gyur 'dri la the tshom med// rtse gcig pa 'i ting 'dzin 'dis// gang 'dod las de byed pas na// chog rdzas dpo'i byad rnams
13b5(rnying rgyud): gas pa yang ni gtsang ba ba da// chog lda ni mdzu ngas par 'dzi'o// de bsanan tan cher babyeng de// ting 'dzin gyi'i 'khor bsgom par bya// dper nagang rkyen stonang pa dag/ gdul thabs sngags kyis 'dul bltar// rang sa ma med ku na gsu
13b6(rnying rgyud): dka' yang // matam bzhag ting 'dzin rtse gcig gis// 'dral na dngos srab yam tshon dgrub// mtshan ma dag gi gzugs bstan dang // lugs ma la lcogs phyag rgya las// mtshan ma'i tir 'dzin ba sgoms byas kyang // rang gi rnal 'byor
13b7(rnying rgyud): byung te// byang chub sems la gnom pa'ims// nga shin byor kyang gyur // de bsanan tan gyi gcig gis// mtshan mamadal brtson par bang // ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyam pon bzhi gshegs pa thams cad /
14a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dur khrod khu phyug rol pa'i mdo las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyil Ta sna bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/
14a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang bu mchog gi bdag pos sngags
14a3(rnying rgyud): dang phyag rgya 'di dag bshad do// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las gang bsgrub pa'i snying po yin// 'di la gang zhig dad mos pa// sdang mdzad sems dpa' nyid 'drar 'gyur// oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsAn oM// lag
14a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng pa yi// rtse mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// bzung ba snang mdzod sems dpa'i rgya// rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis su// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu dkris shing mnyes par
14a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi za// gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te// badz+ra ak+Sho Sh+Ta hUM/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug nas// lag g.yon pang par mnyam bzhag ste// g.yas pa sa gzhi gnon pa'i tshul/
14a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mir khrugs phyag rgyar bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang // rab tu 'dir zhing skrag par 'gyur// bdud rnams tshar gcod smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rin chen 'dzin pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po 'di yin no//
14a7(rnying rgyud): rat+na saM b+ha ba g+h+nAM// mi 'khrugs phyag rgya de nyid las// g.yas pas mchog sbyin byed pa ni// rin chen 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde ba'i mchog rnams sbyin par byed// dgang dka' ba yang rab 'gengs nas// bkren pa phyug
14b1(rnying rgyud): par dag sa// gzhan yang rgyas kyi sems dbang // gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin na// padz+ra sa mriN+DA d+ha hrISh+Ta/ phyag rgya gang mad nyid las// lag gnyis bsam gtan nus nga byus// ba sems dpa' drug tu yin// sngags dang d+hU /
14b2(rnying rgyud): 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// khams gsum skye bo spos ci dgos// gzhan yang las kyi sems dpa' yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// badz+ra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a// phyag rgya gong ma de nyid
14b3(rnying rgyud): pas// mi 'jigs sbyin par bya ba ni// las kyi sems dpa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad b+ha ba// dbyings phyug ma yi sngags 'di yin// oM bung+ga lo tsa mA i/
14b4(rnying rgyud): lag gnyis zal mo mnyam sbyar te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag pa ni// dbyings phyug ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdzogs pa gtum po'ang lhan ner gyur// a~M ga gan lo tsan+da hUM/ thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mdzu bi gnyis
14b5(rnying rgyud): gdu du rta byas te// da dI rtsom mig gi tshul// rdo rje dbyings phyag ma yi tsaM// lpags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sungs rgyas thams cad dkyis 'gyur zhing // las rnams 'brub par byed pa dang // shi bu'ang mos par gdon mi pa// tri king kor ma
14b6(rnying rgyud): mgau ra R+R-i// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las// glang gnyis brjeng de'i tshigs gsum par// mdub gnyis bcug pa de ji'i tshul// mA ma kI li phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag tu 'di yis ni// bsrung ba'i las ldan byed pa ste/ mis bsrung ba /
14b7(rnying rgyud): pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi mi tshugs so// oM ka ta bi ka te ga tang ka te swA hU~M// lag gnyis thal mo khong skyong du// bsla ba rgya'i tshul byas pa// bskra dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// chos mdzod chen po tho
15a1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// d+hA tung d+hA tu swAhA// thal mo khang stong spang ba las// mdzub gnyis bkug pan rtsa ma yis// sa sa ga ma rtsam mnan// mthab gnyis dbus su bzhag pa ni// las kyi dbyings phyug tu/
15a2(rnying rgyud): byar bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyang // dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA na at+ma ko& haM// lag gnyis zla tshu brdzangs pa las/
15a3(rnying rgyud): mtheb gnyis gyen du bteg pa ni// bder gshegs kun gyi sku yi rgya// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gang la byin gyis brlabs pa de// rdo rje lta bu'i skur gyur ro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM// phyag rgya gong ma de nyid las/
15a4(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi mthe bo nang bcug ste// g.yas kyi mthe bo de bzhin bteg/ bder gshegs kun gyi gsung gi rgya// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gang la byin gyis brlabs pa de// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung du 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ha tsi d+ha badz+ra
15a5(rnying rgyud): b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM// phyag rgya grong ma de nyid las// g.yas pa'i mthe bong nang bcug ste// g.yon pa mthe bong bteg pa ni// bder gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi rgya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gang la byin gyis brlabs pa des// sangs rgyas kun/
15a6(rnying rgyud): gyi thugs su 'gyur// de la lcogs te bsam yas mchog/ chome dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// brjod med brjod du med pa yi// yon tan mtha' klas bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal
15a7(rnying rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las// sngagra dang phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces bstod do// e mngo rna ma dag stong pa'i lam//
15b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi sgra 'i mchog/ sna chog las phyung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ rnam dag sgra chen khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi thug chen po// ye shes gtsol phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chos kyi 'khor los rab
15b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba// sangs rgyas mkhor lo khyod la 'dud// nor bu 'dzin pa khyod lu 'dud// pad+ma pad+ma 'chang la 'dud// sna tshogs las la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ni/ de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar 'jug
15b3(rnying rgyud): so// de tshe rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs// 'khor rnams rgya mtshor bcas rnams kyis// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro rnams sna tshogs 'dul bar gyur// la lar sku yi don mdzad pa// 'gro rnams kun la sdig song gzugs//
15b4(rnying rgyud): sprul pas so sor 'dul ba ni// dmyal ba rnams la gshed pos 'dul// pre ta rnams la kha 'bar gzugs// dud 'gro rnams la seng ge'i gzugs// mi rnams kun gyi 'jig rten du// 'khor los sgyur rgyal lta bu'i tshul// lha min rnams la//
15b5(rnying rgyud): thags bzang gzugs// lha rnams la ni brgya byin gzugs// tshangs ris rnams la tshangs chen gzugs// chags bral rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// sku ni rnam
15b6(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba la// mthun byas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'dul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs ni// la lang sde snod gsum dag tu// bsdus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//
15b7(rnying rgyud): la la re gsung rab bcu gnyis so// la la stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi// gti mug rmongs pa'i 'gro rnams la// sangs rgyas 'khor los 'khor lo bskor// gi ldeng che la rdo rje 'don// rdo rje 'khor lo rab tu bskor// dkyil can la rin po che'i// 'a
16a1(rnying rgyud): blan med pa bskor// 'dod pas 'chel pa'i 'gro gang la// pad+ma 'khor lo rab tu bskor// phrag dog spyod pa'i las grang la// sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'khor lo skor// 'gro ba'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de nyid rdzand
16a2(rnying rgyud): tha dad ston// la lar lhums su gshegs pa'i tshul// la lar lhums nas bltams pa'i tshul// la lar gzhon nu'i rol byed ston// la lar khyim pa lta bu'i tshul// la lar khab nas rab tu byung // la lar dka' thung dka' nga spad// la la
16a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub mchog sems bskyed// la lar bdud bzhi 'dul bar ston// la lar rdo rje'i sa la gshegs// la lang byang chub shing dbang drung // la lar skul ba'i sa la gshegs// la lang rnam pa bcu gnyis su// lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo bskor//
16a4(rnying rgyud): lar tsho rdul chen po ston// la lar mya ngan 'da' tshul ston// la lar sku gdung ring bsrel ston// la lar chos kyi grogs bam ston// la lar phyi rol 'byung ba las// chos dang mthun pa'i sgra skad 'byung // la lar mu stegs lta bu'i tshul// la lar
16a5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten bsam gtan tshul// la lang sa bcur rim gyis 'byung // la lar spyan lnga rnam par dag/ la lang mngon shes pha rol gyin// la lar khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// la lar 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// byin
16a6(rnying rgyud): rlabs cho 'phrul de ltar bstan// de tshe 'gro rnams thams can kun// las kyi stobs kyi dbang gyur pa// log pa can gyi rA t+yA rnams// ldog lha'i mthus bsnyems ma gtogs pa// sangs kyis bstan la dad par 'gyur// byang chub spyod sgo ji snyed pa/
16a7(rnying rgyud): de snyed 'bras bus pade la bkod// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o rdo rje kun tu bzang // ngo mtshad khyod la bdag cag 'dud// e ma
16b1(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags ya mtshan cha// e mdze ston pa cho 'phrul che// A mra 'o ngo mtshar rdzu 'phrul che// e ma'o sngags kyis mi 'dul med// 'di ni ngo mtshang la mtshan no zhes gsal pas/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// rigs rgya
16b2(rnying rgyud): bu khyod tshur nyon cig/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la ni// su zhig mos pa'i skyes bu des// mi bya ba ni gar yang med// mi 'grub pa ni gang yang med// rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang // ma byin len dang mi tshangs spyod// rdzun dang ngag chub smra ba dang //
16b3(rnying rgyud): zas su bshad gci nag khrag dron po 'thung ba dang / ngan thos ngan spyod thams cad kyis// gsang ba 'di nyid 'grub par 'gyur// pha dang khu bo myes po dang // bu dang sun dang mdza' bo rnams// zhe sdang sems kyis bsad byas na// rdo rje'i rigs kyi zhing du 'gyur//
16b4(rnying rgyud): ma dang phreng mo bu mo dang // gdol pa mo dang phyal pa la'ang // 'dod pa'i sems kyis sbyang bas nas// pad+ma'i rigs su nges par ste// zhes gsungs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag smag ste rab tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu 'ang/
16b5(rnying rgyud): thos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag slang gso bar gsol zhes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems kyi 'od zer zhi zhing 'khyil bas/ de dag la bsgrims te byin
16b6(rnying rgyud): gyis brlabs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag slar dran pa rnyed de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhal du mig mi 'dzum par bltas te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang bu mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka'
16b7(rnying rgyud): stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams rang rang gi 'du shes ngan pa de dag zong zhig/ byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yi// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// de nyid 'jig rten sna tshogs te// phyag rgya'i tshogs chen de nyid do//
17a1(rnying rgyud): chos na skams dbang bsgyur bas// dal dngas pag ma med// spyod bsgoms ca bslabs cang // chu da na chud// dbyung 'i gnas nyid bumo gnas// klag bsngal nyid kyang byung chub ma/
17a2(rnying rgyud): 'khong banyid kyang mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa nyid ni mngon sangs rgyas// nges don de la 'dus par sbyor// zhes gsungs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gsom nyi dang bral nas rang rang gi de bzhin nyid la dmigs te cing mi smra bar 'khod do// rgyud kyi
17a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba dur thod khu thug rol pa'i mdo la ste/ thugs rjes 'dul bar bstan pa mdzi drug pa // / de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bdi ba gshegs pa la phyogs pa thams cad dkying
17a4(rnying rgyud): pa gcig tu gyur te/ log pa'i lam dngos po la mngon par zil ba/ mngon pa'i rgyal gyi mthung rjes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rten pa la mngon par ma dad pas/ 'jig rten zung bar byed pa rnams/ zhibs pan pa'i skabs la mabang te/ ro
17a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol pa btud do// oM r+ya'o log pa'i lam gyis man ngam// zhibs pan par mi 'gyur te// 'dod 'bod par byung bar 'gyur// shinaH
17a6(rnying rgyud): TIg tum gdug pa la// ye shes zlos pas 'dul ba rje'i gyur// de bas mngon pa'i 'dul mdza rigs// nas gas pangs/ bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog gi bdag pas gsol ba btab pa de thugs su zad nas/ hUM hUM/ zhes pos rigs
17a7(rnying rgyud): di ga shegs pa phyogs pa'i 'khor rnams cad dang gi thugs par zlasaH/ gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su mi rjeng par 'dzad do// gdung byed kyil 'khong sa rdzogs 'thams cad kyang nyid kyi tshul bsdus te mi phreng bar mdzad// de nas d+ha sa
17b1(rnying rgyud): dz+wa baT cas pa'i sla brjod cing rdo rje khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// thos pa'i sgra mngon par 'du mdzad de/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyeng mtha' yas par snang ba'i thugs ka nas rig pa'i dz+ha sdug nag las/ rdung nag rdo
17b2(rnying rgyud): rje'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'i dkyil na/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab 'bar ba'i steng na/ drag po e'i gzhal yas khang nA ma mkha'i rgya dang mnyam pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phro ba 'khrugs pa'i klong du 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// de nas
17b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ma hA kro d+hI zhes brjod pas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug mngon par phyung ste/ gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las/ b+h+rUM d+h+waM b+h+rUM bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wA la maN+Dal paT phaT phaT ha la ha la zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
17b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku rjes su dran nas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgya thams cad khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang bar gyur to// rdo tshe'i'ajig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'bugs
17b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ tshig rab tu tshig/ kun tu tshig go// 'byor rab tu 'thod kun tu rab tu 'thor ro// de'o tshe 'jig rten 'di phung bar byed pa'i dregs pa chen po dang / bcu byin dang / tshangs pa dang / ma hA de ba dang / khyab 'jug
17b6(rnying rgyud): rnams rang rang gi rgya ba ston cing shin gnas gtum mo// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos hU~M hU~M hU~M bcoMs tus na b+h+rUM bi hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas/ khro ba'i chom pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i dregs pa bsgral nas/ slar 'dus te sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i sra mthing nag
17b7(rnying rgyud): dbugasum pa mdog mthing nag dmar nag ldang nag gi tshul gyis rngams pa/ phyag drug zhi bo sang ge stong tshul du prA nga/ rdo rje'i gshog pas gtams pa/ sangs rgyas lnga dbul rdzogs shing sgrub ma nag tu kyil ba/ dpal kyi chas dang drung khrod kyi rgyan gyis
18a1(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa/ stod rdo rje'i go cha la srang kho bo'i phu rabs gtams pa/ me bar ba'i dkyil na yum ral pa gcig ma dang 'khrel ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa gtsug tu sbyar te/ bka' nod pa'i tshul dug nas shing / dregs pa kun
18a2(rnying rgyud): zhabs rog tu 'ardzis te gnas pa las/ khros pa'i rgyal po dbar bskur ba'i phyir/ hUM kro d+ha badz+ra/ hUM dz+nyAn 'adz+ra zhes brjod nas/ las kyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni phyag g.yas bar mar gyin/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa ni g.yas dang por byen te dbang bskur ro// de nas
18a3(rnying rgyud): dregs pa de dag brlang po'i gtum tshig sgra zhing nga rgyal gyi mthu ston pa las/ lag cha kha T+wAM ga phyag g.yon gyi bar mas phrog nas rgyal ba'i rtags su bsnams so// de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos/ rjekhro bo phur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
18a4(rnying rgyud): thoba'i chung ba de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// hUM kro d+ha kI li kI la yis pA'i b+h+rUM paM hUM phaTaHbadz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bid+d+hi hU~M hU~M phaT rad+na shI ye tsA la hU~M Ta/ padz+ra b+hI si kI pa ya sarba ban+d+ha tu hU~M phaTaHkarma kI oM kI la ya
18a5(rnying rgyud): hUMhU~M phaT zhes brjod pas/ khrag 'brang khro bo las kyi phung pa dang / rdo rje'i bo las kyi phu ri ba dang // rin chen khro bo las kyi phur be go// rnams kyi phreng pa dang / phrin las kho bo las kyi phung ba rnams// sku snod gil gsum rgya gdug pa la/
18a6(rnying rgyud): slad lcags kyi phur pa drag po'i dbyings su sdang ba/ dbu sla kha ma pa zur gsum gyi thabs su 'gred ba/ dbul rigs lnga'i gzhal yas khang dang bcas par rdzogs pa/ thugs kan ye shes sems dpa' dang ldan par/ e'o gdan la sras mchog rdo rje gan
18a7(rnying rgyud): da dga' nod pa'i tshul dugs/ de nas yid khrig 'a cung chen pos 'dind ces bskul lo// nag bya ga sum drug pa dkyil 'khor nas// rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog sdepapa// mthing na gachen po gcer bar pa pacad/
18b1(rnying rgyud): pa can gyi snying la thob// ces pas/ sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i phyag tha ma gnyis kyis khrag 'jung khro bo las kyi phur pa'i ske nas bzung nas dregs pa chen po po mo zhabs 'og tu mnan pa'i snying la gzer te bskul lo// de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos 'di skad ces bsru ro/
18b2(rnying rgyud): d+h+r-igru gsum spug nag drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// smug nag chen po gcer bu ral pa can// gti mug dregs pa can gyi snying la thob// ces pas/ sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i phyag ji ma gnyis kyis
18b3(rnying rgyud): rmikhro bo las kyi phung pa'i ske nas bzung ste tshangs pa pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa bskal lo// de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos 'di skad ces bskyal lo// hUM gru gsum ser nAg drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'dus pa'i skyes mtsho ga kI la la// ser nag
18b4(rnying rgyud): chen po gcer bu ral pa can// nga rgyal dregs pa can gyi snying la thob// ces pas/ sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i phyag tha ma gnyis kyis rin chen khro bo las kyi phur ba'i ske nas bzung ste brgya byin pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral lo// de nas yang khrag 'thung
18b5(rnying rgyud): chen pos 'di skad ces bskul lo// hUM gru gsum dmar nag drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// dmar nag 'jigs pa'i gcer bu ral ba can// 'dod chags dregs pa can gyi snying la gzer// zhes pas/ sras mchog
18b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gzhon nu'i phyag na ma gnyis kyis pad+ma khro bo las kyi phung ba'i ske nas bzung ste/ ma hA ba po mo 'khor dang bcas pa bskal lo// de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos 'di skad ces bskul lo// hUM gru gsum ljang nag drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas// phrin las 'dras
18b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sras mchog kI le ya// ldang nag chen po gcer bu ral pa can// phrag dog dregs pa can gyi snying la thob// ces pas yang sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i phyag tha ma gnyis kyis/ phrin las khro bo'i las kyi phur pa'i ske nas bzung ste khyab 'jug pho mo 'phor
19a1(rnying rgyud): dang banas pa / nas srung d+ha chu pa na rtswa dunan na rgyu bya ngarnas pas nga nga/ zug gas par
19a2(rnying rgyud): jig chung nga gzhon rdzas byung / nga dad ga sa rjegs pa nga grol na dzinas kya sbyi ga zhe ma po kyi'i rmugs mi bang dgu mdzad de// chos mi chog rdorjeg na pa ba sum panyis sa pa pa
19a3(rnying rgyud): sa dus su ma dang/
19a4(rnying rgyud): sam nga / sa pa 'a'o// sangs mi dang/ shod pa / dang/
19a5(rnying rgyud): bye dang / da / rgya skyes te/ ny-i // nga/ gi'i ngas sa / ma
19a6(rnying rgyud): sa gnasas pa dang na na s+ho/ mi gshes nga na mal pa man byinan ma sa rjin bri de dag dang can dang ga sa ba dang brjon de/ pa drug pa dang / gcig dang patadang / khyim dang btsud
19a7(rnying rgyud): dang/ nga 'a dang / 'a/ nga/ na nas med pa ma la ba gtus su
19b1(rnying rgyud): dang / seM ska dang/ gshin rje dang / srin po dang / klu dang / rlung rgya dang / gnod ston dang / bsregs dang / sa bdag rnams gtor dang bcas pa gang ma ltang bsgom ma// donas dpal khrag 'thang chen pos gsang ba rol man ta man pa ta
19b2(rnying rgyud): par zhugs te/ hU~M hUM b+h+rUM e ar mi ru lu dus hU~M pha nas brjod pas/ drag po chen po'i ma dang bu mo dang chung ma'i tshogs kyi mo nyi shuH brgyad 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas khrag 'thung chen de'i thad du lung tsam gyis 'dus so// 'dus nas kyang nyid kyisu
19b3(rnying rgyud): 'khril te dgyes pa'i sprin las ha ha zhes pas/ dkar mo dang / kun mo dang / sbos mo dang / gtum mo dang / rmongs mo dang / ro langs ma dang / thal byed ma dang / sme sha can rnams ri re la yang tshogs bsam gyis mi khyad pa rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang /
19b4(rnying rgyud): stan dang chas te 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// de nas yang dgyes pa'i sprin las he zhes brjod pas/ seng gdong dang / stag gdong dang / wa gdong dang / khyi gdong dang / bya rgod gdong dang / dur bya'i gdong dang / bya rog gi gdong dang / drug
19b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gtod rnams ri re la yang tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pa rang rang gi lag cha dang stan dang chas te dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// yang dgyes pa'i sprin las phaT zhes pas/ rta gdod dang / phag gdong dang / seng gdong dang / sbrul gdong rnams
19b6(rnying rgyud): la yang tshogs bas ma gyis mi khyab pa rnams dkyil mdzod du khong do// de nus ma mo de dag phaT zhes pas rang rang gi gnas gal ba deng wad tsam gyis phyin pa rab kye'o// de nas rgya bo rnams phyag brang la bsnol te btsong bas/ mi gtsang ba'i rgya mchi 'khyil te dran pa med
19b7(rnying rgyud): pa las// khrag thung chen pos thugs rnga'i bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i ting nge 'don la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ sbyor mtshams nas khro mardo pe brtsegs ma 'thon te/ mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho bdubs pas slar dran thob ste/ bden pa mthong nas dpel cher
20a1(rnying rgyud): po'i 'bangs su mnas par te/ lus khro bo rnams kyi gdan khrir phul te/ grub pa lang kar khas 'ches nas phyi rabs pa'i rnal 'byur gyi tshogs myong bar dam bcas so// de'i tshe phyo gas khyong rnams zhabs ra
20a2(rnying rgyud): tu zhag go// ma dang bu mo dang chung ma rnams kyang dpal gyi 'khor du phul te dmachog byin nas gzhal yas khang gi mu ngan la bzhag go// rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu bug rol pa'i mdo las/ dregs pa can
20a3(rnying rgyud): btul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'dri dag thugs ka nas klung ngo // dur khrod dang ni dam grog gnas// rkang gcig sum mdo 'ang stong du// rdo
20a4(rnying rgyud): rdo drug po'i dkyil 'khor bya// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// gru tshong bzhis ni rab tu brgyan// gruba'i dro khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// dbus kyi lte bzlum po la// thig bani maN+Dal babyung du bya// de dag
20a5(rnying rgyud): la ni mthing nag gi// gru gsum me 'od 'bar bar bya// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan dag la// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yub dgod// spyan rnga nyid dang stsogs bzhi ru// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba lus// sras mchog phur pa lnga po dgod// rnam kyal
20a6(rnying rgyud): gshed ngo rta mdzin dang // bdud rje 'khyil pa nyid dang bzhi// dri drag shin rje grug drug dang // gnod sbyin gdan mchings dag la// phyogs pazhi dag tu gzungs dang bcas// du tsams kyi 'dzong po dag la yang // khams gsu rna
20a7(rnying rgyud): dbyug sngon can// mi garog rten gyi mi thu brgyal// bgegs dang drang srong srin po dang // rlung lha'i gdon la bzung babru ma tshul// 'dra dang khro mo dag dang 'arje pa// mdun dang kyang tu hU~M dang ni// stobs chen gzungs dang bzlas pa dang // rgyas par
20b1(rnying rgyud): sas sun // pas // nga drun / /
20b2(rnying rgyud): su na/ sa
20b3(rnying rgyud): sa na dru/ sa su na
20b4(rnying rgyud): na
20b5(rnying rgyud): su lu su // su
21a1(rnying rgyud): 'du/ tho ma tshogs sa dang/ da rgyas so / rus labab par sems cad/ las la babar 'dus 'thor bdu/ mtshanam ma dragacas dang bya/ gas sa rlabs thams sa /
21a2(rnying rgyud): dang byang shar mtshams su bstan// ma nga nang dragazhag par \u0f7f// zla ba'i phu pa mang po rlan// / yi phyogs su sungs te bzhug/ dri nas gdeng ldanan pa 'byor des// der rtagang tha su nus s+ho// khrag 'du tshogs pa da srung rnams
21a3(rnying rgyud): rdorje g.yab mas spyan drangs te// gnyis med brtan par dmigs nas ni// rmang du byung ba'i mchod pa byartsam// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis mdzod// mnyes nas nye bar bsgrub pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon brda sa byed dang // grA ma sman la 'akra ze
21a4(rnying rgyud): dang // gsang ba'i theg pa sdod pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang // rgyal khams yongs su gnod pa dang // rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur la// brnag pa'i nan t+yAr bya ba ni// khro bo sum lha'i sbyor ba'am// yang ni lcags kyu
21a5(rnying rgyud): rna 'byor gyis// nyin mtshon dgung la rang bkug ste// ni ye rnam shes rlung 'dra ba// mtshan ma ming du bcug pa la// srin bu me khyer 'drar bcug ste// gzugs la phab ste srog gis bcings// de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang // sgo nog
21a6(rnying rgyud): nag po'i dud pas bdug/ 'gro ba'i lha dang phral ba gces// de'i lus tsha ba bskyed pa'i phyir// lus nang skye tshe dug gis bkang // rdo rje drag po'i ltung pa 'des// lte snying mgrin dpung 'go dang // gsang gnas yan lag snga la gda'// yungs
21a7(rnying rgyud): kar mtshon cha'i char ni dbab// de nas mtshan ma'i dngos gzhi de// drag po hom gyi dkyil 'khor du// tsher ma can gyi me sbar te// mtshon cha rab tu rnon po yis// rkang pa g.yas g.yon gang yin nas// rdul du gtub cing bsreg snang bya// lha
21b1(rnying rgyud): sa /
21b2(rnying rgyud): papa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
21b3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang pa tshig gi bdag pos de dgra lugs dang \u0f7fga~M kyi rnams bshad do// skye brib po tags pas we/ khris pa'i skabs sra gnas nas // lag g.ya ming rje 'dogs
21b4(rnying rgyud): bas pa nga/ sa/
21b5(rnying rgyud): rgya
21b6(rnying rgyud): na
22a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kr-iH badza ya h+ne ha na han b+hA phaT/ lag g.yon khro mdzub snying gar bzhag/ g.yas pa lpags kyu sbyar dbyas pa// spa bzlog skabs kyis pas byan// rnam par rgyal ba ri yin par bshad// sngags dang byad tu/
22a2(rnying rgyud): 'di yis ni// rlung dang drung chen grub pa yang // bzlog par gyur te gdon mi za// rje yang ci yang phyir zlog byed// oM badz+ra kr-ita ne lad tu hU~M ha da ha hU~M phaT/ g.yon pa khro mdzub ste gar bzhag/ g.yas pa be rton tshul du gdengs// badz+ra
22a3(rnying rgyud): tshwapa stabs su gnas pa ni// pre con sngon po'i yin par bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'joms par nus// gsang ba'i las la lhag par 'debs// oM badz+ra kro ta ya mAn+ta ka hU~M pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ lag gnyis khu
22a4(rnying rgyud): tshur bcings pa las// grung mo srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te// gung mo rtse mo'i tshul du bya// rgyab tu srin lag bsnol ba las// mdzub gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du dkri// mtheb gnyis rtse sbed mdun bzhag ste// kha si tshul du byas pa ni//
22a5(rnying rgyud): gshin rje 'joms pa'i yin par bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i gugs dang bsad pa dang // bskam dang dbye dang bskrad par 'gyur// A~M badz+ra kro tA Ar+tha A tsa la hUM/ b+har+N+Na b+han+ta hU~M phaT/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo yas/
22a6(rnying rgyud): srin lag mthe'u chung sen mo mnan// mdzub mo gung mo ral gri ltar// shungs nas byung bar byas pa ni// mi g.yo mgon po'i yin par bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// lha klu la sogs ming ge gzhug byed// log 'dren tshogs
22a7(rnying rgyud): kun bred cing sreg/ oM badz+ra krota ha ya grI rba h+ne hu lu tsu lu hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du mdud// mdzub mo gshibs te bsgrengs pa las// bzlog ste dpral bar bzhag pa ni// rdo rje na yi yin par bshad/
22b1(rnying rgyud): gas dang phyag rgya 'di yis na// drag rnams thams cad 'joms par gyur// sor ba la rdzogs bzlog pa dang // 'jigs pa kun las thang par 'thud// o badz+ra grong yang dun tu// // phaT/ lag gnas khu tshur bcangs pa
22b2(rnying rgyud): las// rgyang sprad mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud// mdzub gnyis rtse sprad zhags pa'i tshul// gzhan gyis mi thub yin par bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // rab tu 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur//
22b3(rnying rgyud): gdon rnams thams cad gzing bar byed// A badz+ra kro tra a mr-i ta ku d+ha li b+hu hU~M hrI d+hUR+tha dz+nyA phaT/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gis// mehrIn klung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan// so sor dpung 'gor bsnol ba ni// bdud rje 'khyil ba'i yin par bshan/
22b4(rnying rgyud): sa dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // smod par 'gyur te gdon mi za'o// oM badz+ra kro ta tri lo kya bi dza ya hUM b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ra hUM phaT/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// mdzub gnyis bsgrengs te mkhrig ma bsnol//
22b5(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rnam rgyal yin par bshad// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bcing bdal gyur ti ga don mi za// oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag/
22b6(rnying rgyud): yas pas brdeg pa'i stongs su phyur// stobs po che du bshad pa yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// thun pa byung na char pa 'bebs// char chen yang gcod par byed// oM badz+ra kro ta pa ya ba ti t+te/ las ke hUM/ pra ti tsa hUM/ shwa sha na pa ti hUM/ mu sa lI tA/
22b7(rnying rgyud): pa tiH/ sha kya ya hUM/ ri k+Sha ya ti hUM/ ma raNA d+hU/ tsin da mu ne hUM/ khro mo'i stangs su gnas nas su// g.yas pa thabs kyis gcol 'khyud// g.yon pa b+hat+taM rak+ta stob/ rma mo kun gyi phyag rgyar bshad// sngags dang
23a1(rnying rgyud): dasasan// las rnams thams cad byed du du/ du su na sus gas su bshang// gzhan yang yang zlal na da// mam cang rgya la rdzogs sun// sas grags dang zag tun pa za
23a2(rnying rgyud): sa gas sa// rmad kyi snang de dazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigs rab dung khrod 'brug rol pa'i mad las/ thags dang thags ste das pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang bar rdzog gi bdug pongs
23a3(rnying rgyud): darnam par spros 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de dbus bdag mo'i gzugs bsams te// las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// bka' yi 'khor lo rab 'asbyar
23a4(rnying rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas phur bu rgyun gyi ting nge 'don 'di gsungs so// gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang por dngos med byang chub sems// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phur pa khro bo'i gzugs su
23a5(rnying rgyud): brtags// rgya mdud steng du gzhal yas khang // tshad dang rgya yang ma chad pa// 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i mogs// zheng rnams gdan chen gsal ba'i steng // khrag 'thung tshogs ni rgyas par bsgom// de las sras mchog kI la ya// rgya mdu
23a6(rnying rgyud): man chad khro bo'i lus// phur pa'i lha nyid gsal bar bsgom// de nyid byin dang ldan bya'i phyir// A~MhrIHphaT/ zhes yig 'bru gsum// spyi bo rked pa rtse mo la// sku gsung thugs su bsgom par bya// ye shes lnga yi yi ge lnga// oM A
23a7(rnying rgyud): spyi bo skyed nga snying gdong // skrod pa yan lag dga' ste// mang zin rnab 'od kyi 4// dngab yi ge ni// hU~M gsum dang ni phaT gsum gyi// ros gsum der byung gsum la/ rtse mo gcig tu bsgom par /
23b1(rnying rgyud): g.yon thabs dang shes rab kyi// sor ma lab yum bcwa bsgoms te// sbyor ba'i byin brlabs 'ong 'bros pas// mu tig dkar po med ltar// nem pas lhan pas 'od dragyurang// 'dra bya mgan byin gyis brlabs// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yang
23b2(rnying rgyud): yum gyi// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// bar ma chad par de la bstim// des kyang byin chen 'dus par 'gyur// de nas sku gsung thugs nyid du// byin gyis brlabs shing brtan pa ste// lag gnyis sor ma rgyab tu bsngol// bung gte
23b3(rnying rgyud): gshi ba te bsgreng ba yi// bar du phur ba dril byas te// rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod pa'i sngags// oM badz+ra satwa rA tsi hUM// des ni thugs nyid rdo rjer 'gyur// lag gnyis sor mo rtse bsgrengs te// pad+ma lta bur byas pa yi// rting bus phur pi dril byas te/
23b4(rnying rgyud): tshig tu brjod pa'i sngags// oM phur bu phaT/ des ni gsung nyid rdo rjer 'gyur// lag gnyis sor mo rgyab bsnol te// mthe bong gshibs pa'i chang pa ru// rdo rje phur bu dril byas shing // rdo rje'i chog tu brjod pa'i sngags// A~M ha na ha na ti ba ta tsakratrU~M Ta/
23b5(rnying rgyud): des ni lus nyid rdo rjer 'gyur// de nas phur bu mchod pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// e yi gdan la bzhugs pa yi// khros pa'i rgyal po de nyid la// nyung dkar rgyal pos brdeg bya zhing // rtse gcig rdo rje dbyin gyis brlabs// lag mthis
23b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas su bzhag pa yis// gu gul dud pa'i sprin phung gis// bdud ste mchod pas mchod par bsgom// phyi nang mchod pa ci 'byor pas// mchod de lis gang bsgo bar bya// de nas bzlas pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// bdag nyid
23b7(rnying rgyud): dang po rnal 'dug ste// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las// mthing nag 'bar ba'i hUM bsgoms te// sngags kyi yi ge rab bskor bas// phur pa la yang de bzhin te// rang sngags tshig tu brjod pa las// phur pa phra mo'i sku spros te// khros pa'i snying
24a1(rnying rgyud): gang bsnams s+ho// / rangs bya bsta pa nang san/ can ma myu nga dam na/ du gdang tu dran su / ga 'a// sa da dang
24a2(rnying rgyud): nas lag g.yon 'debs tshul du// g.yas pa'i thobs brdeg tshul du// rdo rje sder mo'i sngags 'di yis// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra nAM/ oM d+ha g+hA g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TA na mA ra ya phaT/ kIl
24a3(rnying rgyud): ya kI la ya sarba dA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pA ya ti/ kA la lA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya phaT/ drag tu brjod cing gdab par bya// btab pa de nyid brtan bya'i phyir// rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad brjod// dam tshig can gyi dus ya bab/
24a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed tsong // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdub 'tsho ba pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dam par chod byed pa rnams// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe 'a
24a5(rnying rgyud): byed// khros pa chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul gyi bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul du bsheg nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM l-iny+dzi laM staM d+hA ni/ mo ha ya d+ha ga
24a6(rnying rgyud): bAn/ shri kri d+hi kri badz+ra hUM kA ra hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ badz+ra kI la la dzaHhUM baM haM/ rdo rje tshig tu brjod nas ni// bkrag dang gzi madrangs bdag la bstim// sarba bab+h+raM kI la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra hU~M ka ra aHa nyid byang chub sems kyi lus// phur ba nyed
24a7(rnying rgyud): kyang gzi byin pa skyed// 'od dang mthu dpung lhag par bskyed// de nas phyogs bcu'i khro bo la/ rdo rje chog gis 'di skad bskul// dngos grub par chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings/
24b1(rnying rgyud): dun na na na tusu smra na tu du
24b2(rnying rgyud): na du/ sa/ / mab bdu'ang pa na
24b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rnams mA// rdo rje chog gis bskyes D+ha ste// bran dang ponya ba kA nyan tshogs// khyod kyi mchog nas lA~M ba baM/ chog de ltar chas pa snyesten// drag po'i hrI la sa myu du mdzod// kI ma te tshog rnam sa the ni
24b4(rnying rgyud): rdorje'i chu yis bsreg par gyi// ha na ha ni dz+ra/ dag nyi ba dz+re/ btsab tsa 'adz+re/ mtham tha' dra/ dz+wal dz+wa li badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu rba badz+ra/ gtang gi ma dzum pa nga/ oMdzi ta a par te/ sa r+b+ba thA ma /
24b5(rnying rgyud): hU~M TaHdris kyang brtan pa'i las su 'gyur// de nas sras mchog bskul byab// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed do// stobs chen chub chen gyi yis// klad pa tshal ba brgya ru khros// nyon gyi
24b6(rnying rgyud): big gis dang log 'dren rnams// rdo rje'i bka' las 'da' mabyed// hU~M ma ma pa shaM ku dri ma lAM ny+tsa ga re/ at+man te/ ma ma kan+ta shanA rA ma N+Di ka ra ye swA hA/ de nas dbye ba rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa'i//
24b7(rnying rgyud): srungam panid byin dung byeng du// de'i mthang du byed pa ni // mdzudang du 'phrul mod byed// mos san su dedas parjod du da bsrungs do// dro rnam kyi pa di rjo/
25a1(rnying rgyud): 'dung bya zhing // dngas par gyur ba'i gnas can du// dul gan pazhan du brdung bar bya// da chasags bskal ba na// sus shig na'angar ba'i gdun// bka' mas rang kyad cigacan rnams// ma
25a2(rnying rgyud): bsregs nas/ sras ngagadu la ldan pazhin du brdung // khroma'abar ba'i gtan thong du// bris bdud na ste// skayang nga ste badrug par byar// btiSha ti 'jam/ de nas bsgrub pa snun gyi nang pa'i nang dgas ma // da
25a3(rnying rgyud): bar ba dang // rdo rje ba byed srin po dang // rdo rje gnod sbyin zhal gdangs par// mtshan ma'i dngos po bstim par bsgom// rdo rje'i cho ga 'dis bsgral bya ste// nam mkha' khro bo'i zhal gdangs su// thugs rjes 'gro kun yad la bstarba/
25a4(rnying rgyud): ngas bstag khyed kyis myed la bstims// ngo ba nas dgyes pa'i ga rgyangs spogs// skus shig bsregs la myu du'o// brda wi ti ya thA kyA wotaShA h+ni ShA haM/ ha ha ha/ hrIhUM hUM/ phaT ba Ta phaT/ de nas bsreg pa sbyin
25a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// klong yangs la khyir pa'i nyom khung du// 'bar 'gro'akhrug pa'i me skar te// ye shes 'bar 'o'i maM dpung gis// dngos par gyur po'i gnas rnams bsregardo rje'i chog tu bskal ba ni/ raM/ med zung 'a bde
25a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'gyur ba'i dngos po bsreg/ bsregs pas dngos po kun brlags te// slar mi 'tsho bar bsreg par gyur// raM dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM/ s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ de nas mnan pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// nam mkha
25a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// ri rab steng du rdo rje ni// rgya gram steng du babs pa ni// las kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// skye gr-i thams cad mnan par bsam// rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod pa ni// hU~M la
25b1(rnying rgyud): bzlas// radag rten khams na rab 'byams na// ldog par lta ba'i sems can rnams// skad cig yud la mnan par n+ya'o// au badza su me ru nus ma ya s+t+waM/ dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad pas// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor mtha' yam
25b2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ las su rung ba'i rnal 'byor pa// de yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mi bya ba yang gcig kyang med// ting 'dzin krung du 'dris pa yi// mi zhes bya ba bder gshegs yin// sangs rgyas zhes ni gud na med// ces gsungs so//
25b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ kun gyi ting nge 'dzin rim par bye ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ lhan gyis bya ba
25b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin pas kyis rnam par sbyong ba 'di gsungs so// kun tu sna tshogs las kyi rnams// kun tu sna tshogs rnal 'byor gyis// kun tu sna tshogs ting 'dzin du// gnas nas sna tshogs don bya'o// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// rmongs
25b5(rnying rgyud): par kAr dang sems can la// sna tshogs las kyi zhi bar sbyar// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// bkra shis mtshan ldan yum mchog gzung // rnam snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ram// mi bskyod rgyag rgyang bdag gnas la// dkar pa blam
25b6(rnying rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje di zer 'phro bas brgyan// rin chen kha dog dkar po'am// dkar po'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zlum po drug btab ste// zhi ba'i lha tshogs sman yang drangs// snying rje byams pas mchod sbyin bya// ya mra
