25b7(rnying rgyud): dkar la sbar ba'i ma// dkar la mang ra ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// zhi nga'i tshul du sbyin bsreg bya// dngul rje 'bras chan dkar po la// gtor mar bya ste sbyin par bya// bi gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gti mug las kyis 'chel pa rnams//
26a1(rnying rgyud): na par bla bas byangs sangs/ rdzabartan thams na 'a'athams na/ ngas pad+ma byung ba mgyog sa/ gsangs Argyas pa tud dunan ma matog brjod// nyams dag dru/
26a2(rnying rgyud): sgo'i tshal dag tu/ lcug phran ma yi yum mchog gzung // rin chen sems dpar bdag gnas la// ser po gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la// rin chen chu skyes dag gis brgyan// rin chen kha dog ser po'am// ser po'i shing las byas pa
26a3(rnying rgyud): yi// phyar bzung bzhi bzhi ba tab skye// rgyas pa'i lha tshogs spyan yang drangs// dngas byams sems kyis mchod sbyin bya// ser po'i shing la spang ba'i mer// kha ba'i ro ldan ser po'i rdzas// rgyas pa'i tshul du sprin bsreg bya// gser bye 'bru
26a4(rnying rgyud): rnams ser po la// gtor ma byas te rgyas par bya// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// nga rgyal las kyis 'chel pa rnams// rgyas par gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// chags par gyur pa'i sems can la//
26a5(rnying rgyud): dbang du bya ba sbyar bar gsungs// zla mtshan can namachu gling du// sdong gcig ma yi gzungs ma gzung // sdang ba mtha' yas rnal 'byor ram// rdo rje rtar ni rnam par bsgom// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// 'od zer 'gros pa'i mda' gzhus brgyan/
26a6(rnying rgyud): zangs la stsogs pa'i rin chen ni// dmar po'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zla gam lnga btab ste// dmar smug 'phro ba'i lha tshogs rnams// rdo rje spyugs pas spyan drangs te// dag 'a chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// dmar po'i shang la spar/
26a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i mer// spar zhing dmar po'i rdzas rnams kyis// dbang gi tshul du sbyin bsreg bya// zangs phye 'bru rnams dmar po la// gtor ma byas te dbang du bsdu// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'dod chags las kyis 'chel ba rnams
26b1(rnying rgyud): nga ngasus pas ngas su rol// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'brums na// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// drag shul spyod pa sbyar byas te// rkang gcig can na mdur khrod du// rigs ngan k+She shA can la rdzogs// mar nam la tub
26b2(rnying rgyud): mig / 'ong bdag gnas la// nas pa rgya gsum dbyel 'dong pa/ khye da can gyis brdzun par bya// rdzogs sa man go pa'i shing rnams sam// cing ma na shing rnams sum// mi mdus pa'i thung da / mdzar
26b3(rnying rgyud): gsum gsum bteb ste// mthing nag 'khrug pa'i gatshogs rnams// dregs pa 'dul bye sprin drang te// btang sgoms zlos pas mchod sbyin bya// tshong ma'i shing la slar ba'i mu// drag po ci zhing rngub pa yis// drug zing tshul du sbyin pa sreg pa/
26b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bye brunag ga khrig pas// spar ba'i gtong mas drag shul spyad// me yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang las kyis 'chel ba'i tshigs// brlag par gyur pas dbyings su rol// ji snyed phrin las bas ma yas kun// 'thob
26b5(rnying rgyud): gyis bsam pa 'brab// de snyed 'dul ba'i thabs rgyal du/ bsam yas phrin las rnam par smos// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi nga nyid las// las kyi bye brag rtsis las 'das// bya byed dang ngadu spun gyis 'brub// ces gsungs so// !
26b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi gsang 'drang khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ las rim par skye ba'i le'u ge bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos// dmachog gsang ba
26b7(rnying rgyud): pa re gsung // // tshogs mig nyin pasam yas so// rtog 'dral dam myi ga'i zhing spong // sa nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// di ni dmamag kyi// sdugasung rdzun myongs rtsod do// thub nas 'jig
27a1(rnying rgyud): dus mtha' med// rdo rje dmachog lu gu d+hur// rnal 'byor rnams kyi dka' thub dam// dra ma gcig tu bsdus pa'i sreg/ yan lag dam chog 'da' bar dkar// rdorje grAm slob dpon la// srog la bab kya
27a2(rnying rgyud): bkur bar bya// dam tshig dbang dang shes rab rgyud// man ngag 'bras bu'i slob dpon la// blta zhing bkur bar bya ba ni// pha dang ma dang mig 'bras ltar// bkur zhing gces par bya ba yin// de yi phyi bzhin be'u wAr 'breng // sna tshogs su
27a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi sgonas// mnyes shing dgongs pa bdang ba dang // tham ldan dang meng phreng la// mngon dang rgyas kyi sems pa // / ngo nge theg pa'i spun yin pas// gcig la gcig gi meg bzhin bste// 'di su maM sa ma ya// de nga
27a4(rnying rgyud): tshig bcas pa ltar// sngags rnams rgyun du bar mi gcad// phyag rgya bsgom zhing bca' ba ni// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas// 'di dag brtan por gzung bar bya// gsung gis ma yang bshad// spyi gsang bzhi dad par gsang bzhi/
27a5(rnying rgyud): gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad pa'i// gsang ba'i man ngag 'bras bu rnams// sngo dang na phal la mi spel ba// 'di ni thugs kyis ma ya// sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// de dag nyams par gyur na ni// rtsa ba nyams te rigs brlag 'gyur// nyams/
27a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi langs// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa dang // dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis// skad cig yud tsam smra mi bya// smras na 'bras bu nyams par 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog chen po ni
27a7(rnying rgyud): bdeng gshegs lnga yi rang bzhin pas// 'di ni mi spangs ma ya// sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/ dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi dngos// dong bar mi byas ma ya'o// rngan dang tshig rtsub chu ba dang // sbyor dang sgrol ba'i dam tshig ni// bder gshegs
27b1(rnying rgyud): mdzadapa ste// nag tu sdud pa'i sam yan// me wang ma dod skad byam// yan lag bcwo lnga'i dam cha // srog gcir yang ni gtong ste// btang na 'bras thags 'byung // dam nyas pa brdad ma langs// smyung nas slob dpon nga
27b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la gnod pa dang // theg pa chen po smong pa dang // sems can yongs la gnod byed dang // rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur ni// myur du bsgrim ste ma bsngal na// rdo rje'i tha tshig nyams pas na// grims 'byin shugs kyis
27b3(rnying rgyud): bsgral bar bya// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// sangs rgyas grub pa'i rgyu dang gzhi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dam tshig rnams ni mi gtang ba// legs pa'i yon tan brjod mi langs// sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dra bas na// dngos grub
27b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de bas nan tan bskyed de bsrung / zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ dam tshig rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
27b5(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la stsogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus pa rnams rang rang gi bsam pa rangs par gyur te/ gtsug gi 'dud pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi tshul du byas te/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas te/ ngo mtshar
27b6(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i tshig 'di skad ces bsgrags so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mnyam nyid dbyings mchog nas// thugs rje chen pos gsal la ma 'dres kun tu khyab par gdal// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor brjod mi la
27b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba bsam yas rnam rtog de snyed thugs rje 'phros pa e ma'o ngo mtshar che// e mngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa las// sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa rnams// kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar// zhes ched du gle
28a1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ni/ dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos yang rang gi stan las langs te 'di skad
28a2(rnying rgyud): ces gsol ba btab po// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po mdo 'di nyid kyi don bsdus te bdag cag rnams la bsgo bar gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bsgom par gsol// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos dgongs pa mas
28a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings las bzhengs nas// rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs te/ zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas te rdo rje kun tu bzang po la gzigs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ rgyud kyi rgyal po
28a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi don 'di nyid ngas bsdus te bshad par bya'o// e ma'o chos rnams thams cad sems kyi 'phrul pa ste// sems las ma gtogs chos 'ga' tsam yang yod ma yin// 'khrul pa bzlog phyir rgyal bas chos bstan dang // de yi spu 'phrul 'dra 'phur
28a5(rnying rgyud): snang // 'khrul dang 'khrul las sbyang ba'i chos rnams kun// rang gi sems yin sems nyid snang bar zad// sems kyi rang bzhin dngos por ma grub ste// lnga gyi gsos nas rang bzhin yongs kyis med// gzod nas ma stes ye nas rnam par dag
28a6(rnying rgyud): ge med cing sgra dang tha snyad bral// stong pa nyid de stong pa'i yul las 'das// de phyir sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba ste// rtsa ba de nyid srid dang grol bar snang // ho// e ma'o sems nyid stong pa chen po'i dbyings nyid las// gnas dang ston pa 'khor zhes
28a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba gal yod// ting nge 'dzin dang yig 'dra phyog mtshan dang // rdzogs dang bzhugs thabs rim par bgrang du med// stong nyid snying rje byang chub sems bskyed med// gzugs brtan med cing nying 'dzin pas ma dang bral// sngags dang phyag rgya med ci
28b1(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes 'dul ba'ang med// madrangs gdul du med cing dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mdu// skyonga'i stong tshul med rgyun gyi rkang mngan medu/ byab mod cing sdom ba kun las 'dad// dekun thas yin nyi du med// 'khrul pa zlon byung du drung /
28b2(rnying rgyud): tsam du bstan par zad// de bas bstan pa 'di la rab brten te// don dam bden pa'i nges pa rig par bya// sems las 'das pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin ni// tshig dang yi ge tha skad kun las 'das// mthun pa'i dpes kyang de la mtshon du med//
28b3(rnying rgyud): de bas bstan pa de kun sgrib pa yin// mtshan med blo ldan de la dang mi 'gyur// bden gnyis blo ldan sems la snang bar zad// ces gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams rab tu dga' ste/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus pa rnams/ de
28b4(rnying rgyud): don nyid kyi don la sems shing cang mi smra bar gyur te gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po'i lce bad+mo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje rgya gra ma zhig bzhag ste/ rdo rje chos su dbang bskur te/ don bsdu
28b5(rnying rgyud): bar byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mdo 'di bshad kyi bar du tshig gcig tsam yang bshad cing brjod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni bshad cing
28b6(rnying rgyud): brjod pa dang bral ba'o// phyogs bcu dras bzhi'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bshad cing brjod pa dang bral ba'i don thugs su chud nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bas na ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor dang pa can rnams kyis kyang brjod pa
28b7(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i don bde blag tu rtogs shing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ mdo 'di bshad do rjod do// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyang ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don du mdo 'di don bsdus la mi nub pa'i phyir gsung chos kyi yi ger yang sdang zhing
29a1(rnying rgyud): nub par gyis shig/ 'on tang na dang pa can gyi rna la 'byor du dag na dza theg pa'i gting 'jugs shing / rdul 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i rgyud 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de bas na ma
29a2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi nye lam chen po nyid yin pas shes par bya'o// de nas yid kun tu bzang po rdo rje chos rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rang gi rdo rje gnas su gsor zhing / btsun mo bya ba mo dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'di
29a3(rnying rgyud): skad ces bstod do// e ma'o bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa che// mi nub rgyal mtshan yongs kyi bdag/ bder gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi thugs// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
29a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug 'das pa dang da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i lam chen po nye lam chen por mdo chen po 'di lta bu snang ba lags pas ni/ bdag cag gis mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen por gnas par bgyi'o// gsung chos kyi yi ge lang
29a5(rnying rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid du yang gnas par bgyi'o// 'di'i don 'chad cing ston pa'i gang zag skyes bu dam pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par yang gnas par bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
29a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po lta zla yang gnas par bgyi'o// gzhan gyi sde pas bar du mi chod par bsti'o// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog gi bdag pos cang mi gsung bar gyur to// gyad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
29a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis 'a
29b1(rnying rgyud): skad ces rnam par baphrul lo// sems dpa' chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos kyang sdud pa pa rje chos su med btags shing dbang bsku rangs nA/ darjod kyis phye rabs pa'i rnal bya 'on byer/ ma
29b2(rnying rgyud): dang som nyi ru gyur pa rnams dris shig ces rnam par bskul lo// de nas byed pa po yid kun tu bzang pos bskul bar rig nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la stsogs pa 'dus pa'i
29b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rmad du byung ba'i mchod pas mchod ste/ lan brgya phrag stong du skor ba byas shing brkyang phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// e
29b4(rnying rgyud): mdo bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje bla med theg mchog gi// blol snang ba'i the tshom rnams// bdag cag 'khor tshogs zhu bar 'tshal// zhes gsol pas/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sems
29b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po legs kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la stsogs pa 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu a la la zhes pa'i ste phyung ste/ rang rang gi bsam pa
29b6(rnying rgyud): gnas su bsdus so// de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po rdo rje chos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// 'di ni dur khrod ji ltar lags// khu rgyug zhes pa gyi ji ltar lags// rol
29b7(rnying rgyud): pa zhes ni gang la bgyi// mdo yi don ni ji ltar lags// gsang sngags ming gi mtshan nyid ci// zhes gsol ba btab pa dang / gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dur khrod
30a1(rnying rgyud): zhan stan nan// nag snang da/ sa sonas gnas dang/ du dza ma/ // shAg
30a2(rnying rgyud): ma nas/ ma sapas shes pa/ ga 'a nga/
30a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs rim par bstan po dang // thams cad kun tu 'dus pa'i byed// don dang mthun pa'i ming dri grags// gas tesags med gi mtsha nyid // rkyen rngu zhin dra migs nga bral// gleng dub ti ga la du ma / @
30a4(rnying rgyud): nyid la gdags su med/ ces gsungs so// des pa me gsomadu dug rba// ma pade na rjes/ sa nga na / sa
30a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sa mchog gi bdug pos bka'/ la pa// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can sa// mdzinan 'dis ga ces byas na/ dgas pa rnam na shid du ldan/ gas pa'i la bas// gi rnaM ga gtongs
30a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba// mdag 'an dag dang bri' par bzhed/ ming dag su nan pa smra// dam thab ci byu ba ngan sa padapa ma/ zung chu'is so// gzugs pan
30a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyis gsarjes na// sa nam ma du/ / /
30b1(rnying rgyud): rung // da'asadas pa nadubs// ba drag nga gags // dam pa ni 'ang na chung bang gco// zhes gsungasaso// denas dang mang kur tu brgyabs pang 'dod ces gsung na// sumadu gad gagags nga nga/
30b2(rnying rgyud): ti rke rje dang // su nyi yongs ma rdzogs pa dang // shes 'ardabs surnam pasul bas/ sgo dang badru ba'i mtshan nyid ci// gas ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal te/ sems dpar nan do// depazhi nyid las ma
30b3(rnying rgyud): dang / deng ma rnang bachen por bsgom// dmapa'i don gyi byang chub sems// 'i tshul drangam par gnas// sbyang bya zlas thang 'brel byas na// mtshams sa myong ba 'a pa dzin bzhom// 'di nyi pan babyang chub sa rnaMs/ na
30b4(rnying rgyud): kyi tshul dra dam par gnas// zla las 'bras bur snang bas nA// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa d+mo // dang byung sgra ste che ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu'i tshul du mngon sangs rgyas// rang byung rgyal de'i bu mchog las// shes rab rlabs kying zad du
30b5(rnying rgyud): byin drabs 'od 'phros pas// 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// stong pa nyid dang snyin rje rtse// rnga mi dad pa'i byang chub sems// bsnyen pa zhes su rgyal bas gsungs// rang byung rgyal ba'i sgra mchog tu// bdag nyid shes par 'gyur
30b6(rnying rgyud): 'i/ nye ba bsnyen pa'i dmachog yin// shes ga skyes kyi mtshan nyid ni// sgrub 'i zhes ni bar bya shad// shes rab rnabs su gnyis me pas// sgrub pa chen pod rnam par bshad// dIbs dam pa bzhi po ni// slan gyi thog mer/
30b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje ying kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol ba bta po// kye ma'o bder gshegs rgyal ba'i gtso// byang chung sems kyi byin rlabs las// thog mar gzhal yas byang chub sems/
31a1(rnying rgyud): de dbus rang sngags skyes bu zhing // gnas dang bdag po'i mtshan nyid ci// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po// shes rab yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// / byug yangs
31a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhal yas su// rang sngags skyes bur rnam gsal ba// snod dang bcud kyi mtshan nyid dang // shes rab thabs su 'brel pa ni// bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs/ zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang //
31a3(rnying rgyud): pos gsol pa// kye ma 'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ ting nge 'dzin dang snying po dang // rang mtshan so so'i skur rdzogs pas// rten 'brel don de ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa//
31a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nyen cig/ ting 'dzin zhes bya ye shes te// don dam rgyu yi tshul du gnas// snying po zhes su gsung du grags// thugs kyi mtshan ma thugs nyid de// rnam pa kun rdzob sku yi rgya// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su grags//
31a5(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni las kyi rgya// snying po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig rgya// yongs su rdzogs pa sku yi ste// mdor bsdus phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gso
31a6(rnying rgyud): kye ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ zhe sdang zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// gti mug nga rgyal 'dod chags dang // de bzhin phrag dog ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// thugs ni nam
31a7(rnying rgyud): shes yin pas na// zhe sdang sems la gnas bca' ba'o// gzugs ni sku yi rnam pa bas// gti mug glen pas bcings par bshad// tshor de myong nas mi gtong bar// nga rgyal dmyal zhes su bshad// 'du shes shes nas
31b1(rnying rgyud): chags// 'dod pa chags pas 'dod chags so// phrag dog mngon par 'du byed nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ru rab tu grags// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun du bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// nam mkha'as chu ma rlung dang // byangs rgyags dra
31b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// ngo bo ji ltar gsal bar bzhed// ces gsol to// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// gti mug nam mkha'i ngo bo ste// zhe sdang me ni 'bar bar bshad// 'dod chags chu yi ngo bo ste// ngargyal sra ba sa yi khams
31b3(rnying rgyud): phrag dog chung gi ngo bo yin// de bas dbyings phyug lnga ru bshad// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// don dam kun rdzob tha mi dad// byang chub thig le'i rang bzhin de// spros pa'i mtshan ma med lags na// rnam grang
31b4(rnying rgyud): don de ji ltar lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag sos bka' stsal pa// tha dad med pa'i byang chub sems// spros med rgyu yi tshul nyid las// 'bras bu ye shes lngar bshad pa'am// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// so so rang gi mtshan
31b5(rnying rgyud): nyid de// ji ltar thugs su chud pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyang de bzhin du// bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// gzugs brnyan spyi yi dkyil 'khor du// rgyal pa sangs kyis kun bkod
31b6(rnying rgyud): par// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus nas// rang rang spyi ru dbye bo yi// rnam grangs don de ji ltar lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// don dam nyid du dbyer med kyang // kun rdzob bden pa'i dbang tsam du// 'di dag
31b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas gang la yang // sgra dang gsung thugs yon tan dang // las lnga dang ni spyi dang drug/ rang gi rgyud du gnas pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rnams kyang de snyed du// bder gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos
32a1(rnying rgyud): gsu g+sa// sgra dAg slang drugs lan tan ldas// du da rgyu du nga da // dus padug ba sa// drug ga su ma drugasangs pad// dag su nad drukA na dug sa nas// gsung gyu
32a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi bdag pas bka myu // sems dpa' chen pa drug tu bshad pa mazad de// de dge re re dag la yang // sgra gsung drug suM gnas smras na// gros rig sam dag tu brjod pa yin// dang las dring yan tan yang / don la
32a3(rnying rgyud): kun la'ang yod mod kyi// so sor bshad par mi g+ho'o// ci snyer skyegasang thug nyid las// bud na yod pa ma yin phyir// de bas rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis// dkyil 'kho sgo dang gsung dang thugaste// mi zad rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du//
32a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi lus ngag sams// med pa'i 'khor po me byad la// dgongs nas de snyed gsungs par zad// mA de can sku gsung thugs nyid dang // 'pho ba'i lus dang ngag sem kyang // me sir yong sum grub ste/ nges pa med par rgya sa
32a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs// de nas yang rdorje ya kun tu bzang ba sngags la // bad du gshegs brnyan pa'i dkyil 'khong // cho ga stegag ma mtshang na// de rjes su ba 'bras bu mi 'thung zhing // rnam par thob par ming skye ma// gsang ba mjug
32a6(rnying rgyud): gri bdag pas ga la pa// dge pang rjid dang mthun 'a/ nga gan pa 'byor ga gyig pas/ yangs dngo sa rnams/ byed ba rtsigs papa bye pa dang / rgyad nan du gyis/ ban
32a7(rnying rgyud): rkyed kyang // cho ga yo byed gton ma rnams// tshogs ni yang ni gtsor mgasangs// mtshogs na yang nges par 'grub// de bas nan tan cher bgyid do// sam pa dge pa shin tu gces// yong rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/
32b1(rnying rgyud): bzhind dkyis 'khor bzang po nyid// ye nas spun grub gnas bzhin du// tong 'dzin 'askyed pa'i dkyil 'khor des// yongs su 'grub par mi 'gyur na// 'di yi dgos pa'i gyu labs// 'di la rgyud par bya zhig mchis// gsang nga mchog ga dun
32b2(rnying rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa// dag pa'i rgyud dang mi ldan pas// bskyed kyang rdzogs par mi 'gyur la// dag pa'i rgyud ldan dbang phyug de// ye nas sangs rgyas yin pi phyir// ting 'dzin bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// thugs kyi sras su rdzogs pa dang // das
32b3(rnying rgyud): kyang dngos grub ster bar nges// rang rgyud rnam par dag gyur na// rdzogs dang bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor la// khyad par med par rgyal bas gsungs// de bas rnal 'byor khas 'chis pas// ting 'dzin nan tan dag par bya'o// yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos
32b4(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// sna tshogs las kyi sngags rnams dang // sna tshogs las kyi phyag rgya yis// sna tshogs las rnams 'grub 'gyur ba// gang gi stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' chen po//
32b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs sngags dang phyag rgya yis// las rnams sna tshogs 'grub gyur pa'i// t+ye 'dzin stobs kyis ngo mthon du// sems kyi sprul pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sems nyid dag pa'i ngang nyid las// cho 'phral sna tshogs zad mi shes// sna tshogs sngags dang b+h+ya/
32b6(rnying rgyud): dang // tshogs yon tan bshad pa rnams// sdug sung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// las dang yon tan nyid yin par// myabs pas de bzhin rig par bya// ya rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// sna tshogs sna tshogs 'gro rnams la// tha tshogs
32b7(rnying rgyud): bder gshegs rgyal ba yi// sbal pa sna tshogs sna tshogs pas// sna tshogs sna tshogs cis 'dul bas// btul bsna tshogs ji ltar lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka'aphrul pa// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang gi/ dbro/ rnams sna tshogs
33a1(rnying rgyud): btul ba dang // sna tshogs 'gro rnams rang rang gi// las 'phro'i dbang gis snang ba las// de bzhin nyid kyis bcos pa med// bedeng gshegs rgyal ba thams cad kyis// dngos po rdul byas mi gzigs te// ched du
33a2(rnying rgyud): rnam par mi spru la yang // sems can lta spyod tha dad pas// bder gshegs su yang snang mtha' yas// de bas gdul bya'i 'gro rnams dang // bder gshegs sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs kyang // 'khrul pa'i dbang gis sdang bar zad// yang rdo rje yid kun tu
33a3(rnying rgyud): bzang pos gsol pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje theg mchog la// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kun// byas la mi stsogs tshogs 'gyur bar// bshad pa'i don 'di ji ltar lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po// /
33a4(rnying rgyud): debazhin nyid la gnas bcas nas// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyang // tshogs chen gnyis su rdzogs par rol// don dam stong pa rgyu yi tshul// chos su shes rab ces su bshad// kun rdzob dngos po 'bras bu'i tshul// thabs mchog gzugs skur
33a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// nyon mongs rgyu nas rnam par dag/ dargyal pa'i gnas nyid bla med gnas// rnal 'byor rig pa 'dir ldan na// spyod yul kun tu mi 'da' la// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang du gnas// yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa//
33a6(rnying rgyud): sa cad mnyam pa'i dang nyid las// thams cad dbyer med gcig pa las// log pa'i lam pa'i dregs pa rnams// srid rtsa nyes dmigs ji ltar lags// ma dad rgyu de ji ltar lags// thugs rjes 'dul ba ci yi phyir// gsang ba mchog gi bdag
33a7(rnying rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa// log pa'i lam pa'i dregs pa de// gsang ba'i theg pa'i sgor zhugs nas// sems la nyon mongs rgyud 'chang bas// rang bzhin gsang po ma rtogs par// dngos rtogs rdzas la mngon par 'chel// rang sems skad
33b1(rnying rgyud): cig rang bzhin la// rtag pazer byug bltas pa yas// sring \u0f7fnyes dmigs de lus byung // tsha ba'i nga rgyal dbang gisan// zhabs 'dul la dang mi 'gyur// sngam bstan pa'i stobs shugs kyis// khros par thugs rjes 'dra /
33b2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// dregs pa'i nga rgyal khros pas kyang // 'jig rten khams kun sgra bkod nas// ye shes thugs rje khros pa yis// dgod dang gshe dang za byed pa'o// yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gastsol pa// khrag 'thung kun gyi thugs kyi du
33b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rab tu kI la ya// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams spol mkhas pa// de yi dngos gzhi ji ltar lags// gdab pa'i thabs su ji ltar bgyi// theg pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar legs// gso ba'i cho ga ci ltar bgyi// slar dbyung cho ga ji ltar lag+sa/
33b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// dus gsum bder gshegs thams cad kyi// thugs kyi sras mchog kI la ya// dregs pa 'dul phyir thugs las shar// sras mchog de yi dngos gzhi yang // byang chub sems kyi phur pa ste/
33b5(rnying rgyud): ma btab bzhin du las rnams rdzogs// srid pa gdar sha bcad nas ni// mtshan ma dbyings su rtogs gyur te// gzhung bzhin btab na thebs par nges// thebs pa'i rtags su bstan pa ni// yang dag don du bstan pa ni// snang srid chos
33b6(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad kun// mtshan med dang du rtogs pa yi// drod chen rtags kyang 'byung bar nges// kun rdzob rtags su bstan pa ni// mngon du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// thebs nas gso ba'i cho ga yang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bya bar shis//
33b7(rnying rgyud): btab nas slang dbyung cho ga ni// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// snying rjer bsgoms te dbyung bar bya// yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// dregs pa'i las kyis 'chel pa la// khro bo'i thugs rjes 'dul ba'i tshe// dregs pa
34a1(rnying rgyud): bskul ba ci'i phyir lags// dregs ma sbyor ba'i dgos pani// gsang ba mchog gi ba dag pos bka' sal pa// zhe rlung las kyis 'brel bal// zhenang ma po da du d+ha m+b+ha// zhesang dbyangs su dag tur
34a2(rnying rgyud): phyir// dregs pa po ni bsgral par gsungs// 'dod chags las kyi gzir ba las// 'dod chags chen po 'ga'o ni ru// 'dod chags dbyings su dag bya'i phyir// dregs pa mo ni rab tu sbyor // sbyor sgrol byab kun byas kyang // de la bya ba
34a3(rnying rgyud): rdul tsam med// yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// rdo rje drag po'i dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor rnam par ji ltar 'tshal/ sngags kyi bdag po glang gis bgyi// 'gugs 'dren pho ti gang gis bgyi// sgrol ba'i phrin las
34a4(rnying rgyud): gang gis bgyi// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor lo// rnam pa gsum du rgyal bas gsungs// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// phyogs mtshams khro bo'i dkyil 'khor da // sras mchog tu
34a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor de// rdo rje gzhon nu las kyi lha// gtso gzungs zung du 'brel pa ni// bdag nyid chen po yin par bshad// khro bo khro mo phra men tshogs// phyogs mtshams khro bo zhes su bya// sras mchog phung pa'i khro bo ni// kI la ya zhes rab tu
34a6(rnying rgyud): grags// de dag dkyil 'khor re re la'ang // rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang // bskyed pa ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // rten bca' brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor te// gsum gsum rig tu rgyal bas gsungs// bdag nyid chen po sngags kyi bdag
34a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i khro bos 'gugs 'dren byed/ sras mchog phur pas sgrol par gces// bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// de bas nan tan cher bskyed de// drag po'i las la brtson pa'i mis// dkyil 'khor gsum du shes par bya'o// ya
34b1(rnying rgyud): rdorje yi kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// khrag 'brung rnams kyi stangs tshul dang // bzlas pardza ba gsang sngags rnams// ting 'dzin na la 'gyi dgang gis patso// dgos pa'i dus tsha ga ltar lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' skal ba/
34b2(rnying rgyud): rjeg bri rnams// seMso ga minags phyin mas // gang sbyin pagu dang ngas skangs kyis// ngang rgyams kyi sa no/ oM n+na ni nA drug du// nacig gis dan kyil rnams kya / 'a dathams
34b3(rnying rgyud): deskad rgyal ba dpa' bos bshad// yang byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bya ba yi// sngon du 'gro ba'i lus nI gang // rti lding mthar phyin pa yis 'grub// grub pa'i mtha' ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag
34b4(rnying rgyud): sa paka rnam pa/ naci gang man byed ba skyeng bskyed pa rgya sems drug pa rjo mam men// zhed pa ni rten/ na bahUM nam/
34b5(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// bdag dang phur bu sems can rnams// tha mi dad par grub mtha' gcig/ ces gsungs so// yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// gi rgyas dbang dang drug spyod kyi// phrin las rnam bzhir bshad pa gang // gnas skabs
34b6(rnying rgyud): gang du 'tshal ba lags// mtshan nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i las bzhi po// zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor gang gi yang // ma dang rkyen du rgyal bas bsngags// de bas nan
34b7(rnying rgyud): tan tshor bskyed de// las bzhi rdzogs pa mchog yin no// mtshan nyid 'byung ba bzhi yin te// e ni bsregs pas me dri bshad// bai ni chu yi dkyil 'khor na// ma nis yi mtshan nyid de// ya ni rlung du bshad pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen pon
35a1(rnying rgyud): mkhar ye// mtshan nyid yin par rgyal bas gsungs// las rnams brtsam pa ma byas na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// yang rdarje yid kun tu dazang pos gsol pa// dmachog gnas rnams bka' stsal /
35a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ces ni gang la bgyi// nyams pa gson ji ltar lags// rang bzhin ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal la// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// rtogs pa'i lta ba dam tshig ste// de las 'das na
35a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig par bshad// chos nyid mnyam par tho bzhag na// gso ba'i thabs ni de ltar ro// nyams pa'i chang pa byung bAn// mgon su bas/ de las gud na med// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// dam tshig rnams ca gcig par na// @
35a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// yang rdo rje yid kun du bzang pos gsol pa// rdo rje theg pa zhes bgyi ba// rdo rje zhes ni gab la bgyi// theg pa chen po ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka
35a5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// theg pa chen po'i chen po ste// gsang ba'i theg pa zhes su grags// rang gi lus ngag yid rdo rje// chos sku rdo rje mi phyed phyir// rdo rje zhes su brjod pa yin// de nyid shes rab gsum po yis// rtogs par bya phyir theg par bshad// ces bka' stsal
35a6(rnying rgyud): pas/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang / skud pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la/ lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te/ gtsug gis 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi tshul du bya
35a7(rnying rgyud): nas// a l-i la ho// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi don 'di byung ngo // zhes mgrin gcig tu brjod do// de nas rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po yang ngangadage stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol pa
35b1(rnying rgyud): tA 'o// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mod chen po la stsogs pa'i gsang ba'i theg pa 'di lha nyid khyad par du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dum+b+ha kyis 'khor cing rnal 'khor du 'chad par spyod na// gas
35b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i theg pa 'di sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi ring la bshad pa dang / slad kyis sa phyogs gang du dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pas spyod par 'gyur ba/ bdag cag rnams la lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// gsang
35b3(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di 'byung ba ni shin tu yang dkon te/ u du ma byu 'i me tog 'jig rten du dper brjod pa dang 'dra'o// sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i theg pa de ni sngon byung pa res
35b4(rnying rgyud): ma'ad sra sa chad pas/ 'jas gro nga theg pa mams kyi gatho ma no / dus sa yang ga ba'i thog pa 'dem pa nyidan// dkyi'i byid na/ dris da gyi ba rnams pamyong ba thed pa dang rjod dam byung phying // de bzhin nga 'das
35b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ma bshad do// sngon bskal pa thog ma bskal pa kun tu bkod pa zhes bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mngon 'byung gi rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i bstan pa la/ gas rab rgya cher grags te nges pa'i don rgya cher
35b6(rnying rgyud): spyod do// de'i tshe 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i nges pa'i don la shin tu dad par gyur te/ rnam par grol ba'i lam chen po la bkod do// sems dpa' chen po de ste bskal pa bye ba 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bskal pa me rtog bkod pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas 'am
35b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba da ltar dang tshul mthun pa zhig 'byung ste/ des gas ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro// gzhan sangs rgyas gang gis kyang / gsang ba'i ngos doni ston par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'gro ba rnams gas dang chen po 'di'i snod du ma gyur pa'i byar
36a1(rnying rgyud): ma// sems dpa na pad/ na brtan pa'ogs du mdas / du rgya na/ ma myod bar rtag dbyed dang madrangan tu rna ma bsagro ba dag na
36a2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis bslus pa'i don 'di dag kyang // gsung chos kyi glegs bum du lding bar 'gyur ro// der skul ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis rim gyis spyod par 'gyur te/ dri yid ched 'ag ni dang / gad 'ag 'di rung / gad lag na po na du gyur/ ched dag 'ji
36a3(rnying rgyud): sbas/ la las ni tshul bzhin spyad cing sngags kyi mthu stobs kyang rnyed/ phal cher ni tshul 'dra log par spyod pas ltung ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ 'tho pa la ni dang / la la ni mngand par gnas pa las/ dus khrab kyi tha me'i tshe da zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro//
36a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku'i bstan pa'i bar skabs rnams su yang gsang ba 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro// de dag tshon yang gsang ba 'di dang 'dra ba'i log pa'i lam ston pa'i chos ston pa yang mang du 'byung ste/ 'gro ba dag phal cher ni bdud kyis bstan
36a5(rnying rgyud): chos de la dad par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de'i tshe de'i dus su gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag la nan tan du byed cing / gzhan la 'chad pa dang / nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni// rdo rje theg pa'i gting 'dzugs shing / rnal 'byor dbang phyug
36a6(rnying rgyud): gi rgyud 'dzin pa'i nga'i sras dam par blta'o// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang spyan dang grogs po nyid du byin gyis rlobs shig/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang mos yang 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
36a7(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid ma nor bar 'chad cing ston pa'i rdo rje slob dpon de la/ bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de'i yon tan gyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/ gsang ba 'di la mos shing ma nor bar 'dzin pa'i gang rtag dam pa de'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par nas cir 'gyu
36b1(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar brtse/ gsang ba mchog go bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir sems dpa' chen pa nyon cig/ tha mdzan slob dpon do na// khyod kyis sems can tu bung tsA dud+ha s+ya/ yang drag par rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas nyid du
36b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems nyid du blta'o// de gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyi sems dang / nga nyid so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro// gang phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnam
36b3(rnying rgyud): kyang spyi bo la bkur bar mdzad na/ gzhan gyis lha ci smos// gsang ba 'di'i don ma nor bar 'dzin pa'i gang zag dam pa de ni/ sems dpa' chen po da lta khyod nyid dang 'dra'o// zhes smra'o// de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
36b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ring ba ma yin no// sems dpa' chen po der yang ma zad de/ gsang ba'i mdo 'di'i chos kyi yi ge 'di gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na yang / de gsang ba mchog gi bdag po bzhugs pa yin par shes par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po
36b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen mi chad par bskor ba yin par shes par bya'o// gnas 'khor de nyid du 'jig rten gyi dgos pa yang phun sum tshogs par 'byung bar shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs nyid yin par shes par bya'o// sems dpa' chen po de bas na khyod
36b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis kyang / gsang ba'i mdo 'di mi nub par bag yod par gyis shig/ sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang nyon cig/ gsang ba'i mdo 'di la gang zhig skur cing mi snyan par smra zhing sems pa'i gang zag des ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
36b7(rnying rgyud): la skur pa yin no// byang chub sems la skur pa yin no// yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba yin pas rig par bya ste/ de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngan song chen po gsum gyi kha brgyud nas kyang / dam sri dmar po'i lus su skye ste/ gsang ba 'di dang phrad pa'i skabs/
37a1(rnying rgyud): cung zad kyang mi rnyed do// dbas na ngan nal 'gyur \u0f7f dbang phyug chen pas dang tshig tu blangs te bskal gA'i rigs su// sems dpa' rdzu po gzhan yang gang da ma na nga nyi nga snyan par sno can drug tu shin
37a2(rnying rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag dam pa de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa bsam pa nges pa can/ ma 'jungs pa'i sems kyis bla ma la bkur sti byed cing / zab mo'i don la mi skrag pa/ don du gnyir 'chud mi gson pa/ phyi rol
37a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi khar mi gtong ba'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir te/ bsam pa log pa can rnams kyi ni ma yin/ sgrib pa phrag cing blo zhan pa rnams d+hi nI ma yin/ de bzhin du yid gnyis can dang / 'dungs pa'i bsgom pa nan dang / bla ma pa mi gus shing / zang mo'i
37a4(rnying rgyud): chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang / nyams su len pa chud za bar byed cing gzhan gyi sde pa la dga' ba'i bsam pa can rnams kyi rna lam du 'grong ni ma yin te de bas na shin tu yang dkon no// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus pa rnams kyis yang dang yang du bskor gi
37a5(rnying rgyud): yang dang yang du rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyi mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang / sdud pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po rdo rje chos dang / gsang ba'i mdo 'di nyid la mngon par bstod pa/ e ma'o bdad bani rnam par
37a6(rnying rgyud): nas yon tan drug ldan pa// yod med mtshan la dngos po'i mtha' las 'das// don dam thugs ni rtogs dka' shin tu gsang// gsung ni gsang sngags 'bras bu kun gyi mchog/ ma lus kun la mnga' brnyes bdag po'i sku// bcom ldani gsang
37a7(rnying rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma'o// gsang bdag dgyes pa yum gyi dkyil 'khor na// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par rtag tu sbyor// gnyis med thig le byang chub dag pa'i sku// byang chub rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma'oms
37b1(rnying rgyud): phrul che la mtha' brnyes pa// bka' ma 'khor lo gsang ba / gas pa// thugs rnam na rdzas car yang 'babs// gas phyugs bdag su ma chag la phyag chag nga// kyang dus gsum pa du gshegs su na
37b2(rnying rgyud): gas/ yin kyis kyi ma maldan 'dod byed pa// smra ba'i ming gi rkyen po byu bya// dod bu ngas sto// mya chog sung gen pa bad kyi'i grong// sred kyis shesakyi nga
37b3(rnying rgyud): gsum rnal 'byor dbang phyug bgrod pa'i shul// 'og ma zil gnon seng ge lte bu'i sgra// don gyi mdzod du pog gi smon mar snang // bdud rtsi thigs pa'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal brjod// yal la hU~M zhes bad+mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gas
37b4(rnying rgyud): mchog gi bdag po ni dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings zhi ba chen po la bzhugs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ni che ba'i don la dam zhing rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i thugs su zhugs to mi snang bar bya
37b5(rnying rgyud): la la ni gsang ba'i mdo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo las/ don phyi ma rim par bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
37b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/
37b7(rnying rgyud): du na #
38a1(rnying rgyud): bye bdug pa na ma ba 'angan la bstod pa de/ dmangar ma dang byung ba'i don 'di nyid bshad pa yonas/ yang dag gas pa'i yang gas nga/ chos nyid can na zhi'i bzang yongs sum na/ chos kyi 'byangs kyi rnam mkha' las can bya
38a2(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul rgyan dpag tu med pa rin po che'i rgyal po ltar snang ba/ chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la/ rlung gi phung po tu ma chad pa dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho dang / gser gyis gzhi 'bur 'phar bar chags pa'i gzhi la/ 'bar ba'i gzhal med par sna tshogs 'od zer kun tu 'phrong
38a3(rnying rgyud): thod pa mamatshon brtsegs pa la// gnam ljags kyi gzeng tu ler btab pa/ sbrul nag gi rgyan la sogs te 'khor ba'i rgyan thams cad dang / thabs dang shes rab rdzi ldan dang / rdo rje'i rgyan la sogs te ye shes sgo kun tu gsal bar gyur pa'i gnas na/ bcom
38a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rnam shes dang zhes thub / com ldan 'das tshong 'dod nas bya dadu/ bcom ldan 'das 'du shes do zhes tha ba dang / bcom na 'das babyed du des tha brji / bcom ldan 'das gzugs da zhes zab dang / yum tshan mi rnga bya
38a5(rnying rgyud): phyug ma dang / yu ma chen mo rin chen dbyings phyug ma dang / yum chen mo pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma dang / yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyug ma dang / yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba la sogs te/ sems dpa' chen po byang
38a6(rnying rgyud): rgyab kyi sems rdo rje dang / byang chub chen po kun tu bzang dang / byang chub chen po thugs rje gzigs dang / byang chub chen po drag shul rdo rje dang / byang chub chen po sgrib pa sel byed dang / byang chub chen po mkhyen rab gzhon nu dang / byang chu chen po brtan pa'i
38a7(rnying rgyud): snying po dang / byang chub chen po sdang ba'i snying po dang / de dag la sogs te byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad dang / gzhan yang bud med kyi 'khor tshogs thams cad kyi dkyil na/ bsnyengs pa mi mda' bo rdo rje'i gdan mi byed pa la bzhugs
38b1(rnying rgyud): te/ yum chen mo chos nyid kun tu bzang mos nyid kyi yul 'khril te// nyid kyi nyid la bltas nas thabs cig go// de nas bcon ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po rnaMs na gnas pa mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dron ma lus phyir mnyam par mtshan
38b2(rnying rgyud): nas/ sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i ngang la snyoms par gnas so// rnam rtog mi mda' 'jug ldog thams cad dang bral nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag yod chos kyi dbyings las pa
38b3(rnying rgyud): g.yos par/ yum chos nyid kun tu bzang mos gsol pa/ chos sku rnam dag nam mkha' dri med nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos// yod med mtha' las grol bas stong pa'i dang // brjod bral maze'i las 'das po k+Sha nam mkha'i tshul// dngos po
38b4(rnying rgyud): kun bral brtags pa'i yul las 'das// mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po des/ chos rnams thams cad nam mkha/ ltar mkhyen nas snang
38b5(rnying rgyud): ba med pa las rdo rje lta bu'i skur bstan te/ 'jig rten nyi zla sgrib pa med par shar ba lta bu'o// de nas yum chos nyid kun tu bzang mo la gzigs te zhal bzhad par mdzad pas/ nyi ma 'bri ma la.a 'od zer byung ba lta bu'o// 'od zer de dag las kyang byang chub kyi
38b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi sprin mngon par byung bas/ rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byung nas/ bde ba'i dga' ba la gnas par mdzad do// de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyag ma zhes/ spyan bde ba'i tshul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po de
38b7(rnying rgyud): bltas te/ 'dud pa'i tshul gyis phyag byas nas/ gsol pa/ tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas ye shes dbyings kyi lha// longs spyod rdzogs pas bde ba chen po'i sku// yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas yid bzhin drin po che// rdo rje sems dpa skal bzang da
39a1(rnying rgyud): na du mam spad du nga chu tu sa tho papas nga na na nags du da sa bshes 'angs/ 'am ba
39a2(rnying rgyud): bde ba ring nga las cho 'phrul sna tshogs su bzhengs te/ 'gying ba'am brjid pa'i tshul du yod med thams cad la bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po des kun pa khyab par mdzad de/ de rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du gnas so// de nas yum chos kyi
39a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyug mdong mtshar du gyur te/ 'dud pa'i tshul gyis phyag byas te gsol pa/ ye shes d+hu 'phrul rnam par rol pa'i sde// zangs dang shes rab kun la mnga' ba'i// / 'phags pa'i thugs rje mo 'phrul 'byung ba'i gnas// 'dro ba'i don mdzod sprul pa
39a4(rnying rgyud): mang po 'gyod// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs kyang ston par byed// bder gshegs sprul pa mdzad pa bzhengs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po des/ gsol pa mkhyen nas rtse gcig pa de kho na nyid rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin
39a5(rnying rgyud): la gnas nas/ cang mi gsung bar mnyam po la bzhugs so// de nas yum chos kyi daljongs phyag ma dang / byang chub kyi rdo rje la sogs pa/ 'khor rdul snyed ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de dag gis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ e ma ho yid bzhin nam mkha'
39a6(rnying rgyud): dang // khyab pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje brjid pa'i sku// sprin phung rol pas rdo rje bsgyings pa'i sku// thogs med rol pas cho 'phrul ston par mdzod// e ma ho// gsung mchog sgra sgrogs snyan pa lta bu las// rdo rje brjod mdzod sgra rnams brjod pa mngang // gsung
39a7(rnying rgyud): gi yan lag rgya mtsho bkod pa'i gsung // seng ge'i sgra sgrogs gsang sngags nges par ston// e ma ho yid bzhin rin chen gtor chen lta bu las// rdo rje'i byin rlabs bde ba'i mchog/ ye shes thig le spos bral me rtog thugs// rnam tho nyi
39b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrul ston// oM ma ho sdug bsngal mi bzung 'khor ba 'di// thob pa'i bdeb ma tho' 'gro ba'i rgyud// mdze res bde ba ma thob ngan song gnas// yang dag don rnams bdag la bstan du gsal// nyon mongs mI shes 'grong rnams// sag
39b2(rnying rgyud): sAl rgya mtshos bcings pa don gyis khrol// ma rig mun pas ldongs pa gsal bar byed// 'khor ba rgya mtsho thug rje'i gru yis sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ye shes mchog ldan don gyi snying po 'di// rnal 'byor sems kyi don
39b3(rnying rgyud): ni// 'khor rnams 'dus pa rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// don rnams shin tu rtogs par 'tshal lags na// thugs rje'i gyen rlabs cho 'phrul bshad du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes
39b4(rnying rgyud): mas cad kyi bdag po des/ 'khor rnams kyis gsol ba btab par gzigs nas/ bzhad pa mdzad do// bzhad pa mdzad pas/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas/ rig ya'i ye shes brjod kyis mi langs pa'i yang mi langs pa 'od zer dang
39b5(rnying rgyud): bcas pa/ 'od zer des nam mkha' khyab par mdzad do// 'od zer de dag re re las sprul pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par shar bar mdzad do// sprul pa'i sku de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag 'khor so so zham 'breng dang bcas pa gnas pa mdzod do//
39b6(rnying rgyud): de dag las ye shes kyi char mngon par dbab pas// ma rig pa'i klong thams cad gsal bar mdzad do// rig pa'i chos kyi sgra sna tshogs dang / rig pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs byung ste/ kun tu khyab nas byung ngo // sku gsung thugs gar mkhan ltar la
39b7(rnying rgyud): dpyad par byung ste rmad du byung ngo // a la la ho zhes sgra bsgrags pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung dbyangs gcig tu sba bsgrags so// 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gdul bya sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang spro bar gyur/
40a1(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs nas/ ngam zhing nga mtshang na// khor rnams kya bar gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rnams cad kyi bdug po dang / byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la sogs te 'khor rnams su na
40a2(rnying rgyud): rnas brgyan pa shes kya ti 'dzin la spyom sa pa zugs nas/ sngags tshig nag sungs du// // rigs dam sa 'a rgya 'dus pa yi// dam pa chen po rig 'don nams// drarbog rim pa'i gnas/
40a3(rnying rgyud): gral la 'god// mu stegs can dang 'jig rten pa// gang dag lta dman gyur rnams dang // rigs ma yin pa rigs mi 'gyur// skal sa bzang po'i dam chog 'di// skal ba ngan par 'bab mi 'gyur// de las 'das na de bdag byed//
40a4(rnying rgyud): d+ha dzA la sa ma ya/ hUM rak+ShaM dzA la sa ma ya// hU~M tsit+ka dra la sa ma ya/ d+h+waM ya d+h+waM dz+wa la sa ma ya zhes brjod pa tsam gyis// zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung // sprul pa'i 'od kyi gre rabar 'bar// / gnod byed thams cad brlag mdzad do// spros pa'i co
40a5(rnying rgyud): slar 'khyil pas// 'khor rnams dag kyang shin tu skra// e ma ho me ma ho ngo mtshar che// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis bkrab tu gsol// zhes gsol pa lus// bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po des zhal gyi ma
40a6(rnying rgyud): phying ste/ ye shes kyi 'od zer 'khyil pa dang / mdzes shing bde ba dang ldan pa dang / snod du rung ba rnams sbyangs nas/ 'od zer rnams gnas sgra thim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po des// mi gnas ye shes
40a7(rnying rgyud): des bzhengs nas ni// seng ge ba rgyal ba'i sgra lta bu// don pa'od gsang ba'i nges pa dang / rgyud 'grel rtags kyi rol pa 'di// rdo rje bskyed pa'i sgra 'dis bshad// oM oM A~M bo d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya a ti a la la ho// zhes cang mi gsung ngo // ma gsu
40b1(rnying rgyud): pa nyid na rgya cher bzhugs so// de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la zhal 'dzum pas gzigs so// byang chub sems rdo rje des bskul bar rig nas rang gi gnas nas langs te/ rang gi mtshan mi gnas su bsams te lcel rdo rje bzhag nas/ ston pa'i zhal
40b2(rnying rgyud): 'bru tshugs kyis bltas te/ chos kyi rgyal po tshogs bdag destongs su gsol// mi gsung chos kyi bdag pos dgongs pa bshad du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po des/
40b3(rnying rgyud): dam pa de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ rdo rje rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas 'di skad gsungs so// badz+ra ka \u0f89\u0fa4 tsakr-i sat+kA raM/ smra ba'i dam pa des b+hAH'i dbar dam pa thob nas/ shin tu mi bzod las pag dang ldan par bzhugs so// la na
40b4(rnying rgyud): pa bcu gnyis su bskor bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te/ zhing khams thams cad ni bde ba'i gnas su gyur/ bcud thams cad ni yang dag pa'i don mthob/ rngams pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logs bu/
40b5(rnying rgyud): ge rdo rje su mtshan pa'i gdan la gnas so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma he bcom ldan ye shes bdag/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'di// mthuzhi pa dang byin rnams che// rgya me mkhas
40b6(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing zab// bcom ldan thugs las skyes pa lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'di// / byang chub sems kyi phyi mo ste// snying rje kun gyi
40b7(rnying rgyud): bdag po yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan yin// byang chub rig 'dzin rnams kyi yab// rnal 'byor mes po mya ngan 'das pa'i don// bdud kyi yang bdud chos kyi mdzod// ye shes 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin// de ci'i phyin ne na/ sngon med
41a1(rnying rgyud): mi 'byung nga ltar mnyam pa'i dus// 'byam klas dus na mngon sangs kyis// chos la sbyor cing rgyal ba'i thugs las byas// rdul bkun gyi yab yin te// de 'dra zhes ni bkaru stsal pas// 'khor tshogs thams cad dag
41a2(rnying rgyud): gyur te// e ma ho bcom ldan bde gshegs ngo mtshar lags// byang chub sems la phyag byas te// e ma ho rmad byung tshogs kyis mchod byas te// 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar rgyal ba'i sras// zhing 'dir rgyal sras khyod spyod pas// bka' yi
41a3(rnying rgyud): lo lam mchog dag/ e ma'o tshig gis mtshon de gsal bar mdzod// a la la ho// zhes byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la gsol to// ts+tshi g+ha g+nis mtshon de smras pa/ AM AHhUM swA hrIHa lA la ho// ston pa rgyal bcing mi gasrong // mi gsung bas
41a4(rnying rgyud): cher bshad// bshad du med pa'i chos rnams ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma bshad do// ston pas brjod par mi bzhid de// skye ba med pa'i tshe si m+b+ha ni// ma skyes pas na chos skye 'dod// snying po don du gyur pa'o// tshogs brjod pa legs ma yin/
41a5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid ni min no zhes// mkhyen pa rnams kyis nges par bshad// de bas ye shes bdag po nyid// bka' ma stsal par dgongs pa'o// dgongs pa'i don rnams 'byin 'dod pa// gzugs brnyan me long po tu 'dod ltar// dgongs pa'i don ni rig la snang //
41a6(rnying rgyud): ma skyes don gyi snying po 'di// tshig tu smra ba ma yin kyang // tshig min don rnams mi rtogs pas// ci phyir mi dmigs tshig gis mtshon// rgyal ba'i snying po mnyam nyid de// gsal brjod 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// da ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs
41a7(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i don nyid ldan gyis byas// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag yod pa la kun tu bzang po la byang chub
41b1(rnying rgyud): sems rdo rje la sogs pa/ 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma skyes pa'i don de lta bu lags/ chog nyid kyi don no gang // chos kyi dbyings ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// stor pa'i don ni dmigs su med/
41b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i dngos po spros dang bral// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dmigs dang bral// chos nyid rang bzhin spros dang bral// rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i ngang // che ba'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang // kun bzang yangs po chos dbyings yin// bu bral mi
41b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs dbyings la gnas// rnam rtog mi mnga' chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir// bcol sems med de rnam grol lo// zhi ba chen po'i ngang nyid do// mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs// gzung 'dzin yul yang ngang gis stong //
41b4(rnying rgyud): mi skye mi 'gag mtha' las grol// byams pas don gnyer rnam sbyang phyir// bdag dang sems can gnyis ma mthong // rang bzhin gcig ste gnyis med do// sems kyi rang bzhin skyo med de// thugs rjes bzung ba'i mtshan ma med// snying rje chen po ce
41b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad// yang dag zab mo chen po yin// che ba'i che ba zab mo yin// che ba'i don nyid mnyam pa yin// byang chub med de ngan song med// de bas gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// chos dbyings gnyis med yon tan gter// yon tan cir yang bsdig
41b6(rnying rgyud): pa med// yon tan rgya mtshor spos mi 'dogs// don rnams ji bzhin mi bskyod de// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos// skyon rnams ma lus dag pa'o// bya ba'i yul rnams dang gis spong // bya ba med pas rang bzhin grol// 'gro ba zhi ba chen po'i dang //
41b7(rnying rgyud): na thos gyi// gan gyu sa sa/ byung sa mi rnam 'angs// la me ma na na/ khrom du sa slo pa pa'i lam nga da som ldad du/ du ma ma nyis ma dang /
42a1(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das nyid du// gnas susl-i btags yod ma man// de lta bur ni sus mtho ga// mtshan ma'i g.yul las rgyal ba yin// de ltar ni sus 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas yan ta rgyal bar smras// zhes gsungs so// rgyang
42a2(rnying rgyud): po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas so zhes bkye ba'i
42a3(rnying rgyud): don ji lta bu lags/ bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags na/ bdag cag la gya cher bshad du gsol// a la la ho// zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// 'khor ba
42a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad byang chub ste// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// sachu me rlung nam mkha' che// don nyid ye nas sangs rgyas te// snang ba nyid na dag pa yin// sems can thams cad rang bzhin grol// de phyir chos nyid grol ba yin// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/
42a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes pas sde bslad mi nus// de la 'khrul 'khor 'byung de min// phyin ci log gi rjes mi 'breng // phyin ci log tu rnam bslad kyang // grol ba rang bzhin gzhan las min// yang dag ye shes dag pa ste// chos rnams thams cad rang gis stong // de phyir rang bzhin
42a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das// zhes gsungs so// e maho rgyal ba'i sras po yon tan mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi gter// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs gsang sngags ston// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ngo mtshar chel bdag cag 'dud// ces gsol to//
42a7(rnying rgyud): pobya chub kyi sems cang chen po'i mdo las/ rang bzhin gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas 'khod deng 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' chen po la gsol pa/ bdag cag gis ye shes kyi don ji ltar rnyed par bgyi lags/ thabs ji ltar lags/
42b1(rnying rgyud): don ni gang / rnyed par bya ba'i rgyu ni ji ltar lags/ de nas byang chub sems rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ chos kun mnyam rdzogs lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pas rin chen gter// rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa'i ngang // kun gzhi'i rang bzhin stong pa
42b2(rnying rgyud): ste// dngos po thams cad zhi ba yin// de ltar ma mthong sdug bsngal te// sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'khor bar 'khor// de ltar mi shes byis pa dag/ ji ltar sdebs nas grang ba la// nyi ma'i 'od mchog sprin gyis bsgribs// grang bas de nyid bas ma 'dod pa// rang gi rtsal
42b3(rnying rgyud): gyis sprin la bud byas kyang // sprin rnams bsal bar ge la 'gyur// dngos po brtags pa'i mtshan ma yis// stong pa'i don ni mi ster ro// de phyir che ba'i yon tan mchog/ che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba// zab cing phra la rtogs par dka'// chos nyid mi rnyed sgyu mar
42b4(rnying rgyud): bstan// ji ltar sgyu ma snang gyur yang // de la dngos po ga la yod// ye shes bstan pas sgyu ma snang // ji ltar sgyu ma byed pa'i skyes bu yis// 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams sna tshogs byas// sgyu ma de la 'gro ba med// 'gro ba'i don du ye shes bstan// ye shes de la chos nyi
42b5(rnying rgyud): ga la yod// shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub// longs spyod chos nyid mi dmigs mnyam pa yin// dus gsum mi dmigs don gyi mchog/ ming tsam gnas pas bston nas mthong // rang rig ye shes bde ba che// nyid la nyid mthong bde ba yin//
42b6(rnying rgyud): ming tsam gzhan la bstan 'dra yang // gzhan nas ma byung de nyid yin// mngon sum bde bar rang las byung // bde ba gang yin stong pa yin// de ltar mthong ba dag pa yin// dag pa de nyid grol ba yin// zhes gsungs so// e ma ho chos kun rgya mtsho dag pa'i gsung // gnyis med don dam
42b7(rnying rgyud): bkod pa'i rgyan// rnam rtog me mnga' ye shes thugs// ngo mtshar dam pa ser ge'i sgra// kun la snyoms mdzad ye shes dang // dmigs pa med pas nam mkha' 'dra// kun la snyoms pas nyi zla 'dra// nam mkha' lta bur dmigs pa med// gter gyi dadud
43a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin seng ge'i ste// smras pa'i don ston gsung gan na ga/ zla ba'i dam pa de la bdag cag 'dud// ces gsol to// kyad kyi la bachen po byang chung kyi sems lung chen por mngalas/ gnan masaza ba'i pa
43a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen 'dir 'di dag bcal lam me btsalA/ ma btsal mngon gyi ngo Ta/ don gangs sdeb/ chos
43a3(rnying rgyud): nyid la thog ma dang thamar mi 'gyur ram/ sems dpa' chen po don 'di dag bshad du gsol// de nas smra ba'i dam pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos nyid 'anga'i mo 'phrul labyung // nam mkha'i ngang gis gzugs rnams mthong // mos dbyings nam ma
43a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gnas// nam mkha'i khams la btsal du med// de bzhin chos dbyibs btsal du med// cho 'phrul chen po dka' ba min// ji bzhin cho 'phrul chen po'i/ chos dbyings de bzhin nyid mi 'gyur// de ni cho 'phrul dam pa'o// thob par ya du med
43a5(rnying rgyud): de// thob pa'i yon tan bstun pa yang // theg dman rnams la bstan par zad// dper ni phyis pa'i rang bzhin la// snga ma bslu byas brid pa ltar// theg pa margal bde gshegs yon tan bstan// yon tan kun gyi stobs kyi rnams// thob par dbye ba yod
43a6(rnying rgyud): ma yin// mi dmigs pa yi chos nyid la// dmigs par bya ba yod ma yin// yang dag ma mthong theg dman dang // 'jig rten pa dang log lha dang // mi shes blan rmongs mongs rnams kyis// 'jig rten sgyu mar sbyor ba la// bde rtag 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// de
43a7(rnying rgyud): ltar gnyis yod ma yin te// blta dman rnams kyis gnyis su mthong // zang ma'i rang bzhin rtogs par dka'// zab mo'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med// chos nyid rang bzhin nam mkha'i tshul// rtog pa kun dang yang dag bral// ji bzhin rtog pa rba ba yis// rtog
43b1(rnying rgyud): mi mtshan ma zhi// rtog pa phra dgas nyid las 'byung // de bzhin rtog pa'i mtshan ma des// de ma thag tu rang las byung // bya ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid ni// de la bcol bar byad yin// rtsol bar byed na sdug bsngal yin
43b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgya mtsho brgal bar dka'// bcol du med pa'i chos nyid ni// mA btsal bzhag pas bsgom pa yin// chos nyid de bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul// dmigs pa med pas kun tu bzung // mnyams dang bzhag bsgom pa yin// de dang der ni rnam bsnol na//
43b3(rnying rgyud): yid skyes bu rtsal can gyis// nyid la nyid kyis ga la dgongs// ji ltar mig gi dbang pos kyang // dbang po rang thad gal mthong // de bzhin yang dag za' mo yang // de las de bzhin du mi 'thung // mtshan ma'i rtog pa thams cad bral// mtshan ma'i yul
43b4(rnying rgyud): brjod du med// gzhan gyis rtogs dka'i zab mo'i 'angon// mchog tu gas ba chos nyid ni// mi dmigs rang bzhin stong pa'i ngang // depyir gsang bdam pa yin// mi dmigs chos dbyings zab mo 'di// rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur// de rtsi chos
43b5(rnying rgyud): zlos med// de bzhin gyi yi dbang pos kyang // de la brjod du rdul tsam med// chos nyid dam pa garjod med lnga// brjod par 'dod pa gang yin pa// byis pa thun rmongs mi shes ngas// nAm du kha' dag la gnas 'dod 'dra// byang rtsol med
43b6(rnying rgyud): pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams dam par gyur te// e ma ho sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i mchog/ thugs rje chen po stangs mdzad do// ji ste nad pa gdungs pa la// de bzhin sman pa don ldan gyis// nad kyi rnams gang yin par
43b7(rnying rgyud): sman dpyid banyen po btang ba bzhin// ji ltar la bo ba'i sdug bsngal la// 'khor nga dag phyir rnam grol bshad// dgas zen po a al la// zhes gsol to// kyi rgya mdo chen po byang chub kyi sems sring chen po mdo las/ bcol ba med pa'i la
44a1(rnying rgyud): na nga mas ma/ sa da ga nab
44a2(rnying rgyud): danas sam sa dpang can pos bka rtsupa pa// semam nyid rjo pa// dngos po marjod pa dang/ dman// dpe na kyi po sa papas// nga da yul // de na ga rje'i drug pa sa// don ny-i rjong de dang la drang/
44a3(rnying rgyud): nga ba // 'thob mdus/ shes / / pa sa mi na
44a4(rnying rgyud): spang babs pa bathings gyur/ dag ri pa zhib pa // gzung 'don pa gis 'arjengs pa na/ dreg ci cini 'a/ ma po bye byes pa mdzod rtigs pargya gyi/ dzin ma
44a5(rnying rgyud): nyid kun kyis rdzogs// gnyis med dag pas 'de gnas pas// de la bstod pa med bzhinang // nam mda'i mtha' ste mnyam par gnan ni D+yan mo nga 'di do// des gsungs so// nyon ma'i rang gyi ni mdzo kar/ byar na ma nga/
44a6(rnying rgyud): sa rdo chen po 'gro 'phye mngon// thugs rje'i dang la stabs sum che// gsol to// kyirgyal rjo chub tu sems sa/ brjod pa 'i 'astedran / de du byal sogs pa/
44a7(rnying rgyud): memapa la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag la na me/ seng ga // gangs kyis bsta te/ 'dren ce med pa // gatho sems / po myang na'asa'i/ ngos pad
44b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad kyi bdag po cang ma gsung bar mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chags rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la btud de// de nas sems dpas bka' stsal pa// las kyi khyad par stong pa
44b2(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log gis las su brtags// de yang yod pa ma yin te// khyad par ci yang mtshungs pa la// las so zhes ni rnam par brtags// kun bzang byang chub mtshungs par gnas// las des ci phyir 'gro mi 'khol// gal te las kyis 'khos 'gyur na//
44b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin ga la yod// nyon mongs byang chub rang bzhin te// las nyid bstan pag la yin// ci ste lus kyi dbang 'gyur na// rtog pa dang bral zhi ba'i ngang // rang byung ye shes yod ma yin// rgyu nyid skye med rdo rje'i don// mi gnas skye med rang bzhin ni//
44b4(rnying rgyud): dorje rkyen dang 'dra// ye brub ma yin snying po'i dor// ma skyes pas na 'dzeg pa med// mi b+he mi 'gag don b+hi dang// gdod nas snying po byang chub la// 'dus byas rtsol babrel ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i chos nyid dmapa de// 'tshal pa rings ma yasa? dkyi
44b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po mdo las/ sems kyi rang bzhin las kyis mi 'khol ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sgra ba'i rnam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/
44b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po/ bsam pa'i don dang bsam pa'i khyad par gang lags/ smra ba'i dam pas bka' stsal pa// 'dam du bying bas 'gro ba kun// ye shes rasam gtan spyod pa rnams// yon tan mam bsam gtan ni// sam gtan nyid bas bsam du med// bas
44b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsam gtan bgrod pa min// ma bsams ma sbyangs chos bzhin du// gnyis su snang bas skyon yin phyir// rnam rtog nyid las ye shes kye// rtog nyid nga 'byung ye shes yin// phra ba'i sgo mor ming btags nas// phra mo yang dag sgo mo 'di// sems kyi dben pas
45a1(rnying rgyud): tshol zhing // 'khrul pa phra mos bden bslad de// dgon pa'i rgyudang du dben 'dzin pa// brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom// rgyu 'bras don nyid dbyer med la// rgyu dang 'bras bud ming 'dogs shing // dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par sel/
45a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar byis pa mi shes pas// nam mkha' dag la mdud pa 'dor// de la mdud pa 'ong mi 'gyur// ji ltar chos nyid dag pa la// 'jig rten 'di las 'byung ngo zhes// blang dor brod pa mchog tu bskyod// yang dag de la blang dor med// chags dang mchags chog gi lam//
45a3(rnying rgyud): dbu ma bzhin te brag cha 'dra// gang du'ang ma gyur dag pa'i lam// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhing // bde dang sdug bsngal don gyi dbyings// 'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rtsol
45a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang bral ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje des/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces pa lpags so// nyon mongs dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyud// 'khor ba rnams kyis ji ltar mthong // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// byis
45a5(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis 'khor bar mthong // byang chub chen por lam la byung // dug gsum byang chub la ma yin te// kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang // 'dod yon lnga nyid dag pa ste// chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyun zhes gsungs// kun bzang bdud rtsi chos kyi sku// nam mkha'
45a6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa skye med cing // rnam rtog med de zhi ba'i sgra// rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar rtog/ dug gsum rtog pa nam mkha' 'dra// mi chags nam mkha' bsngo ba la// rgyu gcig sems rig don can yin// rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung // /
45a7(rnying rgyud): byung tshor rtog pa yod ma yin// zhes 'byung ngo // rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rang gsal ye shes 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bdag po chos nyid gsang ba'i sku las
45b1(rnying rgyud): ma g.yos par bzhugs so// de nas 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa las bzhengs te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi snying po na sems can rnams la 'dul bar dgongs nas/ shin tu bde ba chen po mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa'i chos nyid rang gi sgra las 'dus ma byas
45b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin/ zla gsang thig le'i dkyil nas/ gzungs kyi rang bzhin gyi don mi gtong ba dang / don du mdzad pa dang / don ltar ston pa dang / don gyi rjes 'jug pa'i thabs kyi rang bzhin/ yi ge A li kA li zhes bstan te/ gzungs kyi rol pa 'di gsungs so//
45b3(rnying rgyud): rtog med mnyam pa zhi ba ste// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// rtog pa mi dmigs mtshan ma zhi// A li ka li mnyam sbyar nas// a nyid chos sku stong pa'i dang // kun tu bzang po rol pa'i gzungs// A li kA li zab tu bstan// byang chub nam mkha'i
45b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// a ni stong dang mi stong gis// dbu ma yang ni yod ma yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs pa'i le'u ste bcu
45b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ smra ba'i dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ yi ge'i don ma skyes par 'tshal na/ yi ge gzungs kyi rang bzhin bstan du gsol// de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'di
45b6(rnying rgyud): skad bka' stsal to// a ni chos sku dag pa ste// zhi ba yul med dag pa'i dang // de la a ni nut+pan+da swa b+hA wa ste// chos kun rang bzhin skye med dag pa'i klong // zab mo thabs kyi thun mong ste// gsang ba gnas su bzung ba yin// thams cad byed pa shes rab ste/
45b7(rnying rgyud): da ni/ a dang mdzes pa'i ta// sa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin// bdag gis shes rab gnas pa ste// thabs kyi shes rab dam pa ste// 'gro ba'i bde sdug spos gnas te// bdag dang gzhan gnyis kun tu bzang // ma bslad zab mo thun mong ste// 'jig rten
46a1(rnying rgyud): 4/ yangs kyi spyong yul las// sangs rgyas gsang ni bab ma 'byung // gzhing zlab mchud dka'i phyir// e ma ha sangs rgyas spyod yul 'ad// gzhan nas skyed pa ga la 'gyur// bcal bas rtad pa'i grags med do// dam par
46a2(rnying rgyud): don la rgya cher dmigs med pas// spyod yul rang bzhin rnyed par dka'// yul drug rang bzhin stong pa ste// drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas// dmigs pa'i yul rnams stong pa'i phyir// ldongs pas nam mkhar bsnyegs pa bzhin// gong nas gong du
46a3(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i lam// thob par 'dod pa rmongs pa'i phyir// bya bral chos dang mthun pa med// brgya byin tshangs pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam// lam de thob 'dod bcing ba chen po'i phyir// ji ltar 'gro ba dmus long gis// lnga pa'i yul rnams blta dzi
46a4(rnying rgyud): da// nga ba nyams pa ma dzad mi 'gyur// ma sa pa ma 'ang/ ldang man mams sa la mdzad/ mal ba pa tsam dzu/ ba pa datha gnam ma ngas/ la yang byum pa'i na sa
46a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mtha' dag blta 'dod na// nam mkha' mi mthong byis pa ngal// de bzhin chos nyid zab mo yang // nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ sems dpa' chen po
46a6(rnying rgyud): gzungs kyi rol pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas 'khor tshogs rnams kyis slu ba'i dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po zab mo nI gang / chos rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i don gang lags/ zhes
46a7(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje des bka' stsal pa// chos kun rang bzhin spros bral te// brjod bral stong nyid lhun gyis grub// de yang ci yi phyir zhe na// chos nyid dmigs pa kun dang bral// de ltar de bzhin de phyir ston// de la der ston de yang thob/
46b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin 'gro kun dbyangs sa mnyam// tsa m+b+hir don nyid mngon sam ma gyur pa// rang bzhin chos nyid ston 'arjod thal// don snying po dbas na// sems ni snying po mngon sum dra// da las dbyung ngo mtshar cha// dus rnams rtag tu bde ba'i 'bras// sngon gyi bdi dang
46b2(rnying rgyud): da ltar bad// 'das dang ma'ongs da ltar gyi// dus gsum rtag tu zababade// de yang rjes nyid zhi pa'i gnas// zhing mthong ba gang yin pa// ra~M ba ni de yiganas suche// sems can rgyal ba'i zhing 'gyur yin// thams cad rgyal ba'i dang thar bas//
46b3(rnying rgyud): de ltar de yi la ma 'dra bas// rgal pa 'gro dang mnyam nyid pas// de ni lam mchog rang bzhin te// de ltar snang ba gang yin pa// de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam// zla ba las byung rten dang bcas// klung la zhi ba'i rang bzhin gnas// skye med zhi bar gcig
46b4(rnying rgyud): phyir// mnyam nyid dag pa gang yin pa// thams cad mnyam nyid zhib la// kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa'i rgyur// phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med// de phyir mnyam nyid dam pa la// blta bar 'dod pa gang yin pa// dper na mun nag rdzas 'tshol 'dra//
46b5(rnying rgyud): daphyir mnyam nyid gal rnyed// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'khor dar 'dus pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems
46b6(rnying rgyud): rjel gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chags pa thams cad dang bral ba ji lta bu lags/ chags na skyon du ji lta bur 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje des bka' stsal ba// chos nyid bde sdug nam mkha'i tshul// de bas bde sdug gal yod// chags dang ma chags
46b7(rnying rgyud): rang gis stong // 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// bde sdug rnam par bsal ba'i phyir// da lta'i bde dang phyi ma yi// mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas 'byung // che ba'i yon tan thob zin pas// ye shes dbang gis yon tan rnyed// ngarting dbyar ba med bzhin du// shes
47a1(rnying rgyud): pas rnyed par bya 'dad pa// de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas// de la brten par mi bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung man pa'i mdo las/ chags pa thams cad dang bral ba
47a2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad bya ba med pa'i don ji lta bu lags/ ye nas chos nyid che ba'i rang bzhin ni gang / don nyid ni ji ltar rtogs par bkye/ zhes
47a3(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje des bka' stsal pa// gnyis med rnam pa zhi ba'i ngang // 'gyur med dag pa zhi ba'i phyir// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// dus rnams rtag tu stong pa'i phyir// sngon med phyis med gdod nas med// chos kyi
47a4(rnying rgyud): byibyengs ni cig char gnas// chos smras khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir// chos kyi rgyu ni nam mkha' 'dra// gnyis med chos sku'i rgyan yin te// che ba'i rgyan gyis kun khyab phyir// che ba'i chen por rang bzhin gnas// de ltar chen po'i rang bzhin yang //
47a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun la khyad par gnas// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ che ba nyid kyi snying po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po
47a6(rnying rgyud): da ni smon pa thams cad dang bral ba lags na/ ci phyir btsal ba bgyi zhes gsol to// smra ba'i dam pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rang bzhin che ba'i chen po la// btsal dang bskyab par gang 'dod pa// ji ltar byis pa'i
47a7(rnying rgyud): 'joms// 'du shes chung ba'i rang bzhin gyis// nye rang rnam pa mi shas ltar// de ltar / bidaman gyur pas// yid dag bstab mthor mi 'gyur// yang dag don ldan mkhas pa yis// srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang // med tsam sgra mar snang ba ste// sred
47b1(rnying rgyud): sbram ming tsam grags// da yang rtse// bu zhen// ji ltar sgra ma mkhan pa mas// rdzas kyi rnam pa rtson la// sred phrag sum du ldang 'gyur yang // srid pa'i dngos pa yod ma yin// sgyid gsum ma lus dag pa'i zhing // mkha mos sbyar ba'i gnas rgyan pad//
47b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma byang chub zhi bas 'dul ba'i gnas yin te// 'khor los sgyur ba sgyu ma'i tshul// sgyu mas sbyor ba'i gnas chen yin// dbyings nyid ye nas rdzogs pa la// dag pa'i dus 'dod 'khrul pa ste// sngon du ma he ma mthong bas// 'o ma'i ma dar ba 'dod gyur
47b3(rnying rgyud): na// nu ma bzhag nas rwal 'jo// chos nyid theg pa ma mthong bas// dus de 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir// rnam smin dus la bltas pa na// dus der 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// de phyir chos nyid stong pa 'di// ma bral smon pa spyod pas na// stong nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis
47b4(rnying rgyud): grub// ji ltar ston pa rgyal bas kyang // stong pa'i rang bzhin gsungs pa bzhin// ji ltar stong pa mtshan med 'di// theg dman rnams kyis mi rtogs pas// rmi lam dag na nor rnyed kyang // de la dbang ba'i dngos po med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal
47b5(rnying rgyud): po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ smon lam dang bral ba'i le'u sgra bco lnga pa'o// // de nas 'khor tshogs rnams kyis smra ba'i dam pa la btud de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// zab mo'i chos nyid gang / tha tshig ji ltar
47b6(rnying rgyud): lags/ de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// de bzhin nyid la khyad med phyir// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyi med// zab mo mi gnas kun tu bzang // rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas// nam
47b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' dag la song gyur kyang // de la rjes ni mthor mi 'gyur// ma byung ma skyes snying po la// brjod dang mi brjod mtha' dbus med// gnyis med don dam spros bral yin// ma byung ma skyes snying po la// smra bas ma yul med dag pa'i phyir// sgro btags
48a1(rnying rgyud): chos kun gal yod// phyi nang rtsol ba bdag med zhi ba ste// dbyangs la thob pa'i bsam pa dang gis zhwa// phyi nang gnyis ka bya nyid nang // zab mo byang chub ma rtag yul med// 'di dag mnyam zhing sring pa rlu
48a2(rnying rgyud): tsam ste// zab mo'i cha shas rtog yul med// khams gsum dag tu grags pa yang // srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs// zin pa'i dgongs pa bkod pa ste// ska ma'i ting 'dzin bcings pa ste// de bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral// tha tshig
48a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa 'byung ba yang // 'byung chen lnga la tha chog phyi dang nang // rang bzhin phung po khams bzhin gnas// zab mo khyad par ji tshig stong // bder gshegs sems can dang gcig phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ chos kyi rgyal po lta bura'i/
48a4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum de dang mi bral bas// blang dang dor ba bya med phyir// tha tshig ming du btags pa med// de bzhin chos nyid dag pa la// tha tshig 'dogs pa blta ba dman// nam mkha' dag la rdzas bzhag kyang // de la chags pa'i gnas med ltar// yang dag
48a5(rnying rgyud): dam pa zhi pa la// tha tshig ming du btags pa yang // de la tha tshig thogs med 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal nge chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ lung ston pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas 'khor der
48a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// dbyings la dbade ba'i don ni gang / ma btsal bar lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i don ni ji lta bu lags// de nas sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i
48a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs rnams// chos kun mnyam nyid lhun gyis rdzogs// mi rtsol dbang sgyur rtogs pa'i phyir// mi bskyod dag pa'i phyir// mi g.yo ba ni sgra yi rgya// mi bskyod de nyid ye shes te// chos nyid skye 'gag mnyam nyid dang // chos nyid phyag rgya nam mkha
48b1(rnying rgyud): mi len ye shes dag pa ste// bsam pa'i mngon shas mi len byer// mi len mi 'dor mnyam med do// mi len pas na bdag med cing // mdor chog bral mnyam nyid do// smra ba'i seng ge yul med pas// bsam pa mi 'dor mnyam nyid do// 'dus dang ma 'ongs dus nyid zhe/
48b2(rnying rgyud): gang dang gang sheg du yang // ji ltar yid bzhin rin chen sbyar// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i dor byed ltar// rang las dag pa mi zad 'byung ba'i phyir// kun 'khor kun spyod dag las 'byung // chos dbyings kun tu bzang mo'i dang // rdul ba jog
48b3(rnying rgyud): rten mnyam pa yis// 'di la skyes pa bud med ces// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yongs ma gsungs// de bzhin ston pa rgyal ba yang // mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhag ste// nam mkha' bzhin du zhi bar gnas// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal
48b4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ mnyam pa nyid la dbang bsgyung ba'i len sde btu bdun pa'o// de nas 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la logs su btud de/ 'di skad ces gsal to//
48b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po bde ba dang / chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i don ji lta bu lags/ zhes gsol pa dang // sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// 'gro ba 'khrul pas mi shes pas// bde dang sdug
48b6(rnying rgyud): bsngal gnyis bsdus byar// da phyir bde dang lhag bsngal myang // 'khrul pa'i dbang gis myang bar zad// chos nyid rang bzhin dag pa la// bde dang sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir// 'di la brtul zhugs drag po yis// spyod par byed pa gang yin pa// ji
48b7(rnying rgyud): sbya dran pa zung ba'i mas// sA dang brgyab mi gas byed// thams cad brtseb med pa mdzod// dadas su byang ming par med// de 'di chos dbyings dam pa 'di// brjod pa thams cad bral ba'i phyir// thams cad stong nyid rang bzhin ni// kun bzang rgyas
49a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings dag pa la// bsgrub dang dkar thub bsrung ba yis// yang dag don de ma mthong gis// sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs bskyod// de ltar spyad na 'tshong tshan pa yin// thams cad su med bdag nyid zhing ste//
