49a2(rnying rgyud): dang bar ni rnam ldan pas// shes rab skye med ni ba ste// de ltar bltas pa de steng ste// de yang ci yi phyir zhe na// rang bzhin gcig tu mnges pas// 'dzin pa ma spangs skyon steng pyir// 'phrul pa kun tu btsal na byon// sdod 'dod rtsol sems bad
49a3(rnying rgyud): yang // de ni rje sgrib skyon can yin// lam bgrod rlabs kyi yig 'bru dang // gzugs brtan 'dzin dang cha lugs bsgom// mtshan dang dpe byud 'khor tshogs 'dzin// chos nyid rang bzhin dngas bral bas// de skar bsgom pa byis pa yin// byang chub
49a4(rnying rgyud): yan lag kun gyi sgo// cha lugs bsgom pa chu zla bzhin// de ltar bsgoms kyang skyon can yin// mgos ma chags 'byung gyur kyang // bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul yin// dkyil 'khor cha lugs khro gnyer gyis// khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung
49a5(rnying rgyud): nas// yi ge mngon du byung na yang // zhi ba'i rang bzhin dam pa ste// ngang nyid rang bzhin dag pa'i dngos// zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos de skad gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ bde ba dang
49a6(rnying rgyud): chags pa spangs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ rnam grangs kyi chos thams cad sangs rgyas pa ji lta bu/ sems
49a7(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// rnyed dka'i chos nyid zab mo 'di// thams cad mngon rdzogs byang chub ni// rnam dag lhun grub chos kyi sku// tA la'i mgo bo bcad pa dang // sa bon me yis bsregs pa bzhin// chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las dben// tharapa
49b1(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal rang bzhin zhi// rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa// gang ltar bskyed kyang mi rtog skye// mngon sum chos nyid rang bzhin la// de la dmigs par bya min phyir// mnyam nyid gang nas bsgrub tu med// chos nyid bcings grol kun tu bzang // /
49b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i dbang gis na// dper na yid bzhin rin chen dag/ bsod nams ldan la yod gyur pas// dgos pa gang 'dod 'grub pa ltar// tshad med chos nyid dag pa las// mtshan ma dbyung bar mi 'gyur phyir// bsti gnas 'di la 'byung mi
49b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// chos nyid mtshan mar mi 'gyur bas// gzhan las chos nyid mi 'byung ste// dag pa'i rang bzhin rgyu med yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rnam grangs kyi chos thams
49b4(rnying rgyud): cad lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid kyi dang brjod pa dang bral ba'i don ji lta bu lags/ sems dpa' chen
49b5(rnying rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa// skye med chos dbyings gleng gzhi bral ba la// ma skyes bder gnas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// gleng bral 'di la gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang // chos nyid gter ldan nam mkha'i tshul// rnal 'byor chos nyid
49b6(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir// bdag dang gzhan dag med pa'i phyir// bdag dang gzhan don mi byed pas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// mi gnas dbyings las cir snang yang // snang ba sgyu ma chen po ste// yul la rol pas lhun gyis grub// phyi rol bzung ba'i yul
49b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang // de phyir bzung ba'i yul rnams kyang // ngang gis grub pa ma yin pas// de phyir shes pa yang grub min// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
50a1(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid mi 'gyur ba'i don ji lta bu lags/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// yang dag med 'gyur nam mkha'i
50a2(rnying rgyud): tshul// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med par ltar// dbus mtha' med pa'i nam mkha'i tshul// gzugs med chos nyid nam mkha'i ngang // ye nas mtha' bral dag pa'i phyir// gang nas mi 'byung chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs/
50a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba med pas drang por gnas// ye shes dmigs med nam mkha' 'dra// rang bzhin mtha' med mnyam pa che// yul bsam smra ba 'byung mi 'gyur// mtshungs pa med pa'i chos nyid ni// rang gi mthu yis rig pa las// mnyam nyid bsgom pa gzhan las
50a4(rnying rgyud): min// depyir bslab pa don med phyir// chos ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ye nas rdul tsam me dmigs phyir// spyod yul bgrod pa shin tu dkar// yang dag chos nyid gcig pa la// bye brag chos su phye bar dka'// sgra zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'// zhis
50a5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid dngos bral bas// mngon sum gnas pa kun la khyab// chos nyid mtshan ma med pa ste// chos nyid dmigs pa'i yul med pas// dbang pos mthong bar bya ba min// yul med khyab pas de bzhin nyid// mngon sum snying rjes kun la khyab// rang
50a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin chos nyid zab mo la// dmigs pa thams cad yongs bral la// 'jig rten byis pa mi mkhas pas// ri bong rwa dang dus sbal sku// nam mkha'i me tog mo gsham bu// de rnams mthong ba gang 'dod pa// de dag byis pa'i spyod yul yin// thob med
50a7(rnying rgyud): yenas gnas pa'i phyir// mngon par 'char ba gcig pa'i phyir// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i le'u
50b1(rnying rgyud): ste nyer gcig pa'o// / de nas yang 'khor bar 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po yang dag ma bsgrubs par 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsa/
50b2(rnying rgyud): pa// yang dag don nyid dam pa 'di// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu yongs med phyir// mi dmigs zhi ba nam mkha'i tshul// ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di// bya bral nam mkha' ji bzhin te// sku gsung thugs ldan kun tu bzang // bcom ldan chos nyid mnyam
50b3(rnying rgyud): par gnas// bya bral ngo mtshar zhi ba nyid// sprul pa'i rol pa sgyu ma 'di// rmad byung byed mi 'gyur dang // mi mdzad chos nyid zhing gnas phyir// ci yang mi dmigs gti mug las// de ma thag tu rang las byung // gti mug rang bzhin yang dag ste//
50b4(rnying rgyud): stong nyid zhi ba nam mkha'i tshul// shes rab gti mug chos dbyings dang // de bas cir yang mi dmigs gti mug la// de ma thag tu rang las byung // sems can mtshan nyid stong pa'i phyir// rnam grol dag pa gang yin pa// 'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i
50b5(rnying rgyud): lam// 'gro kun snang po yin pa'i phyir// 'gro bkun gyi rang bzhin gnas// mi shes byis pas bskrad pa'i phyir// yang dag don nyid gzhan nas tshal// sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin// ji ltar nad pa'i mtshan nyid la// swanA dang ldan pas zhi bltar/
50b6(rnying rgyud): zhibs chos nyid dag pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid rgyu rkyen las ma grub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems
50b7(rnying rgyud): rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag pa chen por 'gyur ba'i don ji lta bu/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i// byang chub snying po kun
51a1(rnying rgyud): bad na pa sa// gang+gA dang ma pa migs pa// 'dog rtenanam gnan pag// da mas 'an / da sgyu da mad/ phyogs bcwa nas rlu pa kyang/ danan
51a2(rnying rgyud): thas cad pa drathabs// ming rgyas rnam nga / nyid ma sbyinas// mas ma ra rjon// dem krenas da dus sa/ gas pa ni sa da pa na'i sa dus
51a3(rnying rgyud): 'grosams can rnams su srung // mangs 'dzi' non pa dag sasu// rigs kyi byung bar mngon par srung // snod bzad 'jig rten rnams cad kun// gso dang myig yo rnams cad kyang // de bzhin nyid kyis zhe med// de bzhin pa la'i po gsob// 'ag rnams
51a4(rnying rgyud): labaste phyi byed// 'byung bas pag tu can// thams cad mi bral yang dgas+ho// thams cad de bzhin nyid dru gnas// lhag pa'i dbang gis teg pa N+DI/ rtog pa ni ba gang smin pa// na chos sring gi ste// rgya med dpe'i dris gang ba shang// rnas ga
51a5(rnying rgyud): la ba na chub rtsamams sung smin pa'i ma nga/ da bcung dag pa sadasu dpa dus pa mas / seMs su pa'angs pas
51a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad dag pa chen po yinan rtsol brgya ba gyur rje sa bu lags// sems da pa'adam pas bka' stsal po// gal te dmus yong mig ljongs pas// bzang ba'i yul cig pasta da kyang // bral dem thong nga med pa ltar// rjem nyid yang dag
51a7(rnying rgyud): 'di// theg pa dam na pas mi rtags phyid/ spyong bsgrub sgri chags bstan nas kyang // don la yang dge gzung bying bdun/ chos nyid yang da ga zab mol// dus gsum bdag shegs mchod pa dang / ting 'dzin phyag tu spyan dang sems cad do//
51b1(rnying rgyud): chos nyid lda ni de dag med// dpyir tshol bslob bla med gnas surtse// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ spyod pa thams cad bkag pa'i len gnyi shu bzhipa'o// / de nas 'khor dar 'dus/
51b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i don ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dus gsum rtag tu ngo bos
51b3(rnying rgyud): stong // rang bzhin skye 'gag med pas zhi// byang chub tha snyad mi 'dzin phyir// blang dor chos nyid rtag gnas phyir// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// tha snyad ming la mi gnas te// skye 'gag med sar rtag gnas shing // de nyid dus gsum
51b4(rnying rgyud): chen por sbyor// mnyam nyid chos dbyings kun tu bzang // phyogs bral chos nyid yongs rdzogs phyir// dus gsum rnam pa zhi ba'i tshul// mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// gcig pas phyogs su bsngo dang bral// dri med rang bzhin
51b5(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i tshul// tshogs kyi rgyan dang bkram pa yang // rang bzhin gnas pas dri ma med// 'dod yon lnga nyid kun bzang rgan// ye nas chos kun dag pa'i phyir// bsngo ba khyad par med pa'i phyir// gnyis 'dzin bral ba zhi pa ste// gdod nas rnam
51b6(rnying rgyud): ngag bdud rtsi'i tshul// kun bzang ldan grub yin pa'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pas mi bsgo zhing // gdod nas dag pa bdud rtsil// phyi nang 'du byed bdud rtsi'i tshul// mi gnas 'du byed zhi ba'i phyir// 'du byed bcu gnyis khyad par yang // lhag
51b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsam pas gzung ba med// gzung med 'jig rten zhi ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas 'khod de
52a1(rnying rgyud): 'das pa rnams rgyas/ sems dpa' da sa na byamanas pa// stsa sa ma rnams so thamags// soms dpa'ang 'a byas pa stsal pa// rnamasas dang na gshegs pa sa
52a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'char// e mato chas rnams thabs mkhas ye shes mthong nga dang // chu bzhi dmigs dang nges dang dam tshig dmas// thams cad gang yinangs rba// chos dang gang yin zhi ba'i tshul// de phyir chos pa yongs su ngas
52a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// dpa' bo chen po dpag med pa// rnam 'dren sems can thams cad kyis// rnam pa kun tu mi 'gyur dang // nga ltar stobs dang rnamathar dang // 'jig meng gang dag ci 'dra dang // yang dag chos rnams/
52a4(rnying rgyud): ji 'dra bar// bkrus kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro// de yang dpyir zab ma 'od// she na rtogs par dag bya ba'i phyir// rgyal bas grangs med gnas dgan// zab cang shin tu phra ba dang // ngag dka' mthong bar dka' ba'i phyir// spyong pa dag na sngon chad
52a5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen// bskal po grangs med bas ma yis su// stod pa de dag stong pa'i phyir// 'bras brang ne ci 'drubs// byang chub snying po dam pa'ang// de ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren pa// gzhan dag dang ni ngas kyang de// ji ltar yin dang ci 'dra dang /
52a6(rnying rgyud): dayi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra shes// de ni bstan du mi nus te// mos pas rtogs par mi 'gyur phyir// de ni brjod du yongs med do// gang la chos de bstan pa dang // bstan pa dag kyang shes pa/ yi// de 'dra'i sems can su yang ni// 'jig rten
52a7(rnying rgyud): dgan yang ma yin// gang dag 'jig na na dgim khyen pa// phyag par bras pas dang pa gshegs kyis bsdigs// gzang kyil ba ma shes 'ang // sems pa dag cig rje 'dres gyur nas// bar yang dge bsams thas kyang / ra bca/
52b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes rtogs mi nus// de bas yang dag zab mo 'di// lha dman theg pa chung ba dang // mu snyigs log lha can rnams kyis// nga yi chos kyi phyogs tsam yang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// yang dag don de yongs mi shes// zhes rtog med
52b2(rnying rgyud): mnyam du ma shes na// shin tu nges don zab mo sgra rnams kyis// de rnams kyis kyang phyogs med gang gyur kyang // smyig ma 'dam bu'i tshal ltar gang bas kyang // shes rab phra rnams gcig tu 'dul nas su// ji ltar mi rtog zab mo la// brtag
52b3(rnying rgyud): kyang lta ba dman pa'i phyir// zab mo'i don gang mi rtogs pas// byis pa'i spyod yul min pas so// gzhan min gsung rgyal drang srong che// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos rnams
52b4(rnying rgyud): don gyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ zhi ba bdag nyid la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhi ba'i bdag nyid chen po rnam grangs kyi don ni gang lags/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid chen pos bka' stsal pa/ rang
52b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin theg pa gcig phyir du// dpag tu med pa bstan gyur kyang // theg pa yang dag rdzogs pa yin// nga yi bstan pa theg pa dgu po yang // 'gro bdag gi mthu dang stobs la bstun// thabs kyi mchod sbyin ye shes la// gzung ba'i phyir nangs
52b6(rnying rgyud): bshad do// gang zhig rtag tu rnam par dag 'gyur ba// rab tu nges pa sangs rgyas dang // de dag la ni rab rgyas don rnams bstan// de ltar de dag bsam pa rdzogs pa yang // de dag la ni ma 'ongs dus dag dang // shin tu dag pas de dag kun la khyab
52b7(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// the tshom med pas thams cad byang chub dang // theg pa tha dad pas ni gang bstan pa// skyes bu mchog rnams thabs mkhas ma gtogs par// theg pa gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin// bya ba gcig ste gnyis sa yod ma yin// byang chub
53a1(rnying rgyud): rdul med dam pa thob nas sa// 'dod chags zhe snang gti mug daN+Dal dang // phrag dog ser lnga 'khor ba'i thos// de dag rang bzhin 'o ba'i phyir// gdod nas kun rdzogs dbyings kyi dang // rab zhi mya na rtag/
53a2(rnying rgyud): 'das pas// theg pa gsum du gang dag bstan pa yang // bder gshegs thabs kyi 'gro ba 'dul yin phyir// theg pa thabs kyis de ltar bstan par zad// theg pa gcig ste de bzhin tshul yang gcig/ rnam dag chos kun 'dren pas bshad pas gcig/
53a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad theg pa mchog la gnas// zhi ba'i sa mchog dag pa dag pa'i dang // 'di dag thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// bsngags pa mtha' yas chos nyid dngos po dag/ 'di ni yang dag dam pa'i mdzod// rig dka' dam pa zhi ba ste/
53a4(rnying rgyud): theg dman rnams kyis rtogs mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid zhi ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi
53a5(rnying rgyud): sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po chos nyid ldan gyis rdzogs pa'i don gang lags/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// bya med lhun zlab yongs su rdzogs// mi gnas chos dbyings dngos po dag/ yud tsam ting 'dzin dbyings
53a6(rnying rgyud): la dbang // de nyid dang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// yid kyis bsam pa yang dag ste// bltas pa'i stobs ni bkral pa'o// mi dmigs mi 'gyur spong pa'i tshul// mi gnas lha ni klub mnyam pa'i dang // chos nyid yang dag bkram pa'i phyir// mthong bar
53a7(rnying rgyud): gyur pas dngos grub la// de nyid mnyam gzhag yongs rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgyas zag med dag pas zhi// chos 'di thams cad zag med zhib rtse// 'gog pa skye ba rnam por spangs// 'din chos rnams gang yang ma mchis zhes// de ltar bas
53b1(rnying rgyud): na dang me 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes blan med pa'i phyir// mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la// bdag nyid mnyam pa chen po'i don// yud tsam bzang bas sbyong ba yin// dga' bar blar bas ma chog s+ho// thog ma'i 'bras bu zag med dam pa
53b2(rnying rgyud): thob// ji ltar dbul pos nor rnams rnyeng pa bzhin// de bzhin yang dag dam pa thob// thabs kyis gar thabs bskyod pa yin// gnyis med sbyor bas phral ba yin// chos dbyings mi dmigs sbyor brtse// dga' ba kun bzang mo gtong shugs/
53b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid la ni nyams pa med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor deng 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems rdo rje la 'di skad
53b4(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// las rgya mtsho spyad par dag pa'i don ji lta bu lags/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// chos nyid zab mo yang dag yin pa'i phyir// dag pa 'di la mi smon to// rgyal bas 'di ni dam pa'i mthar gsungs so// mya ngan 'das
53b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthar thug lus 'di la// stong pa nyid du yun ring yongs su bsgom// khams gsum sdug bsngal byang chub zhing // bdag gi rgyal ba'i bstan pa bya ba'i phyir// rgyal ba'i sras la gang tshe rab bstan te// byang chub mchog la gang dag su zhugs pa// de
53b6(rnying rgyud): dag la ni chos gang ci 'grub pa// gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs mnyam nyid gnas pa'i phyir// bdag med mnyam nyid gnyis spangs te// mi gzung gtong bas gtor ma yin// bya ba med pas las rnams zin// rnam rtog 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ste// mnga'
53b7(rnying rgyud): brnyes mi rtog bgegs pasal te// phyi nang chos 'dzin bgegs kyi rnam// gzung 'dzin bral ba byang chub ste// ye shes nyi ma chos kyi dbyings// rnam rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas// mi gsung mnyam bzhag sngags tshig go// mnyam nyid ngam
54a1(rnying rgyud): bzhig yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chan pa'i mdo las/ spyad du med pa'i leT ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' dam pa la 'an
54a2(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po chags sdang zhib gang lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// mtshan mar sprod pa rnams la chos nyid de// chos kyi dbang phyug 'jig rten zhi ba'i tshul// sems can gnas rnams rab tu na//
54a3(rnying rgyud): rab dang byang chub dam pa 'di// thabs la mkhas pas chos nyid dang // rtag tu mya ngan 'das pa yin// rang gis chags pa mi mnga' bas// snying po rang rig sangs rgyas phyir// bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad
54a4(rnying rgyud): dang // ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs med na// byas pas 'ching ba chen por 'gyur// byang chub bde gnas snying po'i don// chos nyid mchod pa rin chen sbyin// rdo rje'i don nyid mi shigs pa// chos nyid skye med chos can rnam par dag/ de ltar zhi ba
54a5(rnying rgyud): bsod nams yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chags sdang zhi ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' chen po/ brdas
54a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid mtshon du med pa gang lags/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// rnam grol ro gcig mya ngan 'das// mthar thag rtag tu gcig pas nam mkha' 'dra// ye shes de ni shes dka' ste// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs la// mi shes
54a7(rnying rgyud): pas ni the tshom 'gyur// de las nyams shing de dag 'khyams// ji ltar sman gyi phung lo yis// nyi ma'i 'od mchog bsgribs pa ltar// mi shes byis pa rmongs pa yis// yang dag dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgribs// sprin gyi char pa ro gcig ltar//
54b1(rnying rgyud): zla 'brugasupa yang sa nyidad// sems can nyams cad mdon rdzogs te// sems can sdug bsal ma dag yon// dmang gzhan tam thod par sa pa phyir// don na'am thod yang dag gtsug/ don rnam thal mya ngan 'das pa byen// ga su
54b2(rnying rgyud): rlab sngo na gnas yin phyir// ngas na mnyam pa nyid da ma mnyam med// 'dad chags med cing 'd-ir dag kyang med// nam yang rjes su chags pa med// sral 'ang mdza' zhing chags pa med// de yi dbyeng sgrib par 'gyur// de ltar de la sar rtogs na/
54b3(rnying rgyud): lade'i grub pa med// de bzhin nyid tsam 'grub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// d+had kyi thal po chen pa byang chub kyis pas wang chen po'i mdoms/ de bzhin mtshon du med pa'i 'du skyes ma cu gcig pa'i// de nas 'khor dang 'dus pa rnams
54b4(rnying rgyud): kyis/ byang chub sems rdo rdul 'di skad ces gsol te// de bzhin nyid mtshan mi dang mtshan ma meng pa 'dzin gang lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// ji ltar te zla dag po'i 'od// yon tan ldan dang sdig can gyis// me la mnyam par
54b5(rnying rgyud): rab 'char ta// de la sde ba 'grib pa med// nga bzhin chos nyid shes rab yod// nyams pas nyi ma tha ba bzhin// lhag cang zad pa mang pa bzhin// thams cad sems can nam dag 'das// dzaM ltar kham sdong rngam par dgas// 'jim 'dra las sngang byas
54b6(rnying rgyud): padag/ sbrang kyi rnam pa mang byas la// rdzas kyi rnam pa so so thugs// des ni ming yangs sar grags// de bzhin mams can sangs rgyas tha zag med// zla dang med pas bdapar gshegs// theg pa zlang dang ba rten kyang // theg mchog rtsal ba'i zag par
54b7(rnying rgyud): 'khri ba'i 'am ma pashes pas da su nga shes pas// / ma rnam pa rnam // dag par ga med/ zhings sathas samaldan ma/ nga 'i yang dag nyid du gas/ sa ma
55a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas yin// ji ltar da lus long mi mthong 'di skad ces// gzugs rnams kun ni med ces sgra// sman pas dmus long rnams la snying rje bskyed// ril sman btus rab sgrar dmus long la ni shin tu gtong // de yis
55a2(rnying rgyud): mig mthong gzugs snang 'gyur// mi shes sems can dmus long 'dra// de phyir zab mo rtogs dka'o// bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub// theg bshad 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// rnam par dag pa bstan du med// stong nyid mi lam sgyu ma'i tshul// chu shing
55a3(rnying rgyud): snying po med lha'i tshul// gang gis chos nyid rab shes shing // khams gsum rang bzhin rnam par grol// chos kun stong zhing mnyam pa ste// tha dad dbyer med bdag nyid do// de dag la yang ma rtog stong // chos nyid gang yang mthong med na// chos kyi sku ni
55a4(rnying rgyud): ma lus par// shes rab chen po des mthong ngo // dgur bstan theg pa gcig tu mnyam// mnyam zhing snyoms te gcig tu mnyam// de ltar mkhas pa zhi pa yis// mi bcing ma ngan 'das pa shes// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rang rig skye med ye shes
55a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings// mi shigs mi 'gyur rdo rje'i don// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don// rdo rje 'chang rgyal 'di nyid ni/ thams cad du yang yang dag gnas// rgyal bas dus gsum rtogs par skye med mnyam// kun gyi chos nyid rtsal
55a6(rnying rgyud): brgya mtsho'i thugs// rdo rje gsum gyi mtshan mji snyed pa// bdag po nyid du gyur pas de bzhin nyid// chos rnams thams cad 'gro kun ni// dbyings su ro gcig skye med do// mnyam nyid rgyal po'i chos nyid de// rdo rje sems dpang kun tu bzang po'i dang // dug lnga chos dbyings
55a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbyings// skye med chos dbyings ye shes mnyam// de yi yon tan khyad par lngar mthong ba// mtshan nyid de nyid ye shes lnga// 'gro ba'i don du rigs lngar snang // rigs dang yon tan mang po yang // 'gro bzung don du bstan par zad// chos dbyings ye shes khyad med phyir// de phyir
55b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings nyid stong pa'i ngang // skye med ye shes me long lta bur gnas// rig pa'i ye shes dang rang gnyis med phyir// chos dbyings ye shes dag pa'i dbyings la brjod// rigs lnga thabs kyi phyag rgya kun// thams cad chos sku rdo rjer ro gcig 'dus ma byas//
55b2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar de ltar snang ba yin// gcig pas ma de nyid kun gyi dang // rigs ldan rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gcig/ bdag med gnyis nyid bder gshegs dag pa'i ngang // ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa na// kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa// chos la
55b3(rnying rgyud): snying por gyur pa mkhyen pa dag/ chos can zhi ba'i tshul gyi dag pa 'byung // yum gyur dam pa rgyal ba'i lam// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gnas pa ni// byang chub cu ni chos dbyings mkha'// yang dag zhi ba zab mo la// bkrus pas mi 'dag nam mkha'
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'dra// byang chub la ni chu 'bras med// dag pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa'i phyir// thob par bya ba med mos pas// rtsol bas yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// dpal ldan sangs rgyas rtse gcig 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dang // rang byung tshogs chen bla med dag/
55b5(rnying rgyud): chal ba'i rang bzhin ting 'dzin shes// dus gsum sangs rgyas rang bzhin stong // rang gis shes pas chos nyid stong las su// 'khrul rtog brtags pas thams cad snang ba bzhin// shes rab thugs rje dang gi 'char// rnal 'byor chos nyid dag gyur na// thugs
55b6(rnying rgyud): rje'i byin rlabs btsal mi dgos// gnyis med rnam dag chos kyi sku// bdag med zhi bas snang ba'i phyir// bdag tu sdang ba nyid kyi sku// mi 'gyur nam mkha' lta bu dag/ tshul dang mthun pa'i ngobo bzhi// ngang nyid zhi brtogs pa'i phyir// tshul khrims la sogs
55b7(rnying rgyud): pha rol phyin lam bcu// sprod pa mtha' dag rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa// yang dag lta bas ma zin na// de dag byang chub gegs su gyur// sems kyi byang chub rnam dag kyang // chos tshul yon tan khyad par ni// ma nor bsgom pa'i mngon 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi
56a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ mtshan ma med pa'i laT sgra sum cu gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol te// sems dpa' chen
56a2(rnying rgyud): nam rtog zhi bar bya ba'i don gang lags/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// chos nyid don nyid rang bzhin la// rdo rje gsum bsgom ma rtogs pa// grub par bya ba'i dngos grub gzhan mo 'tshal// gnas dang med pa la ni gang rtogs pa// dengs
56a3(rnying rgyud): sa nyid la yang gang rtogs pa// gnas dang gnas min 'gal bar ma byasams na// yang dag mau dmigs zab mo 'di// bzhag pas lus la yang yong mdal// btsal bas za' mo ga la rnyed// dbyings kyi rang bzhin stong nying dam pa yin// rag
56a4(rnying rgyud): khyad par du snang yang // de dag byis pa'i spyod yul snang ba ni// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' gtso// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan dang // 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas yul// 'dra byed don grub gdon mi za// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// rigs dang zhi khro
56a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa kun// chos sku rogacig mkhas pas 'gro don bstan pa mnyam// dmigs med byis pa ma mkhas pas// chos dang chos ma yin par mthong // snong nyid mnyam pa chen po la// rgyal ba rigs lngar rtog pa 'khrul// chos nyid la ni nam rtog med//
56a6(rnying rgyud): phyir de dag 'khrul ba yin// thabs kyis so sor bshad pa'ang don gcig la// dbyings rtog len sbyang sgrib pa mu mtha' med// rtogs pas sangs rgyas ting 'dzin dog rtsa 'phags// blo dang nam ldan zhib sems kyi dang // dam pa de ni mngon du 'gyur ba na// chos/
56a7(rnying rgyud): sru dri med nam mkha' 'dra// de la bu gsum mchog tu gyur pa'i chos dbyings sa// rdo rjerje mamachog nyid 'dus ma thas// me dag la shes chos dbyings da yang danyid // de la gang tsog yang dag mthong // zhi ba namang gnyid las yon tan ma lus 'byung
56b1(rnying rgyud): ji snyed rnam grol chos su dag pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang // 'dus ma byas nyid chal bkun gyi dag// gzhan du rigs lnga bstan par bya mi dgos// mo'ikhrul pa la yid ma lha med ltar// de nyid rtogs ldan dbyings kyi lha// rgyal ba
56b2(rnying rgyud): mabacos gdod nas rtse ba med// rang sems zhabs bsgom par bya ba min// sems ni skye med thugs kyi dbyings// lus ngag yid gsum mi mnyam mnyam pa'i ngang // nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya// nam mkha' bstan du med pa gyur// bdag nyid rang
56b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin med par zhi// de phyir byang chub sems nyid rdzogs// de las yon tan de dag de las 'byung // de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan sna tshogs rdzogs// kun bzang dang nyid ro gcig phyir// dbyings la dbyings nyid rtag tu dmigs// cir yang min la cir yang
56b4(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i phyir// thams cad chos nyid sprul par zad// byang chub don nyid de dag thams cad kyang // 'ching med rgal ba'i rigs can yin// chos sku rnam dag lhun grub stong pa'i dngos// de med mi 'byung de phyir chos dang phyir// de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do// rnam
56b5(rnying rgyud): grol zhi ba zab mo byang chub sems// des na rdo rje sems dpa' chos nyid kun du bzang // de nyid ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur// rdo rje de rtogs pa sgrub pa bca'// rdo rje de nyid yang dag dam pa ste// phra zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam// 'di ni zab mo mi rtog rtog las
56b6(rnying rgyud): dag/ ji ltar brtag par dka' zhing shin tu zab// bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha skad rnams dang bral// stong nyid dam pa zhi ba la// mtshan ma'i ting 'dzin bcug pas nor// gnas dang zhi ba stong pa la// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bde
56b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs kun gyi pho brang ngo // e maho e ma ya mtshan dag pa'i gzhi// tshig gis mi phebs brjod dang bral ba'i phyir// gzhan dang byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin yang // de phyir chos nyid dngos bral la// byis pa lha dman yod par 'dod// de ni yod
57a1(rnying rgyud): pa min pa'i phyir// brjod pa mtha' dag don 'dir blta// zhi ba chos dbyings gzhan nas mi btsal te// mngon dang mi mngon chos rnams kun// de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong // dper na dbu ba rdos dag chu bos khyer
57a2(rnying rgyud): mthong na// de la dngos ma mthong ba ltar// mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po rnams// de yang 'jig rten grub pa'i mtha' rtogs pa// rgyu ni dngos bral dam pa ste// de nyid rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu 'bras spyod yul rnams// ji ltar tshad ma bzhag na blo
57a3(rnying rgyud): yis 'dzi byed do// mi shes pa dag kun 'dus nas// dag pa'i don la ci bltas kyang // dag pa de nyid ga la mthong // rtog ma mtha' rnam pa med pa'i phyir// dpyad mtha' med de snying po med na tshad ma gang // de phyir rnal 'byor chos nyid zab mo la// de phyir 'jig
57a4(rnying rgyud): rten tha snyad rtog pa rnams// rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam 'dir mi dgos so// yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin rgyas par 'gyur// ye shes 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs byas na// 'od byed gtso bo rnam par dag/ mnyam thugs zhi bar gyur cing shin tu gnas// rtag par mi
57a5(rnying rgyud): g.yo gyur cing mi 'gul te// de la nam yang g.yeng ba mi mnga' la// de ni ngang gis zag pa med la gnas// bde dang sdug bsngal zhi bar mnyam// dge ba 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ thugs brtses rtag tu 'di mtshar te// 'gro ba thams cad kun bslang dag pa yis// /
57a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa// dgal zhing bde bar rab tu brnyes// de ltar dam pa zhi ba brnyes par bya ba'i phyir// dngos po mtha' yi chu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya// brtags pa'i mtshan nyid phung po khams dang skye mched la// so so skye bos dngos po
57a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan mar bzung // skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni// mi shes byis pas gnyis mthong phyir// gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis su brtags// dper na byis pa mi gnad 'khrul pa yis// nam mkha' dag la bal gyi 'khor lo
57b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba dang // gzugs rnams med kyang yod par mthong ba ltar// 'dzin pa drug gis ji ltar dngos por mthong zhing bzung // gzung 'dzin brtags pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul// rang gi rtog pas mos pa de bzhin gzung ba med 'gyur na// de dag dngos po med rtogs dag
57b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra bar grol bar 'gyur ba'i rigs// ma rtogs lha dman byis pa dang // theg rdzogs de gnyis khyad par rigs// de dag dus dgras 'joms pa dang // sdug bsngal gnyen lam des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur// dus las bde lhag ga la 'byung // gzhan nas skye mched sgo nas
57b3(rnying rgyud): reg pa de dag tshad mar rung na ni// phyi mchos su bzung bas dngos po ni 'gyur ga la yod// de dag skye mched sgo nas zhi ba ga la rtog/ de dag tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de sul 'ang dgos mi 'gyur// de phyir don de dbang pos rtogs gyur na// bsgrub dang brtson 'grus de dag mi
57b4(rnying rgyud): dgos phyir// stong pa'i chos rtogs khong du chud pa dang // bsam gtan yan lag dam pa ldan rnams dang // yon tan zhi ba dam pa gsungs pa kun// de kun byis pa'i spyod yul min phyir ram// lam de rnam grol lam du bstan cing de yi rtog med 'gyur// dbang po shes
57b5(rnying rgyud): pas mi thar te// mig mthong can 'dra lta dman mtshungs// don dam rtogs shing zab mo yang // 'khrul pa dag gis yongs mi shes// 'khrul pa dag las dngos 'di byung // 'di la brten nas dngos po mtha' dag byung // ma rig pa sogs bcings pa'i sdug bsngal yod//
57b6(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil phyir// rnam rig shes des nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas// de phyir don nyid ma mthong bas// des na skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul// de ltar mun par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungaso// des na 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyu
57b7(rnying rgyud): zhen// rtogs pa dngos su bden pa che las nyams// kyi hud byis pa 'di dag thams cad ni// rnam rtog gis bcings dag pa ma mthong bas// bdag nyid bsgoms pas rin chen che las nyams// kun tu rtog can yang dag ma yin phyir// nyon mongs sgor nga'i sbubs brtol
58a1(rnying rgyud): rgya/ me nus shing // kun da rtag las rgyal mang nyams// stang pa gnas med rten yang med pa la// ji ltar yod pam rig 'khrul pas shes// yang dag ma mthong blo gros 'khrul pa'i phyir// rna gros phyin ci lag tu gyur bas na// 'o/
58a2(rnying rgyud): par rtogs shing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang sa de bas// yang dag dben pa'i don rnams mi mthong bas// des na mya ngan 'das pa'i dgongs pa rab tu 'jig/ sems dang sems las byung ba de dag kyang // de nyid rnam shes 'jug ldog bcas rkyen gyis// de nyid
58a3(rnying rgyud): lus gsum don du snang ba yin// 'du rtogs dag gi bag chags bsags pa la// dge dang mi dge'i bag chags yongs gsal la// las gang goms pa'i mthu yis brtas pa'i tshe// sems nyid yul dang lus 'dra snang bas rus pas gang bzhin du//
58a4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'byung ba thams cad shes pas 'khrul par snang // ji ltar 'khrul pas bag chags sna tshogs bsags// bag chags sna tshogs shes pa brgyad nyid yin// bag chags bsags pa'i rgyu la dmigs pa skyes pas na// yid la brtags pa'i bdag ni
58a5(rnying rgyud): yod pa min// 'jig rten byis pa shes pa 'khrul pa yis// zag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin// thag mthong shes pa 'khrug pa yin// bag chags rnams la bde bar shes// 'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra mthong de las rnam rig skye// dper na sos
58a6(rnying rgyud): kyi nyi ma phyed dus gdungs pa la// skyes bus gdungs pas smig rgyu dag la chu yi rgyun du mthong // de la brtags na chu nyid ga la yod// rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs pas// rtog pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas log pa'i dngos// bag chags mthu
58a7(rnying rgyud): las sna tshogs snang ma rtogs// de las zag bcas rang bzhin to glangs bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed// ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyung de ma mthong // bdag tu blta la sigs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar bar // sems 'di las
58b1(rnying rgyud): rnams mtha' las gnas sur bya// bag chags mtha' med nges pa med// ba rgyags panas shing sa par byung pa'i can yang rnam pa sgra chags te// rkyen 'gas pagachags dag 'a zhag thal mam po nang ba las drang sa// can gzhan dag nas
58b2(rnying rgyud): bag chags gzhan sa byas pa'i tshe// dbang phyug la sogs byed par 'dod de lam de ma ni grol mi 'gyur// bdag nyid 'dod chags bcas shing zhe sdang bcas// gti mug bcas par yang ni rab tu snang // de dag spyod pa dag ni ma spangs // bdag gi
58b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi yang yongs su 'da' mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor lam bslad the tshom rgya yang rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes// bdag tu brtags pas bsgribs de 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral// mngon shes tshe la shin tu mi mkhas pas// des ni chos nyid pa sgribs
58b4(rnying rgyud): de rnam rtog kyi phyir 'phel// sems can mtha' dag rang bzhin stong nyid dag pa la// mi shes gzung 'dzin 'khrul 'khor ma rig rtog pa las// chos rnams dag pa nyid du sdang zhing bde la gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i nA// chos su brtags pas sdug babrel ba chag+sa/
58b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur// rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyal mtshan ma tha dang 'dzin pas na// las kyi khyang par dag gis rgyan du snang ba'i rigs la du ma med// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzung 'dzin bral ba du ma'i ngang la gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
58b6(rnying rgyud): rtog des// 'phags pa'i rigs bral 'dra ba'i mya ngan 'das pa yongs su med ces rgyal bas gsungs// 'jig rten bde ldan yang dag zhi ba mya ngan 'das gang mchog tu bde ba de// shes pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs skye bar mthong bas yang dag 'khrul//
58b7(rnying rgyud): shes shing rig pas ris su gcig pas rigs la du ma med// sems kyis rnam pa sna tshogs du ma 'byung ba'i phyir// de phyir sems kyi skad cig mde lus dang chos sku gnas/ sngon dang phyi mang ltar sems kyi chos kun gcig//
59a1(rnying rgyud): sems la bas ma bzhin gyi ma nges 'byung de la snang // dngos po ma spangs de bzhin nyid ni ga la mthong // rnam dag grol gzhi 'di la sems kyi rnam pa 'byung // rang sems rgyang las 'phags pa rgyu
59a2(rnying rgyud): chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin// 'di ltar dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kun// de dag sems kyi rnam pa yin// rgyud drug rigs la sna tshogs de la'ang // de dag 'gro drug de bzhin no// phyogs bcu ga na'ang sems ni dngos po yod min /
59a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// de phyir sems rgyud de ni phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la rten med de// de phyir phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing khams bdag gi lus// bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye ba'i lus su rang snang la// sems dang bag chags tha dad ma
59a4(rnying rgyud): yin cig min brtag par rab tu dka'// 'di la snang phyir rten cing 'bral ba rnam gsungs pa// ma rig la sogs rten cing 'brel 'byung chos rnams kun// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'byung ces pa// ma rig pa la sogs pa so
59a5(rnying rgyud): so'i ngo bor ston pa'i phyir// tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgya 'bras med// ci phyir rten 'brel sems can kun la snang // de dag rang bzhin med dag las// mi shes pa su yod mthong phyir// de dag dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras
59a6(rnying rgyud): bur rtog par sems nyid ni// de nyid gzung 'dzin rgyu dang rkyen du snang // / ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na// bu mo skyes nas dgar 'gyur shi nas mi dgar 'gyur// de phyir chos kun rmi lam lta bur yin zhes rab tu gsungs// de phyir rten
59a7(rnying rgyud): 'brel rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med// gzung 'dzin med phyir dngos bral te// skye 'chi med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med cing rtag chad med// sangs rgyas ye shes 'di nyid dang grol phyir// de
59b1(rnying rgyud): nabazhal 'khor bar kyang byangangan 'das pa nyid du na// da gshegs nyid ldan sto du
59b2(rnying rgyud): ldan rtsa na la ma mas nag la// tshan dang nga na dun ta rgya ma ma du gyur// gzha lam na ma na
59b3(rnying rgyud): par cid nas padapa ma chog pa na/ banas kyi nang ciganam yang ma smras te/ mas gag pa 'thu sa bya 'an pa// sa dang ba dang 'a yis// kun ni sa rang ga dgas pad ba
59b4(rnying rgyud): dag ma ya rtog ngas babyed par ba gzugs yod pa ma yin dang / spyod bral med dang thanaga' meng cing na marig yang med pa yin// rtog pa mapa pa bye dmigs dang gnas mi na ldan pa ga pa / ra sems 'ang yod 'a
59b5(rnying rgyud): las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral// bde ga shegs kyang chub med byed de yi rdzu 'phrul sgra 'dra 'phrul la rdung/
59b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes shin tu dge ba'i rgyu nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang // chos
59b7(rnying rgyud): dngags sangs rgyas ye shes chos dbyings dam pa la ni mi dmigs rgyal ba'i sku// tshes dbyings rnapa dag rdo rje gnas med phyir na mnyam par gnas/ rang bzhin 'dra 'gyur chos nyid sgong bzhi po rdo rje 'dus mthas dang ldan// chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag
59b8(rnying rgyud): phyogs nyid med pas na ma dag gang cig myed// dag pa'i dag rgya gzugs brtan med pas 'jig rten le gami meng mi 'gyur// ji ltad sgra ma byed pa'i zlas tha po// she skyes pa zad med pa tshogs gzugs bzung ste// dal bdags nas gzung
59b9(rnying rgyud): kyi dngos pa gal yan// chos kyings tha mim chom med cing kyang bubad d+haganas
59b10(rnying rgyud): sems can thab mobatang nas kyi 'gag rnam thal bla na med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa bde gnas zhi ba'i ngang / bsod nams mang 'phel byang chub mchog 'di
60a1(rnying rgyud): thams padan thosal da byu/ sa gsungasas// nad mam can pa thang rgyab gyisems la na pon 'da'an/ nam gsho bya smra nyis sa rgyags na// dadas 'a
60a2(rnying rgyud): dang rnas pa rnams kyim sems dpa 'dam pa la ma kyis pa / seMngs byu ngas pas dka'amal// khams gsum las 'das la tan ni dag tu kyang dang / deni ga zhi sa /
60a3(rnying rgyud): 'dun rtag/ rnal zhi ba'i cher// da byang chub ma tshan nyid med kyang byung ngar med// don rgyal gis do pa rnas spangs kyi 'gag zang dang mnyam nyid dang / gnas sa dngam ma 'das da kyis dkyi brjid dang brtang tshul lasags/
60a4(rnying rgyud): dag bstan pa dgand na dam med cing gan slob med // gzhan pa thams cad 'angs nas 'di 'dra 'dzi dan gan tu ze bdag gyi/ yang dag rang sa mas pas rnyed pa shi tu dka'// de da ltar la rgya du rnams pa pa ba nas kyang gyim cun ra
60a5(rnying rgyud): tudakon// de skar byis pas don nyid mi shes pas// don 'di mi shes pas ni sangs rgyas ye shes rnyed par dkon// don ma tshul gyis lam 'di nyid ni 'di 'dra ces pa'ang kun sgrib yin// the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang slob ning gnas
60a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad / brtsam pa sa dbyas ma byings mnan de ladam par bgyu brgya/ nus ma lags ny-im pa mas // dang na pa'i la sa / pa tshig
60a7(rnying rgyud): par mam la/ ldan das dachags thar dusas cid gar/ ma pa med 'das pa gagasas par dzinami dang bad pa mamang dbang dgi rjem kyi cad pa'i
60b1(rnying rgyud): meng pas nam mkha'i ngang tshul 'dra// 'dod yon lnga nyid rtag par spad 'gyur yang // rang bzhin spros bral ngang gis zhi ba gang la yang // 'jig rten pad+ma dbang phyug kun kyang mi spangs 'dra mnyam gnas// ji ltar mi shes 'khrul pa yis// ca yang med
60b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i nam mkha' la// gzugs dang sgra dang ro la sogs// de ltar mthong ba'ikhrul ba yin// chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul par yin par rab rtogs te// drug ga brten pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor don du mi rtog go// rang gi shes pa dam par
60b3(rnying rgyud): byas shing kun la tshul de de bsnyems nas// 'dod chags zhe sdang bskyed rtsol 'byung ste gti mug yin de don mi mthong // bsam gtan gnas lus phyag rgya'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa kun// ma skyes de dag ma skyes zhi ba chos nyid rnal 'byor yang dag dam pa'i
60b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// g.yo dang mi g.yo tha skad mi gnas gnas la'ang gnas pa med// snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes ba der gshegs gsungs// bya med mi gnas ma skyes zhi ba dang gi rdzogs pa byang chub sems zhes rgyal ba kun gyis rab tu bsngags// byang chub kun rdzogs
60b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid mnyam par lhun grub yang dag don bsgom ting 'dzin mchog/ de bzhin mos nyid mi 'gyur stong pa dam pa dngos bral bas// gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas su// rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa bdud kyi lam yin gzugs la sogs pa stong
60b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// don dam yang dag dmigs bral sems nyid rgyal ba kun gyi yab gyur thams cad 'byung ba'i rgya// blang med spang med srang len bdud kyi lam ste don dam zhi ba bden dang bral// 'khor ba'i lam gsum spangs shing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa
60b7(rnying rgyud): yang bdud kyi las nyid de// de nyid rang bzhin btsal spongs gar mi gnas// dug gsum ngo bo rnam par dag pa'i lhun grub sgra gsung thugs// 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das so kra lam nyid gzhan na med// ljang dang mi lang ched du mi sbas sems
61a1(rnying rgyud): na na da / smo pa / spyan sa nga byed mas pas rjod pa yo /
61a2(rnying rgyud): sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de la de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin// bsgom dang mi bsgom rnam rtog zhi ba'i ngang // dngos rnams bral gang la'ang mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom me// phyi rol yul dadu nang la bdag dang gzhan
61a3(rnying rgyud): du rtog pa skyes na yang dag don las nyams// de ltar rnam dag zab mo stong nyid zhi ba dam pa de la thams cad ma lus yang dag gnas// 'du byed ma skyes shin tu chos kun chos rnams ma lus mya ngan 'das// dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi
61a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings zhes rnam grol yin// ngo bos mngon rdzogs rgyu rkyen rnams ni byis pas ga la shes// nam mkha' ming tsam dge dang mi dgir byar med skye ba'ang med// chos nyid rdo rje'i don dang mi dmigs stong pa de nyid rnam grol zhi ba chos kyi sku//
61a5(rnying rgyud): byed na yang ngas gang ba sams/ de sa sus na rnam sa / la bar myed mi mi na dpa ma 'i bdag pa sa kyis su 'a ba ba na pa nas sa/
61a6(rnying rgyud): dran dang dbyer med spang lenA ga la'ang dga' dang mtshungs med mi dmigs mnyam pa'i ngang // blang dor med pas brjod bral ga yung drung dbyings// mnyam gnas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de gsog bri med// stong pa'i rang
61a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin chos nyid la// bri ba'am 'phel bag la yod// ched du rtsol bral yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs chos skur mnyam shes dang // chos nyid rnam par rtog pa kun las 'das// gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med
61b1(rnying rgyud): de lce 'phrul mi gnas shing // gzhan sas yang dag po gron chos sanazhi pa'i dang // mi 'azlog mnyam shes bzhi pa phyogs dang 'a rol byin rnams der shes te// chos rnams de bzhin nyid dang stong pa rang nying nga pa nyid kyi rtsa// soms cirang
61b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin skye med nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam// sems kyi dbyings su bsgoms pas lam gyis gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro// sems la sems bsgom rnal martse gcig sems kyi dngos po 'dus ma byas/
61b3(rnying rgyud): brda' can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir// de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te// ting 'dzin med la rnam rtog ting 'dzin mang po rnams// ting 'dzin de dag ting 'dzin gsum
61b4(rnying rgyud): po brtan par byas shing rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bye ba mang po de dag bde ba dag/ de dag ma lus lha nyid chos sgra yongs su rdzogs// chos sgra phyag rgya chen por sems nyid bskyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom// sems
61b5(rnying rgyud): ni kun nyon mongs dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag rdo rje 'dus ma byas// de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrims pas lam kun ma nor bsdom pa yis// de sbyar bsod nams sna tshogs rgya tshor spyod pa rnams// srin dang tshul khrims bsod nams ci bsags kyang //
61b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag chos nyid zab mo'i lta bas ma zin na// de ltar spyad pa de dag mu stegs lta ba yin pa'i phyir// kar du bzang mo'i spyod par ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang chung // kun tu bzang po spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur// shes
61b7(rnying rgyud): dang mi shes spyod yul thams cad mnyam// de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par 'gyur// snang dang mi snang mang zhing rgya che ba// rdo rje'i rigs tshags phyag rgya thams cad sngags don byang chub sems kyi rdo rje kun tu bzang po
62a1(rnying rgyud): na ga na nan
62a2(rnying rgyud): ngas sa
62a3(rnying rgyud): shug pa pa'i brub ma du / sa sa
62a4(rnying rgyud): tugs dang tham pa gyid// de bad gzhi gas pas khyen pa ge'i slong / ngachub pa sa ma ga dgas pal // del myi nga byang chubal ya byung rlabs mas can da/ byang chung
62a5(rnying rgyud): pa nam rgyas pas/ 'du madran pa ma smra tun nying ma pa 'dil sems na ci ming mig sa so// mi'i mi da pa byung ba ca me shi btsal pa dgatu bamags// gnas 'dir brgyang ba ma
62a6(rnying rgyud): jug na nags sa bzlan bcas pa'o// maN+Di gnas can pas pad kyi rnams pal thos ga rigs sangs nas seM / nga dag dis sa rgya// 'apal ba'i bams da rnams ca khams/ 'angs lan tha
62a7(rnying rgyud): sa sa
62b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa ma na 'das sa/ rnam pa snang sa da rgyam mar 'das/ khams gsum par mags pa dganang mi rnams chubs su sa gas/ DU ga dus sumanyapa 'thom pa rnam pa sa da
62b2(rnying rgyud): d+halathas dman ma ma nas sa ma skrag pa sbyangs stengs par ma 'gyur dan pa // de na dag na rtags pa'i mnyam nyid pas sa pa dang sa// gnas dang migs nga phyug na ngas pa/ du dgapa padang po'i
62b3(rnying rgyud): spangs de ltar ba sgom patshan ldan tag/ 'di skar sna ba 'bras rnams pani mthang dang // me mthang mang thung zhe dang mnyedu la ma dul// de ltar dang ning sang par mthang na yang dag rdzogs pa'i thig chen pa sgom pa yin// bdi
62b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas chos rnams bla dgas mi dmigs la// mA skyes mi 'gag rang bzhin mi dmigs te// sangs nas tha dag don bsgom rtogs par dka'o// 'dus byas 'dus mabyas su shin/ rtog par dkru // ci yang med 'gyur yang da
62b5(rnying rgyud): zed snang ba bskum pa'i mag// de bzhin nyi mam pa dag zhugs dag par mthang cang // ba dgashegs ca ni sa da rgyun rnams rig par ma dgangs pas// 'thong ba da gshegs bzhin nyid nga mnyas brnam na// ba rje
62b6(rnying rgyud): pa ba mnya pa bzhag bang ba'i dang // de slar lhan pa sra mdzan rtsa mo'i mchog// bas ma dang mi bas ma las 'das ngan migaH// sa sa sde ba 'phags pa chags rnams mi 'byed dang // sa pa nyid gnas na pa'i dres /
62b7(rnying rgyud): bas mthos ma ba byings la sa nas// dbyings pa srid maras sa skye ba mang migs s+ho// blang dang mablangs sa bya ba dag 'a bar byeb te// de lta ngan la brnams pas bsgom pa yang dag yin/ khri rnam pa nga 'dren sna
63a1(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa de ldan zhing // tid 'dzin mnyam skyems pasam rnaMs rnam// dab na mjun nam ngan da na rnguH// 'du ba nga pa pa ga jog bya snyam dus mas// gang kyi sbal ba
63a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyu lagrus skyobs pas// bal thaM pe dag pasgos mi dgos pa tsog/ dzin du ma ma sa zhugs sa/ yon 'dis gnas sa pa nyi dan 'digag sa sa du sasams la//
63a3(rnying rgyud): gangags ting 'dzin 'dir gnas na// gdugs su meng pa'i ting 'don ldan grub pe// bags chis ba dzin gas kyi rnying ldan gra gnanan yi 'i 'byung // des nabs ma gyis ma khyed ting 'dzin mi logs hA// de ltam
63a4(rnying rgyud): kyis bsgom pa mthob su yang med// 'gro ba thams cad bsam gyis mi khyu'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas// daMbus ti 'dzin bsgom pa dam pa kun la yod// mi dmigs tshangs par spyod pa yun ring spyad pa yin// bdag gis yang dag gnas
63a5(rnying rgyud): ni chos kyi dbyings lnga gnas te// gnas med kun nas spong ba longs spyod rdzogs sgra yid bzhin rin chenas bcu chos kyis rlom// thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i spyod pa'ang 'di nyid yin// 'di med rtul ba rnam par sdang ma
63a6(rnying rgyud): pa gsum smyon mi srid do// sangs rgyas byang chub sems zhes mi rtog par// stong cing thabs mkhas rlom sems 'du shes mi 'askyed 'joms pa'i dang // rtog dpyod med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub spyod pa sbyar po yin// de ltar chos kun
63a7(rnying rgyud): thang du chud cing rab rtogs 'joms pa'i dang // skad cig tsam du dad pa'i thugs skyes de yang byung du 'ang ma dpal ga non nur 'argyud// de lta nas rgyas pas so b+h+yo ba dan gas na mang na / dkyil lakho gas bar zhugs
63b1(rnying rgyud): shing theg rten byang chub mchog kyang bsrung ba yin// tshul khrims dam pa kun kyang bsrungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu gnas// de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// nam mkha' bar snang de yang snang du chung
63b2(rnying rgyud): zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs// e maho 'du byed rtog med skye zhing 'gags pa'i chos can 'di lta bden par gang 'dzin pa// slu ba skab sna tshogs dag nas skyes shing skye 'gyur skye brgyan gyi dbang sod pa// phung gi khams da'i lha mched
63b3(rnying rgyud): chos kun bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul// rtog mthar mi shes rtog pas bskas shing rtog pa yi// rgyan 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog lngas phyir phyog med gyur pa// nam mkha' sangs rgyas rang bzhin bye brag med pas bde dang //
63b4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal 'gag dang mi 'gog stod pa nyid las byung min pa// sa ma skye zas mi shes bskrad nas rtogs pa 'khu'o// s+thA ma'o sgra shes dag gis glang po 'dra bar sgrims rmongs pa'i sgyum rnams// mi lam b+his bskrad bzhin du ni yes bden
63b5(rnying rgyud): pa nyams shing rmi la ma dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa// lam 'di spangs shing mtha' dag lam gzhan lam du bltas pas mnor yi mdzes ston pa de// de dag rnol gsor bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma'o 'phrog pa yin/
63b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungasas/ lhad kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung rgan po'i mdo las/ byang chub kyis mos ma nor bar bskrun pa'i la'u ste sum rlabazhi pa'o// / de nas khor de 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chu
63b7(rnying rgyud): sems rdo rje la 'dis kyis gsom te/ sems dpa' chen po/ chos rnams me dmigs pa gang lags/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bkang stsam pa// phung po la sogs chos rnams can// rang bzhin spyod ster migs dang zang // 'dus
64a1(rnying rgyud): zas 'das mthas dang 'a dang ma du chos// bsam btan na mnang tadang ngan snyams 'jug ma ngan nas lhan gyi drung/ na sa bla bzod 'gyur napa rgyag 'dus byas dbus mthas ta dang gsun
64a2(rnying rgyud): 'du dang ming du ldog dang mi ldog phung po mngon grub dang bzhin de bzhin nyid// mnor gzhan cing khams dang sde mched rten cing 'brel 'byung mngon du grub pa ma nor de bzhin nyid// byin ci log dang sgrib dang sred pa'i tshogs chos nyid ngang gis stong /
64a3(rnying rgyud): rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal dang gis zhi ba'i phyir// bdag yod bdag med rdzun dang ma rdzun byed yod byed med sgyu ma'i tshul ltar ro// 'byung dang mi 'byung ngo bo nyid yod nyid med 'chi 'pho skye ba dngos med smig rgyu'i tshul// tshogs dang //
64a4(rnying rgyud): mchogs lhun grub brjod pa kun dang bral// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog khong khro ser sna mun pa li lo yongs su dag/ zag bcas zag med stod dang mi stong mtshan mar 'dzin pa 'khrul pa yin pas stong // yongs su
64a5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag nges pa bzhin du chos rnams rnam dag zhing // dri med rnam dag chos dbyings rin po che// rnam par mo g.yengs shes rab dbyings ma'i ngang // thams cad mi dmigs nam mkha'i ngang tshul zhi bas bde ba'i don// skyes bus rmi lam
64a6(rnying rgyud): rmis kyang rmi lam rang bzhin bsten kyang rmi lam rang bzhin bshad pa med// de phyir rmi lam nyid kyang med na rmi lam rang bzhin bstan pa ga la yod// de bzhin chos nyid bstan kyang chos nyid la ni dngos po med// 'di ltar skyes bus sgyu ma mthong
64b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bstan kyang ngo bo nyid kyis ga la yod// de bzhin zab mo bstan kyang zab mo'i rang bzhin dngos bral te// mig yor mthong ba'i skyes bus mig yor bstan kyang dngos po yod ma yin// de bzhin chos spu'i rang bzhin
64b2(rnying rgyud): bstan kyang dngos po mthong ba med// ji ltar smig rgyu mthong ba'i dngos po de la ngo bo ga la yod// de bzhin rtog bral zab mo dmigs med yang dag rtogs par dka'// ji ltar brag cha'i spyod yul sgra thos de ni mi mdzang ba// nga dag gi rma
64b3(rnying rgyud): byung de tshe sgra de thos// de tshe chos nyid zab mo bsten pa'i tshig zos chos gang bstan pa thob 'gyur mngon bshad de tshe kun shes rang bzhin med de thos pas lam du gyur// dbu ba rdos pa'i rang bzhin stong yang dbu ba'i rang bzhin gyi nang mi dmigs bsnyen
64b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par ga la 'gyur// de bzhin chos nyid zab mo ston kyang rang bzhin mi dmigs chos gang mngon par grub pa 'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// chu'i chu bur ston kyang chu'i chu bur rang bzhin med na chu bur ngo bo ga la yod// chos gang
64b5(rnying rgyud): mngon par 'grub pa 'byung ba nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// 'on kyang skyes bu chu shing snying po btsal yang mi rnyed mod kyis 'on kyang de yi 'dab ma rnams kyis dgos pa byed// de bzhin chos nyid snying po med mod kyis// chos nyid bstan pa'i
64b6(rnying rgyud): dgos pa'ang byed// skyes bu nam mkha' stong par tha snyad rab 'dogs kyang // nam mkha' la ni bstan pa ci yang med// de bzhin chos nyid la ni rba snyad rab btags kyang // bstan pas yongs su grub cing tha snyad btags pa mi de//
64b7(rnying rgyud): grib ma nyin ldog tha snyad gnyis 'dogs chos gang yongs su grub pa'i phyir yang nye bar mi gnas sdang ba mngon// de bzhin chos nyid tha snyad 'dogs pa'i tshig tu 'gro yang chos gang bstan pa tha snyad tshig tu mi 'gro chos rnams snang bar byed//
65a1(rnying rgyud): ji ltar nor bu rin chen sbyangs na snang ba chen po nye bar gnas 'gyur kyang // snang ba de ni nang ngam phyi rol gnyis na yod ma yin// de ltar chos nyid spang ba'i bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas gyur kyang // snang ba de ni nad dam phyi rol mthong bar nye bar mi 'gro'o// dper na
65a2(rnying rgyud): 'bru mar mes bus na// de yi 'od 'phro yud tsam mi gnas kyis// snang bar byed de snang ba des gzugs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur// de bzhin ye shes chos gang la yang mi gnas chos rnams snang po'i bya ba byed// snang ba des ni 'phags rnams chos kun yang dag ji lta
65a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du mthong gyur to// ji ltar gzugs dang skye mched khams dang rten 'brel gang zag bcu gnyis ma grub pas// de ltar chos dbyings rnam dag zab mo de ltar mtshungs// bden dang rdzun dang phyi nang yongs su ma grub pas// rnam pa dra mi rtog lhun grub zab mo
65a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub pa de// sa la sogs drug khams su ma grub pas// yang dag dang nyid zhi bas de dadra'o// 'khor ba'i chos dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kun// de dag rtag tu mgu bzhi pa chos kyi ngang yang rtag tu zhi ba chos kyi dngos// zhi ba bsil 'gyur zhi ba
65a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su grub// de ltar bstan pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs lhun rdzogs ngo bo nyid kyi sku// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rnam pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o//
65a6(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// yang dag pa'i don ci lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// ci la'ang mi gnas ma chags yang dag dam pa bsgom// gang la'ang
65a7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams zhi ba'am 'phel ba'am 'grib pa yod na gros pa ma yin te// yang dag so so skye bo'i chos rnams mi spang sangs rgyas chos rnams mi len pa// de ni yang dag zab mo'i don rtogs bsgom pa yin// 'khor ba'i sgor yang mi 'ching// mya ngan las
65b1(rnying rgyud): 'da' yang dag blang dor med// 'phel 'grib skye 'gag bsam pa yi// chos la 'ang mi smon yang dag bsgom pa'o// 'das dang ma 'das da ltar ba dang tha mar bar lam chags shing // de ltar bsgoms na yang dag bsgom pa yin//
65b2(rnying rgyud): e e ma ho gzung du ma mchis sangs rgyas chos rnams mchog lags stong pa mngon rdzogs sku// bcom ldan de ltar bsgoms na yang dag zab don rnal 'byor bsgom pa yin// 'byung ba ltar gnas de bzhin te// chos gang gnas med
65b3(rnying rgyud): gnas kyang de yin te// bsam gyis mi khyab skye med chos kyi dbyings// dbyings ni bde ldan gnyis med de dag sku yi mchog/ shes pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes so// gang tshe ye shes de ni don dam ye shes te// chags med
65b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes de la dngos po med// yul med ma tshogs ye shes de ni gnas med do// gang tshe rten med ma thob skye med yang dag zhi// chos dbyings ye shes la ni skyon yon gnyis med do// gang gis de ltar shes pa mi dmigs sangs rgyas ye
65b5(rnying rgyud): shes so// skye mi skyed 'i mi dmigs ye shes nub dang ma nub med// rtag dang chad dang 'dra dang mi 'dra med pas ye shes nam mkha' 'dra// ma bsgyur ma btsos ye shes drang por gnas// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug mi rtog ye shes
65b6(rnying rgyud): dam pa yin// sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs kun ni btags par shes par bya// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lu chen po'i mdo las/ ye shes dag pa'am bsgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// /
65b7(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis chos mchog chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// ci yang mi dmigs stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang // dngos po rnam par dag pa'i don gang lags// chos mchog byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa//
66a1(rnying rgyud): nan du chug na sa sas nga/
66a2(rnying rgyud): mitog dbus kyang rjes su mi mthong // dbus rnams bdun man na yang yod par 'gyur// mtha' bus 'byed na byon sbyin no// ji ltar dang ngan nam mkha' la// mtha' dbus rnam par me tog ltar// chos nyid nil rtag dang chad pa da// rjes nyid pani gzugs ma
66a3(rnying rgyud): gsapa// 'gas gis sa da
66a4(rnying rgyud): 'das dang ma byon sgyur gyi/ sbrul ba rnams kyi yum da gyur// byang chu nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ying mtshan nyid med // deg zhi blang ba ma yi rdo ma yin// gnas sum yid gnas rnams sbyang ma yin// na nas nyan mangs ma yin du
66a5(rnying rgyud): par byang ma yin// kun nas dben pa ma yin mi dben chen// chos nyid gal ba med kyi dgang du'ang so// 'dus byas rkyen rnams re bas 'arig pazed // rnams bag tshayod pa'i phying // chos rnams rtse 'gag med cing stong pa'i dong // phung po khams dang skye mched med kying
66a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag dam pa'i ngangal ma med do// chos nyid kun mnyam rdo rje mnyam 'a min// gang dag gsangasug bzlab par brtsod ni de dag bshegs mngags sngags 'grub par 'gyur// ma te// gang gi mngon 'dam nyam gzhag sdig 'i thams cad
66a7(rnying rgyud): bar gyur// byang chub ngas par gzhol krung // gsang sa tha bslab pa brtson pa 'di dag pag sa me gas sngags 'i/ 'i nyid kya 'i gyin/ 'a 'dzi dzig 'jog rgyal ba dum// byang chu sprin bya sangs rgyas yan tan rdzogs/
66b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil ma thams cad byas no pa yang bskur bung 'gyur// gsung sngags thams cad ma lus mngan du gyur// thams cad thal nas bya ba'i nga 'dun mnyam par gnas// yan tan kun thub tang 'don mnyam pa drung
66b2(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'brang ba'i 'od// gzim dngas 'od ldan nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// bdag med mnyam snyoms nam mkha'i dang // zhib chen po chos kyi sku// rnam dag ldan grub brdal dz+dza/ kun khyab dang bzhin dang gis gas
66b3(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dag pa'i tshul// ma bcos byang chub de bzhin gnas// chos su rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul// bde dang ldan pas rnam rtog bral// dri ma rnam drag chos kyi sgra// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje can// mig blo mi 'bul nam
66b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'dra// zhi ba chen po de bzhin nyid// de ltar 'don pas gzung 'dzin g.yul las rgyal// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen pa byang chub kyi sams ltang chen po'i mdo las/ mtshan ma dang stong pa mi dmigs pa'i
66b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ dam tshig gi sdom pa ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa/
66b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod tshogs zhi sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog spang mi bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// rdzun gyi tshig kyang sba bar bya// mi tshangs par yang spyad par bya// bram ze dag kyang gsad par bya// phra ma'i tshig kyang sba bar bya/
66b7(rnying rgyud): brnab sems gnad sems bskyed par bya// sha khrag rdo rje dri chen chu dang byang chub sems// ba lang khyi sha la sogs rtag tu bza'// AM dang shrI dang AHrnams kyis// de dag rtag tu sbyangs la bza'// de ni rdo rje'i dam tshig mcho// des ni
67a1(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub thob// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spyod// des ni rdo rje mchog gsum 'thob// gzugs sgra dri ro la sogs pa// de ma thag tu bsten gyur na// dngos grub dam pa myur du
67a2(rnying rgyud): 'thob// 'dod pa ma lus kun bsten na// de ni byang chub yang dag 'thob// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs ni shes byas nas// byang chub sems ni mchod par bya// dam tshig can rnams thams cad kyis// /
67a3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na// mthong ba'i tshe ni 'di nyid la// rdo rje gsum ni 'di yis 'thob// mi shes gti mug can gyis tha tshig 'das// de la dngos grub yang dag 'byung mi 'gyur// mdze dang phol mig 'brum bu dang // rims dang /
67a4(rnying rgyud): dug dang na de dang bgegs// ye 'drog bka' yi chad pa yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen pa rma las kyi rigs// de bzhin sangs rgyas byang chub dang // 'phags pa rnams kyis skyob mi mdzad//
67a5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis kyir ni mi brlab ste// rang bzhin 'phags pa thams cad la// rin chen phreng ba la sogs dang // me tog bdug spos la sogs rnams// phul yang rgyal bsag la ba zhes// 'jig rten 'dir yang cho thung zhing / tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal dag
67a6(rnying rgyud): myong nas// gan de gcod sdug bsngal mi bzad myong nas ni// pha rol du yang dmyal bar 'gro// tha tshig spyod pa nyams pa yi// mi shes byis pas dngos grub mi thob po// gal te dam tshig sdom pa ma nyams na// dug lnga nyid kyang ye shes lnga/
67a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad bltas mngoms// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // de yi 'khor na gnas rnams kyis// de la rtag tu skyob par byed// mthong yul chol bde dang / rdo rje gsum nyid rtagatu// sdom
67b1(rnying rgyud): dang // bsrung dang ma bsrung phyogs ma par// mAnyam nyid sngam par gang gnas par// mnyam pa chan pa'i dmatshig ste// nam mkha' lta bur mngon gas na// de ni yang drug dmachogs// blta bu'i rnam dag dam tshig mchog/
67b2(rnying rgyud): dag bzhi pa gang bsrung ba// rnam dag dam tshig chen po yin// yang dag chos dbyings zab mo la// bslang dang mi bsrung ga la yod// bsrung med nam mkha' lhar shes na// de ni yang dag gsad pa'i dam tshig go// de ltar bsrung bzlab
67b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i don// zhes gsungs so/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ smra ba'i dam pa la 'di skad ces
67b4(rnying rgyud): gsol to/ sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs brnyan gyi rtog pa bgyi ba dang / 'gro ba'i don du chos tshul bslab cing bsnyen pa ni lhur lags/ smra ba'i dam pas bka' stsal pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyed dang /
67b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i gnas// dgon pa chu gleng gnas rnams dang // nags tshal chen po'i sa phyogs dang // dben pa chen po'i gnas rnams dang // ri bo ri sul gnas rnams su// yon tan phrin las gang bsgrub rnams// rtag
67b6(rnying rgyud): tu bsgrubs ni dngos grub thob// mchog dang thun mong rnam gsum 'thob// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i sa bslang ba// bde gshegs rgyal bzhugs pa yis slong na// dgongs shig thub bang myal ba'i sras// mkha' 'am pa de rje nges steng 'khong pa/
67b7(rnying rgyud): yis// bdag por gyur pa thams cad kun// yang dag grub pa'i sa slong na// 'khor bcas khyed las sa 'di blang // yo byad sna tshogs sa la 'khod la sbyin// skyob pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// sa non pha rol phyin pa'i chos// 'khor/
68a1(rnying rgyud): mya ngan 'das gyur la// yum gyur khyod kyi dbang mdzod cig/ sa yi skyon rnams bsngal nas kyang // rin chen sna lngas gtar du bya// maN+Dal kun tu gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi rnam lngas sbyang rgyal bya// de nas/
68a2(rnying rgyud): srad bu'i sbyor ba ste// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la// dpa' mo byin brlabs mkhal du gzhug/ zhing chen ris kyi na rgyas la// sum sgril 'dur mdud med pa ni// maN+Dal 'khor khyad tshad dubya// mkhas pas rdo rje gsum du byin gyis
68a3(rnying rgyud): brlabs// de nas srang bu gdab pa'i mtshams bcad de// so so rnams su gdab par bya// de nas dam rdzas bdud rtsi yis// zhing chen ris kyi thig ler bu// dbus kyi pho brang dgu pa la// phyog so bzhi dbus la yab yum bcu// phyogs
68a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams bzhi la gsang ba'i yum// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// de ltar bcu drug dgod par bya// gru chad la ni lha mo brgyad// 'khor sa la ni sgo gdod bya// sgo bzhi la ni phyag rgya bzhi// de yi khyams ni phyi ma
68a5(rnying rgyud): la// sbrul sku thub drug dgod par bya// de yi bar khyams phyi ma la// sgo gdong phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya dgod// de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyas pa sa// 'od zer sna lnga kun du gzigs// sangs rgyas rdo rje can gyi gnas// de dbus b+h+rUM ni gnas pa las// gser bya
68a6(rnying rgyud): po 'dra ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal med khang // 'khor lo bsgyur bas bsgom par bya// las kyi rdo rje'i stan nyid du// shes rab ldan pas de 'og bsam// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bde gshegs kun gyi pho brang ngo // rin chen gzhi dngos mchod rten ni/
68a7(rnying rgyud): 'od bar ba bas rnam par brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsal gyi// gnas pa di rnam parabs ma// gru bzhi pa la dro bzhipa// rmi rkyen bzhi payang dag wan// dril bu dang 'phyang 'phan la sogs// sgo khyud kyis ni rnam pa ri ba rgyan// grwa mtshan dag ni thams na
68b1(rnying rgyud): chen rnams kyis smras// zla kham chun 'phyang gis brgyan cing // nyi ma zla ba la sogs brgyan// bla re bres pas mdzes par gyur// na bza' phreng ba'i tshogs kyis brtan// de ltar dkyil 'khor dam pa yis// mi shes byas
68b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnams la bstani// chos nyid ye nas lhun grub pas// bsgrub dang sgrub pa dmigs su med// dbyings nyid ye nas dag gnas la// bsnyen pa nye bsten gdags su med// dper na med las yod btags pa// me long nang gi gzugs ba
68b3(rnying rgyud): 'dra/ chos nyid rnam dag ye gnas la// gnas dang dgon pa raganas pa med// dper na nam mkha' stod pa la// gnas rten sa phyogs med pa la// gang dag byis pa mi mkhas pas// mkha' la myu gu sdong skyed 'dra// de dag yod
68b4(rnying rgyud): shA byas pa'o// pas sa da/ rnams sa u sa ltung bye / ny-id kyil 'a gang mangs pa'i ma //
68b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dmigs su med// stong nyid rang bzhin dag pa chos kyi sku// lhun gru'i rdzogs mdzad longs spyod chen po'i sku// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mtha' yas sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin lhun grub sku rnams la// gzhi dang ngo bo mthun pa'i
68b6(rnying rgyud): dpe// gnas dang 'khor dang 'dul ba'i zhing // sku gsum gsung ni bsgrags pa ni// chos sku chen po bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen po yin// longs spyod che ba'i rdo rje can gyi bsdus gsum yin// sprul pa chen pos 'dul ba mngon
68b7(rnying rgyud): pa mdo sde gsungs pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang shAkya rigs dbang po// thugs gsum mnyam nyid dang dri zhi// chos sku'i don rnams bstan pa ni// gzhi ni de bzhin nyid dang mtshan nyid brjod du med// mthun dpe nam mkha
69a1(rnying rgyud): gnas ni yum gyi mkha'// gdul zhing nam mkhang khyab pa lamaldan rdzogs sangs cas// longs da rdzogs pa don rnams bstan pan// gzhon chos spang brnam skang mngag// mthun du' da chung
69a2(rnying rgyud): sbyar ljang bzhugs// gnas ni lha yi rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas// 'khor ni nye ba'i sras brgyad sa rnams rim gnon yin// bdul gzhi gzhi dang me tog snying po can// sprul pa'i sgo yi don rnams bstan pa ni// gzhin
69a3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs dang shAkya'i rigs dbang po// mthun dpe lha ma'i tshul dang gnas ni rdo rje gangan sogs yin// 'khor ni rgyal ba kun dang 'gro drug thams cad do// gdul zhing gling rnams bye ba phrag brgya yin// sgo dag zug dgu pa
69a4(rnying rgyud): kyang 'gro ba'i don bstan mi rtogs pa// theg pa de kun yang dag zag las gzhan na yod ma yin// de bas chos kun du ma dag theg pa gcig rdzogs so// 'das pa'i dus rnams su dran de ni sangs rgyas gnas pa yin// tshad med bsam/
69a5(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab bskal pa na// de'i tshe rgyal bu byung ba skye dgu'i bu yi mchog/ mtshan ni ye shes bdag po zhes bya ba// skye dgu 'dren pa des ni chos bstan te// sems can bye ba mtha' yas ma lus 'dul// byang chub sems dpa'
69a6(rnying rgyud): bas ma yas bye ba spangs med kun// yang deg yo shes yang dag 'dzud// 'jig rten mgon po de yis chos bshad pas// mtha' yas nges par bstan pa gsang sngags mchog/ rab tu snang bas 'jig rten thams cad mdzes
69a7(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams kyis yang dag don yang ston// de ltar de na rin chen zhing // de bzhin kha dog ba DUr+ya yi mdo// sangs rgyas rang byung de dag nyid kyang sdang // gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur ba lta ni mdzes// bai DUr+ya yi dbus nags
69b1(rnying rgyud): gzugs bzhin// 'khor gyi dbus na chos na rab tu gsungs// de la 'khor yang grangs yod ma yin te// bskyod pa med cing g.yo ba med par snang // bzod gnas bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par bzhag/ yang dag gi bzag pa
69b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i gnas// rgyal ba drang srong chen po rnyed par dka'// zhe sa gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ sku gsung thugs lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sti le'u ste so dgu pa'o//
69b3(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol te// rdo rje dam tshig rin chen cod pa ni dbang bskur bas// ye shes ldan pa rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya mnyam nyid thugs chud sna tshogs mdzad pa de/
69b4(rnying rgyud): ma lus sems can yongs su bskrad pa'i phrin mdzad thugs rje can// rnam par snang mdzad chen po las gsum mnyam nyid la bzhugs pa// sku gsung thugs dang thams cad ma lus rdo rje ste// bde gshegs lha yi rgyal po gzhan 'phrul
69b5(rnying rgyud): dbang byed gnas// khams gsum thams cad ma lus yid bzhin rin chen spras pa dang // dar gyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril brgyas rlung gis bskyod pa dang // me tog phreng ba rnga yab rgyan phreng dang // chun 'phyang zla ba nyi ma sbrul chun rnam
69b6(rnying rgyud): kyis mdzes byas dang // mtha' dbus med pa'i gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs// yon tan ldan pa'i sras dang thabs cig ste// de ltar yon tan ldan la bdag phyag 'tshal// longs spyod rdzogs sku yid bzhin rin po
69b7(rnying rgyud): che// sa bcu'i rgyal sras chos kyis tshim mdzad cing // 'jig rten mun dum 'od kyis snang mdzad pa// sdang mdzad dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan sku mchog dbu gsum gser mdog brjid pa'i zhal// 'og min
70a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal blon por mnga' brnyes pa// log lta thams cad 'jigs pa'i sgra// ri rab lta bur brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// / dug gsum 'joms mdzad shA rus gsol mdzad cing // gnyis med don la sbyor bas
70a2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum sgrol// shin tu brjid pas dur khrod rgyan dgu sku la mnabs// 'khor bar mi ldog dpal gyi chas brgyad sku la brgyan// chos sku mi 'gyur mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku// ye shes ting 'dzin zin pas mche ba gtsigs//
70a3(rnying rgyud): dug lnga gtan du bsreg pas me yaM klong na bzhugs// ting 'dzin 'du 'phro mdzad pas chos nyid sna tshogs mdzad// spyan gsum sdang mig bgrad pas ngan song rtsad nas bcad// dbu rnams sku lus gcig pas chos kyi dbyings// shum
70a4(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis su med pas rnam dag don// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// a la la ho zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ye shes can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dkyil
70a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa mtha' dag kun gyi mchog/ khams gsum ma lus mtha' dag 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal// sems can ma lus 'dul ba'i don rnams thams cad 'grub// nam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni
70a6(rnying rgyud): g.yogs byas te// yang dag rnam grol don dam 'dis ston te// lag g.yon rdo rje bsgyings te bzhin ni rab 'dzum pas// rdo rje chen po gsor te rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin// bde chen don dam rdo rje dam tshig kho na nyid kyi snying
70a7(rnying rgyud): po 'di smras so// hUM bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis// zhi ba'i de nyid mngon rdzogs byang chub bsgrub par bshad// rdo rje mnyam nyid mngon rdzogs byang chub chen po ste// don gyi ngo bo mi rtog mnyam nyid rnam drag zhi// mnyam nyid snying
70b1(rnying rgyud): po 'di snyas la ge wa// 'dod chags na sdang gti mug smos med pas// chos rnams thams cad yi ge Ang rig/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag cad rnga can// 'jig rten dri meng rnam dag rjes kyi dbyings// nyon mongs skyon gyi mgos
70b2(rnying rgyud): don dam 'di sbas hrIH// khams gsum dbang bsgyur snying po'i don// nyid la rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur phreng ba bcings shing dam pa 'di sbas twa// sku yi phyag rgyas dbang bskur chos kyi sku// gsung gi phyag rgyas dbang bsrung chos kun thob pa dag
70b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ting 'dzin dag pa thob// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa// lus sems dgra ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// de phyir chos nyid zab mo a ru 'dus// thams cad spros med yi ge oM// ngo bo'i chos nyid stong
70b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yi ge a// mtshan mod sngon med chos nyid yi ge a// rdo rje mi shigs dngos grub yi ge a// rdo rje mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor yi ge a// don nyid mnyam 'dug chos nyid yi ge a// a ni ma skyes stong pa ste// a ni chos skya dag 'a
70b5(rnying rgyud): gter// a ni stong dang me stong gi// dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// hUM gis mchod pa thams cad longs spyod rdzogs// oM ni ye shes lnga yi dngos// sku gsung yon tan phrin las sogs// hU~M hUM hUM sems can rdo rje nyid
70b6(rnying rgyud): pas khro bo'i ngang // ye shes lnga yang rdo rje khro bo can// hU~M gsum rnam dag zhi ba las// dkyil 'khor rnam dgra 'byung ba yi// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// bar khyams bzhis mdzes sgo khyud ldan// gru tshad bzhis kyang mdzes par bya//
70b7(rnying rgyud): dbus la b+hud+d+ha yab yum ste// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rgyas par dgod// dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams rgyas 'gyur nas// bsgrub pa de bzhin brtsam par bya// bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams bsag/ pa ni// rtsab lnga dang yan lag brgyad// a ga ru dang du ru ka/ ga pu dgur zhum la sogs
71a1(rnying rgyud): na sa na na ma du na ma sum byan/
71a2(rnying rgyud): sa gas / / sa / gas ma lda
71a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas sa skye mas gyur/ sa
71a4(rnying rgyud): ba batshigs sa rgyas // sems da kyis nga ba byed/ na po tid pa'i sa po/ sa nga sto na rjem ma kyis// maT byam pa pyi ma nga/
71a5(rnying rgyud): na /
71a6(rnying rgyud): sa 'o// da pa s+ho/ mi sa ngas sa sa
71a7(rnying rgyud): su su su sa ma mams// sa
71b1(rnying rgyud): lan rnams pa migos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bdeb che zhing nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas ni// sems can don rnams bstan par byed// rgyas gsungs so// s+yAd kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyisems ldang tshan
71b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo las/ bslab pa gsang pa'i le'u ste zhi bcu pa'o// / de nas kho der 'dres pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ gas sngags kyi rdo lci bu lags// sems dpa' dmangs
71b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// yang dag gsang ba'i don chen 'dri// rgyal ba'i thugs dam+b+ha bskal ba dang // mtshamos gca gnas pa rgya ba dang // rnyog na ma gsum ba skrad pa dang // 'go ba'i sgrib ba skyed ba // srogasang thugs rtog shA dang /
71b4(rnying rgyud): 'khong lha rnams brtan bathugs phyir// dam pa 'di dag bzod pa yin// na ba'i pra sa rgyun rgyal ba'i thugs kyang ldan/ nartsal ba'i yon tanan sto// A na rnal badzin / la
71b5(rnying rgyud): las so// thams ca de bzhin gshegs bu'i phyid// sngags kyi dam pa 'di brjod do/ hU~MhrIts+tshit+ma/ I mAM/ t+ya nad d+hAn/ TaHDa d+hAH/ ka khrag g+ha/ dza \u0f7f/ paM phab b+he/ wa yI rA la/ nga nya ma / sha Shasa? ta/ e A/
71b6(rnying rgyud): u U/ e I/ au ak+Sha/ hUM badz+dza d+h+r-i kA / mr-it+sAd+d+hi shwa dr-i/ AM dzin dzoka dza/ laMng+giShar ti/ smr-i dz+nyA nAM ka dz+r-i/ maM mo hAr taM/ AM A ro l-i ka dza/ pAM dA gar ti/ hA prad+b+ha d+h+r-i ka dza/ hAM badz+ra ra te/ k+Shau hi rA dzA ya hU~M/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+ra
71b7(rnying rgyud): A ga d+hA ya/ trA mA le sa ma yi ha/ hriM ha~M hUM pad+ma pA da ma~M/ hI gI ti rA go&hi/ dzi ku ru shweHhrIH/ e rti rI gA yA ma/ med+ha raNe/ dzaHd+hU pa~M bribi sha snroni s+pha r-iSh+Ti ya swAhA/ hUM pro r+thaM A baMH/ hU~M sa rA dA ya~M/ br-i dI ba su~Mn hU~M/ s+t+rI ma rA gA ya
72a1(rnying rgyud): na na na tu na man sa
72a2(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ A r+g+ha dam ngab dadzin du / oM pad+ma ldan tshul po/ d+mo sa/ ya Sh+Tangs pad+d+hab+h+yadz+nyA /
72a3(rnying rgyud): gyis gzungs brji pos// bad dang ldan pa yang dag rdzogs// rdzogs par bya ba sdigs kyis bskyed// sngags kyis byin gang yin pa// yig sa las bsgyur nas kyang // lha rnams rim par bskyed pa ni// t-il 'i tsam gyi rang bzhin
72a4(rnying rgyud): las// bye med cher bskyed nas kyang // rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che// bsgoms pas mngon du gyur pa'i rtsa// che ba'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// mthu ni dang depe byed mngon sa wan+ta// 'jig rten 'phangs dang btig pa dang /
72a5(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan po dang // rigs rnams so sor bsgrag pa dang // dI ltar lha li mur gyur nas// rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yin// de lta pa ma nyid stong pa la// dngos por 'dzin pa 'khrul pa yin// dngos po ji ltar spyod zhen//
72a6(rnying rgyud): a nyi ma skyes ni bste// a lAs yig 'bru thams cad bskyed// a wAr yig 'bru thams cad de// yig bru stong pas lha yi sru bskyed stong // sugasung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rang bzhin stong // dper nanam mkha' stong pa
72a7(rnying rgyud): medams yod par brtags pa badzin/ chos ted nga bden stong bang// mitshon mo dngas por slar bstan pa// mkha' la'ang 'chen rdo byung ba 'dra// de ltar chos nyid dngos med yin// zhes gsungs so// sbyi kyi kyi la
72b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems sung man po'i mdo las/ gas sngags kyi la Ta sten gcig pa ra// / de nas 'khor dar 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa'adas pa lnga 'di spyad ces nas pa to// ting nge dzin ci TI thag rje ltar lags/
72b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// ting 'dzin rnam pa 'byung ba ni// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // dpa' ba ru 'gro pa'i ting 'dzin dang // chos nyid yang dag ting 'dzin dang // rang bzhin gyis gnas ting 'dzin dang // gnas
72b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang // btsal dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang // brjod dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang // sems kyi chos nyid las kyi me'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // badz+ral sems ma bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // bdag nyid chen
72b4(rnying rgyud): po'i ting nge 'dzin dang // 'gro don chos dbyings ting nge 'dzin dang // gzungs don chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang // yongs rdzogs byar med ting nge 'dzin dang // chags dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // bya med snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
72b5(rnying rgyud): smon lam stobs med ting nge 'dzin dang // lung ston rnam dag ting nge 'dzin dang // dbang bsgyur mi rtsol ting nge 'dzin dang // dngos grub mi spang ting nge 'dzin dang// rnam grangs lhun grub ting nge 'dzin dang // brjod pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
