98a1(rnying rgyud): bya btsal med par mthar gyen// bskyed rdzogs med par sna rdzogs te/ yun cung zad tsam yang ma lon par dgyes pa'i rol thabs byas par gyur to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las/ ma bskyed pa dang bzhin rdzogs pa /
98a2(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sgra thob par gyur te/ che chung med pa'i rim pa/ rnam grangs med pa'i gnas/ brjod du med pa'i sbas/ rtag pa chos nyid/ chad pa la sra mdog/ yod pa la mi dmigs
98a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ med pa la bu gsung thugs/ rang chung ngu shar zhing dpag pa las 'das par bstan to// de nas de ltar bstan pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sems dran pa'i shes pa thams cad ni/ kun tu bzang po rang gnas kyi rgyal por dbang thob// dang
98a4(rnying rgyud): po yul gyi shes pa thams cad ni kun tu bzang mo 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings khyab pa chen po skyi la yongs su ma grub pa'i man ngag brdal bas/ bsgom pa'i dgongs pa rang rgyud du shar/ bskyed mi dgos par rang chas su rdzogs te/ shes rab pha rol phyin par
98a5(rnying rgyud): dbang thob/ de'i rdzas med pa'i yon tan gyis/ chags sngang thams cad shes rab tu dbang thob/ dug lnga sangs rgyas lngar lhun gyis grub ste/ ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dbang thob/ dug gsum sku gsung thugs su ldan gyis grub pa'i dbang thob/
98a6(rnying rgyud): skyes mi 'gag pa'i klod na nyal/ bskyang ba ji bzhin pa'i dbyings la mnal te/ dbang gi rgyal po bskur mi dgos par rang chud du shar ti/ gyi nang gi chos la sems kyi dbang ma thob pa 'ga' tsam yang med de/ ye 'byams kyi dbang la phyogs med de/ spri
98a7(rnying rgyud): 'thams kyi dbang la ris med/ de lta bu'i tshig sus thos shing grol snang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rje ba can yin pas/ dbang mi dgos pa'i tshul ni/ dbang thams cad de la rdzogs te/ thabs kyi rgyal po dbang gi mes zhes bya ste/ gang lta byas kyang dbang gi
98b1(rnying rgyud): rgyam pod kyis dgang mas ma gtogs pa gzhan gang yang med/ mtho na dzung du thad da dab pa dag can pa thang dag pa nga ba / ma ma thong nas mamyong ba dang / thabs sa rgyas btsun chags da gal ba tha~Mng snrel pa yang byed pa thog// rnams zas narnas su
98b2(rnying rgyud): zad de/ dbyangs stan gyes pa'i kwa'i dbang thob/ mthos nam thos sa da de/ rba gang dang btags pa dang bral ba la zhes kyi dbang rdzob/ snas du tshong na tshar du zad ni/ dbang po rgyam byed gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang rdzob/ mtshar na mtshor
98b3(rnying rgyud): zad de/ byung tshod kyi sgo gags pas/ 'khor ba thabs kyi dbang thob/ lus dmyangs na rgyangs su zad du/ chos nyid kyi mangs pas ni stong / ya rnaMs kyi ro lhangs pas na rtags/ thabs ky-i myangs pas ni reg/ shes rab byi myangs pas shes
98b4(rnying rgyud): pas/ 'du zil me par snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang thob/ mtshungs nam myangs su zad/ chos nyid lardzas su mi spyad/ sangs tesaM la gzugs mi bstan/ thig ma rdzogs pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang rdzob/ lum kyi dag na reg tu nga
98b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par rdo rje pad+mar reg pas/ yab yum 'du 'bral med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang thob/ ma reg na ma reg par zad de/ dngos po med na chos nyid/ 'dzin chags med na ye shas/ yod med 'das na dbu ma ste/ ma bcos gci
98b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang thob/ yid kyis chos rtogs na rtogs su zad de/ spros pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang thob/ ma rtogs na ma rtogs su zad de/ yid chos nyid la/ yid las ma gtogs pa'i chos gud na med pas gnyis su mthong ba'i dmar
98b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbang thob/ de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gis ji ltar zas kyang dbang thob la/ dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi gang du bslabs kyang dngos su batho ste/ thos pas sangs kyis/ nyan pas dbang pod/ rtogs pas doni yod pas/ dbang skur chud ces
99a1(rnying rgyud): bya ste 'di las chog tung gad kyang bstan/ btags su ji skad kyang grags/ don du bang dul ma dmigs shing bstan du medang / cho ga dang yo gar thi ba las 'das pas/ 'phags pa'ang phags pa// sangs rgyas/
99a2(rnying rgyud): gyi sangs mas zhes n+yaste/ 'dig tshogs ltab sang gcal pogs thaste/ ku tu babang pos bshad cing dradang bar dka' ba// de bzhin gzugs pa skyed pa byung ba'i rgyud las/ grangag na pa'i la ste dang pa// de nas
99a3(rnying rgyud): do sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ ston pa kun tu bzang po la 'di sa ces gsol to// oM ma hor mtshar tsho'o// e mtsho mtshar che'o// e ma ho mtshar zhen tu che'o//
99a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bsur mi dgos pa de ngo mtshar ro// dkyil 'khor bskyed mi dgos pa dngo mtshar ro// don gcig la gcig tu skad kyang bstan pa ngo mtshar ngo ro// che ba'i lha bdag cag la lung bstan du gsol/ a la la ho zhes gsol ba dang / kun tu bzang pos
99a5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs lda de dag rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ dkyus pa bla 'di dag blangs so// a ho d+ha dza shrab dacing / mAng ta taM pa shas pa sho ta kA la ta~M/ ma ma pad+hA dram bkal te da las/ ma tag ba ha ya babar ci// sang sha dur mngam
99a6(rnying rgyud): ho bar la~M s+t+wa~M/ tikun mang nang // zhes bla blangs/ 'khor rnams dag bzlas nas/ yang 'di na cas bzang stsal to// sems lam mu gtogs chos med pas/ gzhan du chos rnams bstan pa med// sems la mtshan nyid yongs med
99a7(rnying rgyud): pas// dbang mchags mas la yod pa ni// ngas gsu ma rgyal ba'i wang las byung / dbang mchog rang pa med pad// bsrung ba sajob par yongs mi 'byar// ngagadang thas pa'i dbang badrang yang // dalang rdzas kyi mngon pang med// mchogs
99b1(rnying rgyud): ma bshad mal ba la// phranang dbang rnams gang bskur kyang // da la dbang rtags dngos srab med// sgrar la jigs pa rtse bar de ste// de bas dbang rnams thob 'dod pas// dang mthos 'di bshad par bya'o// de la dbang bablang na na da nga/
99b2(rnying rgyud): dang padabang brgyar pa'i ba mtshan dang rtatha pa dbang btung bdang / dbang gi slob po na de mkhrul dbang nad pa dang / dbang gi phral ga gas kyi ba dang / dbang gazla thebs dang ga mtshal 'thal tha ba dang / dang ga rnas kyi dgom
99b3(rnying rgyud): dang / rab ga dkyil khod kyi snang thab dang / dbadag yon ltar dathal ba da / dbang gi bsnyen pacwa zhag grangs dung gsungs pa dang / dpung gartags ni sbyin pa dang / dbang baspar ba'i drad cing gang la bzung ba dang / da
99b4(rnying rgyud): bslang ba'i dgas pa dang bcwa gcig gis bstan dgos te/ de la dbang bskrad pa'i slob pa'i mtshan nyid nga lci tha la dbang bskur bar bya ba ni/ dang por slob dpon gyis btsal bar bya ste/ gsungs pa'i thog las/ rang bzhin pa
99b5(rnying rgyud): bas nam mkha' 'dru// spyod pa bzang pos gzhi 'dra// dmachog 'dags med mkha' ltar babyungs// sab bcos pa med par 'chang // skyugs thugs kyis zad med pa// bongs med min gyis lnga 'dzan cing // byin na
99b6(rnying rgyud): dag la/ thos shing shes pa gdang ldar bya// 'khwa ldog med pa nal 'byor la// dbang mchog ci yod bsnang bar bya// dbang bsngar ba ma dam pa ni// yon dang b+har te bsrad na 'ang rung // yang ni dbang bskur rab pade/
99b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' dag la// thos zhing goms pa gtsor gyur na// de la bshad pa'i dbang bskur ro// zhes shing zin zung mtshan rung // gsang sngags kyud kun nyan 'dod na// de la nyan pa'i dbang rnams bsrur// nang 'brir gsung mchog dgos pa na/
100a1(rnying rgyud): rang rnas don 'a da // dal nam pa dab sas bad / ma thags mdun pa dag // yad mthagags sad// dpa banapa pa mas da// bas
100a2(rnying rgyud): gzung bzlang shing // mnor shes dab don 'chang pa// de lag ma dbang rnams byung // bas mdzad dag pa'i bro chang ba// dal gang shi bang rnams brgyar// rnam par rtog pa med pa la// de la dzin med dpang rnams bzur// nyon mongs
100a3(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i tshul shes na// de 'grol gang dbang rnams srung // phu ye sa gas pacoMb N+Dal/ del rdzob gang dab babyur // brje gdung bral po la thugs 'byung la// phra bcung du dbang bzhir ro// shes rab mtshan can me gdas
100a4(rnying rgyud): ma bar da bstan nagasad pa dang // dpal pa 'a byas pab tu dag byed bapo ying nas ma// tsham/ mapa mdza ga nga bad zab// sa #
100a5(rnying rgyud): gsang thub bong ngam spyod gsal bar// shes rab yum du dbang bsrung ngo ro// gzhan yang mtshan ldan dag pa dang // de dbyibs gzugs sa dbang bskur ro// shes rab rgya chen thogs pa shing // ces kyang rmi 'dzugs dpa' sems can// nges pa
100a6(rnying rgyud): gzhung gsol dbang thob par// rdo kAmar dbang bskur ro// che ba'i yon tad gdang tha tshan chad rtags dang brtsor zad par// dkyil 'khor bzang bar dbang bslang ngo // dbang mi bsrung ba'i dam pa ni// chags pa dmachog nyams sa
100a7(rnying rgyud): dang // gzungs sa 'phyang sham te sogs/ dpe pa tshan med cag thos cir// rdo rje skar grogs yang bathas dang // rdo sham gzhung gams pa// dpral 'khor bdag rtag 'a dang / rgyal thabs shes rabang thabs pa
100b1(rnying rgyud): kar+tha rtog pa che ba la// dbang rnams gang yang ma bskyang ro// gzhan yang dbang rnams mi bskur ba// rim par yang dag bshad par bya'o// dang por chos la nyams yod dang // bar du slob dpon brtas drad dang // za mar thugs la sran 'byin pa/
100b2(rnying rgyud): bskal pa brgyar yang dbang mi bskur// dad med g.yo sku zol gyis bsgo// bkang 'gal grogs po thabs kyi spod// rang shes byed 'dod thos bcung // theg pa chen por ltung byed pas// dri la dbang rnams ma bskur te// de rnams dus gsum
100b3(rnying rgyud): dgra d+ha yang // dbang gi dkyil 'khor la mi bsnyen// bstang yang snyeng la nyams pas non// gzhan yang dbade rnams mi brkyar ba// stong pa zab mo dbang la g.yengs// phrin las zab mo khrom du sgrogs// gsang ba'i rdzas rnams mngon par rjor
100b4(rnying rgyud): 'di la dbang rnams yongs mi bskur// bsung yang nyams pa chen por 'gyur// gzhung du 'gro ba'i chos bor nas// 'og ma'i chos la blo 'jug cing // theg pa che la 'phyas 'dogs pa// de la dbang rnams yongs mi bskur// bskur yang gsang
100b5(rnying rgyud): sngags bka' sun 'byin// de yi sdig kyang bdag la 'ong // de ni dbang gi slob ma yi// mtshan nyid yin pas shes par bya'o// dbang gi slob dpon ji lta bu la dbang nod par bstan pa yang gsungs pa// sngags pa rnal 'gror blo yod pa// dbang
100b6(rnying rgyud): thob pa yi rtags dag na// chud 'di yongs su 'chad cing ston// dbang rtags phyag rgya 'di 'don cing // rim pas dbang bskur thob pa dang // rigs kyi btsun chud mkhas chud dang // rdo rje zam pa mchad lags// de dag rnams dang ma ldan kyang
100b7(rnying rgyud): rlung 'di 'chad pa gang byed pa// rigs dang snga chen gang yin yang // de ni dbang nod slob dpon yin// gzhan yang dbang nod slob dpon na// shes rab yangs pas chos rnams ston// lta ba yangs pas phyogs dang bral// spyod pa ma 'gags
101a1(rnying rgyud): thabs su spod// sgom pa sran cha 'gyur ba med// dam chog gang yang mnyams pa// de ni dbang nod slob dpon yin// gzhan yang dbang nod slob dpon ni// phyi nang tan+ta kran gsal zhing // byin cha snga mar dbang thob dang /
101a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsrub pa zhal gyi zhing // las dang cho ga gzhung rdzogs la// bsngags pas dbang rnams nod par bya// gzhan yang slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// bde bar gnas shing gtsam ma byed// ce skad gsungs pa de bzhin mdzad// rdzun dang rdol
101a3(rnying rgyud): gyi tshig sngangs pa// byin rlabs ya mtshan chen po can// de la dbang rnams nod par bya// gzhan yang slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// lung dang man ngag thugs la 'chang // rgyang dang bsgrub pa rim pas 'thob// zhang blon bu tshar gyur pa na// sngon nas
101a4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang yid tshad thob// phal ba gang dag su yin yang // mtshan rdzogs kun la lung rdzogs shing // rig pa tshang ma'i gzhung yod na// rigs ni gang zhig yin yang rung // de la dbang rnams nod par gsungs// dbang rnams nod par
101a5(rnying rgyud): mi bya ba'i// skyob dpon mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni// khro gtum che la 'jigs 'dod dang // rang bzhin dan la bcos dka' dang // mtshan nyid ngang tshul mi shes dang // phrag dog la sogs sems la 'chang // sems ni chos kyis ma dral
101a6(rnying rgyud): pa// chos re thos shing kho bor skye// spro thung tshig gi go mi 'jigs// de 'dra'i slob dpon mtshan nyid la// dbang rnams nod par mi bya ste// mnos kyang dbang rdzob mi 'gyur te// slar la nyams pa chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang slob
101a7(rnying rgyud): dpon mtshan nyid ni// shes pa sgo dogs thos pa chung // nga rgyal kha 'dod khengs pa dang // rab tu tshul ngan khengs pas bcings// bsgom bsdu badz+ra gad dbang du btang // de 'dra dbang gi slob dpon min// de la dbang gi rgya mnos kyang // rnal
101b1(rnying rgyud): da sems dpas ka// slob dag nang nag par gyis spang / ub bdu bya gapas nga // 'di dag sang ba ngas padags pa// 'ad dgapa ma tshun du / maud ma na bang bang phyus// gang nga rnams par kyang blangangs/
101b2(rnying rgyud): pa bka' rtags gzung 'dzin pa// de la gri dbang bskur ba rgya// phye med chos la blo grags pa// dal nang dbang bsrang bar bya// byang chub sems la mngon dang cing // dmardzas rnams la rtog pa med// de'i mtshan ldan rtag bsnyen la/
101b3(rnying rgyud): la gsang ba'i dbang rnams bskur// tan+t+ra mtha' dag blo la gsal// phrin las bsgrub pa mthar phyin pa// rdo rje rgyal po chen po yi// rab 'byams bka' yi dbang bskur ro// lung dang man ngag nges pa'i don// snying dang 'dra ba kun bshad la/
101b4(rnying rgyud): zos shing rtogs par gyur nas kyang // bla me dag la mnyes byed pa// de lta bu yi slob ma la// rgal thabs spyi brags dbang bskur ro// 'byor ba'i longs spyod kun ldan zhing // yangs la phan 'dogs nas pa la// rig 'dzin tshe yi dbang bskur ro//
101b5(rnying rgyud): rdzas dang yan lag ma nyams par// 'dzab bzlas sran che dpa' btul can// don dang ldan pa drag shul spyod// dpa' brtul ldan pa'i gang zag la// bstan pa bsrung bar dbang bskur ro// dbang gi yul gang gos bya ba yang gsungs pa// khrel dang
101b6(rnying rgyud): gtsug lag cher ldan shing // grol dgrar shes pa'i sram mchog do// btsal te rnyed par 'gyur nas ni// lag pa g.yas nas bzung nas kyang // bla ma la ni 'di skad dbul// e mngon la 'byor yongs kyi ste// rdo rje sgra la gzugs 'chang ba// thas
101b7(rnying rgyud): sa ma po brtsal po'i tshul// thams cad ma spangs nyid kyi rgyal// longs spyod chen po thams cad la// chos nyid can gyis spyod mdzad// gnyis med gram chen 'di bzhes la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// byang chung
102a1(rnying rgyud): na/ sems kyi dbang rnams dang // pad+ma shA dngas srab rnams// rnal 'byor bdag laHla drugs pa// a la ldan/ zhes bdadu la na pas mo// de nas du ba nad pa bdag gi sum cas thab ma
102a2(rnying rgyud): dgos pa gsangs pa// rtswa khyod yid mthun pasam pa gcig/ brtse ba'i shugs 'chang gsal ba'i grogs// mtshan ldan ma mAM yid 'ong ma// dbyibs logs ngan cing mangs pa la// rgyan rnams ci yod pas bcan nas// lus ngag yed/
102a3(rnying rgyud): gsam khrus byas te// phyi nang dri ma dag zlas nas// dri'i ma spos kyis lus byugs te// mdzes ldan dar gyi sgrub lhub kyis// yid du 'ong bar brgyan nus kyang // thogs chags med par chags byas la// gsang ba'i rje ru gzhag par bya//
102a4(rnying rgyud): yang na dbang nod gzungs ma ni// so so'i dbang rnams gang nod pa// rigs dang mthun par sbyang bar bya'o// de yi yon tan mtshan nyid gang // so so'i rigs la shes par bya// dbang gi rgyal thabs dang karba'i tshul ji lta bu'i bya ba'i don la/ yang
102a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// thogs chags med pa'i blo ldan zhing // sde snod chos la rnam grol bas// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i lung dag las// gang dag shes rab shin tu grol// rnam par dag pa'i slob dag gis// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs
102a6(rnying rgyud): grol bas// sngon chad slob dpon mkhas pa yis// rdo rje rtul thabs dbang bskur nas// gzung dang mthun pa'i dbang thob ste// rdo rje rgyal thebs yin zhes grags// de ni dbang gi rgyal thebs su// nges par btsal ba gzhung las 'byung
102a7(rnying rgyud): gal te de dag ma rnyed na// bdag gi bla mas ci mkhyen pa// de yis mkhyen pa dag yod na// de yang dbang gi rgyal thebs bya// gzhan yang dbang gi rgyal thibs ni// bla ma de la sras yod pa/ yon tan bla ma dang 'dra ba/
102b1(rnying rgyud): de dag yang na btu lags// gzhan yang tham thob dpyod nas/ rgyal thazla 'bun pa gang thal ba/ la dab drug la zugs// nalan dang maldanan// ba na mas mangs pa dan// gzhan sa yod dun dang
102b2(rnying rgyud): tshad yang // dbang gi rgyal thibs mi bya zhes// nges par nga yis yang dag bshad// bdag dang bla ma'i gzungs ma rnams// tshul dang yon tan de rnams dang // ldan par gyur na su yang rung // rgyal rigs rje'i rigs dang ngas rigs dang // rigs pa/
102b3(rnying rgyud): gdol ba'i phyag n+d+ha mo// yod tan de ldan gang yang rung // tshul dgur skyod na dbang thob cing // dngos grub rtags kyis dam pa 'grub// gzhung gi rtags dang mtshan me na// nal rigs rje'u rigs gang yang rung // gzhan pa'i yon tan gan
102b4(rnying rgyud): yang // dbang gi gzungs mar mi bya zhes// nges par nga yis yang dag bshad// gzhan yang rang gi yum dang gzungs// mchog tu gzhan las ma pa rnams shing // srin mo'i mdung shul med pa yi// bu mo gzhon du shes par bshad// de la dbang
102b5(rnying rgyud): rtags dam pa yod// sna dgu dag gi \u0f7f pa ni// blan tu bzang po ngas ma bstan// mnyam pa de 'i gzhung las med// karba'i mtshan nyid tshul bstan pa// las dang tha ba gzhung bsrangs shing // phrin lngas thogs pa yongs med pa// nges par zla ma'i
102b6(rnying rgyud): snying thob pa// don cing dbang bsgyu gnas pa thob// muM 'gal legs par spyod pa'i wang // gas ka dkyil 'khor dam srung ba// dbang gi gas yin mas bya// gzhan yang dbang gi garman// thams cad kun la blo gros stong // lhag par
102b7(rnying rgyud): br-in las don la mkhas// de ni dab ga kaR+Wa yin// mnyen zhing nges la bka' blo bde// gzhan gyi yod 'ong mthun bzhin byed// nges pa'i chog smra na spangs shing // rtags las nges pa'i lung tho ba cing // bka' ya don langs par rtogs// sngags dang
103a1(rnying rgyud): rdzag tu da surnam par dag pa bral ba sa// dbang ga gamatha par bstsud// yon tand dag maldanan// gzhan sa yon napa da kyang yang // dbang ga gang yang kun na// 'dan pa sa 'a ltar rgyag dang // /
103a2(rnying rgyud): da srang med bde ba med// rimacho gzusems cad 'dod pas// dab ga kan tha pa ni// narbA bzung ba dasam bshad// nyams par thar pa'i mtshan mas na// bad+mar byang pan ma bya na// dbang gi rjes dgos pa don
103a3(rnying rgyud): yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur ba ya rdzas rnams ni// rdzas la grangs ni bsam las kyang // nges pa'i rdzas ni lnga ru gsungs// kho bo dur khrod can gyidz+nyAs// rtsal snyid dbang gi longs spyod rdzas// bsgrub pa rdzas kyi gzungs ma'i
103a4(rnying rgyud): rdzas// dngos grub bslab pa'i go ram rdzas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rkyen gyi rdzas// rdzas kyi rnam pa sngagasangs de// khro bo dur khrod rgyan zas na// ral gri dgras gshol la sogs// mda' gzu bre dang mtshan can// de dag rdzas /
103a5(rnying rgyud): yod na lags// gzhan yang ma mchog zug mtshan ni// rdon rdul thang khor la dang // badz+ra chen ral gyi dang // rgya gram s+thA gr-il sogs pa// rigs pa'i kha bo'i phyag mtshan d+hi// dngos su rgyas pa yod na logs// de dag
103a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs sa ma grub na// ri mo mkhan dang bris mkhan gyis// de dag gzugs panyan thos la bskur// ze mchog khro bo la sogs pa// he ru dgra po thams cad dang // dkyil 'khor lha yi phyag mtshan rnams// dngos su rdzas su yod na/
103a7(rnying rgyud): legs// med na de bzhin bris la bsgyur// glang po che yi ko rlon dang // zheng chen ga yang gzhi 'khor ba dang // khrung gi gshag pa me dpung dang / stag gi sham thabs sreg sdom dang // da
103b1(rnying rgyud): paskam rnon phreng ba dang // sbrul nag chun po la sogs pa/ de dag ming gi rjes su dgos// yang zhig rdzas sum 'byor na// za na gzugs brnyan bru bar bya'o// dbang bsgyur ba ye b+h+yan d+ha na// drag shul las la dga' ba
103b2(rnying rgyud): la// khyab 'jug ma yaM snod kyis bskur// bram bu gcig pa la sogs pa// rigs dang mthun pa'i b+han d+ha yis// ji ltar bskur 'dod rtags su lag/ thal chen mtshan ma la sogs te// khro bos mtshan ma'i dur khrod rdzas/ de dag
103b3(rnying rgyud): dngos su tshogs par bsags// rgyal srid longs spyod rdzas rnams ni// rigs kyi khyad par rnams la sbyar// ce ltar mthun pa'i rdzas rnams bsags// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yis// rdzas su rin chen sna bdun bsags// slob
103b4(rnying rgyud): mas bdag rgyal po ni// rta dang glang po rol mo'i sgra// dbu rgyan dpung rgyan gdugs la sogs// rgyal po'i ngas su gang yod pa// de dag rdzas su bsag par bya// slob ma bram ze rje dang dmangs// khrus mkhan gar mkhan rngon pa la//
103b5(rnying rgyud): ci ltar 'tshogs pa'i rdzas bsags la// bla ma dag gi rkyen du bzhag/ bsgrub pa gzungs ma'i rdzas rnams ni// gsum dang lnga dang gang bskyed pa// mtshan na gang du bstan pa bzhin// rkyen dang ris su tshang bar bya// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i
103b6(rnying rgyud): rngas rnams ni// dmadzes bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang // tsa ba btsod dang yan lag stong // wang las byung ba bzhin du bsags// gzhan yang mda' dang dang sna dang // me long tshon srad s+thA lnga dang / kha dog sna lnga'i tshon rtsi dang // rin chen lnga yi bum pa
103b7(rnying rgyud): dang // gos dang rgyan dang lham la sogs// de dag cing byar dbang ngagyur ba// rang gi dngo thob gang bsgrub pa// nyams dang sbyar te dngos su bsags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rkyen rdzas ni// rim pas btsud pa'i slob dpon dang // man ngag/
104a1(rnying rgyud): phyag len la sogs pa// gang yod pa ya rdzas rnams dang // bla mad 'bras bu chags gcod pa// bka' gsang nges pa'i rim pa rnams// bdag la gang gnas yod pa dang // the tshom gang la che ba yis/
104a2(rnying rgyud): man ngag yi ge gang yod pa// bla med thag bcad nges bsrubs pas// de yang bsags pas des dbang nod// rdzas rnams 'di dag gang yod pa// rim pas gzhung bzhin bsags par 'byung // so sor 'chol ba'i rdzas rnams dang // ma nges rnyed tsam
104a3(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams ni// kun tu bzang po ngas ma bshad// dbang gi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri ba'i don gsungs pa// dkyil 'khor thams cad brtsig pa'i lugs// dang pos gzhi sbyar byas nas// de dag rtog pa'i gegs bsal te// maN+Dal chag chag kun
104a4(rnying rgyud): byas nas// sa la tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// hUM ma chags skye ba med pa yi// chags med yum gyi gzhal yas na// thabs kyi 'phro 'du ye nas rol// zhabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings nas/ byang chub
104a5(rnying rgyud): sems su dbang bskur phyir// dbang gi dkyil 'khor brtsig par bya'o// lan gsum dag tu brjod par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor brtsigs nas kyang // dam mas dag gis chag chag gdab// hUM 'byung ba yum du dbyer med pa'i// thabs kyi phyag
104a6(rnying rgyud): NA um rdzog la// sred gsum yongs pa dbang bsgyur byer// gnyis med myong ba'i rang brnyan la// bdud rtsid mthas chag cag ga bya// thams cad 'chi med ye shes dbyung // yongs la bang bsrung 'di dag tug/ swA badz+ra ma ma/
104a7(rnying rgyud): hUM// de nas gzungs ma mtshan ldan la// thig srud gtsang ma 'khal du gzug/ de nas dgongs pa'i gzhung bsrangs la// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad ma 'grus par//
104b1(rnying rgyud): dad ba nga dmas cug gdab pa// denas dpe' 'bor rnabar sa// dngams rnags gtsug pazo// rdzogs panam tsam sa brgyad de mthun par// dbang gzugs na smra// na kyis can kyang dmang ra blta// dalu yang ba dag sa
104b2(rnying rgyud): b+ha gam par la seng po btang // bru chang lani ljang gra btang // kun gyi phyi rol nag pos bskor// de khA da byibs kun dkar por drangs// de nas bram bu lnga dang dgu// gang 'byor sman gyis bkang la bzhag/ dkyila'i khor burgyan ngog rgyan dang /
104b3(rnying rgyud): slob pa'i rdzas rnams gang yod pa// de yin sis dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi mtha' mal// rdo rje'i rna ba me sa bskor// de yi phyi mnag po la// dbang phyug sa la 'khor rnams bzhag/ mda' dang ral gri mo long dang // da shA
104b4(rnying rgyud): ba sgru ma tig dang // 'apa dang / can gca dang // gdug sa dang na ma man dang thang dang // mi tig nan po la sogs pa// can namamam ma yod byed rdzun// rgyu ba dacol la khor na mangs// dbang po 'dang da /
104b5(rnying rgyud): spyod tsa'i gang rngas pan rdzogs pa'i// gzhung dang mthun par rdzogs par dgram// de yang yongs su shes pa na// dbang gi dmyal 'khor bri bar bya// bka' gzhung don gyi don med pa'o// dkyil 'khor byi bar ma gsungs so// dbang gi yin/
104b6(rnying rgyud): ji lta bu dpral ba yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur gnang ba thob 'dod pa'i// skyes bu gang zag rnal 'byor pas// dang la dbang gi yon dbul te// 'dzam gling rin chen gang ba dang // rta dang glang po dud 'gro'i tshogs// rgyal srid dang ni rang lus
104b7(rnying rgyud): dpral// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// bu dang rlung ma sun dang grogs// 'khor dang longs spyod nga yod pa// dbang rnams thob rtser yon du dbul// de dag gang dang ma ldan na// las kyi phreng po 'bangs su dbul// sems kyi dra
105a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa// na gas// dang gang pasargyas // nga dub yang sapa sa// / ga dang dab tsug pang// ran byu
105a2(rnying rgyud): na yang byu 'angs// she brna thapan 'ag du du dag / na sma pa / pa gas pa cos/ bang yang ga sa nas ci nganapags sa/ da/
105a3(rnying rgyud): badzad pa ltang da // man ga nyid du na ba sngags// bang gi byed rlag grubla ma pa'u yang gzul pa/ ba pa rgyums gzu na/ kyi legasapa pa rtag gas pagasas
105a4(rnying rgyud): gags pa pa dzan// dbang gi ban dru pa/ de sa ba ma dad pa seM ma pa gang bad pa// ga shes dag pa cad na nyam canas// yang nas pa na kyis gas so// de dag pa da zla ba sa
105a5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// dang ga ga slos da gsus pa// gang da pas// stong gza nga na pa// ga la rlo mas// dab gas gdu dngag rnam me ma spyon// gan yang na ma mar 'od
105a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ de yi grangs ni bstan pa ste// dngos sra brtags kyi gzung po babyung // ldan bdun dbang nga snyer rtags tshad ni// de nas de la dbang med de// rkyen chad bskur bar ma b+ha'o// de la dbang rtags sbyin par// phrin las lag tu'i rlab la// dza
105a7(rnying rgyud): bu'i dbang rtags sbyid// bsgrub pa 'din la lhur 'ad pa// rjes mchog pa zang po dang sa rgyun// ca pa da pa slob ma la// rlung rtsigasang 'gro grub pa dang // ni ba kyi tshig shing dag/ dbang rtags sung byen par \u0f7f// ga
105b1(rnying rgyud): dbadag slob ma yis// yon la chags pa med phral na// rang la dbang rtags ca yod pas// slob ma de la sbyin par bya// gos dang rgyal mtshan lhang lbab rngas// zang zing rdzas rnams rje yod pa// dbang bslaskur rtags su sbyin par bya// slob mas yar/
105b2(rnying rgyud): kyi mchog dbum na// dbang rtags med du me rung zhes// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur ba'i dus tshod gang la bsgyur gsungs pa// dbang dgun rton dpyid ra ba yi// chos brgyad gnam stong nya la bskur// de yang ston tu
105b3(rnying rgyud): bzang // dus tshod 'di dag ma yin par// gzhan du bskur bar ma bya'o// bslar yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// dbang bskur dgos pa'i don gsungs pa// dbang bskur ba yi dgos pa ni// rkye nang las grang thams cad kyang // dbang bslar nas
105b4(rnying rgyud): dgos la// dbang bskung ba yi dgos pa ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur zhing // srid pa gsum la mthu dbang che// mkha' 'gro dbang phyug zan du 'khol// 'jog rten dgos pa thams cad 'grub// gzhan yang dbang bskur dogs pan//
105b5(rnying rgyud): rgyad kyi rgyal po 'di yin no// rgyud kyirgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang skad pa'i chung las/ dbang gi bye brag gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsol
105b6(rnying rgyud): kyikye shin tu ngo mtshar dang ldan pa/ shin tu byin rlabs chen po dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang // dbang bskur ba'i phrin las bdag cag la stsal du gsol/ A la la ho// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'a
105b7(rnying rgyud): dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ khyed la sogs pa'i dbang gi drim pa 'di yid la zung zhing / dbang bsrung ba'i rim pa nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang dang / chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang dang / 'bar
106a1(rnying rgyud): chen pa'i dbang dang / 'khor pas myur ba'i rgyal ba'i dbang dang / rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang dang / ngo rje rdul thabs kyi dbang dang / kam 'i da bu dang / gang ga dbang dang / nyan pa 'i dbang dang / bslab pa'i
106a2(rnying rgyud): dbang dang / phrin las mthar phyin pa'i dbang dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang dang / 'jig rten tshe'i dbang dang / dngos grub rnam gsum gyi dbang dang // mthu stobs phran su mtshogs pa'i dbang dang / bzad pa'i dbang dang / de bA
106a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba yum gyi dbang dang / rgyan chas rtags kyi dbang dang / dur khrod chas kyi dbang dang / mongs spyod rdzas kyi dbang dang / phyi ning gsang ba gsum sti dbang ste nyi shurtsa gcig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste dbang skur ba'i rgyud las
106a4(rnying rgyud): 'dang / dbang gi rim pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phrin las thabs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so// de la dang po rdo rje rgyal po dbang bskur ba ni// b+h+rUM mkha' mnyam dbyings kyi dkyil
106a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyis// thugs kyi byin rlabs rmad po che// thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang gi mchog/ byin rlabs thabs kyis brtsed dgongs te// thabs kyi cho 'phrul pas ma yas pa// 'jig rten gsu
106a6(rnying rgyud): rna med pa yi// sku gsung yon tan bsam mi khyab// thams cad kun la rgyal ba dang // srid pa gsum la dbang bsrung zhing // rdo rje thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis// khams gsum re slong rgyal por shog/ A~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya A~M// wAka
106a7(rnying rgyud): tsit+ta b+h+rUM/ badz+ra rAngo mahA/ g+hu h+ye shwa ra At+ma ko&ha~M/ badz+ra mAM/ zhes brjod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi stong du drangs la/ dmardzas ci yod pas dbang bskur la/ rdo rje slob dpon dang phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor pa yongs kyis kyang rdo rje rgyal ba'i
106b1(rnying rgyud): dbang che ge mos thob par gyur cig ces brjod la/ bdag nyid kyis kyang rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang bdag che ge mos thob par gyur cig ces brjod la/ phyogs bcur grags pa bskyed la dbang mas blang ngo // de nas chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni/
106b2(rnying rgyud): hUM rang bzhin dbyer med dkyil 'khor nas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos kyi rgyal srid dam pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i yon tan rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ngas sprul pas// rdo rje slob mche ge khyod// chos kyi rgyal sring ma
106b3(rnying rgyud): paM// rigs kyi bu mchog rdob par shog/ oM sarba d+ha thA ga ta d+harmA rA dza tsakra g+hA h+ye shwa ra At+ma ko&haM// zhes brjod pa gong ma bzhin no// de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba 'di skad // hUM bde gshegs thugs kyi sras po dam pa'i mchog
106b4(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi thugs dam bka' da mi 'gal zhing // dgongs pa yod bzhin na ma mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phrin las skyabs mdzad ma dag 'dren mdzad cing // chos nyid don ston kha lo sbyar byed de// phrin las thabs kyi rdo rje slob dpon mchog
106b5(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'gro ba yongs kyi re skong ba// ston pa'i sgon ma ma lus kha lo 'dren// shes bya'i mtha' rdzogs yon tan ldan gyis grub// sdug bsngal bskyab mdzad ma rig 'dren mdzad cing // chos nyid don ston kha lo sbyar byed pa// sangs rgyas gdung
106b6(rnying rgyud): 'tsho ba rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ gang yin mngon du gyur pa grub pa'i dbang // dbang mchog ma lus khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ oM ta thA ga ta ma hA g+ha r+ya g+hA h+ye shwar badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// de yang gong ma ltar bsgrags so// de nas 'bar ba cha
106b7(rnying rgyud): po'i dbang bskung ba ni// hUM thugs rje thabs mkhas rang byung he ruka/ khams gsum dbang bsgyur rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gdug pa bsreg mdzad 'bar ba chen pa ni// rtsi bra'i tshe mchog dbang mchog che ba sgra// rtogs pa thugs rje 'ab
107a1(rnying rgyud): pa dbul 'khar la// ye shes me bar rtags pa'i 'da'ab tu// tshogs 'bar ba'i dbang mchog rab 'bar bya'o// ye shes me dpung 'bang ba chen po'i das// gdug pa pa la gnan sa dag bcug
107a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // sdug bsngal na margyan la pa'i mas bsregs shing // yang gi sems ca thugs rje thabs 'bar ba// kun pa med pa'i 'bang ba chen pa'i dbang // rigs kyi bu mchog dab mchog 'thab pa na sa ta tA ga ta
107a3(rnying rgyud): shwar dzA g+ho/ \u0f85\u0f7f// de nas rim pa gong ma bzhin pa'o// de nas 'khor los gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// rje rgyal zid yongs spyod dpam dang ldan// 'khar lo rin chen blang chen rin chen bdun// 'jam bla zing badz+ra yang sa'i sbyong de/
107a4(rnying rgyud): lha yi rgyal po man chad nas// rgyung drug sems can thams cad la// yongs su spong ba'i rgyal po ste// thams cad ma lus 'dren byed pa// sems can kun gyi don byed cing // ma lus yangs la dbang bskur ba'i// rgyal thebs go 'phang 'thob
107a5(rnying rgyud): par shog/ A~M sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri ku ru ma ha shwa ra g+hu h+ne sa ma yA ra tA tsakra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// de yang rim pa bzhin no// de nas rgyal thabs ste blag gi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM thams cad spun sngagi kun tu bzang po'i rdzas// rang bzhin
107a6(rnying rgyud): spos med kun tu bzang mo'i ngang // gnyis med thabs kyi rgyal pos yongs la khyab// thabs kyi rgyal pos yongs la dbang bskur te// kun tu bzang po rang byang bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi dbyings la gcig tu bzhugs pa yi// rang rig byang
107a7(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi lha yin te// don dang sems kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po dri ma med pa yis// yongs la dbang bsgyur sems kyi rgyal por shar// rang sems rnam dag togs pa'i ye shes shar// byang chub snying po bde ba chen po
107b1(rnying rgyud): dang // thams cad ma rgyas rgyun grub chos kyi// chas rnams thams cad dang gi sems su 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin cu yang ma yin pa'o// theg la smos pa med pa'i rang bzhin pa// mnyam pa rgyal pas kun la dbang bsgyu du/
107b2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid theg pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa che// ma 'dres cir yang ston pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ 'di dag ma lus myur du rdzogs pa'i phyir// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang mchog 'di bskur bas// yongs kyi dbang phyug thabs kyi rgyal por shog/ AM sarba
107b3(rnying rgyud): tathA ga ta ma hA k+sha N+De rA dza s+tha she na shwa raswa b+hA wa AH ko&haM// de rnams kyang gong ma bzhin no// de nas rdo rje rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad de// h+lagra med rgyal pa rnams kyi gas pachen gang // nges par brtags pa'i ge 'phang gang yin pa/
107b4(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs gdung 'dzin dgongs pa yab dang mnyam// thabs kyi phrin las nyan rdzogs nyer ba rdzog gnas// sdang ba'i phyogs 'dul ma reg 'dren mdzad pa// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gdug pa shin tu 'dul// snod ldan rnal 'byor 'dul ba'i mched 'dren
107b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rdo rje rgyal thebs dbang rnams thob par shog/ I sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hAN+Te badz+ra bo li ka g+ha ra ya swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// de nas karma ging gi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// k+ShiM 'gro kun bla med thar pa'i lam ston cing // ngan song gnas spangs thar
107b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las mdzad// thams cad 'dul bas las kyi karma ra bskos// phrin las ma lus rdzogs par bya ba dang // mchod pa dus drug gnas sra stob pa dang // las dang bya ba ma lus gzhung bsrang ba'i// karma ging gi dbang mchog 'thob
107b7(rnying rgyud): par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&hi// de nas ging gi dbang bskur ba ni 'di skad do// hUM thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// gsal ba thabs kyi 'phro 'du las// yang dag snying po rab bstan pa'i// bde ba'i phrin las
108a1(rnying rgyud): nga/ da sus sa / // / // pas
108a2(rnying rgyud): ga ba rnams 'dzub par shog/ mas zhag tu na/ dang po pa nga pa dzin / shes byed pa pa me dag pa // myed rnams tha pa byed // 'dag
108a3(rnying rgyud): sa las// dam 'jis theg byasmra la/ gas 'de dag pani da bzhin / mi mo/ pa'i rgyung
108a4(rnying rgyud): A s+'u t+ya zlas tam sa rna padres la dan pazlab pa nga 'dra ba 'di dang/ ba rje rnaM sa pang rjegs// pa 'i sna pa nyid byang chub ngan / la sa na thab
108a5(rnying rgyud): ga so// rnam shes phung po sbyi rnaMnas dkyipa'i nga rdzogs/ byed pam rnams sangs rgyas me bye'i s+ho// 'dag shes slo sa kyi 'thos zi pa grong tshul la khyor byas 'ba' par zhig
108a6(rnying rgyud): b+hag tas lag grus sa matrag te/ sa smin pa mas babyerjod pa'i dub ba da // d+hi shes bzlas 'i rjod kyi bcom ma stsam pa dag sumamatha' smras pa/ na
108a7(rnying rgyud): kaMHsa dbang dang dngos su dang // nag Na'i myod sgrol rnams// rnal byeng dag pa'i srid pa te// las rnams pa napa pags pa sa/ rgyas padas pa sa// las bye ba chog gang yin pa// smon pa
108b1(rnying rgyud): phyin dpa mchog 'di// gnas 'ang khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ oMs sata thag tu ma thAk+Sha t+ye bsgrub pa ku ma traswa b+hA wa At+ma ko hU~M/ de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ shes rab mtshan ldan ma'i lag pa g.yas pa nas
108b2(rnying rgyud): bzung la 'di skad do// hUM skye med chos dbyings rig pa 'byung ba'i yum// mtshan ldan mi mo mchog gi rim pa'i rgyan// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med rol pa las// lhag pa'i byang chub sems las dkyil 'khor spos// 'phags mchog
108b3(rnying rgyud): kun mnyes 'bras bu bde sgrub pa// gnyis med bde spyod chos nyid dag pa'i rgyan/ dgyes pa'i ro mchog chos nyid dbang mchog 'di/ rnal 'byor slob bu khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hA h+ye pra dz+nyA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ de nas
108b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM zla gam dmar po rdo rje dbang gi tshe// gzhan gyis mi 'phrog khams gsum kun las rgyal/ lha mod dmar mo rdo rje 'chi med tshe// legs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzas// mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe lo stong
108b5(rnying rgyud): phrag dang // rang nyid gang 'dod phung po rdo rje'i tshe/ A yuHdmar po yongs su 'gyur med pa// mi 'phrog nges pa'i tshe mchog gang yin pa// yun ring gong nas bsnyen bslab bskyabs pa yis// rdo rje tshe yi dbang mchog gang yin pa// rigs kyi bu
108b6(rnying rgyud): mchog 'di dag 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye A yur+d+ha na b+hin+da yu tshe shwa ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// de nas dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do/ hU~M sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rin chen dbyig/ 'jig rten 'das
108b7(rnying rgyud): dang 'jig rten 'di dag na/ tshe dang longs spyod dpal dang gzi byin dang // 'byor pa kun rdzogs bsam kun rdzogs pa yi// rdzu 'phrul mthu sngobs che ba sna tshogs pa'i// 'jig rten 'di yi dngos grub thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i
109a1(rnying rgyud): dngos grub gang yin pa// byang chubs mchog stug pos brgyan pa yis// sangs rgyas sa gsum 'phags pa'i yon tan tshogs// sgra dang ye shes bzhi dang rdo brang dang // 'phags pa'i yon tan bas
109a2(rnying rgyud): khyab pa// de yi legs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad dang // 'jig rten mtshan mardzas kyi dngos grub pa// gnyis med longs spyod bdud rtsi sman la sogs// de dag dngos grub dbang mchog gang yin pa// rigs kyi bu mchog dang 'thob par
109a3(rnying rgyud): shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+ha N+ye sid+d+hi pha la b+h+rUM swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ de nas mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM khams gsum kun na bla na med pa yi// che btsan gar gyis 'gran gyi do med pa// che ba'i che ba dang
109a4(rnying rgyud): phyag che ba'i lha// zhe sdang thugs rje'i mo 'bar khro mchog hU~Mng+ka can// sdang ba'i phyogs 'dul bdud srin 'dul ba'i lha// dbang phyug chen po dpal gyi king ka ra// dregs pa dbang sdud dbang phyug dam la 'dogs// khams gsum tshogs
109a5(rnying rgyud): 'joms dregs pa 'joms pa'i mthu// khengs pa spyan 'dul khams gsum sgrol ba'i mthu// yongs la dbang bsgyur gang gis mi thub mthu// bdud bgegs tshar gcod par chad sgrol ba'i mthu// mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i
109a6(rnying rgyud): dbang mchog rnams// rdo rje'i slob ma khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kru h+ya ha na d+ha ha pa tsa swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ de nas 'chad pa'i dbang bsku ba 'di skad do// hUM sku gsung thugs kyi 'dul ba rnam gsum las//
109a7(rnying rgyud): gsung rab tu mchod mchos bdud rtsi'i mdzod// chos kyi char 'bebs 'gro ba'i rgyud 'grol po// zag pa'i bye brag ma 'dres don ston pa// snod ldad slob ma'i shes pa'i rgyud bkrol nas// chos nyid don rtogs bden pa'i
109b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzud pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' gas dam pa yi// dam chos mtha' dag ma sras 'chad pa'i dbang // chos rnams 'thad pa'i dbang rnams 'thob par shog/ os rba thAg nams su rna ma panyis rnal ma
109b2(rnying rgyud): de nas rgya chas rtags kyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// rigs lnga rin chen dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas// ye shes lnga dang rigs snga dbyer med pa'o// rigs lnga'i dbu chen dbang mchog
109b3(rnying rgyud): 'thob par shod// oM sarba tathA ga ta ma hA g+hat+ye b+had+d+ha satwa/ badz+ra satwA/ rat+na satwa/ pad+ma satwa/ karma satwa/ swa b+hA wa At+ma kro&haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod can// nang rtags kyi bstan rin chen stan cha 'di// gnas
109b4(rnying rgyud): pa ma 'gags rin chen snyan cha'i mchog/ si la sman sten pa'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hAg+h+ra h+ya rat+na bI ma ling swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs stod tu na// nang rtags khyer bstan rin chen
109b5(rnying rgyud): mgur chu 'di// yon tan mthar phyin mkhyen pa'i skur rdzogs sngags// mgur n+ya rin chen dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA b+hu h+ye rat+na ku na swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// dz+haiM chos nyid car yang sdang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtag
109b6(rnying rgyud): byu ba'ang // rnab 'i yin nan rgya rtags rnyan na thong// dashul zing ba'id pa mjug 'thob par shog/ rgyams ma rnam rnal kyi/ nyid ci yang snang ba yo sa nga gyud/
109b7(rnying rgyud): du/ sa parnal ma sa sa// gas ngas na sacag ma na/ brgya gas
110a1(rnying rgyud): yangs snod can// nang rtags kyi ga/ nang na chan rgyagagadu na// sag nas rnam par dag pa 'dagasas pa na// phyag gdungs bstan dbang 'chog 'a bya bar chunas ta ga tam gcing brdamaHlda /
110a2(rnying rgyud): \u0f85!// gyis nyid kyir yang blang ba'i longs spyod cas// nang gas kying nga/ na rgyag ga dum pa di// stobs brgyarnam par dag pa'i rtags su bstan// phyag gtu sil sa da dbang mchog 'jo bar smrig/ stobs zhug ta ma ny-i nga
110a3(rnying rgyud): wa At+ma ko&haM// hU~M chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan dang gyi sham zabs 'di// mkhyen pa'i bye brag ma 'dres gsal ba'i rtags// bsnga sham thabs dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ AM sarba ta thA ga ta ma N+Da g+haHsa
110a4(rnying rgyud): mAd te swa b+hA wa A dz+wa r+pahU~M// rdzu chos nyid cing yang sdang po'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phying bstan ti tha bsu gtan// thabs dang shes rabar chags parda'i gdun/ gdon gyi dbang mchog dam pa 'thob par shog/ oMsarba twa shA ga tamaHbya
110a5(rnying rgyud): tsan+d+ra bad+ma d+ha re sa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// hUM chos nyid cing yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan rin chen khri nang 'di// 'gro ba'i de skrong yon tan bzhi yi rtags// rin chen khri rkang dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA sa ta mahA
110a6(rnying rgyud): g+ha t+yai ra tA ra tri tra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags kyir bstan glang chen seng la sogs// mi 'jigs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dbang dang las// thogs pa med pa'i dbang mchog 'thob par sho /
110a7(rnying rgyud): ci gtam pa gyi rgyangs tu ma matsun tu/ cad kyi yang dru los gyu ban// de shegs byer bad+hA du sa ga'ajug gsun/ sa kyi khri pa la la dzin pa sa na/ dang dbang 'chog dam pa'i kha
110b1(rnying rgyud): sha// chos sata thag tam thu n+de d+ham dang la dz+wal a k+Sha haM// d+had nga 'khor la pa den chen dang // ral grwa byos kya zlogs dril zhwa dang // chos kyil ba ma la shus lnga dang rdzaH// dgos 'dod dang phyag rngu phrin ma mngogs// kyang
110b2(rnying rgyud): dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga tre ma hAg+ha ts+yai tsakra badz+rad thAkam badz+rar na badz+ra swa b+hA wa A t+ma ko&haM/ de nas cang khrod ches brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// ngo la zhag gi tshom bu byas la// hUM he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khro chen
110b3(rnying rgyud): po'i gnas brgyad nas// zhing chen gsar snying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+d+ha t+ya mtshor bskyil// zhag gi tshem bus mtshan pa yis// 'di yang sngon gyi dam tshig la// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// chos nyid zhag gi tshom bus dab bad+ma
110b4(rnying rgyud): bas// chos nyid dbyings las rgyal ba dang // gtsug pa thabs kyis 'dul ba dang // che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa dang // chos nyid zhag gi dbang 'thob shog/ oM da ta b+ha ga ta a la la ho// de nas khrag gi thig le byas la 'dri sad //
110b5(rnying rgyud): ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas bcad nas// dpal chen khrag 'bud spyan drangs te// zhing chen gsar d+hir ti rar bcas// dmar s+t+waM ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil/ khrag gi thig les mtshan pa 'di// 'di yang sngon gyi da
110b6(rnying rgyud): tshig la// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// 'dod chags gnas su dag pa yi// khrag gi thig les dbang bskur pas// gtum khro drag po 'joms pa dang // nga rgyal drag po 'joms mdzad pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa 'thob
110b7(rnying rgyud): shog/ oM ma hA ra k+Sha na ti la ka hU/ de nas thal chen gyis mtshan ma byas la 'di skad do// hUM he ru ka yi gnas brgya dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang // dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// zhing chen gsar rnying
111a1(rnying rgyud): te'adabacas// dasu seM sa rgya mtshor bstsal// thal ba'am ma rnams brtsan pa 'ad// gzug pa ma mas rab 'dul ba/ ma chu ba dag pa san bya bdag/ thams cad kun tu dpa 'bra' bdag/
111a2(rnying rgyud): gdug pa zil gnon thal ba'i mtshan// dbang mchog 'di yi dbang bskur bas// khams gsam gdug pa thal bar klo// de 'dra'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ oM ba ta ba ya hUM/ de nas dzad pa sam rngon gyi phreng ba thogs la
111a3(rnying rgyud): dbang bslang ba 'di skad do// hUM phur khrod khyong seng dbang po lnga dang ldan// sku gsum tshul 'chang sa mthon du ris tshul// 'khor bya gnas su spang ba'i thabs kyi phreng ba'i rgyan// khams gsum thogs med phreng bas dbang bsrur bas/
111a4(rnying rgyud): sra gsung thugs kyi dbang mchog 'thob pa re shog/ oM bad+ma beny+dza ka pA la ha sta hUM// de nas srul gyi chun pos dbang bsrung ba 'di skad do// spyi thod sbrul mnyen lcug 'jigs byed gyen du che// sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa'i rngom pa
111a5(rnying rgyud): can// su la mchod phyir sku yi gnas lngar 'khril// dug ldi ma spangs dbang gi thabs su ston// mnyen skrag 'khril ldam zhe sdang drag pos 'joms// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis ka rgyal dbang du spyad// gti mug rnam 'dul dbang phyug yin
111a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// sbrul nag stong gi chun pos dbang bskur pas// zhe sdang drag po 'bar ba'i gnas dag nas// thabs mkhas rgyal po mnyes pa'i dbang 'thob shog/ AM badz+ra nA ga rA tsa ho ha du lu hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i gshog pas dbang bskur ba 'a
111a7(rnying rgyud): skad do// hUM khams gsum yongs la khyab pa'i gshog pa 'di// kun la khyab pas thugs rje 'byung ba'i yum// ma g+ha pa rnams pas yongs la slob pa'i tshul// thugs ni thabs mkhas rgya tshe rol pa li// phyogs bcur khyab pa'i
111b1(rnying rgyud): gshog pas dbang bskur bas/ phyogs btur grub pa'i chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i// rkyo 'dabang mchog dam pa 'dab par shig/ o la ni bzlas mab+ha du// de nas zhing sdig yang gnyis dbang bslang ba 'di 'a // khams gas pa
111b2(rnying rgyud): rtags su gsol ba'i dur khrod bdag/ g.yang gzhi tsheH skra ga sud pa srul btsongs/ 'khor ba ma spangs gnas su dag pa yi// dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir// zhing chen g.yang gzhis khyod la dbang bskur pas// zhing chen
111b3(rnying rgyud): rten pa thibs pa mkhas pa pas// mthong ba gnas rnaMs ma lub zing bar sheg/ ma sgri ta la hU~M/ de nas su lpags kyi sha thas kyis dbang bskur ba 'di gdad// d+hi ga zung drug pa gag sham thapas ca// rtagazugs
111b4(rnying rgyud): shAmathabs dpa byung brtan pa yis/ sdug thom 'a gas la bras kyi na gsang pa gas ga dag gnas disas ga lags bang bathur ba // de rje gnas 'a gagags rgyas pa'o// dab sa bung shu bas
111b5(rnying rgyud): 'dir 'thob par shog/ oM badz+ra bya g+h+ri su ga hUM// de nas glang po che'i ko smon gyis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM glang chen ko tron brjid du che ba ni/ gaN+DI mug ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rgyan// na bzang rgyan gyis sku la mda' gsol zhing /
111b6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi ko rlon rgyan gyi dam pa yis// gang la dmigs pa'i dbang mchog 'di bskur pas// stobs kyis rgyal ba'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ oM ma hA ra ta ba sha trUM/ de nas bskal pa'i me ris dbang bsgyur ba 'di skad do// hUM 'ab
111b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'phro ba'i ye shes thugs dang ldan// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms nyon yongs du gsol ba// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i stongs la gnas// ye shes gsal bas phyogs bcu'i mun pa sel// bskal po me'i 'bar bas dbang ba
112a1(rnying rgyud): bas// par med bgegs ma rtag pas mtshugs shud// mtshan pa 'dun tog med pa'i dbang 'thob shog/ rdo 'a yang na // de nas ldan la sogs pa tshwa ba cug mtshan na tshogs pas dbang bskur ba dun du/
112a2(rnying rgyud): chu bdud dpung 'joms pa'i rtag kyi phyag rgya ste// gtsug pa 'dul gyi daphyag mtshan ma tshogs parnams// rdo rje pa ni bu zung po can dang // ral pri dgra ng+gA/ khwa dang gshol la sogs// gdug pa'i rtsagam ma ni tshon ma sna tshogs pa// dpa'i
112a3(rnying rgyud): bdud la gan tu rgyal ba dang // cha mngams skyabs kyis rdzogs pa 'dul ba y-i// nyon mongs tshe gcod sdang ba 'dril ba dang // khams gsu ma rdzogs pa san las rgyalwa ba yaM// dbang mchog dam pa de yang 'thob/ A badz+ra tsag shig
112a4(rnying rgyud): ratu ma thu pro ta y+ya dzal pag+h+nAM// de nas longs spo dngas kyis dbang bskung ba 'di skad do// hU~M dam rdzas dag pa nyid nga zhal zas ma// pra lnga 'kho la gsung 'dra byeng med pa'i// 'dod pa'i yan tan bza' dang bca' ba dang // btung sogs pa'i
112a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs ma gang 'i da sa skyed pa brang poni/ de 'i ni gyi 'di'i ste 'i sa'i da nyid pa rim ga da ma ba da/ ban na
112a6(rnying rgyud): hA// drin po longs spyad la rlom pa'idabar bskur ba 'di gang ngo // hU~M yid bzhin pa de mchog sku gsung brags kyi tshor/ cing yang longs spyod don la g.yos pa med// chos nyid longs spyod pa bachen po'i rgyan// glang yang ma spangs chos
112a7(rnying rgyud): dge bar rol/ bde chen longs spyod 'di las gzhan na med// thams cad ma grangs gnyis med rol pa yis// rol pa nyid kyi 'bras bu 'thob pa yi// dbang mchog dam pa de yang 'thob par shog/ oM badz+ra ni ma kha la d+he// de na
112b1(rnying rgyud): gsang bragasum kyi dbang bcu to// khyo'adab de min pa byor bya ba thub pa'i rgyud las byung // nang gi dbang ni slob ma'i phung po dang rnam pang zhes pa lags pa'i dkyil khur bkod la 'dis dang / nga nyid med mog das/
112b2(rnying rgyud): rnab dag dkyil 'khor na// bde gshegs thugs rje can kun kun du bzhugs// phung po mi sbyangs rnam dag dkyil 'khor la// gsapa zhing rdzogs pa'i dbangar rnams 'thob par shog/ A~M badz+ra d+hi laT+Ta ki tI na ma d+hAd+d+hi mat+tar rje// de das
112b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// spro dri mang skyon bral kha dog dmar po'i mdog/ pad+ha rak+ta chags pa chen po'i gnas// chos nyid chags pas 'gro don mthar byin cing // byang chub sems kyi dbang mchog thob pa
112b4(rnying rgyud): dang // tsa~MN+Da yab kyi byang chub sems// dkar la dag pa mu tig dri ma med// shin tu 'tsheng nga chos nyid byang chub sems// don dam dbyer mang byang chub rje ba'i ngang // gnyis med rol pas chags pa'i byang chub ste// thar pa'i
112b5(rnying rgyud): lam mchog gnas 'dren cing // 'khor ba'i 'khor las kun rgyal dbang 'thong ste// ye shes byang chub sems me dbang bathob shog/ oM sa~M d+he tset+ta ka mA lu tsit+tatrAM/ de nas dbang ma lus 'gro ba yongs kyi re baspong bar bsgyur ba nI/
112b6(rnying rgyud): kyi ston pa'i sgron ma ma lus kha lo 'dren// shes bya'i mthar rdzogs yon tan ldan gyis rtsub// sdug bsngal skyabs mdzad ma dge 'dren mdzad cing // chos nyid pon ston kha lo sgrar byed pa// sangs rgyas gdung 'tsho ba rdorje slob dpon
112b7(rnying rgyud): ga/ gang yin mngon du gyur pa grub pa'i dbang // dbang mchog ma lus khyod kyis 'thob pa re shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta maHg+huH/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
113a1(rnying rgyud): dbang srung ba'i rgyud las// dbang yongs rdzogs bsgyur bar bya ba'i phrin las kI le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis
113a2(rnying rgyud): gsol ba/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skams par zhugs nas 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gsung gi dkyil 'jo
113a3(rnying rgyud): don med lan zhig/ Ak+Sha/ Ta da/ b+h+yat+ta/ na/ kA Sha gaH// pad+hA beH/ NA / wa ya l-i/ n+ta sa/ i/ sa/ a/
113a4(rnying rgyud): A A/ dzaHhU~M ho// a h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ mahA ka rba N+Ti// dr-i n+ya ho/ sa ma yadz+dza/ sa mA ya tAM/ bsred pa'i snying po gzhan bzhin no// gzhan yang de la khro bor spos// drA lu ra lud+d+ha ts+tsha hUM/ rgyud kyi rdul po de bzhin gshegs pa thams
113a5(rnying rgyud): cad kyi spyi dbang snar ba'i rgyud las/ gsung gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos dbang bsrung ba'i yon tan 'di dag 'khor rnams la gsungs so// dbang bskur ba ya~M phan yon ne// yang dag nyid du bshad
113a6(rnying rgyud): bya ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang // dbang bskur nas ni bskor bar bya// bsrub pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dbang bskur nas ni bsgrub par bya// phrin las mtha' dag bye ba yang // dbang bslar nas ni bya bar 'brug
113a7(rnying rgyud): dbang bslar gnang bathob nas kyang // gang bcam las de 'grub pa rings// dbang bskur ba yi yon tan ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad l-i// yid la cir dgang dbang yang bslar// mamo mkha'
113b1(rnying rgyud): tshe dang longs spyod phran sum tshogs// 'jig rten 'di yi yon tan kyang // bsam gyis me khyab 'grub par 'gyur// dmyal bar skye bar nges na yang // dbang bsrung ba yi yon tan gyis// dmyal bar rnams kyang mi nyung
113b2(rnying rgyud): ngan song gsum po kun spangs nas// bla med 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur// tshe zad 'chi bar nges na yang // dbang 'di rab tu bslar nas ni// tshe zad 'chi bar nges pa yang // tshe tshad dpag med thob par 'gyur// gzhan
113b3(rnying rgyud): yang tshe 'di'i yon tan yang // brjod kyis mi lang 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa'i yon tan ni// rig 'dzin rnam gsum yan chad nas// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa kun// sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad
113b4(rnying rgyud): ma A sa // du sag / nga pa / la sas// sa
113b5(rnying rgyud): 'dra// dbang sgyur rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dbang gi yon tan gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang ston pa kun tu bzang pos/ dbang ma bsrung ba'i skyon 'di dag kyang gsungs so// dbang ma bskur ba'i skyon rnams ni/
113b6(rnying rgyud): nges pa nyid du shes par gyis// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// gang zhig sngags la 'jug byed cing // nyan cing sgrub par byed pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas na// dbang
113b7(rnying rgyud): thob na yang me phan no// dbang ma thob par brtsam pa dang // nyams pa sa pas des 'gel pa// de dag phreng ba'i chu yin no// dbang ma thob pa'i gang zag ni// gzhan ma yon tan gang tshang yang // 'khor lo srog shing med pa
114a1(rnying rgyud): 'dra'o// bsgrub pa zhag grangs dus mang yang // rtags kun phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de yang dbang mthob pa'i skyon// mchod pa bstan bsgrub shugs phyung yang // dngos grub thob patam 'gyur/
114a2(rnying rgyud): na// de yang dbang mthob pa'i smon// sngags pa dbyed med ngas gcod ma ban// sgo dang ma dang lugs pa dang // rims dang mug 'khrug pa dang // nad rnams sna tshogs 'byung ba yang // ba pon de y-i sgra las 'byung // dpal
114a3(rnying rgyud): bskur gnang ba ma thob par// rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang // slob dpon bya bar mi 'byung ngo // gang zhig sngags la spyod 'dod na// shes par gyis la dbang rnams nos// rnal 'byor sngags pa tshe thung dang // rdo rje ldum dral rkyen
114a4(rnying rgyud): 'ong ba// dam skyi langs pa ma yin te// 'phags pa nyid kyi bka' chad yin// rang dga' rung chung byed pa la// sangs rgyas ko long mi mdzad na// rang gi gzugs phung brlag tar// gzhan yang dbang rnams ma thob par//
114a5(rnying rgyud): ras chod byed pa'i skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa gcig gsungs na'ang // 'jigs la skrag pas lo tsA bas bod la ma bsgyur ro// de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis// dam pa'i don du dbang 'di nos// rang la rang rdzun ma bslu bar// sangs
114a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas bka' 'di gzhung bzhin gyis// man ngag thams cad bdag la yod// bka' bzhin gzhung bzhin ma byas na// ljon shing me yis tshig pa bzhin// yan lag med cing brlag ta re// kun tu bzang po'i lung la nyon// dbang
114a7(rnying rgyud): srung rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dbang ma bsgyur ba'i skyon gyi le'u gyi bdun pa'o// / de nas nyon ba kun tu bzang pos// de dag yod par bya ba'i phyir// dam tshig nges pa 'di gsungs so// bla ma yi ni bka' bzhin bya// sngags dang
114b1(rnying rgyud): ga lhag tu 'drung // gsang nga man dag masus na/ margyang sa bu ga pa'o bya/ nas byung nan dang ma 'a la go/ sa dang man ma ba dpas// da d+yab ba bad pa dmas gnams// drun
114b2(rnying rgyud): thubras kyis bskyel bar bya// mtshan dang ldan pa ma mal// sbyor bdag kyang rib brtsam pa// de'i sna snang zengs pa gang yod pa// mkhyen grangs nas rkyen du spyad// yang dgadon d+ham 'brel ba// rten nga 'i
114b3(rnying rgyud): rdordzalakra chud kyid ma// yang nas yang du ben bar bya// dbang sgyur rgyam po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi lan sa brgyad pa dz+nyAn/ bam sbyin padas kun tu bzed dus/ dbang ska nal po rgyud bshad pa
114b4(rnying rgyud): mas dper mtshogs pa rigs thalab phra ma dang / sem sa dpe 'dang semapa mdang / ba dang khyim dang / thub pa la phags ngas/ dbang gar rgyal po 'i dpang gyi dngas grub thob pas/ dakhong ba dang myang ni las 'das pa
114b5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad la/ sems kyi dbang du ma gyur par gang yang med de/ thams cad ma skyes pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang la ci ltar snang bar gongs spyod par gyur to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis/ rang
114b6(rnying rgyud): gI lus rdul sna sa stsal nas/ bla na yod pa dang / bla na med pa mchod pa la sogs pas/ sa gzhil rtsi shing 'khrungs pa ster bskyed de/ bar ldang la sbyin phrang bzhin dru gti bas/ nam mkha' la char bzhin pab nas/
114b7(rnying rgyud): gas mched pa rdul tshoshes su babad pa'i dag gis da // kyi dzin pa brnam ldan 'as// kye ma mdzad pa'i tsam ldan 'das// ces gru pabacom ldan 'das/ sangs byas pa da pa rgyad kyi bya
115a1(rnying rgyud): me gnas mi dmigs rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas khyod kyi sku mchog N+DI 'drag// nam mkha'i dbyings las cir yang snang ba'i sgra// dbyings dang ya shes gnyis mad tshus kyi
115a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa thabs kyi sku// sku mchog kun bzang skul phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi gsung ni ci 'dra ba// slar snang brjod med don las mA g.yos kyang // thugs rjes 'dul phyir gsung brjod cing yang ston//
115a3(rnying rgyud): brjod med gsung mchog shes rab pha rol phyin// gsung mchog kun bzang gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi thugs ni ci 'dra ba// rnam rtog mi mnga' rjer yang sA lir gzigs// ye shes mkhyen ldan thams cad
115a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus ma byas// dran med rig pa'i rgyal por phongs su shar// thugs mchog kun bzang thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi yon tan ci 'dra ba// che ba'i yon tan med las cir yang snang // sdang tsam nyid nas thugs
115a5(rnying rgyud): rjes dang gis 'dul// lhun rdzogs mthar phyin yon tan rgyal ba'i sgo// yon tan kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi phrin las ci 'dra ba// thabs kyi phrin las 'gro ba yongs la bsgrud// spyi 'gro mang po
115a6(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i lam 'god mdzad// thabs mkhas mdzar phyin zin las rgyal ba'i sku// phrin las kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag lus phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// chags med mchod pa'i ljin phung rab
115a7(rnying rgyud): sprul nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul du 'bul lags na// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bzhes su gsol// ston pa khyod kyi bka' drin dpag tu med// ma reg rmongs pa'i shes rab gsal mdzad nas// thar pa'i
115b1(rnying rgyud): lam ston de la phyag 'tshal bstod// theg pa'i yon tan khyad par bsam yas pa// mu 'dres so sor gsal ba'i go phye nas/ rnal 'byor yongs la theg pa 'di ston pa// 'dren pa'i lha khyod la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// ces
115b2(rnying rgyud): mgrin gcig tu bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang gyur ba chud kyi rgyal po'i rgyud las/ mchod pa bstod pa'i le'u sde dgu pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' la
115b3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i 'khor gyi lha rnams la/ shin tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'di dag gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje zhags pa dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' dgyes pa che// rdo rje lus te rdo rje gsung // rdo rje thugs
115b4(rnying rgyud): te rdo rje blo// rdo rje shes rab bla na med// rdo rje ma lus kun gyis shig/ oM rdo rje go cha brtan pa che// thub par dka' ba brtson 'grus mchog/ da ni rdo rje thabs chen de// rdo rje thabs kyis gtso bor shog/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// bla med
115b5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi yid bzhin te// thams cad ma yus rdzogs sangs rgyas// rab 'byams 'bar ba'i don rtogs shog/ ces 'khor rnams la dga' ba bskyed nas/ thams cad ma lus par 'dus pa'i dbang gi rgyal po dbang skur ba'i rgyud 'di yongs
115b6(rnying rgyud): su gzung ba'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpa' la rgyud 'di yongs su gzung ba 'di bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag la rab tu dbang bskur ba'i// bdag gi dam pa bla na med// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud chen 'di//
115b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyis zung // lus dang ngag dang sems la chongs// dbang rnams kun gyi byed po par// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du shog/ ces bka' stsal pa dang // de nas rdo rje sems dpas ston pa kun tu bzang po la/ dbang
116a1(rnying rgyud): klur chu / sa nga/ nags pa da na sa ga //
116a2(rnying rgyud): da kyi bang sang ba byang kyi rgyas pa'i rjid 'di yang / dngagal pa dzan pa gang ga gcigalas da mapa'i shing par mam bya'o// 'di me dbang pas shing ba rnal pa rgya 'dzin sde ma dpa' bdag gas
116a3(rnying rgyud): chog par shog cig ces dam du bcas so// de nas 'khor sems dpa' dang sems myal sogs pas kyang nyon pa kun tu bzang po la 'dre nang cas gsal to// bdag cag sems dpa' dang sems ma pa sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang chud kyi rgyal
116a4(rnying rgyud): bA dbyang gyur ba'i rgyud kyi bka' lus 'gal bar mi bgyid do// 'di'i bzhung yang rnal 'byor bas bsgoms shing bsgrubs nadang // nod cing rgyal bzhin bgyid na yang / bdag rtag gis ston pa kun na bzang po nyid bzhin du bkar thams cad bsrung /
116a5(rnying rgyud): shing de las 'da' bar mi bskyed do// bdag cag rnams kyis dbang skur rgyal po'i rnyed 'di gang zag gal par ldan pa gcig las ma gtogs pa/ gang la yang bstan cing sbal bar mi bgyid de// gal te bdag cag gis ngam thos shing kun lnga brgyan
116a6(rnying rgyud): na/ bdag cag rnams kyi mag lus gas shing tshig par sheg cig ces dam du bcas so// de nas ma rgyan gyim padapung byug ma la sogs pa gsung thos pa cos kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang chu rgyal po 'di 'tsha
116a7(rnying rgyud): padang rgod cing ba slab pa a cang yang ces/ ming tsam ngon pa rnam byor pas yod pa la ma/ bas can 'das dpa'i chen po zhin ga kyil ba bdag gis bsgrub pa bslab par // gang zhig 'a
116b1(rnying rgyud): ldan zhing stod du ma gyur pa rnams la/ meng tsam bstan par mi bya zhing / bka' dang 'gal ba rnams/ shin tu rtswa phung la ma mchad pa bzhin du/ lus ngag yid gsum thal ba bzhin du brlag par bgyi'o// ci ste bdag gi
116b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus 'tshig par dam du bca' 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'khor thams cad yongs su bsdu bar mdzad nas/ rgyud kyi don 'di dag kyang yongs su gnang bas 'di gsungs /
116b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gang yin pa yang / dbang sgyur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyu de 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi dus gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gang
116b4(rnying rgyud): yin pa yang dbang sgrar rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang sbyar rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gang yin pa yang / dbang sgyur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// /
116b5(rnying rgyud): dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi byang chub kyi sems so// sems can thams cad kyang dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang sgyur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid kyang kun tu bzang po'o//
116b6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po yang rang gi sems so// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan phrin las gang yin pa thams cad kyang / dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang slar rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang
116b7(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi sems so// mtho ris ngan song yang dbang skur kyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// rgyung 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi sems so// zhes gleng bas 'khor
117a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis kyang dbang pur rgyal ba'i rgyud 'di rtogs so// de nas dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang / rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ye shes la snang bar gyur to// de nas snod dang ldan pa'i rnal 'gyur
117a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i blo la snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang skur bcud kyi rgyal po dbang skur ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gzung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// / de nas 'khor thams cad mi snang bar gyur
117a3(rnying rgyud): nas kun tu bzang po rang gnas kyi dbang thob nas/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang dbang slar rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po de dag gis 'khor lo bskor bas sems kyi 'bras bu mchog rdzogs
117a4(rnying rgyud): so// rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi man ngag go// ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa po kun tu
117a5(rnying rgyud): bzang po/ chos nyid mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la bsdus nas bzhugs so// de ltar bsdus tsan yang ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang ma grub po// ma grub tsa na khyab pa'i snying rje
117a6(rnying rgyud): chen po phyogs dang ris med par sems can thams cad la skyes so// snying rje chen po skyes tsa na/ snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid du sangs rgyas pa'i rtags chos kyi sku zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar la ldem par gyur to// de ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lha
117a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba yang / don ci yang med pa las ni rdul tsam yang ma g.yos so// ci yang med pa'i rtogs pa rtogs pa'i ye shes shar ro// de nas de nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje sems dpa' hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags pas/ rang byung ye shes shar bas yi
117b1(rnying rgyud): ga'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas so// de bzhin nyid du ci yang ma grub pas/ chos stong pazang mar 'chad pas mtshan nyid the gsu ma rdzogs pa chen po ngal bzlas te 'phags so// de las ma g.yos pa'i snying rje chen pos/ gri yog byams pas phan
117b2(rnying rgyud): 'dogs pa khyab pa'i snying rje la la bzla ba ste// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes kyi nyi ma shar ro// de nas yi ge 'brur bstan pas don kun tshang bar la bzla ste/ hUM du snang ba tsam zhig ma g.yos pa la bzhag go// ma g.yos can yig 'brus don ma
117b3(rnying rgyud): byas pa 'ga' yang med do// yig 'brus don byas pa las ma g.yos par thugs phyag mtshan gyis rig pa'i go gsal lo// des kyang don chos nyid stong pa las ma nyams so// hUM tshig tu glengs pa tsam gyis yi ge'i 'bru tshogs kyi las
117b4(rnying rgyud): kyi bya bar byas te/ 'byung ba khongad bskams nas/ rang rang gi las kyi bya ba'i don rer sangs rgyas pa 'di lta ste// rlung g.yo byed ma g.yos par 'dogs pa chen por sangs rgyas/ nam mkha' mi 'gyur khyab gdal chen por sangs rgyas/
117b5(rnying rgyud): chu sdud pa klong dkyil du sangs rgyas/ sa bstod pa ma bslad par sangs rgyas/ me drod snyom don 'byung du sangs rgyas/ de yang don de bzhin nyid la tshig tu 'phen pas yi ge yin pa 'di lta ste// e yaM maM laM raM/ de nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
117b6(rnying rgyud): lA ma g.yos par 'gyur ba med pas/ de la rin po che ri rab bya bar ming du bta gA ti suM hUM/ de nas chos nyid de bzhin nyid du rgyas btab pas des thams cad yongs su bskyed pas rang la khyab par yod pa la gzhal yas khang zhes tshig tu btags te/
117b7(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shrad+d+he/ de la ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs mang po 'dus pa la/ gyen gyis brgyan po zhes ming du btags te/ ci yang med pa las chu sin ta ngan dang / mu tig gi shar bu dang / rin po che'i chun 'phyang dang / rgyan dang shar bu dang /
118a1(rnying rgyud): gser dang rin po che'i dra ba dang / gser gyi dril bu la sogs pa/ rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin mang po'i mang po/ nyung ngu nyung ngu/ chen po'i chen po/ chung ngu'i chung ngu/ gang la'ang ma g.yos mi snang bar yongs
118a2(rnying rgyud): su khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// gsal zhing thams cad snang ba cir yang ma grub po// mi snang ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos pa'i ye shes kyi nang du byung nas/ gang yang phyi nang med par ma grub pa'i phyi nang du bstan to// gzhal yas de la dbus
118a3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dbus su rgyan med pa'i rgyan nyi zla med pa'i nyi zla skar khung la ma brgyan pa'i mtho khung du mi gsal bar kun mthong bar bstan to// gzhal yas cing pad ma grub pa'o// nang med pa'i phyis bskor ba/ dkyil med pa'i dbus su/ me 'khor ba'i
118a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor los/ de dag thams cad la 'khor te/ rtsis ma bgrangs pa'i grangs bzhi yod pa/ zlum po zur gsum can du bstan to// chos nyid stong pa la gcig kyang ma g.yos shing ma bstan par/ kun gyis mthong zhing rtogs par byas so// 'khor
118a5(rnying rgyud): lo de'i steng min pa'i khri/ gzugs med pa'i seng ge glang po rta dang rma bya nam mkha' lding la sogs pa/ tshig med pa'i ming du btags nas/ don med pa'i rang chung du shar ro// rin po che khri rig pas brgyan pa la ming du btags pa/ dgos 'dod
118a6(rnying rgyud): mi skong ba'i skong ba/ yod pa'i med pa dang / ma chags pa'i chags pa chen po'i pad+mar bzhugs pa med pa'i bzhugs pa'i gdan nyi zla ba zla med pa'i yod pa/ ma g.yos pa'i g.yos pa chen por bstan to// mi bzhugs pa'i bzhugs gnas glo
118a7(rnying rgyud): 'bur dang ba khyams gru bzhi sgo khyud la sogs pa gdan pad+ma dang nyi zla sra sti med pa'i rdo rje'i breg la sogs pa'i mi bzhugs pa'i gdan/ ma bkod pa'i bkod pa/ mi snang zhing rab tu gsal bar snang ngo // de tsam na chos nyid ma g.yos pa'i klong las
118b1(rnying rgyud): rdul tsam yang ma g.yos la/ ma khyab pa dang ma skyes pa med pa'o// de ni kun tu bzang po rang bzhin du ci yang ma grub par sangs rgyas te zla gdod ma nas dag go// de nas gzhal yas khang ci la yang mi bsgom zhing / gang d+ha yang ma khyab pa med par rdo rje sems
118b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' rtogs so// stobs dngos po chos nyid ma grub par grub po// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ gzhal yas khang gi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yid kun tu bzang pos/ ma g.yos pa'i yi ge a
118b3(rnying rgyud): las/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su byung ste/ ming du ma btags pa'i lha grangs dang / tshig tu ma byung ba'i yi ge 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ma 'phros par ma khyab pa med pa 'di ltar te/ dza pra ta Tad Da d+ha D+ha na Na/ ka kha gA g+ha/ tsa tsha da to/ pa pha
118b4(rnying rgyud): ba b+ha/ Sha ya ra la/ nga nya ma au/ sha Sha sa ha/ ak+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ yongs su khyab po// mgayos so// kun tu gtor ro// ma 'phros so// thams cad yig 'brur sangs rgyas te/ tshig dang yi ger ma grub po//
118b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje la sogs par btags pas bshad/ bstan pas bkrol/ snang bas don byas/ med pas skyon grol/ 'phros pas rtog pa gsal/ ci yang mi snang bas rgyas btab po// de nas yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos ston pas ma gsungs
118b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra rang byung ba ni 'di ltar te/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i kra/ AM dzi nA dzig/ stA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ AM A ro lika hA prad+d+he tr-i ka/ lAM dwe Shar tI/ mAM d+hAr+t+ti shwa rI/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ gAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ s+t+r-i hi rA dza ya/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ hrI ha tAM pad+ma pA da ma/ dzi
118b7(rnying rgyud): ru pA Na/ hUM lA s+ya sa ma ya stAM/ d+h+waM mA le sa ma ya hoH/ hrIM gI ti rA go&haM/ aM ni rti rA ga yA mi/ me d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ b+hI ni swa raM thA ya swA hA/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mU shrI ai rA gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+b+ha pi pra be sha/ hU puSh+pe A be sha/ baM dI baM su gai rAM/ ho
119a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa nga / na
119a2(rnying rgyud): gas s+ho/
119a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa med pa bsgom pa chen po'o// gsung yig 'bru dang / su phyag rgya dang / bzlas pa snying po la sogs pa/ so sor bstan pa gcigagi bdag nyi da/ yi ge med pa'i sa med med pa'i kun tu bzang po tshig med pa'i sgra phyag rgya chen po gcig las kyang ma g.yos pa'i mang po bsam gyis mi khyab
119a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nom pa dang / yi ga med pa'i bla ming med pa'i kun tu bzang mo chog med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig las kyang ma g.yos pa'i mang po bsu ma gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i tha ming med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' tshig med pa'i lha phyag rgya man po gcig las kyang ma gas
119a5(rnying rgyud): par me thobs mchis mi thab par bsgom pa dang / yig me pa'i meng med pa'i nasu mkha'i dbye sa sug mchog med pa'i sgra shA na chen po cig las kyang gsos pa dmang po sa ma thos ma khyab par brgol pa dang / yi ga med pa'i ti nga med pa dwa par snang ma tshig med pang /
119a6(rnying rgyud): pA drug+sa d+ha ba na ga cig kyang ma thub bar mang babs ma gyis mi zab par bsgom pa dang / yig myed par rnam pa dpa'i sangs nas sngon rtog medapa rgyagan can pog gakyang ma thub pa bang po bas ma gyis so sa par 'dor pa dang / mi ga pa dmeng med pa na
119a7(rnying rgyud): sngon tshig med pa'i spu phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang mgrub par mang po bsam thos mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ga med pade 'i meng med pa'i mam sngo tshig med pa'i sbu phyag pa pogacig kyang mkhrug pa mang po gas pa kyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yig me tu ming zad pa'i snga
119b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i rtswa ming med pa'i gos dkar mo tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ga med pa na ming
119b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i don yod grub pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i Na ming med pa'i dam tshig sgrol ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang /
119b3(rnying rgyud): yi ge med pa'i ka ming med pa'i sa'i snying po tshig med pa'i sa phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang mgrub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yig med pa'i kha ming med pa'i nam mkha'i steng po chog med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po 'asam gyis mi cha bas
119b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i ga med med pa'i spyan ngas gzigs tshig med pa'i chu phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par yang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i g+ha ming med pa'i phyag na rdo rje tshig med pa'i sgra phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis
119b5(rnying rgyud): khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i tsa med med pa'i lha mo la skye ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang mgrub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i tshe ming med pa'i lha mo mA le ma tshig med po'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis
119b6(rnying rgyud): khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i dza ming med pa'i lha mo gI ti ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i tshwa ming med pa'i lha mo ni d+hi ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam
119b7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i pa ming med pa'i kun tu bzang po tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i pha ming med pa'i sgrib pa rnam par sel ba tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma
120a1(rnying rgyud): grub par ma pe bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i ba ming med pa'i byams pa tshig med pa'i lha phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i bla ming med pa'i 'jam dpal tshig med pa'i
120a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i lha mo gar+b+he mchog med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i de ming med pa'i gshin rje gshed tshig med pa'i sgra phyag ma chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khab par bsgom pa dang /
120a3(rnying rgyud): yig med pa'i nya ming med pal khrob dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa tshig med pa'i du phyag cha chen pa gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yig med pa'i ma ming med pa'i khro bo rta mgrin tshig med pa'i muH gan chen po cig kyang mthub dang mang po bsam
120a4(rnying rgyud): gyis me khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i na med med pa'i khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i sha ming med pa'i yu ma ro langs ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig
120a5(rnying rgyud): kyang mgrub par mang ba bsam gyis mi khab par ba sgom pa dang / yi ge med pade'i ming med pa'i yum mo'am mchog med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i sa med med pa'i khro gnyer mchog med pa/
120b1(rnying rgyud): sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis me khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i ha ming ming pa'i khro mo ral gcig mtshig med pa'i sgra phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i A ming sbed pa'i
120b2(rnying rgyud): lha'i thub pa dbang po badz+ra byin tshig med pa'i sku phyag rngu chen po gcig kyar ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i A ming med pa'i lha ma yin gyi thub pa thag bzang res tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang mdzub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab
120b3(rnying rgyud): par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i i ming med pa'i mi'i thub pa shAk+Sha thub pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i I ming med pa'i byol sor thub pa seng ge rab brtan tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig
120b4(rnying rgyud): kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i u ming med pa'i yi dwags kyi thab pa kha 'bar ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i sku ming med pa'i dmyal ba'i rtsibs
120b5(rnying rgyud): mos kyi rgyal po tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grib par mang po bsam gyis mi theb par bsgom pa'o// zung kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi chud pas dkyil 'khor ba sbed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nus yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bsgoms pa'i nyes pa bshad de/
120b6(rnying rgyud): dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la/ stong pa phyung chad pa rang chung du bsgoms na/ med pa lcag gcig pa'i 'jibs cad de// ji la yang mi sems pa dang di du ba sgoms ma/ ma rig pa'i bla thabs su 'gyur ro// dza la yang mi rtog pa dang chud du bsgoms na/ mtha' chad par lhung ngo // dza la yang
120b7(rnying rgyud): gnas par dang rgyang dung skams na/ ye shes kyi lam dang 'bral lo// ku tu snang pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snying rje rang rlung du rnams na// mnyam pa'i don ma rtogs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ra cung du bsgoms na/ skye shi'i rgyun yod do// chu'i ting nge 'dzin la rig 'bru rang chung ngu skams na/ 'khor ba dang
121a1(rnying rgyud): nus pang 'dram pa/ d+hA du rnamasam gtsun lung gardom pa'i shesu/ na na rung bar byag// yang d+hang du bsgoms sa dang sa pa'i 'dan 'bral na pas gtsug pa pag nga ma dzubatsapa dag nga byo// 'thung ba d+hA dang chu dang bkrams
121a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig tshogs kyi dag ldang ngo // nam mo dang rjed du pa/ mas ni/ ba many+dzu DI dzin// rlung dang myed du bskams na/ lus kyis rnying mdzin lhung // chu rang rjeng dra ba skamasas/ nyo mangs pa'adzin dang mi thal lo/
121a3(rnying rgyud): rlung du bsgoms na/ 'khor ba las 'das pa'i dus med de// me rang rgyung du bsgoms na/ nyan mangs pa las 'grog med do// dr-i rAng d+hAd du ba rnams na/ mu phyogs rteg pa mungaSh+Ta8// gzhas yas khang rang drung ngu ba rnams
121a4(rnying rgyud): ni/ rkyen mangs pa'i gtanag khri bskyed de// rdza zin nan rang rgyud du g+sa sa/ 'dun nags dang 'bral mi shes su// mAtig gi shing byed rlung du ba rnams na/ nga za hU~M gags// don pa rje chan 'byung ring d+hidang
121a5(rnying rgyud): bskams na/ 'dod pas skyeng gzungs par bsgyu // rkyen ci rgyu na pa rnams na/ darigs pa te ga yang du snang // she ba nga na du sa masam ma na pa cig nga pa dra ba dang myed
121a6(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na/ 'di // gas sa na du gzhi gakya byung / thasasad dngas par spyod 'am san/ 'ad te dang / sa rnyed nga ma
