121a7(rnying rgyud): 'angs bgrang ba'i'i mtha maze// 'khang la tu 'i / la ba ma 'ad/ 'bar du ba sems pa su dus masu da'i sa da sa cing bani na
121b1(rnying rgyud): gro la sang smad bkal gyi sdig sbyin no// rin po che'i khri rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin chags kyi sgo mi khegs so// pad+ma'i gdan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'brang ngo // nyi zla'i gdan rang rgyud du bskan/
121b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings ye shes kyi don mi 'char ro// rdo rje'i breg chud du bsgoms na/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin gyi gtan gzhi mi shigs so// tA la'i skye shing dang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod pa la chog shes pa'i dus med do// 'od zer rang chung du bsgoms na/
121b3(rnying rgyud): sems can gyi rtog pa skye'o// 'phro 'du rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bdud kyi bar chad du 'gyur ro// sbal pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bgegs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ngo // kha dog rnam lnga rang rgyad du bsgoms na/ chos nyid du la mi zlos
121b4(rnying rgyud): so/ rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud las/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum dang / gzhal yas khang gi skyon btsal pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de ni yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos sku phyag rgya'i nyes pa bshad do/ b+h+ya
121b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yab kyi sku rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod pa'i rgyu snyed do// yum gyi sku rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ chags pa'i gzhi sog go// sems dpa' brgyad rang rgyad du bsgoms na/ mtshan nyid kyi phyogs dang pha rol phyin pa'i sa
121b6(rnying rgyud): las mi 'das so// sems ma bcad rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod chags kyi chags yul las mi 'das so// khro bo bzhi rang chung du bsgoms na/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i rgyur gyur to// yum bzhi dang chung du bsgoms na/ gdug
121b7(rnying rgyud): ba kyi gzhi sog go// thub pa drug dang chung ngu bsgoms na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i zag ring ngo // yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po dang rgyud du bsgoms na/ rang byung gi ye shes mi 'byung ngo // chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo rang rgyang
122a1(rnying rgyud): dra bskams na/ zla ba med pa ni' ra// rigs pa sangs rgyas dang byung nga bsgoms na/ mdza pa la bar du gyu'o// yum n+ta rang chung ngu ba gams na// ume par byar sprul gyur // phyag mtshan dang rgya dang
122a2(rnying rgyud): snyoms na/ mtshan ma'i rdzas su phung ngo // rdo rje rang chung du bsgoms na/ me long lta bur ye shes las khrul/ 'khor lo rang tung ngu bsgomapa na/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las 'khrul/ zin pa che rang rgyang du bsgoms na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi
122a3(rnying rgyud): sa pas bkral/ pAn byu du skams ni// masor rtog ye shes las 'phrul dul ba rang rlu da du gram pa na/ la shes lapa lathal/ yum rnams kyi zag mtshan thal bu rang rgyang du rnam na/ #
122a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings rnam par dgra pa'i ye shes las 'khrul/ dgra gsum rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ tshul song mgo gsum par s+ye/ lag drug rang rgyud de ba sgoms na/ klu phrag lag mang du ste/ lag gnyis rang rgyung du bsgoms na/ gti mug bya las/
122a5(rnying rgyud): tu pre/ zhabs gnyis rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin pa'i gdos dang mi 'bral/ sku mdog mthing ka rang rgyud ngu bsgoms na/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i klong du skye/ dkar po dang chud du bsgoms na/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'go// ser po dang rgyad du bsgoms na/ yon
122a6(rnying rgyud): na gyi cho ga dang bral// dmar po rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chag pa'i skyon gyis gos so// lja dgu rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ phrin+ta las kyi don ma rtogs so// sems dpa' dang sgo ba yan chad kyi sum dog kyang de bzhin shes par bya'o// phyag mtshan lam mthun pa'i don 'dir bshad
122a7(rnying rgyud): ni/ sems dpa' dang sems ma'i phyag mtshan rin po che gu gsum dang rgyung ngu bsgoms na/ 'dzin chags kyi skyon chags so// ral gri rang rgyang ngu bsgoms na/ phung po'i nad 'byung ngo // pad+ma rang chung du bsgoms na/ chags pa'i gzha

123a1(rnying rgyud): mi shigs/ gamatshan dang rdung ngu ba rloms ma dargyal gyi rlom shigs/ gseg par rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ 'dod chags kyi sgo mi shigs/ bta dang chung ngu ba sgoms na/ gti mug go sgom shigs/ rin pa
123a2(rnying rgyud): tham par d+ha du dom ma/ sa bu ng+ges/ mirje nga / dang pa dAbs / nan pa shigs/ rnarnam par gzhag pa'i phyag ca nga rje da pa rnamasas/ dngos pasdur pa dzunapag 'i da pa rnams
123a3(rnying rgyud): sna yang ni rkyen no// rlud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog gi rgyud las/ sku mug pa'i rtson pasal pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa la// da ni kun tu bzang bas can dang cha lugs kyi nyes pa bshad de/ rigs lnga ya~M ba yum gyi rtswa'i na
123a4(rnying rgyud): dburgyan dang rgyang du bsgoms na/ mya ngan 'das pa'i drin mi rtogs/ sbyin ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshan ma'i sreg chos su 'gyur/ mgu tshe rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ gzung 'dzin gyi thob pa che/ dpung rgyan rang chung du ba rnams
123a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rtog gi shis mi spang / phyag gdu ba dang byed du bskamasamatshan ma'i las la 'grusas// zhabs gdub dang rlung ngu'i rnams nA/ zug gzir gyi ljags sgrog gis b+h+ra ma/ de shang rang chung ngu ba rnams na/ 'bar ba'i
123a6(rnying rgyud): zhugs pas 'dzin/ dang byangs rang chung du bsgoms na/ 'khor ba'i ti ngas/ mams dpa'i skyil mo krung dang drung ngu grom ni/ rtag pa zer thug pa'i rkyen yang / mdam pa'i skyil mo grang rang rdung chu ba skams na/ bsam gtan
123a7(rnying rgyud): nga'i las kyi/ rdorje tshul sa nga rgyad du 'dzin te/ phas kyi na sbyid pa sogs pa'i dbang po ri rmeng nga ba rnams / thung tsho'i 'irjes bye/ thams dpa can pa nga mdun/ mas ma sa
123b1(rnying rgyud): sems ma'i chan dang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod chags chas nyid du mi 'byangs/ khro ba khro mo'i gyan rtags rang rgyud du bskams na/ phrag dag gi rlung 'chubs/ skal dang rgyang du ba sgoms na/ zhe sdang gri me 'bar/ kr-in+dan rang chu dang /
123b2(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na/ gti mug gi gtibs chad/ thod phreng rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'khor ba'i gnas nas mi g.yos so/ thub pa'i rgyan la/ dbu zlum rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nyan thos 'gog pa las mi theng ngo // zhabs rjen dang gyud du
123b3(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'char ro/ chos gos rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ sdug bsngal gyi sgo 'byung ngo // 'phrag phyung rang rgyud du bsgoms ni/ tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba dka'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ chand
123b4(rnying rgyud): cha lugs kyi skyon bsal ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // da ni yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos/ ci yang ma g.yos pa la ni mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mang po bsam gyis mi khyab tsam ni gcig gi ngang las kyang ma g.yos te/
123b5(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i sa bon dran pa dang / sbas pa las mngon par 'chel ba dang rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po/ mi rtog pa'i ye shes shar nas/ hUM b+h+rUM r+b+hu bi shwa badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT/ cesna tshig tu ma brjod pa'i sgras/ snang zhing srid pa'i
123b6(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i klong du rgyas btab par sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas pa'i ngang de las rnam par rtog pa la zhen pa mun pa la sgron me 'od gis pa'am/ bar snang la nyi ma shar ba bzhin mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen por bsgral nas/
123b7(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA na tsa kra dz+wa la maN+Dal hrI/ zhes brjod pas mang po 'dus pa'i dur khrod la/ 'khor ba dag pa'i zhing ngo // 'dod chags zag pa'i khrag gi rgya mtsho dang / rdo rje'i rlung nag 'tshubs ma dang / zhe sdang kong rus kyi ri rab sog kha gyen du

124b2(rnying rgyud): gyi las las mabyung ste/ mnyam parten pa'i klung gi ye shes la/ rang byung gi yo shes mang du byung ba'i rol pa yin par byed de/ de ni rnam sbyin sa na ldang nas/ 'khor ba rje 'azlog pa'i dpa' brtul mo// de can rtogs pa don

124b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyod pa yang rjes su dran no// d+hAd kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyung las/ drug 'dul khro bo'i 'ang ste drug pa'o// / de nas chos nyid mnyam pa 'dus ma byas pa las ma g.yos par/ hUM hA he phaT/ b+ho ru lu Sha9
124b7(rnying rgyud): zhes ma brjod pa'i sgras/ yi ge med pa'i hUM lA/ tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khar gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par byung ba dang / yi ge med pa'i hUMwa/ ming med pa'i he ru ka lA/ tshig med pa'i sku rtsag
125a1(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil la ba ga rdzogah+nAng mthub par yang po pas ma byas ma khyab par byung ba dang / yi ga med pa'i nAH/ ya ma pa d+d+ha shA/ chog med pa'i su phyag cang \u0f7flang la gcig kyang 'thun
125a2(rnying rgyud): par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i nya brgyad/ mid med pa'i ka'i ma btang / chog med pa'i su phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang mgrub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyad par bsgom pa dang / yi ge med pa'i

125a5(rnying rgyud): zab par bskam pa dang / sas kyi ga' she nga dang ma la pa sa pa'i lpags skyes kyang mabadzod pa 'di dag gang grags sa// mA~M ba dz+ra man+ta hrIHd+hak+Sha ma T+Ta sa du rkyeg na ba / oM \u0f89\u0fa4 maHha~M hU~M ga ma
125a6(rnying rgyud): na duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM raN+Da ma hA shrI he ru ka ma bA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA D+ha ka ha na da ha pa tsi hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shI he ra ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA nA kA ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hU~M hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shr-i hi ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa
125b1(rnying rgyud): mAhA tu pa sha d+hA phaT/ sleb ga / bang / bad pa cata/ bar+thag/ d+he/ badz+rab sas / ba b+hUHd+hIH/ ba mA// ba ca swAH/ oM bzlas nas nga/ badz+raT zhe ShaH/ bar+d+ha ga la pa kha~MH/ 'adz+ra sha ras ldaH/
125b2(rnying rgyud): ba kA m+WAny+dzaH/ badz+ra s+yA/ 'a rbag TA/ 'dzug / badz+ras (\u0f7f/ brda la kab/ bang thA pa pa y+ya pAts+tshaH// /
125b3(rnying rgyud): ts+tshad+hIts+tsha dz+dzats+tsha/ ts+tshaSh+T+r-id+hi/ sngags dang snying po rnams sa A wa barba rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bkri zhing mi snang bar gsal lo// de tsam nachos nyid mnyam pa pas mag yos shing 'jig rted rje khangs lha'i da pa
125b4(rnying rgyud): 'kho b+his ma khengs pa med pa la/ don mi byed pa med cing / don bya ba'i rnga yang medado// don byas pa'i mthum rtags pa/ spri sngags 'don pa rnams/ chos nyid la rag mas sa mang rngub zag nas/ bde bachen po'i can du zas/
125b5(rnying rgyud): sdang srid chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pas/ gzhal yas khang la ma brgyan dgus brgyan no// brdal pa chen po'i ye shes shar nas/ mthung dgu zung / ma bkag pa'i rol pa zung bsams pa dgra sbal lo// bdag nyid chen por sangs
125b6(rnying rgyud): nus pas gcig kyang mthang mgrub po// rol pa'i tshe 'phral yin pas/ sku mdog dang lag mtshan can dang cha lugs thams cung mar gasngal la// ye shes la ye shes gsul me dgos pa'i tshul gyis brtsal/ grol mi dgos tshal
125b7(rnying rgyud): ches spyod nas/ spang srid ye rgya chen pos btab bo// rgyung kyi rgyal ma ting nge 'dzin mchog gcung las/ gsung yig 'bru' tsho yul gyis/ bdud btul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / da ni ye shes rgyal po
126a1(rnying rgyud): yas khang gi rtogs pa bshad du/ yi ge hU~M bar nga chung ngu bsgoms na gdug rtsub rgya tshogs su skye'o// drag po'i sngags zer rang rgyung du go na/ bdud kyi spyod pa 'byung ngo // rdo rje'i rlung nag rang rdung ngu gon/
126a2(rnying rgyud): 'phro thugs kyi gnas 'khyim mo// khrag gi rgya mtsho rangab chud du gon/ dmyal ba'i mtshar khri'o// keng rus ring ba dang chung ngu go na/ srin po'i mkhar brtsig go// 'bar ba'i me dpung rang chung ngu go na/ lde phung gi yan lag tshig go// dur khrod kyi
126a3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas dang rgyud du go na/ srin po 'bar bar skye'o// ban+d+ha skab rlon gyi brtsigs pa rang chud du go na/ dbang po 'i sgo lnga'i tshogs 'chad do// gnam lcags kyi zhog gzer dang rgyud du go na/ 'dzin chags kyi sgo rtog mi 'chad do// zhing chen
126a4(rnying rgyud): gyi ka ka dung rang chud du go na/ 'khor ba'i dpyis mi phyin no// mchog chen gyi dral phyam rang chung du go na/ ngan song gi gnas mi sbyongs so// srad gsal gyi zhing gi g.yang gzhi rang chud du gon/ sems can gyi gnas mi stongs so// tshangs pa'i gdung
126a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi rang rgyung dug na/ 'phags pa'i go 'phang nub bo// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rang rgyud du gon/ dmyal ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi gzhi 'dings so// nang dkyil 'khor gyi bar khyams dang / sgo bzhi rang chung ngu go na/ rtag pa'i skyon dang mi 'bral lo//
126a6(rnying rgyud): zhing chang pa'i gdan rang chud du go na/ yi dwags 'dre rigs su skye'o// ngas stan dar stan rang chung ngu go na/ 'jig rten pa'i rtog pa dang mi 'bral lo// chu mchog rang chung ngu go na/ gti mug gi blo 'khyim mo// ma he rang chung ngu go na/ nga rtsal gyi brag
126a7(rnying rgyud): 'chor ro// gzig rang chung du go na/ 'dod chags kyi mcho bskyil lo// rtag rang chung ngu gon/ phrag dog gi rdung ldang ngo // do ma dang krung ngu go na/ zhe sdang gi mo 'bar ro// ru tra bsnol ma rang chung ngu go na/ gdug pa'i sngags zer
126b1(rnying rgyud): 'ching / 'khor ba bskul pa rang chud du go na/ bres skas ni sgo 'gag go// 'od zer gyi 'gro 'dra rang khyung ngu ga na/ bdud kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ngo // mra'i chem rgyang rang rlung dug na/ srid pa'i bskal pa g.yo ba'i sgrib pa 'byung ngo // chags pa'i gzhi sred
126b2(rnying rgyud): cing ma chags pa'i gleng brjod spong ngo // chud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi chud las/ gzhal yas khang gi rtog pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / da ni ye shes rgyal pos khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sku phyag rgya'i
126b3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa bshad de/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sku zhal gsum phyag drug pa rang chung du bsgoms na// las kyi srin par skye'o// gsung nga ro'i yi ge 'brub rkyang rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gsang sngags kyi spong tshal lo// thugs ye shes sems dpa'
126b4(rnying rgyud): rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ rnam par rtog pa'i sdong sogs su 'thung // khro bo dang khro mo rnams kyi spyan dang chud du bsgoms na// rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'gag go// snyan rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ srang lan gyi sgra 'byung ngo // shangs rang chung ngu bsgom
126b5(rnying rgyud): na/ chu 'bras so so'i drir 'khyams so// zhal rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ sems can gyi lhung sar 'gyur ro// mche ba rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ za byed kyi bdud phor 'gyur ro// phyag rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ dngos po ther zug gis
126b6(rnying rgyud): gang ngo // zhabs bzhi rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ phyin ci log bzhi'i gnas 'khyams so// khro bo dang khro mo'i phyag mtshan la/ rdo rje 'bar ba rtse dgu rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ khams gsums dgur ltung ngo // kha T+wAM rang chung ngu bsgoms
126b7(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi lag char 'bar ro// rde'u chung rang chung su bsgoms na/ sku ma'i rdzas su 'gyur ro// dril bu dang chung ngu bsgoms na/ me rtag pa'i rdzas su 'gyur ro// dung dmar rang drung du bsgoms na/ 'apung po khrag 'thung rje sde'o// chu zhags/
127a1(rnying rgyud): rang chud du bsgoms na/ sdig pa'i rgyun mi 'chad do// 'khor lo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ srid pa'i 'khor long 'khyams so// rin po che rang rgyung ngu bsgoms na/ yon tan gyi chags dang 'bral lo//
127a2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dang chung du bsgoms na/ 'dzin chags kyi skyon 'byung ngo // rdo rje cha tham rang chud du bsgoms na/ las kyi dbang bcan du skye'o// stong gi 'jig rten khor yug rang chud du bsgoms na/ rtag pa'i brag brtsig go// ral gri rang
127a3(rnying rgyud): rmad dri bsgoms na/ mtshon gyi bskal pa 'byung ngo // dgra stA rang rgyang du bsgoms na/ srog gi bdud na 'bab po// gshol rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ lce la me 'brang bar 'gyur ro// zhing dbyug rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ 'khor ba'i g.yang
127a4(rnying rgyud): sar lhung ngo // mda' gzhu rang rgyud du bsgoms ni/ bde ba chen po'i thugs dam mi skye'o// chu srin rgyal mtshan rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ stsal ba'i ye shes mi thob/ byis pa za ba rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ sa bdag byis can du skye'o// chu ma 'dren
127a5(rnying rgyud): pa radu rgyad du bsgoms na/ sa bdag nag po chu 'dren du skye'o// khrag 'thung ba rang chud du bsgoms na/ 'byung mo khrag 'thung mor skye'o// snying zab rang rgyad du bsgoms na/ gnod sbyin ma ru cor skye'o// mgo lus 'brel ba rang chud
127a6(rnying rgyud): du bsgoms na/ dur khrod kyi 'dre mor skya'o// zhing stong spang bsnol nas dkrug shing za ba rang tur du bsgoms na/ ne'u le sha zan du ts+yai// zhing gi nang khrol 'dren pa rang kyang ngu bsgoms na/ nag po chu zan mar skye zheng thug pa la bkal ba dang chung ngu bsgoms
127a7(rnying rgyud): na/ mu stegs ro kun tu smra/ zhing 'drad pa rang nyung ngu bsgoms na/ dregs pa sha zan du m+be/ gre thogs pa rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ lus kyi 'jigs pa che/ tir smi nas 'joms pa rang chung bsgoms na/ rnam na
127b1(rnying rgyud): 'chal bar ste/ lcags kyur rang rgyung du bsgoms na/ phung po lnga po 'dzin pa'i rgya las me thar/ zhags par byung du ba sgoms na/ mgo lus dam par 'ab+h+ring / lcags zlog rang krung du ba rnams na/ lnga phung yan lag bsdam/ dril
127b2(rnying rgyud): bu rang chung du bsgoms na/ tshe srog gzhan du sbyod/ dbang phyug ma'i phyag mtshan rab rgyud du bsgoms na/ srin po nu tra'i tshogs bskyed do// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ spu phyag rgya'i rtog pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
127b3(rnying rgyud): de nas ye shes rgyal po des dbu dang rgyan chas kyi rtog pa pa shwad de/ dbu skra ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba dang rgyung ngu bsgoms na/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu skye'o// thod skam gyi dbu rgyan dang chung ngu bsgoms na/ sdug bsngal gyi gzhi sog go//
127b4(rnying rgyud): seng ge'i mgo can rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ lnga phung zil gyis gnon pa'i byol sod seng ger skye'o// stag mgo rang kyang du bsgoms na/ yul rong gi stag tu skye'o// wa mgo rang byung du bsgoms na/ yul gyi mtshal khung gi wa mor skye'o//
127b5(rnying rgyud): spang ki'i mgo can rang klung du bsgoms na/ nags kyi lhang ker sbyor// rgya nod mgo can rang lhung ngu bsgoms na/ rgyu ma tshogs kyis 'gang ngo // kang ka'i mahA rang rgyung du bsgoms na/ dur khrod b+ha du gyi'o// bya rog mgo rang klung ngu bsgoms
127b6(rnying rgyud): bkres skom gyi gnas su 'khyams so// zhag mgo dang rgyung ngu bsgoms na/ shes pa nyin mtshan du 'khrul lo// rta mgo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mi 'am ci'i gling du skye'o// phag mgo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mi can du skyugs
127b7(rnying rgyud): so// dring mgo rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ tsha ba'i drid mor skye'o// srung mgo rang gyad du bsgoms na/ tshig khags chad dbang phyug ma'i mgo rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ byol songs so rang rang gi gzugs su spro'o// khro bo khro mo'i sku'i kun che ring kyang du
128a1(rnying rgyud): dam na/ thug brdal ci dab bstan // stag gag pa thabs dang cang dub rnam san/ phrag dag sa nga 'chubs/ sbrul nag gi rgan po nga rgyang dru brkoms na/ 'asdang gi m+b+ha 'bang / blang tu
128a2(rnying rgyud): ko rnon rang chung du bsgoms na/ gti mug gi shing spyang / zhing chen gyi ga yang gzhi rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ drang khrod kyi bdag por zla/ nag gtsam bu dang rgyung du bsgoms na/ log 'dren gyi kha zas su 'gyur/ khrag gi thig pa rang chung ngu bcom
128a3(rnying rgyud): na/ ma mo'i rngan zas su 'gyur/ thal chen gyi mtshan ma rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ srin po thal ba yod par skye/ bskal pa'i mo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'bras bu mes tshig// b+h+r-i ku Ti gnyer ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gnas kyi drags
128a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gro// rdo rje'i gshog pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ltung ba'i g.yangs che/ zod phreng rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ sku gsum gyi sgo 'gags/ thod skam rang chung du bsgoms na/ chos sku dngos por gol/ thod par ri rang chud du
128a5(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dngos por gol/ drod pa rlon pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ sprul pa'i sku rang rgyad du gol/ sku mdog rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ kha dog lnga'i sgrib pa che/ mthing nag dang rgyud du bsgoms na/ zhe sdang
128a6(rnying rgyud): rang ga ma/ smug nag rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gti mug rang gam/ ser nag rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ dmyal rang ga ma/ dmar nag rang rgyungad du bsgoms na/ 'dod chags rang ga ma/ ljang nag dang chung ngu bsgoms na/ phrag dog rang ga ma/
128a7(rnying rgyud): sngon mo rang chud du bsgoms na/ nam mkhal mtha' la chags mi bslad/ ser mo rang gyud du bsgoms na/ dngos po gser sdong du 'gyur/ dmar mo rang rgyud du bsgoms ra/ nyi ma'i dmar thag chad/ nag mo rang rgyung du bsgoms na/ gleng bar
128b1(rnying rgyud): gyi sman pa 'a khyams// dmangasar rang rgyung du bsgoms na/ nyi ma'i 'od zer drang bros/ ljang gu rang byung du bsgoms na/ lo 'dab kyi rdzas la chags/ ser skya rang chung ngu bsgoms na/ nAm tha'i tshod la lhung / gro mo dang rgyung du bsgoms na/ las dang sdig par gol/ snong
128b2(rnying rgyud): mo dang chung du bsgoms na/ phung po sha'i rnom tshing // dbang thug ma'i sgra ma dog nga chung ngu rnams na/ saMs rang rang gi kha ga dngas pa rnam pacan du m+bu'o// klud kyi rtul ba ting nge 'dzin mchog gtud las// dz+ra bai'i rgyan rgyas kyi rtag pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu po pheM// / da'i
128b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyal po des ta na ga Na'i rtog pa bshad de/ sbyor bar nga rgyud du bsgoms na/ mngal gyi srin bur gyi'o// sgrol ba rang byung dub sgoms na/ las kyi srin par bya'o// yun 'ang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chos nyid kyir mamyong / pad+ma rang krung du bsgoms na/ lhag 'dus pa dang 'gal la//
128b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rdo rje rang kyang du bsgoms na/ rigs pa dpyis ring du mye'o// 'jam dpas rang rgyang ngu ba rnams na/ tsha ba'i nad mi'i chad do// // len pa dang rnyeng du bsgoms na/ smyig gi lan chags 'ong ngo // phung ba dang nyung ngu bsgoms ni/ ngan song gsum gyi gzhi sog go//
128b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dkar dmar rnam gnyis rang chung du bsgoms na/ sems can gyi gzugs su spen no// rmad kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ ta nA ga Na'i rtog pa bshad pa'i le'u// bcu gcig pa'o// / de skad ces yid byed pa po kun tu bza
128b6(rnying rgyud): pos// gyi yad ma gsungs par bka' stsal pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga la ba yum dang / khro'i lha brgya rtsa brgyad kyi'akhor gyis/ rgyud kyi rgyal ba ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud kyi don togs// rgyud kyi rdul po nyi nga 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ 'bras bu
128b7(rnying rgyud): nges par bkod pa rdzogs sa/ de // phrin pas thams cad kyi thu rdzog pas sbyo badrang pa'i byud/ bcom ldan 'angs pas bur chubazang po la phyag brgya ro// bang gags gas pa'idus pa gud/ bcom ldan 'das
129a1(rnying rgyud): yang byed pa par byagasanan thugs papa/ 'dasas na pa da na / 'dus da dag shenas mas na ma pa'on pas kya bas da
129a2(rnying rgyud): ces bame ba de gang bags/ sra ma las ma pas khyo ba gang la nas/ gas ga za kyi nga ma pa/ tshig zin sa na papa skye shi migs/ ba'idzin pa su man pas stong pa gang lags/ bad+hU dzin
129a3(rnying rgyud): las kyi skabs sbyor ba gang lags/ spyod pa'i phrin las kyi skabs sbyor ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sras mchog
129a4(rnying rgyud): dam pa nyon cig/ skabs sgor bdun pa'i rgyud 'di ni/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs shing bshad la gsungs pa yang mi mnga'/ des kyang bshad la bshad pa yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
129a5(rnying rgyud): rtag pa can gyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te/ des na rigs kyi bu phrin las zhes bya ba yang / dmigs su med pa'i man ngag las ma gtogs par/ 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma'i las su bstan pa ma yin te/ de la sgra'i phrin las kyi skabs sbyor ba
129a6(rnying rgyud): 'di yid la zung zhig/ de la sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin pa ni sems can gyi lus la/ sems can gyi lus gang yin pa de ni bdag ste/ bdag gi phung po langs kyang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'gro yang rung / 'grangs kyang rung / gnas kyang
129a7(rnying rgyud): rung / me gnas kyang rung / rol kyang rung ste/ phrin las kyi skabs sbyor nyid du mdzad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus langs na skye ba med pa chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs pa'i sku ste/ don chos nyid du sbyor ba'i phrin las so// lus 'dug na
129b1(rnying rgyud): yum ku tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin dag pa mkha' la bzhugs pa'i s+yA// yab yum du sbyong ba'i phrin las so// lus 'gro na thugs rje chen pos yongs la khyab pas smras pa'i sgra ste/ thabs dang shes rab tu sbyong ba'i phrin las so// lus 'grengs na/ bde chen
129b2(rnying rgyud): longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ yab yum gnyis su med par sbyong ba'i phrin las so// lus gnas na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi smra ste/ gnyis su med pa'i phrin las so// lus mi gnas nam skyes pa'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i sra te/
129b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes chos nyid du dbyer med pa'i phrin las so// lus rol na/ 'chi ba med pa rdo rje'i sku ste/ lus dngos su snang ba thams cad rdo rje'i rigs te/ sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med de/ me long la bu'i ye shes kyi phrin las so// lus thams cad du drin zhing
129b4(rnying rgyud): sdud pa thams cad ni/ rin po che'i rigs te mA ma kI dang gnyis su med de mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phrin las so// lus la drod 'byung ba thams cad ni/ pad+ma'i rigs te gos dkar mo dang gnyis su med pa'i so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi phrin las so// lus
129b5(rnying rgyud): na slod dub tub pa rnams cad ni/ lasas rigs te mchog sgrol ma dang gnyis su med de bya ba nan tan gyi ye zhes kyi phran pas so// sras gzhig na/ rang bzhin med pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgas te/ kun tu bzang ma dang gnyis su med do stong ba na
129b6(rnying rgyud): kyai yo sho kyi sa sa/ de bas na sa su'i phrin las thams cad na yang dag pa'i phrin las la yongs pa med par mang dang / de la 'ang skad ces brjod par bye// gdong nas ma byes rnam dag dbyings kyisra// yongs la khyab pas thugs rje spal pa'is// thabs ma pas
129b7(rnying rgyud): rol pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra// skye shi med pas rdo rje sems kyi sku// don dam togs pas mngon par byang chub sku// gnyis med ga yung drung ba de chen chos kyi smra// sku lnga dbyer med rol pa'i phrin las kyis// don dam phrin las yengs pa med par mdzad// lus kyi/
130a1(rnying rgyud): bskul ba stod thub tu dasngal 'khor la/ U yidzin las cang yang g.yos pa med// ma lus thabs su bstar ba'i gan las skyes// gang zhig bskul ba byung chub dathob nas/ nasrog bcad nyid kyis thad lam bde bcog tu/
130a2(rnying rgyud): skadangs sangs sasu zhing dgrags// sku mngal bas pa rkyen 'dra 'bral ya // steng po thang chub ma bzhag yan \u0f7f// danal 'dus ma thus pa'i ban pa// mthas me la rnams pa phrin las chog/ na dang changs drug bsngal na// da sa
130a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i nadang 'joms pa// 'di yang ske yi phrin las mchog/ bzhes dang sgom pas sdug bsngal na// chos nyid dadangos po mtshan bsgribs pas// 'di yang sa/ ma phrin las mchog/ nas drang chud pas sdug bsngal ni// rtag rjed don gyi mthar sbyor bas//
130a4(rnying rgyud): 'di yang sku yi phrin las mchog/ grang dang 'dar bas sdug bsngal na// mtshan mar zhen pa rang spyong pas// 'di yang sku yi phrin las mchog/ skye dang 'chi bas sdug bsngal na// mi rtag don gyi mthar sbyor bas// 'di yang sra yi phrin las mchog/
130a5(rnying rgyud): bde dang skyed pa'i longs spyod dang // dro dang 'jam pa'i longs spyod dang // ro dang 'dod par longs spyod na// chos nyid don gyi tshor bas// 'di yang sgra yi phrin las mchog/ sgra yi phrin las 'di shes pa'o// rnal 'byor glo ldan gang spyod pa// don la the
130a6(rnying rgyud): chom med par 'azlab// dgongs dang ng+ga dang dras gsum du// 'du 'bral med pa'i phrin las mang // sangs pa med par bsgrub pa'i klong // gang zhig 'di dang mi ldan pa// zang pa'i dus med 'ching bzhin// legs par skyed kyang sdig pa'i shas// bsku
130a7(rnying rgyud): kyang don med ga yang da hU~M// 'di la gang zhig goms byed pas// nyes par spyang kyang rigs pa'i pham// sa bsgrubs par yang grub pa'i ga de do// g.yung dru m+bu yi gter btsugs pa'o// sku ye skabs skyor dang pa'o// / de ni gsu
130b1(rnying rgyud): gislabs sbyar yad la zung nog// de la sangs rgyas kyi gsung gang yin pa sems can kyi g.yon la/ sems can gyi ngag gang yin pa bdag gis slab ste/ bdag gis sgrub brjod gang drang / ma brjod cu dang / bdon par sras kyang drang / rdzun par smras kyang /
130b2(rnying rgyud): rung / snyan par smras kyang rung / mi snyan par spras kyang rung / sba lhang sgang por smas kyang rung / gsang ste shub bur brjod kyang rung / gang zag gi spen tshig tu sbas kyang rung / sran ngag gi chos nyid du brjod kyang drung / 'dod chags kyi sbyor sngags su
130b3(rnying rgyud): brjod kyang rung / bzhad gad kyi bre mo'i gtam du smras kyang rung / zhe sdang gi khro gtum dang byams pa'i gtam ngag tu smras kyang rung ste/ phrin las kyi rgyal po skabs sbyor nyid du mdzad pa ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngag smra zhing brjod na/ skye ba med
130b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos kyi dbyings rum nas/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs su thugs kyis dgongs nas/ mgur gyi bum pa las phyung / sngags kyi dbang po la bkram nas/ snod kyi rim par bsgrags pas/ ngag gsung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phrin las
130b5(rnying rgyud): so// ngag gis ma brjod cing ma blangs na/ gsung chos nyid bden pa'i don la tshig tu ma gsungs pas kyang don go bar bzhed pas/ ma g.yos pa'i chos nyi dkyi gsung la/ skye ba med pa'i gsung cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pas/ ngag gsung brjod pa
130b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las so// ngag gis bden par spyan/ mar khu khol ma'i nang du chu mi gnas pa bzhin du/ chos nyid lardzun gsung du'i mda' ste/ haM gsungs pa don dang ldan pas/ rdzun med pa'i rang bzhin te/ gsung bden pa'i phrin las so/
130b7(rnying rgyud): gis rdzun du sbas shing brjod na/ gsung rab dam pa'i chos kyis nyon mongs par khor ba dang 'dri la/ rdzun dang 'dra ba yin pas/ gsung 'khor ba 'dren pa'i phrin las so// ngag gis snyan par sbas shing brjod na/ chos nyid kyi byin
131a1(rnying rgyud): kyis 'gro bkun gyi yid tshim pa'i rang bzhin pas/ dbang po tsham zhi go bar byed pas snyan par sgrub ste gsung kun dang mthun pa phrin las sa// ngag gis ma snyan par lus shing brjod na/ dper na dang sngang ba nyid kya /
131a2(rnying rgyud): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la// snyan par smras pa nyid ni/ rgyal shes pa che bas/ 'bras bu 'khor bar chags kyis dogs pas mi snyan par brjod pa ste gsung chags pa dang bral ba'i phrin las so// ngag gis sgra lteng lhang sgor brjod na'ang / sgras dbang po
131a3(rnying rgyud): tshim zhing sgra mthar stong pa dang 'dra bar/ chos nyid bye ba med pa'i don gyis pha rol gyi yid tshim par byed cing / chos thams cad da bzhin gyis sku mthang stong ste/ des sgra lhar ljang por brjod pas/ gsung go bar sgrogs pa'i drin las so// ngag gis
131a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ste shub bur brjod de snying po ma yin pa'i snying po yid la bzlas pas/ gsang ste shub bur brjod pa ste gsung gsang ba'i snying po sngags kyi phrin las so// gang zag gis spen tshig tu smras na/ 'dul ba'i dus la gang la bab par gsung ji skad bskur
131a5(rnying rgyud): du rung bas/ don du mi 'gal na ni tshig nyid kyang sgren tshig tu smra ba ste gsung thabs mkhas pa'i phrin las so// man ngag gi chos nyid du brjod na/ chos kyi 'khor lo gsung dbyangs brgya dang ldan pas/ dbang por rab 'bring gsum la ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin
131a6(rnying rgyud): go ba ni chos nyid du brjod pa ste/ gsung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phrin las so// ngag 'dod chags kyi sbyor sngags su brjod na/ thams cad yab yum gyi tshul du sbyor ba'i brda' skad du smra ba ste/ gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin pas/ 'dod
131a7(rnying rgyud): chags kyi sgor sngags su brjod pa ste gsung gnyis su med pa'i phrin las so// ngag bzhad gad kyi bre mo'i gtam dri brjod na/ dgyes pa chen po chos nyid kyi sgra brnyan du bstan pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis bstan pa nyon mongs pa rang gams mi dka' ba med pas/
131b1(rnying rgyud): bzhad gang bro mang gtam du skab ste gsung dgyes brgyan par phran lasas// ngagazhi sdang gA khrag tum dang byams pa'i gtam ngag tu brjod pan/ gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa sran phyung ba dang / chos nyid drug du bre pa'i snying rje bzung bas khrog tum
131b2(rnying rgyud): dang gdams ngag smra ba ste gsung ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du mdzad pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o// de bas man ngag gsung gi phrin las mdzad pa ni/ thams cad chos nyid du phrin las yengs pa med par mdzad pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// rang bzhin
131b3(rnying rgyud): spros bral bde gshegs rnams kyi gsung // brjod med ma skyes ye nas spyong pa'i gzhi// tshig dang yi ga ma brtags mtshan ma med// dngos med ma skyes chos rnams 'byung ba'i mdzod// thabs la mkhas pas yongs la zab par rdzogs/
131b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i don mdzad gsung rab bdud rtsi'i bcud // ma rig log rtog kha lo gyen la bsgyur// dam pa chos kyi yon tan brjod mi langs// ji snyed brjod pas gsung rab rgya mtsho ste// theg pa'i bye brag bro la snang bar 'gyur// don 'di gang zhing / bla la 'chang
131b5(rnying rgyud): dang // nges par sems la gsal ba'i rnal 'byor des// ji snyed brjod pa chos kyi sgo mo la// pha rol gzhan gyis shes pas grol ba yis// gsung rab don dang ldan pa rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig 'di dang ma ldan chos sgrub// bden par sbas kyang pha
131b6(rnying rgyud): rol mi go ste// dper na rgyal po ma yin dmangs rnams kyis// bden par smras kyang nyan pa med pa ltar// 'di dag me shes rnal 'byor gzhan rnams kyis// don dang ldan yang gang yang 'dral ba med// zhal nas ci gsungs gsung rab bdud rtsi la/
131b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan la co brjod man ngag ston pa'i mchog/ tshig gi sgra ska bye med chos kyi dbyings// don gyi bdan pas ngar 'dzin rtag pa med// lung dang ldan pas brjod pa don gyi dbang // bla ma'i wang las byung ste bstan par bya'o// 'di dang mi rjen chos /
132a1(rnying rgyud): ra rgya/ pA// du mchos nyams pa'i chur 'gyur ro// bshad kyang don med ga yengs pa'i na// 'di ltar rtogs nas gang sgrub// log bang bstan grang nges pa'i lung // spros pa med pa'i chos mdzad de// man ngag bdud rtsa' char /
132a2(rnying rgyud): phab pa'o// gsung gi skabs sgor gnyis pa'o// / da ni thugs kyi phrin las kyi skabs sbyor 'di yid la zung zhig/ de la sangs rgyas kyi thugs gang yin sems can gyi yid la/ sems can gyi yid gang yin pa bdag gi sems te/
132a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gis bsams kyang rung / ma bsams kyang rung / yid la dran yang rung / ma dran yang rung / nyon mongs pa lnga'i sems skyes kyang rung / ma skyes kyang rung / bzang por bsams kyang rung / ngan par bsams kyang rung / gtsang bar
132a4(rnying rgyud): bsams kyang rung / mi gtsang bar bsams kyang rung / dga' bar bsams kyang rung / mi dga' bar bsams kyang rung / skye bar bsams kyang rung / 'chi bar bsams kyang rung / rung bar bsams kyang rung / mi rung bar bsams kyang
132a5(rnying rgyud): rung / skyes par bsams kyang rung / bud med dang ma ning la sogs pa 'gro ba rigs drug tu bsams kyang rung / ma bsams kyang rung / gzugs dang kha dog la sogs pa yul dang dbyings su bsams kyang rung / ma bsams kyang rung ste/
132a6(rnying rgyud): phrin las kyi rgyal po skabs stor ba nyid du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid la bsams na/ chos nyid kyi klong na rig pa'i ye shes ma brjod pa'i dgongs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa ste yid rnal 'byor gyi dgongs pa la bzhugs pa'i phrin las so//
132a7(rnying rgyud): yid kyis ma bsams pa 'dzin rtog med pa'i shes rab kyis rang bzhin byung tshor spong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i rol pa ste rnam par mi rtog smra bsam brjod las 'das pa'o// yon ces sgo ma btags/ med ces skur pa ma btab/ ci la yang sems kyis//
132b1(rnying rgyud): mi rtog pa'i sgo nas phrin las so// yid dam sems kyis dran na rang byung gi ye shes btsal ba med par rang byung ba ste/ mtshan ma med pa las mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings bye bragaskye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du sems la ci dran snying rje chen po'i
132b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin te/ snang la rang bzhin med la phyogs dang ris med par khyab pas/ de tsam nu phyogs dang ris su ma bzung bas thugs kun snang gi dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems la nyon mongs pa lnga'i sems skyes na/ nyon mongs pa nyid rgyu'i byang
132b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi rtsa ba ma nor ba ste/ sems 'dod chags na chos nyid spros pa med pa blo la snang ba'i 'dod chags pas/ gsung byang chub sems kyi rgyu/ sems zhe sdang na rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma mi gnas par sun 'gyin pas/ thabs mkhas
132b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhe sdang yin pas/ thugs byang chub sems kyi chu/ sems gti mug na/ gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa mgo rmongs shing mi gnas par/ gti mug pas sku byang chub sems kyi rgyu/ sems nga rgyal na/ che ba'i yon tan gang gis kyang
132b5(rnying rgyud): dpag gis mi langs pas/ gang gi dbang du mi gtang bas/ yon tan byang chub sems kyi rgyu/ de nyid rgyu 'bras kyi don mi dmigs pa'i ye shes shes rab kyis zin pas/ thugs ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems de ltar ma skyes na gleng
132b6(rnying rgyud): brjod kyi bsam pa ril dang bral bas/ thugs thig le chen po'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems kyis bzang por bsams na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ye shes dang mdzad spyod la sogs pa blta bas mi ngoms pa'i don bzang po// gsal la/
132b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs par snang la dang bzhin med pas/ thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems kyis ngan par bsams na/ ngan pa nyid kyang rgyu nas bdas pas bzang po la/ bzang po nyid kyi 'bras bu nas ded pas ngan pa la drug
133a1(rnying rgyud): pas/ de yang gnyis su med pas thugs mnyam pa nyid dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems kyis me gtsang bar bsams na/ mi gcad pa nyid kyang gtsang ba gtsang ba yang dag par shes pas/ ma gcang pa nyid dun
133a2(rnying rgyud): che ba yin pas/ thugs kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa'i in d+hA hA s+ho// de ltar dbang thob pa la mi dga' bas/ de yang tha mi dad pas thugs gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems skye ba yang bsam na rang bzhin med pa las skyes pas/
133a3(rnying rgyud): skyugasu thugs su byin gyis brlabs pas/ thugs byin gyis pa sgrims pa'i tsho 'phrul du dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems 'chi bar bsams na/ 'gyur ba med pa chos kyi sgra gyi dngos po dang mtshan ma thams cad ma skyes par 'chi bas/ thugs
133a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku'i phrin las so// sems rung bar bsams na/ thams cad du gsal la mi bsgrib pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul bas/ thugs ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul du dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems kyis mi drang bar bsams na yang /
133a5(rnying rgyud): tshig cad sog/ so de las mi zhan pas/ thugs dbyer med pa'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems kyis skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems su bsams na/ sems can gyi gzugs nyid sangs rgyas yin la/ 'gro ba
133a6(rnying rgyud): rigs drug dang ye shes drug dang rigs lnga rang yin pas/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du dgongs pa'i phrin las so// sems kyi spyod pa bsgom du bsams na/ ma bskyed kyang rtogs pa la tshang bas/ thugs bskyed bsgom dang bral ba'i dgongs/
133a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las so// sems gzugs dang kha dog la sogs pa yul dang dbyigs su bsams na/ mya khyon dpag tu med pa'i gzhal yas khang rgyan dang kha dog gis brgyan pa'i rang bzhin pas/ thugs ye nas ldan gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas
133b1(rnying rgyud): khang du dgongs pa'i phrin lasas// sems kyis ma bsams na/ gzhi nyid snying po byang chub kyi rang bzhin la/ ye nas byas zin pa la thugs btsal ba med cung / brgyad bsgom dang bral bas dgongs pa phrin las so// de bas na lang
133b2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi phrin las ni/ thams cad du ye shes kyi phrin las lus yengs pa med par mdzad do// de la 'di skad rjes brjod par bya'o// rang rig ye shes bde gshegs rnams kyi rdugs// mi brjed ma yengs don gyi snying por rtags/
133b3(rnying rgyud): rang rig gros bral 'dzin med ye shes la// thabs mkhas bde chen byang chub sems rnams 'byung // thugs rje chen pos yongs la khyab par mdzad// 'gro ba'i don rtogs thugs kyi phrin pas ni// mun pa'i sgo skye kha lo gyen du bsgyur/
133b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes thugs kyi yon tan brjod mi langs// ci ltar dgongs pa ye shes rgya mtsho ste// dgongs pa'i man ngag yid la snang bar 'gyur// nges pa'i don 'di gang zhig rtogs pa dang // don la goms pa'i skyes bu chen po des// ci ltar bsams/
133b5(rnying rgyud): kyang dgongs pa'i klong du 'gyur// sems can gzhan gyi don kyang byed par nus// yang dag don dang ldan par rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig 'di dang mi ldan thugs dgongs pa// don du bcos kyang shes par mi 'gyur te// dper na tshangs pa
133b6(rnying rgyud): ma khyen dran rnams yin// legs par sdud par nyes par gyur pa dag/ 'di ltar matogs gang zag gzhan rnams gis// gzhung du bsgoms kyang gang yang 'grub pa med// sems la ba dran dgongs pa'i rgya mtshal// gzhan gci bas mdza
133b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor dgongs pa'i bral// sems kyi dran togazig po spros pa med// don gyi dgongs pas phyogs de rtog pa spangs// bka' dang 'tshams par brjod pa don du 'gyur// ston pa'i bka ngam nga ste bshad par bya'o// 'di da ma ldan pa
134a1(rnying rgyud): sras bsgom/ tshwa chad ltung bar gyur 'gyur na// bsgoms kyang ngan mdag yangs par rgyu// 'di ltar rtogs nas grang ba rnam pa// 'gu par bsams sadangs pa sa// ngan tu bzung ba'i thugs nyan
134a2(rnying rgyud): la// sems kyi dgongs pa mthar phyin pa'o// thugs kyi skabs sbyor gsum pa'o// / da ni lta ba'i phrin las kyi sbubs sbyor 'di yid la zung zhig/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi lta ba nyid sems can gyi yid du gcod la/
134a3(rnying rgyud): sems can gyi yid kyang sangs rgyas kyi lta bar yangs pa/ bdag cag gi lta ba chos thams cad la/ yod par blta yang rung / med par blta yang rung / bde bar blta yang rung / sdug bsngal du blta yang rung / rtag par
134a4(rnying rgyud): blta yang drang / mi rtag par blta yang rung ste/ phrin las kyi skabs sbyor nyid du mdzod pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad yod par blta na/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par yod par blta ba'i chu/ rnam par dag pa'i phyen
134a5(rnying rgyud): las so// lta bas chos thams cad med par blta ba/ bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas pa la/ ngan song 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ye nas med par blta ba'i 'bras phra rnam par dag pa'i phrin las so// lta bas chos
134a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad la bde bar blta ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gser du 'gyur na/ rdo btsal gyis mi rnyed pa bzhin/ lha ma rgyal po 'di la sdug bsngal myed cing / thams cad du legs pa'i rang bzhin pas/ ci ltar snang ba bde bar gyur pa
134a7(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i klong du gnas pa'i phrin las ngalte bas chos thams cad la sdug 'jal du bldan/ bcos pa med pa gsung rdung du lta pi las ma gtogs pa/ zin chags dang rtsol bgru ba sdug bsngal bas/ lta ba gdeng su phur po'i zin
134b1(rnying rgyud): las so/ lta bas chos thams cad la rtag par blta na/ sra shi 'pho 'gyur med pa'i chos kyi sku de ni/ dus gsum du 'pho 'gyur med par rtag pas/ lta ba ma yengs pa'i phrin las so// ta bas chos thams cad 'chad par ba
134b2(rnying rgyud): na/ dngos po dang mtshan ma rgya dang 'gras bu la sogs pa rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i dang du mi gnas ltar chad pas/ lnga pa mngon du gyur pa'i phrin las so// don ldan bka' las bkrol te bshad par bya'o// 'jig rten med par gang bsgrub/
134b3(rnying rgyud): 'di yang blta ba'i phrin las yin// 'pho 'gyur med par gang blta ba// 'di yang lta ba'i phrin las yin// skye shi med par gang blta ba// 'di yang lta ba'i phrin las yin// bya btsal med par gang blta ba// 'di yang blta ba'i phrin
134b4(rnying rgyud): las yin// yungs dog med par gang blta ba// 'di yang lta ba'i phrin las yan// rgyu 'bras med par gang blta ba// 'di yat+na lta ba'i phrin las yin// thams ca dang yin gang shes pa// 'di yang lta ba'i phrin las
134b5(rnying rgyud): yin/ lta ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' che// yongs la khyab cing dgas pa med// phyogs la brtul zhing dogs pa med// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa// de ni lta ba'i byin las yin// 'di dang mi ldan skye bo rnams//
134b6(rnying rgyud): ci ltar bltas kyang dogs pa'i lam// don gyi shes pa 'byung bar dkon// 'di ni 'dren pa'i lam mchog tu// rgyal banyid gyis snying par gsungs// 'di 'dra zhes bstan dka' ba'i b+hair/ lta ba'i skabs sbyor bzhi pa//
134b7(rnying rgyud): da'i bslab pa phrin las kyi skabs sgor 'di yid la zung zhig/ de la sangs rgyas kyi bsgrub pa gang yin pa/ sems can gyi rtsol ba yin la/ sems can gyi rtsol ba nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi bsgrub par 'gyur pas/ spu dang phyag kyar bsu
135a1(rnying rgyud): byu/ nub sgrubs kyang dang / bsgyangs pa zin las rtags kyang nga / mdzugs kyang dang / bslabs pa ldan las kyis bas spyod nying dum dang rtswa kyang byed zhan/ don 'ad gyur btud da chu
135a2(rnying rgyud): dang phyag rgyar bskabs na/ sku dang brag tu la sogs pa thams cad byung yang bdag nyid las byung la/ chos thams cad kyang bdag nyid kyis thob par rang la rang chas su yod pas/ bslab pa'i gzhung ma nor ba'i phrin las so// bsgrubs par
135a3(rnying rgyud): phrin las rdzogs ni rig pa'i klong du gyur pa la/ las dang bya ba tshang zhi don dang man ngag rdzogs pas bskyab pa thogs chags med pa'i phrin las so// bsgrubs pa'i phrin las mdzegs na/ don gyi man ngag nang nas shar ba la/ gnyis su
135a4(rnying rgyud): med cing rtsol ba las ma grub pas/ ma rtogs su zad pas/ bskyab pa btsal du med pa'i phrin las so// bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i don yin pas/ shes pa gdengasu chud/ rig pa nang nas gas la/ man ngag nges par thob
135a5(rnying rgyud): pas/ bsgrub pa mthar phyin pa'i phrin las so// bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub ma thob na/ ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub la/ grub kyang gzhan du ma spangs la/ ma grub kyang med cing lus pa'i chu med pas/ bslab pa tshang zhing rdzogs
135a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las so// de pas na brlabs pa'i phrin las dus gsum bu yengs pa med par 'grub pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// bslabs pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'/ tshul 'chang gzhung las kye ste bshad par bya'o//
135a7(rnying rgyud): rgyu nyid dgang gang bsrub pa// 'di yang sgrub pa'i phrin las yin// rtsol ba sgrub med par gang bsgrub pa// 'di yang sgrub pa'i phrin las yin// ma bcol bzhag pas gang bsgrub pa// 'di yang sgrubs pa'i phrin las yin// bcos
135b1(rnying rgyud): mang dang por gang bslab pa// 'di yang sgrub pa'i phrin lngas yon// mnyam pa nyid du gang bsgrub pa// 'di yang sgrub pa'i phrin las yin// thig le chen por gang bsrub pa// 'di yang sgrub pa'i phrin las yin// ma bka
135b2(rnying rgyud): klong ru gang bsgrub pa// 'di yang srub pa'i phrin las yin// kun tu bzang por gang bsgrub pa// 'di yang sgrub pa'i phrin las yin// bsgrub pa'i rgyal po stsol ba yang // thams cad bslabs pas thams cad 'grub// grub tsam
135b3(rnying rgyud): nyid na grub pa med// bsrub pa med tsam rdzogs kyang rdzogs// snying po byang chub bcos med pa'i// rku 'bras med pa'i dngos grub 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub nyid kyis mkhyen// gang la phyogs cher bstan pa 'di// de ni bde gshegs snyed
135b4(rnying rgyud): min// don dang mthun pa'i rnal 'gror pa// don la the tshom med pa'i blos// sngags pa blo ldan 'di ltar bsgrub// de ni nam mkhar 'gro zhes bshad// pha dang ma la sogs pa dang // bu dang chung ma gang yin pa// yid dong nags
135b5(rnying rgyud): gnas med de// rtog pas bskal la bsgrub pa brtsam// byang chub snying por 'grub ces bshad// de skad ces ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
135b6(rnying rgyud): 'das pha ma ba sogs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga'i las de/ bsgrub pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa de/ oM ma ho ngo mtshor grags na zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dbang pha ma rig pa dang / ma 'dod
135b7(rnying rgyud): chags dang / bu snying rje dang / chung mnyon mongs pa dang / yid 'ong gnyen sdug rtag chad rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis mi gnas pas ni// ma skyes pa nyid yid rang byung du bsgral na/ snying po byang chub sems kyi don ma nor bar rtogs pa yin te/
136a1(rnying rgyud): ngas na 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// rnal byur rtog pas bsgrub pa na/ pha ba// la ma bsgral gdung nas dag/ chung ma bu bsgral rnam tog med/ yid 'ong gtan bskal pa dbu thug gags
136a2(rnying rgyud): mam nga rjo pa yang sa myor gyi dbum tsha/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu thag mi ring // goms pa'i ye shes sus spyod pa/ spyod pa don dang mi 'gal ba'i phrin las so// spyod pa nang gi sems dran rtsol du mi spyad na/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i don gyi ye shes smras kyang ma
136a3(rnying rgyud): b+has ma bcos pas/ rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i don la spyod pas/ spyod pa rtsol bsgrub dang bral ba'i phrin thos so// spyod pas thams cad la gnyis su med par spyod na// phyi'i yul dang nang gi sems gnyis su med pas/ stong phyi'i zhing nang
136a4(rnying rgyud): gi sems dang / gyi'i yul gnyis su med pas ma bcos pa/ da yang gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems su lun gyis grub pas/ 'du 'bral med pa'i klong de nyid 'dus ma byas par spyod pas/ spyod pa mthar phyin pa'i phrin las so//
136a5(rnying rgyud): spyong pa gnyis su med par mi spyod na/ yin spang chen pa la/ bcol panan tan du 'gyur bad/ dngal chu 'brus gang la yang dag ma lus pa'i don du len pas/ spyod pa ma yongs par grub pa'i phrin las sa// de bsan spyong ba'i phrin
136a6(rnying rgyud): lus ni/ thams cad du bde ba chen po'i gyen gyis longs spyod spyod pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// stong pa'i rgyal po bde gshegs rnams kyi las// rdul gror thugs kyi sgom phre dam pa las// nges par gsal ba'i
136a7(rnying rgyud): mig sgo phye nas// rgyal ba'i bka' las phyung ste bshad par bya'o// phri nang chos rnams thams cad la// dmigs pa med par gang spyod pa// 'dir yang spyod pa'i phrin las yin// 'khor ba'i las rnams thams cad la// rtogs dang
136b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pas gang spyod pa// 'dir yang spyod pa'i phrin las yin// bdag dang gtan du snang ba rnams// gnyis su med par gang spyod pa// 'dir yang spyod pa'i phrin las yin// phyogs dang ris su snang ba rnams// gnyis med rgyal por
136b2(rnying rgyud): gang spyod pa// 'dir yang spyod pa'i phrin las yin// las rnams sangs rgyas las yin pa// spyod pa sangs rgyas nyid du spyod// rol pas thabs dang shes rab la// 'dod pa thabs kyis longs spyod pa'i// spyod pa gnyis su med
136b3(rnying rgyud): par spyod// de bas rnal 'byor rdzogs ldan gyis// spyod pa'i phrin las brtsams so// hUM rang gi sems nyid gdod nas ma dag na// phyog su tsam bsgom pas dag mi 'gyur// chos nyid bcos med ye nas yin shes na// de bzhin nyid
136b4(rnying rgyud): kyi ting 'don ma bsgoms gsal// thabs kyi rtsa bar snying rjer ma shar na// 'phral du phyogs chas yongs la khyab mi 'akur// gdal ba chen po'i blo yis spyir khyab na// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin ma bsgoms gsal// rgya nyid dag pa'i don nyid
136b5(rnying rgyud): sasu
136b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i sku mi rdzogs// shes rab pha rol gyin par dbyer med na// snying rnga'i yus mchog thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// sems kyi dbang phyug 'dod dbur bskur ba ma shes na// 'phral du thabs kyi ye shes wa yi dbang ma chags
136b7(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi phyogs bcur dbang bskur bas// ya 'byams chen po'i dbang mchog ma lus rdzogs// bde ba'i gyen thapas thig ler ma brlabs na// 'phral du dgongs pas su gsung thugs ma rlob// ra'i thung bde bas khams gsum byin rlabs
137a1(rnying rgyud): pas// swA gsum sbyin rlabs cho 'phrul rang bzhin chang // yid kyi mchod pas stong gsum mkhyab na// 'phral du yud tsam pang brnyad ma 'gyur// yongs la khyab pa'i mnyas pa rkun med na// mchod pa'i
137a2(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul don du ma bsgoms tshang // dgongs pa yid k+Shi ting 'dzin ma gsal na// 'phral du 'gro 'dus rig pa'i lha mi gsal// chos nyid rang gsal don gyi gting gon// ting nge 'dzin mo tshwa bstsal ma bsgoms gsapa// don gyi bsnyen pa khong nas
137a3(rnying rgyud): ma shes na// 'phral du mtshan mar brjod pas grub pa min// yid kyi bzlas brjod dus dang rdzun med na// rnal 'byor bsnyen pa'i cho ga yang dag rdzogs// rnam smin las kyis bdas pa'i srin po dang // nyon mongs 'dum gnas 'khor ba'i rdu
137a4(rnying rgyud): nams// rtogs dang ldan pa'i lta bas ma btul na// mtshan mar bsgoms pas rtog pa'i gnas mi 'grongs// rnal 'byor rnams la don du 'di ltar bde// ma skyes kyi na thams cad gsal bar rigs// dngos pa med pas 'di dag brtul
137a5(rnying rgyud): ba d+has// zhan chags che bas ma zhag bskal bar bya // log pa dag pa'i dan rjes tu byung / bu 'bras bslabs grang ba rdag gsum blangs// nyon myongs cad brdzung // dgangs par kya 'a nags pa pasod
137a6(rnying rgyud): du gcig/ nam mkha'i mtha' ltar kun tu thug pa med// skye med byang chub sems ni yan du khye// mtha' la thug pa med cing dbyings las g.yos pa med// chos sku 'gyur med dus gsum slong na bzhugs// byang chub nyid de don du 'khrul pa med//
137a7(rnying rgyud): ma bcos thig le dur khrod gcig tu 'khyil// rtag chad mtshan mar ma yin slong nas bdal// 'du 'bral med pa'i byang chub sems chen po// bde ba chen po 'drod ni nyams su myong // mi gyo mi 'gag klong du phrin las rdzogs// thig le dang
137b1(rnying rgyud): ni dbyings su gsal// rnam shes dgra ni klong na 'gro// te ru dgu ni rol pa mdzad// ye shes dgu ni mya ngan 'das// thag pa dgra ni don la gsol// phrin las dgra ni mkha' la rdzogs// lung chen dgu ni bka' las bkrol// zla gam dgu ni yum/
137b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings// snang gsal dgu ni rig pa'i gdeng // dag go byas bu chen po'i rtsa// rdo rje la yang nyid sbyor nas// rang gi don du bsgrubs pa'i lha// gzhan na sangs rgyas gnyis med pas// dus gsum rgyal bas 'di bsngags pa'o//
137b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyi// sangs rgyas sbed pa khyad par che/ tsaM ltar sbeng thang don dang mthun// 'dren pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
137b4(rnying rgyud): kyis/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa ma rtogs pas/ las dang spyod pa thams cad 'khor ba'i nAr gol bas/ rnal 'byor pa gsar bus don ma rtogs pas the tshom za ba la/ gang zag ras chong mkhan gyis bkang
137b5(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log tu bslang / rgya 'bras phyog par khrid/ drag shul gyis btson thabs lnga ston pa 'jig rten gyi sgron mas kyang ma thulaM/ nga tshul gyi btsan tshig la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang ma zhe/ gti mug gi che dgA la zhi ba chos kyis kyang ma
137b6(rnying rgyud): grol ba/ la ba mad pa'i ras tshong/ dam tshig nyams pa'i gzu lum/ spyod pa rtsing pa'i tho tsha/ man ngag med pa btsan stong / snying rje med pa'i brtson stsol/ thar pa'i lam nub cing bden pa'i shan shor po'i gang zag srin gro 'a spod pa byad rnams dang /
137b7(rnying rgyud): por thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir/ hU~M ta he phaT b+h+yo// de nas drag pos 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ gutra he ru ka rung tshal ba ha na tan hU~M phaT/ de nas mngon spyod kyis 'dul ba'i phyir/ ku t+ya du d+ha mA ra ya pra thAtrAn pra we sha ya swAhA/ de nas rnam shes
138a1(rnying rgyud): d+hu/ de nas phung po hU~M/ de nas dug gsum phaT/ de nas stabs 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ zhi zhi de ma mA A/ de nas don dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang por gang yin nga yin pa/
138a2(rnying rgyud): nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi yab// bar du thams cad ngas spyod pas// da ni thams cad kun gyi rje// tha mar thabs kyis ngas 'dul ba// da ni rnal 'gyor yongs kyi dpon// lams gsum dag nang dbang che// nga yi gong na su yang med// sr-id
138a3(rnying rgyud): gsum chad ltar phab kyang nga mi 'chi// khams gsum chu ltar 'brug kyang nga mi 'khyer// rgyud drug me ltang 'bar kyang nga mi 'tshig/ stong gsum rlung ltar 'phyo yang nga mi bskyod// dug gsum mun ltar 'jibs kyang nga mi 'thom// ye shes
138a4(rnying rgyud): nyi ma shar yang gsal chu med// ma rig mun pa byung yang gnag rgyu med// skye shi res su bcad kyang 'ching ba med// nyon mongs dug gsum gnas kyang yengs pa med// dngos grub rnam gsum yin yang chags pa med// chos su 'gyur
138a5(rnying rgyud): med 'grub kyang btsal ba med// dang byung nyid du gnas pas ngag mi lus// snying po lhun gyis grub pas rten mi bcang // rnal 'byor spod pa'i phrin las ni// dang po tha ma med pa la// yengs pa med pa'i las spyod pa// 'di ni phrin las dang
138a6(rnying rgyud): po'o// yid kyis shes pa gsal btab nas// gsang chen nges pa'i don rig pa// 'di ni phrin las gnyis pa'o// rnal 'byor bla ma blo ldan la// lung dang mthun pa'i don bstan pa// 'di ni phrin las gsum po'o// gzhan yang phrin
138a7(rnying rgyud): las 'di spyod pa// chung 'di nyan par gang byed pa// snod kyi rim pa 'di dag go// dang por dad pa'i yon gyis bsten// bar du slob dpon mig ltar khur// tha mar man ngag gting nas nos// lta ba'i man ngag gdeng du tshud// sgrub pa'i
138b1(rnying rgyud): mnang ga phul du sbyin// skad pa'i mnang ga gzhung du spyad// mtshan nyu dang tshul bzang la shes// yangs la phyug yangs dag pa med// kun dang mthun la phu du la lagasal// rang shas bsnyungs la gzhan ma spyad// dam laganas/
138b2(rnying rgyud): shing bsrugal bcan// go yo med khang rkyen rnam par spong // bkang bzhin byed dang don dang mthun// 'di dag bshad pa'i snod yin no// snod med rnams kyi rim pa ni// don med khyod la bshad par bya'o/ dang po da dra pa'i gzhung med pas/
138b3(rnying rgyud): dbul bar mi dga' gzhan yang sdom// man ngag lung med gzhog slong byud// don pa'i bka' med yug sa'i tshig/ khe dang grags pa'i mtshan nyid pas// bla ma bkur bar mi sems shing // rang nyid che 'dod tshul 'chos byed// bka' ba mi nyan
138b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor kun bsgyur// phan pa med pa'i tshig rnams kyis// thogs po rnams kyi zhi gcod cing / bsnyen bsgrub rtsol ba ma byas par// mkhas par 'chos nas gzhan la smod// gsang ba'i bka' 'tshal yongs su 'khyams// man ngag gsang
138b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzag rgyal pa btang // mtshan nyid ngang tshul ngan pa der// 'di dag bshad kyang go mi 'gyur// khams la sogs stong nang du// seng ge'i 'o ma bzhos pa ltar// snod sdang chag la bkrung kyang 'gro// de bas rin chen stod nang du//
138b6(rnying rgyud): bcud mi pa bar gnas pa bzhin// bka' bzhin mi ldan rnal 'byor pa// bka' gsang yul du bstan mi rtse// nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur 'ichog par nges// de bas sdod dang ldan pa yi// don mA~M gter du 'di bcang ngo // 'di ni spyod pa'i phrin las
138b7(rnying rgyud): te// 'jam por spyad na zhi ba'i las// mang bar sprad na rgyas pa'i las// kun gyi bzlums na dbang gi las// drag por sbed na mngon skrod las// ma pyad bzhag na chos nyid las// spong ba'i phrin las mthar rdzogs pas// 'di ltar spyod
139a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las yin// spyod pa'i rgyal po bde ba yin// kun la rol cing thams cad 'grub// phyongs su spyod cing yengs pa med// stong dang mthun pas thams cad 'grub// spyod pa 'di la gang gnas pa//
139a2(rnying rgyud): de ni mi 'ching grol bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa yis// nges pa'i gzhung du de 'gyur ro// 'di dang mi ldan gang zag rnams// ci ltar spyod pa log pa'i lam// thar pa'i dus med 'o dod 'bod// 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i
139a3(rnying rgyud): log pa'i cho sa// mnar med nyams par der 'gyur ro// de la dngos grub 'byung bar dka'// byas pas nor bas 'khrul pa'i chos/ shin tu mtha' dang spong bar dka'// glang chen 'dam du zhugs pa bzhin// yan phag g.yab pas kyi phyir
139a4(rnying rgyud): na// 'di 'dra mi shes glen pa yis// dpyad cing btsal kyang phyi phyir dam// de bas rnal 'byor skal ba bzang // thams cad kun gyi snying po mchog/ ston pa nyid kyis 'di bsngags pas// snod ngan rnams la mi bstan pa'i// spyad
139a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i skabs sbyor drug pa'o// // da ni dam tshig gi skabs sbyor 'di yid la zung zhig/ de la sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gang yin pa sems can gyi sdom pa yin la/ sems can gyi sdom pa gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig yin te/
139a6(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig bsrungs kyang rung // ma bsrungs kyang rung / nyams kyang rung / ma nyams kyang rung / shes kyang rung / mi shes kyang rung ste/ phrin las kyi rgyal po skabs sbyor nyid du mdzad pa de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
139a7(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar te dam tshig shes na/ dam pa ni sangs rgyas des zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas/ dam tshig chos rnams sgrogs pa'i srin las so// dam tshig 'di dag ma shes na/ yang dag pa ma nor ba'i chos nyid de ni/ tshig dang yi ger bri ba
139b1(rnying rgyud): las 'das pas/ dam tshig chos nyid kyi phrin las so// rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig 'di ltar bsrungs na/ thams cad du ma g.yos pa'i don yin pas/ cho ga dang yi ge gzung 'dzin gyi rtag pa bsrung bas/ dram chod bka' dang mthun
139b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las so// dam tshig 'di dag mi bsrung na/ thams cad du bdag nyid byang chub sems su snang bas/ gzhan gang yang ma grub pas ci zhig bsrung ste/ dam tshig 'da' ba med pa'i phrin las so// dam tshig 'di dag nyams na'ang /
139b3(rnying rgyud): togs pa klong du grol/ brtsams pa mthar phyin nas/ dngos grub las su rung bas/ dam tshig ma nyams pa'i phrin las so// dam tshig 'di dag nyams na'ang / ye rgya chen pos thams cad la btab pas/ nyams pa'i chu med pas dam
139b4(rnying rgyud): tshig bsung du med pa'i phrin las so// de bas dam tshig gi phrin las thams cad ni/ thams cad nas thams cad du bsrad du med cing ma nyams pa'i dam tshig ste/ de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dam tshig rgyal po lhun grub snying po mchog/
139b5(rnying rgyud): gsang chen nges pa 'da' med dam pa las// don gyi skyes bus zhus pas rab bkrol nas// mi yi seng ges kun la bstan par bya'o// dngos po mtshan ma thams cad la// 'da' ba med par gang bsdang ba// 'di yang dam tshig phrin
139b6(rnying rgyud): las yiyer// nyon mongs zug rngu thams cad la// g.yos pa med par gang bsrung ba// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// lung dang mthun pa yang byed pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// shes pa sgo yangs chos dang mthun
139b7(rnying rgyud): 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// gtsang sme med par gang zab// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// bzang ngan med par gang sbyor ba// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// byams sdang med par gang sbal ba// 'di yang dam tshi
140a1(rnying rgyud): phrin las yin// spang len med par gang bgrod pa// 'di yang dam tshig phan las yin// thogs chags med par gang spyod pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// chags sdang med par gang
140a2(rnying rgyud): shes pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// nogs dang ldan pas gang thub pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// snong dang ldan pas don 'byin na// 'od yang dam tshig srin las yin// nges pa'i klong bas yengs med par//
140a3(rnying rgyud): 'di yang dam tshig zin las yin// rlud 'di 'dzin nam 'chang ba dang // klog gam rab tu bsgrub pa dang // yid la shes pa gang yin pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// sngags pa blo ldan dad pa can// zang zing nor la chags
140a4(rnying rgyud): med pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// g.yo sgyu zol spang bden pa'i lam// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin// dngos po'i chos rnams thams cad kun// skye ba med par gang shes pa// 'di yang dam tshig phrin las yin//
140a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig phrin las mi shes pas// bslab pa ni las rnams log par byed// smos med chos la ya ga 'dogs// rang bzhin med la phyogs char 'dzin// mnyam pa nyid la blang dor byed// nges pa'i don la dbye ba sring can// bla ma'i lung med//
140a6(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal tshig/ rang shes byed 'dod nges pa med// log pa'i lam tsho la bden pa nub// yongs la phrag dog kun dang 'gras// dam tshig tshul med nyams pa'i zhing // 'khor ba'i chos rten log pa'i lam// shes rab don med 'chal ba'i tshig/
140a7(rnying rgyud): don med yug sa~M mus ni// don dang mthun pa'i gtan tshigs med// mu med gang zag spro ba'i tshig/ des ni 'khor ba'i sgo phye bas/ lag nas bzung la mngon du 'askal// sems nyid bdag dang gcig pa'i phyir// snying khrag khar ya
140b1(rnying rgyud): btung bar byar// de dag 'askal na bde chen zab// de yang dam chog phrin las yin// bzhag na nyams par gyur 'gyur na// de nas smon pa mnyam gzhag gis// rdo mugapa dpon bka' 'de bshad// yang bzhin ran chen
140b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba yi// slob dpon blo ldan man ngag can// nges pa'i sgo 'byed gang yin pa// phangs med yon gyis sna drangs nas// lus ngag yid gsum phung po rnams// de la gus pas dbul bar bya'o// slob dpon de la mchod byas
140b3(rnying rgyud): na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mchod dang 'dra// bla ma de la phyag byas na// sangs rgyas bkur sti byas pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas byas na// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus dang 'dra// slob dpon bkur bar ma byas shar/
140b4(rnying rgyud): mdang gangangos pa ma thob par// gang zhig lung la spyod pa ni// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dus gsum na mda'ang mi 'bral zhing // klamede pa mon gyis bsdu// thegs nyid byang chubams drang bas// rgyal bstan
140b5(rnying rgyud): la mchod dang 'dra// gnyis med dngos grub da yos thob// sangs rgyas nyid du dar 'gyur ro// danas rig pa'i bu mchog das// da 'di gzung dang btsun par mnyan// legs par bsgoms la sems la 'chang // sngag
140b6(rnying rgyud): dang phrag tu kun med pas/ dus dang grangs dang bskal pa yis// 'di garnams kyang bar me gcad// gsang ba la ni dbyer med cing // dmatshig tams la gsang ba dang // snod du yin la shin tu gsang// sdud par bya
140b7(rnying rgyud): de dag la// gang yin rim par gsal rtogs nas// nges par phye ste bshad pa'i phyir// lung las bkrol te bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
141a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgya dang bral d+ha/ ye nas sran gyis grub no nga po lags na/ na rje'i slad du dmachog gdam par skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra rdza sems dpa' phyogs bcu dus gsum
141a2(rnying rgyud): 'de bar gshegs pa thams cad ni/ mdzad pa thams cad mi mdzad pa yin/ detso'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'dzin chags mi mnga' ba'i don no// sems dpa' chen po ba'i don rtogs gshegs pa rnams ni/ mi mdzad pa thams cad mdzad pa
141a3(rnying rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du 'byung ba'i don no// sems dpa' chen po/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad ni/ zhal nas gsungs pa thams cad ma gsungs pa yin te/ de ni 'di lta ste/
141a4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid stong pa la ci yang gsung du mi mnga' ba'i don to// sems dpa' chen po/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams ni/ mi gsung ba gsung ba yin/ de ci'i lcir zhe na/ de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas chos ston pas ma yengs pa'i thogs pa par byed
141a5(rnying rgyud): don no// sems dpa' chen po/ phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa ni bzhugs pa mi bzhugs pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la snang la rang bzhin med pa'o// sems dpa' chen po/ bde bar gshegs pa ni/ ma bzhugs pa bzhugs
141a6(rnying rgyud): pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thugs nam mkha' lta zlas kun la khyab la/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pas/ ji ltar btags pa bzhin/ mtshan dang dpe byed dang ldan pa'i don to// sems dpa' chen po/ @
141a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi dmachog 'di dge bsrung ba mi bsrung ba yin/ de ci'i phyir she na/ de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi don la 'dang zhing nyems pa med pa'i don to// sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin du chos thams cad yod pa med pa yin/ datso'i phyir
141b1(rnying rgyud): de ni dngos por ma grub cing / rtag pa can ma yin pa'i don no// sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad med pa yod pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skyong nyid chad pa nyid dngos po'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sems dpa' chen po/
141b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad snang ba mi snang ba yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid do// sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad mi snang ba snang ba yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs la phyin ci log gi las btsan pa'o// sems dpa
141b3(rnying rgyud): chen po/ chos thams cad don mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so sor 'grel te ji skad gsung la/ gang du yang gsung ba med pa'i don to// de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rtogs pa'i bag chags byung ngo //
141b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dam tshig 'di dag gang bsrung ba// de ni ma nyams thar par 'gyur// sdigs pa dam tshig mthar phyin pa'i// sa ma ya yi gzhung du 'gyur// gal te gzhung 'di ma shes pas/
141b5(rnying rgyud): ci ltar bsrungs kyang nyams par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i spyod pa ya re nga // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzod blag med// de las thar bar rab tu dka'// nor pas lam nor bar khrid pa// 'khrul pas byang chub nyid las gol// thams cad
141b6(rnying rgyud): kun gyis brtag dka' bar// snying po'i lung du 'di bstan pas// sdod dang ldan la bstan pa'i phyir// dam tshig skabs sbyor bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi phan yon 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa
141b7(rnying rgyud): chen po/ gud 'di gang zhig 'dzin pa na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad do// rang drung gi ye shes kyang btsal ba med par lhun gyis grub pas/
142a1(rnying rgyud): gas sa ma sanam na na dang / nas dran kyis bdan da ston pa
142a2(rnying rgyud): btud du/ dus gsum du pan yin chepar gyis shig/ rkyen kyis ba ma bdang/ so po'i phyogs paganyis su mang po 'dzar thams cid nin rjes kyi mapor bar ngas patsug / ma bcos pa'i
142a3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen gyis grub nas zhugs so// 'di na na dang di sbyin pa gang shes cing na pa nas gsus/ gzung bang yang ming tshur po/ stod pa zhid rnas gsungs shing brtan pas/ byed na nyid la phyed ces nas/ dbang pas
142a4(rnying rgyud): par phyir to// de rji gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste deng gsuMng dang thugs pa sogs par dzinan bska pas gyung bdun pa btsun pa 'bras tha rdzogs so// / rdorje yang dbang gter gyi lags/
142a5(rnying rgyud): da da spyod pa thams nga da mams dpa sa phyug ma brten pa'i dus gcigan/ ma ldan 'das dpal sun bya bzang pos
142a6(rnying rgyud): skyes pa rang bzhin med pa'i 'dra la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ rdo rje sems dpes mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/ ston pa kun tu bzang po la ma 'dres pa chen po'i don ces phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems
142a7(rnying rgyud): can thams cad ni lus ngag yid gsum pa spyod do// des khams gsum pa spyod na/ sa kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod cing ba/ bgang dang ldan na dan dang rngan/ ngag gi spyod pa ga lta spyod cing blta ba / nga dang ldan na don dang ldan/ sems
142b1(rnying rgyud): spong ba ga/ rgyad kyang ba byug dang ldan dang sa/ bangs kyi smon pa gangs tu kyang sgra ba gang dang sun dan da smyan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zung ban drug / bye bar gshegs pas grang brnyan pa gsug
142b2(rnying rgyud): de med ces namal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rdo rjesems dpa' thabs chen po/ 'gro la phan par 'dod pa yis// legs par dris pa brtan par byeng // sems can ga pa zhig 'khrul pa 'o//
142b3(rnying rgyud): mngam shes pas// spyod pa'i don du mtshan maspyod// de 'dri nag pa'i mtshan nyid pas// de bzhin spyad pa 'khor bahrIn+ta// da ni man ga gter 'dod pas// legs par gyur 'di mnyan par rjes// rdzas kyi spyod pa gang
142b4(rnying rgyud): cing blta ba gang ltar ldan par bya ba yang / lus kyi spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spod pa dang / lus kyi spyod pa mi 'grog la ma chags par spyod pa dang / lus kyi spyod pa bsgral bskyed phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du spod pa dang / lus kyi tshud
142b5(rnying rgyud): padam pa ga pa'i gling du rnyed pa dang / lus kyi spyod pa snying lags la bar spyod pa dang / sus kyi spyod pa ma spangs pa la mi gnas par spyod pa dang / lus kyi spyod pa sgom g.yos pa'i dang du spyod pa'o// de la lus kyi spyod pa thabs dang ni
142b6(rnying rgyud): rab tu sto pa ste/ lus ni thabs/ dgong rnaMm go ri badz+nyAn pa ni shes rab po// 'byung ba chen po lngas bskyed pa'i phung po lngani thabs/ de byung ba chen po gang la yang mi gnas pas shes rab po// rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad na pangs
142b7(rnying rgyud): des gaung mthong shi 'bras pa dang myong zhing tshar ba dang shes shing rig pa ni shes rab za// nyon mongs pa drug gi sum ni thabs/ nga 'ams gsum krung drug tu gnas shing spyod pa ni shes rab// dbang po ni thabs/ yul ni shes rang/
143a1(rnying rgyud): rig pa ni thabs/ gnas pa ni shes rab ste/ de bas na de skad ces bstan pa yin te/ snod bcud thabs dang shes rab pa// mtshan ma kun la cing spyad kyang // thabs la mkhas pa shes rab ste/ thabs dang /
143a2(rnying rgyud): shes rab dron rtogs na// sangs rgyas nyid kyi lung dang ldan// 'di las man ngag yongs med par// kun tu bzang po ngas bshad do// de la lus kyi blta ba gang dang ldan pa'i don dang ldan pa ni/ lus ma skyes par shes pa ni dbyings rnam par dag
143a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ de nyid de bzhin med par yongs la khyab pa ni rnam par dag pa'i klong / de la mi 'dzin mi chags shing yongs la khyab pa ni thabs la mkhas pa'i bdug nyid do// des na rdo rje sems dpa' lus ni yod kyang yod la med kyang med do// lus ni brtan
143a4(rnying rgyud): kyang brtan la ma brtan kyang mi brtan pa'o// lus ni khyab kyang khyab lnga mi khyab kyang mi khyab pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtags su bgrangs la don ma 'dzin pas so// chos nyid ni lus so// lus ni chos nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni gnyis
143a5(rnying rgyud): su med par// rdo rje sems dpa' lus chos nyid ma yin/ chos nyid lus ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar ma brtags pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa lus lha'i dkyil 'khor ro// lha'i dkyil 'khor ni lus so// de cing
143a6(rnying rgyud): na/ deni so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'o// rdo rje sems dbang lus lha'i dkyil 'khor ma yin/ lha'i dkyil 'khor lus ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rtag pa can gyi lus ma yin pa'o// rdo rje sems dpung pus ni man ngag go//
143a7(rnying rgyud): man ngag ni lus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par bstan cing don la bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lus ni man ngag ma yin/ man ngag ni lus ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga rgyal can gyi skams shing ma yin pa'o// de bas na 'di dang /
143b1(rnying rgyud): ces bstan pa yin te// lus ni bskul bskyod thams cad ni// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin pas// skyon du bya ba gang yang med// pags nyes rnam par dbur med pas// thabs kyi phyag kyang dkyil 'khor la// bayul pa spyad thugs dam
143b2(rnying rgyud): bakhrul// gnyis med rol pa'i thig po che// nges par gsungs pa'i phung yin pas// rtogs dang ldan pas ci dkar skyong // don mthun pa yi sdes bu ni// chog gcig chad// gar skang spyad kyang gser du 'gyur// gang la reg pa gser du 'gyur// sman
143b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po pa ki te// gang la reg pa phran du 'gyur// man ngag gdeng chen rnal 'gyong pas// nyes pa spyad pas dpal du tshwa// mtshams med wa yang thar pa'i lam// srog gtsad cu yang sangs kyis la// don dur mi ldang gang zag rnams/
143b4(rnying rgyud): lus spyod gzab kyang nyes las gol// rang nor yud kyang lan chags nor// thar bskrad kyang 'chang ba'i rgyu// lol bar bsams kyang 'khor ba'i rgyu// bde chen nyid du don shes shing // rang byung rgyal por krung rol na// lus kyi spyod pa yin zhes
143b5(rnying rgyud): bshad// de la lus kyi spyod pa ga' la'ang ma chags par spyod pa ni// lha bgoms pa'i gdang dang // man ngag nges pa'i drod chud 'di zin pas// lus kyi skud pas don dang lhun du zad kyi// lus dang mi ldan zhing gong zag 'og pa'i srin tshigs
143b6(rnying rgyud): dag gis kyad cang spyod pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de la lus kyi spyod pa dbyings dang ye shes su khyod pa ni// kyi snod kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po che'i mtshan nyid du snang ba thams cad pus mtha' med pas dbyings// yongs
143b7(rnying rgyud): lakhab pas dbyings// zad pa med pas kyang dbyings// nam mkha'i 'ang du cing med pas kyang dbyings// de bsdod pa'i lus dang dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sdang ba thams cad ma bcings pa'i don dang ldan pas ye shes// de nyid
144a1(rnying rgyud): rig pa smos pa dang bral bas kyang ye shes/ rtag par mi 'dzin zhing mtshan mar me 'dzin pas kyang ye shes yin pas na/ don 'di ltar lus su rig shing sems la bcangs pas na/ lus kyis ci spyod pa dbyings/
144a2(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes de/ ci ltar snang ba kun la dbyings dang ye shes su shes par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la yang dbyings dang ye shes las med/ sems can gyi spyod pa lus kyi spyod pa thams cad dbyings dang ye shes kyi klong du spod
144a3(rnying rgyud): cing / nyin dang mtshan med/ dus dang rgyun mi 'chad par gnas na/ lus kyi spyod pa nyid sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid 'byor bste/ lus kyi spyod pa dbyings dang ye shes su stod pa ste/ des na 'di skad ces bstan pa yin te/ lus
144a4(rnying rgyud): kyi spyod par rab spyod pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// 'du 'bral med pa'i klong du rol// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i dang // byang chub sems kyi ngang du zhu// dbyer med gcig tu bstan pa'o// de'i phyir lus lha'i dkyil
144a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor du spyod pa ni/ lus ni lha'i dkyil 'khor du spyod pa'i rang bzhin ye nas yin pa ste/ spyod kyang lha'i dkyil 'khor du spyod de/ lus kyi bsgral bskyod lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las so// lus kyis gang la khyab pa don mdzad
144a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ pus la grangs su snang ba ni lha'i grangs/ lus la rtags su snang ba ni lha'i rtags/ lus la gzugs su yod pa ni lha'i gzugs/ lus gzhig na rang bzhin med pa lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin med pa ste/ lus skyes
144a7(rnying rgyud): na lha'i dkyil 'khor du sku rdzogs par snang bar spyod do// lus mi rtag par 'chin lha'i dkyil 'khor ma bskyed par bsdu'o// lus longs spyod na lha'i dkyil 'khor la longs spyod do// lus bzhengs na lha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba'i don pa
144b1(rnying rgyud): bzhengs sa// zhus bgyid na 'ag busams can gyingon pa baspyadad// sus mnapan byung dkyil lab nyam pa shad pa ldan pa ga// dasan dus pa spyod pa sbya dkyi pa ladu gyu nga // zas kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su su
144b2(rnying rgyud): pa nI/ chos nyid ma smras pas lus kyi spyod pa rnam par dge ba'i grong du stod pa'o// dbyings su mu mtha' med pas lus kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i grong du spyod pa'o// srang ga thig 'i chen po sangs nus pas skyes rnam par dag pa'i gro/
144b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ nadam pa skyen med pa susam gsas smras pa la sa spyi spyod pa nas phyir dag ba rnyed pa de ba 'i stong ba shes pas su su byung ba bang brdzun par myu
144b4(rnying rgyud): da bya ba med pas/ don dam pa'i man ngag dgongs pa'i klong pa gsal bar skrod pas pus kyi sto ba rnang pa gsal zer spyod pa'o// lus kyi spyod pa ma spangs la mi gnas par spyod pa ni/ 'khor ba'i lus chos nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas ma spangs la/
144b5(rnying rgyud): de la rtag patsun du mi gnas pas chos nyid dus kyi spyod pa yin pas lus kyi spyod pa ma spangs pa mi gnas par spyod pa'o// lus kyi spyod pa 'phrul bskyod drug rgya dkyil 'khor du spyod pa ni/ mi 'dra' ba dang rtag pa dang ldan pa dang / don dang ldan pa
144b6(rnying rgyud): dus med pa'o// chos kyi spyod pa chos nyid kyi sgram g.yos pa'i ngang du spyod pa ni/ lus nyid ma skyes pa'i g.yung drung du 'dus mabyas pas/ rtogs pa'i grong las 'am 'gyur med pa'o// lus kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i ngang du spyod pa ni/ dper na/
144b7(rnying rgyud): nyams gang du zab par mun po gsal bar 'thabs/ lus rnam par dag pas lus kyis gang nas gang bral ba ba'i chos kyang rnam par dag pa'i rang du gyur ba'o// de nas 'di skad ces bstan to// lus su spyod pas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas/
145a1(rnying rgyud): // spyod pa lus yin pas// ye shes lus ni sangs rgyas pa'o// sangs rgyas gzhan na yongs med pas// 'pho ba'i mgon pos lus la brjod// 'di ltar goms pa gdeng chen gyis// dus ni nyin dang mtshan med pas// de yi brtson pa don dang
145a2(rnying rgyud): lus la yengs pa'i rgyu med pas// des ni brtson pa'i don dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpas rtogs par gyis// rdo rje rgyal ba'i dus spyod pa// bsngags pas nges pa de ltar spyad// nges pa nyid du bstan pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyis zab par gsungs// spyod pa thams
145a3(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las/ lus kyi spyod pa gang gyur spyad cing lta ba sgreng gzhi'i le'u snyed pa pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag gi spyod pa gang ltar spyad cing lta ba gang dang ldan pa 'di ched du brjod do// ngag gi spyod pa gang yin pa'ang shin nga/
145a4(rnying rgyud): 'byor rnams kyis nyon cig/ de la ngag gi spyod pa la rnam pa gsum ste/ ngag chos nyid du spyod pa dang / ngag bzlas pa'i thig ler spyod pa dang / ngag stong pa nyid du spyod pa'o// de la ngag chos nyid du spyod pa ni/ ji ltar snang ba thams cad ngag gis ming btags pas tshi/
145a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad chos nyid/ chos thams cad yi ge/ yi ge thams cad ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin du shes pas chos nyid do// de la 'di skad ces bshad pa ste// gnam dang nis brag dang // rtsi shing dang ni nags tshal rnams// yi ge nyid du bstan pa ste// yi ge ma skyes rang bzhin na//
145a6(rnying rgyud): de la ngag spras chos nyid de// de bzhin dam grogag yang sa dang // gyen dang thur dang snod kyi rdzas// 'byung ba lngas bsdus thams cad kun// yi go mgyes rang bzhin na// de la ngag spyod chos nyid do// de la dag ni spyod pa ni// sems can lus dang dbang po dang / rnam grangs
145a7(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i rang bzhin dang // 'phags pa'i sku dang ye shes dang // yon tan bye brag bstan pa yang // de yang yi ge rabastan pa ste// yi ger thog mar ma skyes pas// de la ngag spyod chos nyid do// legs dang nyes pa gang smram pa// snyan dang mi snyan sgra bsgrags nas//
145b1(rnying rgyud): gang dang ldan na don dang ldan pa ni/ blta ba rnam pa lnga ste/ brjod pa med pa'i lta 'am langs par blta ba dang / thabs mkhas pa'i lta ba gang ltar rnangs snang don dang mi gal pa dang / don dang mthun pa'i lta ba gzhung du 'gro ba dang / chos nyid stong pa
145b2(rnying rgyud): lta ba stong pa'i zhing du dag pa dang / ma byung ma skyes pa'i lta ba ma bcos par gnas pa ste/ dris na 'di skad ces bshad par bya ste/ 'byung ba med pa'i mkhang dbyings nas// ngag gi brjod pa mi skyes pas// don gyi stab zag bcud pa'o// spyod pa
145b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud pas/ ngag gi spyod pa gang ltar stod cing lta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod nyid skye ba gang dang ldan pa 'di ched du brjod do//
145b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi spyod pa gang yin pa// rdzogs chen rnal 'byor rnams kyis nyon// de la sems kyi spyod pa la don rnam pa lnga ste/ sems kyis nyon mongs pa gnas su dag par spyod pa dang / sems rang byung gi ye shes su spyod pa dang / sems 'gyur ba med pa'i snying
145b5(rnying rgyud): por spyod pa dang / sems bcos pa med pa'i snying po nyid du spyod pa dang / sems btsal ba med pa'i ye shes su spyod pa'o// de la sems nyon mongs pa gnas su dge par spyod pa ni/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog la sogs pa sems
