145b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad dang / ye shes chen po'i don dang 'byung ba las/ gtong ba gting chad pa las ma byung ste/ de chos nyid ma nor pa'i don mthun par shes pa'i sems nyon mongs pa gnas su dag par spod pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o//
145b7(rnying rgyud): chags pa chen po'i sems nyid ni// sangs rgyas thugs rje yab dang yum// gnyis su med pa'i don gyis chags// 'di ltar lung dang ldan pa ni// bde ba'i ro las ma gtogs pa// log par grol ba gang yang med// gti mug chen po'i sems
146a1(rnying rgyud): dang gang ldan pa// log par smras kya nges pa don// bzo bo goms pa'i lag dang 'dra/ don chen 'di dang maldanan// bdun par smras kyang bag pangs// dper na blung po'i bzla dang 'dra// chos mdzod pams cad dag las
146a2(rnying rgyud): 'byung // sangs rgyas thams cad dag gis bstan// byang chub sems rnams ngag gis bstan// dngos grub rlabs chen ngag gis bslab// 'di ni ngag gi spyod pa yin// don chen gti mug go bde// brtson pa don dang ldan pa'o// dus gsum sangs
146a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad pa// gsung gi spyod pa 'di las med// gsung gi spyod pa dag yin pas// ngag gi spyod pa 'di shes na// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring // de la ngag stong pa nyid du spyod pa ni/ legs nyes kyi don gang dag gis smras shing brjod kyang //
146a4(rnying rgyud): de la dngos po med pas/ de nyid snga ma ni stong / da lta ni mi gnas/ phyis mi rtog pas/ dus gsum du brjod pa ma skyes stong pa nyid du gnas pa ni/ ngag stong pa nyid du sbyong pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad pa'o// rdzas la dngos por bstan pa yang
146a5(rnying rgyud): tshig la dngos por ma grub pas/ rdzas kyang dngos med stong pa'i zhing // bzang dang ngan par bstan pa yang // tshig la dngos por ma grub pas// bzang ngan dngos med stong pa'i zhing // bde dang sdug bsngal brjod pa yang // tshig la dngos por ma grub pas// /
146a6(rnying rgyud): bad sdug dngos med stong pa'i zhing // de bzhin gleng brjod thams cad kun// tshig la dngos por ma grub pas// gleng brjod thams cad stong pa'i zhing // ma skyes pa yi chos nyid la// ngag gi gling brjod thams cad kun// bcos med stong par shes par
146a7(rnying rgyud): bya// sus kyang smra med smra mi 'gyur// 'dren pa'i dbang pos kyang mi gsung // sus kyang gsung ba med pa'o// de 'dra'i don la gang gnas pa// de ni ngag gi spyod pa ste// de la nyid dang mtshan med pas// brtson pa don dang ldan zhes bya// de la blta
146b1(rnying rgyud): nga chub sogs rnams pan// rang byung rgyagasus pas// lo ga mnas rgyas kyang na// de lang gsung tsam nango // ba ba dang jug pas pa dang / sgram thab rgya lasags dang // da bzhin lam ga tu rnams// lag tang
146b2(rnying rgyud): cis btags pas na// yi ge'i rang bzhin ma gyes pas// de la ngag spyod chos nyid do// de bzhin btags pa gang yin pa// chos nyid yin pas gzhan nas min// don ci man ngag 'di shes na// ci sgras ngag gi chos nyid du// de
146b3(rnying rgyud): gang bzlas pa'i yi ger spyod pa ni/ ngag lhang lhung por sgra ci brjod kyang de thams cad yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ma bsdus pa gang yang med do// ka kha ga g+hang / tsatsha dz+nyA ta/ Ta)k+Sha Na/ taHda d+ha na/ pa pha bad+ha ma/ yir pa la/
146b4(rnying rgyud): a ha/ mAM/ oM yi/ sa sa?/ e e/ swA ya k+Sha/ bu mu dbyings kyi 'dren stangs dang // zhabs bskyed blugs rje'i shugs bskyed pa// 'greng bu ma bkag gsal ba waM// nar chos nyid klong na rol// zla chas 'dang mchog 'dren pa
146b5(rnying rgyud): yum// thig pa byang chub dbyings su 'khyil/ gas tag don tuman dag gdeng du gnas// dgongs pa sgra yo yul la bar gsal// bkrus pa bsnyen 'ang bsnying por rdzogs// rtogs pas bad+ma chen sbyor du 'byos// bshad pas sems
146b6(rnying rgyud): na ngas dgral// tsaM brjod rjes kyi bzlas par 'gyur// don lam 'gyur gang yang med// ngag gis brjod pa dun \u0f7f// chos ma mdzad rnams thams cad gsapa// ma brjod na yang don rten// chos kyi chog dang yi gar snad /
146b7(rnying rgyud): tshig tu btags na btags te legs// chos rnams tshig ding yi geng bstan// ma btags na U r+yA d+hA nA~M// cho ga dang yi ge sa ma btags// ma yengs dran pa bzlas brjod yin// don dang mthun pa bsgrub pa yin/ 'od
147a1(rnying rgyud): da na// chos kyi sra ste tha ma dang // don kyi dmigs pa med pa'i dang // 'di ltar lung dang ldan pa ni// ma skyes pa las ma gtogs pa// me shas tshangs pa gal brgyad// zhe sdang chen pa tha sems nyid ni// nam r+d+ha/
147a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma kun 'joms pas// thabs la mkhas pha rol pa'i sku// 'di ltar lung dang ldan pa ni// rol pa'i sku las ma gtogs pa// 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i gol ba med// nga rgyal chen po'i sems nyid ni// kun la khyab par dpag pa ste
147a3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi rgyal po rang brang bas// 'di ltar lung dang ldan pa ni// che ba'i sgra las ma gtogs pa/ nyon mongs khengs pa'i gol ba med// phrag dog chen po'i sems nyid ni// nyon mongs mtshan ma mi shong bas// chos nyi dngang las rnam rtog med/
147a4(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar lung dang ldan pa ni// mnang gdon las ma gtogs pa// phyogs char grol ba gang yang med// de ltar spyod pa gang yin pa// nyon mongs spyod kyang spyod du bas// spyad kyang yon tan yin pa las// don du ma song gang yang med//
147a5(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar nyin dang mtshan med par// man ngag 'di las ma yengs na// sems kyi spyod pa dam pa yin/ kun tu bzang pos lung bstan to// de la sems rang byung gi ye shes su spyod pa ni// rang byung gi ye shes btsal ba dang bcas pa las
147a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ye thog ma nas kun tu bzang po'i ngang las thams cad byas zin pas/ bru~M gyen gang gis kyang bsnyeng du med de/ rang byung gi ye shes ma skyes pa'i klong nas shar bas/ dang por ma bskyed par du ma btsal tha mang
147a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs pas/ nam mkha' la bcos pa med par snang ba dang 'dra bar/ rang byung gi ye shes rtogs pa'i don dang ldan pa de/ rnal 'byor tshad ma rnams kyi blo la rang snang bar tshad mar byung ba ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// rgyud drug skye 'gro
147b1(rnying rgyud): mams pa// sras kyang ma thas kyang 'a sa// sal dang dab ba mas cad drung // rnam par shes pa'i chog sasas nga// rangasam sartogs pa'i zad pa byas// dab na namam larje can nyid pas// dbyung ba snyoms snang ngam nga/
147b2(rnying rgyud): nam mkhang nyid du rang 'byung bzhin// kum thab sems kyi mtshan nyid las// sti ltar snang zhing grags pa dang // go zhing rtags pa thams cad can// rang thang bral po'i ba shes pas// gal te las ci dbang btsunan// rang blango la shes dayang ra
147b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba nyid du sems pa yang // 'khor ba rang byung ye shes pas// rtogs pa'i man ngeg ma bstan 'byung // dus gsum nyid du sems pa yang // drag gsum rang byung ye shes pas// ji ltar sems pa de bzhin bzang // rang b+har ye shes spyad/
147b4(rnying rgyud): pa la// 'khor ba ngan song ming yang med// sems can dang las spang len med/ rtogs pa klong du rang byung bas// rgyal ba nyid kyis 'di la bsngags// sems pa dran rig 'byung ba yang // rang byung rgyal po ye shes yin// sems la byang tsher byeng ba/
147b5(rnying rgyud): yang // rang byung rgyal po ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes chen po ni// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rje btsan te// lta ba skye shi med pa'i klong // rtogs pa 'du 'bral med pa'i dang // spyod pa bcos med snying por spyod// sgrub pa btsal ba med par
147b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub// don gyi snying po nges pa'i lung // rang la yod pas bde ba'i zhing // du nyid dag pas thar pa'i gnas// gzhung dang mthun pas nges pa'i don// 'di ltar sems spyod gang yin pas// ci ltar spyod kyang kyad du zad// rang byung nyid las ma
147b7(rnying rgyud): gtogs pa// zhen cing chags pa gang yang med// 'di ltar dus dang rgyun med par// man ngag 'di las ma yengs na// sems kyi rang byung skyong par bshad/ de la sems 'gyur ba med pa'i snying por spyod par bshad pa ni/ sems kha dog dang
148a1(rnying rgyud): dathogs sa 'gyur ba ma pas/ 'asru ba ma ba da pa yin pas/ dbar dgasal bag na ma ma das/ nga na bags pa pa dang nab/ dum tha 'gyur ba shA/ ma da ba ma med par nad
148a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / spyong pa mi 'gyur basbyin dang mtshan med par shes pa dang / sems mi 'gyur ba s+ho shi med par shes pa nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i snying po yin la// 'gyural bad kyi snying po nyid de ltar shes pa yin pas/ de ni 'byung ba'i snying po yin// bAr snang mtshon
148a3(rnying rgyud): kyi char 'babs na// skye shi gnyis kyi ming btags kyang // byang chub sems la 'gyur ba med// de ni sems kyi snying po yin// sems la dngos po rdzas med pas// kha dog dbyibs su 'gyur ba med// sems la brtag pa'i mu med pas//
148a4(rnying rgyud): skye shi gnyis su 'gyur ba zod// sems la brten pa'i gnas med pas// phyogs ris gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la chags pa'i gzhi med pas// blang len gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la ngadang bdag med pas// bzang ngan
148a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la rlig pa'i rgyu med pas// nA 'bras gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la 'dzin pa'i sems med pas// mtha' dbus che chung 'gyur ba med// sems la dmigs pa'i sems med pas// yangs
148a6(rnying rgyud): dog mtho dman 'gyur ba med// de ni snying po nges pa'i lung // 'di ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gyur med snying por spyod pa bzang // de ltar dus gsum 'gyur med pas// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa// sems bskyed brtsod//
148a7(rnying rgyud): pa don dang ldan// ngang nyid bcos med snying por 'grub// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dus gsum du// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa 'chang // gang ltare spyad kyang spur du zad// 'gyur mid snying po yin par nges// de la sems bco
148b1(rnying rgyud): ma chas nyid kyi don du spyod pa ni/ chos rnams rje chos nyid ni yang dag par sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang bcas par dka' la kun rdzob tu sems sdang ma bskrad bskrang du med pas// de bzhin du sems kyi don yang gnas pas gzhan du bstan pa med du/ byung /
148b2(rnying rgyud): zhe na/ de ni dper na dngos po med pa la/ gang gis bzung bar dka' ba bzhin/ chos nyid stong pa la sgro 'dogs par dka' bas/ don nyid yin par shes par dka' ba la/ ma bcos par de dang mthun par spyod pa ni/ bcos pa med pa chos nyid kyi dang du
148b3(rnying rgyud): spyod pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// sems nyi du ma skyes chos nyid ni// tshig dang yi ge kun spangs pas// 'di 'dra'i sems ni brtag par dka'// sems kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin la// rang bzhin bcos pa med pa yis// de ni chos nyid
148b4(rnying rgyud): yin zhes bya// rang bzhin ma skyes gang shes pa// de ni chos nyid spyod pa yin// ci ltar bzo mkhas tshul shes kyang // sems nyid bcos par yangs ma gsungs// tshig dang yi ger ma bcos pa// de ni skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings/ rang bzhin//
148b5(rnying rgyud): du ni bzong po zhig/ nges par yang dag bstan par bya'o// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid la// sangs rgyas thams cad kun 'byung ba// byung tsam nyid nas bcos su med// dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la// 'ja' tshon gzugs brnyan snang ba yang //
148b6(rnying rgyud): snang tsam nyid nas rang bzhin med// de bzhin bcos pa med pa yis// skye dang 'gag spangs chos nyid dbyings// gnyis med so so ma yin pas// skye ba med las spros pa med// rang bzhin med pas 'dzin pa med// 'pho 'gyur med pas yum
148b7(rnying rgyud): gyi klong // de la skye dang 'gag spangs pa'i// kun la rol pas yum gyi dbyings// yab yum gnyis med so so min// de bzhin bcos med chos nyid de// sus kyang bcos med bcos ma 'gyur// 'di ltar rtags pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bcom
149a1(rnying rgyud): med chos su stod pa de// de ltar nyin dang mtshan med par// man ngag 'di la gang gnas pa// sems skrod spyad pa ngan dang ldan+ta// bsdu pa nyid dru brtsu ba pa d+ha// dad+hA rtag tu ngas pa ste// man ngag kyang la gnas
149a2(rnying rgyud): de la sems btsal ba med pa'i ye shes su spyod pa ni// sems kyi mtshan nyid ye nas ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa ste// de la rgyu rten rten 'grel gyis btsal ba med do/ rang gi rang bzhin gyi snying po min ngag gi don dang ldan pas// thams cad du legs pa 'byung
149a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin pas/ de lta bu'i don shes shing rtogs pa dang ldan par skrod pa ni/ btsal ba med pa'i ye shes su spyod pa ste/ gyur zhe na/ dA ni rig gar yang ma sbas par yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ster/ dkris pa 'byung bas/ man ngag dang ldan pa'i dgas
149a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyid ni rig pa gsal ba nang nas shar bas/ btsal ba med par spyod pa yin pas/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// btsal ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos kyi sku yi gdeng chen te// ma g.yos pa yi dbyings nyid la// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid gsal
149a5(rnying rgyud): gang sa pa sa/ na pa/ / pas papas / dasas
149a6(rnying rgyud): btsal med snying por shar ba las// zla 'bras can du de ma bstan// bcos pa med par shes pa las// gnyen po can du de ma bstan// 'gyur ba med pa'i shes pa las// 'chi 'pho can du de ma bstan// ma g.yos pa yi shes pa las// 'dzin rtog
149a7(rnying rgyud): can du de ma bstan// mnyam pa nyid kyi shes pa las// che chung can du de ma bstan// kun tu bzang po'i shes pa la// gtsang sme can du de ma bstan// mtha' dbus med pa'i shes pa la// phyogs ris can du de ma bstan// de ltar shes pas sems
149b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa// bas nus pastan pa pa ba/ pa bad phyu na gagasan// mA nas nas rgyud pa med// bag ta pa sa bya sa// sod brdzun pa sa/ 'brug spyad myu sa ba sad// mas nga
149b2(rnying rgyud): dab pa 'dod/ shes pa na la na/ na cung pa da pan// nga kya rtogs pa 'inil pamang / nyid na bcal brgya'o// 'di lta rtags pastod pa yin/ da sbyin na byeng pa med// de 'a
149b3(rnying rgyud): da gsos med pa'i bdo dmas de rtogs pa na ma myong // btsal ba med par blas d+hang bya// bdun pa dang blan med nas bya// denyi mangs kyi nyid du bstam/ bcom ldan des kyis yi spang brten
149b4(rnying rgyud): di spyong ba yin/ bar banyi nam bdug dus/ dbying btul ba mad pa'i/ rna pa pam par bsha sa pa/ dang gnas pas mi 'ad/ 'ang 'dag yang byas pacos bdag
149b5(rnying rgyud): yaSh+Ta/
149b6(rnying rgyud): dang / na de nas gzhan dun bya ba myed// dbade du bzhin pa// man dag sa nyis kyang brdum// 'byung 'ad pa kyang dus pa// btsas med pa la thos pa byu pa// yin pa 'din ma pa dzi sa// don
149b7(rnying rgyud): da bamed pa nas/ gas da pa la / sgru ba ga su na tunan 'an
149b8(rnying rgyud): na du
150a1(rnying rgyud): rgya du kyang yin pas/ yongs med pang // sems ca lta ba 'gyur ba med pa ni/ rang brten mo g.yo la ga dang rigs gzhan du bskrun par daklu bas rjes kyang bstan dang dranan// sems kyi skab bamasapa
150a2(rnying rgyud): med pa ni/ dper na nam mkha' la cha shes su bgos zhing bcos pas tshe zad pa dang 'dra bar kun gzhi byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ye nas khyab cing gang lab chen po grub zin pa la/ tshig dang yi ges 'chos par dka' ba'i don de la 'di skad ces bshad
150a3(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// rang sems med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas byang chub yod ma yin// dus gsum rje bcan byang chub sems// gzhan la phan 'dogs nus pa'i mthu// rang la gnas med goms pa'i gdeng // gzhi bzhag don gyi snying por blta'o// spyod pa
150a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las/ sems kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod cing lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod cing blta ba gang dang ldan na 'di ched tu brjod do// thabs kyis spyod
150a5(rnying rgyud): pa gang yin pa// rdo rje sems dpas nyan par gyis/ nges par lung 'di bstan par bya'o// de la thabs kyis spyod pa rnam pa gsum ste/ kun rdzob dngos po'i chos la thabs kyis lhod pa dang / nyon mongs pa nang gi chos la thabs kyis spyod pa dang / bde ba chen
150a6(rnying rgyud): po yum gyi b+ha ka la gnyis su med par thabs kyis spyod pa'o// de la kun rdzob dngos po'i chos la thabs kyis spyod pa ni/ gan ma ri dang sa brag rtsi shing dang nags tshal la sogs pa/ ji srid rdzas su yod pa thams cad dang /
150a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba chen po la sogs par bskyed cing snyoms pa thams cad smon du bltas nas spang ba ma yin/ de nyid thams cad kyi spyod pa ste/ dper na skyes bu dpa' rtsal dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas spang ba'i phyogs thams cad thabs kyis
150b1(rnying rgyud): brtul nas yon tan du snang ba 'dra bar thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pas mtshan ma rdzas su snang ba thams cad sgyu ma yin pa dang / rang bzhin ma grub pas gnyis su med pa dang / ma gus pas gang ba spyad kyang yon tan las sman zad de/ lha ma ltar shes
150b2(rnying rgyud): shing ma skyes par go bas srog gcod pa yang yon tan las skyon med de/ rang bzhin med par shes la/ mnyam pa nyid du go bas ma byin pa blangs pa yang yon tan las ston med de gnyis su med par shes la/ tha mi dad pas mi tshangs par snang
150b3(rnying rgyud): kyang yon tan las skyon med de/ de don las som gsogs su mi ston/ man ngag spyi ljongs su ston pa thabs kyis spyod pa'o// de la phyogs cha'i ris su ma phye/ bdag med kyi shes rab tu ba pabs kyang thabs kyis stod pa'o// de la bzang ngas
150b4(rnying rgyud): gyi spyod par ma phye/ rang byung gi lo res spong du mdzad pas kyang thabs kyis stong pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// sdang srid mtshan ma'i rdzas rnams kun// ma rig rmongs pa'i blo rnams kyis// yod pa nyid du snang ba ste/
150b5(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang bzhin med par 'dris par spyod// chu 'bras mtshan ma'i chags sems la// gang zag 'khrul pas rtog pa chags// mkhas pas ye nas dngos med rtogs// 'byung ba ma skyes yum gyi
150b6(rnying rgyud): klong // 'gyur med snying po yin par ston// spong po'i rgyal po 'di las byung // lus kyi spyod pas thams cad bskal// sems cad thams cad bskal ba na// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// gtsang sme med par za ba ni// rtsal ba
150b7(rnying rgyud): mnyes te sras su ste// spar len med par sbyor ba ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// bzang ngan med par spyod pa ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// thabs kyi spyod pas ma spyad na// spang ba nyid kyang 'khor ba'i chu/ thabs kyi spyod pas spyad pa
151a1(rnying rgyud): bdag pazhing la sangs spyod 'dra // gang zhig dang me ldanan// dang na spyad krung mgrin blangs// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pas ma// 'byung ba'i chos nyid bram du spyad// snang mad kun tu bzang mor spyod// yu
151a2(rnying rgyud): ni chos kyi dbyings su spyod// pus ni phyag rgya chen por spyod// phung po rnam grol zhing du spyod// dug gsum gru gsung thugs su spong // don dam nyid du ma skyes pas// thabs kyis spyad kyang golas med// mchigs rtog pa med par spyod// don dang
151a3(rnying rgyud): mthun zhing 'gal med pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa nang gi chos la thabs kyis spyod pa ni// dper ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mun pa rang gis mi gnas pa bzhin du// mkhas pa'i spyod pa la nyon mongs pa dang gis mi gnas te// thabs kyis spyod pas
151a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags chos nyid dag pa'i rgyan du spyod// zhe sdang thugs rje chen po'i zhing du spyod// gti mug ma skyes pa'i dbyings su spyod// nga rgyal che ba'i yon tan gyi mchog tu stod// phrag dog rnam par rtog pa mi gnas par spyad/ dper na de bzhin
151a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku pa gang ltar bltas pas legs pa bzhin// thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pas ji ltar bltas pa legs pari zhing yin pas// de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// nyon mongs rgyu rnams thams cad kun// thabs kyis spyod pa'i zhing yin
151a6(rnying rgyud): pas// de la mi srad sprad par bya// gti mug thabs kyis ma spyad na// de bzhin rigs kyi su mi 'grub// zhe sdang thabs kyis ma spyad na// rdo rje'i rigs kyi sku mi 'grub/ nga rgyal thabs kyis ma snya na/ rin chen rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// 'dod chags
151a7(rnying rgyud): kyis ma spyad na// pad+ma'i rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// phrag dog thabs kyis ma spyad na// las kyi rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// nyon mongs lnga po thabs su mnyam// rigs kyi sku lnga spyod par 'dus// nyon mongs lnga po sgyu mar spyad// rigs kyi sku lnga gnyis med thabs//
151b1(rnying rgyud): na mangs lnga po ya nas dag/ rigs rgya sgra lnga gdong nas byung // nyon mongs lnga po nam mkha' khams// rigs kyi sku lngag za' skar tshul// nyon mongs lnga ba rgya mtsho ba'i ma// rigs kyi sku rtswanyi gA skar// rgya mtsho chu zla dbyer med mnyam// don la gnyis med thang sa
151b2(rnying rgyud): spyod pas// nyon mongs chos la thabs kyis spyod// man ngag don 'di sus spyod pa// dus drug nyin dang mtshan med par// phrin las tsha bar ma chags pas// btsun pa don dang ldan zhes bya'o// de la bde chen yum gyi b+ha ga la gnyis sa med par thabs kyis spyod pa ni/
151b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad du bde ba'i longs spyod de/ dper na gser gyi gling la rdo btsal gyis mi rnyed la/ 'dod chags kyi dga' ba bstar na gang la yang mi dga' ba dang mi bde ba med pa bzhin/ chos nyid bde ba chen po'i don man ngag la/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang zug rngu btsal gyis
151b4(rnying rgyud): mi rnyed la/ chos nyid dga' ba de sems kyir rnams su bsgyur nas/ dga' ba'i longs spyod ma yin pa dang / bdaba'i langs s+ho gang yang ma yin pa gang yang med par shes pas/ de nyid blo'i chags par bya ba'i yul du gyur pa yin pas yum gyi thag yan la/
151b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med par spyod pa ni thabs te/ dus thams cad du rtsol ba dang ma bral bas/ gnyis su med pa'i rol pa rgyun ma chad pa/ bral na bral te legs pas/ btsal med kyi dga' ba de la zhugs/ sems kyis thams cad du dran rig skyes pas/ dus gsum rag pa'i
151b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings len pas/ 'dra 'thal med pa'i gzugs su rgyun ma chad/ dran rig ma skyes na ma skyes su zad de/ dran med shes rab kyi klong na/ 'dzin med thabs kyi rtul po// 'gyur med dga' ba de'i grong na bzhugs pas/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o//
151b7(rnying rgyud): btsal ba gnyis su med pa na// yab yum gnyis su spyod pa ste// don 'di rtags shing shin tu ba dang // dbyings la spyong ba sram zhes bya'o// tha'as la spyod pas yab ces byang // rnams su lon pas byang chub sems// tshwal bsta rangs dgyes pa'i'o'o// gang yin pa
152a1(rnying rgyud): rnamapang/ dam shes par bzhugs pas// dang can pa pa da// zab bang mdapa' da papa// da bcos ba thugs pa'o// bang bcad pa byasadas pasno dmas/
152a2(rnying rgyud): thabs zhugs pas// bde bachen po'i babs sa dzad// gnyis su ma pas dga'a'is 'o// gsal bdag bas pade zhes bya// chags pa byab rnam zhes \u0f7f// dmigs par bye shes pab cas tha'// gnas par zla bzhagang/
152a3(rnying rgyud): dga' bye gyes pas ga'o// da pa 'a teg/ sa pa bya dgang bang// nga tu bzang par bdang gas bad gyi / / pa // dbu 'byong thugs sa dgas pang /
152a4(rnying rgyud): mas kyi mdzad da de// 'di skor mnang nga/ don 'chang ba// thabs kyi spyod pa dam pa 'chang // 'di ltar thams cad du gnas pa// basbyin pa don dang ldan pa'o// thabs kyi spyod pa yang shes byeng // dwel skya ba gang dang ldan pa ne/
152a5(rnying rgyud): na du
152a6(rnying rgyud): dri kyi gyim nyid yin shes na// gsus bying breg brin susus 'a byas na/ nadrang dadu/ ngas phreng sra / ngas dri phre bras la bas sa/ drang batha
152b1(rnying rgyud): dpa dan ldan gyin pas/ zabs kyi smod pa gang slar chu kya ba yid sgrub b+hag// donas pacwa ba ldan 'das kyis dumang nas bka skal ba dang / dngas rgyas dang gtung ba'im 'as sas// danas
152b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ngal bsang ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// gdung ba skye ba shin tu legs// gang zhig mnyan par brtson pa ni// legs 'od bul bshad par bya'o// de na
152b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pas sangs rgyas na/ sems can spyod pas de ltar ma togs pa shin tu 'gyod do// lus kyi sdod pha rol ma gnyis su med pa'i thabs dang shes rab yin pa la/ sems can gyis de ltar rig
152b4(rnying rgyud): pa shin tu 'arjod do// sems can byos da ba cibasasas shing dran pathams cad ye shes dang gisar la pa lags pade/ matogs pa shin tu 'gyid do// sems can thams cad byas lus kyi rtsod pam shes pas sdug bsngal tshogs thams sa myong nas/
152b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab nub par gyur pa dang / ngag gi spyod pa ma shes pas lce la zhing rmo ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don nub par gyur pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa ma shes pas nyon mongs pa kha lo baphyang bas
152b6(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ rig pa'i ye shes nub par 'gyur ba dang / thabs kyi spyod pa ma shes pas/ 'jig tshogs kyi dbyen smyos pas/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs spyod dang bral
152b7(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa'i sems can glen pa rnams la/ thabs mkhas pa'i lta ba'i rgyal po spyod pa 'di lta bu mnga' ba de/ sems can gyis de lta bu ma 'tshal ba de ni ji lta bu lags/ sems can gnas pa yang spyod pa/ 'khor bar 'khyams pa yid spyod pa/
153a1(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs shing nyam thag pa yang sdud pa/ 'di ltar gsungs na de nyid bde ba yang dag pa las skyon du ma song ba de/ sems can gyis de ltar ma 'tshal ba de ji lta bu lags/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes btsang
153a2(rnying rgyud): ba mang pa'i snying pode/ sems kyi stong pa dang skyon nyid las byung ba las/ sems can gyis ma 'tshal ba de de lta bu zhig lags/ chos kyi sgo bka' ci snyed gsungs pa yang / 'khor btid na de nyid byang chub kyi chos su gsungs pa de/ sems can
153a3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis chos de bzhin du ma 'tshal ba de ci lta bu zhig lags/ de dag ni ji lta bu zhig lags/ des bdag ni shin tu mchi ma dku'o zhes dus so// de bzhin du rigs lnga kun kyang ngus so// rnam par snang mdzad kyis sems rtag chad gnyis su blta ba
153a4(rnying rgyud): la dus so// rin po che'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyis sems bzang ngan gnyis su blta ba la dus so// pad+ma'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyis sems gcod skye gnyis su blta ba la dus so// las kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems snang len gnyis
153a5(rnying rgyud): su blta ba la dus so// rigs kyi yum rnams kyis kyang / sems can rnams thabs la mi mkhas pa la dus so// sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis lam ma shes pa la dus so// de ltar dus tsam nyid na/ rdo rje sems dpa'
153a6(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yab yu ma dang / byang chub sems dpang la sogs pa gang yang med cing gang gis kyang ma dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs par bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dpang sems can gyi spyod pas/ sdug
153a7(rnying rgyud): bsngal gyi kha brgyud pa ni/ dper na sman gyi sbyor btang ma shes pas/ sman du slar yang dug tu 'gyur la/ sman gyi sbyor thabs la mkhas pas/ drug slar yang rnyed 'jil ba'i mahA stobs yod pa bzhin du/ spyod pa'i rgyal po 'di ma thos pas ni/ sangs rgya
153b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa sa pa yang rtag baphrus ci gtan zhing du 'byur ba/ rlu bsngal ba'ad thas pas ni sdug bza zhing byung kyang byur pa bde brda pa sangs nas kyim dang spyad du 'gyur ra// dza na sems dpa' sams can gyi spyod pa sna bdu ga dang ltubs pa brgyud /
153b2(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs nang khor bting bde ba yang dag par 'gyur ba ni/ dper na zas sbrad ma legs pas nang du 'gyur/ 'chi bar dgyur la/ de nyid spyod pa lags pas gzi ma dngas bkrug dang ldan pa bzhin du rgyad 'dri ma rtogs shing mgo bas/ sems can 'i
153b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang byams la// rgyud 'di rtogs shing glon/ 'khor ba nyid bde ba ror bstar par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi thugs yang dag pa ni ye shes btsal pa med pa'i snying po nyid sems kyi skrod pa dung skyon las byung ba/ sems can thongs shes pas
153b4(rnying rgyud): rI/ dbar dargya pa rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigasasam/ khyim bdag gi rigs lta bu gzhon pa pa/ brda dang / zed madrug/ gzhon nu rab pa ga sngags pa bus par ny-id dang pa chang par yod kyang / 'tsho ba'i ma ma dang blom la sogs pa rnams kyis mya bstanang/ de bya
153b5(rnying rgyud): mr-i shes pa/ babad dang shes pa bzhin/ da gong ma dag sems kyi spyod nyidang yin pade/ srung ngas pa 'di ma bstan na de bzhin du mi shes shi mi tog pa/ wang 'di dag bstan spyon yang yang dag pa'i slang du 'gyur ro// sems dpeng chos kyi sgos mas can
153b6(rnying rgyud): byung ba ni/ dpeng nanamamakhar 'chad pa pas pa ni ma tad las byung zhi nyid du 'babs pa bzhin gnas byeng / shes pa dag pas de bzhin rtogs la/ shes pa mdug pas de bzhin du me shes pa bzhin/ chos kyi smyos bsam gyis mi thab par gsungs pa yang /
153b7(rnying rgyud): mis che rgyag ti na mongs pa dang / dza ny-id kyis gsung sol/ yin yang da med pa/ mas gzha pa mjas dpa dun rlu thal rjes pa sa kyis can shes pa las/ 'di thal sa 'dres pa dmas kyis da nga pan
154a1(rnying rgyud): pasa?/ 'ad zlang ma dras pa rnams kyis rtogs par dgang / daH byer zhen/ doni spyod pa nyid du gnas pa dang / gnas pa nyid du gnas pa med pa 'don matogs pas/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par byud // kun nas gas ba'i man ga ni// gnas pa nga
154a2(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs te// 'jig rten khams na dpyan zhing ten// yang gsang nges pa'i theg pa 'di// rang nyid yin pas btags pa'i b+ha/ zhes rtsa te/ de bas rgya rje sems dpang sems can kyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngos su ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa la yang mi mang ngo // sems
154a3(rnying rgyud): gyi sngon med pa'i yon tan ni/ bde bar gshegs pas kyang ma bshad do// sems can gyi spyod pa chos nyid yin pa las/ de las gzhan pa'i chos ni ston pas kyang ma gsungs so// 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa yin pa pas/ gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa ma 'a
154a4(rnying rgyud): sems can gyi byas ci stod pa nyid/ rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad rjed yid pa pas gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi ma nga tu nga byung ngo // da gdod ma nas dag pa'i 'bras bu yin pa pas/ btsam pa dang bcos pa'i ba 'jug gi nga rig pa'i
154a5(rnying rgyud): mthong // de lta bang don sems can pa rang pa dang chas su yod na 'gyod pa'i na ci yang / ces bkang phul pas/ rdorje sems dbang ma ngan las ngas par gyur to// spyod pa thams su rtsal po rtson mdon ldan gyi byud pas/ rdo rjesems dpa' mya ngad las 'das pa
154a6(rnying rgyud): du ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'angs par de snyed rje la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa chud 'di/ ma bskrad pa'i yon tan kyad du the bas che ba dang / ba~M btsal ba'i mthur pag tu med pa dang / ma bsrubs pa'i
154a7(rnying rgyud): dngas grub shi tu brjod kyis ma langs pa dang / ma gsungs par rtsom pasam kyis 'i khyab pa dang bla pa'i drad 'di ni nyan nas dang thag pa das na pa rnams kyi rtogs pa tho kyi/ me ma yang thos par pi 'thang pa/ yangargyas tha parjod
154b1(rnying rgyud): byas padas / dam sa pa gsu nga pam bar rdzug ba ca ba sas// ngas mas da 'a ga pa yang tha sa sa da 'a ma na nga ba las 'das ga dang/
154b2(rnying rgyud): 'di'i don da grangs sam su mtha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// de ska bas na thad 'di yang sras thob pa ston pa rnyed do// ston pa nyid par glid dang 'o// kun tu bzang ba yang chung 'do'o// 'di med 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi ye shes so// gang drang na pa
154b3(rnying rgyud): dwakon nyid byed poni/ grangs par dang 'dri banas gsol pa dang / bcom ldan ngas kyis bkang sbal pa dang / rdorjes pa mang pa 'i legs sa pa gas // nad nga kun brgyang pos dus gusu mdu go sa nyid yi go// da'i dgas khyod ding bstan pa yid pas/ rnyed da pa
154b4(rnying rgyud): gyi snang ba ngas/ kun tu byas par ma bstan te yang dag pa'i man dag ngas par 'dod pa dang / don la na dag 'di dang phrad na zang zing yon dang grogs tshogs pa mi blta ba'i rnal 'byor pa 'gang zhig sred pa dag la bstan par bya'o// gang zhig sdod dang mi ldan pa rnams pa ni/ dmus pang po
154b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin mthong ngam btub pa'i dbye bzhi/ mad ngag bstan kyang ga zhang rtogs par ma nus pa yin pas/ de bas shin tu gsang bar brtan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa de 'di ming tsam 'dzin pa ma yang ba na cig 'brug cigasas yang / kha ton du 'don nam da dag gi dngas thab sa
154b6(rnying rgyud): pa yin pas// de la ni gol ba med do// de skad ces sus kyang ma gsungs par bka' stsal pas/ rdorje sems dpa'i de dang mi gnyis gcig pa'i gang zag rnab 'byor pa rnams kyis rgyud 'di'i do rtogs par gyur te// spyod pa thams cad kyi rtul
154b7(rnying rgyud): brtson pa don ldan gyi chud las/ yon tan dang rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po btsod padon ldan gyi rgyud las gsungs pa med pa'i mdzod/ sems kyi 'bras bu mtshogs ma ti rdzogs so// ba zhes tshe ga sa ba na pa
155a1(rnying rgyud): rgyag ga du/ shAng+gA rba tanA ma hA na ma/ bdagad \u0f7f/ zhab sa skang rgyan po nas byas/ btsab ldan 'das dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'chab la// 'di ska bdag gis brgyan pa'i dus gcag / dang zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyilas
155a2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi btsun mo'i lug la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod dang / yum sangs rgyas spyan/
155a3(rnying rgyud): ma dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yum dbyings phyag ma dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / yum mA ma ki dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / yum gos dkar mo dang / don yod grub pa dang / yum dam tshig slol ma dang / nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs lnga'i sa
155a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas yab yum rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ se'i snying po dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rin chen phreng ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / pad+ma dbyangs mkhan ma dang / phyag na rdo rje
155a5(rnying rgyud): dang / las kyi gar mkhan ma dang / nang gi byang chub sems dpa' yang yum rnams kyang bzhugs so// byams pa dang / rdo rje bdug slos ma dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / rin chen me tog ma dang / kun tu bzang po dang / pad+ma mar ma ma dang / 'jam dpal dang /
155a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi dri chab ma dang / phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sems ma rnams kyang bzhugs so// gzhan yang rigs dug 'dul bar mdzad pa ni/ lha'i thub pa srid thub 'dzin dang / lha ma yin gyi thub pa rnam par chal ba dang / mi'i thub pa shAkya seng ges mtho ris gnas gsum
155a7(rnying rgyud): po 'dul ba'i zhing du yang gzigs so// grol song gi thub pa seng ge rab brtan dang / yi dwags kyi thub pa kha 'a bar rgyal po dang / dmyal ba'i thub pa chos kyi rgyal pos ngan song gnas gsum 'dul ba'i zhing du gzigs so// gzhan yang gdug pa can 'dul ba'i gshin rje
155b1(rnying rgyud): gshed dang / gsang ba'i yum rgyas 'dabs ma dang / stobs po ze rnam par rgyal ba dang / gsang ba'i yum tshe 'pheb ma dang / rta'i mgrin pa can dang / gsang ba'i yum za byed ma dang / bdud rtsi dkyil pa dang / gsang ba'i yum tshangs byed ma dang / rig pa'i grogs
155b2(rnying rgyud): mos sgo bsrung bar mdzad do// gzhan yang rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' mang ba dang bcas pa ni dpe na til gyi gang bu ltar bstsags sa// zhib lha spyad las sbed gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos gakhod kyi 'jig
155b3(rnying rgyud): rten thams cad la gzigs nas/ rang gi btsun mo la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do/ zhugs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad la bde bas khyab pa 'o/ la la ni go rim gyi bang ba bzhi shar ro// la la ni phyi nang gi gnas pa ltos pa'i bde ba bzhi shar ro// deng ni snang ba
155b4(rnying rgyud): la ltos pa'i bdeb bzhing shar ro// la la ni rang gi ngo bo la smos pa'i bad ba bzhir shar ro// de nas 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngoms nas 'di skad ces brjod do// mar me mang po khyim du sbyar gyur kyang // mig med pa la mun par snang ba bzhin
155b5(rnying rgyud): lhan cig sus pas kun la khyab mod kyang // nya yang rmongs pa nyid la shinas ring // skal na sams can thabs kyis grol ba'i phyir// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs las byung ba // ka dag ldan grub rdul thal chen pa'i chos// gnas lugs rang bzhin ni 'ji zhir gnas/
155b6(rnying rgyud): khams gsumasas can rang sems ma rig pa// khams gsum nyon mongs snang ba'i rang bzhin can// gadrug sems can skye ba rnam pa'i la// rang rgyud phung po ga ba gang du gnas// dal 'byor ba ni nyams kyi snang ba la// gdul bya sprul pa yini pa rnam pa ca// sgra gsung
155b7(rnying rgyud): mazang rgyan gyi 'khar mo'i thugs// bde bar gshegs pa'i slong ba rnam dag pa// sugasum su ni su rdza spang 'bi/ mazang byin 'bras bung gi ba ltar bzhugs// thapa nganas mas can gdul dka' ba/ khyod kyib 'dul ba'i drus la bab// gshelas 'bras bu
156a1(rnying rgyud): na man ma na nanan du smra
156a2(rnying rgyud): chang byid khon nyid ma btsas pa'i gzug sa dngos pon pas gnas pags citing nga 'dzini la sgrubs pa shugs nas/ thung chung bems dang rnams 'am na rdzogs par thu ba'i phrer 'di gsungs so// ma mnyar btugs dbar chos// gnas chags ngam nyid kyiga'o//
156a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang 'dras pa kun gyi rgya// bcing tshul med pa rang gis gnas// e maH rag rtogs pa'i chos// skad can rnal 'byor chen pa ni// snong brgyad thams cad shes rab6// b+hag r+b+ha ga ga cher ba rtogs// e ma ha rab tu rtogs pa'i tshus// grang chen
156a4(rnying rgyud): banApa byu ne// blan bcing lab wam dbyings ye shes// 'de chen mas sa sangs rgyas sa// e ma tshang ba tu btsun pa'i chos// man ngag rdzogs pa chen po ni// kwa shing srid pas bsdus pa chos// sel med sangs rgyas nyid du gnas// dag pa chen mtshas tsasa?/
156a5(rnying rgyud): branal mam ngang gis rigs// mam char bang chos// can mtshan ma 'das pa rnams// tshal kyi dang \u0f89\u0fa4 kyis ga// dus gsum thal pa malus pa// rgya byab tshag tu gongs pas so// gang pon depas pags yang //
156a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu bsngags// lenas phran ces grab pang// dbang gag dag rin chen kyang // mngan das par dang rjod do// ti mra ky-ilan chud meng kyar// ye shes ra A ma rtogs pa// tsan mongs 'khor bang gis med// ga ma thugs nyid drug dag pa'o// dngas
156a7(rnying rgyud): gshis kyi gnas lugs nyid// bcing med rnam par grol med pa'i// ma nas ldan grangasangs cas tsham// btsun gyi grong rna tshogs mdza// ces gsungs so// ba spyad chen po pas gzhiganas lugs rang bzhin gyis ning btsun pa stel dug bum par//
156b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dpal rin chen 'byung ldan nyid/ 'khrul pa thams cad grob par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dre gsungs sa// bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin 'di// khams gsum yongs la ye nas gnas// lhad cig tus
156b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma rig pa// lus dang grib ma lta bur byung // bskal pa sngon las bsags pa yi// 'khor ba sngon gyi rnam smin byung // las su nyon mongs lnga po yis// 'byung la 'dus pa'i phung por srin// snod kyi 'jig rten snang ba yang // sangs rgyas zhing khams yin par shes
156b3(rnying rgyud): shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing // lhon dpal ldan nub phyogs bde// byang phyogs rnam dag bkod pa // dbus kyi byang chub snying por gnas// 'di la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhing // gud na med par rab togs la// mi dge bcu po khro bcu'i mtshams/
156b4(rnying rgyud): mongs lnga po mtshon cha lnga// spyi bo sna tshogs rdo rdal// rkang mthil rdo rje'i sa gzhil// rtsib ma rdo rje ra ba dang // pags pa rdo rje'i gur du phub// ba spu mda' yi dA ba yin// san mo me dpung rab tu 'bar// lus khams bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// 'byung ba lnga 'am
156b5(rnying rgyud): bzhir gnas pa// khams dgu 'dus pa'i drangs ma ni// rang byung bdud kyi'i mchod pa nyid// dbang po rnam drug 'dod yon drug/ pad+ma ra bya mchod rdzas nyid// kun gzhi chos kyi pho brang du// yid ni kun bzang rang byung sku// lus dang ngag lid rnam pa gsum// ya na
156b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs par gnas pa'o// rang gi lus nyid 'dom gang la// thams cad tshang bar gnas pa ni// kun gzhi de tid nyon yid med// yid ni chu nyid ar gnas so// rkang mthib rlung la sum mdom// lte brtsal snying gas// skal tshigs ri rebs ni me// mi mnya
156b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i grang zhi pus// snying ga'i cung gi sgo bzhi la// rkang brgyad ka ba rnam pa brgyad// mig gnyis pa ny+tsar khA la// snga ni rin chen bu nyid// son drab da la// lho ru 'dod yon lha mo 'byung // na brta babs nyid du gnas// steng ni mi 'jigs
157a1(rnying rgyud): ge'i gdan// mkhal ma stobs ba kra glang por// mar+tha rab rdzu 'phrul rta pa khre// mchin pa dbang bcu ma bya nyid// zla bzugs med nam mkhang ltung // pho ba rin chen khri rkang la// mchin dri dkar nag ti zla'i gdan// rgyu yang chags med/
157a2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma yin// khyab byed gzugs phung rnam snang mdzod// srog 'dzin rnam shes mi bskyod pa// me mnyam tshor ba rin chen 'byung // gye na rgyu 'dra shes snang mtha' yas// thu sil 'du byed don yod grub// sra ba sa ni sangs rgyas spyan// nam mkha' dbyings phyug ma nyid
157a3(rnying rgyud): la// mnyen pa'i chu dbyings mA ma ka// dro ba'i me dbyings gos dkar mo// bskyod pa'i rlung ni dam tshig sgrol// bcud ni yab la snod ni yum// spyad byar gyur pa'i btsun mo yin// chu bas snying me rlung mig/ gzugs ni sgeg mor gnas pa'o// shin tu rgyu ba nam mkha'
157a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// nam steng sA la gnas pa dang // dri ni lha mo phreng ba mo// mngon par chub sman ras gzigs// rdon chon par byed pa ste// rin lha mo glu le na ma// rab tu chub phrag drong nyid// rna ba la gnas thos pa la// sgra ni las kyi gar byed ma// rnam shes dbang
157a5(rnying rgyud): po'i byang chub sems// yul la snang ba mched pa dang // thob par byed pa snang ba gsum// byams pA me yi chung du bshad// dpyid ni 'das dus zlos me ma// sgribase la sna yi rlung yin te// de ltar dbyar ni me tog ma// kun bzang me ni mngon par bya// 'byung dus ston te/
157a6(rnying rgyud): mar ma ma// 'jam dpal rlung nyid gnas pa yang // mnges dgun dri dri cha ba ma// dbang por swAta bzhi lha 'dri kun// dang la yai nas dus spyod yul// yid ni snyi rnga thabs ma N+Di ga yab// chos ni stong pa shes rab yum// zhe sdang dmyal bar snang ba yang // thub pas na
157a7(rnying rgyud): sdang me yang gsod// ser snas yi dregs snang ba yang // nga rgyaba'i snyin thub pa yin// gti mug la song smos pa la// thub pas gti mug mun pa sel// ladi chags mi yi skye gnas da// 'dod chags drug 'joms shAkya Sh+Taba~M// bod thos lha ma yin buH/
157b1(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan bral bas lha mi na thug// phrag dog lha yi gnas snang bas// phrag dog lcags 'grol lha la thub// sras kyi 'dus te reg pa ni// rdo rje rag pagashin rje'i gshed// reg pa srabs yin te// rtog par ma yin lcags su ma// lus kyi dbang po rag byed
157b2(rnying rgyud): nyid// yab kyi rdo rje stobs po che// gsher bar 'byung ba cu nyid ste// chad par ma yi nA zhags pa ma// lus kyi yul ni rig bya nyid// yum gyi pad+ma rta mgrin dpal// tsha zhing dro ba me pin te// bdag tu ma yin lhags sgrog ma// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni// dam rdzas
157b3(rnying rgyud): dkar dmar bdud rtsi 'khyil// g.yo rlung stod pade'i nam mkha' ni// mtshan mar ma yin dril bu ma// srid gsum khams gsum sems can la// ye nas rang la lhun gyis grub// rang gnas chen po rtogs gyur nas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de nas
157b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dpal gyis/ tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor rang la gnas pa 'di gsungs so// spyi gtsug bde chen dkyil 'khor na// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum la// sgo ba yab yum brgyad kyis bskor// 'di ni sku yi dkyil 'khor te// rtsa dang thig le sngags
157b5(rnying rgyud): dang rlung // dbu yi gtsug tor rtse mo ni// rigs bdag kun bzang yab yAm la// thub drug sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// 'di ni spyi yi dkyil 'khor yin// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor la// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum la// snyan ras gzigs dadabum
157b6(rnying rgyud): dang // kun bzang mar me ma yis bskor// 'di ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// gnas rten grub pas g.yo bar grub// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la// mi bskyod yab dang yum du bcas// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang // byams pa bdug spos ma yis bskor// 'khor
157b7(rnying rgyud): lo thig le sngags dang rlung // 'di ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ lte basprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ dkon mchog dpal ni yab yum la// nam mkha'i snying po phreng ba ma// slobasel me tog ma dang bcas// 'di ni yon tan 'khor bcas te// 'khor lo khams brdud
158a1(rnying rgyud): sngags dang zung // gsang ba me rlung 'khor lo la// thub pa gdon mi zab la// phyag na rdo rje gar ma dang // dngam dpal dri chab ma yis bskor// 'khor lo bdud rtsi yi ge g.yos// 'di ni phrin las 'khor lo yin// gnas brtsa yi rang bzhin
158a2(rnying rgyud): las// dkyil 'khor spros pa bsgom par bya// grub pa sngags kyi yi ge las// tshom bu spros pa bsgom par bya// lus khams bdud rtsi thig le las// zhal phyag spros pa bsgom par bya// snying po rlung gi yan lag las// rnam grangs spros pa bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor
158a3(rnying rgyud): blo yi khyad par las// chu las nya ljang ji bzhin du// snying po brjod pas phyag rgyar gsal// cig char lam du bsgom par bya// srid pa mngal nas chags tshul du/ lo dang zla bas smin pa bzhin// chu rkyen 'dus pa las byung ba// rim gyis bslabs te bsgom par bya// zhes
158a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// zhi ba lha chud chen po las/ rang rgyud phung po len 'a sems can thams cad la gnas paste le'u bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyis gdul b+ha thams cad zhing dag par gzung ba 'di gsungs so// ji ltar gdul bya
158a5(rnying rgyud): byung nas// de nyid lam du byas pa yi// chos 'di sdod ldan kun don du// rdo rje snying po nyid la bshad// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid// stong gsum zhing khams grangs med par// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor kun spros nas// khams gsum sems can mtha' yas pa/
158a6(rnying rgyud): 'dul phyir dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du snang // gang zhig rigs kyis 'dul ba la// gti mug can la bde gshegs rigs// zhe sdang 'dul phyir mi bskyod pa// nga rgyal can la dkon mchog dpal// 'dod chags 'dra tshe dpag med// phrag
158a7(rnying rgyud): dog don grub las kyi rigs// rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di dag gis// 'dod dang thar par bsrub phyed// gang gis mtshon pas 'dul ba la// rang bzhin sra mdog snang ba yang // snum zhing dngas la mdzes shing srug/ dbyibs mdzes mdangs gsal mdog phyed 'phro// gang zhig
158b1(rnying rgyud): bsgyur bas 'dul ba la// rtag pa chen po shad+d+ha ste/ mi bskyod in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ rin chen 'byung ldan bcom gser// pad+ma rAg tshe dpag med// don grub in+da nI la yin// rigs mthun mdog tu gnas pa'am// yang na nyi shu rtsa lngar ston// zhab phyag 'dul
158b2(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa la// chos sku spros pa med pa'i phyir// zhal ni gcig tu bstan pa yin// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel ba'i phyir// phyag ni gnyis su bstan pa yin// thabs dang shes rab mnyam pas na// zhabs kyang rdo rje'i skyi la krung bzhugs// bkri dang 'bras bu rnam thar
158b3(rnying rgyud): gsum// nges don 'bras bu sku gsum snang // de phyir zhal yang gsum du bstan// nges par chos nyid zhal las 'das// pha rol phyin drug snang ba yang// sbyin pa btang zhing tshul khrims bsrungs// brtson 'grus brtsams shing bsam gtan bsgoms/ bzod pa
158b4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms nas shes rab rtogs// hUM yi lam nas bgrod 'dul ba// rdo rje phyag kyang drug tu byung // stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // chos dbyings me phong lta bu dang // so sor rtog dang mnyam pa nyid// bya ba grub par bzang phyin pas// 'bras bu'i sgo nas mthar phyin pas/
158b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag mtshan drag po rnams// dbyings dang ye shes mi 'bral zhing // thabs dang shis rab skyong ba dang // snang stong thung du 'jug pa dang // yul sems dbyer med snang bas na// gdul bya'i shes par grob mtshon pas// yab yum zhabs dang skyil krung 'brel//
158b6(rnying rgyud): chos 'dul bar gyur pa pa// rig pa'i dbang lnga rdzogs pa dang // rigs gcig rigs lnga dbyer med kyi // dbul rin chen zeng thog pa// kun 'dang nang du sems bzlog pas// gtsug tor por tshugs yid bzhin bar// mra stegs lta ngan rab 'joms pas/
158b7(rnying rgyud): boral pa'i tshe dang ni 'phyang // ro rgyang thabs dang shes rab ldan// phyogs rnams mdzes pa'i cod pa na mdzes// rigs rnams 'de bas gar bas na// matog rgyan posatha~Md bcings mdzes// byang rbab yan lag bdun ldan pas// rdo dran mthul chung bung rgyan dang /
159a1(rnying rgyud): reg dang ni do shal dang // rtsa gzhabs gdu bus rab tu mdzes// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad ldan pas// bkra shis rtags brgyad lus la rdzogs// cha lcags che pos brjid bas na/ sgra yi stod g.yogs rab mdzes shing // gsung gi/
159a2(rnying rgyud): skad dkris smra ba dang ldan// thugs kyi ba du ldan rnam par bgos// yon tan chos gos pasdams nas ni// mngadza dpa las kyi chu rlung ldan// zhing 'ams rnam par dag pas na// rtsub po pa zla ba'i dkyilang bor dang // snga pa 'od kyi gang bu dang // 'od zer dra bas rab tu smra/
159a3(rnying rgyud): gdul bya'i rab bskad mdzad pas// baspu'i bug re re nas// 'od zer byed drug stong // bdag shegs snang ba sna tshogs s+hon// mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa la// dpe byad 'bras bum sbas pa'i phyir// sems dpa'i yab yum rang gi rig// mas kyi tshogs kyis kun nang sgras//
159a4(rnying rgyud): sras chags ma pus pa rnams kyang // rigs ma'i dgongs pa tshang bas na// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan cing // spyad cha na chen 'byung ldan la// mgrul chu snang ba mthad pas te// do shal sru ga rnam snang mdzad// phyag zhabs ga/ du bu don grub pa// dbu rgyan mi bskyod
159a5(rnying rgyud): pA yi brdang // phyag mtshan 'dul par dgongs pa la// dngos po 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang // rmad kyang sgrogs pa'i 'khor lo bskor// dgos 'dod skong ba'i rin po che// skyon gyis ma gos parla 'bar// log lha 'joms pa'i rab gri dang // myos kyi sgra sgrogs dril bu rnams//
159a6(rnying rgyud): rigs rnams dbyer med yin pas ni// phyag mtshan gcig pa klad byung tshang// sa badra tho ba dang rig 'dzin pas// sa snyi da/ yin can stag// dam snying mning ga pa bri 'dzid// sman gzigs dmang po badz+ra dka // phyag rdo ljang gu rdorje bsnams// snang bag su gyis
159a7(rnying rgyud): grol ba dang // rdzas kyi longs spyod ldan pas na// sgeg mo mo pong rin chen 'greng // pad+ma gling rung gang byed pas// byams dkar k+Sha zhing sbos me yum// sgribasel mthib ga pusti nyid// yum ni me tog phreng ba nyid// kun bzang dmar skya rin chen te// yum ni mar ma
159b1(rnying rgyud): dod gsapa skang // 'jam dpal ljang ser ut+pa la// yum ni dri chab srin mtheb 'thor// rigs bdag thams cad dbyer med pas// kun bzang yab yum mnyam gzhag rgyu// lha rnams le pos g.yengs pa la// brtson 'grus mthar phyin pi wang rol// lha min khod khro
159b2(rnying rgyud): 'thab rtsod la// 'dul phyir bsam gtan go mtshon bsnams// mi rnams 'dod chags bza' btung chags// de phyir tshul khrims gseg par bsnams// byol song gti mug 'thibabs pa phyir// po ti shes rab pha rol phyin// yi drags bkres skom 'jungs pas na/
159b3(rnying rgyud): dephyir sbyin pa rin chen sgrom// dmyal ba zhe sdang tsha gang la// me chu bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// 'chi ba dag bdud 'dul 'khor ba 'dren// gshin rje thod dbug lcags kyu yum// stobs chen phung po'i bdud 'dul bas// rdo rje gnon te zhags pa yum// nyon mongs bdud 'joms
159b4(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin dpapa// thod sbrul bsnams te lcags sgrog yum// lha bdud bdud rtsi 'khyil dngul bas// rdo rje rgya gram dril bu yum// zhi ba'i mdzad pas 'dul don du// yab kyi sku yi tshul bzhi ni// gsal tsher lhan sdug gzi byin ldan// yum gyi tshul lnga ldan pas na// mnyen
159b5(rnying rgyud): lhag 'khril lde ma gzhon tshul can// thub drug sems dpa' don mdzad pas// 'od zer 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po// sgo skyong gdug pa 'dul bas na// 'bar pa'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// spyir ni kun dang kun bzang yum// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa'o// bzhugs
159b6(rnying rgyud): thabs 'dul bar dgongs pa las// sangs rgyas rnams ni lab yin pas// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rig ma gzungs ma yum rnams ni// pad+ma'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' yab yum rnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//
159b7(rnying rgyud): thub pa 'gro ba'i don mdzod pas// bzhengs nas gdul byar mthun par bzhugs// sgo ba gdug pa 'dul bas na// yab lum babyangs bsums dor thabs bzhugs// phrin las dngul bar dgongs pa la// yab lngas phung po byin gyis brlab// yum lngas 'byung ba byin gyis
160a1(rnying rgyud): brtag// byang sems rang rgyud bkra shis byeng // thub pas nyon mongs 'dul zhing skyong // kun bzang thabs shes 'azal par brlab// khro bos mtshams gcod gdug pa 'dul// gdam khris 'dul bar dgongs pa dang // chos byung khor lo bkod//
160a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdan// 'og gzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bar// dgos 'dod re ba skong bas na// yid bzhin rin chen khri dang brtsegs// yon tan cha bas bcom pas na// stobs bcu tshang ba glang po'i gdan// mi 'jigs bzhi bcom seng ge nyid// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi rta yi gdan/
160a3(rnying rgyud): dbang bcu mtshon pas rma byal// phrin pas thogs med nam mkha' lding // sa yi khyad par bgrod pas na// nyi ma tha ba pad+ma'i gdan// 'bras bu'i sa gsum gnon pa'o// gnas kyis 'dul bar dgongs pa la// khyad par 'phags pa 'og min gnas// gzhan min rang snang /
160a4(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i khyim// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga nyid// de nyid kun gzhi pho brang la// gdos pa can las rab grol bas// phyi nang med par gsal ba ni// shel gyi phor par bcud bzhag 'dra// khyad par zhing khams lngar yang snang // zhes gsungs so// zhi ba lha byung chen po
160a5(rnying rgyud): las/ ji ltar gdul bar bya bskul par byung ba'i le'u b+hal pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dadas rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nyid lam du bya bang di dag gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga pa// lam ni rnam pa gnyis yod de// grol lam lci ba bstan
160a6(rnying rgyud): dang // thabs lam dbang gis bgrod par bshad// lta ba bden pa dbyer med nyid// sgor 'dun ra ba nyid du gnas// bder gshegs dbyel khor spyan drangs nas// mchod pas rab tu dgyes par bya// rang gi gnas rnams spang par bya// yi ge a dkar pas skye
160a7(rnying rgyud): ri rab rje la lha yi gnas// lha ma yin gyi sum ga// ri ba khor ser nang na gnas// gling ba ni min rdo sngon po// bzhi ding gling phrad badru gnyis gnas// byol song du yig bung ga ni// gyi yi rgya mtsho nang na'o// phred mer las gyes ye drags rnams/
160b1(rnying rgyud): 'di gong yin spyod ga g.yod dam/
160b2(rnying rgyud): gnas na yod// dmyal ba tre yig nag po de// rdo rje gdan gyi 'og na gnas// 'di drug 'dod khams gnas rnams sbyangs// gzug sa khams bsam gtan mu bzhi sogs// yi ge slod shes par bya// gzugs med skye mjed mu ba ni swa// nyams nas mas la 'cha
160b3(rnying rgyud): ba yin// kar ni lus la 'char ba yin// sngags ni ngag la 'char ba dang // mthong snang yul la 'chang ba la// bag chags rmi lam shar ba ni// khams gsum gnas las nges par grol// 'bru gsum sbyangs na nges par ni// sku gsum gnas pa bzhugs par ba
160b4(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas bdag ni bsgral zhes bya// gang zhig thugs rjes gzhan bsgral na// zhing du gyur pa'i bsgral bya rnams// mnyes pa lnga dang stong pa lnga// dgongs pa lnga dang gyur pa lnga// de sogs yum gyi mkha' la 'phangs// sku gsum rgyal ba'i zhing du nges// tshogs chen gnyis
160b5(rnying rgyud): kyang rdzogs par 'gyur// thabs kyi pham la sbyor 'dod na// rang don gsal ba rnam pa gsum// gsang dbang shes rab ye shes dang // bde ba chen po'i dbang gsum nyid// gtum mo 'khor lo srog shing gsum// 'di las 'byung ba'i lam yin no// lus kyi 'khrung
160b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor legs gnas na// rlung gis me ni rab tu 'bar// k+Sha ni kun tu bzang po nyid// bdud rtsi 'bab pa kun bzang mo// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// rang gi lus kyi lha rnams mnyes// ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor pa yis thob par 'gyur//
160b7(rnying rgyud): la dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// bsgoms pas bde ba rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba sngags kyi yig 'bru bzhi// snying po rlung gi gnas pa pa ni// dkyil 'khor srog shing rnam pa gsum// lus dang ngag dang yid du gnas// srid pa gsum dang grong khyer gsum// 'khor ba
160b8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin 'das pa gsum// gzhan don sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bde gshegs yum lnga gzungs ma ni// glang po can ma sangs rgyas spyan// dung can ma ni dbyings phyug ma// ri hwags can ma lA ma kI// ri mo can ni gos dkar mo// sna tshogs can ma dam tshig sgol/
161a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba nyid ni gas // dgas skabs pa te// nyid tag parnas pa gyu/ gzu ba med da pa ga pab// rnab na ga da// gab na na na 'a dpag/ ga sa ma dngas rnan ma byung byung/
161a2(rnying rgyud): drug sems dpar shar// phyi yi gnas la ltas pa ni// lum gyi khol bur byams paskyes// sras la phal ger grib sel nyid// bran tu bzang pos sul kun byab// 'jam dpal snang dngos bde bar 'char// nang gi gnas pa ltos pa yul// bad baN+DI/ mthun mas pa
161a3(rnying rgyud): nyid// mchog bde mgrin snying me tog 'thong // steng gasgrub mar me gsal// skye ba gsang gnas ldan skyes dri// sgang du ltos pa rnam pa pa ke/ sa srung gzugs 'dzin rags rim 'god// nam snying bdag rtog 'gas de sa gog/ gzugs kyi rtog 'gos spyan
161a4(rnying rgyud): ras gzigs// bde gsum rtog 'gog phyag rngar nyid// rang gi ngo bor ltos pa pa'i// bde ba rdo rje nag mam// mchog padi rin chen phreng ba la// 'de bas pad+ma kra pan pa// ldan skyes las sdi gang mkhan nyid// gad cig bzhi ru sha pa na// rnam pa snga tshogs sa
161a5(rnying rgyud): cig ma// kho bo gshin rdzing gshed po yin// rnam par nyed pa'i skad cig ma// khro bo stobs chen gzhan mi zung // rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma// kho bo rta mchog chen po la// mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig la// khro bo bdud rtsi dbyil pa yir// drod gsum
161a6(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bzhi byung ba// dbar ba'i drong ni rnam pa gnIs// dang po 'bar balhags rnas// rab rta 'bar ba shags pa nyer// rdzogs srog cig le gso ba khyod// dri thA theg pa brgyan pa'i dzad// 'gyur ba drug ni zab padrug/ se tshe rang ba sam pa byed/
161a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal thos 'dral ba men// gleng bzhid pa nga bya ba ni// shwaH seng ges 'tha~Md mjed// ra 'a na rang gi gnas su smyer// le dwags pang bar 'du byed // dbang po'i mchog ni steng dra ba dag// lha mi bkas pas mam pa dngapa// rag sag nga
161b1(rnying rgyud): sing ga dam ldan 'dul ba pa// ta 'dzin phru pha Ta mdang gzung phangs// bgang pas tshim pa lhas lan// kun ta bzang po'i brub sas// dbabs pas mkhas myur du nyams// gzung ba mi ga pas 'di yang zung // brjog pa mi mabs chu dang snang // dgram pa mimakhas na
161b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// kun tu bzang mo'i mkhas pa bzhi// dbab par mkhas pas rus sbal 'bros// gzung mkhas lus ngag 'gyur ba gsum// 'phrog mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba ba'i// khyab mkhas na ma gro la phyag rgya bca'// 'dod chags thar ba byeng chub sems// bzhi bcwa rtsa
161b3(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// zhi ba nud chen po las/ lam dbang du bya ba chags lam lha rgyud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ dgongs pa'i phrin las 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par
161b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// b+h+rUM chos nyid spos dang bral ba'i rang bzhin las// cir 'dul thabs kyis bstan pa'i las mdzad pa// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor thig le chen po nas// 'khor 'das byang chub sems kyi rgyun yang 'bebs// longs spyod dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhal hom du/
161b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pas dgyes mdzad cing // chos dbyings dkyil 'khor chen po'i klong yangs nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa kun mkhyen zhing // sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bde ba 'bebs// 'gro drug skyed mdzad mya ngan 'das par 'dren// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi
161b6(rnying rgyud): bdag pas phrin las mdzad// dang po sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ni// yi ge AM las bskyed nas spu ru sdang // sangs rgyas snang mtha' tshe dpag med pa ni// yi ge AHlas bskyed nas gsung du snang // bde gshegs rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa// 'gyur med hUM pas
161b7(rnying rgyud): sprub nas thugs su snang // yon tan rin 'byung sangs rgyas dkon mchog dpal// sA las sprul nas yon tan yid bzhin snang // las mdzad grub pa gdon mi za ba ni// hra las skyes nas phrin las mdzad par snang // rigs kyi sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// grub pa sngags
162a1(rnying rgyud): don mdzad kyis yang// bcad ma thacan gas bdagaras snang ma dang / brgyad byang chub sa sdus nis D+ha// gzhananags 'ang ngas dus 'das/ 'argyu shA ltung ba zang pas / brlabs banag byad yad chag
162a2(rnying rgyud): chen mangs yum mtshag sangs rgyas spyan// th+ya sha sa kha' la 'phyo ba dbyings phug me// mgyogs byed ta ni dbyings phyug snga ma ke/ bgrang skyon gyis mgos na bza' dka / NI sha las rib dmatshig sgopa mar snang // khams kyi dang sam bdud rtsi mchog gi sgra// rigs /

162a4(rnying rgyud): chubs yi snying po sgeg mo su// byams pa ga blos ma me lu ru sbyang // phyir la ldang ba kun tu bzang po nyid// nang du 'jug po bud drug 'gro don rdzogs// khong du gnas pa kun tu 'azang mo nyid// kha slong bzung ba sgo srung yab yum bcad// bzhi bcwa rtsa gces

162b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes ma dbyed ma thas 'dug// mngon pa// hUM rje r+the'aM/ NA~M// A ga/ ta ba coM// myeg ra te/ na ts+tsha/ b+hU dza n+da d+hA par ti/ brtad pa'i gsang thogs des byag// rgyal ba rigs lnga ba zum /
