163b5(rnying rgyud): tog dag bde bcas// ye shes rang shar mtshan mnon// rang shar ldan thub dang sa cings// de ltar 'bras bunis pa'i// gzhan nami yang 'a ma yin tAM// 'gro ba gcig nyid re reb 'ang // lus ngag yid ladus pa lnga// gnas bzhin ma 'dres tshangs rdzogs shis//
163b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos pa chen ngas// rtag pa rgyan du thug pa ste// sems cananams sa / dben cug gta canan// 'angs thong chags pa'i thupa / ga ma bangs kyi/ sa bdu/ la dang tha thug
163b7(rnying rgyud): mngan byang su dngo ngo dzing zla// rang bzhin drugs kyis drugasong ste// des gzungs so// shib tu kyang chen pa las/ mthar byin pa'i ni sa sbyin gyi grub pa nasas padru chu dam spyod pa las// ma ldan 'das
164a1(rnying rgyud): brtan// churnams ca hA// pa pa ga// ngagatanams drug zugs pa dus/ rdzogs pa gangs// 'byung byed pa // 'as pa/
164a2(rnying rgyud): rlung rnams rang gdangs mar// dbyer med rdo rje mngon byang chub// rigs pa dag dbyer med kun pa khyab pa'i sku// stong pa'i bdag nyid kun bzang khyod phyag 'tshal// ye shes lnga las skur snang yongs stod rdzogs// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin nyid du snang // 'byung ra dzA yi yum
164a3(rnying rgyud): dang rnam par bakhri // bachad pa'i skyes bu byed la bdag phyag 'tshal// chu bo bzhin du rgyun tshad med par gnas// dang po de las byung nas bya ba rnyed// mthang ma dang brib rang gi gnas la bzhugs// 'gro ba'i nang sos mdzad pa sla gyi gnas// 'jig rten thags bzhin
164a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ring bzhin can// rgyud rgyal dgongs pa can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ bdug so gas rnams kyis ji ltar gzung bar bya// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba pa/ chu dang di skang ngan kun la gsang ba dang // dmi ldan snod ldan rnams 'khyod kyis gta
164a5(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs pas rjes su yi rang ngo // zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las/ rjes su yi rang bste le'u dgra pa'o// / zhi ba lha rgyad chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra mas twA las/ 'o tsA ba pad+ma du ces bsgyur ba'o//
164a6(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ d+ham hA shAn+ta de ba tan+ta/ 'od skad du/ chos nyid zhi ba'i lha rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun bzang kun tu zhi ba'i phyi laM phyag tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i lha zhig thams cad du rang gi sems
164a7(rnying rgyud): gnas so// sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nim mapar ci la yang mi gnas/ ci la yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa'o// de bzhin du sems dang kun tu bzang po yang de bzhin no// de de bzhin nyid do// chos nyid ni sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas ni mtha' pa
164b1(rnying rgyud): gnas shing dbus su mi 'dzin pa'o// sangs rgyas ni phyogs su mi 'dzin cing / nga mi byed pa'o// sangs rgyas ni dang du mi len cing ga tsor ming dren pa/ skyon du meng do ning sbyang bar mi byed pado// de bzhin du dbyings dpo 'byur med pa'o// sems skye ni med pa'o// rag pa'
164b2(rnying rgyud): 'bral med pa'o// gnag zhi bzang ngan med pa'o// rtog pa lho dru ba med pa'o// ye shes ldog 'ju med pa'o// dus la nyin mtshan med pa'o// bsgom pa 'byung 'jug med pa'o// yul mdun rgyab med pa'o// gsung la skye gag med pa'o// thugs pa rtag tshad med
164b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// yon tan bde sdug med pa'o// phrin las rtsol bsgru ba med pa'o// de lta bu zhig gi rang bzhin yin kyang / chos nyid skyon du mthong ba dang / chos can mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / sems la dngos por 'dzin pa rnams la/ rnam par dbye ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
164b4(rnying rgyud): yul dang dbang po'o// sems dang srung ba'o// d+hi dang nangango // d+hA dang bras sbya'o// sangs rgyas dang sems can no// de la 'ams can thams cad ni/ ma ga pas sems canan// de bas kyang thams cad pa chags pas sems can no// depas kyang thams cad
164b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sems can no// de la sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ bsam pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang thams cad pam chags pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang thams cad la mi 'dzin pas sangs
164b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// de bas kyang mi 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so// sems can thams cad ni yod par 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang yod la rtag par 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang rtag la ther zug par 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang ther
164b7(rnying rgyud): zug par 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sems can no// sangs rgyas thams cad ni gang la yod med du mi blta bas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang rtag par mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang ther zug par mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang ther zug par mi 'dzin
165a1(rnying rgyud): pangam btas pa sa su sa// mas na sa na/ sa // das kyang rnyan pa mas dzin pa sa mas cad// dbas kyang tha byar na /
165a2(rnying rgyud): mthu brtas pas sems can no// sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi bye bar mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang ming chi bar mkhyen pas sangs nas so// de bas kyang 'pho 'gu med pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang 'pho 'gyur med par mkhyen pa'i mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so//
165a3(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad ni phyogs dang ris su bltas pas kyang sems can no// de bas kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang rtag pa dang chad par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang yod pa dang med par blta bas kyang sems can no// de bas
165a4(rnying rgyud): kyang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bar blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang bzang ba dang ngan par bltabs sems can no// de bas kyang grub pa dang ma grib par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang bde ba dang sdug par blta bas sems can no// de pas kyang yin pa dang ma yin par
165a5(rnying rgyud): bstabs sems can no// de bas kyang snang ba dang mi blang bar bstabs sems can no// de ngas kyang de rnams kyi mthubartas pas sems can do// sangs ces thams cad ni phyogs dang ris su mi bltabs sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang sdang ba gzung 'dzin gnyis su mi bslab
165a6(rnying rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas so// dpas kyang rtag ched gnyis su mi blta bas kyang sangs byas so// degs kyang yod med gnyis sum bstabs sangs rgyas so// debs kyang gtsang ba dang me gtsang ba gnyis su me par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang bzang ba dang nganas gnye
165a7(rnying rgyud): mad par mkhyen pas sangs rgyasas// dengs kyang grub pa dang mgrub pa gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs tsas so// de ces kyang da nga lda gnyis me dpar babyed ngams sa rgya so// debs kyang yin pa dngas gnyis su me par ma rkyen pa
165b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// de bas kyang snang ba dang mi snang ba gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang de rnams kyi mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med na chos nyid do// mtshan ma med na chos nyid do// stong pa nyid na chos nyid do// dngos
165b2(rnying rgyud): med na chos nyid do// skye ba med na chos nyid do// 'gag pa med na chos nyid do// 'phos pa med na chos nyid do// sems can thams cad ni mtha' la mi gnas na sems nyid do// dbus pa mi gnas na sems nyid do// mtha' dbus gnyis ka la mi gnas na sems nyid do//
165b3(rnying rgyud): yon pa la mi gnas na sems nyid do// med pa pa mi gnas na sams nyid do// yod med gnyis ka med na sems nyid do// skyeb la mi gnas na sems nyid do// 'chi ba ba mi gnas na sems nyid dro// skyeng che gnyis ka pa mi gnas na sems nyid do// rdzog ma la mi gnas
165b4(rnying rgyud): sems nyid do// tha ma la mi gnas na sems nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma gnyis ka pa mi gnas na sems nyid do// de'i shes pa ye shes so// de lta bu'i klung du gnas pa la 'khrul pa dang phyin ci log pa'i dbang gas/ sems can gyi gzugs dang dbyibs rnam grangs tha
165b5(rnying rgyud): dad par snang ngo // kha dog dang yul grangs tha dad par snang ngo // gnas dang spyod pa grangs tha dad par snang ngo // de yang thams cad du rang gi sems so// de 'dul ba'i don du sems nyid maskyes pa'i thong nas/ kun tu bzang po chos kyi srung bzhengs pa'i byin gyis rnams pas/
165b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang dbyibs grangs rnam pa tha dad par snang ngo // 'od zer dang zhing khams grangs rnam pa tha dad par snang ngo // bzhugs gnas dang phrin las grangs rnam pa tha dad par snang ngo // de yang snang tsam na thams cad rang gi sems so// sems can gcig gi lus pa
165b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'byung ba chen po lngas bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin gyi chos nyid du mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang la dngos po med par byung bas/ de 'dul ba'i don du yematshan mo ltar sdang ngo // sems can gcig gi lus la phung po lnga tshang bar gnas so//
166a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin pa don chos nyid byang chub sems su mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rang bzhin med pa byung bas/ de 'dul ba'i don du rgyal ba rigs lngar snang ngo // de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i
166a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyad kyang sems dpa' brgyad do// yul dang dus kyang sems ma brgyad do// phyin ci log pas khro bo/ yul gyis khro mo'o// mtshan dang sems dpang bcu drug la sogs pa snang la rang bzhin med par de 'dul ba'i don du snang ngo // sems can gyi gnas na 'gro ba rigs
166a3(rnying rgyud): drug tu snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin gyi// don thugs ye shes su mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang la rang bzhin med pa byung bas de 'dul ba'i don du nyung ba'i skyes bu drug tu snang ngo // sems can gcig la yang phyi nang snod bcud gnas so// sangs
166a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin gyi/ don dbyings dang ye shes su mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku sdang la rang bzhin med par byung bas/ de 'dul ba'i don du yid dang chos su snang ngo // sems can gcig gi shes pa'i rgyud la yang nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong
166a5(rnying rgyud): tshar bar gnas la/ sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa ma yin gyi skye ba med par mkhyen pas/ de gdul ba'i don du chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri ba ni stong du snang ngo // sems can gcig gi gnas skabs la/ lam rgyud lngar gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs na/ de 'dul
166a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don du dpa' bo 'bru war snang ngo // sems can gcig gi gnas skabs na/ nyon mongs pa lngas dbang byas te/ phyin ci log tu gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs na/ de bdul ba'i don du byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin las/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i
166a7(rnying rgyud): don du rdo rje sems dpa'i su phyag rgyar gsal lo// gti mug 'dul bar rnam par snang mdzod kyi sku phyag rgya gsal lo// dargyal 'dul bar rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// 'dod chags 'dul bar snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// phrag dog 'dul
166b1(rnying rgyud): pa don yod grub pa'i sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// ngan song gsum zad par mdzad pas/ de rnams dbu gsum par gsal lo// sku gsung thugs su sna bas kha dog gsum du gsal lo// rgyad drug 'dam nas 'don pas de rnams phyag rgya drug tu gsal po// de yang
166b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes drug tu mthar phyin pas/ phyag mtshan drug tu gsal lo// de yang don chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs pas skyil mo krung du gsal lo// de phyin ci log thams cad las rgyal bas/ dbu rgyan snyan cha la sogs pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du gsal lo//
166b3(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal lam 'dres pas/ bsta tsi tra'i sha ma thabs la sogs pa gsal lo// de yang thabs mkhas pas yab kyi bzhugs tshul du byung ba dang / phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags pas rigs lngar snang ba dang / de nyid ye shes lnga dang ldan pas kha dog
166b4(rnying rgyud): lngar gsal lo// yang chos nyid longs spyod rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i rtags gdan dang khri rkang du gsal lo// thams cad du smon lam mthar phyin pas/ sems can chen po la sogs par gsal lo// de yang chos kyi dbyings dang 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags su yum du byung
166b5(rnying rgyud): ste/ sra bar mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du sangs rgyas spyan ma dang / gsher bar mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du mA ma g+ni dang / dro bar mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du gos dkar mo dang / bskyod par mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du dmachog sgrol ma dang / stong par mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i
166b6(rnying rgyud): don du kun tu bzang mo dang / thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rtags su bud mod+mo yum gyi gzugs su gsal lo// gnyis su med pas gtso gzungs khril pa'i tshul du gsal lo// gnyis su med pa las thams cad byang bas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i
166b7(rnying rgyud): don du/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du/ sa'i snying por gsol lo// de bzhin du snga nam mkha'i snying po dang / lce spyan ras gzigs dang / rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang / mig gi dbang po la sogs pa bzhi/ kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / sgrib pa
167a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal la sogs par gsala'o// de nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i don du/ sems mar byung ste/ yul gzugs lha mo lnga kye mar gsal lo// sgra mA le dang / dri gI ti dang / ro ni rtir gsal po//
167a2(rnying rgyud): de rnams kyang dus bzhir gsal bar byed pas/ lha mo bzhi ste/ 'das pa d+hU per gsal lo// de bzhin du da ltar me tog go// slad kyis 'byung ba mar me/ dus 'byung bar ma nges pa drir gsal lo// de rnams kyang gnyis su med pa chos nyid kyi ros tshims pa'i rtags su/ sems
167a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' sems ma rnams dbyer med par bzhugs so// de yang thams cad drugs pa zhing mthar phyin pas/ bus pa khye'u dang bu mo la sogs gzhon sha chags pa'i mtshan nyid du gsal lo// de yang chu dang dbras bu mthar phyin par mdzad pas/ zla dang 'bras gang byang chub sems dpa
167a4(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ shar phyogs na rdo rje sems dpang dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje legs pa gsal lo/ shar lho mtshams na dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / kun tu bzang po dang / zla 'od gzhon nu dang / bzang skyong kun gsal lo// lho'i phyogs na/ rdo rje rim
167a5(rnying rgyud): chen dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje bzhad pa gsal lo// lho nub mtshams na/ dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rdo rje snying po dang / 'od dpag med dang / nam mkha' mdzod gsal lo// nub phyogs na/ rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje sla
167a6(rnying rgyud): gsal lo// nub byung na/ mya ngan kan 'joms dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes tog dang / blo gros mi zad ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs par gsal le// byang phyogs na rdo rje las dang / rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur du gsal lo// byang shar mtshams na/ ngan
167a7(rnying rgyud): kun 'dren dang / mai tri dang / spos kyi glang po dang / don yod grub par gsal lo// de yang skye bo las dbang 'dul ba la brtson pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dbu lcang lo can du bzhugs so// de las yang rigs bsam gyis mi khyab na yang / mdor drug tu 'dus pas/ lha la brgya byid
167b1(rnying rgyud): gsapa'o// de bzhin du lha ma yin pa thags bzang ris dang / mi la shAkya thub pa dang / byol song la shAkyas ga dang / yi dwags 'kha' bar ma dang / dmyal ba la gshin rdo rjes kyi rgyal po la sogs par gsal lo// phyi nang yid chos pa kun bzang yab yum du gsalalo//
167b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa mi gnas par sel ba'i rtags su khro bo dang khro mo la sogs par gsal te/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang phur ba las dbyung ngo // de thams cad kyang sems can ji ltar 'dul bar tsha ma thun par don mdzad pas/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa la/ mtshan cha sna tshogs
167b3(rnying rgyud): par gsal lo// de las kyang thugs ye shes gsal la ma bsgribs pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyi 'od zer kha dog rnam pa drug tu 'phros te/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / gnag pa dang / rin po che'i kha dog la sogs pa/ re re la yang 'od zer bye ba khrag
167b4(rnying rgyud): khrig gangs drug cu drug cu ste/ drug cu tsho drug las dod kyi lha mo drug cu tsho drug byung bas/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi gling bzhi dang / gling phran dang / lcags ri dang / nye rla la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gyur/ nang bcud kyi 'jig rten skyeng gro ris drug la sogs pa/ grangs
167b5(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad/ long bas gzugs mthong ba/ 'on pas sgra thos pa la sogs pa thams cad dang / snod du rung ba dang / bskul ba dang / dod sbags pa dang / sangs rgyas par lung bstan pa nas rgyal ba rgya mtsho la thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul ba la sogs pa la/
167b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid kyi longs spyod chen por mdzad de/ par 'phro ba dang / tshur 'du ba dang / 'od bsnol ma dang zhugs pa dang / mnyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / dngos grub stsol ba dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin lhan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ dgyes pa
167b7(rnying rgyud): chen po mthar phyin pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs so// de la mkhyab pa med cing / ma 'dus pa dang / mi shong ba dang / phyi nang dang / steng 'og dang / yangs dog med pas/ gzhal yas khang gi rgyan sna tshogs par yang gsal lo// don de bzhin du sems can la sogs pa yod pa'i
168a1(rnying rgyud): nam sa kyadang ngang dbang / dathas bar lachags pa sla pa dra rlobs par spyang ba/ sonan mags sa brgyad d+ha mam chogs brgya bas pa dbang / nam mthang bdang blang napas das pa'i tsho thams cad mnyed
168a2(rnying rgyud): lha rlung du gnyis su med par sangs rgyas par bzugs pa thams cad kyis ma khyen// / zla kyi rnam ba chedang/ ches nyid de na rdzosas// 6 N+Di N+Dite'i mang mi dza dang / bad tsA ba gartags ldan sa spangs brgyar rtsi chus rta gtan pa phub pa //
168a3(rnying rgyud): rgya gar ga ngas/ kro tad wa A saN+Darnam/ bdi ga / tsha bar thud chen po zhes byag/ bcos ldan dpa gzhag zang nga 'dzin kyinal po ma hU~M// 'ad dang bdag gis byis pa'i sa gcig / d+hi / gnas brgyan pa zugs shing / rnga brtswad can pa gas
168a4(rnying rgyud): brgya na myong pa sa gam kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad can pa'i de ba gshegs pa rnams gdus byag na bcad pa cwa po brgyan pani/ bcom ldan das dang bdun / ning bas chen po'i 'ape dgral/ dgra kyi ma cing na
168a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa/ g.yas sgrag nas/ g.yas kyi tham sa nag// gzhon dang po dam dag/ g.yon tham ldar dag/ dbus pa de'i ga la stong ma dmang badrug sa/ do gapas dka / g.yon mthong ga// de'i byang gi zhal dkar por gnasas// phyag bco brgyad pa g.yas @
168a6(rnying rgyud): dbyupa/ gnyis pa na sngag blarnam pa la ma/ ban / ba na nga ming ba / drug pa da makyi/ bdun pa na na pa ni 'ang rnagasapa bang ban/ dbu da bang phyu na mong byung brnam ma man//
168a7(rnying rgyud): pan drang cin bdud rtsis pakang ga/ gnyis pa na dril za/ gsum panapa/ bzhi dgraSh+Ta/ drwa ban buM/ drug pa dag na pa/ 'dud padang rdzun/ bcad pan sum ny-i dzin/ dbya 'i rdum shi pa nags pa/ zhab sa rnam pa brgya kyis rdza
168b1(rnying rgyud): gdan la bzhugs so// gnas na bzugs pa ni/ dkar ma dang / thun mo dang / rmongs mo dang / thal byed ma'o// nye ba'i gnas na zhugs pa ni/ spos mo dang / gzum mo dang / sgra sha can dang / mtshogs ma'o// gzhan yang phul na bzhugs pa ni/ seng gdong dang / stag
168b2(rnying rgyud): gdong dang / skyang gdong dang / wa gdong ma'o// nye ba'i yul na bzhugs pa ni/ bya rgod gdong dang / kang ka'i gdong dang / bya rog gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma'o// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing na bzhugs pa ni/ rta'i gdong dang / lag gdong dang / spre'u gdong dang / sbrang gdong par/
168b3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod dang nyo ba'i dur khrod na bzhugs pa ni/ mi'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' mo dang / 8
168b4(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung myos ma dang / gcig pur skyong ma dang / yid 'grog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed ma dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / chu ts+tsha dang / nye ba'i cha b+h+yo dag na ni/ nag mo chen mo dang / ramago dmar
168b5(rnying rgyud): ser chen mo dang / bum rna sngo nag chen ma dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo rnams bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi mnga' bdag bud+d+ha he ru ka dang / bud+d+ha kro d+d+he shwa rI dang / rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa badz+ra he ru ka dang / badz+ra kro N+De shwa rI
168b6(rnying rgyud): dang / rin chen rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa rat+na he ru ka dang / rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI dang / pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyung ba pad+ma he ru ka dang / pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI dang / karma'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa karma he ru ka dang / ka ma kro d+h+ri shwa rI dang / de dag
168b7(rnying rgyud): kyang rA tra dang / lha chen dang / gshin rje dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin 'dul bar bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje snying po ra'i gi gdan las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun bzang he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// gzhi la 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i// gnas lugs rang
169a1(rnying rgyud): dang// sapa// du// /
169a2(rnying rgyud): ga // s+yA shAm pa myig // ga ga na ga rjes/ dadag pa'i ste nga/ rnam seMs pa la / pa pa da ga sa/ mags pa narnams//
169a3(rnying rgyud): na nas kyis sa gsams/ nas thags pa rkyen na nam // ma ga zhi dang gas 'as/ tha sha // / gas yig pa // thal ya mangs
169a4(rnying rgyud): bzla 'i dus shings pa'i// sa gas dag sa rigs pa'i rung ba// ma na// kya sda babasamams da // rabar rkyen 'bras zung thub ni// u rbu gyi ba sgrag sung bags// dege na
169a5(rnying rgyud): snang/ sa sams ma/ na ma na #na man / bdag na
169a6(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa gnyis smras pa// thugs rdo'i sgrub pas 'grob mdus zlob// yul ming ma sgres bungs pa'i rgyas dbying sa las// 'dzin pa mi rtag rting rjes zhen chags so// gnyis me dge 'alas phrin las snying rnga snyams// dpang chen khrag 'thung byed ga phrug tshal ba
169a7(rnying rgyud): tshig 'dams spyod nga mthun pas 'gro 'dra'i zhing // brda' can yang dga' nabs don gol// gya d+hung brjod pas dngos sub kun dang 'brel// da skye 'dir gnas dmanal bshad pa dang // ma 'ongs rjes 'jug rnal 'byor kun don du// bka da ga tan tshigs dgepas
169b1(rnying rgyud): par 'os/ khyod kyis lung bstan ma rang sa rgyud rtogs byed// skabs 'dir lha chud bshad pa'i dus pa bab// rgor ma shan dra dpa' bos gsung du gsong// bdag cag ma 'ongs don du ngas par gzung // zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhir gnas thugs
169b2(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di dag gsungs so// ye nas rang sems sangs rgyas pas// 'khor bar snang ba 'khrul pa'i chos// de nyid sangs na sangs rgyas nyid// ka dag chen por bshad pa yin// 'digashigs ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// 'khor ba
169b3(rnying rgyud): log rtog sgyu ma'i sku// ye shes bag chags zad dang // skye ma'i ngang du rang bzhin mnyam// chos rnams dbyings su ka dge ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// sangs rgyas nyid las ma gtogs pa'i// chos nyid
169b4(rnying rgyud): gud na yod ma yin// de phyir phyag rgya ka dag pa'o// 'khor 'das bcings grol ma grub phyir// ngo bo lhun gyis grub par gnas// chos nyid 'dus byas 'khor bar snang // 'dus byas stong pas chos nyid grub// 'khor 'das bzang ngan 'dzin 'gyur yang // rig pa byang
169b5(rnying rgyud): chub sems la 'dus// de nyid chos can lhun gyis krung // rang gi ngang gis der gnas so// rdo rje'i skul zer zug thal// rtag chad kun min lhun gyis grub// rtag chad blo yi ngan rtog ste// chos nyid gshis la de ma grub// chos rnams rtsa ba byang chub sems// mchog
169b6(rnying rgyud): tu spyan grub rnam par dag/ dang khro shugs kyis khro ba yin// de nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gnas// zhes gsungs so// khro bo d+ha rgyud chen po las/ gzhi'i chos nyid dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom
169b7(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal khrag 'thung rigs lngar snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'chang ba'i skyes bu mdzad pa'i phyir/ sems can ma lus pa'i lus mongs rgyas par ston pa 'di gsungs so// kun gzhi kun tshad rtsa ba'i rgyud// de rtogs lus ni bshad pa'i rgyud// rtsa bshad rgyud pa lhag nas so//
170a1(rnying rgyud): ro byang kun 'dar srog shing gsum// nyi ma zla ba rA hra la// dkyil 'khor bzhi ldan dkyil 'khor ni// lus la ye nas gnas pa'o// gnas lugs shes nas bsgom pa ni// bde chen longs spyod chos sprul bzhi// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor
170a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// spyi bor bAd+ha he ru ka/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang mos bskor// gti mug mi rtog dang na gunas/ mgrin par longs spyod papral// pra mo hA dang srA shaN+DI// sr-i la mu la bya rog gdong // 'dod chags bde ba'i ngang tshul can// snying ga chos lardo rje nyid// gau d+hi ma dang phyug/
170a3(rnying rgyud): sde// se ha ma dang gr-i d+ha ma// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid// lte ba sprul pa rin chen la// sngo rI ma dang tsat+ta lI// b+ha s+t+rim dang kang kA ma// nga rgyal shes po rno ba nyid// gsang bar me d+hAng las kyi rigs// be tA l+le dang g+has+sa hrI// shAn+ta ma dang u lU ka/ phrag dog lha
170a4(rnying rgyud): ngan+da 'joms pa nyid// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung bas// rang gnas rA tra 'dul ba ni// gsang gnas ma nag yi ge k+Sha// srin po dU d+har rang gnas pa// rtogs na kun bzang he ruka/ gnas lugs rtogs pa mchog gyur pa'i// thugs dem dkyil 'khor
170a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog/ khams kyi bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// ye shes khrag 'thung yab dang yum// mnyes byed gtum mo'i bde bar gnas// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas mad// snying po thig le mnyam sbyar nas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod
170a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'bul// bag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ rlung bcu snying po de kho na// snang ba'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// nam
170a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i rlung // sa ltar brtan zhing chu ltar 'grogs// me dang mnyam pa rlung ltar yang // chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// khrag 'thung lnga li ngo bo nyid// snying po rlung dung gis shar// chu ba rab rgyu shin tu rgyu// mngon rgya yang dag chu ba yin// byang chub sems
170b1(rnying rgyud): ma rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// dbang po thub pa sprul 'dul ba// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// srog ni nang na gnas pa la// rtsol ba phyir la ldang ba nyid// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lnga blta zhing // hUM las
170b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i he ru ka// ha las shar ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// he las byung ba'i phra men ma// phaT las bskyed pa'i sgom bzhi// b+h+yo las gnas pa'i dbang phyug ma// rang gnas dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang gnas dkyil 'khor gnas pa ni// bdag nyid sngon gyi sangs rgya
170b3(rnying rgyud): nyid// bdag gi sras su sangs rgyas bya// rigs rnams mi nub lhun grub phyir// bde gshegs sras su bdag byas so// de bskyed 'khrul snang rang log 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// khro bo lha rgyud chen po las/ phung po rang rgyud khro bo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
170b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi tshogs rnams 'dul ba la snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chu dra'i tshogs rnams la rang shar bar snang ba 'di gsungs so// lung gsum mnang gi gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung gi man ngag kyi spyod gdeng du bya/
170b5(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhis stod kyi khog phub la// bzhi bcom drug ldan gyis 'gos sa bcad do// khro bo'i rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyed kyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung // de la thog mar lung gsum ni// zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rme
170b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' la gza' skar bkram// don bcas pa dang ba tu zhing 'tshams par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du shes// de la man ngag rnam gsum ni// bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod// yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzod du gshegs// yul sems gnyis
170b7(rnying rgyud): med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong mnang ba// de la spyi don gsum po ni// med nu brtags chags bsgrub 'grub brtas pa ni sdang // spyod mthun khro drog gdug pa dpa' bos 'dul// rtog 'joms sman rdzas dang len dngos grub tu// 'di
171a1(rnying rgyud): na ma ngo gyi mdon du bshad// de la gyi log rnam pa bad+ma bzhin// grang khro gang la ci gyi gang gis so// gang khro rnam pa bzhid ni shes b+ha// dang khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcos// tshogs pas thugs rjes rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang //
171a2(rnying rgyud): gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas// las drung 'bras bu sems can grub pa'o// las bzhi 'bras bu skra gsung thugs// ci byid mya dang 'bras bu gnyis las ni// drug gsum mi skyong shadus khrag la rol// gang gis rgyu ni hUM dang ha ha phaT// gnas ni steng 'og mabya
171a3(rnying rgyud): ste ye shes sku// skyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum pos khro bo'i sgra// 'bras bu dpal chen phra me na 'khor gyis bskor// phrin las drag pos 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi bcom pa ni// tsham rngams drag pos lha chen 'dir bsgyel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas rdos
171a4(rnying rgyud): bcas phung po bshig/ dug gsum mi sbyong sha dus khrag la ze// rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i sras su stob// de lasas bcad rtsis dgo drug po ni// dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang // dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang // ye shes dang ninan tan dang // drug dang yang
171a5(rnying rgyud): dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang dang ldan pa ni// chags sdang nga rgyal gti mug phrag dog ni// mnyes stob yum dang 'jigs tshul sgra yi skul// dran med thod pa kha mthor ga yang gzhi dang // kha T+wAM rgal mtshan tshe dang lha chen dregs pa gnon// de la khro bo'i dpal drug ni// thams
171a6(rnying rgyud): pas khyab pas thugs dra ma dmigs kyis sgrol// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor ba ji srid ba zhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don ldan gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pas bde bachen po'i dpal// khro rgal khrig 'byung
171a7(rnying rgyud): dpal chen rnam drug yin// de la bde chen yongs rdzogs pa'i// dpal ni bsam me khyab pa na ste// sku gsums gsum sems dpas rtogs dka' ba// mkha' khyab sbyin gardal cher 'bab chu bo'i rgyan// ting 'dzin gas ma yas byang chub thogs pa pad// bsam ya

172a2(rnying rgyud): khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs 'phro// ral pa 'dzings shing kham nag 'phyo ba ni// ye nA sa chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes pa// 'dul dbang yon tan mtha' med dgongs pa'i gting // mi dpogs de la yan lag rtags kyi lung //
172a3(rnying rgyud): spyi dang bye brag snang ba yang // spyir na dpal chen he ru ka'i// sku mdog phrag mtshan mnges te// gang ltar bsrubs kyang 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de ltas dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci dgar
172a4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na 'grub// bye brag yan lag rtags lung ni// grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang // mdzad pa las kyi phyag rgya'o// grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsum lhun gyis grub// lha spyod rnam pa gsum gyis grub pa'i rtags// sman dgu sa
172a5(rnying rgyud): gsum sku gsum ye shes so// bgrod med thob med dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' spangs dbu ma'i dang // shangs gsum srog lnga mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid rgya kun tu sbyang zhes bya// skra chen tha dang sgra ste chos sra ting
172a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin spyan// zhal gsum rnamathar sgogasum lhun gyis grub// ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes pa'i rtags// mche bzhi phrin las mthar phyin bzhi yi tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar grin phyag drug s+t+wa~M// pha ro'i phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs
172a7(rnying rgyud): bzhes lam bzhi bgrod pa med par thob// de la mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// spyi dang phyag sa tshag rtags kyi lung // spyan dbusas dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// spun gas pa med gsum 'gro rgyad sosor mkhyen// shangs gsum nas byung thub pas stong gsum 'ge
172b1(rnying rgyud): skad drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sgra gsung thugs// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad par rngub// ljags gsum thag gsum smyon pa'i gdangs dang sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin po'i lce/
172b2(rnying rgyud): mche bzhi skye bzhi rtsad nas gcod par byed// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhi phrin las rnam bzhis bgrod med sgrol// de la phyag mtshan yan lag rtags lung ni// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni/
172b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'phags shing 'joms// chos sku mi 'gyur rtog dang bag chags bsreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// b+har+d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen chags thugs rje skye
172b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' gnyis skyon gyis mi sngags bzod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum sgrol byed dregs pa lha bdud gnon// stobs gsum srid gsum yongs 'dul rgyal ba'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// zhing chen smon lam pa
172b5(rnying rgyud): rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang sdud cing // sbyin pa'i bza' bas mkha' 'gro tshims par byed// brdeg pa'i dbyug pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ rtogs pa'i chos nyid dran med shes lngas bzung // ji ltar smon bzhin grub pas de skad bya// thod
172b6(rnying rgyud): gshol thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs thugs rjes za ba rnyog mdzad cing // ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba rtogs// thabs kyi sku gsum lhun grub stsal pa 'gro// rnga ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med rnam dag chos kyi rnga logs la// 'dzin
172b7(rnying rgyud): pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyig gus brdungs// gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab bskyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshon// tshul khrims ting 'dzin ye shes gsum dang ldan// bdag med sems las rin chen dgos 'dod skong // mi zad par ldan sbyin
173a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i do n+tu// bad+ma dus skyes mchags thugs ngas spyod// nu sa par btsun pa nyingang du brtan// ral la shis thugasangs mtha' gnyis gno// rnyog gting 'dzin gnyis pa 'arjon 'grus mas// dab stanags pa 'dza
173a2(rnying rgyud): zag mnarnams// ra ga khyer ldas chos rtogs/ ma yon/ Sh+T+rI hrauM srung ba shad// m+b+ha geg brji ba nim/ na pas ma rnaMs mthag yangs zh-i// dang dupa dim tshig sa lta pa
173a3(rnying rgyud): skyabs rnam// byil gyis gnon pa'i gang na yang ngas// tshe marnams rjen pa ni stobs ldan dam// da yang sa na rdzob rang bzhin med// namamA kha'i sprin ni dngas pa'i tshul// lha 'phags rjongs pa smon lam dang // cing yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs stabs tshul// srid pa /
173a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la zal gnan pa// dri med pa rba Sh+T+rim+b+ha yon tan rtags// gdan 'i tshul rnams stobs chen bad+ma'i// de lagasung gi ma bzhi la// ta ma lA sh+lel 'byung gal yang ngam// thugs cing skyon rtags kyang ngam// s+ye shiH shA gcod mche brdzam// 'brug ltar rtags
173a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsung dbyangs ngas// d+yegal ye shes phyag tshulas// ngo mchog rnam sde ba theg pang du// tshaM ma zhing 'brel lnga yaM rgyal// gsung dbang tshal gyis 'das dras dang / rang bzhin pa 'dres ston pa tshul// mtsho bras shes 'gro 'dus ni// drag brtenam shes
173a6(rnying rgyud): bzhig rjod tshul// 'jug sogs ldan lagadrug pa dbyangs// chu pa med krig pa gags// gnon pa'i tshul rnam brgyad// thugs ma rnaM/ ma bzhipa// ting 'dzidunam pa 'ing+ga/ tshogs ngam// rkyen pas nyam dzi ngas rnam// ma ta
173a7(rnying rgyud): shing nga// ma pa'i la ma gang thabs ma/ na zhin can da rtse// ga slong dag gis pa na pa// song rigasas sna pa'i tsham// gshes nal// tshig na gyi nga gyung tshul// zheganas rang ba
173b1(rnying rgyud): las// lhag mthong pan pa 'dogs par rtsog// dganas dang ba mthang las// ga sa dUr byung ga bad mo// dal na yongs panan// rtswa bcom pa'i gnas mang ngas// sa ga gdang yang ngam// khams gsas bskal ba zhing nga/
173b2(rnying rgyud): zhing // rtog 'joms spyod pa'i btu thugs das// de yang gnas ni khyad par can// bkra shis cis kyang mi tshugs tshul// gdan kyad thams cad zi na rdul// zhing khyad bapas gsum yongs bskul tshul// spyod byad skyid rtog dus gcig 'doms// de ltar
173b3(rnying rgyud): rngam tshul sum cu gnyis// de la sku yi brjid bzhi la// glu che yan lag rags pas brjid// grangs med rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid// dkur ngos gtso bor mthong bas brjid// khyad khrigs yid dang 'thad pas brjid// chos su mnyem byung sgonas che// thugs
173b4(rnying rgyud): mnyam byung sgo sprul rags// 'du byed mnyam byung sgo srul mang // smon la masgo rigs mthun rkyen 'tshams// spyod lam sgo nas bkur bar 'os// rigs btsun pa yi gtso bor mthong // rang bzhin gru bsgo nas khyad zhugs// phrin las sgo nas yid dang 'thad// de yang gsung/
173b5(rnying rgyud): gri brjid bzhi la// gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid// cig myur the tshom gcod pasra brjid// bdag la nyi tsher smyon pas brjid// khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid// chos sbas khyab sgo nas gdangs che// tha dad sgra spogs stong gsum 'gengs// dbyangs kyi
173b6(rnying rgyud): sgo nas go bar myur// nye bar gyur pas the tsom gcod// byams pa'i sgo nas bdagra la gzigs// thugs rje'i smo nas nyi tsher ston// shes pa'i blo brag sgo khyung zhugs// tshig gi yon tan ste kun 'dul// de yang thugs kyi brjid bzhi la// yangs la ro dogs med pas
173b7(rnying rgyud): brjid// gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid// thugs rje thags dam mthar phrin brjid// ma mongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid// gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yangs// spang blang mod sgos ro dogs med// lhag mthong sgo nas dbu mar gsal// zhi gnas mi 'gyur

174a2(rnying rgyud): 'i ni

174b1(rnying rgyud): men 'phro// lus ni cir bsku sems ni cho 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs dang sna tshogs phyogs bcur sgrogs// mche bas zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan sman gnyis dbu ma'i dang // dbyings pas mig yo ci yang sa ler mkhyen// sems
174b2(rnying rgyud): bye brag ting 'dzin sa ya 'phro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi pa rol par mdzad// rdo rje'i steng mo pags pa spu phreng kun// 'khor ba ji sred bzhugs pa'i tshel dbang // lta ba rnam bzhi'i spyan gyur gyis bsgral bas// rdza men bzhi gro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon la
174b3(rnying rgyud): dbang gi drag po'i skur ston zhing // dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med// de la btsun mo rin chen lum bzhi ni// ma chags rdo rje'i gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud// zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor// thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis bskyed//
174b4(rnying rgyud): lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis gnyis med 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi pa rdo rje'i lha mo des// bde ba chen po'i sprul mnyes pa 'bul// de la dmag dpon rin chen tshul dgu ni// nang dang phyi yi tshug gnyis ni// sgeg pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul// nyam nga med pas ma
174b5(rnying rgyud): spyod dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub rnams pas brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log par lta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' khro bo'i snying rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi bshol rngams pa'i tshul//
174b6(rnying rgyud): nyin mongs grub pa'i myur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul// de la byi tshul gang dgrani// sgeg pa dpang ba 'jigs pa'i sku// rgod dang gshe dang rngams pa gsum// ngo mtshar snying rje zhi ba'i thugs// dbang phyug 'dod chags nyams can
174b7(rnying rgyud): bcom pas sgeg/ lha min ba su kar bsad pas dpa' bor mdzad// khyab 'dug seng ge phag gdor sbrul btul 'jigs// gzhon nu smin drug rta skad drag por dgod pas btul// tshogs bdag glang sna gshe ba'i gdul bya btul// sprig can rA hras nyi zla bar ni ming

175b1(rnying rgyud): gas// snang can dbang sa nyer babyad yin// mos rba tathA ga tam sbyin tugam hA d+ha san rtag tan hang tsad+ha hU~M hrI hA/ o dzin hA shrIha ga b+hu tsa sa rba na rtag tad ta hU~Mb Ta/ or hA shA ha ga ma tA sa rba tu tan tas nga
175b2(rnying rgyud): oM pad+ma ma hA shA hi ru kA ma hA tsata sarba duSh+TA n+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM kaR+Sha mAny+dza shI hi d+ha ka ma hA \u0f7fk+Sha~M sarba rbaSh+TA n+ta ka ha na~M dai hi bitsahU~M hA hU~M phaT/ spyir ba srub ni ni dril ba'am// sa su gsong bzlas pa ste// rer la ni 'bum 'i ba ma dang // byaM ba sa y-i sogs par ban/
175b3(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta ma hA kr-id+hi shwa rI sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badza d+ha ra ma~M hU~M kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA s+'u d+ya rat+na ma hA shri trA~M shA rI bid ma hU~M phaT/ oM hr-i shu ta sa ma hA pad+ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI khA hi hU~M phaT/ oM sa mras mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hI shA dI bi sh+ya hU~M phaT/ zhe bsnyen 'bum dang byed sogs// sle'am

175b5(rnying rgyud): hA/ badz+ra shA na muShI hi/ badz+ra kr-i d+ha mu dz+dzi he/ badz+ra kang+ka puSh+Ti te/ badz+rak+Sha ka ma Sh+Ti te/ badz+ra u luka mu wi ta/ badz+ra Ad+ya to dza tang dza/ badz+ra/ a mu Shin+ti/ badz+ra lo ka bi/ badz+ra d+hasmai ba la ya btu ho/ gnas dang yul gyi mamo dang // sgo bzhi lha mo hi shu la// gnas yul dur khrod tsats+tsha
175b6(rnying rgyud): ning // kun nas dngos grub ster bas bslab// ma nur kyA b+h+yo/ brAd+d+ha b+h+yo/ ro'u d+d+hi dz+nye/ bit+te ts+tsha/ kausum 'i b+h+yo/ iHN+Di b+h+yo/ bing+ga lI rgyo/ oMm+ma ha b+h+yo/ soru N+ya b+h+yo/ daM ta da d+ho/ rak+Sha b+h+yo/ b+h+yaHhi g+ho/ ra ti badz+ro d+ho/ d+ha d+hir mat+tad+h+r-i/ e ka tsi N+Di b+h+yo ra/ sib+he/ g+ho bA ya d+hidz+dza/

176b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// myos byed dbying sa nga yo des gnyis med pas// thugs rjes dbyug cing nge zla tshul du gzigs// phyogs nga byabyas da gso mdzad b+ham+ba nI// tshigs pang tshub kyis don ma gra gadrung // ga chung pe la gzung na rje bang ga// ma
176b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ma spang sa rnam par g.yengs tshul gzigs// 'phang me stong gsum toT/ gyid tsa )// tAms rtag byung ba'i lus gyur mtshogs ma// kur gyilas ces slong snying po 'dzed// kun mardo pas 'jigs tshul du ni dang ldan// thugs rngas 'jig rtem la ma
176b7(rnying rgyud): 'jom sa byeng rgyabar chog thas kyi phug sa 'do// she dra gabs da gragasu bdagasa'adad// sdugs gsod kyangs ma// ngag gan sa sod yus
177a1(rnying rgyud): myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don mdzad// thugs rdo rje gcig ye shes so sor gzigs// dkyul 'chi bdag 'jigs byed b+ha m+b+ha ma// 'joms byed dmachog rnam dag gsung gi yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad/
177a2(rnying rgyud): don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la bstar// 'dod chags ngur khrod bgegs 'joms srigA la// mi 'byed spyod pas las mchog rigs kyi yum// g.yengs pa'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes bsgreng // chos nyid sgra la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog kun las mdzad
177a3(rnying rgyud): par shA na ma// yid kyis ye shes so sor kun la rtogs// rnam shes gsang mdzad dgongs 'brel tshul khrims bsrung // 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin rgyan gcod spa ge 'dzin// mgyogs mas snyogs byed khrag 'thung kr-i nA ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'phrog mtshan ma 'joms// bsad
177a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i god rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos skus gzung 'dzin spang tshul 'dzin// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog karnam// bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag pas// mi 'gyur gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku thugs su tshud phyir zhal na
177a5(rnying rgyud): thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA ka ma// dbyings las mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin// dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spang ba'i rnga ma tshul u wA ka/ bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i
177a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dpal chen bcu drug sa la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i sku// thog mtha' med cing yon tan bzlas pa med// sbyin pas rig pa'i klung du mtsho dngas ltar// 'khor ba'i 'jing nas thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren// dpa' bar 'gro/
177a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing // rin chen phyag rgyas sems can dgos 'dod skong // yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags
177b1(rnying rgyud): blan nga byung pas padag ga dan// gas sbyin mapa drug ldang man pasas// don gnyis me dang blan sgrub gyu ba rdzog+sa/ ga thAn// na pa slab na ba na kyang// pas grags/

177b3(rnying rgyud): pas mdzad ma nu d+ha ste// sdug bsngal myang na 'das teg sa tshangs pa'i gzugs// tshad meng pa'i rdzogs dpapa myed bu pa 'a ldan// zhal pa da klung don cing bdir bkrags ldan// bti mug med bzhin dz+haiM na hU~M// rnga rang tshad mam nyid rtog pa ga
177b4(rnying rgyud): ma// ma rig drug gsum 'ja mas mdzad dpal ci ba snams// bud mang chags tshul bang mdzad dka' klog sa// chags pa'i b+h+yo zlar na ro ma// thams cad ltal bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsul la togs// nin las rgya mchos
177b5(rnying rgyud): sprol ba'i bzhud cadas// khong bde rgyan gcang dag pa lta pa// 'du byung med ga lathur du kyang babyen// rtag pa ga natshul khong ba skyid parnags// nyon mongs ni pa 'jigs pa'i mdung byung babyen// gnod gyi chags pas dab // dede bye de/ rdo byas pang
177b6(rnying rgyud): phrin 'i blan byed// b+ha ye nal phred rdzogs la dbang bltar 'a // mchod sbyi byug rgyab me dmigs pu mdog dkar// gsod byed rdo rje ste bre na TI// byams pang+ge thugs rdzas dang med pa dag dgang // b+had+ha bcud yang sa rjod kyi 'brem tsho// rngam padon 'angs
177b7(rnying rgyud): gsus byu sa// rdzob pa la dbyings su sung mdzang ba dag las// sems can thams cad dang zungs // sring sa pa d+mod 'ab ba tsa na dgas mad// 'das rgyas pa lta lang ba chu ngas kyang // tshigs pa rtsod rdul dang 'ang ya

178a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i las na sas pa'i mchog // thag so tan rtags pa sbyin// / ga ba du pa gtan nam na ci// gdu mchog zangs gyu byed sonam// da bas cag par 'dabang gzha med ma gyun// thabs
178a3(rnying rgyud): kyis marmongs ljang gu phrin las mdog/ nan dbang drug shul rgyan gyi byu to ba rnams// dregs byed byenas bcom sa mdzadad d+hi // log pang ltab 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye ba 'phrog byed ste dgu'i lhag ma rdzog sol// las mdzad chags rdul gser gyi skad chings can//

179b1(rnying rgyud): kun bad dbyer med pas// rgyal ba drug pa zhes bya'o// rigs lnga kun bzang dbyer med pas// rigs drug pa zhes bya ba yin// la bzla lhun grub kun ngog/ gnas lugs nyid du la bag+h+nAn// mdor na gnyis par brjod do cog/ thug pas b+hag rtsir mtha' yin te//

179b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin lus grol na// rtsa rnams sbrul skus bum dbang rdzogs// sngags kyi yi ge longs spyod gsang// lams kyi bdud rtsis shes rab chos// sku gsum mi zad rgyan 'khor lo// sku yi mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor// sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// thams
179b4(rnying rgyud): pa yi skur brjod pa// nges med kun khyab chos kyi sku// dngos gnyis bde gshegs longs spyod sku// cir yang sprul pas sprul pa'i sku// yul med rang gis la mngon byang sku// so so dbyer med rdo rje'i sku// gsung gi mi zad rgyan 'khor ni// gsung gi gsang ba bsam
179b5(rnying rgyud): mi khyab// thams cad pa yi gsung yin te// skye med don dang dgongs pa brdad// tshangs pa'i gsung dang rig byini rlabs// 'jig med dbyed med rdo rje'i gsung // thugs kyi mi zad rgyan 'khor ni// thugs kyi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// thams cad pa yi thugs
179b6(rnying rgyud): yin te// bde chen tu gas dang rnam mi rtog/ 'gro ba sgrol dang rnam mkhyen mchog/ dbyer med rdo rje'i thugs yin no// sku yi khyad par lami byung ba// yon tan phrin las snang ba ni// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// mi zad rgyan kyi 'khor sor gnas// zhe
179b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// khro ba'i lha nad chen po las/ mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod pa mdzad do// e ma ho mtshar sa mtshan gyi// khro bo rigs lA ha ru ka
180a1(rnying rgyud): dnga'abarnag pa 'jigs su rung // rgod dang gshe dang rnams pa dang // skyong rdzab dang ngo mtshar zhe// nyams ni sems la nad du 'chang// gang ni lus la myi 'char// sngags ni dag tu nus pa 'char// mthong snang yul gyi snang bar
180a2(rnying rgyud): 'char// bag chags rmyi lam 'chang ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams grol bar byed// ston pa kun bzang khyod la bstod// ces gsungs so// de nas ston pas gsungs pa// khro bo chen po'i rgyud mchog 'dis// lam gyi rnal 'byor grol byed pas// gang zag chos
180a3(rnying rgyud): kyi snyan ldan la/ rdo rje snying po khyod kyis gtod// ces gsungs pa sa rjes su // b+hi d+ha las mdzes pa dang dz+ha gtad pa pa ste bdun pa 'o// zla bi rgya rdzogs sa/ zug ky-i myakhan po bris twa las/ 'di kyis d+hi badz+ra rA tses pa sbyar bam/
180a4(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha de ba tan+t+ra ma hA kag+ga/ bod skad du/ khro bo lha rgyad kyi rtog pa chen po/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga khraga'i thung ngu khor rgya mchod de bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis bral las// thug rdzi'i sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus
180a5(rnying rgyud): sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhi chags khro// gnyis med dang las phrin las snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thung mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing // padz+ra 'acan
180a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag len pas don grol// lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel// bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os// zhes bya'o// srung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng su bya// spyi log bcu gnyis do
180a7(rnying rgyud): gyi kho ga phub la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsisang dgos sa bcad de// khro bo'i rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung // zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor bsdus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo'i sde zhes bya'o// de la bshad pa ni//
180b1(rnying rgyud): lung gsum gyis sna drangs te gdang sgra bya'o// man ngag gsum gyis mjug bskus te blo la bzhag pa'i man ngag tu bya'o// spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi bcad do// lci don bcu gnyis don gyi khog dbub po// bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba
180b2(rnying rgyud): bdud bcom mo// rdzis 'ogo drug gis sa bcad do// khro bo'i rtog pa mtshan ma gnyer gyis bshad pas ni grol sa dang sgrib pa spang ngo // yon tan kun la rngom pas brjid gzhan la snang bar bya phyir rngo ma brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan no// rgyal po yin pa'i phyir/
180b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtags su rin po che sgra bdun gyis rgyal po chen por mda' gsol lo// lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te skyed do// de ltar rnam pa bcur gses nas/ dan phyo byang bu do bstun pas gses nas bshad do// de la lung gsum ni/ zhi gnas mi rtog dngo
180b4(rnying rgyud): pam 'a' khyung dang / lhag mthong ma rmongs mkha' lagazang skur ba kram// ngos pa cas don deng brdzun zhi 'i rnams par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab bku' lung gsum du 'dus// de la man dag gsum ni/ bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzad nas 'artson// yul du
180b5(rnying rgyud): ma grub gzhan med mdzod du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos dang rgyal sems tsam yod man ngag/ de la spyi dron gsum ni/ med rgyu btags chags bsgrubs 'grub brnyas pas snang // snod mthun khro drag gdug pa dpa'
180b6(rnying rgyud): pos 'dul// rtog 'joms smad rdzas dang len dngos grub rgyu// 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad// de la spyi khog bcu bzhi la// gang khro gang la ci'i phyir gang gis khro// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes par bya// ngang khro shugs khro khro bar bcas dang bcos/
180b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang // gang la snying rje khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras bu sems can grub pa'o// lAs spyi 'bras bu sku gsung bugs// ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dug gsum mi spang sha rus khrag pha rol// gang
180b8(rnying rgyud): bzhi la byung //
181a1(rnying rgyud): gi d+hu nI hUM dang ha he phaT// gnas ni steng 'og mkha' zla ye shes mA// bskyed thabs tshong phrul gsum po lnga bo'i sgra// 'bras bu dpa' chen phra men 'khor gyis bskod// phrin las drag pos 'gro ba cis 'drul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi
181a2(rnying rgyud): bcom pa ni// tsham rnams drag pos lha chen 'dang bsrel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol po rdos bcas phung po ba shig/ dug gsum mi spang sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes ngachi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stob// de la rtsis 'go drug ni/ dbang dang rab tu ldan pa
181a3(rnying rgyud): ga sa
181a4(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi dang // kha T+Ta rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen dregs pa gnon// de la dpal drug ni/ byams pas khyab la thugs dam dmigs kyis sgrol// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don
181a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pas bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal chen rnam drug yin// de la bde ba chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhen/ sku gsums
181a6(rnying rgyud): gsum sems dpas rtogs dka' ba// mkha' khyab sprin brdal chang 'bab chu bo'i rgyun// ting 'dzin bas ma yas bo d+hi thogs pa med// bsam yas bsam khyab mkha' la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu 'dul phyin klu lngas sru brgyan pa// na chen gsung sme byams
181a7(rnying rgyud): dang pho nya'i dbang // dug lnga rtog bcas 'dul byed rgyan byas pa// khrag sbrul g.yeng gzhi la tI dregs pa gnon// de la gzugs rnam gnyis pon// mi thung byis pa'i gzugs 'dral// a ni gi la rkang lag rtags// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad 'a// shin
181b1(rnying rgyud): ma gleng mthang bag na// gnod sbyin gyi dag mi byung gzugs pa ni// 'dus dbang le dwags srin pa 'dra// de la grags pa ni/ bud+hA ba rtsis bskyod la sras sun dgongs// gti mug gzengs pa so dang rgyal gnon par thugs// de la la shas ni/ rnam/
181b2(rnying rgyud): dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral// 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen mya ngan mtha' pas 'das// gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang // mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin// de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag bcas zag med 'du//
181b3(rnying rgyud): nAn tan phrin las 'gro ba'i gnas nas 'don// bsam yas nan tan 'gro chud migs na// nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya// nga ni khro bo'i rtog pa bshad de/ de yang mi 'da' rgyan gyi lung dang / che mchog yon tan gyi lung / yan lag rtags
181b4(rnying rgyud): kyi lung gis bshad de/ de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa// bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung // stag ni dpa' brtul za byed rgyan zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje phrin lam rgyan du bstan// sbrul ni
181b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' brjid mnyen lhag rgyan zhes pa// 'jigs tshul gdug gnon 'khril ba'i yum zhes bya// thod phreng dbang chas sgrol ba'i rgyan zhes pa// sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chas sgrol// g.yang gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa// byang chub sems
181b6(rnying rgyud): tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya// rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje'i pad ma'i spyan// gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od// thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge khor
181b7(rnying rgyud): los mtshan ma thal bar rlog// me 'bar 'gro 'du sreg klong dkyil nas bzhengs pa'o// ye shes thugs rje'i dbyings su phrin las te// zad par shes pa mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me pre sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa// chos skus khyad dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs 'jo// ral
182a1(rnying rgyud): ga she na tun spya ga na/ na ga rlung ba na dang // mam/ rnal ga sungan chu rgan
182a2(rnying rgyud): gong du bshad dang zad do// de la dpa he dug su mdog dang phyag mtshan cing yang mangs par 'byung te/ gang ltar ba zlabs kyang 'brub po'o zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' dus
182a3(rnying rgyud): bshad// mkhasna pas ci ga bsgoms na 'grub ces 'byung // 'on kyang 'dig pas su tsi ng+kuka dbu gsum thug dru gzhabazla bder bgrad de/ de yang yan lagatags kyi lung gis bshadan/ grub la rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa las kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so/
182a4(rnying rgyud): depa grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// dbugasum dug gsum gri gsus spyan kyis thub// wa sto rnam pa gsum kyi sa grub pa'i rtags// b+han dbu sagasu ma zhu gsum lo shes gsum// de spub myed thob zin dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// rtag chad ldan gnyi
182a5(rnying rgyud): mthar grangs dbu ma'i dzing // shangs gsum smrig 'a mnga'i' mdzad tid 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid rdzu ldan da zhe rkye// mA chen pa da pr-I chos mye ting 'dzin stan// zhal gi l+h+wam rnam tha~Mng mo gsum ldan gyis grub// ljags gsum thog gzum ma tha byin
182a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i rtags// marje ba ni phrin las mthad byin bzhi 'i tshul// ye shes drug rnaMm par byin gyig drug s+ho// nga rob byin drug myang drun cigs tshan rje// ni byung 'i sa bzhi brjod pa myed par thob// de la mdzad pa rtags kyi zug tu sa bya ba ni// sman
182a7(rnying rgyud): dgusas dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// spyan gsum srid gsum 'gro rdun so song mkhyen// shings nas rlung byung sprul pa'i stong gdu mang gangs// spyan drug dgro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbugasum srid gsum mgon mdzad sgra gsung thugs
182b1(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum dbyings su drug gsum zad par rngub// lpags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs rang sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin po lce// ma che bzhi ste shi rtsad nas gcod par byed// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag
182b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhis phrin las rnam bzhis bgrod med sgrol// yan lag rtags kyi lung ni 'di ltar sbyar// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni// rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos sku mi 'gyur rtog dang
182b3(rnying rgyud): bAg chags sreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// b+ha n+ta bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings zlos med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen chags thugs rje skye// mtha' gnyis skyon gyis mi sngags brjod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wA~M stobs
182b4(rnying rgyud): kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum sgrol byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms// stobs gsum srid gsum yongs 'dul rgyal ba'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// zhing chen smod lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor
182b5(rnying rgyud): rnams dbang du sdud// sbyin pa'i bza' bas mkha' 'gro tshims par byed// brdeg pa'i dbyug pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ rtogs pa'i chos nyid zan med ye shes lnga las bzung // ji ltar smon lam 'grub pas de skad bya// thod gshol thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa
182b6(rnying rgyud): ni// nyon mongs thugs rjes tha brlog mdzad cing // ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba rtogs// thabs kyi sku gsum lhun gru ba sprul pa 'gro// rnga ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med chos sku rnam dug rnga logs la// 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i
182b7(rnying rgyud): dbyug gus brdungs// gsung ba rda sbas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag sa gsum gyi mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan// bdag med sems las rin che nang gi sa 'dod skong // mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin//
183a1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan// ngal gri ye shes thugs rjes mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis ma brtson 'grus mdzad// dgra sna zhugs pa la sogs
183a2(rnying rgyud): phyag mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi brda' mtshon chos sku rtogs par bstan// de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gi spyi dril te bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid las phrin las kyi rngom sum cu so drug gis bstan pa ni/ de laM sku'i rngom bzhi la ni/
183a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i ri mor phyag rgyar rngom// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs rngom// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan yang rngom// tsham rnams chen po'i stobs ldan rngom ste bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob tu rang bzhin med pa nam mkhar las sprin drengs pa'i tshul dang / lha dang
183a4(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa dang tshangs pa dang / smon lam dang cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad+ma nyi zla 'od kyi yon tan rtags te gdan khri'i tshul dang // stobs chen bcu'i tshul rnams ni 'og nas 'chad do// gsung gi
183a5(rnying rgyud): rngam bzhi la/ hom lnga 'brel par byung ba'i zha la rngam/ bla gam cir yang rngams pa'i ljags rngam/ skye shi'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i choms rnams/ gsung skye / 'brug d+har smrig pa'i dbyings rngam da bzhi'o// de yang gan pa~M shes kyi phyag rdza las/ ro rnam pa lnga'i sreg
183a6(rnying rgyud): khang du/ ro rnam lngas tshims shing mchod pas 'brel pa lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbang tshul gyis 'dus byas dang / rang bzhin dang / zur ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba ye shes kyi 'phro 'dus/ dug bzhi rnam shes bzhi gcod pa'i tshul dang / 'dug
183a7(rnying rgyud): ltar sgrogs pa yan lag drug cu dbyangs kyis bsnyad pas mdo sde go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam pa brgyad do// thugs kyi rnga ma bzhi la/ ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rnga ma/ phrin las kyi mtsho'i rme rlabs rnga ma/ yon tan mi zad rtsi
183b1(rnying rgyud): shing rngam/ mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam/ de yang rgyan chen po bzhi ni/ rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las/ lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lcug mthong gis phan 'dogs pa'i
183b2(rnying rgyud): zhiganas kyi nga bzhin ma sod mi zad pa las lhag pa rjo shi ni yang 'byung zhing dga' ba ba skyed pa'i tshul lo// bzung rdom pa zhi'i/ rnabacom pa rnye gnas ngam/ wA zi ni tul po'i gdan ngam/ 'ams gsum bskal ba'i zhing rdzam/ tog 'joms spyod pa
183b3(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs rngam pa dang bzhi'o// de nas yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi rdzogs pa'i tshul dang / gdan khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par can kha/ sa gsum yongs su sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod po khyed
183b4(rnying rgyud): par Na na srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu 'joms pa'i tshul lo// de ltar rngam tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bshad do// de la sku'i brjid chen po bzhi la/ sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid che/ bkur 'os pa
183b5(rnying rgyud): gong mthong bas brjid che/ khyed zhugs yid dang ldan pas brjid che ste bzhi'o// de yang chos kyi sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgongs che/ thugs rje mnyam par byung ba'i sgo nas yan lagA rags/ 'du byed mnyam par byung ba'i sgo nas sbrel b+ha zang / tron pa ma
183b6(rnying rgyud): sgron pa rigs mthun gyi rkyen dang 'tshams/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor snang / rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sgo nas khyang zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bde la/ gad
183b7(rnying rgyud): sbyong gsum gang bas brjid rje/ tshig phyur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la nyi tsher ston par snang bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjod che ste bzhi'o// de yang chos smras khyad pa'i sgo nas gdangs che/ sgra ze dad pa'i sgo nas stong
184a1(rnying rgyud): gsum 'gengs/ skad dbyangs kyi sgo nas kun gyis go bar mud/ nye bar gyud pa'i sgo nas tha tshom gcod/ byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/ thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tshor ston/ shes pa'i bye brag ge sgo nas khyad thugs
184a2(rnying rgyud): tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas kun 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yangs la re dogs med pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid tshe/ thugs rjes thugs dam mthar phyin pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o// de
184a3(rnying rgyud): yang gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ blang dor mod pa'i sgo nas re dogs med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gnas/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor ba ji srid du bzhugs pa'i sgo nas
184a4(rnying rgyud): thugs dam mthar phyin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas ma rmongs/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi brjid bzhi la/ med la zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig las 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par mdzad pas brjid
184a5(rnying rgyud): che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che/ de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig/ sems kyi bsam pa'i sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/ sems can gyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor/ grub pa'i
184a6(rnying rgyud): chu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/ shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis mgos/ phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi dngangs nyams bag che bas brjid che/ 'khor ba yun ring mi bsnyel bas brjid che/ mgon skabs rgyan tu mdzad pas brjid che/
184a7(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che/ de yang sgyu mar mdzad pa'i sgo nas mi bsnyengs/ rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas nyams bag tu rol/ don mdzad pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por gnas/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi bsnyel/ mthi'i sgo nas mgon rgyabs
184b1(rnying rgyud): tshe/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/ rtse gcig pa'i sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi don la dgongs/ nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub/ brjid nyi shu ni/ sgo bzhi bcu dang / spyir drug cu'o// de la rin po che sna bdun na/ 'khor lo rin po mes ni dbang
184b2(rnying rgyud): brkus skye ba rnam bzhi la dbang bsgyur ro// btsun ma rin po ches ni yum bzhi rgyal ba mnyes pa 'bul/ dmag dpon rin po ces ni tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so// khyim bdag rin po ches ni tshad med pa bzhis rgyal po'i che bsring 'dzin no// glang po rin po ches ni
184b3(rnying rgyud): stobs bcus bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed ngo // rta mchog rin po ches ni mur mgyogs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas su sleb par byed do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can mi re 'dod skong ngo // lung rnam pa gsum ni/
184b4(rnying rgyud): mi 'da' rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis 'gos spyir sbyar bar zad do// rdol 'khor lo rin bu cheni dbang bcu ni/ skye bzhi cu ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzod pa// lha mi sdig sbrul skye ba bzhi du bsnyen// yo byed sring ba'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni// rtog pa bzhom phyer phran lnga
184b5(rnying rgyud): dang len rol// ji ltar mos bzhin tshul dgu'i gzugs bstan pa// gang dag thabs kyi tshul dgus rol pa mdzad// rdzu 'phrul baspu'i dbyings nas gru men 'phro// lus ni cir pardzu sems ni cho 'phrul sgron// gad rgyangs gdangs dar sna tshogs phyogs bcur sgrogs//
184b6(rnying rgyud): mchebs zil gdod tha dang chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan snyan gnyis dbu ma'i dang // dbyings nas mig po Nir yang si le mkhyen// sems kyi bye brag nyid 'dzin pa ya 'gro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad// rdo rje'i sder mo pags pa
184b7(rnying rgyud): sra phreng brgyan// 'khor ba srid par bkrugs pa'i tshel dbang // ba rnam bzhi'i spyan zur gyis bskul bas// rtswa min pa shing phyogs pashir 'ab / sprin lam dbang gi gi drug po'i spyad ston cing // ngas mtha' bsa' pa bzhin drang shom du
185a1(rnying rgyud): de la btsun mo rin po che'i yul bzhini/ mchags rdo rje'i gzugs kyi yum gyis gabyu // zhi gnas ting 'dzin mig yo yum gyis spyod// thogs med shugs 'chang don grub thus gyis bskyod// rtag mthong ye shes sum gyis
185a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis bde 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje'i lha mo des// bde ba chen po'i rgya la mchod pa 'bral// de la dmig dpon rin chen tshul dgu ni// sgeg pas 'gro ba shes rab skyed pa'i tshul// nyam med pa'i mad spyod dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub
185a3(rnying rgyud): rngams pas brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log pa'i blta ba zhe gcong gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' khro bos snying rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi bshol rnams pa'i tshul// nyon mongs grub
185a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i sgrar mdzad ngo mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.ya zhi ba'i tshul// de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang // gsod chen snying rje'i bdag nyid de// bsgral zhing stong rjes dga' ba'i mchog/ yal
185a5(rnying rgyud): bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/ thugs rje'i stobs ni dregs chen spyi nas gnon// chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed spyod pa'i stobs ni glang po'i rdzas la rol// grub pa'i stobs ni
185a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi dngos grub rgya// ma sbyangs stobs ni rdos bcas sku la brgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i rgyan// smon lam stobs ni bska' par g.yo sgro ba mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brtan phra men 'phro// phrag dog 'khor bar log par gcig mi
185a7(rnying rgyud): gtong // 'dod chags phrag dog yul chags spyan mdog dmar// de la rta mchog rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ chos nyid rdzu 'phrul med bzhin cir snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin te rnam par bkra// ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings la rol//
185b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' la nyi shar 'dra ste gsal la stong // chos nyid rdzogs pa'i rtsa 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du gdal// sprul ba'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// ro gcig char 'babasnod kyi bye brag phye// de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni//
185b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin re 'dod skong // mi zad bdag med gter chen nam mkha'i mdzod// srid pa'i man nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron// dus gsum rgyun mi chad par rin chen 'phreng // lung rnam pa gsum rtsis 'gos sbyar te bshad pa yin no// da ni lha'i
185b3(rnying rgyud): gud kyi rtog pa so sor bshad par bya'o// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgasaM chung stongs// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs
185b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po 'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhi sdang 'joms mdzad pa'i// zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka/ rin chen dbyig ltar re 'dod kun tu skong // gdug med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis
185b5(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'angam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing // lhag mthong me chen bskal pas thams cad bsreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka/ phrin las
185b6(rnying rgyud): rgya mtshos 'gro ba 'dren mdzad cing // shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par
185b7(rnying rgyud): dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// chos dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin khro mo'i rgyal// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad
186a1(rnying rgyud): pa// sra brtan rdo rje dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rdul// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // tshul khrims mthar ldan 'ad chags rnam par dag/ gsung bsgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// lhag mthong ye shes
186a2(rnying rgyud): dbang bstar khro mo'i rgyal// yon tan longs srung sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // sbyin pa mthar byi na nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ting 'dzin dri mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // bdag med zhig nas dbang bskur khro mo'i tshel// phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs
186a3(rnying rgyud): me dmigs shing // bzod pa mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // thogs med las la dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mi dro tshogs// 'gugs byed ye shes lnga yi dbyug
186a4(rnying rgyud): pa can// ngan pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms mdzad dbyug thogs gau rI ma// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'phrog zhag nas lhag mnor zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs
186a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dbyings mchog sgal byed tsau rI ma// gsung gi thams cad zil gnon rmongs mo'i tshogs// dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi spong rgyu srin can// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par blta// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pa mo hA// thal bar byed pa
186a6(rnying rgyud): bral byed ma yi tshogs// kun gyi las sgrub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin// sa dgu'i rtog 'joms shi ba slong par gzigs// 'jig rten thal byed rde'u thogs be tA lI// 'byed med shes rang mi rtog rjes mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin brgyang zhing dbang 'dren las/
186a7(rnying rgyud): khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyi thugs rjes sgrol// bde chen dbyings su 'dren mdzad phyag ste// zhe sdang tshul gyis sgrol mdzad gtum mo tshogs// myos byed dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// thugs rjes dbug cing ra ze'i tshul du gzigs// snod btung
186b1(rnying rgyud): nam daklags mdzad d+has te/ chags pa'i tshul gyis ro mdzad sde sha can// ma ning rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags// mtha' gnyis maspang sa rnam par g.yengs bral gzigs// 'brang ma stong gsum bya myed tsats+tsha yAM// thams cad 'byung ba jam/
186b2(rnying rgyud): gyur ma tshogs ma// kun gyi las mdzad chos skra snying po 'dzin// kun la rol pas 'jigs tshul kun dang ldan// thugs rjes 'jig rten sgrol mdzad swa sha nI// 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum// gnyen po'i stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon/
186b3(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan do ni// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sed+ha ma// dpa' brtul za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje rtse gcig ye shes so sor gzigs// dgral 'chi
186b4(rnying rgyud): bdag 'joms mdzad pA b+hI ma// 'joms byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la bstar// 'dod chags dur khrod bgegs 'joms sring gA la// mi 'byed spyod pas las
186b5(rnying rgyud): mchog rigs kyi lum// g.yeng ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes bsrung // chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog las kun 'grub byed shwa na ma// yid kyi ye shes so so dkun rtogs la// rnam shes kyis gsod 'gongs 'brel tshul khrims
186b6(rnying rgyud): bsrung // 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin rgyan gcod spu gri 'dzin// mgyogs pas steg byed khrag 'thung gr-i d+ha ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'phrog mtshan ma 'joms// bsad pa'i gong rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos spus gzung 'jig spong tshul
186b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal cho 'phrog kanam// bslang pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag pas// mi 'gyur gnyen pos me shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos skra thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA ka ma// dbyings las
187a1(rnying rgyud): martag 'gro la thugs rjes garigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes ru ra// kyigag ngas pa yang su mnas// margya gnyis sadas dal yun pa smrag/ gnagagag gis tha pa 'jug
187a2(rnying rgyud): chen btu rdugs la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i sku// thog tha med cing yon tan bzlas pa med// sbyin pas rig pa'i klong du mtsho drangs ltar// 'khor ba'i rdzing nas thugs rdo'i grags kyus 'drer// dpa' bar 'gro ba
187a3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin 'gro don mdzod// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdod lcags kyu ma// don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khod pa'i khyang 'dzin cing // rin chen phyag rgyas sems can de 'dod skor// yon tan tshogs rdzogs pag gdong
187a4(rnying rgyud): zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don du spyad pas rang gi don// shes rab sgron mas dug sde'i mun pa sel// yon gnyis mi 'di' rdzun grub dga' ba'i mchog/ kun mi khyen ma rig thub mdzad nyi bla'i spyan// snyan par smras pas kun kyang bka' bzhin rnyed// btang snyoms
187a5(rnying rgyud): thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// phan pas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho// chos ston pa ma chags slong mdzad kyis 'khrol ma// dani rdo rje yin pa'i rgyud bshad pa ste// bco brgyad shangs nas bco brgyad sprul pa 'gro// btso brtsad
187a6(rnying rgyud): khams la bco brgyad skur ston pa// bco brgyad thugs kyis bcom cad 'dul zhabs mnga'// btso brgad snyan gyis ngams byad khams gsan cing // bco brgyad ljags kyis bco brgyad gsungangs 'chang // gyu su brgyad kyi dgangs pa bsam mi byang// sad kyi
187a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan// brjid nanon zhabs bcad rdzogs btad lhab rtad kanor// de da la kyang spyan dgu 'byings mig po// 'dul ba'i dang du bzhal pa'i ba ston ci / sri pal gyi dang po med pa den rdzogs// napang gsu
187b1(rnying rgyud): las sgra gsum phrin las 'byung // spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs// ral gci gsugs pas 'gro don rtse zhing rol// bco brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad do rnam// brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gyis gnon// phra 'i byod srung
187b2(rnying rgyud): ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// chos la dbang mdzad ha ya grI ba'i dpal// 'dzin tshul stobs kyis drang srong tshar gartsod cing // log pa'i nyes spangs yang dag don dang ldan// tshul khrims mthar byin drang srong kau
187b3(rnying rgyud): pas che// skye la dbang mdzad pan tshul mi g.yo mgon// shugs 'chang stobs gyis rlung lha gzir gnon ci // 'khyal ba'i skyon spangs dag gi dbang phyug che// gnyen po'i smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtsi// las la ra'ang mdzad bdud rtsi s+'uN+Da le/
187b4(rnying rgyud): gnon pa'i stobs kyis 'byung po tshor gtsad cing // gnod sems skyon srungs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// gnyen po'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing // rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// brdeg pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing /
187b5(rnying rgyud): bden dang bral ba'i rdzun dang skyon sel ba'i// mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma kun 'dul ba// ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can// ldeg pa'i stobs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing // brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// bzod pa
187b6(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi lta bu'i gzhir gyur la// smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da li// rol pa'i stobs kyis gza' skar tshar gcod cing // 'dod chags skyon spangs su yi dbang phyug che// ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal// skye zhing mos la dbang mdzad
187b7(rnying rgyud): hUMk+Shar// zlog pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams car gcod cing // ma khyen len pa'i spyod spangs bdag nyid ce// rab tu shes pa'i shes rab pathar byin po// ma byed dbang mdzod gzhan gyis kyi thu rgya// 'jigs byed stobs kyis 'tsho bdag zi laganon cing /
188a1(rnying rgyud): gagan shes grangs pa me par grags// 'dung 'dra bye blangs pas pa ga da dang 'gas/ sal bang 'dzu 'jigs rnyed gshi gshang // ye gas byags rnaMs ldanapas mamang ma 'dod// zags la ga
188a2(rnying rgyud): pas srid las sgrol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bskams// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad lA s+ye kaM/ rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin// thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'phro ba mi gtong zhing // skyes rab thabs kyi lcags kyus mtha'
188a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'dzin// gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad tra ti ru// ye shes mtshan ldan thugs rje'i khrod 'byung zhing // sprul pas 'gro sgrol skya dang ye shes 'phro// shes snying ma skyes dbu mo'i rig pa skye/ shra sha pa tis rdo rgyal gshin rje mnyes// dbyings su mtshan
188a4(rnying rgyud): ma shes rab tho bas brdung // thugs rje'i phrin las sems can mtshan ma bcom// dbu mar ye shes snying rjes mi rtog dang // ma g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mus la// rdo rje gtum mos mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom// thugs rjes rngam tshul srin po bral bar rdzog
188a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs// ha ya grI ba mnyes mdzad tsa N+Da lI// phra mor 'bigs pas ye shes dbyings su 'phen// 'jigs pa'i ye shes gnang du thugs rjes brdeg/ ma 'gyogs dbu ma chen po'i don rtogs pas// gzhan gyis mi thub
188a6(rnying rgyud): mnyes mdzad sa b+ha ti// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos reg pa'i sgra// dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyal ba'i sgra// de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa// bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bya ma rtas mnyes// bdag tu rtogs pa'i maman pa kun 'acom zhing // ba byed
188a7(rnying rgyud): mche bas skye sha rtsed bcad de// skra dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa// pad+ma 'khyil po mnyes byed mA ra Na// thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul// thugs rje'i shug kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// mnyes byed mchod bskul dbu ma'i dpes pa
188b1(rnying rgyud): ma hA pa la mnyes mdzad tsun dAm// bstod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rdo'i shugs kyis 'gro rnams gnas nas sbyor// thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// dI ba ya tis khams gsum d+hu mdzad mnyes// khams gsu
188b2(rnying rgyud): shugs rje'i mi bzod phrin las kyis// yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtul// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar gtug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed bya g+h+ra~M ma// sdang mig thugs rjes mi 'gyur zhe la gnon// mthu rtsa 'jom brjid 'gyur med bdud
188b3(rnying rgyud): dpung bzlog/ tsham rngams ral gsig gdangs ngar 'jig rten 'gengs// de phyir skra men 'gyur med tsa mar// rtog pa'i sgra spangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas// 'khrul skyon dri ma shes bzhin rjes tshor spangs// 'gro don dus la bab la thugs rje 'jug/ re phyir 'jug
188b4(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i ha ri Na// chos dbyings gnas la rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing // thugs rjes sprul bas sgra ris bsam mi khyab// dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad bya g+h+r-i ma// yang bag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan//
188b5(rnying rgyud): dul zin thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs// dus las mi 'da' brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i bi DA la/ ye shes dbyings la 'jug pas shes bya za// thugs rjes ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za// de phyir za byed shwa na mu kha ma//
188b6(rnying rgyud): rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul// phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung ma lus 'joms// stong nyid sgra sgrogs mu stegs wa tshogs 'joms// de phyir 'joms khyed rtsal mchog si d+ha ma// dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rjes rmo// mthing nag chen
