188b7(rnying rgyud): por drag po'i skur ston cing // thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed phra men da~Mk+Sha ka/ ye shes thugs rje'i stobs kyis mtha' gnon te// tsham rngams ral gsig sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms// las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus
189a1(rnying rgyud): sa man/ sa / rtasas nanasangasam rgya// / mas sal ma pa sa// dper sa pa
189a2(rnying rgyud): gyur// yid gsolas than mams par bya na// sde shis dbang gi gis rnye lasa'o// don mdza 'i zhes so grong dbyings su mabyed/ na panas// bas pa'i la po 'dod 'a bya
189a3(rnying rgyud): byin pas sa ga// rtags de 'dun pas 'kho ba'i ga chagasas/ myer babyed do/ shA/ demigs lasems dzin nga ma byed par gyur// lce shes dkyis gas dug pas nyid mo nyas// dgro 'ong rmongs la rdzogs rje ma na
189a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'aM u wA// brtags pa'i dngos la de gcig te 'dzin gyur// mnyam rje po ma dbyings las zheg mo ba// rtogs pa'i snod ya?l b+his pas mi mdzod te// depyir da me byed pa yas// las 'bras bden pa srid ches dang
189a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// mnyam nyid dbyings su thugs rje'i shugs kyis mgyogs// zhiganas sbyin gyis lhag mthong 'grod phyogs drang // de kyir mgyogs byed named na pa// nges pa'i ngongos la 'dzin pa myos par gyur// zhag mthong la shes dbying sa nyid ma nyam hA
189a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// zhe gnas gces par 'dzin pas mi 'phrog ste// de phyir 'dzin pa'i tha men d+ha// 'dzes pa'i dngos po ma 'das dran par bye// dbyings da yo na su ma nyam nyid mi brjid nga na// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mdzangs song gsal// gnyis las ma tshungs
189a7(rnying rgyud): rin pa tI la// chos rnams 'byed pa'i bye brag gyur ba ni// mnyam nyid ngangadu log sa'i byed cing // rig pa bgyid pas pos nyid tshel gcod// de kyi da gsod byed dgul// 'dzin pa rang dbang med pas gnyid kyang bas// mnyam dang mi mthun rdzogs
189b1(rnying rgyud): myos pa 'o// bta pa'i chos bsgrags lag brgyam su pa yis// thabs kyis sas byed pa man su ka/ gsum 'dus gzang ba reg par gyur pan// phrin las bye brag pa mad kyang // drug tu ban pa sa skyes dkyis su thong // debyer ma thod dra khyod nas
189b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das// chos sgra rdo rjes gcod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// brjod med brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral// de phyir brjod med badz+ra la k+Sh+mI N+De// chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsre
189b3(rnying rgyud): phyag mtshan rdo rjes gnas pa'i sku bdud bcom// de phyir 'joms byed badz+ra b+he ta ba// 'chi med bdud rtsis yul sems skye 'gug med// grub pa'i bdud rtsis bsam pa'i 'bras bu thong // thugs rjes 'gro bas bdud rdzi bla med 'grub// de pyir rtsi mchog ye shes brda
189b4(rnying rgyud): amr-i ta// ye shes 'phrog byed yon tan rgya mtsho 'grub// thugs rjes 'phrog byed srid pa dbang du skyed// ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbyings su nug// de phyir drug byed badz+ra ma NI// da ni pad+ma dbang chen dang / dbang phyug ma'i rtsa klung brjod par bya'o// @
189b5(rnying rgyud): lnga'i spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu// ye shes lnga po so sos ci 'dul mkhyen// snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal sel// shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul pa 'arko// rgyung lnga'i mgon mdzod brtson ldan te dbu lnga// 'uhU~M lnga zhal dr-i shAr te rngub mdzad cing /
189b6(rnying rgyud): ljags lnga the tshom gcod cing theg lnga 'chad// sde bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad gshog gzhi stod// bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dred// phyogs brgyad 'dul gyi zhabs brgyad khro chung gnon// rigs pa ni snod bcud nyi zla'i 'od dang rdzis// phyogs
189b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi rtsa la jug dbang phyug yang che ga non// che ba'i che ba yang che bla na med// bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa ltar// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa bcu rdugs la bzhugs// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i de'/
190a1(rnying rgyud): rjem su so gzugs// dbang chen yongs su 'dral ba dkyil 'khor dang // tshogs chen/ nyis rdzogs thugs rdzas sun grub pa// dpepa 'khor gas ma gyis brjod pa po thab ma// thugs rjes 'dus gyis spyong pas skyon mags// mtha' gnyis dang
190a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa/ te ruka/ rngams pa'i tshul gyis srin mo'i gzugs 'don cing // thod dus gdug pa'i 'brumar nas sum// srid pa sems can snyid khrag tron mor gsol// dbang drag las mdzad man bya ste// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'dis ston tshangs ma'i gzugs// tshad myed pazhi rdzogs dpa /
190a3(rnying rgyud): myed bu bzhing ldan// zhal bzhis smang 'don gleng bzhi bcwa shis ldan// gti mug yid bzhin rin chen bAh+ma N+Di// tha ma byed mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma// mngag dugagasumya doms mdzud ngapas rje bstinas// bud med chags tshul dbang mdza dadaka' zlog ma// chags pa'i
190a4(rnying rgyud): skyon bral lha chen jim// thams cad khyi ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la rtogs// phrin las rgya mtshos sgrol ba'i bzhad chen mo// 'khor pa'i rgyun gcod drag mo blta ba// 'du byed mi rtag trel bu'i grwa ltar ma khyen// rtag par gzhon tshul
190a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba ji srid 'khrugs// nyon longs za ba 'jigs pa'i mdur thung 'phen// gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad kau ma rI// rdo rje'i las mdzad kun gyi blan med// b+ha yi rgyal srid tshogs la dbang bsgyur zhing // mchog sbyin phyag rgyas mi dmigs sku mdog dkar// gsang bya
190a6(rnying rgyud): kye 'bebs mi tri hrI// byams ma'i thugs rjes dbang mdzad snga mdog dmar// b+haSh+Ta bcud langs snod kyi khrag mtsho la// rngam pa'i zhal du drag gsum bzheng ma// sdug bsngal dbyings su skong byed pi rga la// sems can thams cad 'dul thabs mchog tun khyer// bung sel skyon
190a7(rnying rgyud): 'bang bdud rtsis ni dag so mdzad// 'dam skyes pa da ltar 'khor bar sru' blangs kyang // chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mr-i ta// shi ba'i las ni spyo rnams mchog bu ma byin// zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar smin cu// gdung ba'i nang sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cig/ gang na mchod/
190b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad stongs mdangs du sgyum// dbyig pasang chog pa dra ba ga zul med pa khyen// thabs kyis mchongs ldang bu phrin lus madrog/ nan dbang dag thul mchog gi dbyug to rnams// dregs byed sbyi nas 'joms mdzod da // bon par brtag sa kyi bur kyi rdzos
190b2(rnying rgyud): ba 'phrog byed ste rgyan khrag mtsho gsol// las mdo chags tshul gser gyi skeng chings can// drag mo rnga ma tshul glog phreng daHsI// phrengs rkun gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes// snying rje'i rgyun sbyang bsu'i zhags pa yis// chags medo nang du khams gsum sgrol mdzad na// thugs rje
190b3(rnying rgyud): gyis sgrol mdzad d+ha Sha sI// tshogs pa'i dbyig pas mchod pa mchog tu ma khyen// gtum pos gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad cing // yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ra ti ma// ra ro 'dra ba'i dpa' bo gzhan med ma khyen// chos rnams gnyis
190b4(rnying rgyud): med don rtogs rtag tu myos// nyon mongs ma parnyog pa'i gshol brnams shing // dge ba'i log rtog byed pa'i du ti rem d+ha// brtan pas gzhad rnams pham byed dpa' ba'i mchog/ ma bus gsod byed las la 'jug byed cing // bstengs pa mi mdang 'gro don gcig bur spyod// gsod byed
190b5(rnying rgyud): dral mdzad meg tsa rje// bud med tshul chags 'gro ba dbang du spyad// thams cad ma lus 'bugs byed dga' ba'i mchog/ 'dod lha'i mda' 'dren srid dag sum yid 'grog cing // thugs rjes zin pa'i mnog ma// khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing // don
190b6(rnying rgyud): rnams dbang du bsgyur nas ze de gtor can// mi zad gter ldan nor gyi bum pa 'dzin// sdug bsngal de spyod mthur thug si d+hi kA// reg bya'i sems mchung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog byin tshe 'phel ma// bde ga shegs pas chud sems can rdzo la mdzad cing // khams
190b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas nas skyod mdzad bA ya bI// snyigs ma lnga ldan lde bcu mtha' mal// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gsad pa nyi tshe'i las kyis gdul bar mdzad// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsod mdzad mA da Na// gzi brjid can ni me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba
191a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsreg/ ba byad bskal pa dus mtha' tshul rton pa// ga mthong sa shas ba 'gro mgan pa// mchab dag pas b+hA ba nA tu dag cong zhugs// nyan mongs tha ba rlog pa pagag bya// log pa'i phyogs rnams srid gsus stobs
191a2(rnying rgyud): kyis sgor// skye ba'i rtsad gcod pa byed par hrI// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma spos mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad// dam tshig spang ba'i 'chi bdag bzlog mdzad cing // phung gi du khrod dbang mdzad tsa mut+ti// 'jigs las lhag pa'i dgegs ni
191a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan med ma khyen// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs pa dbang mdzad cing // rta rkyen glang sna bdud rtsig tu thogs// sdug balnga nad pos mdzad pa'i satan// rgya las lhag pa'i zad zhi gzhan med mkhyen// rdor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing // gdug pa'i dul phying dag rjong
191a4(rnying rgyud): sbrul zhags bsdams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang srud wa ru DI// 'gro ba'i don mdzod mi 'gyur sa mdog gang ga// sring gsum 'jolas mdzad kyi shul gdengs pa bsnams// thugs rjes shugs kyis dzin mdzad lcags kyu bsnams// 'khor bzugs rje shar mdzad ka lI mo// chags pa
191a5(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis don mdzad ra mgo can// byams pa'i nags bas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing // gang la ces 'dul de la der ston pa'i// yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skod tsaka k+She// ston pa'i bkang dang rang gi dam bcas gnyis// mi 'da' mgub dang rta brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgog gis
191a6(rnying rgyud): sems can po la mdzad cing // matig du ba mdzad kun+ta gaN ma// phrug sung yo tu na zin las mtha' bas pa/ ba'i zhes skul 'gro ba'i chung pang bebs/ rdzos kyi// klog sa shing // bzla chags byang mdzad pa spong ma/ nadang pe byed kyis pa
191a7(rnying rgyud): pa mgyogs pa'i o nya ste// rngam pa gtum pa'i gzugs can ni// rngab mo dang sgrog 'gyur grags// chos nyid zhags pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud// ye shes thugs rjes 'brel mas kun ma khyab// phrin las dra pas 'gro ba rlabs kyis spol// de phyir lha mo ni chen drab mo//
191b1(rnying rgyud): bdun la bdun/ ye shes thog 'grus patshan ma byangs skrag cong// da cigazugs snang khor bar byebs pa yod// khrim pas spyo 'grus 'grub 'a thob// dra sa rdzas pagrog blam yis 'dren// ma ca su 'od cir dra pa 'drabra// dang ba nyis thog
191b2(rnying rgyud): shing // bskal ba'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa'i rlung dung mtshungs// mig gsum po la lcags sder can// mgo gsum po la nang gsum po// mangs za zhing bdud khyim 'angoms// bltas pas bdud rnams 'jigs par byed// klu rtsi gnas cing nges par joms//
191b3(rnying rgyud): 'dri rnams khro bo'i pho ta s+t+wa~M// ha ha ru lu'i sgra spogs shing // gang gi rlung phyogs song ba'i tshe// khro bo thams cad nges par 'chi// na mo bi tsar b+h+yo/ hAha ru lu b+h+yo/ mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad po// rkang pa brgyad la mig \u0f7f brgyad// lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin// rta ma gre gnas
191b4(rnying rgyud): ni nges par 'joms// rkang badrug la mgo drug po// lag pa drug ni rgyung drug gcod// g.yon pa drug ni gtor ma 'dzin// g.yas pa gsum ni phyur bu 'dzin// gang nas ga du 'gro ba'i tshe// bdag gi rkang pa phur ba yin// rkang balcags phur rab tu grags// 'od zer dung
191b5(rnying rgyud): khas reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang nges par 'joms// lag pa g.yon pa bskyod pas ni// phra man 'khor bcas ral pa gsig/ lcags kyi dgra star ba thogs shing // zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// byung gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po//
191b6(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ suni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// sma ni 'brug pas rab tu che// bang ni klog pas rab tu mgyogs// rab tu mi bsun 'di dag ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la 'od phung can// dral pa gnag cing mche
191b7(rnying rgyud): bsanag/ mig kyang gnag cing ral po gnag/ mchogs pa rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di dag lo ta'i mchog yin te// dums pa med cing stobs chen 'joms// pha rol rnam shes nges pa rang rig/ rkang gcig 'di dag lo nya yang // kha dog 'bar ba ci 'dra ste// gcig la gcig ni rab tu
192a1(rnying rgyud): la// yang na lag bgrang lta gro// mrig kyang med de cang mi// long bkun gyi mchog yin te// tub bas ga na nga ba rnams te// ma/ 'gA'adag tu mnganas nAn// gnyigs ste der byin ngas// gang la dmigs pa len par byed/ lus kya ban/
192a2(rnying rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// pho nyid rnams sems kyi khyad par las byung ste// srul byed mas ni gzhan 'debs shing // mardzogs pa'i lam ni phyin par 'gro// lhag gaN+DI'i ma sring du mo d+hang ma pa ni // phyi br-i na tshul thams cing na men no// des po nyi ni ste thugs dam bsgral/
192a3(rnying rgyud): sar+tha khyab dang 'jal pa des rkyen no// thugs dam bskyal ba 'i sbyin pa las bzhi'o// ti dzin sbrul ga las dang rnam shes gas+ho// rtsa ladrung rtsal rkye ni ta tsaM // rtabab sur rdzob rlung bdon mu gnyis// lus laganyen bung kyil khor rung bzhig // lus la rang bzhin
192a4(rnying rgyud): dngos po med pa gcod// khyab pa chos nyid khyab pa za byed na// don dam mkha' la nyi sha rags la stong khyab// gsod pa'i las ni grub pa yin// so so yang 'phrog sgrib pa yis// 'phrog ces 'bring ba de ltar bya// phra men zhes bya'i nges chog ni// don dam rang bzhin byin rlabs rtags
192a5(rnying rgyud): dang sprul// btul ba yin te rnam pajug tu bshad// don ni dpyi sri nga ni shes gnyis med tshul// gseng dngul bsres pa'i rnaM ba ninaH// phrin du m+b+ha rnams dang ting rjeganyid ldang ba// ti 'od rdo dang bsreg pa lci bu'i tshul// gnyis las byeng phyir rang bzhin sha ng+yas te//
192a6(rnying rgyud): kyi ts+lim-igadug na nang tshul byams pa yin// rtags ni ni ngag gnyis kyi don mdzad pa// shaza'i n+ya go cang mi la tha~Mng du btags// sbal pa'i las dang thugs m+b+hi 'brel bas na// de 'da'i rdzi sngal smra 'dra 'phrul la snang // nges tshig ye shes po nyas dbyings pa 'jug/ sa sor ra
192a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin sa pa nyi sa na 'angal zhes byan// brlung pa'i sa ma chul pa 'ang/ gongs pa // rdongs pas mau dag gi dzin // dan nga rings pa brel byed// ma bgang pa bas pa spangs/
192b1(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i mdzad spyod grol bas dngos grub rgyu// lung dang rig pa gtan tshigs kun dang 'brel// bka' dang bstan te dbye gsal 'di brtsams pa// bdag 'dra dmin pas dbye bar mi 'os kyang // sA lu'i 'phrod bzhin du ni sgron snang bas// rmongs pa'i mun sel 'gro ba'i don byas
192b2(rnying rgyud): pas// bshes mchog dus gsum 'gro ba ma lus rnams// skyon brjod nyes pa'i ze ra rdzis mi 'phog cing // nyon mongs smad nga grub pa'i chung rtogs pas// bstan myed kyi don la 'jug gyur cig/ gnyis med 'bras bu bla mdo 'grub par shog/ lung thams cad kyi rgyal po/ man
192b3(rnying rgyud): dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba/ rigs 'os bshad 'thad gtan tshigs thams cad kyi tshod ma'i 'grel pa/ lha rgyud kyi rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA ru d+hU ba li sh+tsa mAM sa rak+Sha sti ma hA ba li s+thAn+ta/ bod skad du/ thugs rje chen po'i gtor ma dang / da khrag ru
192b4(rnying rgyud): gtor rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bla na med pa'i he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis shes nas bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rang rig pa'i klong na bzhugs pa la/ de nyid kyi khyad par las/ de nyid dang gnyis su
192b5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i yum des 'di skad bskul lo// a k+ka ho// dang po skye med chos rnams yum gyi dang // ma byung ma skyes sems nyid skye ba med// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid dag pa las// 'khor ba ngan song ye nas med pa la// brtags pas 'khrul pa'i rdzas su snang ba kun// thugs rje chen
192b6(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba'i dus la ba ba// ngo mtshar che ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bskyod// ces gleng bslangs pa dang / yab k+Shis yum la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// a rge ho// me bcos ye sa kyis dag pa'i zhing khams su// thams cad gnyis med rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de tshe log stog
192b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma ming yang med// stong pa nyid las stong pa'i rang bzhin gnas// stong nyid brtags pas stong nyid rang bzhin bde// ni skye'i chos las chos rnams thams cad 'byung // chos nyid longs spyod rgyan du gcig par byos// zhes med du brjod do// de nas sus kyang ma brjod pa'i rang
193a1(rnying rgyud): tsam nyid las/ a A swA hA lnga las/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs kyis bsdus pa thams cad rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtor ma 'gyur to// gzugs kyi phung 'os bsdus pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtor mar gyur to// tshor bar snang ba thams cad rin
193a2(rnying rgyud): po che rigs kyi gtor mar gyur to// 'du shes kyis bsdus pa thams cad pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtor mar gyur to// 'du byed kyis bsdus pa thams cad las kyi rigs kyi gtor mar gyur to// de yang gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ sdug cing mdzes
193a3(rnying rgyud): pas gzugs sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba dang / se ra ba dang / ldang ba la sogs te/ me tog sna tshogs pa'i gtong ma ra sprul te/ des kyang don bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / thugs dam bskul ba dang / tshim pa dang dngos grub stsol ba
193a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur te/ des kyang chos nyid la chos nyid rdol pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gdod nas dag pa dang / sangs rgyas shing gtor bar gyur to// de yang rnams shing thugs rje che la yongs la khyabs pas gtor mar gyur to// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ tshems par byed pas
193a5(rnying rgyud): dri zhim pa dang / mi zhim pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / sman gyi dri dang / zhal zas kyi dri la sogs pa spos sna tshogs kyi gtor ma rtul te// des kyang don bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / thugs dam srul ba dang / sgrib pa spong ba dang // dngos grub stsol ba la sogs
193a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur te/ des kyang chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa dang / ye shes la ye shes rol pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gdod nas dag pa dang / rjes su snang ba ste/ thams cad du sangs rgyas shing gtor mar gyur to// des kyang byams shing thugs rje chen pos yong
193a7(rnying rgyud): la khyab pas gtor mar gyur to// kye'i rnam par shes pa ni/ myong bar byed pas bro ba dang / mi dro ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa dang / khab dang / meng ra ba dang / sbreng ba dang / rtsub pa dang / lan mo ro la sogs pa bshos sna tshogs kyi gtor mar sprul te/ des kyang ngan
193b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / mchod pa dang / thim pa dang / thugs dam skul ba dang / sgrib pa skyong ba dang / dngos grub stsol ba la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rten du gyur te/ des kyang chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa dang / ye shes lnga yod nas rol ba dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gdod nas dag pa dang /
193b2(rnying rgyud): rdzas su snang ba dang / 'bras bu thob par byas te/ thams cad sangs rgyas shing gtor mar gyur to// des kyang byams shing thugs rje che la yongs la khyab pas gtor mar gyur to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ reg par byed pas/ 'jam pa dang / rgyab pa dang / gnyis
193b3(rnying rgyud): kamra yin pa dang / lha dang mi gos la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi gtor mar sprul te/ des kyang don bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dam skul ba dang / sgrib pa skyong ba dang / dngos grub stsol ba la sogs pa'i sku dang rkyen du gyur te/ des kya don grong ma
193b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gyur to// na pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ thos par byed pas/ sgra sbyin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa dang / TI ltar lha dang mi'i sgra dang / rol mo dang / 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa thams cad dang / sme sna tshogs kyi gtor mar sprul te/ dris kyang
193b5(rnying rgyud): don gong ma bzhin du gyur to// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pas pa suM stsogs par byed pas/ bag chags bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa dang / rjes su rgyu ba dang / dran pa dang / rtsol ba dang / shes rab rno ba la sogs pa sdeng ba rdzogs kyi gto ma sprul te/
193b6(rnying rgyud): myang don bya ba la sogs pa gong ma zhin no// nyon mongs pa can gyi ying kyi zla par zhes pa ni/ rjes su chu bar byed pas/ tshor ba dang / drang ba dang / thos pa dang / gnas pa laso gos bsdang ba yongs su snang ba'i gtor ma phrul te/ nges byeng don babra la sogs pa gong ma zhin/
193b7(rnying rgyud): no// yid mirnam par shes pa ni/ gsal bar gcod ngas/ lha dang 'i'i gzugs pa sogs pa dang / thog dang sgra'i don thams cade shes pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / mi brjed pa dang / sdong du byur ba'i sogs pa yongs su snang ba'i gtod mar sbyaras te/ des bya no dum
194a1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dam skul ba dang / sgrib pa spong ba dang / dngos grub srol ba la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur te/ des kyang don pas dang / rgyas nyid la rgyas nyid rol pa dang / ye shes la ye shes rol ba dang / gnyis
194a2(rnying rgyud): su med pa dang / gdod nas dag pa dang / rdzas su snang ba dang / 'bras bu thob par byed ste/ thams cad yongs su rgyas shing gtor mar gyur te/ des kyang byams shing thugs rje chen po yongs 'khyab pas gtor ma gyur to// de la gzugs kyis bsdus pa ni gang zhe na/ chu'i
194a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs bzhi dang / 'bras bu'i gzugs bcu gcig dang / lha dang mi'i gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs te/ rgyu'i gzugs bzhi ni/ 'byung ba chen po bzhinam mkha' spyir btang ba dang lnga ste/ nam mkha' ni shong yangs che ba dang / steng 'og med par gdal ba dang / mtha' dbus
194a4(rnying rgyud): med par khyab pa dang / phyogs ris med par khyab pa dang / thug pa med par dpal gyi gtor mer gyur to// des kyang byams pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no// sa nI sa'i rang bzhi rnam pa dang / rgya che ba dang / grangs mang ba dang / phye ba smin par byed pa dang // bdog gsal ba dang /
194a5(rnying rgyud): ri rab dang gling du ldan pa'i gtor mar gyur te/ des kyang don bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no// chu ni gsher pa dang / rlan pa dang / sbed par byed pa dang / gting zab pa dang / 'bab pa dang / rgya mtsho dang / gting dpag yangs pa'i gtor mar gyur te/ des kyang don bya ba
194a6(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa gong me bzhin no// mo ni dro ba dang / tsha ba dang / gsal ba dang / mjed pa dang / sreg pa dang / dro zhing shar ba'i gtor mer gyur te/ des kyang don bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no// rlung na bskrod pa dang / yang ba dang / 'degs pa dang / bsel ba dang / 'gyed pa
194a7(rnying rgyud): dang / khyab pa dang / 'thong ba'i gtong mar gyur te/ des kyang don bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no// des bskyed pa'i 'bras bu'i gzugs ni/ yul lnga dbang po lnga dang / rnam par rig sa ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad gas pa pa dang / sdang ba dang / ldan pa dang / ba ta
194b1(rnying rgyud): bdang / dngas su snga pa sa te mar gyur / ngas kyang dbya ba lasags pa gang maban na/ rdzir sa bsdus pa gang nan/ bang ba dang / drug rdza ba dang / btas nam na / da dgu na tra'abras kyang bar byeg Shamar byu // yang dang nga 'ad /
194b2(rnying rgyud): pagong ma bzhin no// 'du shes kyis bsdus pa gang zhe na/ rgya che ba dang / chung ngu dang / tshad med pa ste/ de dag kyang kun la khyab pa'i gtor mar gyur te/ des kyang don bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no// 'du byed kyis brdzus pa gang zhe na/ lnga brgya rtsa gcig ste/
194b3(rnying rgyud): ngag kyang thams gsum khyab pa'i gtor ma gyur to// des kyang don bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / rtsom pa dang / thugs drim stsal ba dang / sgrib pa skyong ba dang / dngos gri bsnol bu la sogs pa'i rnye dang rten du gyur te/ des byang chos nyid la rgyas nyid ros byang /
194b4(rnying rgyud): shes la ye shes rol pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gdod nas dag pa dang / rdzas su sbyang ba dang / 'bras bu thob par byed de/ thams cad du sangs rgyas shing gtor mar skur to// de yang bums shing thugs rje tshel/ yongs la khyab pa'i gtor na'o// de nas chos nyid bye ba
194b5(rnying rgyud): nga'i slong me sa gang 'bral/ rang rig she 'a ba'i rnamang du phung sa gtor 'o// rang pa'i la pog pa ma sa pa'i tshul gdapa' sugator du'o// ni 'thun gnyis su rjed dus med mangs pas/ rigs pa'i sangs rgyas pa skyes sa pa ma
194b6(rnying rgyud): bses na ma'o// rdzas kyis bun 'a grub pas gtor ma'o// myatha' lathug pa med pas gtor ma'o// dbyings las bri ba med pas bskyod ma'o// de tsaman yod par 'don pa rdzas kyi gtor ma byung ste/ de yang 'din ste/ gnas shing brtan pa'i dus na rtsa bya'i gtor ma ste/ 'o
194b7(rnying rgyud): tha ma pas tshogs kyi tor ba srus kyis pa langs pa/ brjod kyis mi langs pa/ rtsa ba'i garko ma tshogs pas stong gsu pa kyi stong chen po sangs rgyas bye so ma pa gang dig rgyas par 'gyur ro// srog pa dang blo sman bru shing bye 'i dren mo ma tor na te/ shi dgas
195a1(rnying rgyud): tshal la sogs pa mnga' gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang / de bzhin gang zhing rgyas pa'i gtor mar gyur to// gsal zhing lhag pa'i dus na me tog gi gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ pad+ma dang ut+pa la la sogs pa blta ba'i gtor ma la sogs
195a2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang de bzhin du gyur te/ smin cing grub pa'i dus na 'bras bu'i gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa sman dang / gel pa dang / 'bru la sogs pa bza' ba'i gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa de yang de bzhin du gyur to// de tsam na med par 'dzin pa rnams la chos nyid kyi gtor ma
195a3(rnying rgyud): rgya che ba/ zabs pa gting dpag dka' bo/ mtha' dbus med pa'i snying po can gyis yongs su khyab par gyur to// de tsam na lha'i skur snang bar 'dod pa la thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor te/ sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / khro bo dang / khro mo la sogs pa'i dpe byad du ldan
195a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang bar gyur to// des kyang don bya ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin no// de bzhin du ci ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du gtor mar snang bar gyur to// de nas nyid la nyid ched du gleng ngo // stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// rmang pung yon ta nabs ma mi
195a5(rnying rgyud): byab// ye shes dbyings kyi rol pa ni// dmigs pa med las dmigs par snang // zhes brjod do// de nas yum gyis ming tsam las sangs rgyas kyi sku// phyed rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis dbyung ba 'dri lta ste/ sras mchog rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang // sras bcas byang chub
195a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rnams// kun kyang lhag ma med mthong ste// gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'khod// de nas snod kun tu bzang mo'i gtor bar gyur pa las// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mos yangs shing rgya che ba'i gtor mar byin gyis brlabs pa/ e mkha' klong rang bzhin mtha'
195a7(rnying rgyud): dbus g.yeb med// kun la khyab pas thugs rje 'byung ba'i yum// yangs dog med pa mkha' grong chen po che// gdong nas dag pa'i gtor gzhod chen por b+ha// / e liM ta/ zhes bya ba'i grwa phyogs bcu thams cad du grags so// grags mthag tu rtsis kyang mi 'gyur ba
195b1(rnying rgyud): dbyis kyi gtor mar shar/ dA nas snod dmachog sgrol ma yang zhing g.ya ba'i gtor mar byin gyis brnabs pa/ ma tsa ltar g.yob rlung gi rang bzhin la// la pa'i phran las cing yang 'gyur// phrin las yum gyi mkha' rjong dag padra// gdod nas dag pa'i gtor
195b2(rnying rgyud): gzhong chen por gyur// ya ba liM ta/ zhes bya ba'i sgra phyogs bcu thams cad du grags so/ grag/ ma thag tu cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i dbyings kyi gtor bar shir ro// de nas snod mA ma b+hir zlar pa las/ chu snam kI badz+ra zhing sprad pa'i gtor mar byin ces brlabs pa/
195b3(rnying rgyud): rma bdun zhing lda ba chu yi rang bzhin lnga// che ba'i yon tan thugs rje cir yang 'byung // yon tan ldan gyi mapa klong dag pa ru// gdong nas dag pa'i gtor gzhod chen por d+har// mAM ba liM ta/ zhes bya ba'i sgra mi 'arjod par phyogs brgya thams cad dra grags so// grags ma
195b4(rnying rgyud): thig tu ces kyang mi brjod pa'i dbyings kyi gtor mar shara'o// de nas snod sangs rgyas spyan du gyur pa las// sa sangs rgyas spyan sra zhing 'degs pa'i gtor mar byin gyis brlabs pa/ les zhing 'degs pa sa yi rang bzhan la// thugs rje'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang ston// thugs/
195b5(rnying rgyud): rje yum gyi mkhang grong dag pa na// gdod nas dag pa'i gtor gzhong chen por gyur// la~M ba lo ta/ zhes/ ba'i sgra ma brjod par phyogs bcu thams cad nga thags so// grags ma thag tu rtsis kyang me 'thur ba'i dbyings kyi gtor mar shar ro// de nas snod gos dkar mor gyur
195b6(rnying rgyud): pa las/ mgos dkar mos rgya nang sreg pa'i gtor mar byin gyis brlabs pa/ ri tshe zhing sreg pa me yi rang shi la// yongs su snyoms pa'i thugs rje cir yang 'gyur// gsung mchog yum gyi mkha' klong dag pa ru// gdod nas dag pa'i gtor gzhod chen por gyur// raM ba lo /
195b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i blam brjod par phyogs bcu thams cad du gragasas// grags ma thag tu cis kyang mi 'gyur ba'i dbus kyi gtor mar shar ro// de nas snongad sbre las rin po chen gzhal yas khang nga gyur pa las/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gtor ma byin gyis brla
196a1(rnying rgyud): b+hU gzhal las phyogs pa namatha' dbus med pa la// dag pa'i tsho bul na tshogs cir yang ston// dus gsumasgral ba btugs pa'i mabang shong du// gdang nas dbu nga ba tu ga zhong chen por gyur// d+hU ba tab pa/ zhes bya ba snyam
196a2(rnying rgyud): brjod par phyogs thams cad du grags so// grags mthag tu yangs dog med pa'i dbyings kyi gtor mar shar ro// de nas tsakr-ir gyur pa las/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gtor mar byin gyis brlabs pas/ tsang khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu byang dang bcas
196a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// gru chad pa ni dang bar khams sgo bzhir ldan// sras dang 'khor bcas bzhugs pa'i mkha' klod du// gdod nas dag pa'i gtor gzhong chen por gyur// d+hU ba liM tA tsakra/ ces bya ba'i sgra sus kyang ma brjod/ phyogs bcu thams cang kun tu grags so// grags ma thag tu bar
196a4(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa dbyings kyi gtor mar shar ro// de na thams cad bskyed cing 'byung ba'i gtor ma'o// de ni thams cad du gnas shing longs spyod pa'i gtor ma'o// de ni thams cad du mi gnas shing mthar phyin pa'i gtor ma'o// de ni snod kyi gtor gnong du bcud kyi mgron gshegs
196a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'di lta ste/ yid byed pa po thams cad ni kun tu bzang po'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa dang / chos bya ba mo thams cad ni kun tu bzang mo'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa dang / byung yang byung / ma byung yang ma byung / yod kyang yod/ med kyang med/ snang yang sdang / mi snang yang
196a6(rnying rgyud): mi snang / gsal yang gsal/ mi gsal yang mi gsal/ grub kyang grub/ ma grub kyang ma grub/ yin kyang yin/ min kyang min/ spyan drangs kyang drangs/ madrangs kyang ma drangs// phyin kyang byon/ mgyon kyang ma byon/ bzhugs kyang bzhugs/ mi bzhugs kyang mi
196a7(rnying rgyud): bzhun// de lta bu'i sgra bgrang du yod kyang yod/ med kyang med pa'i gtor ma'i mgron du gyur to// de bzhin du rigs lnga dang / yum lnga dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / sgo ba dang / sgo ma dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / don mdzad pa'i rngub pa la sogs
196b1(rnying rgyud): pasru mtshan dang dpe byangad du ldan pa byung yang byung / ma byung yang ma byung ba gtor ma'i mgron du gyur to// de dag kun kyang sku mdog phyag mtshan la grangs su gzung du yang rung / mi gzung du yang rung / de lta bu'i mgron rnams til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin du gang nas kyang khra'
196b2(rnying rgyud): par 'khod do// de nas gtor mo'i mgron de dag la mchod cing bstod pa ni sus kyang bsgreng bu med par sa gzhi de dag lasaM/ phyi ba ltar ni me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / pad+ma dang / u thal dang / badz+ra dzi bi ka la sogs pa gong ma lta bu'i gtor gzhor las rang
196b3(rnying rgyud): so// de la rtog ge pa rnams da lta me tog gi dus so zhes 'dogs so// nang pa ltar me tog ge sa ra re re la me tog lha mo grangs brjod kyis mi langs pa'i yang brjod kyis mi langs par gyur nas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag pa mchod pa dang / don bya ba dang / don
196b4(rnying rgyud): byas pa la sogs pa gtor ma'i longs spyod rgyun mi 'chang bar mdzad do// de la dmigs par 'dzin pa rnams kyis me tog gI lha mo zhes ming dang mtshan du btags so// gsang ba bla na med pa ltar na/ de yang gnyis su med de/ rol pa mdzad smod tha mi dang dbyer med pa'i rol pa
196b5(rnying rgyud): gtor mar longs spyod par gyur to// de bzhin du spos dang / de bzhin du mang me dang / de bzhin du byug pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / de bzhin du dri dang / de bzhin du ro dang / de bzhin du reg dang / de bzhin du chos la sogs pa kyi 'dus
196b6(rnying rgyud): byas su snang ba ste/ rdzas kyi mchod pa rang chung la gnas so// nang 'dus ma byas te/ lha'i rdzing nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o// gsang pa gnyis su med pa ste/ rol pa chen po'i mdzod skyong dru gnas pa'o// de lta bu'i gtor ma rdzogs pa la phyi nang sdod bcung dang ldan no// rang gi
196b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa 'i 'du 'bral med par gnas so// da la spyod pa chen po'i lhun la dus gsum dang / snga phyi dang / tshe rlung dang / mthong man dang / grogs ris dang / bde sdug med par thugs rje chen po'i gtor ma ro longs spyod du rol lo// de bzhin du ye nas sus kyang ma byas pas pa
197a1(rnying rgyud): zhwa skyegatang bar pa dang // ngananas cad mthas pas yang sa nga na na// dad dang rigapas pad par yang gyu/ 'dwags pa rnas ldan 'das rgya sa/ mangs spya mnapa pa rgyan pa
197a2(rnying rgyud): da bu 'don sus thos pas gtong ba thams cad kyi 'thung grangs shes pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad bye ba dag po dang / sangs thal bams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu di ma kyis nga sa bsrungs par 'angs so// rkyen las rjod gi gtong ma yin pa la// bdud dkyis
197a3(rnying rgyud): 'angags la bsgrub pa'i sra// 'byung ba'i longs ni dang la rang bzhin 'char// 'du thal med pa'i mchod pargyan med kyis// rgyal ba mas dang bcas pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchod pa rdzun med mdza// ye nas yin pas nam yang 'phrul ba med/
197a4(rnying rgyud): gtor ba'i rang bzhin sprul bas brjod mi langs// thams cad gnyis su med par po sa spyod phyid// mahA ba nyid rgyal ba'i thugs la gzung bar bya'o// zhes mgrin gcig tu ma gsungs par phreng bsnang // de thob pa pa ni/ sgru bsod nams kyi tshogs dang
197a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu le zhes kyi tshogs mthar phyen 'aze // de blo tha mal pa phal cher rnams ni rig pa dang rtog pa ces zer te/ de la blo tha mal pa chen po rnams ni/ ye nas de ltar dpyon med ces zer ro// gaN+Di ud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i long ste dang ba'o//
197a6(rnying rgyud): dri nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i grong dum nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' byung ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mdun da bka' nod pa las/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// marig ling tog bsal ba dang // ser sna smin par bya ba dang // ma
197a7(rnying rgyud): nyid du bsgyur ba dang / bcud lha'i zhal zas su bya ba dang / 'khor ba rnam par dag pa'i glong du bslang ba'i slad cu/ lus dang sems gtor ma'i d+ha dang rkyen du sul cig/ ces bka' bsgo ba dang / de nas rdo rje sems dpas lus rdul snyed du spel nas gtor ma'i rgya 'byung
197b1(rnying rgyud): 'a dang sa gra / 'du rgya na// da sas gnags bsu na pa 'drab// da nga ma ma/ b+ha ga sa rba yang // da la sa sa rgyan
197b2(rnying rgyud): sa banag// dekyi'i bya ga/ zag do/ ci sa mas pa'i rjes dbes papa dang ga dus nas s+ho//
197b3(rnying rgyud): gtor la'i rgyu yang rdo rje sems// gtor ma'i mgron yang rdo rje sems// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i lus gtor ma'i myung gur te/ kye snod kyi 'jig rten gling bzhi gling phran dang bzlas pa/ grangs bye ba zer 'bum du gtor ma'i snod du gyur to// 'dzem zung gling gang
197b4(rnying rgyud): skad kyin te/ gtor ma'i rgya ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ g.ya di dang/ grangs ri dang / dpa' ba dang / nags dang / 'ad mi da / ma tsho la sogs pa rnams pardo rje sems dpa'i rdzas/ kha dog gsal ba rnam pa hA tshogs pa dang las dang skyes nas pa
197b5(rnying rgyud): ma N+Di mched ma dag par gnas so// de la ze na to stong na/ dbu ma pa tshogs pa/ shing dang kyang shing bsog sarnams pa/ rang pa zhes nas gting ya d+ha grong ma rig pa Sh+T+r-I // de lta bu'ig tang rjong na/ san ma pa sna chags
197b6(rnying rgyud): rdza ba dang shun grags dang lo ma dang / 'bras bu thang chu dang khro ba dang / ra sI ya na sna tshogs pa dang la nga skyes nas gtor ba'i drung mchod ma dag por dro'o// de nas yang rdo sems dpa'i lus las rdo rje sems dpe'i ga tor min sdong du skyed pa'i nang na/
197b7(rnying rgyud): na po chernam pa sogs pa ste/ gleng dang gyi ma brdal ba/ bzhu ba dang / bdu shedang / skyes pa mamigs pa kha dog rnam pa tshogs par rang las rang kyis des gtor ma'i byu sod padag spong /
198a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa dang rgyud kyis grags pa dang / lha dang mas byas pa dang / rtsol ba dang / thabs las byung ba gzugs dang dbyibs su yod pa dang / med pa rnam pa sna tshogs par rang la rang skyes nas/ gtor ma'i rgyur mchod ma dag par
198a2(rnying rgyud): grags so// de lta bu'i gtor sdod kyi nang na/ chu bo dang / chu bran dang / sman chu dang / mtsho dang / char ba dang / 'og chu dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyu dang / 'bab chu la sogs pa rang la rang skyes nas/ gtor ma'i gyur mchod ma dag par gnas so// de lta bu'i gtor
198a3(rnying rgyud): snod na/ nyi 'od dang / zla 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / 'od 'dam gang ba dang / 'bru mar gyi me dang / gtsub shing gi me dang / 'byung ba'i me dang / me thamal pa la sogs pa dang la rang skyes nas/ gtor la'i rgyur mchod la dag par 'bar ro// de
198a4(rnying rgyud): gtor snod na/ tsan dan dang / byang chu la sogs pa thams cad spos rnam pa sna tshogs pa rang la rang skyes nas/ gtor ma'i rgyur mchod ma rag par gnas so// de lta bu'i gtor snod na/ bshos rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rang chud kyi gnas dang / bsod
198a5(rnying rgyud): nams kyi spyod pa dang / lha dang mi'i sbyor ba'i gtor ma'i chu de mchod ma dag par grangs so// de lta bu'i gtor snod na/ lha'i na bza' dang / rgyu las byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang / lha dang mis byas pa la sogs gtor ma'i rgyur mchod ma rag par g.yogs so// de
198a6(rnying rgyud): la rtog ge ba'i thamal pa la sogs pa rnams ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don dka' zhing mi rig nas/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten na ci yang spyi zhes 'dogs so// de ltar 'byung ba yang de nyid kyi don du 'byung ngo // de nas gtor gzhong dang gtor rdzas su sdang ba'i
198a7(rnying rgyud): gnas de na/ spyi mthun gyi las las/ lce 'gro bsam gyis mi khyab na yang / rigs drug gcig tu thugs rje chen po'i gtor mas bzung ma ngag par zhes so 'khod do// de la ni rtog ge rnams kyis sngon gyi bskal pa dang po zhes 'dogs so// de nas yang rdo rje sems
198b1(rnying rgyud): dpa'i lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul gcig gi steng na rdul snyed du sprul nas/ de'i nang na yang thub pa'i skyes bu drug tu spang te/ lha'i rigs su gtogs pa'i gnas na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta bu gcig tu sprul te/ lha'i rigs su gtogs pa bsdus te/ rin po che
198b2(rnying rgyud): gtor gzhod na/ lha'i zhal zas ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa gtor mar bshams nas/ lha ci snyed yod pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed cig spyan drangs nas/ de la mchod pa 'bul ba dang / don bya ba dang / thugs dam bskul zhing sangs rgyas par byed do// mi'i gnas su
198b3(rnying rgyud): sbyong goT ta ma lta bur sbal nas/ mi'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams bsdus nas/ sa gzhi'i gtor gzhong du rin po che dang / sa dang rdo dang shing la sogs pa'i gtor gzhong na/ mi'i zhal zas sna tshogs pa gtor mer bshams nas/ mi ji snyed yod pa'i sangs
198b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas snyan drangs nas/ yang gong ma bzhin du sangs rgyas par byed do// byol song gi gnas na seng ge rab brtan lta bu gcig tu phul nas/ byol song gi rigs su gtogs pa rnams bsdus nas/ sa gzhi'i gtor gzhong du rtsa mchog sna tshogs kyi gtor mar bshams nas
198b5(rnying rgyud): byol song ci snyed pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ yang god ma bzhin du sangs rgyas par byed do// yi dwags kyi gnas nakha' bar lta bur sprul nas/ 'bru/ pa'i gtor gzhong du chags pa sel ba'i gtor mar bshams nas/ yang gong ma bzhin du sangs rgyas phar byed
198b6(rnying rgyud): do// dmyal ba'i gnas su gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po lta bu gcig tu skul nas/ rdo rje kha 'bar ma'i gtor gzhod du/ nyon mongs pa sel po'i gtor mar bshams nas/ dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed spyan drangs nas/ de la mchod pa 'bral
198b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / don bya ba dang / thugs dam bskul zhing sangs rgyas par byed do// de la gang zag ma rtogs pa dang // nang bcud kyi sems can la ci yang byed do zhes rtog go// de tsam na rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs rjes phyi snod kyi 'jig rten gtor gzhong du byung ba ni/ chos
199a1(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings skye ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs so// de las skyes pa de rdzas gtor ma'i rang bzhin ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga chos nyid dag pa'i longs spyod du byin gyis brlabs so// de na gnas pa'i nang bcud rtse
199a2(rnying rgyud): ba sems can rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod pade ba chen po rgyun tshad med par mdzad tsam na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la sogs pa rnams ni/ gang zag phyin ci log tshogs rnams ston pa'i chos sgra sgrogs pa ni tsi ny+tsa
199a3(rnying rgyud): yin cha yang med ces zer to// gtor rgyad chen po las/ rdo rje sems dpas lus gtor mar sprul pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas gang zag sbyin ci log thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir/ gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang
199a4(rnying rgyud): phug rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu gtor gzhong byin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// lag pa thal mo sbyar la snod la gtugs la/ oM rat+na bi kud+d+he kha ha li bi Sh+TAM zhes brjod pas/ phyi ltar gtor gzhod rin po che sna tshogs
199a5(rnying rgyud): las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang / rgya khyod dpag tu med par dmigs la/ nang ltar chos nyid kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i pho brang du lhun gyis grub par demigs la/ gsang ba ldeng yum gyi mkha'i klong rnam pa dag pa'i b+hag yangs pa'i pho brang du dmigs pa
199a6(rnying rgyud): gtor gzhong byin gyis brlabs so// de nas yang gtor ma'i rdzas la bshos rnam pa sna tshogs par byen gyis rlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// lag pa thal mo de nyid las mdzub mo yid tsam bkug la/ oM ke ru shi shwad+d+ho ya~M ri swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/
199a7(rnying rgyud): gyi ltar lha'i zhal zas ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa lhun nam mkha'i gnyis su dmigs la/ nang ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan longs spyod lngar dmigs la/ gsang ba ltar gnyis su med pa'i lha la lha thim par dmigs la zhab zas byin gyis brlabs so// de nas yang
199b1(rnying rgyud): gtor ma'i rdzus 'bru dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa byin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag tu 'di gsungs so// lag pa de nyid thal mo sbar la/ oM b+h+yam pa sa ye s+yAH/ hrI ltar 'bru dang mo tog gis gang chung zas pa dang pags la/ nang su des gang khyab par 'jud
199b2(rnying rgyud): me tog la sogs thogs pa'i lha mos gang zhing khyab par dmigs la/ gsang ba ltar sdug cing mdzes pa'i lha mo rnams po la thim/ pho rnams mo la thim pa gong ma bzhin dmigs pa ni/ 'bru dang me tog sbyin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas btung ba rnamapa
199b3(rnying rgyud): pabyin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// bal mo de nyid las/ gung mo phyir bsgreng ba gtu thebs byas la/ oM A hA da Na sngar rdzas mr-i ta b+ha yA swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ phyi lhar bdud rtsi'i chu rgyan rgya mtsho dang chu bor dmigs la/ nang lding d+hi
199b4(rnying rgyud): mo bsam gyis mi khyab par dmigs la skud pa dang 'brug par dmigs la/ gsang ba ltar lha rnams gnyis su med pa lhag pa'i byang chub sems degyes pa'i ngos bstar ba dmigs la/ btung ba rnams byin rjes brlabs so// de nas gtor ma lha'i dkyil 'khor du phyin ces
199b5(rnying rgyud): rlabs pa 'di gsungs so// lus ngag yid gsum pa'i phyag rgya 'di bcas la/ a k+Sha/ Dita ta Ta da Da d+ha nA naN/ ka khag g+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha/ tsa dza dza dz+nya/ Sha ya ra la/ nga ta ma o// sha Sha sa ha/ i I/ u U/ e I/ gzhan yang rtsa ba'i snying po brjod
199b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ gyi ltar bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched gnas su dag par dmigs pa/ nang ltar bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du dmigs la// gsang ba ltar na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par rol par
199b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs la/ gtor ma lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas gtor ma nyung ngu mang por byen dbab pa dang / chung ngu chen por bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ phag pa rin po che'i snod du byas la/ oM a b+hi s+pha ra Na hi ma~M g+ha g+ha na'aM/ zhes brjod pas/ che ba ri rab mang brtsa
200a1(rnying rgyud): sa jugs na / lag smran du sa/ brgya pa ma na
200a2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa/ myang bas sangs rgyas par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gtor ma bdud rtsi ci ltar 'dod par byin gyis rlangs pa'i sngags dang phyag tu ni/ lag pa de nyid las rin po che 'bar bltar byas la/ oM sa he ha ha na na ya te ye na ny+dza ta/ zhes brjod pas/ bdud rtsi so so'i yid
200a3(rnying rgyud): 'thad par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gtor ma yid lnga 'dod pa de so sor khyab par bar bskur ba'i sngags dang phyag tu ni/ lag pa dbang bskur gyi phyag tu byas la/ oM mA hA shA ra wA ra Na pA dza phU/ zhes brjod pas/ yongs te khyab pas mya ngan 'das par dbang bskur zhing byin gyis ba
200a4(rnying rgyud): so// de nas na ma mkha' sngags dang yig 'grus gang bar dmigs pa ni sngags kyi gter ma 'o// de nas nam mnga' la gang dang phyag rgyas gang bar dmigs pa ni ga nga ga kyi'i tir // don rnam mtha' gis dang can gyis gang bar dmigs pa'i/ gos de rgyad gyi gtor ma'o// de bzhin
200a5(rnying rgyud): pu d+ha dang / me tog dang / bro gang 'du 'gro dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bzang ba dang / btung ba dadu / A la/ ska dang / dzin pa sogs dreng ga zhi kor mgo ma bzhin no// de das rdo rje sems dpas de lta bur gtor ba nyid du sras// nyid kyis dzan
200a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ kun tu 'azang po dang mi gnyis par thadad pa'i nga jugs so// gtor zung chen po pas/ gyi gyis rnabs pa'i sngags phyag ste'i leT te gsum pa'o// nas sems dpa'i thugs
200a7(rnying rgyud): byi rnams des/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad ni// bcig rdo rje sems dpa' dmigs nas/ lus rje rje slob dpon gyis bzung nas/ gtong gzhong la sogs pa 'byor pa che chung gis brdungs shing dbyings dang rgyan modzes par bshams nas/ de'i dang mi'i
200b1(rnying rgyud): spyod na chags pa 'byor pa che chung gis stsal te/ gor ma bzhin rtogs par byas nas/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas gtor mar phul bas/ lus ngo bo sa thob pa sha stag kyang gnas so// phal pa kha cig ni de ltar mi spyod par gsang sngags chog tsam la khungs byung nas
200b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan byed pa'i lang mo tsam la bltas nas gtor ma btang ste/ nges pa med pas tshe chad nas/ phyogs ris gnyis su bcad cing dam tshig las 'gal te mi sun to// des kyang don chos nyid dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rdo rje sems dpar sangs rgyas na yang / tshig gi sangs
200b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas las don gyi sangs rgyas su ma gyur na/ rdo rje sems dpa' de yang shin tu 'gyod pa drag po skyes nas kha bub tu 'gyel to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' brgyal ba bslang ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen
200b4(rnying rgyud): po lus mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas/ 'chi ba med pa'i sku thob pa dang // 'byor pa'i longs spyod thams cad gter mar phul nas// lha'i longs spyod dang 'bral ba med par ldan pa ni/ sangs rgyas zhes mi bya'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa dug gsum la
200b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho la zad pa med pa rgya mtsho tsam zhig yod do// zhe sdang rus la zad pa med pa ri rab tsam zhig yod do// gti mug sha la zad pa med pa ri rab spungs pa tsam zhig yod do// nyon mongs pa srog dang rtsa ba dang / dbugs phyi nang du chub la zad pa med
200b6(rnying rgyud): pa rlung tsam zhig yod de/ 'di dag rang gis rang blo la shes pa/ rang gis dang bsgral nas dus gsum du 'phags pa'i tshogs la yang mchod pa 'bul zhing dugs dam bskang / ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ji snyed yod pa la yang mchod pa dang / 'gro ba yongs la yang bsngo bar bzod pa ni/
200b7(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'gro zhes bka' stsal pa las/ slar rdo rje sems dpa' brgyal ba langs pa las/ phyag g.yas pas 'jam dpal ka ti ri'i shing thag nas/ nyid kyis nyid bsgral te/ 'og pa bshag gis phyes nas/ b+hi Sha ta li hri hUM zhes brjod pas/ khog pa gtor ba
201a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa ma / na/ / gas nga nas /
201a2(rnying rgyud): ngas thag sa sa da pang ba 'ang bad sam tha ma pa tu gzhes byas// den 'dre nga 'ba'i bags 'ang cad mi thu // pa dang
201a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i'i pa brtul pa// dartsegasing pe'i slong bag la shes pangs dpa sug // denas ba blangs pa na nyid sa pa da phyogs brgyang ba pa'o// kengs pa'i bya brtsegapa nis dator bar thu bas/ menyi ma me pa'i bas brgya 'dis //
201a4(rnying rgyud): sha'i phung por thungs gting bang thal bas ma nyis pa'i skal 'byur ba med pa'i slong phyogs brgyang ga la lo// de lta dag dpa bdi rjes man pa dang byung gamo shes rten pa mangs gzod nas sa/ kun n+ya babang pong ba cung dang gnyis pa med pa'i spyod dgrang das 'di na ces
201a5(rnying rgyud): cho nyid bden pa'i chog gis bstod pa phul ba// hU~M chos nyid ma bcos don nyid ma shes pas// Ni star bsgoms pas smus/ rdza nyid du gyur// lha ba kun tu bzang la mthol bshags na// phung po ga tong ma'i mdzod zhes su gsol// sems ted gdod nas dag par ma shes ngas
201a6(rnying rgyud): ci ltar brtsams pas sdug bsngas nyid du byar// srin las kun nu bzang la mthol bshags na// sro dbugs gtor ba'i mchod pe bzhes su gsol// thig la grwa zung med pa ma shes pas// rtsi bskyed pas sdug bsngal nyid du gyur// spong pa kun tu bzang pa mthol bshags na/
201a7(rnying rgyud): rnamags gtong cad pa pazhes sug pal// ngazung la bam par ma shes pa / nga rgyangs pa grub cwa ci dru/ dang chog sung rgya nga ba gro ba gsan// nga ngas 'am mdza ga ga pa/ sog pa pa dadag 'a ma sa
201b1(rnying rgyud): me pher gtor ma ga tubs// dus ni mi ngang gtor ma gtor// khrag ni mi lang a b+ha sbengs// ma hA ra g+ha rdzag sha a mr-i ta k+Sha hi/ zhes brjod pas/ kun tu bzang po'i grong mi gnyis gcag par bzhugs so// de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba tha
201b2(rnying rgyud): dang / gdon mi za bar grub pa la sogs pa yang rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin du 'gyod pa skyes nas de bzhin du gtor ma phul te/ bshags shing bstod nas gzod sangs rgyas te kun tu bzang po skye ba med pa'i klong mi gnyis gcig par bzhugs so// rigs kyi yum rnams kyang de bzhin du
201b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyod pa skyes nas nyid la nyid bsgral nas/ lus phul te mngon sangs rgyas so// bshags shing bstod nas kun tu bzang po skye ba med pa'i klong na mi gnyis gcig par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang / khro bo dang so mo dang / thub pa la sogs pa rnams
201b4(rnying rgyud): kyang / shin tu brgyal nas 'gyod pa skyes nas lus gtor mar phul nas/ nyid la nyid bskal nas/ gzod nyid las mi gzhan pa'i sras su skyes so// de nas sangs rgyas kyang nyid la nyid bsgral nas dug gsum gtor mar phul bas sangs rgyas/ byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams
201b5(rnying rgyud): kyang nyid la nyid bsgral nas dug gsum gtor mar phul tsam na yang gang yang de lta bur bskal zhing bsrub pa med do// de nas sangs rgyas rnams ni ma chags mig yo ma skyes pa'i ngang la bzhugs pa de/ nyid la nyid bskal zhing / nyid kyi lus de nyid gtor ma phul nas sangs rgyas
201b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs mkhyen pa la/ de nas mnga' ba'i tshogs rnams kyis de nyid du rang bsgril ba'i thabs ma shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
201b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad gtod mar sangs rgyas pa'i don thugs su chud nas/ lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas gtor mar mdzad pas sangs rgyas pa la yang ngo mtshar che'o// de yang yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ma gyur nas/ shin tu bsgral
202a1(rnying rgyud): nga tu nga pa cho gu gsum gtadang ma par phul bas yang dag pa sangs rgyas thusaste/ debs kya nga ma cadas/ 'dog ta mang ba rtags sang 'phrul ba thabs dam 'tshalam bcomathan la mthags sa mtha
202a2(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas lung bstan du gsol lo// bde bar gsheg pas lung bstan ru gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / rdo rje sems dpas bkang stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'angs cad rang gis dang grol ba'i thabs de ma shes nas/ bskal rje bsnyed du sangs ma byas te/ kun tu bzang
202a3(rnying rgyud): na dungs dag pa de dag rtson// lta zlo tugs rjes pa'i lam// 'bral ba'i lam btsal thob par bya'// lus mams pad ba ba dang tobasan// sa rdzas byang chu phab nga // sems nyid nyag gcin na gas na// bskal ba'i dbyor ma btu shing// 'thal
202a4(rnying rgyud): sa na ga pa med// sa / sa dbang pa gas
202a5(rnying rgyud): sa spyod tu 'thas ngas/ marung nyi 'ams stod// deni gangs brjod bya ba 'das// des par bar dag btor mami ga te// pa'i nga sa rgyas la// rtags pa zung dub dag pasal nas/ chad par
202a6(rnying rgyud): ba gnasas kyid// chogatong pa'i snying por bshad// ces bka'astsal pas/ rgya chen po rnams mthen ga rgyad du/ ma sa pa'i 'a bu gtor mang / 'byor ba dang 'a / slong gtir mer 'bral ba / ba gros zugs
202b1(rnying rgyud): gtad mar 'bral lo// zhes mgrin gcig tu zer nas/ nyid la nyid bskal te gtor ma rdul lo// de nas klu rnams kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas/ nyid la nyid bskul te gtor mar phul mo// de nas gza' skar rnams kyis kyang / nyid la nyid bskal te gtor mar
202b2(rnying rgyud): phul lo// srin po rnams kyis kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas/ nyid la nyid bsgral te gtor mar phul lo// gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas lus srog gtor mar phul lo// ma mo rnams kyis kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas lus srog gtor mar phul lo// mi
202b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis kyang lus srog gtor mar phul lo// byol song rnams kyis kyang lus srog gtor ma phul lo// yi dwags rnams kyis kyang lus srog gtor mar phul lo// dmyal pa rnams kyis kyang lus srog gtor mar phul lo// phyogs myong ba rnams kyis kyang lus
202b4(rnying rgyud): srog gtor mar phul lo// der gzod gtor mas sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med de/ kun tu bzang po bde 'a chen po'i sangs rgyas su mi gnyis gcig par mtha' yas pa'i skye 'gro thams cad gyur to// gtor rgyud chen po las/ rtogs pas bdag bskal ba'i
202b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum 'dra 'bral med pa'i byang chub sems kyi gtor ma 'di zas par gtor ro// chos nyid kyi rgyan yab yum mtshan dang ldan pa'i mkha' klong gi gtor ba zhor du/ byang chub sems kyi mu tig gtor mar spang
202b6(rnying rgyud): dus gsum 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad spyan drangs nas/ dgyes pa chen po'i mchod sprin gtor mar phul bas/ 'phags pa thams cad dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems kyi dngos grub dang / thabs dang shes rab 'du
202b7(rnying rgyud): 'bral med pa'i dbang dam pa thob pa 'di lta ste/ hUM e ma dang byung rol pa'i sku// spros btags mtshan ma'i sprod pa rnams// gnyis med gtor ma'i longs spyod de// yongs la khyab par gsal spros pa'i// lha yi dkyil 'khor thams cad ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig la
203a1(rnying rgyud): che// sangs rgyas byang chub las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu yin pas// thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyis mdzod// ma lus yongs kyi de skod ni// rak+ta dang ni byang chub sems// de tshe gtor mur ltung ba'i tshe// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
203a2(rnying rgyud): tshang bar 'byung // phung po khams dang skye mchod kyang // dbyer med ngo bo nyid mnyam pas// thams cad rgyal ba'i gtor mor bshad// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs 'phro 'du las// zhi bar 'dod na gtum po zhi// rgyas par 'dod na zla nya bzhi ni// dbang ni khams gsung sgol ba
203a3(rnying rgyud): drag pos ma rungs 'joms par byed// thim pa'i lhar ni rab sbyar nas// dbang po'i tshogs la dgyes par rol// oM su Sha ti s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yaM ho// ma hA su kha hUM/ badz+ra pad+ma naN+Da la/ de nas rdo rje sems dpas 'khod rnams la gsang ba'i gtor ma bshad pa/ rnam
203a4(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad la sogs pa gtor ma'i rgyu dang gsang ba bshad pas nyon cig/ de yum gyi chos kyi dbyings te/ gsang ba'i gtor ma thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu'am gnas so// de'i gsang ba'i mkhang ni/ gsang ba'i gtor snod dag pa'i gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin no// gsang
203a5(rnying rgyud): pa rdo rje ni yang rig pa'i ye shes te/ gtor ma de nyid kyi rgya dang / de nyid kyi dbye' dang / snying pa po'i rjes bu dang / mgron yang yin/ byang chub sems kyi badrad rtsi'i chu rgyun mi chad par zhengs par byed pas dngos bu pa thams cad ci rta dang rkyen yang yin/
203a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yang yin pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa 'jo ba'i chags pa chen po/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyis zhes kyang de la bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pho brang ngo // 'di ltar rig nyid rtog par dus na/ skye ga'i las kyi
203a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'khor zhing / sangs rgyas nyid kyi gsang ba'i gtor ma chen po'o// 'di ltar mi rig cing ma rtogs pa'i dus na/ g.yeng ba'i gtor ma bkang nub pas/ s+ye shi 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal gyi las dang / bag chags ngan pa la sogs pa brtas pa'i dbang gis/ gzug
203b1(rnying rgyud): dngos por snang zhing 'khor ba cur gyur par byed do// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gsang ba'i gtor cha 'di las gzhan mi mnga' ste/ dgongs spyod zab mo 'di thugs su chud na/ gsang pa' gtor mdus gsum 'du 'bral med de chos sku gsang ba'i gtor ma'o//
203b2(rnying rgyud): cog changar ro//
203b3(rnying rgyud): de ni rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas/ dus ni ma zhig gi tshe na don ma rtogs pa'i bka' la rtog pa'i sbyor ba sha stag byed de/ theg pa 'og ma'i spyod pa rnams kyis byas shing srur pa 'debs te/ chos gnyis su med pa ma yin te/ bka' ci snyed bshad kyang don ya char song bas so//
203b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin byas pas chud zos pas/ rtsa ba bdud rtsi las gol nas mnar med par lhung ngo // gtor rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ ci mdzad pa'i phrin
203b5(rnying rgyud): las gtor ma'i phrin las mdzad/ ci ltar sangs rgyas pa yang / gtor me'i sgo nas sangs rgyas/ ci ltar snang zhing srid pa yang / gtor ma'i rang bzhin du byung na yang / dper na dmus long la kha dog ci bzhin pa dang 'dra ste/ gang la bstan pa de gang yin
203b6(rnying rgyud): Na med pa dang 'dra bar/ sems can thams cad ci las byung ba rgyu gtor ma las byung / mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad brten pa gtor ma la brten/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ci spyod pa gtor ma la spyod na/ rang rig pa'i rtsal ma shar bas/ ma rig pa'i
203b7(rnying rgyud): klag ni dmus long bzhin 'thibs/ gti mug gi mun pa'i sma ga rum la/ zhe sdang bcas pa'i brag bcer nas/ 'dod chags zhen pa'i bse rtsi dang 'dre bar chags pas/ snar srid gtor ma'i don ma shes pas/ 'gro ba rigs drug tu skyes/ de nyid mchod pa'i chun du ma
203b8(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas/ lam rgyud lngar 'khor te/ 'di lta ste/ oM nr-i su rbi pre du/ snod kyi 'jig rten gtor gzhong la/ rdzas kyi mtshan ma gtor ma la/ bcud kyi 'jig rten gtor ma'i mgro dum rtogs pas/ zhe sdang gi me chen po 'bar ba la/ las kyi drung dmar po'i nus pas/ sdod
204a1(rnying rgyud): na gno pas tug lus thabasas// gas padang / bsam dang drug pa dang / mdan ni gding ba dang / gnas nas dus dang / sheb ngang srasags pas/ tu matan pa sa dga'argyad
204a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu sangs rgyas ni dmyal khams bco brgyad du grol ba 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i dmyal ba dang / chud pa'i dmyal ba dang / nyams pa'i dmyal pa dang / drang pa'i dmyal ba dang / spangs pa'i dmyal ba dang / 'arjod pa'i dmyal ba dang / ma rin pa'i
204a3(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dmyal ba dang / phog pa'i dmyal ba dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dkyi pa dang / dog pa'i dmyal ba dang / swA ba'i dmyal ba dang / rmongs pa'i dmya' ba dang / 'aral pa'i dmyal ba dang / spyod pa'i dmya ba
204a4(rnying rgyud): dang / ded pa'i dmyal ba dang / 'bros pa'i dmyal ba dang / rtag pa'i dmyal ba'o// de rdo rje'i dmyal ba kong zhin/ gtor mngo don mgobs/ ngog rdo ji ji gtas pa/ steng ro rje thobs su tsams tu mi tshangs par 'a zhing / pa
204a5(rnying rgyud): nga ga sum yang mthong pa shes bang bar gangs te/ rgyu med de/ ga nyi rkyen po byung shi / sa gyi sdigs pas reg na rjem bang ponang dang parab sa mi
204a6(rnying rgyud): san pa da/ ba'i gtor ba rtogs pas/ rdzam da la du ba dang byen du rgyangs pa pa ma sogs ga la mi rigs shing dz+wal ba lags pa jis pa'i sa shi tha sdug pas // demachags pa'i
204a7(rnying rgyud): med pa des rig sa thag tu thang bar ngur zhing / spang phongs pa dang rig pa med pa rgyas rig mthags ni/ tshun rgya she babyed pa sbya gas nasapa/ 'byor padang / spangs med pa'i chon gyi gyu sa/ reg ma dag tutshogs pa sa /
204b1(rnying rgyud): bsngal bsgral pa chen po grangs kyis ma spangs par spyod ca gnas par 'gyur ro// de rdzi las byung zhen/ rgya ba'i gtor ba 'don martogs pas/ 'dod pa dang longs spyod la chags pa'i dbang gis rang la phan par 'dod nas bsad pa dang / thog pa dang / bzang ba dang / nga
204b2(rnying rgyud): dang / ci 'dir 'tshal ba dang / dge sdig gi 'bras bu 'grub pa med par thag bcad pas/ rtsol ba'i don gang byed pa la kho zag chad pa'i dbang gis gnas der shin tu sdug bsngal zhing snying rje'o// de la nyams pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ lus sgred pa man chad lcags
204b3(rnying rgyud): sdig pa chen po'i khar bcug nas/ shin tu nyon mongs pa'i zug gzer che ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang ba dang / stod nas khro rgya khol mas thal mar gyur pa'i bar du blugs shing / shin tu sdug bsngal zhing smre sngags nyin mtshan re la yud tsam re 'byin par mi nus shing / shin
204b4(rnying rgyud): mongs par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i gnas na nyon mongs shing sdug bsngal tsho tshad bskyil ba stong phrag brgyad the bzhi stong du spyod cing gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci las zung zhe na/ thams cad gtor ba yin po'i don ma rtogs pas gzhan gyi 'dod pa thal ba dang / skye bo mtshan mar
204b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa bzung ba ni/ sdig par gyur pa'i dpon byas te/ gzhan gtor ma'i longs spyod dang / rkyen dang ris su gtogs pa la phrag dog bza' ba dang / brnab sems yid la 'dzin pa dang / gsang sngags rnal 'byor gyi cha 'dzin na yang / tshig tsam la khungs
204b6(rnying rgyud): nga nas gtor ba'i sdod pa dang phrin las kyi gnas sum bskangs shing srin po'i mtshogs par gyur pa dang / rdul 'byor gyi tshogs su 'dzin pa ni tshogs dang ge tor ba'i ma nyams gling pa 'byor ba dang / gas sngags nam zang nga / !bA tu byed pa dang / da
204b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sngags la yag dang / mtshang tshig 'dogs pa dang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyar zhugs nas ded dpon la sogs pa byas te/ gsang ba'i rgyu mngon du phyung zhing / gzhan thabs dang pol gyis bslu ba dang / spyod slob kyi don gnas su ma stobs
205a1(rnying rgyud): bas/ gsung sugs nasag pan sa shi pa 'das pa na nga ba dang / / pa rtam pa dang / gabs dang ma dang / sa dad byin la sogs pas pa la tha bdan pa lasags pa nga sa sa dang
205a2(rnying rgyud): gnas der skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal snying rje'o// de la skur pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu mi bzad pa'i khang par zhugs nas/ shin tu gtogs shin thod cig pa'i sman par thags shing yud tsam la lus dang yan lag yungs 'bru tsam bsam gyis mi khyab pa gtubs
205a3(rnying rgyud): nas/ de ma thag tu slar 'gyor zhing de ma thag tu gtubs pa dang / lce'i dbang po zhing lha gcig tsam du skyes nas/ lcags kyi glang dang glod pa'i thod gshol gyis shin tu srid zer ba'i sgra thags shing / na ba dang tsha ba'i sra ni 'byin par mi nus/ bar bar du mthun pa tsam 'byin par nus
205a4(rnying rgyud): de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing spyod pa'i tshe tshad ni bskal pa stong phrag bdun khrir srung par gnas par tu gyur ro// de ci las byung zhe na/ thams cad gtor ma yin pa ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis/ gzhan rmed par 'dod pa'i phyir gang zag skye bo'i rigs su skyes pas tan
205a5(rnying rgyud): Na la sogs pa byar byas shing rtsub bcad nas 'phyas pa dang / rna ba sems can yongs la zhi ba la mi 'bab pa'i chog smra zhing / mying mkhan log par 'dogs pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'thad pa yin na yang / gsang sngags pa ya ga dang sgo phur 'debs shing /
205a6(rnying rgyud): thug pa dman pa'i rigasu 'dzin cing / dam tshig gcig pa'i grogs po thabs kyis skud pa'i thabs 'phya zhing skur ba 'debs pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis de lta bu'i gnas su skyes te/ de la shin tu sdug bsngal steng rje'o// de la spangs pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ stag dang dom la
205a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ded nas/ lcags kyi dom dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i sems can rnams kyis bzung nas/ 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs rnon po thogs pa rnams kyis sha dang rus pa phral zhing btog go// zad par phral yang las kyi dbang gis
205b1(rnying rgyud): slar bya'o// des ni bskal pa re re la shin tu gdung ba'i mchi mas ngu zhing mgon sbubs zhes 'bod par byed do// de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing spang ba'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa stong phrag sum khrir gnas shing sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de ci las byung zhe na/ thams cad
205b2(rnying rgyud): gtor ma yin par ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis tshe phyi ma mi shes pas gang zag skye bo'i sa 'dzin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / bden pa'i tshig 'ga' tsam thos na yang mi nyan pa dang / dge ba bcu'i phyogs spangs nas srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba btsus
205b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs khrims phyung nas byed pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin na yang khrims dang / sdom pa dang / dam tshig la sogs pa rnams mnos nas mi bsrung ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya skad cig tsam yang mi bsrung ba dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor spangs nas
205b4(rnying rgyud): yud tsam yang mi blta ba dang / yi dam gyi lha spangs nas ma'i dod kyi yon tan tsam yang mi 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon spangs nas pha'i dod kyi mchod pa tsam yang mi byed pa dang / rdo rje mched lum spangs nas brtse gdung 'dzom phrad mi 'dod pa rnams las kyi dbang gis gnas der
205b5(rnying rgyud): skyes nas de na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing snying rje'o// de la 'gyod pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu sngon las ci byas pa dran pa'i gnas dge sdigaci byas pa'i las don dang las kun rnge'u dang khram du bkram zhing / de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i las byed pa khyod yin no// ces rgyag gzer zhing rdza
205b6(rnying rgyud): nas tho bas brdungs shing mdud rtses brgyabs nas chu bo rab med la brgal bar byed do// chu bo rab med de'i nang du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pas bzod pa'i blag med par gdung nas rings shing drag par phar khar phyin pa dang / sha kun bud nas rus pa khar thon no// thon pa dang de ma thag
205b7(rnying rgyud): tu las kyi dbang gis sha sos par 'gyur ro// sha sos par gyur ma thag tu yang rang gi sngon las ci byas pa'i dbang gis rde'u dang khra ma thog nas/ yang gong ma ltar rgyag gzer zhing mdung gis brgyab pa dang / thobs brdungs nas skad cig tsam yang ma lon par phyir bzlog go// de
206a1(rnying rgyud): nas yang pha rol du lag pa de bzhin du phrag bsngal myangs nas slar lag pa dang gang ma bzhid du byas nas te/ de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing spang ba nga chung ni/ brga pa pa byung phrag ji gnas shing spang bar 'gyur // na ci gyis pa'i rang
206a2(rnying rgyud): gi rnam par smin pa las 'gyur zhe na/ thams cad gtor ma 'dzin ma rtogs pas/ dge ba dang sdig pa'i don ngom shes shing / bdag nyid rtag tu re bas gang rtag skye bo'i ser gyes pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkong par bags pa dang / mnyes pa'i sems can bsad pa dang /
206a3(rnying rgyud): mnyes pa'i sems can brdungs pa dang / mchod pa tshol ba'i phyir mnyes pa'i nor dang longs spyod phul ba dang / mnyes pa'i dug dang gnas nas dbyung ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin na yang / mnyes pa'i phye bo la mju bston
206a4(rnying rgyud): btang ba dang / rang dang 'gal ba sogs lnga mngon spyod phrin las kyi las byed pa dang / grogs po nyes pa med pa'i chos la srung pa / 'debs shing 'phru ba dang / shin tu spang cing dmas pa ba shams pa dang / 'khor dang slong ma yen chang phyogs gcig tu ris sa bzung nas
206a5(rnying rgyud): mtshang tshig smra zhing rtsod pa rnams kyi dbang gis gnas der skyes te/ shin tu sdug bsngal zhing snying 'o// de la ma rig pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu gnag cing mun pa'i gnas na skyes bu'i lag pa brkyang 'phram tsam yang mi mthong ba'i gnas na/ shin tu yang spang zhing
206a6(rnying rgyud): dang yan lag shin tu gas shing / thams cad du 'khrugs pa bzhin du gyur pa nas/ a rbu bya ba'i sgra yang 'dod mi nus par gnas so// de lta bu'i gnas na shin te sdug bsngal ba'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa stong phrag sbyong du gnas shing srung bar 'gyur ro// do na
206a7(rnying rgyud): las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung zhe na/ thams cad gtor mar snang ba 'din martogs las/ gzhan gyi nyes pa nis so bya ma'i sar rjes par/ sems can gsod pa'i las rgya tshe tshad ma dang / mdang dang / ral ze dang / spu wi dang / ngag swA / gzhan
206b1(rnying rgyud): de'i thabs dang / mang dag gzhan la byad du bcug pa dang / spyad pa dang de bskul ba dang / rang la phan pa med pa'i khar nyes pa bsgo ba dang / gtan yang rang gis ci 'grub pa byed cing / rang gis ma 'grub na yang gzhan la slob cing sdig 'a'i las cha sna tshogs pa
206b2(rnying rgyud): bshams pa la sogs pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos la spyod pa yin na yang khe dang grags pa rtsol ba dang / tshul 'thos pa dang / chos log par spyod de/ yang dag pa'i bka' bas log pa'i chos spyod pa la rjes su yi rang ba 'bul ba dang / chos 'dod pa rnamase la log pa
206b3(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba dang / dam nyams pa'i 'byung po la srung ba'i chog byed pa dang / theg pa chen po la dpyar 'dog pa dang / bka' yang dag pa'i don mi nyan pa dang / dpe rkun dang 'og brus byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gnyen po'i don bor nas bsnyen sngags la dga' ba la sogs pa'i
206b4(rnying rgyud): las kyi dbang gis gnas der skyes nas/ de la snying rje zhing sdug bsngal bar gnas so// de la nyon mongs pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu tsha ba'i zangs khang chen po'i nang du bcug nas/ phyi nas bskal pa'i me 'bar bas bsregs shing / shin tu a tsha chishes bya ba'i sgra
206b5(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab par 'don par byed do// de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa stong phrag lnga brgyar gnas shing spang bar 'gyur ro// de ci ltar spad pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang las byung zhe na/ rtsa ba'i gtor ma 'di'i don ma rtogs pas/
206b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs kyi dbang gis rlom shes pas/ so so skye bor skyes pa na/ zhe sdang gis sems can kha mar bsad pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sha khrag za ba dang / gti mug dang khams ngo ma shes pa dang / phrag dog dang khams gzhan phreng bar bya ba dang / nga rgyal gyis gzhan du
206b7(rnying rgyud): gnod du 'jug pas nyon mongs dang kham la sogs pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos spyod pa yin na yang / dug lnga dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sngags la khungs phyung nas bstan kyang chos nyid don dang ma mthun par gol te/ 'dod chags ma dag pas chog shes pa'i dus med
207a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gti mug ma dag pas don gyi steng du mi phebs pa dang / zhe sdang ma dag pas d+ha tra rang rgyud byed pa dang / dargyal ma dag pas gzhan la khengs pa dang / phrag dog ma dag pas gzhan sprad pa rnams las kyi dbang gis gnas der skyes rngas/ de na rtag
207a2(rnying rgyud): bsngal zhing snying rje bar gnas so// de la log pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu grang zhing 'khyags pa la lto sgyur ba'i gnas su shin tu a chu zhes 'bod cing lus ut+pal ltar gas par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing tshe tshad ni bska pa stong phrag sum pa mi gnas
207a3(rnying rgyud): shing sbyang bar 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang bskyed pa las byung zhe na/ rtsa ba'i gtor ma'i don ma rtogs pas/ 'phral gyi ldog 'gyur gyi don spyad pas/ so so skye bo'i ser skyes pa ni/ g.yo dang rgyu dang zol dang thog dang yang dag pa dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang / de la
207a4(rnying rgyud): rjes su yi rang ba mi skye bar gang dag sdig pa'i las mthong na/ de la sems 'phang gye ba dang / yang dag pa'i bka' bas byin ci log bstan pa la dga' ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' la mi nyan pa la sogs pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos spyod te yin na yang / dang po nyan thos kyi
207a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa la zhugs nas/ khas blangs nas log pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / sngags kyi dam tshig mnos nas bsrung bar ma bcas te/ khas blangs pa las log ste skya bo las dman par spyod pa dang / yang dag par gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa la zhugs
207a6(rnying rgyud): nas/ de la log nas mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la zhugs te sngags la smod pa dang / theg pa 'og ma pa'i chas bzung nas/ gong ma la smad pa rnams las kyi dbang gis der skyes nas/ de na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing snying rje bar gnas so// de la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dmyal ba gang
207a7(rnying rgyud): zhe na/ rab tu grang ba'i gling chab rom chen por 'dug pa'i gnas na/ gdung ba'i smre sngags kyis a chu zhes 'bod cing / lus ut+pa la ltar rab tu yang gas te 'dobs tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong na ci marung zhes bos nas/ de nas yang yun cung zad tsam yang ma lon par
207b1(rnying rgyud): dmyas par zangs dkar chen par byan te/ tsha ba'amachen bskur te rab tu yang thos par btsos nas/ yang ma tshacha zhes gdung ba'i sde sngags bos nas/ de bzhin dulas kyi dbang gas par 'khang tshungal par byed par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngam bu
207b2(rnying rgyud): tshad ni/ bskal ba stong phrag brgyar gnas shing spang bar 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang spyad pa las 'byung rde/ rgyu ba'i gtor ma 'dro'i don sgro la ma shar bas/ g.yel bas kyi gyonakyis so so su ba'i ser skyes nas/ dgrangs su 'dzin pa dang /
207b3(rnying rgyud): mnar sems drung dang ldan par byed pa dang / gnyen dang spun du bzung ba dang / de la phyogs dang gal du slob pa dang / ma~M mthun pa'i phyogs la dge ba slong du mi ster ba dang / mthun pa'i grogs la legs pa'i lam las 'gog pa la sogs pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i
207b4(rnying rgyud): chos spyod pa yin na yang / phyi gzung ba'i yul med pa la/ gzung ba'i skal du brkyang ba'i rtags s+ho/ phyogs ris su srid cing gzhan gyi chos la smad pa dang / nang 'dzin pa'i sems med pal 'dzin pa'i sems su bzung ba'i rtags su/ tra bAka' ltar yin pa
207b5(rnying rgyud): las gzhan gyis lter min no// zhes bdud kyi tshig tu smra ba dang / de ltar gzung 'dzin gnyis su 'dzin pa'i dbang gis/ srin po mngon kul pa'i dra ba'i snod pa byed pa rnams/ lus kyi dbang gis der skyes nas/ den thug pa rjel zhing snying rje ba gnas so//
207b6(rnying rgyud): del jog pa'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ rdo rje'i brag gis gtams pa'i nang du myos nas/ lus ni rab tu 'phel zhing ste/ rdo rje'i bug sa yangs po'i steng med pa'i gnas su sle ba dang / de las yang thar nas rdo rje'i brag gnyis kyi bar du lus cha char btang na
207b7(rnying rgyud): zag bye ba dang slar langs nas/ yar char kyis btang ba'i gnas na skye bar 'gyur ro// de na shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcur gnas shing spang bar 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang spyad pa las byung zhen
208a1(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i gtor ma ma'ablangs pas/ 'phral byam rig pas paslabs nas/ sos su ba'i sar skyes pa na/ sems can la brdungs shing rab tu bcog pa dang / dud 'gro la mi theg par cher 'grel zhing bstan pa dang /
208a2(rnying rgyud): gnas phyung zhing phrog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku spang pa la sogs pa dang / gang zag dam pa zhig gi chos la spyod pa yin na yang / lta ba zab mo la dpyas 'dogs shing / rtog pa'i chos la dga' ba dang / dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid sngon du mthong nas/
208a3(rnying rgyud): 'phya zhing skur ba la sogs pa rnams las kyi dbang gis gnas der skyes nas/ de na sdug bsngal zhing snying rje bar gnas so// de la phra ba'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu gdung ba'i gnas na/ bdag gi yid du 'ong ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang rjod
208a4(rnying rgyud): par 'dod pa dang / zhags pa gang tsam gyis pad chod par byas nas/ bzhin gcig la gcig mthong nas 'phrod par bsams pa na/ lus zhe sdang gi sbrul nag chen po res sgo nga'i srubs zhugs pa bzhin 'khris nas/ sbrul gyi gdug pas lus
208a5(rnying rgyud): zhing sdug bsngal nas/ gdung ba'i mchi mas du zhing rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal ba srong phrag bdun bur gnas shing snang bar 'gyur ro// de lus kyi rnam par srid pa'i
208a6(rnying rgyud): gang stong pa las byung zhe na/ rdza ba'i gtor ma'i don ma rtag sde pas/ 'dod chags la zhen pa'i so ma'i spyi bo'i ser skyes pa na/ sems can rnams la 'dod chags rang ga mar spyod pa dang / gzhan gyis srung ba'i bud med la sogs par
208a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sems can skyes pa'i chu byas nas/ dus ma yin par bsad pa la sogs pa rnams dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos spyod pa yin ni yang / rjes khrims dang gnas khrims nyams pa dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dadang
208b1(rnying rgyud): tsam byas nas skye bzhin spyad pa dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zab mo rnams skye bos mthong zhing spyad slar gyur pa rnams/ las kyi dbang gi gnas der skyes nas/ de na shin tu sdug bsngal zhing snying rje bar gnas pa// de la rmongs pa'i dmyal ba
208b2(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na/ shin tu dmyal ba mi bzod pa'i gnas na/ mgo mjug tu thig brgyad btab nas/ gtong bar brgyad du dris te las kyi dbang gis de ma thag tu 'byar zhing yang 'dra'o// de lta bu'i gnas na shin tu nyon mongs pa'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa
208b3(rnying rgyud): stong phrag drug cur gnas shing sbyang bar 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang spyad pa las byung zhe na/ rtsa ba'i gtor ma ma zos pas/ 'phrul gyi nyon mongs pa'i las kyis bsgrib ste/ gang drug so so'i skye bor skyes pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal ni nye zer
208b4(rnying rgyud): tsam yang mi mthong ba dang / chos nyid bden pa'i don tshig 'bru gcig tsam yang ma thos pa dang / ngan pa'i las rnams blun po byol song bzhin du bgyis pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos la gnas pa zhig yin na yang / chos nyid yid la mi 'jog pa dang / 'dod/
208b5(rnying rgyud): pas g.yeng ba dang / 'du 'dzi dang bus pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / longs spyod dang le lo'i khar 'dor ba dang / gzhan la skur pa chen po btab pa dang / sems can sgrol ba'i las la bab tshol du byed pa dang / dkyil gyi rtog pa tshol phyir mo dang bu 'debs pa rnam
208b6(rnying rgyud): las kyi dbang gis/ gnas der skyes nas de na shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i gnas so// de la 'khyal ba'i dmyal ba gang zhe na/ shin tu dus ma yin pa'i gnas na/ res 'tshed pa dang / res dukhyags pa la lto sbyor ba dang / res 'ga' spu gris mgo gshogs pa'i
208b7(rnying rgyud): gnas na shin tu nyon mongs pa'i tshe tshad ni/ bskal pa stong phrag lnga bcur gnas shing spyang par 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang spad pa las byung zhe na/ rtsa ba'i gtor ma'i don blo la ma shar bas/ gang zag bye bo'i las byed pa'i tshe sod dang / tshod dang
209a1(rnying rgyud): gtags shig pa'i cho ga khyal pa ska ba dang / gzhan ba skangasra pa'i dag tan nas/ bas bcang 'drung ba la sogs pa'i las byas pa dang / gung zag chos spong ba'i lam la gnas pa yin+dan yang / gsang ba bkang ba'am dza/
209a2(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa sdang dgul dbang ma thob par 'chal bar sla ba dang / tan pANA gyi phrin las gnas la ma byang shing mA nag yongs kyis smad par byas pa rnams las kyi dbang gis gnas der skyes nas/ shin tu sdug bsngal zhing snying rje bar gnas so// de la spong pa'i dkyi
209a3(rnying rgyud): bla gang zhe na/ shin tu gleng pa'i dmyal bar 'khrugs pa la lto 'bar ba'i gnas na/ lus pad+ma dang pa'i chen po lta rags te/ shin tu sdugu bsngal dang tshe tshod ni/ bskal pa stong zag sum d+ha gnas shing sbyar bar 'byung // de las kyi rnam par smin pa coM las b+hang
209a4(rnying rgyud): na/ rtsa ba'i gtor mi'i don thog tu maphebs pas/ gang zag spyi bo'i las byed na la/ dus gsum lam spangs nas ma rungs pa bsten pa dang / dge ba blangs mi dge babasnyen pa dang / gang theg chos spod pa zhig yin na yang / theg pa chen ze'i chos
209a5(rnying rgyud): shing / theg pa 'og ma'i chos spong ba dang / lus dang man ngag la ta pyas 'dogs shing / snyan dag dang sdeb myor dang // glu dbyangs slob pa la dga' ba'i las kyis gnas der sres nas/ de na sdug bsngal zhing snying rje bar gnas so// de la ded pa'i dmyal
209a6(rnying rgyud): dgang zhen/ lcags bI shal ma ril yang 'dzegs tsa/ rje/ gnyen 'dun dang bze bas du skad kyis 'bo pa la sogs pas shin tu nyon mongs pa'i tshe tshadang ni/ bskal po stong phyag nyi shur gnas shing spang bar 'gyur / de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang spang
209a7(rnying rgyud): pa las byung zhe na/ rtsa ba'i gtor ma ma thos pas/ gang zag skye bo'i las byed pa na/ ri rags la sogs pa sems can mang po 'did cing gsod pa dang / gang zag dam pa'i chos byed pa na yang / lus rab tu byung ba'i lus su bsgyur nas/ sems can mang
209b1(rnying rgyud): rnam mthug par byas pa nas 'dungs pa/ thugapa dang bu da ga sang pa dang / nam dang / spya dang / thabs dang / bslab pa pags nan/ byung byed pa paganas dang // gnas /
209b2(rnying rgyud): hrIn dugasod la dga' ba'i gsun/ gshin rje ga shin chen po sa mgonas brgya nas/ zhi pa dang zhe dang dang pa dang gsum du brngub nas/ bas ni thos pa dang / ni ma thag tu lus cing tu gams pa la sogs pa yang ni yang pos kyis sngag la
209b3(rnying rgyud): da ni/ bzhal pa stong phrag brdo lngar gnas shing snang par 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang spyad pa lus d+ha rde na/ rtsa ba'i gto ma ma thos pas/ bris pas zung bar rabs/ bu breg skye bor zhes pan/ gtsug lag ldang dang mchod rte kyai dko baju
209b4(rnying rgyud): nam zlos pa dang / gad nag chos kyi rjes su 'azangs pa yid na yang / rje'i glegase pa ma 'i nus nas zos pa rnaMm sa/ las byed bang gis gnas de/ sa nas/ shin tu sdig pasngal zhing snying rje bar dgrangs mAM// de la rtag pa'i dkyil ba gang zhen/
