209b5(rnying rgyud): khro ba'i gnas na/ lus la lcags kyi se rlabs brdungs pa dang / mtshon ci'i char pa sras byung ma ba bas byung dang babs nas/ mus lamacha'i sprin rnamam khyim byin no// ji lta bu'i sdug pa sa 'i/ bskal po stong phrag gsum druganas shing
209b6(rnying rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro// de las kyi rnam par smin pa gang sbed pa lus byung zhen/ gang zag skye bor skyes pa'i rje/ zas drang nongs tug tu regs/ chags shing ba rnam pa'i las byas pa dang / gzhan gyi nor rung gis 'arjod pa'i phyir moni drang bral ba la sogs pa dang /
209b7(rnying rgyud): gang ga chos kyi rjes su 'grangs pa yin yang / de mthu che ba yin no// nga ni rtsal zing yin no// zhes me 'i gi 'don cher byed cing / bdag tan pa dang gnas par 'dzin pa rnams/ las kyi dbang gis gnas deng skyes nas/ shin tu ga
210a1(rnying rgyud): la 'o ba gsu// snru ba ngas pang dmyal ba bang bstan sa da ga/ rnab / tang ma mdod 'angam nya pas/ bdag nyid tu rgyan grangs bsam casu ma khyab par myal ba 'bum ldan
210a2(rnying rgyud): skyed 'khod par yod do// gtor rgyud chen po las/ gto ma don ma thos shing matogs na/ sems can dmyal po leT hU~M gas// de nas yang thams cad gton ma yin pa'i don ma shes na/ gang zag skye ma
210a3(rnying rgyud): na/ gto ma ma shes rdzas su bzung bas/ 'khrul pa'i dbang gis chags pa dang / 'jungs pa dang / brkam pa la sogs pa'i las spang ba dang / gang zag rjes kyi phyogs su 'brangs pa yang / snying rje rdung ba dang / ser sde che ba dang /
210a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan la yod par mi dga' ba dang / gzhan gyis yon tan lobs par mi dga' ba dang / gzhan la 'khor rgyas 'degs par mi dga' ba rnams/ las kyi dbang gis sems can ye dwags kyi gnas su skyes te/ phyi'i sgrib pa can dang / nang gi sgrib
210a5(rnying rgyud): pa can dang / sleb pa can gyi sgrib pa can la sogs pa'i gnas su/ bskal pa stong phrag brgyar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar nga thar de// de yang rnams cad gtor ma yin pa'i do rje mngon par ma shes pas/ thung zag sde bong skyes pa na/ zas thabs
210a6(rnying rgyud): cad gtor ma'i rdzas ma yin pa re/ so sngo ga ti mug gis rang rang gi 'tshal mar mthong / gtor ma'i lha thams cad sems can rang gzugs so sor mthong ba dang / gang zag chos kyi rjes su 'brangs pa yin na yung / gtor me'i d+had 'dis rtogs par spyad pa'i thag
210a7(rnying rgyud): ci gtor ma dang / gtor ma'i drung 'di mi 'dzin pa dang / chung 'di mi mnyan pa dang / rgyung 'di'i ming tsam yang cha med pa rnams/ grol so skyes te/ zas ngan pa sna tshogs pa za ba dang / las ngan pa sna tshogs pabyed pa dang / bsad pa dang / spong pa dang
210b1(rnying rgyud): bsha' ba dang / gzhur ba dang / sdud pa dang / bkol ba dang / brdung ba dang / bda' ba la sogs pa shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i gnas na/ bskal pa lnga brgyar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang thams cad gtor mar gnas pa'i don ma
210b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs nas/ gang zag skye bo'i sar skyes pa na/ yul dang gnas la phyogs ris su 'dzin pa dang / rdzas dang g.yog 'khor la phyogs dang ris su 'dzin pa/ gang zag chos spyod pa na yang / chos la phyogs ris su 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don mkhyed pa
210b3(rnying rgyud): la phrag dog tu 'dzin pa rnams lha ma yin gyi gnas su skyes nas/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de nas yang gtor ma'i rdzas dang gtor ma'i snod dang / gtor ma'i lha ngo ma shes pas gzhan du bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog pa ni/ lha zhes bya ba'i ris pa
210b4(rnying rgyud): bzung ste 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// des na gnas kyang gter ma la gnas/ snod kyang gtor ma la spyod/ yin yang gtor ma'i lha yin pa'i don ma thos pa dang / ma rig pa dang mi gnas nas rdzas la spyad du mongs pa ni/ bkres
210b5(rnying rgyud): shing skom pa'i gnas su la dang / gyen mi 'dzeg pa dang mthur mi pheb pa dang // gtor ma'i don ma rig pas/ 'on pa dang / rig pa dang / gtor ma'i gnas ma 'byongs pas/ na ba dang / mo ba dang / gtor ma'i 'bras bu ma shes pas/ rgas pa dang /
210b6(rnying rgyud): rgud pa dang / gtor ma'i chos nyid ma shes pas/ skye ba dang / 'chi ba dang / gtor ma'i sgrib pa ma dag pas/ nad du mdze dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu la sogs pa nang sna tshogs myong nas/ bskal pa re rer sdug bsngal ba sna tshogs spyod pa'i rgyur 'gyur
210b7(rnying rgyud): gtor rgyang chen po las/ gtor ma'i rang bzhin ma shes pas/ 'gro ba sems can so sor skye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhi thams cad gtong ma'i snod yin par ma shes pas/ la las shal ma ri dang / zangs kyi khang pa dang /
211a1(rnying rgyud): ca 'gyung la sogs pa dang / dpal da sprod par bgang ngo // khalas dag ngag dang / da la sogs pa mi dwags kyi gnas sa mamang // lalas / yin par dmags so// palas rgyang dung na du
211a2(rnying rgyud): dang / gyen dang mthung dang / des rtog la sogs pa'i gnas su mthong ngo // la las brgal zhing pas dpe'i gnas su mthong ngo // la las yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dang / bsod dmapa mye rgyang gri gnas su 'dug par mthang // gtor mi ma
211a3(rnying rgyud): gyi longs spyod ngom shes pas/ wa las 'deb/ la lAs sdug bsngal du mthong ngo // ma las sman pa las drug tu mdzod ngo // lA khas zas la las snyan du 'thong ngo // gtod ma'i lha ngo ma shes pas/ la la'i gshed mala' lang gogs mthong
211a4(rnying rgyud): la la'i dgral la las gnyen du byed pa dang / la laji nanyan pa la las dgrar byed pa dang / l-i la'i sbyin pa la las legs par byed pa dang / la la'i skyon ma drangs pa la pa las 'bras bur bsgrub pa la sogs pa/ gnas dang yongs
211a5(rnying rgyud): spyod dang / 'bras bu mi shes par don gnyis ldog par grol ba dang / mAd nyid yon tan yin par mi rtogs pas log pa'i las kyis snang ngo // gtonan+ta de chen po las/ 'bras bu log pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
211a6(rnying rgyud): nas/ kha lo phyin ci logs su blta ba las/ 'dzin byed kyi zhags kyis kyang me'i rje nas/ go la nga'i lam du shor dang / thugs rje 'i k+Shagi su ng+yas kyang dze / gti mug gi mun pA la ye shes kyi sdang bas kyang ma gsal/ de sdang gi
211a7(rnying rgyud): chen la/ rdzu 'phrul gzing gis kyang mchod/ 'dod chags pasol/ thugs rje nyams kyang mahA/ rgyal gyi ko 'ongs la/ zhi ba'i ti la mar gyis kyang mthul/ phrag dag ni dung dag 'thubasam la/ mamra slob da pa'i
211b1(rnying rgyud): gas pang 'ji
211b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'bas nas/ shang cag la tA// na ldog 'ja la'o// she tan mongs su// shan tu gtong pa'i bkang rab pA rASh+ThahA// dalta bu'i gnas na/ rdzas 'ag pa dang / zos byas/ 'ab 'a du dang / mas nyid slob pa dang /
211b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras 'a log pa dang / lam phog pa sha k+tag mang bar 'gyur ro// gtor chud chen po lngas/ nyon mongs pa mthu brtas kyi ng+ge sna dbu pa'o// / de nas de rje sems dpas phyug pos brgyan pa ni nang khams nas/ ma shaM sa?
211b4(rnying rgyud): sa gzigs te/ ngan song gi rgyar gyur te la las ni mgrang gi sdug bsngal/ spod pA gcig mya dad pa las/ yid dang dbang pos bsdus pa thams cad/ chos nyid brtan pa ni rdzas su gol/ gtor ba'i rigs thams cad 'jigs pa'i lam
211b5(rnying rgyud): gtor ma'i sdod bams cad ngan song gi rgyur gyur te/ la la ni tsha mang ki b+hag bsngal gyi dbyen sngon zhing rtsa ste sdug bsngal bar gzigs sa// la la bkris shing sgom par gzigs so// pa la sud cing bkol te sdug bsngal ba gzugs so// la la
211b6(rnying rgyud): gsum dang brgyad kyis sdug bsngal bar gzigs so// la la 'thab pa dang rtsod pas sdug bsngal bar gnas par gzigs so// la la 'chi ba dang 'pho ba dang ltung ba'i sdug bsngal bar gzigs so// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
211b7(rnying rgyud): 'di dag na/ gtor ma'i las bor nas rtog pa'i las kyis/ la la ni snying rje bral te gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa dang / la la ni gcig gis gcig snying rje dang bral te ded pa dang / la la ni snying rje dang bral te gcig gis gcig gsod pa dang / la la snying rje dang thal te gteg gi gcig
211b8(rnying rgyud): ba dang / la la gti mug rmongs pa'i dbang du byas nas/ yang dag pa'i sgo 'gog shing / log pa'i lam du khrid pa dang / la la 'dod chags zhen pa'i dbang du byas nas/ sems can bsad pa'i sha za zhing lag 'thung ba dang / la lang rgyal rdzogs pa'i dbang gis/
212a1(rnying rgyud): snga srin po chen po'i lus blangs pa dang / mgo gcig la lus mang por sprul nas 'khor ma mdang mkha' 'gro dang / shu zal sogs pas bskor nas rab tu dregs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' la kya bye/ phyogs nas dmyal ba na mo
212a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / snang snang ni sprol/ rnyed rnyed ni za/ phrad phrad ni sbyor zhing nga'i gong na su yang med do zhes 'du shes skye bar byed pa rnams gzigs pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu spangs shing shinate yang nga rgyal te 'gyel to// nga la mgon med do// nga la skyabs med do// ngal dpung gnyen med do zhes dam
212a3(rnying rgyud): du bor ma ba rdul lo// de ltar ba tu las pa dang rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang stug pos brgyan pa mangs so// rdo rje sems dpa' brgyal spangs pa dang / rigs sde'i sanas rgyas rnams drung nang 'od pa mamyong nas/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams la stong gA sam kyi stong chen
212a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad gtor ma'i snod dang / gtor ma'i rdzas dang / gtor ma'i lha yi chen log par go ba mthong ngam zhes bka' stsal pas/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' chen po// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di dag po'i gtor mas 'dul ba'i
212a5(rnying rgyud): dus la babs so zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' gtor ma la kha lo phyin ci log tu snang ba rnams la/ thugs rab tu khros sku rab tu 'tshigs nas/ kun tu bzang po he ru kA la sogs pa ye shes kyi he ru ka bzhi chos kyi sku las bzhengs su gsol/ stong gsum gyi stong
212a6(rnying rgyud): chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su gzigs pa las/ thams cad gnyid ma'i rang bzhin du lhun gyis grub te bzhugs pa la/ de la gtor mar mi rtog mi 'dzin par phyin ci log tu rtog cing 'dzin pas/ rigs gcig pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gtor ma las/ 'gro ba mang po sdug bsngal
212a7(rnying rgyud): thadrad par snang ba gzigs nas/ ye shes kyi he drug rnams su rab tu khros/ thugs rab tu tshogs nas/ dbu dgu pa dang / dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang / dbu gsum pa dang / phyag drug pa dang / phyag bco bcung ba dang / phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa dang / zhabs bzhi pa dang /
212b1(rnying rgyud): gabs brkyang pa dang / 'ab ba sngasngags sumapar nas zhal nas kyang/ a ngal ru Ta/ b+ha gas la \u0f7f/ rag 'i dra/ dus dusan/ be sha shA drug dus durban+ta/ zhesas byad cing gnasas// su sems dpas ldan dza sa
212b2(rnying rgyud): yum gyi mkha' las phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs bltas nas/ hUM trAM zhes brda' zhig mdzad pas/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yab yum sris dang bcas pa thams cad yum gyi mkha' la gnas gcig tu tshogs nas/ skyor gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su gzigs pa
212b3(rnying rgyud): dang / yang gong ma ltar gzigs pas/ khro zhing 'tshogs par gyur pas stug pos brgyan pa'i zhing lams su bde bar gshegs pa thams cad gdan ngo ngo ma bka' bgros nas/ zhi ba dang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thul ba mi 'dra bas/ drag po'i las kyis 'dul ba'i dus la ba pa
212b4(rnying rgyud): par gzigs nas/ ri rab rtser dpal rta mgrin sol btang ste/ dpal rta mgrin gyis sa blangs len gyis bltas pas/ phyin ci log gi mthu brtas pa/ la la nyon mongs pa'i// nas ma kha 'o phyin ci log gi dbang 'gyis/ la la dregs pa chen po'i gzugs dang cha byad du stsal na
212b5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum gyi dbang gis sha khrag za zhing / nyon mongs pa'i las zhe sdang dag pos r+ya tra nyid du gyur nas/ lus che la yan lag rags pa'i 'phros kyang / sha za dang / mkha' 'gro dang / ma mo dang / dbang phyug mas bskod nas/ shin tu gdul dka' bar gzigs
212b6(rnying rgyud): slar log pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis b+h+rUM zhes bco brgyad kyi 'gyur bzhengs nas/ rigs lnga la sogs pa yab yum gnas bsgyur/ he ru ka yab yum bco brgyad du bsgyur nas// stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad he ru ka yang yum gyis lhag gis khengs nas/ gtar
212b7(rnying rgyud): tshan rtse sgur la reg pa bzhin du rlu dang rdegs pa can thams cad reg pa tsam gyis bskal nas/ bdung ba yug ci gtor gzhod du/ l+r-id 'ab da'i gtor ma gcal 'bram nas/ rmo ngas pazang par mdzod pa'i lha thams cad gnyis su med pa'i/ chos nyid kyi longs
213a1(rnying rgyud): kyad bdu 'aman pa'i dang du mdzan/ sun nam/ sdod dul duchag sa nang pa da pa byed/ raga'i dud khrag 'khrug cing dmam/ gzhams na byasangs spong la las shal rol/ la lus sa pas/
213a2(rnying rgyud): pa las phyag la rol/ la las tsata la dzam/ l-i las bas la na la/ l-i las dbang po la chod/ chos nyid kyin mdubyas/ nas bdu 'artags su khyer/ la las zhing gi gdan dpa' rtags su byer/ la las ning gi ga yangasan/
213a3(rnying rgyud): pa las thod pa'i phreng ba/ la pas khrag gi thig le/ la las zhag ga zi ris/ pa las thal ba'i mtshan ma rtags su khyer ro// la las nyon mongs pa'i phrag na rang la bskor te/ ngal gri dang / dgra sta dang / zang ga shol dang // baT+wAM ga la sogs pa
213a4(rnying rgyud): dbang rtags su khyer ro// la las nyon mongs pa las rtul ba dpa' nags su khyer te/ klung gi gshog pa dang / sbal gyi chung po drang / glang po che'i ko brlon pa dang / steg gi sham thabs la sogs pa dpa' rtags su khyer nas// mes gsuma'i rjen
213a5(rnying rgyud): pos btab/ dmyal ba dong lpags nas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor byin dbab pas/ nyon mongs pa rang chung ngu dag/ dug bdud rtsir bsgyur/ ru thardzas kyi gtor mar longs spyod pas/ de ni bdud bcom bgegs bsad pa'i gtor ma'o// gtor nang
213a6(rnying rgyud): bo las/ bdud rAng btul ba'i lde'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas 'bras thub skal kyangs sor mcho/ rnga ti bzhal gyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal mchod / nyon mongs pa'i skye bo dang / sngags log par spyod pa rang chung ngu na
213a7(rnying rgyud): pas/ da ni khro mos 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/ 'khor nye ba'i sras brkyad gi rmi gro mo brgyad du sul/ sems ma brgyad ni phra men chen mo brgyang du bsgyung / thub pa drug dang yid dong chos ni sgor byed chen mo brgyad du ba ltar/
213b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' bcu drug dang / 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' ba cudag ni/ mkha' 'gro sum cun gnyis su bsgyur/ sgo ba rang log tu bzlar nas drasal 'khor dang yod pa dang / cho 'phrul rje pas rla dzang ba dang / chos bstan pa dang / na
213b2(rnying rgyud): bus mi 'dul ba yang drag po'i phrin las mdzad nas/ rigs nges pa'i sras dang thabs sdig pa gnyis su med pa'i de rnams kyang / gtor ma'i rang bzhin du bskur zhing phrin las mdzad do// de nas kha lo phyin ci log tu bltas pas 'phags pa'i
213b3(rnying rgyud): nyi zer tsam yang mi mthong ba/ bsod nams kyi skal ba chung ba rnams la/ thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor lha chen po dang / gyi chen po dang / gazla' chen po dang / gnod rtsin chen po dang / d+ha skar la sogs pa dang / dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
213b4(rnying rgyud): surabacu drug cu dang / gang chen brjo brgyad dang / ma bdun sring bzhim skul nas/ de yang las ngan pa'i 'gagacod myong / gtor ma'i phrin las mdzangad // de bas gang dmachog nyams par gyur ba rnams la ni/ yang smram chen po sa kha
213b5(rnying rgyud): ma la nas/ 'jig rten gyi lam sethams cad du/ nga/ srin sadang / dang / rigs dang / mdza / g.yul dang / gangs chud pa la khod nas/ das pa khyod na sbyin pas skye 'bul bar mdzin kyi/ lus nga pa 'i dpa
213b6(rnying rgyud): gis dregs par mdzad do// gtor rgyad chen po las/ drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas/ 'thung ba lnga dang snong thams cad gtor ma'i sdod/ dngos po thams cad gtor ma'i rdzas/ rnam
213b7(rnying rgyud): pir shes pa dang / phreng pos bslus pa thams cad gtor ma'i mthon/ drug gsum ngongo nyon mongs pa thams cad gtor ma'i rtsib/ badred dang hUM dang rdzogs pa thams ca de gtor ba'i hUM/ srung drug la mechis bsdus pa thams da ma rmongs sto/
214a1(rnying rgyud): kha mo lhan ci log gi ngan song ga sdug bsngal thams cad gtor ma'i phrin las/ de nyid gtor mang rtog pa thams cad dngos grub sa/ 'di ltar dag pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'di ltar rtogs pa rnal 'gyor pa/ sa tha
214a2(rnying rgyud): kyis 'byung ba dang / 'di lta bu'i chud mthar gnas pas de'i don mkhyen pas gtor rgyud 'di lta bu 'byung ba yin pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs chab phog par 'gyur ro// gtor rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje sems dpas thugs chab phog pa'i le'u
214a3(rnying rgyud): bcug nyes pa'o// / de nas yang kun nub nga pom na med pa'i n+yaik+ta'i zhams/ gsung lag 'bru'ang dag byung ngo // // ts+tsha ts+tshin+d+ra hrI dz+dzaH/ ha ha ha he ha ha hA/ hats+tshaH te/
214a4(rnying rgyud): paT pathas pa naman pan \u0f7f/ phaT na pa / da / la po la bzung // dang ngo sam hrIHdrug na/ mamam bdun/ mi mam 'dum
214a5(rnying rgyud): ha.a ha bcu drug/ ru lu ru lu byo la sogs pa skra las thon nas/ ye shaMsaM lngar byin gyis brlabs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/ che ma chem rab tu chem par gyur nas/ thams cad mgrin
214a6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bde ba'i tshogs mnos/ dam bcas nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bting ngo // de nas gsung yig 'bru'i dkyil 'khor la/ ye shes chen po'i khyad par nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor dang / thugs rje sprul
214a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor la sogs pa thams cad ma skyes pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du mthong bas/ ji ltar sdang ba thams cad tshig gis ma bslus pa gang yang med pa la/ tshig thams cad yi ges ma bsdus pa gang yang med pas/ 'o na yi ge'i rang bzhin ni/
214b1(rnying rgyud): ma rgyas pa gang yang med pas/ ji ltar sdang ba'i chos thams cad sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med pas/ kun gzhi yul gyi rnam pa la snang ngo // gzugs dang phung pos bsdus pa thams cad kha dag dang dbyibs su mi snang ba gang yang med la/ kha dog
214b2(rnying rgyud): dang dbyibs thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor du sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med pas/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po thams cad sangs ma nus pa gang yang med par dbang po sems kyi rnam pa la snang ngo // de ltar yul dang dbang po thams cad dbyings dang ye
214b3(rnying rgyud): shes gnyis su med pa las/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par lhun gyis thub ste/ sgrag srung thugs phyag tu'i 'khor du ldan rjes byab ste/ sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med do// gtor kyang chen po las/ gsung yig 'bru'i le'u ste
214b4(rnying rgyud): bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas kun tu bzang po la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ drug po'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
214b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' drag po'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yid la zung zhig/ lag pa sor mo bsnol la mdzub mo mthe bong la gtugs// mthe bong gnyis spyir bsgrengs la/ oM badz+ra pad+ma b+han+da la/ pa lid ta bi shwa tsakran+d+haM/ zhes brjod pa
214b6(rnying rgyud): 'di ni gtor ma'i snod byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas yang lag pa khu tshur bcangs la/ mche ba'i phyag rgya bcas la/ oM ma hA smrig tA dz+wa la pa li tA maN+Da la khA hi/ zhes brjod pa nI/ sha'i gtor mar gyen gyis rlabs
214b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags dang phyage d+ha'o// de nas yang lag pa zab mo sbar ba las/ rak+ta srengs pa'i tshul byas la gtor ma la gdugs pa/ ma hA ra b+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la khe ra ShA ti/ ba ling ti zhes pa khrag gi gtor marje tshogs par byin gyis rlabs pa'i sngags dang
215a1(rnying rgyud): danas yang nan su nga sa / sa ba nas pa gas gyu ma// dngas yang pag pa tha
215a2(rnying rgyud): ga da gzugs/ de sa kyang gang gi phyag ce bcas pa lus bzod/ de nas lag pa ri mo cing byang bzhi du zas la gtu ma'i rdzas li gtugs la/ oM ga pa la zhes da la tshung khrod de/ las rba 'aM/ babi ta ma hA/
215a3(rnying rgyud): ni/ rmadang byung bu'i gto mar byu gyis brtangs pa'i gas cag tu // de nas gtong ba'i rkang pag pa'i mthe bong gis/ mthen zang lhag bti la rdib can / song migasu me ga shibs kyi ba tha~Mngs pa/ shag tu ma du ma
215a4(rnying rgyud): snrel khung ga tsus dus sa mdzu bzhi pa 'i rna pa sa zhes bang bas/ tor ba gzugs nyi
215a5(rnying rgyud): mo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su med pa'i 'di ba chen por byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas yang phag pa gzugs kyi me mong 'dzin pa dang / skra'i po'i zlog pa dang / dri'i spos kyi phyag rgya dang / rabasdod kyi phyag rgyang
215a6(rnying rgyud): rig gi na bza'i phyag rgya dang / chos kyi matamra pa'i phyog na drung / ti ti la sogs pa rjod pa / gtor ma 'dzod pa'i yongs thong chen gyis bcwa'os pa'i phyag ro// de nas pag pa g.yas pa su klag pa'i rgyal du rdza la/
215a7(rnying rgyud): tsun pa'i tshul du na sa na ngangs pa'i pas sa bas sa kyi nga / gas pasang 'ad mtshul dus ba/ yum rnams
215b1(rnying rgyud): g.yan pas 'dzin pa ltar byas la/ g.yas pas za ba ltar byas pa na/ khro mo brkyang bya sgo'i phyag kya'o// da nas lag pa g.yon pas gtan pastar byas la/ g.yas pas rnam pa'i rdul gyis dud+ha thugs su bltab ni bya mon sbyar
215b2(rnying rgyud): phyag Na'o// de nas lag pa g.yas 'thor thabs su byas pa la/ g.yon pas 'degs pa ltar byas nas bstan pa'i tshul du gnas pa nA~M/ rno pa pani spyi'i phrag na'o// de nas lag pa g.yas pas gnon po lhur byas la/ g.yon pa 'dags pa
215b3(rnying rgyud): pAr byas pa ni/ thor byed ma bzang rtsi'i phrag bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yas pa dang rtags kyi phyag d+ha 'phyar bstir byas la/ glu yon pa khrag 'jung pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad spyi'i phyag lnga'o// de nas lag pa ga yon
215b4(rnying rgyud): bsnol la kha sgrub la/ mthe'u chung gnyis 'khyud la sor mo phyi ma brkyang la snod la gtugs la/ oM badz+ra A ra l+li/ e A ral+li/ sa ma ya A ra l+li/ zhes brjod pa ni/ mkha' 'gro sum curtsa gnyis kyi rtsag pa'o// de nas lag pa gnyis
215b5(rnying rgyud): ga grayas g.yon du bzung la/ mchod zhing rgyug pa'i tshul du byas la/ oM badz+ra ha la ha la b+ha na b+ha na aM ku shra dzaHzhes brjod pa ni/ pho nya sum brgya drug cu k+ti'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas phag pA g.yas pa me g.yo ba'i tshul dri byas la/ g.yon
215b6(rnying rgyud): pa snyed 'byin pa'i tshul du byas la/ oM mu ma~M badz+ra ma b+h+yo/ ma mdun ting b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pa ni/ ma mo lci'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas lag pa g.yon pa phyar la/ sor mo gzhan bkug srin lag bsgrengs pa/ oM ti pa A ga dang do la
215b7(rnying rgyud): namagyo/ zhes brjod pa ni/ sring bzhi spyi'i ljags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas lag pa g.yon pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa'ang ma dpal thogs pa'i tshul du byas/ oM badz+ra karta ri sha trUM/ zhes brjod pa ni/ ging 'a
216a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gtor kyang chen po las/ gtor ma gyin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i latha stabacu bzhi pa'o// / gnas kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ rdzasems
216a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' gtor rgyad chen po 'di/ phrin las dAr zhing rgyas pa la sogs pa 'gro ba la rgyas par ston cig ces bka' stsal to// dbang bskur nas gsang sngags kyi lung ston par khas len pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' phrin las kyi gtor ma 'di dam
216a3(rnying rgyud): par phye ste bshad pa'o// de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na/ kha dog rnam pa lnga zhig yod do// gzugs lnga zhig yod do// sku rnam pa lnga zhig yod do// ye shes lnga zhig shar // de la kha dog dkar por snang ba thams cad zhi
216a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i gtor ma'o// de bzhin du kha dog ser por snang ba rgyas pa'o// kha dog dmar po dbang / kha dog mthing ga drag po// kha dog ljang gu las kun grub pa'i phrin las so// gzugs zlum po zhi ba'i gzugs so// gru bzhi rgyas pa'o// zla gam dbang /
216a5(rnying rgyud): zung gsum drag po'o// dbyibs tha dad pa las kun grub pa'i gzugs so// de bas na sdong bcud gtor ma'i rang bzhin du gcig kyang / las tha dad pa'i dbang gis/ gtor ma lngar snang ngo // brgyar yang snang ngo // stong du yang sprul to// de bas na de bzhin
216a6(rnying rgyud): gtor ma de rtogs na/ gang ltar 'dod pa de bzhin snang // las thabs dbang gis 'chos par zad// phrin las sna tshogs gtor ma yin// de bzhin gtor ma ma rtogs nas// 'di las de bzhin de mi 'byung // gcig tu yang gnas shing bstan par dka'//
216a7(rnying rgyud): rtogs ldan gyis grub pa la// zhi ba'i blo yis gsal bar phye// ci ltar brtags pa de bzhin snang // gang zhig gzhan la phan par byed pa la// 'bar ba'i gtum po ma rungs kyang // zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar byed// 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thams cad kun/ rgyas
216b1(rnying rgyud): nas zad// khams gsumam mam napa can// dab nga dang gyub/ batham mas 'das snang sathas tha pa gyud// gas thabyas mas na da da
216b2(rnying rgyud): nga/ gta zung bye pa las/ da pas rnam badzini 'i / dngas shA man+dan pa 'don byur 'du y-in par bya / sa
216b3(rnying rgyud): 'ad/ 'dres bu la tshogs pas 'degs pan/ tong ma 'ang rgyas pa'i byes zu / bzang 'ad 'ar di pan namam ba ga byer babyos na/ gtung sems 'ang sa
216b4(rnying rgyud): ra sa parnabs da / sem sa dang / mis ni nga ra/ ga ni nga po nga rnas pa zhi nas kyi gas pa pa sa/ da sa
216b5(rnying rgyud): byed cing / log par 'dred par byed nan pa'i gtir ma 'di snar gas nas dran pa ci pa'adi tu nga tu phyir na/ thamam khyen pa / dang mdzang byeng byangs dang / 'byor ba ri mgrang
216b6(rnying rgyud): ma su pa'i skyeg pa pa thaM pa mi sa ba byung na 'ang kyi 'dil 'du yang ma sa gyi dang/
216b7(rnying rgyud): so dun gyung ba gas pathams cing 'bang ba 'drang ba'i 'ang 'i ces pa / kyis rnam par byed pa nga su ci 'gro
217a1(rnying rgyud): mo mkha' 'gro la sogs pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na yang / rtsa ba rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma 'di/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la dgyes par phul ba dang / zungs su bzung zhing phrin las bcol na/ ci ltar dbang
217a2(rnying rgyud): bya bar 'dod pa thams cad bran snying nye ba bzhin du las byed pa dang / thams cad la ci dga' bar dbang bsrung par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor pa gang la la zhig ma rungs pas 'tshe ba dang bstan pa 'jig pa dang / yongs la gnod pa dang / dam nyam
217a3(rnying rgyud): nga / skud dgrar gyur pa yod na yang / rtsa ba drad du byung ba'i gtor ma 'di rtogs par byas la bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la gtor ma'i don gyis mchod pa 'di'i gzhung las byung ba bzhin mchod cing phul na/
217a4(rnying rgyud): gang bsgral ba lta ci smos kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrol bar 'gyur ro// tha na yang rtsa ba'i gtor ma 'di zungs su bzung nas gang la dmigs pa'i yul phyogs sam khang pa'i gnas sam/ grong ngam lus la gtor na yang 'chi bar 'a
217a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang las sna tshogs pa ste/ tshe bsring ba dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / gdon bkar ba dang / gter stsal ba dang / yid la ci 'dod pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klod du mi zad pa'i gter sras na/
217a6(rnying rgyud): zad pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gter du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi langs so// gtor chud chen po la/ phrin las gang bya ba'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
217a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpas/ lha ma srin dang 'jig rten gyi bsod nams las grub pa rnams la/ 'di lta bu'i sgra ma brjed par gsungs so// nor pas mtshan mar bzung ba ni// 'byor pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// chags pas bzung nas gang spyang
217b1(rnying rgyud): 'drod 'bod pa myong bar 'gyur// ci phyir zhon gtor ma yin// de la chags na gtor ma 'ching nur 'gyur// ma chags grol na tshogs gnyis rdzogs// sangs rgyas mchod pa'i can yin pas// ma chags sems kyis mchod byed cing // chag
217b2(rnying rgyud): pa med pas rkyen du phul// de tshe sangs rgyas thag mi rnying // chu rnams thams cad rgya mtshor ba bas// de phyir nA mtsho nyid kyi ngang // bdag gi longs spyod gtor ma ste// de bzhin gtor ma nyid kyi rgyu// dper na 'jig rten po tog bzhin// snga ma
217b3(rnying rgyud): srin pas mi chog ste// phyis kyang rgyan mar sbyin pa bzhin// de bzhin chags pa med gtor na// chu 'bras rim gyis de ltar sbyin// de minan pa/ 'gro zhes bshad// de skad bya ba'i sgra 'jig rten bsod nams las thub pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis thos pa
217b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi lha ma srin la sogs pa rnams kyis rang rang gi 'byor pa ci yod pa gtor mar phul nas/ 'bras su mi 'khor ba'i smon lam 'debs pa 'di lta ste/ lha'i rgyal po bsod nams las grub pa rnams/ gzugs sdug pa'i longs spyod
217b5(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin sgra snyan pa dang / dri zhim po dang / ro bro ba dang / reg bya khyad par du 'jam pa'i sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ dang po yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phul pa gtor ma
217b6(rnying rgyud): legs te/ bdag cag lha'i rgyal po rnams kyis ngo mtshar bas/ bdag cag rnams tor ma'i longs spyod dang rkyen du 'bul bas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan lam du/ chos nyid ma skyes pa'i gtor ma/ sangs
217b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis ci ltar longs spyod pa de bzhin du 'byung bar gyur cig/ de ltar phul ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad khams gsum du mi 'khor zhing / ngan song gsum du mi gol bar/ chos
218a1(rnying rgyud): ting gtang ma sangs rgyas par shA na// dus mnags can/ bdag ca byu tshul pa dgas pa na kyi gas dang/ nangang rgya slong dayang / 'das dngadra du dpa'ang da rlabasas
218a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad gtor mar phul zhing sa ng+yas rgyas par ston lam 'debs par gyur cig/ gal zhi de bzhin bdag cag gi rigs dang / smad rnams kyis ma 'gyis na/ bdag cag 'dud dud dnge 'dra bar 'gyur nas/ klu bas rgol bas ngan sang gi sdug bathang
218a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad nas/ bdag cag gi gtso bo dpal chen pos mngon sum du nyingad zung ste bkal nas/ ngur khrod chen po'i gan pa las khyeng dang / thugs rje chen po'i rdzas su spong / bdag cag 'khor dang ri/ rnam pa kyang / rang dbang med pa nga bang du bsdus nas/
218a4(rnying rgyud): nam min pa'i gang 'a dudus thams cad du 'dings par thar ci// marjes mi mi to// chen ponams kyi nying yadu mchog sheg cig cing ci/ dmapa mnas spyod lapa'ade bsas// dge ba'i byi rnapas kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan gyigs
218a5(rnying rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams pa sogs pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis/ lha'i longs spyod 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / me tig rnam pa sna tshogs par / rol mo'i tshul sags pa dang / lha'i longs
218a6(rnying rgyud): b+h+r-id+hi rnam pa snga chags ma thogs te/ kun kyang mtshon ga cig tu 'di skad ces zer te// ci ltar sdang ba lha'i langs spang rnam pa sa rdzogs pa/ de lta bdag cag longs spyod 'di dag thams cad/ me dang po ma/ thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das rdo
218a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gtor ma lags pas/ sngar de bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyis ma 'tshal ba mthol zhing bshags so// de lta bu'i don gyis bdag cag gi slong ba 'di dag phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa rnams la/ gtor ma'i rkyen du 'gyur /
218b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad la yongs su khyab par gyur cig/ de'i mthu dang byin rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams gtor ma'i rang bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyi rigs dang chud kyang de bzhin du gtor
218b2(rnying rgyud): mar gtong zhing / smon lam 'debs par gyur cig/ gal te bdag cag rnams kyis rigs dang rgyud kyis de ltar ma bgyis nas dam las log na lcags kyi pha bong 'gril ba bzhin du dam log ste/ gnas 'phos nas gsod pa la mi 'dzem pa dang / thabs
218b3(rnying rgyud): kyis bslu ba la 'jom pa'i gnas su skyes nas/ de las kyang ngan song gsum du skye bar gyur cig/ ces dam bca' zhing smon lam 'debs so// de lta bu'i byin rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su khyab cing snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha ma yin/
218b4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis kyang / go cha dang mtshon cha dang sman dang / skye 'khrungs la sogs pa gtor mar phul nas gong ma de bzhin du smon lam 'debs shing dam bca'o// de nas yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / 'bru'i
218b5(rnying rgyud): chad dang bcos pa'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang la sogs pa chang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa gtor ma'i rgyan du phul nas/ gong ma bzhin du dam bca' zhing smon lam 'debs so// de nas yang srin po rnams kyis kyang /
218b6(rnying rgyud): sha dang khrag dang rkang dang / tshil bu la sogs pa gtor mar phul zhing dam bcas shing smon la ma 'debs so// de nas yang gru rnams kyis kyang / snying po rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang thud la sogs pa gtor ma'i rgyan du phul
218b7(rnying rgyud): nas dam bca' zhing smon lam 'debs so// de nas yang dri za rnams kyis kyang / spos dang dri rnam pa sna tshogs pa gtor ma'i rkyen du phul nas dam bca' zhing smon lam 'debs so// de nas yang gshin rje rnams kyis kyang / 'bru mar dang thod khrag pa
219a1(rnying rgyud): sogs pa rnams/ gtor ma'i rkyen du phul nas dam bca' zhing smon lam 'debs so// de bzhin du mi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang / rgal phreng rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa gtor ma'i rkyen du phul nas gong ma bzhin na/
219a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du ma mo rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / rig sngags grub pa rnams dang / bgegs kyi rigs rnams dang / lto 'phye dang / mi 'am ci dang / 'gro ba rigs so so tha dad pa rnams kyis kyang / rang rang gi 'byor pa dang longs spyod ci yong po gto
219a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i rdzas su phul nas/ dam bca' zhing sngon lam 'debs so// thams cad gtor ma'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas par byed do// de lta bu'i don gyis thams cad gtor ma la gnas shing / gtor ba'i rang bzhin du longs spyod par gyur to// de nas yang
219a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang sngags rnal 'byor la gnas pas/ mthar phyin pa gsang ba'i gtor ma 'di dag gar spyod pa de nyid dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la/ bgro ba bgyis shing bran bzhin nyan pa
219a5(rnying rgyud): drang / bstan pa bsrung zhing de la bslab par byos// srid pa gcig gi tshul mi 'thung gang yang med// 'jig rten 'di yi dam la mi gnas gang yang med// gang zhig bka' bzhin mi byed dmyal mi gnas na// khyed rnams gsod cing dga' les pa byos//
219a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' stsal pas/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa dang lha ma srin rnams kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes dal 'byor gnyis dam mnos nas phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa dam la gnas pa rnams kyi stongs grogs byed par 'gyur la/ dam la mi gnas pa rnams
219a7(rnying rgyud): kyi bdud du bab par 'gyur ro// gtor chud chen po las/ rnal 'byor pas longs spyod gtor mar phul ba dang / smon lam 'debs nas dam bcas pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
219b1(rnying rgyud): bas/ shin na 'da' dka' ba nyid mchog ga le'u 'di gsungs so// sems dpa' chen po dam chog nos thams kyang pa jog par 'thob te/ byar byen/ dper nas dran pa bye 'khyang sa med par byed pa dang 'dra bras/ dra tshig pa
219b2(rnying rgyud): la sangs rgyas dang / chos kyi dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i zhu // de yang dam tshig rtsa ba gang zhe na/ rngorje slob dpon dang / mched dang lha ma thal lo// de la rdo rje slob dpon ni/ bdag nyid la nu dag dmas dge 'chedang de nyid du mazad kyis/ ga
219b3(rnying rgyud): la shes pa can dang / bsgoms shing dam la gnas pa mtha' dag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thugs ye shes kyi dgongs stong gcig tu lhan ner+ya gnas pa'o// mched dang lham dral yang bdag nyid dang 'dres shing gcig pade gcig bur ma bud kyis/
219b4(rnying rgyud): bka' dang dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi don spyod pa mtha' dag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang sngags mnyam pa chen po'i don la gcig cing dasde bsring med pa'o// de dag la dman sems dang 'phya sems dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / bkra'
219b5(rnying rgyud): bsre zhing 'gal bar byed pa lta ci smos kyis/ bre mos blun po yang smra bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// da ma de nub cing dmyal gnas na/ gzhan gyi 'badra col rtsi ma byas kyang / da lta nyid nas sangs rgyas pa la gdon mi za'o// gal te dam de ma
219b6(rnying rgyud): thu na/ rtsol bsgrub kyi bsgom ri rab tsam byas kyang mnar med par slob la gdon mi za'o// sems dpa' chen po de ni dus nam zhig gi tshen/ spu'i dam tshig de dag mi bsrung bar rtsol bgrub dang rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs dag rtsod par byed cing /
219b7(rnying rgyud): gcig gi 'og tu gcig mi chung bar rtsod pa sha stag 'byung ste/ de ni byas pa chud zos shing ngal ba tshi chad par 'gyur ro// dper na srog pa rtsa dang snying rtsa nad kyis gang ba la/ ngatsho byed kyi sman pa mkhas pas kyang mi 'chos pa dang 'dra'o// des ni sdug bsngal/
220a1(rnying rgyud): bad/ nasan kyang bdag pa du / rnams pan ga sa na / / dgag
220a2(rnying rgyud): lus gyis sum srong sngags dang byug tu ldan par 'thur pa/ ngal pas dang blangs nas btsor zas pasu ldan par 'gyur la/ bra na yang dras dang brangs mang cung tsam du yang ldan par bya'o// dam de lasu ma 'da' bar dang ba sa/ bkang
220a3(rnying rgyud): rnaMs/ gang yin pa'i rtog gcig bas pa rang gis phrag sung grags kyi dngos gru bathob par 'byur do// gal ting mde la mi gnas na/ bkang kyi dang ga don mthang dag sa don 'chang na pang / skyobo bal pa dang mtshungasaso// sems dang byed
220a4(rnying rgyud): gang ga cig 'dul pa su dang pagasu / rje dgas nga rjid sa tsu pa dasas / smra/

220a6(rnying rgyud): mimyog pa dang zhig rtsub pas sbyin myang pa yidan/ deci phyi rin/ sa nyi 'angs susangs rgyas ma gyis pagang mim// gas kying bco gdags pa'i mi dgapa rnam ma thob / de gas thugs pa 'thong gyi//
220a7(rnying rgyud): gang ming song rje ba ba ma deng tshal tshol du sprod med pa la mi smra ba dang / gsang sngags kyi spong ba ma rdzas bdud phyir gyur pa rabs/ rang bzhin gyis spyad legs par byas te/ 'khru' brig dang srang byung drim song bar zla ba dang / gsang
220b1(rnying rgyud): rnabs byung sbal dang / byamag la sogs pa rgas
220b2(rnying rgyud): na
220b3(rnying rgyud): dalta tu dang / sro po zhes pa sogs pa rnams kyi nga
