238a6(rnying rgyud): par ston pa'i phyir/ bzhugs thabs dang sder 'khyod nas/ dad pa dang mchod gnas kyi rten du gnas so// de nas lnga brgya drug pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po bco brgyad byung nas/ rgyal khams bco brgyad du gsang sngags 'bra
238a7(rnying rgyud): bu'i chos dar bar 'gyur ro// de nas bod kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpas dad pa dang thugs dam du bcas nas/ bod kyi rgyal khams su gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos dang ning rgyas par 'gyur ro// de tsam na thub bzob zeng sangs rgyas pa
238b1(rnying rgyud): shAl khams mtha' dag tu 'byung bar 'ar// sngar thub pa zab pa dang / dus thub pa bab pa rnams kyis/ g.yang de dang gangs srud kyi chags pa can thams cad dpal btags nas na tang ma sbyir te/ gsangasags rnas tha' dz+ha
238b2(rnying rgyud): sma pa'i srang ma khas 'ams so// rgya khams par tu yang bde ba la nyes pa shas ces yang ni 'byu // de nas thab bdun pa'i tham la/ cha dang bod lags drugs rjong pa nga tam 'brang dang
238b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos dang mu stegs la sogs pa sun phyung ste/ gtan sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rgol ba'i skabs med par 'gyur ro// gsung sngags 'bras bu'i chos las thang lung dang man ngag gi phyogs thams cad kyang zas shing 'phel bar byed /
238b4(rnying rgyud): de la grub pa thob pa dang / mthu byin dang ldan par zangs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la gnyis su yang gyur pa med do// nA ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad chos ted 'dus mthas kyi gtor ma las/ gzhan gang du yang 'gyur ba med do//
238b5(rnying rgyud): gtor rgyad chen po las/ bstan pa dang nub kyi le'u ste so lnga pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas 'di spyad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gtor mar 'dus la/ gtor ma'i rang bzhin ma ga yos
238b6(rnying rgyud): pa las/ de ltar snang 'gyur las/ snang zhing 'gyur tsam na/ gtor ma'i chos nyid las ma g.yos pa lags na// gtor ma'i chos nyi tshe'i bstan pa yul gang du 'byung / dang ba dang / nub pa dang / legs nyes mchis ma mchis/
238b7(rnying rgyud): bde'ang gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtor ma'i rang bzhin du ci ltar snang ba thams cad 'gyur ba med pa las/ logs sa bstan pa dka' ba ste/ bshad cing bstan pa med dam
239a1(rnying rgyud): dper na nam mkha' la 'gyur ba meng pa la/ gzang skar dang chos grangs dang mo zla dang dbyar dgun du dkye zhing bgrang ba dang 'dra ste/ chos nyid ni dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pa yin la/ chos can ci ltar yang grangs dang
239a2(rnying rgyud): rtags su snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'i dbyings yin la/ de las chos kyi sgo yang bsam gyis mi khyab par snang yang / thar pa chen po'i gnas su gcig cing dbye ba med pas chos thams cad 'bras bur 'dus so//
239a3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i chos kyang gtong mar 'dus so// de lta bas na thams cad du/ gtor ma'i rang bzhin du gnas pa las/ 'khrul pa tsam gyis mtshan mar sdang ba ni/ gtor ma log par bol ba ni/ dus dang bskal pa dang bgrang ba sha stag 'byung
239a4(rnying rgyud): ba 'di lta ste/ dang po gtor ma'i rtsal chags pa'i bskal pa dang / srid par 'dogs pa mas chags pa bzhi dang ldan pas gcig go// de nas gtor ma'i mgron gol ba las/ khams gsum du srid de gnyis so// de nas gtor ma'i rdzas
239a5(rnying rgyud): ba las/ gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang tha dadabang snang ba ni/ bzhi dang 'bru gnyis so// de nas gtor ma'i ma tha grol ba las/ rtse 'gro dang sngo go pa baM las snod kyi 'jig rten/ dzas grol ba las kyi shing dang rags tshul la sogs par gzung /
239a6(rnying rgyud): pa la/ khams gsum srid gsum zhes 'dogs so// de ltar ston pa'i gtong ma'i tan du 'di gang yin pa ni kun tu bzang po la/ gang las spros la kun tu bzang mo las spros pa 'di/ dang po rgya gar yul du dang bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyang sing
239a7(rnying rgyud): la'i yul du dang bar 'gyur ba la/ lo sde brkyang gnas so// de nas lo nyis brgyan tenub par 'gyur ro// de nas lo sum brgya ma/ u rgyan yul du dar bar 'gyur ro// de nas lo nga rgyal/ rgya gar dang / u rgyan dang / sing ga la
239b1(rnying rgyud): dang / za nyid yul 'ang / bru sha'i yul dang / li la sogs pa'i rgyal khams drug tu grags par 'gyur te/ spu lus maber bar phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gyi gnas su sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// denas po lnga brgyan gtang ma 'chos
239b2(rnying rgyud): nub nas/ rgya'i chos dang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lo brgya la rig pa can la sogs pa rnams kyis/ gsang sngags 'bras bus chos dang / gtor rgyud rnams sngon ci dpe rnying pa las dang bar 'gyur nas// des kyang grub pa thob cing yid
239b3(rnying rgyud): ches pa'i rtags dang ldan nas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan pa mang po yang sangs rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas lo lnga brgya la bod kyi rgyal khams su dang bar 'gyur ro// de nas dam la gnas shing tshul du shis pa grangs kyis sangs
239b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas shing 'chod par 'gyur ba yang mang ngo // dam la mi gnas shing ris 'dzin pa phung ba yang grangs kyis mang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bod phrag dag la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang / log pa'i lcags su yang ris
239b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rgyu 'bras gnyis su ris 'dzin/ 'bras bu'i chos kyang bzang ngan gnyis su ris 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// de nas lo lnga brgya la chu'i chos dang ba mang bar spyod/ 'bras bu'i chos ni nub par spyod pa nyung shas can gnas nas/
239b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi bka' bas gang zag gis bslad la mang bar yod de/ mi tshig meng bar dang bas/ byin dang 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags gtor ma 'di dag sdod pa nyung shas tsam zhig las/ brgya
239b7(rnying rgyud): bang gyur nas/ de nas chos thams cad nub par gyung nas/ bskal pa ris phra mo bdun tsam gyi nyes pa las/ skye bas thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig gis rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa bstan nas/ de kyis ring gi
240a1(rnying rgyud): tu dus kyang phyir zhing bzang ste/ sa thob pa dang / grub pa thob pa mang bar 'byung zhing // de la dar nub kyang mi 'byung bar chu 'bras kyi chos gang la dad pa res kyis lo stong phrag gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas thams
240a2(rnying rgyud): cad gtor gzhor yang chos nyid du bsdus te srid pa zhig no// gtor ma'i rdzas skye 'khrungs kyang skye ba med par gsol te dengs so// gtor mgro na yang rig pa gcig gi dkyil 'khor du 'dus te 'phros so// de yang gtor ma'i rang bzhin la ma rig ma
240a3(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa la skye ba'i cho 'phrul gong ma ltar snang ngo // yang dag pa'i chos nyid gtor ma 'di rig cing rtags na// de gang du yang grub cing bstan pa med la/ ldan gyis grub pa gtor ma rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes su gnas so// gtor chung chen po
240a4(rnying rgyud): sa/ gtong ya'i skye sajug pa'o// / de nas rdo rjemams dpas thams cad btsur pa'i rang bzhin pa/ 'brel bas tshogs 'dzin du mdzang ba'i/ steng rje pa'i sems byas nas/ 'bo'i phyir zal
240a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbyings su 'bul ba'i gtor ma 'di skad ces gsungs so// hU~M ma rig 'khrul pa'i rdzas su snang ba la// 'dzin chags byis pa'i spyod pas so sor snang // bag chags brtas pa'i dbang gis bcings pa rnams// 'bar byed
240a6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i klong du gshegs su gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog he ru la/ rgyad drug las kyis bsdus pa'i gtor mar 'bul// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub don mdzad nas// mi ldog don gyi mchod pa bzhes su
240a7(rnying rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen bud+d+ha he ru la/ log rtog gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i gtor ma 'bul// mtshan ma rdzas kyi dngos po zhe mdzad nas// mi dmigs don gyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// bcom ldan dpa
240b1(rnying rgyud): cha 'dushas// rnamags gsacas padasam sad pa du byu tu 'du rgyan nam dang / brtan du byam dzadapa nas sud cang // kyang ldad pa macan drag drug/ ba rdzagra gti ba da
240b2(rnying rgyud): gtor ma 'phrul// cir srung ben pa'i mtshan ma nas kyang // mi sring don gyi mchod pa nis sunam me// bcom ldan dpa' rkyen brjen dral// zung ci da rjes pa sa ta pe zu/ 'dod rjeb sbyinan par mdzad can pa
240b3(rnying rgyud): das// mi 'drar dang byi bachad pa bzhes sre gsal// bajom ldan dang 'dru ga she pa// 'byed pa tig pasgris pa ga ma gyung/ na mi ma dang/ bcas nga dadu do/
240b4(rnying rgyud): dpal che / 'dzin ma/ 'am zhi 'dzunas me den mer byed pa zhes sreg song // ldan dang mtshan pa /
240b5(rnying rgyud): yod gnyis kyis bsdus pa ga tor ma 'bral// nywa sA'i gas las kyi mtshan ma ni mdzad nas// g.yo mngongon gyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// ngaH mI lda de pa le nas kyi ga la// phyi rlung gsang bas skyes bu gtang ba 'jab// byung
240b6(rnying rgyud): khas kyi mtshad ma ni mdzad nas// 'brur med don gyi mchod pa nas srag som// khams gsum yum mi ga t+ta ti dbye rnams la// 'drung spyod bzhi'i 'dres pa'i gtor ma jal// yod me dang ngam po'i mtshan ma'i mdzad nas//
240b7(rnying rgyud): kor la sogs ngo ma cad dmapa pa// dab zhes de' sum pa gtang ma 'jal// mdzong thos thogs nges mtshon ma 'i mdzad nas// skye 'gag med pa'i mchod
241a1(rnying rgyud): sar+b+ba la sogs phra man brgyad rnams la// du zad gnas brgyad bsdus pa'i gtor ma 'bral// rtsa nang du mthad mtshan mazhi mdzad nas// smos pa med pa'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// rnam rgyal la sogs rdza ba
241a2(rnying rgyud): bcu rnams la// bza' btung bgo bas bsdus pa'i gtor ma 'bul// chags sems las kyi mtshan mni mdzad nas// spang med dron gyi mchod pa 'azhes su gsol// snyems ma la sogs khro ma bcu rnams la// srid dag pas bskul ba'i
241a3(rnying rgyud): gton ma 'bul// phye 'gro las kyi mtshan ma ni mdzad nas// rtog med don gyi mchod pa bzhes sra gsol// mi srin la sogs nyi shu brgyad rnams la// mkha' dbyings lhags bsdus pa'i gter ma 'bral// lung sems golwa ba'i
241a4(rnying rgyud): na sa na da pa// gnyis padad pa kyi song ba nas sa gcol// den nga ma rdzob // gajug dus pas sa pa'i sta grub// dag gsem mas pazhes nas/
241a5(rnying rgyud): gyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// brtse gdung tshul bzhin ma bdun srid bzhi la// dam rje sa gnyis su bslus pa'i gtor ma 'bul// smon yon las kyi mtshan ma zhi mdzad nas// ma skyes don gyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol//
241a6(rnying rgyud): sngar mo sum brgya drug cu la// dur khrod phung pos bsdus pa'i gtor ma 'bul// sre shi'i las kyi mtshan ma ni mdzad nas// mang bas don gyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// rdo rje gtar rdo rje ging chen bcob kyang la// srog
241a7(rnying rgyud): sung rdzus pa'i gtor ma 'bul// 'pho 'gyur las kyi mtshan ma zhi mdzad nas// maspangs don gyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// zhes brjod pas log pa'i 'pho 'gyur
241b1(rnying rgyud): 'bul zhing bstab pa'i le'u ste so btsun pa'o// / de nas yang kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin cing zhal mthong ba zhes bya ba yang gzhan ma yin/
241b2(rnying rgyud): te gtor chud chen po 'di tshig dang yi ger bris nas/ gang 'chang ba dang / gang zhig gis zhal mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad zhal mthong zhing 'chang ba yin no// sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab mi 'chad par 'dzin cing
241b3(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ tan du 'di klag cing 'don pa'o// sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes rtogs pa zhes bya ba yang / gzhud pa yin te/ rgyud 'di yid la 'dzin cing gzungs su 'chang bad
241b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs yang dag par rtogs pa'o// sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba yang gzhan ma yin te/ chud 'di yid la 'dzin cing 'chang ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang yang ma tshang ba
241b5(rnying rgyud): med pa'o// sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las zhes bya ba yang gzhan ma yin te/ klung 'di'i don mthar phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las ma rdzogs pa med pa'o// sems dpa' chen po/ sngar
241b6(rnying rgyud): dbus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang rgyab 'di'i don thugs su chud pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin du de ltar dang phyis 'byung ba rnams kyang de bzhin du sangs rgyas pas/ rgyud 'di sangs rgyas kyi dgongs spyod de kho na
241b7(rnying rgyud): de ces pa ste/ rmad 'di shes shing 'dzin pa twa a cad yang ches te zhal tsam yang mthong ba dang ming tsam yang 'dzin pa yang ngan song las grol nas thar pa'i bde ba longs spyod rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po/
242a1(rnying rgyud): na sa
242a2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngas las rnams kyang thar par mi 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po/ rgyud 'di thugs rje che yang che la chung yang drung // de ci'i phyir zhin sngon gyi las Shadro dang ldan pas rgyud 'di'i zhal mthong zhang thos par
242a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur la/ las 'phro dang mi ldan pas rgyud 'di'i zhal mi mthong zhing skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i don no// sems dpa' chen po/ rgyud 'dis ni khyad kyang khyab pa ma khrang byung ma khyab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad 'di las byung zhing
242a4(rnying rgyud): 'dir 'dus pas khyab la/ de ltar khyab kyang de ltar shes shing rtogs par dka' bse ma khyab bo// sems dpa' chen po/ rgyu de 'di ni yod byung yod la med kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtogs pa'i klong yod na go ba'i yul na yod
242a5(rnying rgyud): la/ ma rig pa dang sgo srur can na med do// sems dpa' chen po/ rgyud 'di gnas kyang gnas la/ mi gnas kyang mi gnas la// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dam tshig la gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras po la tshig dang yi ger bris te gnas la
242a6(rnying rgyud): dam la mi gnas shing phyogs chad byed pa la nam yang gnas par mi 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po/ rgyud 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams su grags kyang grags la/ ma grags kyang ma grags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams
242a7(rnying rgyud): cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pas grags la/ dper na seng ge'i 'o ma dang 'dra bar kun gyis mi theg cing snod dang ldan pa gcig 'ga' la sred pa'i phyir ro// de lta bu'i don kyang rtsa ba'i gtor ma dkon zhing rin che ba ste/ rin thar dpag tu med pa'i phan
242b1(rnying rgyud): yin te/ rgyang 'di 'byung bar yang dkun la/ nub par yang mi 'gyur ba'i dpa'// de skan ces bka' stsal pas/ rdo nasems dpas rlung 'dzin cing rdung du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ khwa dang ma / nga yongs cad kun tu bzang po la phul ba/
242b2(rnying rgyud): gtor chud chen po las/ rgyud kyi phan yon bstan pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i bka' de thos pas/ shin tu 'gro ba rnams chags shing gol bar gzigs nas/ 'gro ba sems can
242b3(rnying rgyud): dag par bya ba dang / rjud thos par bya ba dang / man ngag gting phyin par bya ba dang / lung nam du yang mi rngub par bya ba dang / byas pa'i 'bras bu chud mi zos par 'grub nges par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba yongs la 'di skad ces bya ba'i sgra bsngag
242b4(rnying rgyud): so// mi 'gyur dbyangs su gang 'dod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras po kun yin pas// rgyal bas ci ltar gsungs pa bzhin// bu mchog rnams kyis mnyan par gyis// 'khor ba med par bya ba'i phyir// pha ma spun dang ming srid dang // bdag
242b5(rnying rgyud): drang rgyal srid bu dang grogs// bla ma la ni bran du 'bul// de tshe bla ma ma bzhed na// ci ri ba yi rin gyis blu// rgyud chen thos par de gyur na// gzod cig 'khor ba mya ngan med// chags pa med par bya ba'i phyir// gser dngul la sogs/
242b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen lnga// spug la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du// glang po la sogs rta rnams dang // dar dang lhab lbu ba ni bza' dang // zhal zas la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// bla ma mnyes par kun phul nas// zhu ba dag ni tshul bzhin bya// gsol
242b7(rnying rgyud): btab gnang ba thob byas nas// gzod cig sangs rgyas sems can med// gnas pa med par bya ba dang // 'chi ba med par bya ba'i phyir// gnas dang yul dang zhing rnams dang // bran dang gnyen la sogs pa rnams// dad pas dmigs/
243a1(rnying rgyud): la dpral brnyan// gsol btang gnang ba zab byas na// lung chen gnas par dgyur nas// gang rjeg 'ang rang tu dran med// zan de dag ma 'gyur byeng // gang yang yod par mthur na// lus dang srog phyi dbangs
243a2(rnying rgyud): byas nas// brtson 'grus dka' ba'i thams phyung nas// g.yo sgyu med par rab tu 'bad// bka 'a phrul bsnyen bskur thugs zin na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' brdzud dang // rgyad dang lung dang san ga rnams// bai ltar 'dod pa badzin
243a3(rnying rgyud): dbros// gtor rgyud 'di yi zhal mthong zhing // 'azla chen po'i chos thos nas// mya ngan 'das d+ma'i don rtogs shing // kun tu bzang por gdon ldan no// gang sbyig ltar mi byed cing // chags pa'i tshul gyi sa gtor mi shes// 'dzam
243a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems kyis rtag par sems// gzhung dang mi mthun zol thabs kyis// d+h-i srang ma de ci spos kyis// bka' chos te zer tsam yang des mi mthong // na mang ga su med 'dzugs// rgyag da dzin pas der me shes/
243a5(rnying rgyud): yul 'khor la sogs 'di kun yang // gtong po gang gnas dpya ba yin// de cho ga tong yang mi 'brel 'grogs// der yang ma zad dpag mi langs// gang zhig 'dzin chags gtad mi shes// de tshe bzung yang mi 'thogs te// bzung
243a6(rnying rgyud): dpral pos gter sbyor nas// gar ya grogs med pan med ng+ge// ma na ldan gyi snying ring// rjemA med than pa sa rnams mchog/ byang chub za rjes ma brnyan na// sa tshig bskams nas// d+ha rba thang chub 'as
243a7(rnying rgyud): da// ngan song du skyes bzod blag med// gang zhig theg chen khrims thos pas// phongs med yon gyis sde 'dren cing // gzugs snang rtogs pa'i nang rjes te// byang chub lam gyi mtshan btag/ min dge bdud rtsi'i cha chen gyis/
243b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes las kyi 'bras bu smin// rtsa ba'i gtor ma'i rang bzhin du// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// mtha' yas gnas pa'i 'gro kun gyis// kun thos 'di rtogs grol bar shog/ ces bya ba'i sra bsgrags pas/ ce star byas
243b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// gtor ma'i sdod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs so// de skad ces bya ba'i sgra mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad cis thos pas/ chags pa dang bral nas/ rgyud dang lung dang yan ngag gi snod du rung ngo // gtor rgyud chen
243b3(rnying rgyud): po las/ man ngag gi snod srod pa'i phyir// yon 'bul ba'i le'u ste so dbu pa'o// / de nas rnal 'gyod pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ za ma'i gtor mched du brjod do// rnal 'byor lung dang ldan rnams kyis/
243b4(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan byas nas// mchod pa'i tshogs kyi khyad par las// dgongs pa'i za gtor gtang bar bya// de la rnal 'byor pa mtha' dag dus bzhi dag tu 'dod pa la longs spyod par byed do// de chos nyid du spyod par shes na yang gto
243b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni dus thams cad du chos la longs spyod do// de'i dgongs spyod kya dgator rgyud chen po 'di ltar spyod na yang gtor ma'o// de'i phyir za ma thams cad ni tshogs la/ de bsngo ba dang ldan pa ni gtor ma'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dper na
243b6(rnying rgyud): shing mkhan thabs la mkhas pas shing thams cad 'phrul du byin gyis brlabs pa bzhin/ thabs 'di ltar mkhas pas thams cad cu gtor mar longs spyod cing / gtor ma longs spyod pa las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byin gyis
243b7(rnying rgyud): rlobs pa'i mthu yod pa'o// de la dang po za ma'i gtor ma'i dgongs rgyud ni/ rnam pa bdun dang ldan par bya ba 'am/ yang na lnga dang ldan par bya ba ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ dang po gtor ma'i dgos pa dang / theg pa chen por kun tshang ba'i
244a1(rnying rgyud): dgos pa dang / gnyis su med par tshogs kyi langs spyod za ba dang / lhag ma'i phrin las kyi mchod pas gnyis su med par bya ba dang / dngos po dang mtshan ma me gnas pa'i chos nyid stong pa'i rang du gtor mtha pa'o//
244a2(rnying rgyud): de la dang po za ma'i gtor ma'i dgongs pa ni/ l-ig pa grayas pa 'jam dpal gyi phyag tu bcas la/ bdag la dgra bgegs yodan rtog pa yod pas/ dgra bgegs thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis zhugs par bsams la/ tshe dgal gyil
244a3(rnying rgyud): dbyed med par bsnyems la/ srid pa'i tha ba gcod pas mi gnas par bskal la/ rgyal ba'i sras su rigs nges par dbang bskur la bzhan// de nas rnal 'byor pa'i longs spyod dang / mchod pa'i yo byad las/ gtor ma bsngo bar bya ba ni/
244a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan dpal chen po yab yum sras dang bcas pa dang / 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams/ rnam rtog zang par bya ba'i gtor ma bzhes su gsol// oM ba lin ta kha re khA hi/ kha re ta k+She ne/ khA yo ge ni/ de tabag Al
244a5(rnying rgyud): la haM zhes brjod la/ ci ltar snang ba thams cad gtor ma'i rang bzhin du 'phags pa rnams la mchod cing / rgyal brgya mtshornams la thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul nas/ gtor ma'i mchod pas dus rtag tu mchod btsun mi chang par bskam pa'o//
244a6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa la sogs so// tshogs kyis bdag la thi mabe ni// rgyal ba mnyes par bsam pa'o// bral ba mnyes pas ni/ bdag gi dngos gru bathob par bsgom pa'o// bdag dngos bung thob pas thams cangs da
244b1(rnying rgyud): mar mangs sud pa'o// de nas rtag ma phran las sa bya ba na// dang par dngas pa las tshas nyid du dbyings gcig cing / rtogs pa'i gags med par bya de/ phyogs kyi lhag ma la smra rnam nA/ a badz+ra Sh+Tha bar+thakra ma b+had+ha ba lan ta la khyA zhes pa
244b2(rnying rgyud): lanagang yang mi gnas pa'i phrin las bcol lo// de nas dngos po dang mtshan mar mi gnas par bya ba ni/ thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin las ma gtogs pa/ rtog pa dang mtshan ma gang yang mi gnas par tshogs kyi gtor mar longs spyod pas/
244b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad chos nyid dbyings kyi gtor mar sangs rgyas par bsgom pa'o// gtor chud chen po las/ za ma'i gtor ma'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas/ kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
244b4(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i gtor ma 'di// gtor zhing gang la gtang ba lags/ gter gang du bzhag pa lags/ spyad cing btsa' ba'i thabs ci lta bu lags/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
244b5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po lung bstan pa 'di/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bshad la/ ngas kyang bshad par bya'o// gtor ma 'di dag gtor zhing gtang bar bya ba ni/ 'byung ba chen po lnga la gtor zhing gtad par bya'o// de
244b6(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni gtor ma thams cad kyi rgyu yang yin la/ gtor ma'i mgron gyi bzhugs gnas kyang yin la/ gtor ma'i 'bras bu chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong yang yin pas/ gtor ma nam mkha' la gtong ba ni/ nam mkha'i
244b7(rnying rgyud): sunam mkha' la gtor ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni chos nyid skye ba med pa'i dbyings kyis thams cad shes shing go 'byed pa'o// gtor ma sa la gtong ba ni/ gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs bzhi dang mtshams brgyad du khyab par
245a1(rnying rgyud): gtang bang // rdzum gyu nan/ don che ba mon tu phyis thams cad bzud cing dran dur byang dag/ gtar ma thal gtang dran/ ngamacan pa'i 'dring slob pa rgya bachung dgakyang lag 'a'as datha'abyor nam
245a2(rnying rgyud): don rlung zhon pa'i rigasu ma ni skyel babyu // phying nan/ ded dam par rtog pa'i dag pashegs thams cad 'ashing ni ga yang ba'o// gtor chung chen po las/ gtor me btang bu'i ledzis zheg cig pa
245a3(rnying rgyud): de nas gtor migati dusra pa ni/ gang drug tor ma 'di spong bangs la dang cag gang nas ma/ dang sa kyi phyi'i gtor ma la/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis gtor mar sbyar lag tar skye'o// de ci'i rkye nan/ de yang chos kyi su mi 'thung
245a4(rnying rgyud): mdun pazhugs pa la/ yin tan gyi rdzogs cir yang snang zhing 'byung ba'o// dril 'di gad ces brjod par // dzA kun tu bzang mo mapa'adabyings su// chos 'gyur ba med pa yis// rdo rigs kyi gteng smras pas// slob pa bya/
245a5(rnying rgyud): dngos thab stsol// sangs rgyas spyan gyi mkha' dbyingasas// 'dus spong rdzogs par rabasnang ba'i// rin chen rigs cig ter mas pas// srub pa po la dngos grub krol// mA lA ki semapa' byings su// gzugs su gse tshan
245a6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba mi// rin chen rigs kyi gter sbas pas/ sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol// gos dkar mo yi mkha' dbyings su// mngon par gsal ba'i skur sdang ba'o// pad+ma rigs kyi gter sbas pas// srab pa po la dngos su rtsol/
245b1(rnying rgyud): mar longs spyod pa'o// de nas lhag ma'i phrin las su bya ba ni// dang por dngos po de las chos nyid du dbyings gcig cing / rtogs pa'i gegs med par bya ba ni/ tshogs kyi lhag ma la spyi sdom ste/ oM badz+ra raN+Da pad+ma karma bud+d+ha ba lin ta kha khA zhes brjod
245b2(rnying rgyud): lanagang yang mi gnas pa'i phrin las bcol lo// de nas dngos po dang mtshan mar mi gnas par bya ba ni/ thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin las ma gtogs pa/ rtog pa dang mtshan ma gang yang mi gnas par tshogs kyi gtor mar longs spyod pas/
245b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad chos nyid dbyings kyi gtor mar sangs rgyas par bsgom pa'o// gtor chud chen po las/ za ma'i gtor ma'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas/ kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
245b4(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i gtor ma 'di// gtor zhing gang la gtang ba lags/ gter gang du bzhag pa lags/ spyad cing btsa' ba'i thabs ci lta bu lags/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
245b5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po lung bstan pa 'di/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bshad la/ ngas kyang bshad par bya'o// gtor ma 'di dag gtor zhing gtang bar bya ba ni/ 'byung ba chen po lnga la gtor zhing gtad par bya'o// tre
245b6(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni gtor ma thams cad kyi rgyu yang yin la/ gtor ma'i mgron gyi bzhugs gnas kyang yin la/ gtor ma'i 'bras bu chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong yang yin pas/ gtor ma nam mkha' la gtong ba ni/ nam mkha'i
245b7(rnying rgyud): su nam mkha' la gtor ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i chos te ba med pa'i dbyings kyis thams cad shes shing go 'byed pa'o// gtong mas la gtong ba ni/ gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs bzhi dang mtshams brgyang du khyab par
246a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar blta'o// rgyud 'di ni rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gas/ 'chang cing skyon nus na yang / kun tu bzang po nyid dang 'dra bas/ 'khor ma lus pa rnams kyis kyang / rjes ci bsgob mnyan par bya/
246a2(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chud 'dis ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs spyod thams cad ma lus par bstan te/ gang zhig 'di la mos pa dang / 'di bsgoms shing sgrub pa la dga' ba rnams kyis 'di
246a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi don rtogs nas sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ gang zhig 'di la mi mos shing sgro skur 'debs pa rnams ni/ bskal pa dpag gis mi langs par/ 'di'i ming tsam yang mi thos shing / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por skye bar gyur cig/ rgyud
246a4(rnying rgyud): 'di gad na gnas pa dang / ngar zhing spogs pa'i sar/ bdag nyid chen po 'khor ma lus pa rnams kyis kyang / gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du 'debs par gyur cig/ ces spod par bya'o// gtor rgyud chen po las/ dam bcas pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi
246a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' lnga sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i gtong ma'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas par gyur to// gtong rgyud chen po rdzogs so// // mjug spang
246a6(rnying rgyud): man ngag blta ba mdor bsdus/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma saM b+ha wa dang / bi ma la mi tra dang / lo tsA ba gnub nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur/ byis bal po ba su d+ha ra dang / gzubla sangs rgyas ye shes kyi lus gtugs so// / rgya bar skad du
246a7(rnying rgyud): yo gAny+dzad+har+tha ka ga Na ma hA tan+taM/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor nang gi tshogs chud chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i sras gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / yum gyi b+ha ga mkha' dkyi
246b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / gsang ba'i yum dang / 'khor sems dpa' dang sems ma dang / khro bo dang khro mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang sprul pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs
246b2(rnying rgyud): cig tu bzhugs pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu'i gtsug tor drang po las/ 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings gang nas gang du khyab ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pas/
246b3(rnying rgyud): lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ phyag na yang rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thogs pas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad la/ mchod pa'i rnam pa thabs
246b4(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab kyi tshul du mchod/ dgyes pa chen po'i gzi mdangs kyis tshims par mdzad/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs la phog pas/ thugs dam chen po'i rgyud bskul te/ sku la phog pas/ mdzad pa'i phrin las dang
246b5(rnying rgyud): ma 'gal bar thugs dam bsgral/ gsung la phog pas/ bden pa'i chos nyid las ma g.yos par thugs dam bskul/ thugs la phog pas/ mnyam pa'i sems ma g.yos par thugs dam bskul/ dbang gi mchog zhus/
246b6(rnying rgyud): lha dbang lus la brtsegs pa dang / spyi dbang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba dang / mos dbang sems dang 'dres pa dang / gsang dbang lhun gyis grub pa dang / dbang bzhi mnos/ dngos grub kyi mchog zhus/ sku'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen
246b7(rnying rgyud): por rang snang ba dang / gsung gi dngos grub chos nyid ma skyes par dang snang ba dang / thugs kyi dngos grub sems ye nas sangs rgyas su mnos/ skye 'gro ming dang gzugs kyis bsdus pa thams cad la khyab pas/ sems can gyi don byas
247a1(rnying rgyud): te/ 'ong bas gzugs mthong ba la sogs pa 'don byas/ 'khor bar skyon bsal te/ dngos par bsdu pa 'dzes pa bshags/ log pa skyon bcom/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal/ sdug bsngal gyi chu
247a2(rnying rgyud): bshigs/ 'khor ba'i 'dam nas drangs/ byang chub kyi shul bsrangs/ dngos grub kyi stong du rung bar mdzad/ rigs nges pa'i sras su mdzad/ 'od zer de dag slar rdo rje sems dpa'i sra la 'dus/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgra nyid shin tu lhan
247a3(rnying rgyud): ne ba/ lhan ne ba yang ma yin pa/ shin tu sang de ba/ sad de ba yang ma yin pa/ ci lta bur yang snod la/ ci lta bur yang ma yin/ thams cad du gsal ba/ ma bsgrubs pa nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra ba/ de lta bu'i rdos pa can yang ma yin
247a4(rnying rgyud): pa/ thams cad du blta bas mi ngoms pa la/ brtags kyis kyang mi longs pa'i sku gcig kyang gcig/ bsam cis kyang mi khyab/ mthar thug pa yang med/ dbus su brtags pa yang med/ dngos po yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma
247a5(rnying rgyud): yin/ yod par yang mi snang / med par yang ma song / btud nas nye bar med/ bkyed nas ring ba med pas thams cad du lhun gyis thub pa la/ 'di zhes bsten du med pa la/ ci lta bur yang dmigs su med pa/ gang yang ma tshang ba med pas
247a6(rnying rgyud): sku gasngal ba las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi sgrar gyur to// de nas rdo rje sems dpas ljags kyi pad+ma las/ yig 'bru bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
247a7(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i grangs ma yin/ ji ltar nam mkha' nas gang du khyab pa thams cad gzugs dang sgra la sogs pas bsdus la/ de thams cad tshig gi bsdus/ tshig thams cad yi ges bsdus/ yi ge thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du lung bstar/
247b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs bgrangs gsum gyi sangs byas thams cad kyi sngags dang gsung la ga pas/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung gi skanas zas kyi 'khar la bskor bar bzhed pa rnams bskul ba'i sal bdangs te bzugs pa rnams pa/ gangan
247b2(rnying rgyud): nas thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul te/ dgyes pa chen po chos nyid kyi mchod pa phul nas/ chos thams cad tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas pa'i don thugs ye shes kyi slong dam nas dgongs nas mthur gsang ba'i bum par gyung nas/ ljag
247b3(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang po mchog la bkram nas 'gro ba sems can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskong bar bskul/ gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// 'gro ba mi rtag par bstan pa'i slad du/ thabs kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i
247b4(rnying rgyud): tshul bstan par bzhed pa rnams la yang phog pas/ dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phul/ thugs dam chen po'i rgyud bskul nas/ thabs kyis mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing / 'jig rten du yun ring du bzhugs par gsol ba gdab/ sug
247b5(rnying rgyud): pos brtan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phog pas/ yig 'bru gzugs kyi mchod pas mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'i sgo nas bdag dang gnyis su med par thugs dam bsngal/ yig 'bru tshig gi mchod pas gsung dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
247b6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i sgo nas tshig gi don gsal nas chos nyid ma skyes par thugs dam bsngal/ yig 'bru don gyi mchod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i sgo nas don gyis rtogs par byas la sangs rgyas par byas te/ 'khor ba'i
247b7(rnying rgyud): btsal gyis mi rnyed cing / thams cad byang chub snying po can du ldan gyis thub par dbang bskur te/ slar 'dus te rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar 'dus pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs gcig tu mi sdang ba/ gnyis su ma gyi/ grangs su
248a1(rnying rgyud): ma badzad/ rjes sum sdang ba/ rjod du mang cing brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das pa/ smra ba yang mdang/ lags ngas pa med pa/ thags nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la/ rtogs pa 'od zer btsun gdas / kha las/
248a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad ni lha'i dkyil 'khor/ brjod pa thams cad ni chos nyid kyi brjod pa/ grags pa thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i klong / ri bo thams cad ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin/ dgongs pa thams cad ni ma gyes pa'i grong du ldan gyis grub
248a3(rnying rgyud): pas rba/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa thams cad/ rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi sngar ldan gyis grub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la/ mgrin gcig
248a4(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// e ma a la la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ ci las byung ba lags/ thug rje tshe dang ldan pas lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// rdo rje sems dpas bka'
248a5(rnying rgyud): skul pa/ 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi rgyud do// rnal 'byor kyi tshogs kyi rgyud ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rkyen no// rdo rje sems dpa'ang yang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis mchod pa bral bas sangs rgyas pas/ de dag thams cad ni
248a6(rnying rgyud): mchong pa phul ba las byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ tshogs zhes bgyi ba nges tshig ci lags/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bskyed/ tshogs kyi slob dpon de lta bu la bzhi/ tshogs kyi rgyal tshab da gar dang ging
248a7(rnying rgyud): lta bu la bgyi/ yum je lta bu la brtsi/ tshogs kyi yo byad ci 'tshal/ mchod pa ji ltar 'bral/ grangs su 'tshal/ tshogs kyi 'bras bu ni thob pa lags/ yun ci tsam gyis 'brung / phul ba'i yon tan dang / maphul ba'i sgo
248b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams mos shing thos par 'dod na/ yid la zung la rna ba'i dbang pos nyon cig
248b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs chud chen po 'di/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs la ngas kyang bshad do// de la tshogs zhes bya ba'i nges tshig ni/ don dang mthun pa la bka' dang mi 'gal zhing dgezhung bzhin bslab pa la tshogs pa la
248b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom pa'i ming yang med pa/ shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po/ gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa la mos shing gzhol pa dang / 'di dag bshad cing ngastan pa'i snod du gyur pa yang /
248b4(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig la gnas shing ma nyams par bsrung ba dang / ras gcod dang gzu lums ma yin par/ phyi nang gi dbang rnams lung bzhin du nod pa dang / rgyud dang phyi nang gi don la mos shing mkhas pa'o// de mi gtogs pa de rnams
248b5(rnying rgyud): dang mi ldan pa 'jungs pa dang / 'chings pa ma grol ba dang / dgongs pa gnad du ma phebs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de la tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di skad do// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin las/ ngo bo nyid kyis kun tu dag/
248b6(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i chos nyid tshig tsam ma yin par rtogs pa dang / spyod pas de dang mi 'gal bar spyod pa dang / phrin las kyis ba bcol du mi byed zhing / gong 'og rin po che'i phreng ba brkus pa ltar ma nor ba dang / bsgom zhing bslab pa la bzhad gang dang
248b7(rnying rgyud): gnyid dbang du mi gtong zhing / dad dang brtson 'grus kyis mgo la me shor ba dang 'dra bar 'bad pa dang / rnal 'byor kyi don gang la yang shor yangs su che ba dang / rtog pa dang 'khu 'phrigapa med cing / 'khu ldog dang ya ga dang mchod tshig
249a1(rnying rgyud): sogs pas rgyu 'ad ga tas lasags pa ga d+ma yar mtshang ba med cardzogs su yang brdung ba sa thamasan tshogs pa lachags zhes bya ba lngas/ ma
249a2(rnying rgyud): zhing ma tshogs pa dang / mi mthun pa tshogs pa la tshogs zhes zla ba'i nges chog med do// de la tshogs kyi slob dpon ni kun gyis bya ba ma yin gyis/ lta ba gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems rtogs pa/ spyod pa gsang ba'i bka' dang mi
249a3(rnying rgyud): 'gal zhing / thabs la mkhas pas sdong ma yin pa dang / mu stegs dang log pa'i phyogs rnams kyis mtshor ma 'jigs pa'i thabs la mkhas par spyod pa dang / dbang rim pas brtsegs te/ rigs pa'i rgyal po rab 'thams kyi dbang thob nas/
249a4(rnying rgyud): dbang rgyud dang / dbang rdzas dang / dbang rtags dang / dbang bsgrub dang / dbang bsnyen/ dbang bsrung ba la mkhas pa dang / dam tshig gzhi dang 'dra bar shor yangs dang / theg pa che zhing snying la 'chang ste bsrung ba dang / phrin las kyi sngag dang
249a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin dang / ma nor pa'i tshul dgu ste/ dgongs pa'i lha tshul dang / gang ye shes kyi tshul dang / phyag rgya sba'i tshul dang / sngags gsung gi tshul dang / snying po thugs kyi tshul/ mchod pa yon tan ci tshul/
249a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi tshul/ skyil zung zhi ba'i tshul/ stangs stabs khro bo'i tshul te/ tshig tu 'brel pa dang / gong 'og ma 'chol ba dang / dgongs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por rdzogs pas 'dzin pa'o// de la tshogs kyi rgyal tsha ba ni/ dper na rgyal po'i
249a7(rnying rgyud): bka' ba sgo blon pos gsungs pa dang 'dra'o// dgongs spyod kyi don tha mi dad pa de nyid dang mtshungs pa las/ gzhan 'dren pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / slob dpon gyi sra bsnyel ba dang / thun slob dang / snyoms pa la sogs pa la bar mi gcod cing
249b1(rnying rgyud): 'thab par byab dang / sgrub dpon cig lachab tu ches bstan pa la mkhas pa'o// gsu bye gar myed/ zan las rnam pa de la mags pa dang / mchod pa dang brda' don mtha' dag la mkhas pa las ma gtags pa/ sha na zas 'dab dang /
249b2(rnying rgyud): mos pa tsam du bya ba ma yinano// tshogs kyi zhing ni/ rang gi dgos ched mI lan rnal 'byor gyi spyi zas la brtson pa dang / zhing gzur gyung pa la thugs rjes grol nges pa dang / dgongs pa dang las rgyud du ldan pa las ma gtogs pa/ spel ba btsan thabs dang /
249b3(rnying rgyud): rang gang la dga' ba la mngon spod dang / drag shul ci las brtsams pa ma yin no// tshogs kyi yum ni/ gtso bo'i dgongs pa bzhin du byed nus pa dang / gzhung dbu dang ldan te/ tshul shes pa/ ya sha che ba/ nog thub pa/ gsang sgo dam pa/
249b4(rnying rgyud): dmal gnas pa/ dad pas mos pa/ rtog pa rdung ba/ mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ sems bzang ba dang dgung ldan pa las ma gtogs pa/ 'dod mos dang / gnyen brtson dang / sngon 'dri dang / mtshan ngan dang / gsang ba 'dzag pa ni ma yin pa'o//
249b5(rnying rgyud): dem tshags kyi la byed ni/ sangs rgyas rnams la ta slebs pa dang / rnams pa dang / bser ba bstan me med 'a chags pa mi mnga' ba lags kyang / dbar na rgya brten pa la dkar dang rgyas byang byeng ma rlom mi 'ongs pa la yang 'a'ang ba la mags
249b6(rnying rgyud): pas dkor dang longs spyod phul na 'phel gyi phan pa dang yun gyi bde ba dang / bdag gi yid la dang pacol bI dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas rnams la bzhed pa mi mnga' na yang / phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas rdzogs kyis mchod pas 'byor ba bsags/ da
249b7(rnying rgyud): pa btsal/ mos pa dang dad pas phul na/ 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka'i phan pa dang bde bstsol bar mdzad cing / chos nyid kyi dga' ba chen po de ga nyid du 'grub par rtsol bar mdzad pas/ de'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po gzung bzhin du bsha
250a1(rnying rgyud): rar rdzas/ gzugs pa gsumaH/ rgyan dang tha sa da da // nan la yang rnam pa gas na/ da pa bya can dang/ mangs pa mas macan dang / gnas las rdzal ba rgyan// dbyibs pa yang rnam
250a2(rnying rgyud): na' na
250a3(rnying rgyud): dbang batsham byad ky-i dza dang / mdag gas la rgyas pa ldan gyi dang / brgyad gsal yod 'ang rgyal bas // ras yang dam pa gas maH/ rang bzhin gyis brnabs pa lan tshwa nga/ shing tog la sems pa kha ba dang / ma
250a4(rnying rgyud): nasmra
250a5(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba dang / bsregs pa dang / bsangs pa la sogs pa'i ro dang / sngags dang byeng du 'dzin sats+tshin gyis brlabs pa'i ro dang / drung ngums chen po/ cung drams mang ba/ mi ne pA las zhi mtho/ ma ga brgya dang ldan par ra
250a6(rnying rgyud): sa na/ sa dus su sa
250a7(rnying rgyud): rkan dang / dbugs dang 'dams pa'i sgrar// reg la yang rnam pa gsum b+he/ tshwa'ang chags kyi rig pa dang / dga' 'ang ma dbyas pa yum gyi dgang dang / rgyan gyis sgrog pa yum gyi rin po che'i chas kyis brgyan pa'i rag po // de lA
250b1(rnying rgyud): bar 'dar chos
250b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan thams cad de/ tshogs kyi yo byad yin no// tshogs kyi yo byad ni 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga'o// de dag chang zhing tshogs na yang lags/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma g.yos pa thams cad tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin na/
250b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyis mchod pa'i rgyan du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de bas kyang thams cad du ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing gnyis su med pa las/ rtogs pa slabs ma yul las 'das/ bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// I ma hA shUn tA dz+nyA na badz+ra
250b4(rnying rgyud): wa at+ma ko&hi// dbyings gcig rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang // ma rig rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// khyab pa'i snying rje yongs kyis 'byung // de tshe rde ba med par bsgom// A~M d+harma NA ta swa b+hA wa At+ma ka&ha// mtha' dbus med pa'i byang chub sems/
250b5(rnying rgyud): tshes rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems ni yi ge'i rang bzhin no// yig mchog tu bsgom par bya'o// hU~M badzi \u0f7f/ )/ a la~M ma la ba bi shwa bi shwan+te/ mkha' dbyings nam mngon slo yangs su// 'byung brtang gi sra bcas te// bdud rtsing chu
250b6(rnying rgyud): bsgril mA ma ke/ gser gyi sa gzhi ri rab mdzes// kha dog lngar bcas rin chen lngar// b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang // tA la'i bskyed shing cod cong sbrel// yid bzhin rin chen grwa na gsal// lha lnga 'ja' tshon sprin dum yang // mu
250b7(rnying rgyud): tig chun po sna tshogs bres// nyi zla thabs dang shes rab kyis// 'khod cing gsal ba'i byini rlabs kyi// ma rig mun sel ye shes smon// gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha las// theg pa'i bye brag sna tshogs grogs// gyi nad med pa'i bzhugs gan
250b8(rnying rgyud): der// yangs dog med pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// It+man tsakra maN+Da la hUM// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis su// rang chud gzhan dang mthun par bskyed// sems dpa' lum cu rtsa gnyis kyang // @
251a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i tshu gyis brgya// brdadra dang/ ga to/ badz+ran d+haH/ badz+rar dzAdza/ badz+rastanam/ 'a \u0f7f/ badz+rags na/ 'anabashAH/ badz+ra \u0f7f/ dan
251a2(rnying rgyud): badz+rad d+hA raM/ badz+ra ya d+ha te/ badz+ras d+hig/ d+hIdz+dza/ dz+dzab+h+yaSh+T+r-ihU~M/ hrIhrIhrInI/ a a a me/ skubagyi dgas la bte ba de bang bsgyur nas// spyan 'dzin chog gzhung bzhinaH// mtshad pa la sags mchong gyis nas// de ny-i la gyi nas
251a3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur te/ he ru dgu dang yum chen dgu// go ra brgyad dang phra maun brgyad// slong ma brgyad dang sgom bzhi// dbang phyug nye shu rtsa brgyad dang // mkha' 'gro mum cu rtsa gnyis dang // pho nya sum brgya drug cu dang // ma mo bdun dang sred mo bzhi//
251a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i gang chen bco brgyad rnams// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis su// dpal 'bar khro bo'i rgyud bzhin bskyed// zhu ba phyed gsal btab dbang bskur nas// spyan drang mchod pa gzhung bzhin 'bul// de dag 'dir bshad mangs pa'i phyir/
251a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan dang mthun par rgyal bas gsung // tshogs gud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa la yang / don rnam pa gsum ste/ tshogs byin gyis brlab pa dang // chog
251a6(rnying rgyud): drang ba dang / tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul ba'o// de la tshogs byin kyis brlab pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'khor rnam pa gnyis te/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das shing / dgongs pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / 'jig rten
251a7(rnying rgyud): dbang du sdud pa'i 'khor ro// de la dgongs pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i 'khor ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ thugs rje dbri bkol mi mdzad pa'i don gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don la mgon dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyen
251b1(rnying rgyud): cing bzhugs pas/ dmigs pa 'dran pa zhes su gnang ba/ byin gyis brlabs shing / dngos grub rtsol bar mdzad pas/ rkyen gyis brlab mi dgos so// 'jig rten dbang du bsdus pa'i 'khor ni/ chos mnyam pa la bzhugs nas/ thangs
251b2(rnying rgyud): cad la byar dang tshul rtog ste/ dam tshig bsrungs mi bsrung ba ste/ dam tshe gsung ba la stongs grogs byed/ dam tshig mi bsrung zhing nyams bal chad pas gcod/ mnar med par ltung bar byed/ rnal 'byor gyi mchod pa la phung nyams ma
251b3(rnying rgyud): nyams dang / gtsang sbra byed mi byed blta/ phung mnyams shing gtsang sbra byed na/ ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang / gang bcol ba'i las byed/ phung nyams la gtsang sbram byas na/ dngos grub kyi bar chad byed/ las bcol pa log par bsgrub/
251b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor byin gyis brlabs ma brlabs dang / dgongs pa dag ma dag palta/ byin gyis brlabs la dgongs pa dag na/ bsgo banyan pa dang / lus dang grib ma bzhin 'khor ba dang / 'khor dang rigs bsung ba dang / dbang dang mthu ste dang dag
251b5(rnying rgyud): gtor ma bo la mngon du khyer te/ bran rnyid nye ba bzhin las byed cing / 'bru ldog med la/ rnal 'byor ba'i dgongs pas dag pas/ byin gyis ma brlabs na/ blar tshad kyi gegs byed/ cho 'phrul rton/ mthu dang / 'jog/ 'khwa rjo \u0f7f/
251b6(rnying rgyud): mri bde pa'i doni dang / sdug bsngal dang / srog gi bar chad dang / 'khor dang rje la gnod pas/ byin gyis brlab dgos te/ dang po tshogs kyi zhal zlas la phung ma nyams shing bsags te/ gtsang sde dang ldan par btsugs la/ dri chab pa chos
251b7(rnying rgyud): nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags dang / phyag rgyas sbyin gyis brlabs pas bsangs la/ de nas khro mo dang phyug ma'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ne/ chu gtsang ma'i nang du tsan dan dmar po brdar te/ de pa rlung ma po gcig tu 'dom/

252a5(rnying rgyud): lngas/ zhi blo'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab par 'phros pas/ 'jig rten gyi rnam rtog thams cad 'phrog sbyang du byas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byims bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ dra kres pa chen po'i mchod pa lha la lha

252a7(rnying rgyud): dpon dang mched dang wa mjal/ gsang sngags yog rnam gsum gyi nor dregs shing / rnal 'byor gyi bka' gzung bzhin mdzad pa thams cad la/ 'dod pa'i 'ongs spyod rnam lnga chos nyid kyi rgyan du mchod la gul/ thams cad
252b1(rnying rgyud): mnyes shing tshim pa dang // 'grangs shing ngoms par byas/ g.yar dam nyams pa sor chud nas/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa sbyangs/ ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khyab pas/ dam rdzas gang la dad pas mchod/ rang dang de
252b2(rnying rgyud): tshig bsrung / dpal gyi bka' dang dam las mi 'da' bar byas/ rnal 'byor gyi las dang gnyir gtang mthar byin par dam tshig mnos te/ rnal 'byor gyi dpongs pa mthar phyin par byin gyis brlab po// tshogs chud chen po las/ byin gyis

252b7(rnying rgyud): lha dang mi yi na bza' dang // gos dang rgyan dang lhab lbub dang // rin chen dbu rgyan cod pan dang // dpung rgyan do shal se mo do// dar dbyangs pa ti sham bu dang // snyan cha mabur chu bla med 'di// spu yi mchod pa bzhes su gsol/

253a2(rnying rgyud): 'du tshig don dang man ngag dang // gsal dang go 'byung snying po'i zla// dbang po tshims byed rgyal ba'i bka'// phyag rgya chen po'i gsung ldan pa'i// chos kyi mtsho dpa bzhes su gsol// ma lus thugs dam 'a skar gyur cig/ ces drang
253a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs rgyad chen po las/ tshogs drang ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa yang rnam pa gsum ste/ gzugs kyi mchod pa dang / nang grol ba'i mdzad pa dang / g.yeng ba thab sa dang shes
253a4(rnying rgyud): rab byang chub sems kyis mchod pa'o// de la gyi gzugs kyi mchod pa la yang rnam pa bcu drug ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa don gyi mchod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dang / gar gyi mchod pa dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang / sems dpa'

253b7(rnying rgyud): myer bcang ba las 'byung ngo // gar gyi gang drang zangs ni/ sgrub thabs du gsung zugs kyi 'dus so// gar gyi yan tanani// gar bgyur nas phyag rgya // A'i phyag rgya gsal bar byasangs/
254a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'di skad do// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul las/ sku yi phyag rgya 'da' ba med// mi 'gyur phyag rgya'i mchod pa las// rgyal ba mnyes te dngos grub stsol// sems dpa'i skyi
254a2(rnying rgyud): mo mnyam bzhag nas// g.yon pa'i lag brkyang rkang steng na// g.yas pa de steng mnyam bzhag pa// kun bzang nyid kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal sbyar sor bsnol nas// gung mo rtse sprad mthe'u chung bsgreng // mthe bong gnyis kyang de bzhini

254a4(rnying rgyud): mdzub zuraraM can// gung mo sor drug 'od ltar bkram// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal mo de nyid las// sor mo rtse sprad dgu byas nas// pad+ma kha 'bus tshul du byas// pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal mo de nyid ngas/
254a5(rnying rgyud): srin lag gnyis ni nang du bkug/ bzhi po rtse spad phyogs bzhir bzad// las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya de nyid bcangs pa las// bzhi po rtse sprad gyen bsrings nas// dam du badzums te bsgrengs pa ni// rigs kyi yum lnga'i rtsa
254a6(rnying rgyud): rgya yin// thal mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// sor mo gzhan rnams rgyab tu bsnol// zur can myu gu'i yi tshul// sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan// sor mo gsum phyar ral gri'i tshul/
254a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa shubs ltar byas pa ni// nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal mo sbyar nas kyang // sor mo spel te yid tsam bsnol// pad+ma kha rgyas tshul du byas// spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon song
254b1(rnying rgyud): bskol gung mo bsgrengs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i dra ltar bkug/ mthe bong gnyis ni glor bzhag pa// phyag na rdo rje'i b+hag rgyu yin// g.yas pa sbubs kyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pa mthe bong mdzub mo spar// ste ma 'dzin pa ltar byas pa//
254b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' kun bzang phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa lag mthil lte bar brkyang // g.yon pa brlal se gol tshul// mo ta 'dzin pa ltar byas pa// sgrib pa rnam se la phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin tshul// g.yon pa brkyangs tes
254b3(rnying rgyud): gdon gyis// kla shing 'dzin pa lngar byas pa// byams pa mchog gi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon rting sta nas// sor mo phyer bkyed rtse mo dgug/ ut+pal tshul du byas pa ni// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i phyag rgya lan// lag+sa pa
254b4(rnying rgyud): zhur de kung brten nas// 'gying ba'i tshul du gnas pa la// 'dzum ning sgeg pas g.yas su 'dud// las sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon mtheb mdzub smad// g.yon pas phreng ba 'dzin pa la// g.yas pas sprir
254b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams 'dren pa ni// mra le phreng ba 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa rin chen pi wang la// sor mos de'u gnon pa las// g.yas pardeb pa ltar byas pa// dbyangs mkhan ma yi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa'i thal mo bkan pa la/
254b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa steng du lho bsnol te// 'khril ba'i tshul gyi phyag rgya ni// gar mkhan spong ma'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yon pa'i gru mo nas// g.yas pas 'dregs pa ltar byas la// g.yon pa spos phong tshul du bya// d+hU be tshis kyang phyag

255a2(rnying rgyud): yi phyag rgya yin// lag pa khwa chung bcings nas hU~M// dri mag phyag rje chen po las// dategs pa'i tshul du gyur ba ni// gshin rjeg sheng kyi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pas sdigs pa'i mdzu ba sgoms// g.yas pa rdo rtso gyis/
255a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs su 'debs pa ni// dpal ldan chen po'i phyag rgya yin// rta mgrin dpal ni rta yi rgya// yang na g.yon pa zod khrag las// g.yas pa sprul zhags sdom pa ni// ha ya hrI wa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba las/

255a5(rnying rgyud): pa lcags sgrog ltar byas pa// ro langs ma yi phyag rgya yin// dril bu 'khrol ba ltar byas pas// ral gri ma yi phrag rgya yin// pi wang rdebs pa ltar byas pas// lha yi thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// go cha bgo ba ltar byas pas// lha min thub
255a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya yin// gseg par 'dzin pa ltar byas pa// mi mgon thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// mo ti chos 'chang phyag rgya ni// byol song thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen sbom bu kha 'byed ni// yi dgas thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// me 'angar
255a7(rnying rgyud): drug lag gnyis ni// dmyal ba'i thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskar gyur cig/ rgyal sras mchod pas mnyes gyur nas// mdzar byin dngos grub stsal du gsol/
255b1(rnying rgyud): bcu drug gi sngags rnams dra pyad dgom
255b2(rnying rgyud): ri pU dza swA hA/ zhes ma nor bar 'bral/ de nas sems dpa' bcu drug gi mchod pa 'di skad do// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde che// rdo rje rgyal po dga' ba che// rdo rje chags pa 'debs pa che// rdo rje legs pa bla na med// rdo rje rin chen dri ma med//
255b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje nyi mi gsal bya che// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dga' ba che// rdo rje bzhed pa thabs chen po// rdo rje chos mchog gsung ba che// rdo rje 'khor lo yid bzhin bskor// rdo rje rnon po thogs pa med// rdo rje sgrub gsung ba che// rdo rje las rab 'dul mkhas
255b4(rnying rgyud): ba// rdo rje gnod sbyin gdung ba sems// rdo rje go cha dpa' bo ste// rdo rje khu tshur legs pa che// sems dpa' chen po mchod pa yi// phyag rgya chen pos mnyes gyur te// mA lus dgyes te thugs dam bskang // rtsa ba'i sngags brjod
255b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' gzhan yang mchod do// de nas sems ma bcu drug gi mchod pa 'di skad do// oM mu ra to badz+ra ma nod pa bA d+ha// oM swa ra to badz+ra ki li ki li hU~M// oM su ra to badz+ra s+thed ta hrIH/ oM su ra to badz+ra g+har b+he hUM// bde ba za byed yab yum
255b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyar gsal// bde ba rmongs byed gnyis su med par spyod// bde ba rgyas 'debs dkyil 'khor phrin las rdzogs// bde ba tshe 'phel skye shi med pa'i ngang // oM he ma hA sur to b+ha ma sa nrir+NaSh+Tha// tra thA/ ma hA su d+ha ha se he hA/
255b7(rnying rgyud): AM ma hA su ta ta badz+ra gI ti te te/ oM ma hA su ra ta badz+ra ni rti phe pa pheM pa// rdo rje sgeg mo byang chub sems kyi dang // rin chen dpal phyed gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs// las kyi gar mkhan phrin
255b8(rnying rgyud): las rgya mtshos sgrol// A~M su ra to badz+ra me du ga re gum gum/ oM su ra to badz+ra ma ke tang tang / oM su ra to badz+ra sha ra ta a A/ oM su ra to badz+ra shri gan te ho ho// rdo rje bdug pa ma ni byang chub sems nyid 'dod pa'i dang / rdo rje me tog ma ni dkyil
256a1(rnying rgyud): ra gsal bar 'thod/ sa mos pan bral la bar gsal ba dag cang/ dram pa san byang chub sems sacag soso// ngas na ba rtog brtag sra 'drag cas kyang/
256a2(rnying rgyud): gan+d+ha no to/ oM su ra tro badz+ra swAhA// thugs rje'i lhag zhus thugs kyi chung bskul zhing // byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan drangs la// dga' ba'i lo nya lcags sgrog gnas spyod nas// bde gshegs rtog thal mas ni dkyis
256a3(rnying rgyud): pa bskyed// zhes ting nge 'dzin dang mthun par sbyar ro// de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga yis mchod pa 'di skad do// gzugs kyi lha mo'i mchod pa ni/ gzugs mdzes gsal ba'i mya long bsdams// mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi
256a4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'bul// sman gyi mnyes pas dgyes gyur cig/ sgra yi lha mo'i mchod pa ni/ phyag gnyis dbyangs sbyin po wang bsdams// snyan pa'i rol mo'i mdzod pa 'bral// spyan gyi mchod pas minyes kur cig/ dri yi lha mo'i mchod pa
256a5(rnying rgyud): ni// phyag na tshim bred spos bor bsdams// dri mchog sna tshogs mchod pa 'bul// shangs kyi dgyes pas mnyes gyur cig/ ro yi lha mo'i mchod pa ni// ro mchog zhal zas sna tshogs bsdams// bdud rtsi ro mchog snga tshogs kyis/
256a6(rnying rgyud): ljags pa phog pas mnyes gyur cig/ reg gi lha mo'i mchod pa ni// na bza' ba N+Da li ka bsdams// rdo'ang mtshab sil reg bde ba'i// srul gsol bas mnyes gyur cig/ zhes sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas kyang mchod //
256a7(rnying rgyud): nas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa ni/ bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM shri sa marba b+ha dra sarba data thA ga so bshA
256b1(rnying rgyud): pu khe b+h+yaHsarbatar+dz+dza u te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ zhes lta ba yangs par bya'o// de nas bde ba chen po'i mchod pa 'di skad do// bde ba chen po dag la gang gnas pa// rtag pa chen po ljongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// khams gsung
256b2(rnying rgyud): las 'das byang chub rol pa che// ston pas btsal kyang rnyed par ga la 'gyur// thig le chen po ye nas gnas pa la// ye shes snying po 'di las gzhan med do// 'khor ba mya ngan kye shi med pa'i dbyings// bde ba chen po'i ngang la rnam par
256b3(rnying rgyud): rol// oM tsi la bde bas ci la rol// bde mchog de dang mi mnyam bde// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi srid dbyings su mnyam sbar nas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dkyil 'khor rgyal sras bcas pa la// dam
256b4(rnying rgyud): tshig mchod pa 'di 'bul nA// nam mkha'i rdo rje stsal du gsol// sarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM ma hA su kha pu dzi ti ho// de nas 'dus byas kyi mchod pa 'di skad do// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan las thub pa yi// rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs bla re lhab lha ba
256b5(rnying rgyud): dang // bdug spos dri zhim me tog sil ma bkram// bdud rtsi'i dri dang snang gsal sgron mar bcas// lha dang mi yi rol mo sna tshogs dang // glu gar te'u dang tshigs su bcad pas bstod// bza' btung bdud rtsi'i ro mchog rnam mang dang /
256b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun la sogs rdzas// mtshan mchog btsun mo yid du 'ong ba yang // gos dang rgyan dang rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes// thabs ldan rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// bsod nams tshogs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/
256b7(rnying rgyud): de nas bla na med pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ bla med mchog gi mchod pa dag sru ba 'di// ye shes pa yi 'od zer rnam par 'gro// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod mkho dkur ldan// nam mkha'i mtha' klas gter chen 'byung gyur cig/ phung po
257a1(rnying rgyud): bla med rgyal ba ye shes lnga// 'byung ba bla med gsang ba'i yum chen lha// rnam shes yul dus sems dpa' sems mal// mchod pa bla med dus dang rgyan du 'bul// dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar bzhi par mdzod//
257a2(rnying rgyud): de nas rnam par grol ba'i mchod pa 'di skad do// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// sangs rgyas ning yin rnam grol ba'i// 'dzin med chags dang bral ba yis// 'khor ba'i cho sa las kun sgrol ba//
257a3(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod// rtog bral bag chags med pa la// 'di zhes mtshon pa med pa yis// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol// blo chen po dang ldan pa'i bdag/ byang chub nyid de rnam grol ba'i// thabs ldan zol
257a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med don gyi tshangs pa stsol/ de nas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni 'di skad do// ma chags pa yang chags pa med// chags pa la yang ma chags med// bdag med rtogs
257a5(rnying rgyud): pa mya ngan 'das// 'dzin med dbyings la ye shes rol// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// 'phags pa rnams la 'bul gyis bzhes// bu dang zung ma bu mo dang // nor dang dbyig dang sbas pa'i gter// bla ma rnams la 'bul
257a6(rnying rgyud): lags kyis// tshig cad/ rta mchog rgyan gyis brdzun pa dang // dud 'gro glang chen ni shaM dang // 'dab chags la sogs thams cad kyang // 'khor bcas rab 'byams bzhes su gsol// sdug bsngal la yang sdug bsngal med// 'khor ba la
257a7(rnying rgyud): yang 'khor ba med// ma lus bzhes te dgyes mdzod la// 'khor ba'i khre mun stongs par mdzod/ de nas gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// gzugs brten dkyil 'khor
257b1(rnying rgyud): gsal bris te// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms nas// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'brul ba rnams// gnyis med dbyings kyi sbyor ba las// dam tshig thugs dam brtsad dgongs te// gnyis su med par mchod pa 'bul// 'khor
257b2(rnying rgyud): ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis su 'phags pa cang mi gsung // dbyer med rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir// gnyis med mchod pa bzhes su gsol// nyon mongs la sogs dug lnga rnams// thabs mkhas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor te/
257b3(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rol pa las// gnyis med mchod pa bzhes su gsol// mi mnyam 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsal du gsol// de nas mnyam par bzhag pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid sangs
257b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa'i// nga rtog mtshan ma'i spyod yul dang gis med// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun las 'das pa yi// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa rnam par rol// log rtog sgyu mar thos pa'i sems can dang // ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas
257b5(rnying rgyud): kyis// ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam yas kyang // sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// rnam par rtog med dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku// lnga yi nyon mongs drug lnga
257b6(rnying rgyud): rang thaMd kyang // don rtogs gsal ba'i skyes bur gnyis su med// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// rig dang ma rig sgyu ma'i khyad par las// lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la btsal med pas// gnyis med don gyi ngang du
257b7(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i phyir// mnyam par bzhag pa'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya chen por lhun gyis grub// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du/
258a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus ldan gyis grang // bro gar 'du 'phro la sogs pa// 'dzul lam mkha' la 'gro ba sogs// gar yang thogs pa med pa yi// mkha' 'gro chen por ldan gyis grub// s+pharu grags pa ji snyed
258a2(rnying rgyud): dang // cho ga dang yi ge thams cad pa// gsung gi phyag rgyar ldan gyis grub// bza' btung longs spyod thams cad kun// smre dang bdud kyir thams cad grub// chos nyid lhan ne lhang nger gsal// bde chen rgyal por ldan gyi grub// spun
258a3(rnying rgyud): grub mthar phyin mchod pa bzhes// grub pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par mdzod// tshogs chud chen po las/ gyi gzugs kyi mdzad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bskal ba'i mchod pa la yang rnam pa lnga ste/ dang po bskal
258a4(rnying rgyud): 'i rgyu dang / de'i dgongs pa dang / de'i phrin las dang / thugs dam bskul ba dang / zhal du bstab pa'o// de la dang po bskal ba'i rgya la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ gang bskal ba dang / gang gis bskal ba dang / don ched ci'i
258a5(rnying rgyud): phyir bsrel ba dang / ma bskul ba'i spyod no// de la gang bsgral na ning bcur gyur pa 'di bskal te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi srung thar thar pa dang / ngan pa'i ngang dz+wal can la sogs pa badz+ra pa bsal lo// de gang gis bsgral
258a6(rnying rgyud): na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu chen pos lha'i dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med pas bsgral lo// gang du bskal na 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang yum gyi mkha' slod du bsngal lo// dgos ched ci'i phyir bsgral na/ de mnar
258a7(rnying rgyud): med par lhung nges pas/ de mtho ris su 'god pa'i phyir/ thugs rje chen pos bskal lo// de ma bskal ba'i skyon ni/ rdo rje theg pa'i bka' bcag cing / rnal 'byor kyi chos khyod nub nas/ rgyal khams yongs su phung bar 'gyur ba
258b1(rnying rgyud): na mad/ stsal ba 'dun pa pa/ 'du na smras sa pa/ ca sa// na spyad dul/ da pa dang zugs brnyan d+ha rgya na
258b2(rnying rgyud): dang bum tshan dam pa skye rangab ste/ gyi zhes brjod das/ rdo mam stu da'i gtsun na rtsub sa/ gnas pa dag btsun pa rjod napa/ rdod ti ga ba byabs/ zheng gnas su
258b3(rnying rgyud): bcom/ dzakra swAn+ti nas brjod nas/ rin po ni lta ra btub pas rgyal gnas su dag par bcom/ sa rjes brjod nas/ parda khrel brgyab pas 'dod chags gnas su dag par brjom/ tsog hA zhes brjod nas/ ral gyi ga pa'i mchil
258b4(rnying rgyud): dra brtsub pas/ phrag dog gnas su dag par btsam/ rnam par shes pa'i sems me ge nga sgyur/ chu brjid kyil mkhor gyi steng du ldan// 'on tu ma kyim 'khor gyis btegs/ yab sum stong ba'i mtshams su grangs
258b5(rnying rgyud): sbrul tshigasngags dpya'i zag rngu ba ni lang bsom byas nas// khyod ni rgal ba'i sras su 'gyur// sems can rjod kyi gsang bar// yi gi ti ga gnas pa ni// dmyal ba dzub sreg gnas med te// bco bsreg gnas su khyod me gtang / tis
258b6(rnying rgyud): byag cig bzlos/ na sa/ tshig 'tsho dulas// dan yod 'a'abyanal pa / ga kya dang dbang bcom// thal mam sa chub pa ra// bcwom sa nas kyin ma rnas gas
258b7(rnying rgyud): 'dis kyang myong ba'i las / gnan mang phrin las rnapa pa'i dang // la grags can pam ga nams rgyas// war dang sru ni rnams pa cig/ dengs thugs dam dud bskul ba di /
259a1(rnying rgyud): hArmA// da na thul na spangs pa bang // gcig chogadrug pam lus 'bral ba'i phyir// thugs rjeman pos rtsol ba'i nan lngas mdad// 'bar bya dkyil 'khor gnal mthong ba ni// sren pa ras che zang zad/
259a2(rnying rgyud): dbyangs dang gar// chos kyi dri mchog me tog ma me che// rje mdzad dz+wa la hUM ste ba nas su gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen badz+ra he hral// bsngal ba'i zhing bcu'i rnam shes mchod pa 'bul// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam paskang bur dang /
259a3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dngos grub stsal dra gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen prad+ha ha~M rul// bsgral ba'i gzugs kyi phung po mchod pa 'bul// de bzhin rigs kyi thugs dam bskar gyur na// / sgra yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// btsa
259a4(rnying rgyud): ldan dpal chen rat+na he rul// bskal ba'i tshor ba'i phung po mchod pa 'bul// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur nas// yon tan dngos grub dus 'dir yul du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he rul// bskal pa'i 'dra
259a5(rnying rgyud): shes phung po mchod pa 'bral// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur nas// gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he ru la// bsgral ba'i 'du byed phung po mchod pa 'bul// las kyi rigs
259a6(rnying rgyud): kyi thugs dam bskang thar nas// phrin las dngos grub dus 'dir stsal du gsol// yum chen kro d+hi shwa rI la// bskal ba'i bzag dang mdangs kyi mchod pa 'bul// rdo rje dbyings phyu gzugs dam bskang gyur nas// mkha' la
259a7(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyag dngas thab stsal du gsol// yum chen bud+ha kro tI shwa rI la// bskal ba'i sha dang rus pa'i mchod pa 'bral// bud+d+ha yum chen thugs dam bskrang gyur nas// yumatshon kro d+ha'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// yum ched
259b1(rnying rgyud): pa d+hA shA pa// daphrul ba'i thag dang cul mchad pa 'thal// radrab ti thugs nas bas sa nas// dan mang byangs rgya ga dngas thab sal drags la// tham sa nga btu gnas// bskal na 'dzud na ma nga/
259b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'bul// pad+ma yum chen thugs dam bskang gyur nas// pyad+ma dbyings phyag dngos grub stsal du gsol// yum chen kam gro d+hI shwa rI la// bskal ba'i dbugs dang rlung gis mchod pa 'bul// ka mtsho d+hI'i thugs dam bskar thu
259b3(rnying rgyud): nas// las kyi dbyings phyag dngos grub stsal du gsol// kau ri la sogs khro mo brgyad rnams la// bsgral ba'i rnam shes brgyad kyi mchod pa 'bul// khro mo brgyad kyi thugs dam bskrad gyur nas// stong pa brgyad kyi dngos grub
259b4(rnying rgyud): stsal du gsol// seng ha la sogs phra men brgyad rnams la// bsgral ba'i dur khrod brgyad kyi mchod pa 'bul// mgo brnyan brgyad kyi thugs dam bskrar gyur nas// grub pa'i gnas brgyad dngos grub sbrul du gsol// rta gdong
259b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs sgo ma bzhi rnams la// bsgral ba'i yan lag bzhi yi mchod pa 'bul// sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dam bskang gyur nas// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// dbang phyug khrag 'thung nyi shu brgyad rnams la//
259b6(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba'i sgal tshigs nyer brgyad mchod pa 'bul// dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // bcol ba'i 'bras bu mchis pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma bdun srid bzhi gsang ba'i yum chen la// bsgral pa'i glo snying
259b7(rnying rgyud): pho mchin nang rol dang // mkhris pa mkhal ma la sogs 'bul// thugs dam gnyen bskang dngos grub stsal du gsol// pho nya sum brgya drug cu la// bsgral ba'i rus pa sum brgya drug cu rnams// pheM he'i tshogs rnams mchod 'bul
260a1(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang // pho nya rkang mgyogs dngos grub yul du gsol// rdo rje ging chen ka ta shing mchog bcwo brgyad la// bsngal ba'i rtsib ma bcwo brgyad mchod pa 'bral// ging chen thugs dam bskang ste dngos grub
260a2(rnying rgyud): stsol// de nas zhal du bstab pa 'di skad do// bstab po kha raM zhal phyes shig/ 'bar ba chen po zhal phyes shig/ rnam rtog ma lus zhal du bstab// dbu dang phyag mang nal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs ma lus zhal du bstag// zhing gsol chas brgyad zhal
260a3(rnying rgyud): phyes shig/ bar du gcod pa zhal du bstab// sha za khrag 'thung zhal phyes shig/ bsgral ba'i zhing bzhi zhal du bstab// rngam byed ma lus zhal phyes shig/ bdud dang srin po bar gcod byed pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon spu dgra rnams// ma lus bzhes
260a4(rnying rgyud): te rol par mdzod// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med// 'dod chags mchod pa bzhes su gsol// gsung gi dngos thub stsal du gsol// 'byung po'i rnas pa ma rabs nim// zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med// zhe
260a5(rnying rgyud): snang mchod pa 'di bzhes la// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// gti mug mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sgra yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma hA rak+Sha ma hA mAM sa ma hA kiM ni ri ti kha
260a6(rnying rgyud): raM khA hi/ tshogs rgyud chen po rdzogs so// de nas gsang ba thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyi mchod pa la yang don rnam pa lha ste// gzungs ma byin gyis brlab pa dang // gnyis su med par sbyor ba dang // gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams
260a7(rnying rgyud): cad dbang bskur te gnas spang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang / byang chub sems rdo rje'i lce yis dngos grung blang ba dang lnga'o// de la dang po gzungs ma byin gyis brlab pa ni// gzungs ma nyid yum shes
260b1(rnying rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du/ dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bzhug gnas gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs la/ gsang ba'i mkha' la dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshang bar gsal bar bsgom pa dang / gnas lngar yi ge dpa' ro 'bru lnga las/
260b2(rnying rgyud): rigs lngar gyur pa dang / gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i bskor bar byin gyis brlab pa'o// de nas gnyis su med par sbyong ba ni/ dang po spyan gyis brda zhig mdzad de/ 'di skad bskul lo// mtshan mchog brgyan pa'i yum mchog shes rab spyan/ shes rab don
260b3(rnying rgyud): gyi brgyan pa'i thugs dam bsngal/ mi dmigs snying rje thams cad yangs la snyoms/ thabs dang shes rab tshul khrims kyis/ sa ma ya sta ma zhes bskul ba dang / yum gyis yab la 'di skad ces bskul lo// thabs la mkhas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa'i gtso//
260b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba ma spangs gnas su dag pa la/ 'phags pa rnams la dgyes pa'i thugs dam bsgral/ bde ba chen po'i mchod pa rgyan du gzhes/ se ma ya hUM zhes bskul bas/ yab kyi phyag rgya chen po bzhis mnyam par sbyar/ hUM las gsang ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga par bsgom/
260b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i rwa lnga la rigs lnga'i snying po 'god/ yum gyi mkha' pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la yum gyi snying po 'god/ pra be sha phaT kyis sgo phyes/ su ra to s+t+waM gyis bskul bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa gcig tu bltas te/ mnyes pa chen po'i thugs dar bskang/
260b6(rnying rgyud): na dbyings dang ye shes/ rtags thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub bo// de nas gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas spar te dbang bskur ba ni/ nam mkhas gang nas gang du khyab par chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gang nas gang
260b7(rnying rgyud): du khyab par/ yum gyi mkha' klong rnam par dag pas khyab pas/ snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad yab yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'i nang na/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems me mar rlung gis ma bskyod pa
261a1(rnying rgyud): gnas / nan na / su sa smras
261a2(rnying rgyud): ngas dpa tham bachang ba mas su / sa cad bams dpal ba mas pa shasadangs sa/ chub nas nga chung chub mer pa nyid pa sacan/
261a3(rnying rgyud): dbang gyisarnapas 'byang chubapongs su mamed pa 'ja' na/ ma nga lung can gyi ba dgapa/ med pa bapas cig rgyas gtu ma pa rjod pa / dbyas pa'ing po bas ces mas nas/ nga zu rjem byar byam
261a4(rnying rgyud): par rang ni// nganas kyi chub kyims nas das tha ba dkyil bang ba sus cang yang ma gnyisas med pa spyo du ngas du pa bgapas padag gi na mtham mas dang rjes te/
261a5(rnying rgyud): nas sa/ ladzim pas mi zhus sa las dang sa chu dag pa gyu/ na med pa'i ga // rdzogs sabs
261a6(rnying rgyud): yin pasum pa can pan gsum dung bral bar gyun/ nga gis byas pa bral ba bya'o/ dmas bya dang 'dri ma ni la byed sa ba sa sol pa dang / da thab par

262a2(rnying rgyud): dang / mthong deng thos pa dang / bstan cing rtogs pa 'di dag thams cad/ ye nas ma g.yos shing / bcos pa med pa'i chos nyid la// snang ba ni lha dang lha mo'i sgra gsung thugs/ phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du spang la/ mi sngar nang
262a3(rnying rgyud): po dang mtshan ma dang / gzung 'dzin dang ga chang du'i snang ba phyid pa/ yod na ni sems kyi ye shes gsalang da rmings par sangs rgyas par yod la/ med ni gnyis su spang ba dang / rtogs dang ris su phye ba med pa yin pa/ rosan thab med pa
262a4(rnying rgyud): rab dbying dang ye shes dga' ba dang bde ba'i longs spyod chen por rol pa yin la/ mi rol na chos nyid mnyam nyid kyi ngad la/ gang ma yang ma chags gang pa yang mi 'dzin/ gang la yang mi gnas pa yin pas/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis s+ho pa'i gas

262a6(rnying rgyud): zlab pa med pa la/ 'og pa dang mkhrul pa'i bang gis sa ma lda rnyed snang ba martsoms pas napa nga / bya rig pa tu dang shes 'a pa'i rtag pa nar 'thabs pas/ shem tho sa brgyab pa // rtogs pa
262a7(rnying rgyud): gis las sna tshogs yang snang ba // tan mongs pa'i dbang gis pa byed pa tshogs par blang bar byar // byin cing ga gi dang gis nong ba tshogs su gyur te// 'jal pa'i dbang ges rgya 'bras thogs pa da to/ sagyis sa
262b1(rnying rgyud): las kyi dbang gis nyon mongs shing myang ba sna tshogs su gyur to// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khrul pa la las rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig mi 'da' ba'i chos nyid la/ 'da' bar byar med pa la/ rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa la mi rigs shing 'dang ba'i
262b2(rnying rgyud): las byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yid du mi 'ong ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba la sogs par sdug bsngal sna tshogs las nam yang thar pa'i dus med par skyes pa dang / 'khrul pa la las 'dod pa dang /
262b3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod la chags pa'i dbang gis mchod pa dang rgyu rkyen la sogs pa rnams la/ brkam chags sna tshogs par spyad pa'i dbang gis/ yi dwags la sogs pa'i gnas su yun ring bar 'khod pa dang / 'khrul pa la las gti mug gi dbang gis/ de bzhin gshegs
262b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku la thug thub tu spyad pa dang / thams cad ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis bab col du gyur pas/ byol song la sogs pa'i gnas su skyes nas/ de las 'chi na yang slar lus de nyid len cing bskal pa yun ring bar gnas pa dang / de bzhin du mi dang lha dang lha ma
262b5(rnying rgyud): yin la sogs pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa nyams su myong zhing 'khor ro// 'khrul pa la las bstan cing bsgrag pa dang / bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya ba rnams ni/ bdag gis ma rtogs shing
262b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan la ma khrol bar byas/ gsang zhing sba ba dang thabs kyis spyod pa rnams ni/ bdag gi ngo mthon dang gsang mtshams med par spyad la/ gzhan la yang de ltar bstan cing de bzhin du bsgom ste/ lta bas mchod pa thams cad la bsgom pa dang //

263b1(rnying rgyud): dang gzhan dngos su 'thab pa dang / skyon dang zol la sogs pa bshams nas/ 'khrug pa dang gsod pa la sogs pa byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyis mi rtag pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i don mi shes pas/ mi chos kyi blon po lta bu dang / 'du 'dzig yeng ba spyod

263b3(rnying rgyud): med par gnad du btsugs nas/ log pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsham pa dang / log pa dang sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs par spyad pa'i dbang gis/ yongs kyis dpya smra bar gyur nas/ kun kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi bde ba rnam pa sna
263b4(rnying rgyud): tshog pa nyams su myong nas/ bsgrub pa la don med cing tshus ma yin par tshe zad nas/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba'i yod gting du skye bar 'gyur ro// nam yang 'thon pa'i dus med pa yin no// phal pa rnams dang slob ma rnams
263b5(rnying rgyud): kyis sna drangs nas/ mnar med pa ma gtogs pa yan chad nas/ nyi tshe ba man chad du bskal pa du ma zhig gi bar du sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ de las thar nas byol song dang yi dwags kyi gnas su skye na yang / sngon gsang sngags spyod tsa nas/
263b6(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang gi dbang gis mgo lus mang bar bsgoms pa'i kha mig mgo lus mang bar skyes nas/ der yang sdug bsngal shas cig nyams su myong nas/ de nas thar nas skyen yang thar pa'i sgo lho nub pas/ gnas kyang lho nub mtshams bur khrod ka rangs zhes
263b7(rnying rgyud): bya bar skyes/ da dngos por 'dzin dbang gis lho nub mtshams de yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gnas/ tha ma grong khyer gyis bskor ba/ phyi mtha' dur khrod kyi tshogs med par gnas pa'i yul du skyes/ de la gnas pa de la yang rang rgyud kyi gnas
264a1(rnying rgyud): yin te khro bo'i las dbang gi sdang ba'o// de lta bu'i dbus sun/ sngon gsang sngags kyi don spyod tsan/ dngos po la brtag par 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas/ rba num pa gsum gyi bdag po dbus na gnas pa de/ sngon dngos po
264a2(rnying rgyud): yod pa la che bar bsgoms pa'i dbang gis/ lus ri rab tsam la/ sdig pa'i las sngon du thal zhing / bsod nams kyi las phyir lus pas/ mdog kyang thal mdog sngo sbyar 'dug pa/ nyon mongs pa drug gsum gyi rtsa ba las/ nyon mongs pa bsamachis
264a3(rnying rgyud): mi khyab par sngon spyad pa'i mthus/ lag na yang mdung rtse gsum pa la sogs te/ mtshon za bsam gyis mi khyab pa thogs pa/ sngon nyon mongs pa thags pa che ba'i 'khor dang smon lam mthun pas/ de'i 'khor yang shar gti mug che ba dri za'i srin po/
264a4(rnying rgyud): ngargyal che ba gshin rje'i srin po/ nub 'dod chags che ba klu'i srin po/ byang phrag dog che ba gnod sbyin srin po/ de rnams kyang chos nyid la cho ga shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin med pas/ kun kyang sems can mang po zos 'chos kyang skem pa la srid pa rtsa chus srab/

264b3(rnying rgyud): cad du/ srin mo nad gtong ma bcu dang / lcags kyi tiSh+Tha sprul pa bzhi pa sogs pa btang ste/ dang po dud 'gro'i gnas bzhi la/ nang sna tshogs dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs btang ste zos/ de nas gling bzhi'i mi zos/ de bzhin du 'dod khams dang / gzugs
264b4(rnying rgyud): dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ril dbang du sdus shing zos te/ thams cad du gsod pa dang / sbyor ba'i las mtha' dag gtsor spyod cing / 'bras bu ngan song gsum dang mnar med pa'i las sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa la/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings nas/

265b6(rnying rgyud): ci mi gtang bar ba ba la/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis mthul thams/ byang chub sems dpa' sman sa gzigs dbang rgyag gis/ bo mo ta mdog dmar ba lag par du srin kyi rgya la mtshan rdzogs par sprul te/ de dang spyod pa cha brnyan ning rigs

266a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa la/ yang shes kyang mjal ba las/ thang na mas dpa' bya na ngas/ rnam pa g.yas dajug pan byas pa pa 'a stsal nas/ gangam bzhin du banan na// zan pa thal shang rnam thams nas/ dru dza
266a2(rnying rgyud): 'dren byed ces bya ba na/ srin mo nad khrol 'dren ma zhes bya bas sems can thams cad bsad nas nar khrol dang d+ha ma sha khrag rlon par za ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ khro mo muk+ka sIr sprul nas/ yang gong ma bzhin du bzhag go// srin po'i yul gyi

266a5(rnying rgyud): zab la/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ khro mo swa sha rI sprul nas btul te/ yang de bzhin du bdag go// srin po'i yul gyi byang shar mtshams na/ ngur khrod chen po ga pa la na/ srin mo sgron ma zhes bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo lnga
