266a7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i yul na/ srin mo mgo brtan ma 'joms byed chen mo seng ge'i mgo can/ sems can thams cad kha long du blang nas/ spug cing ril med par byed pa la/ thabs cis kyang mthul ba las/ lha mo lA byams tha men ma sing ta mar sprul te/ de dang
266b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas brtul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don du bran dang yang bran dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu dbang byin te bzhag go// lho phyogs gshin rje'i yul na/ srin mo phra men za byed stag mgo ma/ lag pa
266b2(rnying rgyud): bsnol nas ba ma chen po la 'bru tshugs su blta ba la/ lha mo mA le mas pra men ma stag mgo can du sul nas btul te/ de bzhin du bdag go// drab phyogs klu'i yul na srin po bra men ma len byed ma zhes bya ba/ wa'i mgo can ma dpa' tshang ba rgyad khri ba ni sto
266b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ bam chen mo dra tshor nas len par byed pa la/ lha mo pUr ti mas spel mu khar yul te btul nas/ de bzhin du bzhag go// srin mo bre men mang ngo ma zhes kyang / byung zlog sumanod sbyin gyi yul na/ khyi'i mgo can pa marten po la 'drad kyang zab la/
266b4(rnying rgyud): sgyum ni hrIms/ bla men mi shAn mra khang sgra la dus/ de bzhin N+Dal te banag no// yang shar lci'i mtshams drang srong gi srul na/ srin mos men ma thag 'byung sa/ rgyanod kyi mgo na thong zag 'thung ba la/ lha maN+Da be mas pat+ta mu khang phul nas bdus
266b5(rnying rgyud): te bzhag go// lho nub na rje rje'i yul na/ srin mo phra min ma rkang tha ba zlas b+ha / bya kat+ta'i mgo can pab mchen po phrag la khrur nas/ sha dang wAg dang rkang dang tshol bu zab pa/ lha mo badz+ra ng+ga rnams tha men dur bya'i mgo can mar sbal nas btul te bdags
266b6(rnying rgyud): nub byang rig sngags 'chang ba'i yul na/ srin mo za men ma 'joms byed ma thu rog gi mgo can/ lag na thi ka ma la thogs nas/ bam chen po'i mgo bcad pazlogs shing zab la/ lha mo mer sems/ kA ka mu khar stsal nas paN+Dal te bdag go//
266b7(rnying rgyud): geng byung po mang po'i phral na/ srin mo phra min ma sprul byed mjug pa'i mdo / grags byed srod khrag rdzogs nas/ mkhyen thas po d+ha badrub las/ lha mo dri ma 'ams A la mkhar sprul nas babral te/ deponan du bzhag so//

272b7(rnying rgyud): ma'adim 'thun ma dang / rlon tshun pa bcwa sa kyang / rnam tsharnams ma yi bye dang / zlar chen pa mar rig nang / tha mtshan mang bang blar ba dang / rdza ba chen po brda 'ba' ta dang / khrob ched mdo rje zag mo dang /
273a1(rnying rgyud): po su su d+ha kar dang / khro mo 'bar 'jig ma dang / khro ba chen po shrI sa ta kA la dang / khrom tshan mo ral ba 'greng ma dang / slob ma 'chi thabs sbyar dang / khrum 'joms byang chen ma dang / zla ba chen pa las thams cad pa dang /
273a2(rnying rgyud): khro mo las kun grub ma dang / khri ba chen po dang rnams dang / khromatshan mo gtum ma dang / nani po 'jig rten gsam sdang dang // khyimachen mo me 'am ma dang / bo chen po 'dzi zhen gsum 'dral dang / rje mo chen mo thugs kyum dang /
273a3(rnying rgyud): chen po 'jig rtenags ma 'dzag dang / khro mo chen mo khro gnyer ma dang / khrob chen po 'jig rten gsum 'chi dang / wa mtsha mo legs pa ma dang // the bo chen po pad+ma rdul dang / khro mo chen mo ri lang sa ma dang / khro ba chen po btson stan po dang / ma
273a4(rnying rgyud): chen ma lugs zlog ma dang // tho ba chen po ga ne badz+ra dang / khro mo chen po ral gcig med de/ khro bo chen po rda rnga go rba dang / khro mtshan mo dril bri ma dang / tshwa ba chen po rngam chen dang / khro mo chen mo dbang spad ma dang / khro ba chen po rdo rje tho ba dang /
273a5(rnying rgyud): khro mo chen mo za byad ma dang drug cu rnams kyang / yang sbrul mgro brtan dang / phra men ma dang / phra thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshag drug cu gab nas 'brengs pas/ srin po dbus kyi pho nya dang / snying gi mo nya srin pa po ma drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ nga rnams
273a6(rnying rgyud): btul nas bran dang yang bran dbang sbyin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bko dang / dam byin dbang log sa bzhag go// de nas mtha' dang tha 'og med pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rtags 'ang mthong nag las/ bse ma po drug
273a7(rnying rgyud): dang gsung dang drugs rnarna las byung ngo // mA ma hA mar+d+ha T+Ta/ zhes drug gralas ma mo zad mngal po gcig mdang / sbas pa'i mamo can mo dang / drang phrad tshogs kyi ma ma dang / za byed rngam pa'i mamathad mdang / khams gsung spang ba'i la mo za mo dang
273b1(rnying rgyud): chu drug sgrol ba'i ma mo dang / sred gsum za ba'i ma mo chen mo dang / yongs pa dbang bskur ba'am mtshan mo dang / mthung brang bskyod du med pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / sha khrag gsung la dga' ba ma mtshan mo dang / nang khrol gro snying 'byin pa'i ma mo chen mo dang /
273b2(rnying rgyud): zabyed cha srog 'phrog pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / rngam chen mchod la dga' ba'i ma mo chen mo da / 'dzin byed zhal du stob pa'i ma mthon mo dang / bgegs chen snying la 'debs pa ma mo chen mo dang / zhing bcu gtan nas len pa'i ma mo dang / dmanyams
273b3(rnying rgyud): stesnying la 'debs pa'i ma mo dang / 'byung po sgrol ba'i ma mo dang / gshin rje grol ba'i ma mo chen mo dang / gru sgrol ba'i ma mo dang / gnod sbyin sgrol ba'i ma mo dang / srin po grol ba'i ma mo dang / srin mo sgrol ba'i mamo dang / bzang chen len
273b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma mo dang / khrag 'thung ba'i ma me dang / drod 'phrog pa'i ma mo dang / dbugs len pa'i ma mo dang / srog 'phrog pa'i ma mo dang / mdangs 'jib pa'i ma mo dang / bya nod mgo'i ma mo dang / khrag skrag ma'i mame dar/ chu srin
273b5(rnying rgyud): ma mo dang / dur khrod rgyan gyi ma mo dang / rdo rje gar gyi ma mo dang / pad+ma gang gyi ma mo dang / sa bdag dbang phyug ma mo da'/ ri rab rtse nas bsnyil ba'i ma mo dang / rgya mtsho'i gting nas skem pa'i ma mo dang / rdo rje tho ba'i ma mo dang / rdo rje gtan
273b6(rnying rgyud): ljang gi mamo dang / rdo rje drar khrod bdag gi ma mo dang / rdo rje 'degs pa mo'i ma mo dang / rdo rje gsal bkra ma'i ma mo dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung ma'i ma mo dang // ri lung dre'u zhon pa'i ma mo dang / dus bzhi'i rgyal mo 'joms pa'i ma mo dang /
273b7(rnying rgyud): khye sbyang gcan du skul pa'i ma mo dang / stag dom jed ltar rdza ba'i ma mo dang / 'dzam byed khwa ltar lding ba'i ma mo dang / ri thung med par khebs pa'i ma mo dang / ngal drab med par chug pa'i ma mo dang / gtsang sde ma dbang smral
274a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i ma mo dang // ya byin ral dkar mchod pa'i ma mo dang // bse byin rgyal mo che yi ma mo dang // phag byin thogs pa med pa'i ma mo dang // de byin grub pa mo si ma mo dang // cha srog kun la dbang phyur ma mo dang // g.yang
274a2(rnying rgyud): ri gangs la brten pa'i ma mo dang // 'brog srin skyes pa 'dul ba'i ma mo dang // khro tshig myur bar brtson pa'i ma mo dang // drug cu rnams ni yang sbrul bud med brda' ma 'phrod pa/ pa Ni tshe ba bzlog dka' ba/ 'khor drug cu drug cur 'brengs pa/
274a3(rnying rgyud): srin po'i mgo dang mtha'i pho nya byed pa'i srin mo drug cu dang cha lugs mthun par byas te/ srin mo rnams la spras pa/ khyod la sogs pa ni srin po'i pho nya byed cing sems can thams cad bkug bci' bsgral nas/ sha khrag dras pa za zhing 'dug pa de don ched kyi yod
274a4(rnying rgyud): gas pa dang ldaH/ sa smras pa sa srid ma rnams kyis smras te/ bdug cig ga 'i 'dzid d+ha che na ba ga khams gsum dbang btu bas pa dbang thamaH/ sems can thams cad dkrig cing bsgram sa/
274a5(rnying rgyud): dang rtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so// grogs mo dag rtogs pa deng don ci mchis/ ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ bdag dang gzhan bsgral nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por 'don pa'o// srin
274a6(rnying rgyud): mo rnams kyis smras pa/ rtogs pa dang don ched de lta bu ldan pa e ma a la la ho// bdag cag rnams la de ma 'tshal ba yang 'gyod na/ deng rung rtogs pa ma 'byongs shing / 'jig rten cha la brten pas 'tshal ba ma mchis so// ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/
274a7(rnying rgyud): de'i chal ba yang ma mchis la/ rtogs pa dang don ched du ldan pa byos shig/ gang zag dge bcu dang ldan pa dang / rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig bsrung ba ma gtogs so// dam tshig dag dang mi ldan zhing de dag nyams pa rnams ni yud kyis mi bsrel du
274b1(rnying rgyud): mi rung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nas ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu gsog cing / mnar med par 'gro bas de dag rtogs pa dang snying rjer ldan pas bsgral la/ bdag nyid chen por longs spyod par bya'o// zhes smras pa dang / srin mo thams cad
274b2(rnying rgyud): dga' ches te/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam mnos bri bor te/ brane dang yang than dang khol dang yang khol dang yang g.yog tu byin te/ phyi'i dam tshig dkar po'i 'khor bsrung ba dang / nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig gi don bsgrub pa dang / bcom
274b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal chen po'i bka' bsrung zhing / rang gi dam tshig las mi 'da' bar zhal gyis 'chos/ g.yar gyis blangs te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don du/ pho nya sum brgya drug cur mtshan
274b4(rnying rgyud): tags te bzhag go// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams na/ srin po'i pho nya mo srin mo chen mo nang gtong zhing sha za ba bdun la/ srin mo chen mo brkam ma dang / srin mo chen mo rab tu brkam ma dang / srin mo chen mo dri ma 'don pa dang / srin mo chan
274b5(rnying rgyud): mo phor 'ogs dang / srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma dang / srin mo chen mo skul byed ma dang / srin mo chen mo myos byed ma dang bdun gyis nad dang rims rnam pa sna tshogs pa btang ste/ sems can ril kha 'dogs pa las/ dpal chen po'i thugs
274b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi sprul pa las/ yi ge hUM bdun byung / yi ge hU~M bdun las/ gsang ba'i ma bdun byung ste/ rdo rje hU~M grags ma dang / rdo rje kun gsal ma dang / rdo rje kun bzang mo dang / rdo rje chen mo ye shes mchog dang / rdo rje 'od chags ma dang / rdo rje 'od
274b7(rnying rgyud): gsal ma dang / rdo rje g.yu smon ral gcig ma dang bdun gyis/ de rnams dang spyod pa mthun par sprul te/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa btang ste/ btang tsam na btang ba'i ngo bo ci yang med par sems can mang po bsang la bsad pa tsam na bsad pa'i ri bo ci yang med par
275a1(rnying rgyud): byas te/ srin mo rnams kyis mthu zil gyis mnan nas/ srin mo rnams la smras pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams nang rnam pa sna tshogs pa gtong zhing / sems can rnams kyis sha khrag la brkam pa de/ las ci'i dbang gi rtsa ba yin/
275a2(rnying rgyud): sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas su bskal pa dpag tu med par mi lhung ngam/ srin mo bdun gyis smras pa/ bdag ca ka rnams ni dang po pha dang mas zas su sems can thams cad kyi sha khrag bskos la/ lag char nad kyi rgyal ba gtang ba las/ sems
275a3(rnying rgyud): can dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i don ma rig go// grogs mo dag 'di ltar spyod pa'i don dang gtan tshigs ci mchis/ ma mo bdun gyis smras pa/ kho mo cag ni don chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las gnas pas/ dug dang bdud rtsir dbyer med pa la/ 'khrul pas byin
275a4(rnying rgyud): mag ga lamadu'i pas sems can myal bar blangs pa de dani n-i ba sa dang ste rtsA pas/ 'khor ba dang ma dzum ga ta 'duldan med pa'imams pa ma/ log pa'i samadu bstan pa ma yin no zhes smras pa dang / min mo rnams 'jigs
275a5(rnying rgyud): skrag nas/ 'di skad smras so// e ma'o gti mug rang dbang gis// ngan song gsum du skye nges pas/ skyob pa'i thugs ni ci zhig mnga'// 'di la skyob pa'i mthu mnga' na// bka' nyan dam nod 'bangs su mi chi// 'tshal ba'i zas skal ga dra la bgyi//
275a6(rnying rgyud): 'dren pa khyod kyis bshad du gsol// ma bdun gyis smras pa/ sngar nyes pa dran pa rnams kyang rjes su 'gyod pa legs so// slan chad kyang de lta bu bab tshol mi byed par dam du chos la slan chad kyang sdom par zung zhig/ khyed kyi zas
275a7(rnying rgyud): skal ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ston naso// dkar po ma phyogs dang / de ma la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// nag po'i phyogs dang dmal mi gnas shi / zhing bcur gyur pa'i brnag pa de kho na rnams bsngos so// zhes pa dang / srin mo
275b1(rnying rgyud): rnams rab tu dga' mgu yi rang ste/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam mnos te/ bAn dang yang bAn du mna' bor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang / 'khor skyong bar bzhag go// i ti/ gu h+yas ma ma rdzogs so//
275b2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bdud kyi gleng gzhi la/ shar phyogs kyi gling na dri za'i mgyogs ma dang / lho gshin rje'i mgyogs ma dang / nub klu'i mgyogs ma dang / byang gnod sbyin gyi mgyogs ma dang bzhis srin po'i gsang ba'i gzungs ma bzhir byas te/ shin tu
275b3(rnying rgyud): yang chags pa rang ga mas sems can thams cad yid bslu zhing chags pa'i dbang gis srog dang 'bral bar byed pa las/ dpal chen po'i thugs gsang ba'i yum dkar mo mig gcig rgyas 'debs ma dang / bde ba rmongs byed ma dang / bde ba za byed
275b4(rnying rgyud): ma dang / bde ba tshe 'phel ma dang bzhis/ de rnams dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas/ mthu dpung zil gyis mnan nas btul te/ de rnams la smras pa/ khyed rnams chags pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi yid bslu zhing srog dang
275b5(rnying rgyud): 'bral bar byed pa des ngan song gsum gyi gnas su skyo bar mi 'gyur ram zhes smras pa dang / mgyogs ma bzhis smras pa/ grogs mo dag de ltar byed pa ci lags/ yum bzhis smras pa/ kho mo cag ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don la chags
275b6(rnying rgyud): tsam na/ chags pa med pa mthar phyin pas nyon mongs pa dang gzung 'dzin la 'chel ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi srog dang 'bral ba yin no zhes smras pas de bzhin du ngo mtshar du gyur nas de bzhin du bgyid lags pas/ bdag cag rnams la de'i dbye ba dang
275b7(rnying rgyud): rim pa gang lags pa bka' stsal du gsol/ yum bzhis smras pa/ chags par bya ba'i yul ni ye shes kyi dbyingam rtogs pa des/ ma dang sring mo dang bu mo la sogs pa gang la yang mi rtog cing / rtog pa med pa'i chos nyid du mkhyen pa las ma gtogs
276a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ phal ba rnams ni thugs par bya ba'i yul ma yin la/ 'khor ba las bkru ba'i chags pa'i yum ni/ ma rig phu phal pa yid dang mthun par bya zhing / chags pa med pa dang / srog dang 'bral ba yarang / gangs
276a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bstan pa la dang pa'i dge ba'i phyogs dang / dam tshig la gnas shing bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi spyan dang ming sring yin pas brtse gdung dang mi 'bral ba'i srog gi lca gu rgyud byas pa las/ de rnams la srog gi bar cha
276a3(rnying rgyud): TI smos kyi/ de'i bka' las zur tsam yang 'gal na/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur nas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de la srog dang mi 'bral du mi rung ba gang zhe na/ sdig pa'i phyogs la brten pa dang / dam la mi gnas
276a4(rnying rgyud): mi bsrung ba dang / de dag mnos nas nyams par gyur pa la ne/ srog dang me dz+wal na ngan song dang mi khom pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur bas/ ngam 'di bzhin du gnas shing dmang longs shig/ de rnams kyis dmong btsugs pa/
276a5(rnying rgyud): pa bkra' dang dam la gnas pa rnams ni bdag cag gisra bsgob pa rtsi zhing gdung ba sre zhu'i tshogs bgyid de/ bka' dang dam las 'gal ba rnams srog dang 'bral bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du ma bgyis na bdag cag rnams kyi lus srog tshig par
276a6(rnying rgyud): gyur cig ces dam bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje theg pa'i bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba dang / 'khor bsrung bar dbang byin te/ sring mo bzhed ming btags te bzhag go// de nas yang srin po'i 'khor las kyi gling bco brgyang la/ 'dung
276a7(rnying rgyud): lci yor dzam dang / bdud lha gar gyi dbang phyug dang / bdud mo bcu byin kun dga'i mdang / tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can dang/ gnams gnyis kyi bdag po dbang drug chen po'i las mkhan dang / ma bdud rgya mo dang /
276b1(rnying rgyud): dmu bdud rnams pa dang / tshangs pa'i rtse'u brang dang / 'brog sring mgo dgu dang / shar phyogs nas khams gsum gyi bdag po dang / sprin gyi sgron ma dang / rnga d+ha ma chu dang / bin+da yag dang / lha ma nag mo dang / nam g+ha dang / gshin rje'i
276b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo mig pa mgo dang / shel gyi srog bdag la sogs pa bco brgyad kyis/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad sgrol ba 'ba' zhig byed pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen zhal bzhad pa'i sprul pa las/ rdo rje'i ging bso brkyang du
276b3(rnying rgyud): sprul te/ de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ dpa' bo chen po las rnams kun byed pa dang / khro mo chen mo khams gsum dbang snang ma dang / rdo rje ging kar dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje lcang ki dang / rdo rje gishin rje dang / rdo rje rol pa dang / rdo rje
276b4(rnying rgyud): bdag dang / rdo rje dus mtshams dang / rdo rje ro langs dang / rdo rje 'joms ma dang / dbang spyad lcags kyus 'dren pa chen mo dang / khams gsum g.yab mos 'debs pa chen mo dang / gzugs med rlung ltar gyur pa chen mo dang / gar gyi glog ltar
276b5(rnying rgyud): skyur ba chen mo dang / rgong gtong len par byed pa chen mo dang / rna nyan phra ma zer ba chen mo dang / srid gsum sgrol bar byed pa chen mo dang / za byed chen mo ma de bcwo brgyad du sprul nas/ de rnams dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas te bgegs bco brgyad po la smras
276b6(rnying rgyud): pa/ khyod la sogs pa rnams sems can thams cad kyi sgrol ba'i gang 'ba' zhig byed pa don ched ci yod/ thabs ci yod/ snying rje ci dang ldan/ ngan song gsum du mi skye'am// zhes pa dang / bgegs rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams ni sngon nas
276b7(rnying rgyud): pha mas sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ging gyis shig par dbang bsrung ba las/ thabs dang snying rje ma mchis so// grogs po dag thabs dang snying rje ci dang ldan/ ngan song gsum zhes pa ci lta bu zhes zer ba dang / ging rnams kyis spras pa/ de lta
277a1(rnying rgyud): bu'i nyon mongs pa dang / gdol pa can ni shin tu 'khrul pa ste/ don ched ni sems can ma rig pa rnams rig par bya ba dang / rtogs pa can rnams sun dbyung ba'i don ched yin la/ snying rje ni ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis
277a2(rnying rgyud): log pa'i phyogs mtha' dag byas pas shin tu sdug bsngal ya nga'i gnas su skyes pa de/ bu gcig la ma byams pa dang 'dra dar bskyed la/ thabs kyis snying rje ba'i sar mi bzhag par/ de nyid mthu dang thabs kyis bsgral te/ bla na med pa'i sa
277a3(rnying rgyud): la bkod pa'i ched du bstan pa las/ de dang mi ldan pa rnams ni/ dmyal ba yi dgas byol song la sogs pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang ba las thon par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa dang / bgegs rnams kyis smras pa/ e ma a lA la la de
277a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyang bgyid pas/ mthu dang thabs kyis mngon sum du bsgral dmigs dang / mi sgrol ba gang lags pa de'i dbang dang dam tshig stsal du gsol/ ging rnams kyis smras pa/ bsgral ba'i dmigs ni thugs rje'i
277a5(rnying rgyud): dpyang thag chad de/ zhe sdang log pa'i lam dgu la zhugs pa dang / nyon mongs rang ga mas dbang byas te/ zhing bcur gyur nas/ log pa'i las mtha' dag byed pa dang / gsang ba'i theg pa'i sgra dgrar gyur pa dang / sems can tshe zad cing
277a6(rnying rgyud): dus la bab pa rnams sgrol cig/ gang zhig rnal 'byor pa gzhung dang mthun pa lta ci smos kyi/ 'gal ba med pa'i sems can tshe ma zad pa rnams ni ma sgrol cig ces pa dang / bgegs kyi rigs rnams dga' mgu yi rangadwa nas/ de bzhin
277a7(rnying rgyud): bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam bcas dmod bor mna' bskyal te/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i phyi'i dgra bo thams cad sgrol cig par/ phyi'i gir bco brgyad du dbang byin te bzhag go// de nas d+hu tra dregs pa chen po dang bcas pa rnams bsgral te/ khog pa
277b1(rnying rgyud): drar khrod kyi gzhal yas lang du bcags/ rnam par shes pa zag min gyi yum gyi mkha' la gnas slar te thugs mas su byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i ma la bkad/ 'khor ci gyi'i bka'anyan thams cad dbang du bsdus te/ bran dang yang g.yog tu 'gyis twa/
277b2(rnying rgyud): nad+ha dang dregs pa'i phyogs thams cad ming yang migrag cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gtan par gnas te/ chos ning yum gyi mkha' bdeb chen pon/ dgyes pa chen po'i lhan la rtag par bzhugs pa la/ blo'i khung par gyis so sngar
277b3(rnying rgyud): mthong zhing rtogs te/ la las byang chub kyi shing drung rdzang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdud rnam bzhi rim gyis btul nas/ dregs pa thams cad zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyis btul nas/ le lo can dang / rtag pa sun dbyung ba'i phyir/ thabs kyis
277b4(rnying rgyud): mya ngan las bda' ba'i tshul bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas shing / sems can thams cad bde ba la 'god par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang / lA las ri rab kyi zom lnga phyag na rdo rjes ye shes kyi rdo rje gsor te/ lha ma yin thams
277b5(rnying rgyud): cad sngangs skrag nas/ srid pa gsum yang 'dar zhing g.yos te/ mdongs gsol du rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul te/ dregs bcan thams cad btul nas/ lha'i tshig bden pas zhal gyis 'ches shing dam mnos/ lha srin sde 'argyad bran dang chang
277b6(rnying rgyud): gyur bgos nas/ phyi'i dam tshig dkar po'i mu ran gyi 'khor bsrung zhing / ngan song gsum po rim gyis lha dang mi'i bde ba la 'khod cing / sems can thams cad rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas shing 'khod par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang / la las rnam
277b7(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgras/ lha'i khang pa rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i gnas nas/ kho bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i skur sprul te/ dbang phyug chen po'i srin po dang / dregs pa can thams cad bskal zhing / thal 'a yong
278a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhing khams na/ slar dran pa rnyed par byas te/ bdud dang srin po thams cad btul zhing tshang bcad nas/ 'khor dang bran du byas te bka' dang dam tshig mnos nas/ lha dang lha ma yin pa dang mi dang mi ma yin pa la
278a2(rnying rgyud): phrul na / sa
278a3(rnying rgyud): bsod par mabang gang rtogs pa dang / lags 'di ltar sa kyis la gas nga na par du zugs thams/ ba dang / dab cwa pa'i rgyu sa / bdung dang rgyu ma kyis ba
278a4(rnying rgyud): nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rim gyis chos kyi dbyings bde ba chen po yig 'khor lo tshogs sbyin gyis sa rim gyis 'khod par mthong zhing rtogs pa thams cad / dpal kun tu bzang po ngo bo nyid kyi sku chos
278a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ma bcos pa'i byin gyis rlabs las snang ba lus ma gtogs pa/ so sor snang zhing gnyis su med par bstan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni btags pa dang mtshan maldan ma yin pa'i 'tshig go// de lta bu'i chos 'di rnams cad la
278a6(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab bsam du yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dmigs pa med cing / mi dmigs pa'i tshig go// de khu'i chos 'di dag thams cad la bskal pa dpag gis mi ladra bar yang brjod pa'i mtha' mad la/ skad cig yung
278a7(rnying rgyud): tshigs badzad par yang thams cad 'dus sa// kyi phyir zhen/ don srung rang ba dang blang bamed pa'i tshig sa// des pa sa ba ga mas da/ rdzogs ninga'i ring las mi gsos par/ sde deng ba nathugs 'bong bzhi pa'i rmugs
278b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rol ba bsam gyis mi khyab par snang la/ de ltar snang tsam na thugs zhi ba'i ngang las kyang g.yos pa rdul tsam yang med do// daci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ma g.yos pa'i tha tshig go// de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad la/ mtha' yang
278b2(rnying rgyud): med la dbus kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad du nye ring dang / thams cad du phyogs ris dang / thams cad du snga phyi dang / thams cad du che chung med pa'i don no// de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs
278b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes la gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i thugs la gnas so// kun tu bzung po lngang rang gi sems la gnas so// rang gi sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ni ci yang min la ci la yang mi gnas pas/
278b4(rnying rgyud): chos 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'dus ma byas shing sgra bsam gyi yul las 'das pas brjod du med pa'i chos nyid do// brjod du med pa skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid do// skye 'gag med pa las ma g.yos pa/ ma g.yos pa btsal du med pas
278b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms shing mi gnas par byed pas khro mo zhes bya la/ de las kye zhing 'byung bar byed pas yum zhes bya la/ de lta bu'i las thams cad la rol pas yab ces kyang bya la/ de'i dang la 'du 'bral med pa'i rnal 'byor pas thabs
278b6(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab kyi don la mkhas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni dus thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs la gnas pas/ 'di ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni phyag gi mdzad pa phyag rgya'o// thugs la bzhag pa dgongs pa'o// zhal du brjod pa gsung rab bo// de ci'i
278b7(rnying rgyud): khyer zhe na/ der ni don thams cad 'dus pas/ dper na rgyamatsho chen po las klu'i rgyal po'i stobs kyis/ grub dang chu bran mar la sogs par spros nas/ slang rgya mtsho chen por 'dus pa dang 'dra bar dpal 'bar khro ma'i chud chen po 'di las/ rnal
279a1(rnying rgyud): 'byor gyi skyes bu chen po'i dgongs pas/ blta ba dang bsgrub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang bsgom pa la sogs pa byung nas/ slar 'di nyid du 'dus so// dpal 'brar khro mo'i rgyud 'di ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams
279a2(rnying rgyud): cad kyang rgyud 'di la brten nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rgyud 'di'i don rtogs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin gyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / rgyud/
279a3(rnying rgyud): 'di'i don rtog ma nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dper na u du ma wa ra'i tshal ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i dpe yin la/ u dum wa ra'i tshal dang / tsan dan gyi nags la
279a4(rnying rgyud): sogs rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi nad 'jil ba'i mthu yod pa dang 'dra bas na/ rgyud 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dpe yang yin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dag yid gsum phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin
279a5(rnying rgyud): du gyur pa yang yin no// rgyud 'di'i don ma rig cing ma rtogs na/ nyon mongs pa ma rig pa'i bdud dang / phung po sdug bsngal gyi bdud da / lha'i bu mya ngan gyi bdud dang / 'chi bdag mi rtag pa'i bdud de/ dper na nad dang rims la
279a6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa dang po dbugs la zhugs/ zhugs nas rtsa la bya'o// de nas sha dang khrag la rgya'o// de nas rkang dang sri le 'khol lo// de nas srog rtsar 'dus nas mi rtag pa'i las su 'gyur ro// de las log pa'i phal pa rnams ni/ srog pa
279a7(rnying rgyud): rtsal cung zad 'khod nas/ sha dang rus pa la phyir byung nas/ khrog dang ba spu la byung ste/ phyi'i 'byung ba la ltos so// de bzhin du bdud dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa thams cad dang po rgyu mo rig pa las byung ngo // de nas nyon mongs pa na
279b1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shel pas bcad nas/ kun gzhi la las sna tshogs kyi bag chags sna tshogs su sgrogs so// de nas sems can sdug bsngal gyis gtan zhing du 'byams so// de las sman bzang po dang sman pa mkhas pa
279b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba'i rgyud 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam 'di ston pa dang 'chad pa'i rdo rje slab dpon dang 'phrad ni sdug bsngal nyid byang chub yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa nyid lam yin pa dang / ma rig pa nyid chos nyid yin pa dang / 'khor ba nyid yang
279b3(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i lam gnas su bstan pas/ gzung 'dzin gyi 'chil ba thams cad chos nyid bde ba chen por ye nas gnas pa las/ thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par mdzad do// don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rgyud 'di ni dam tshig la
279b4(rnying rgyud): mi gnas pa dang snod ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te/ dpe san nor bu rin po che ti ra ya ka ni lha'i dbang po dang klu'i dbang po'i bsod nams yin pa dang 'dra bar/ 'di ni dam tshig la gnas shing stong du gyur pa rnams kyi sgyid yul yin pa'o//
279b5(rnying rgyud): de lta bu'i rgyud 'di ni 'og min gyi gnas dang / skyem ched mu bzhi dang / ngadod khams rang gzugs khams kyi lha'i ris su khyab na yang / ril lus mabor bar phyug rgya chen po'i gnas su/ grangs dang tshom bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mngon par
279b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang mi klu'i gnas su kyab na yang / ril lus ma bor bar tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su grangs dang tshem bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs zla bar 'gyur ro// de dag
279b7(rnying rgyud): thags rngacan po dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyang blan med pa'i byang chub la dgod par byang na// de nas kyang thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pas rigs nges pa'i sras su bya ba dang / mi 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i myur gag phyu
280a1(rnying rgyud): thugs gsang ba'i mdzod thugs kyi sa bon/ yig 'brung bzhag nas slar 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir/ phyag rgya chen pos kha bcad de bzhag go// de lta bu'i rgyud 'di'i rang bzhin du/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das
280a2(rnying rgyud): pra thams cad dang / phung po dang / khams dang sgra mched thams cad sangs rgyas par bstan pa las/ rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byed pa chen po'i lha'odakyil 'khor du/ thams cad ril 'dus pa las phyis
280a3(rnying rgyud): lam las log par 'byung ba ni/ dper na rgyal po 'am bram ze'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la lta bu las/ rigs 'chog te gdol pa'am/ bshan pa lta bu'i las byed pa ni/ skye bo yongs kyis kyang smad pa dang / nye 'khor
280a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis kyang spang bar 'gyur la/ de nyid kyang ris dmas shing mi 'dra ba'i gnas smra gyur nas/ rgyal po chen po'i bkra' chud kyi gnas su gyur pa dang 'dra bar/ gang zag gang zhig gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa 'am/
280a5(rnying rgyud): de la gnas pa gang yin pa log par gol te/ ting 'dzin rnam pa brgyad kyis log par khrid de 'di lta ste/ brlang po phyal pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyu las gol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yengs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bskrad pas
280a6(rnying rgyud): 'chal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrul par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags par gzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de'i mthu brtas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang brgyad do// de la brlang po phyal pa'i ting nge
280b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gang zhe na/ byi rlung gi dbang gang yang med par las thams cad la 'jug pa'i las byed pa'o// rgya las gol ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gang zhe na/ gsang sngags thabs kyi spyod pa thams cad la gti muka dang / rang byan dang thug thung du spyad papa
280b2(rnying rgyud): lung med par nges pa'i lan brjod pa'o// g.yeng ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ glu gar dang rol mo dang bzhad gang la sogs pa 'jig rten g.yeng ba'i chos la bsten pa ste/ don dang mi 'tsham par rtsa ba bdud rtsi las gol ba'o// bsla
280b3(rnying rgyud): sas 'chal ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos nyid tshig drang ming gis gdugs su med pa la/ yod med rtag chad du bslang pa dang / sems las gzung 'dzin du gdags su med pa la/ skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur du bslad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
280b4(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dgongs pa bka' rgya mtsho rab 'byams dpag gis mi ladra ba 'di/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang thob par zad kyis don ni ma rtogs pa la/ gang zag ming tsam mtshan mar 'don pa rnams kyis/ tshig gi blo btags
280b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / skur pa gdab pa dang / tshig gi ke'u shing gis bslad pa rnams ni gang zag 'chal bar gyur te/ don med pa'i las su stsal ba'o// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni gang zhe na/ gab pa dang gsang ba'i sbas pa la mi gnas par rdzas
280b6(rnying rgyud): dang lag cha dang / yo byad la mngon par 'tshal te/ mtshan mar 'dzin te mu stegs pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa'o// 'khrul par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ yang dag pa'i don bstan pa las snyan dadags dang / rang bzo dade/ khe'u shad dang / sdeng
280b7(rnying rgyud): sbyar dang / phyogs char 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te/ 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ris 'dzin cing gzhan spong par byed do// tshigs par bzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ tang dang gaN la sogs pa chos nyid la khungs 'byin cing / de nyid la mthog
281a1(rnying rgyud): dang bcan thabs dang / 'dud pa'i dbang bcan du sto pa ni/ bshan pa'am spyang brjod ma lta bu la brten pa'o// de'i mthu brnyas pa'i ting nga 'dzinan/ de drug log pa'i lam gyi mnu brnyas pas/ yaM dgas
281a2(rnying rgyud): dang srin po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du smin pa dang / de dag lus ngag yid gsum rab tu khro gtum che zhing / shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams
281a3(rnying rgyud): so// de dag la ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bya zhe na/ de dag la gtsor blangs te rtse gcig pa dang bcas pas/ nan tan du bzung ste spyod pa'o// de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin brgyad po la gnas pa ni/ skye bo yongs kyi dpyas shing smad pa dang /
281a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid ya ga dang sgro skar du gyur pas/ rnal 'byor pa yongs kyis smad cing bsting ba ste dam tshig las nyams pas bya ram rnams kyis kyang rab tu khrel te/ srog gi bar chad du byed cing / 'jig rten 'dir yang mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs
281a5(rnying rgyud): nyams su myong nas/ 'bras bu ngan sor gsum du skye zhing sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ shin tu gdung ba'i smre sngags 'don cing / mgon dang skyabs med pa'i sdug bsngal brgal ba dpag tu med par myangs nas/ de las
281a6(rnying rgyud): thar nas kyang srin po chen po'i lus blangs te/ srid pa gsum yang phung bar byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs khrel du gyur nas/ bla na med pa'i theSh+yo ka'i bka' chad kyis gong ma bzhin bskal bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan
281a7(rnying rgyud): yang ma brtags pa'i don brgyad kyis gol ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/ de yang gang zhe na/ yin pa la ni ma yin par sgro 'dogs pa dang / ma yin pa la yin par sgro 'dogs pa dang / mkhas pa la ni mi mkhas par skur pa 'debs pa dang / mi mkhas
281b1(rnying rgyud): pa la mkhas par bstod pa dang / theg pa 'og ma rnams la gong ma yin zhes che ba 'byin par byed pa dang / gong ma la 'og ma yin zhes slong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smod pa dang / bdud kyi tshig la
281b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin zhes smra ba'o// de la yin pa la ma yin par sgro 'dogs pa ni/ chos nyid don dam pa'i bden pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs mngon du phyung ba 'di la/ snod ma yin pa ma gsang ba dang / phal gyis thos na skrag cing
281b3(rnying rgyud): skur pa 'debs pa dang / smod par 'gyur bas kun gyi thun mong ma yin te/ rang bzhin gyi sa gsang ba 'di la/ gang zag dad pa chung ba dang / shes rab zhen pa dang / thos pa chung ba rnams kyis 'di dag gi don la 'phya zhing 'phral ba sde bas dang mos
281b4(rnying rgyud): tsam du byas pa yin/ yang dag pa ma yin no// zhes sgro 'dogs par byed do// ma yin pa yin par sgro 'dogs pa ni phal che ba byo'u shang dang / rang bzo la sogs pa thos pa chung zhing shes rab dman pa dang / 'gal ba'i don ma rig pa'i tshig
281b5(rnying rgyud): sde ba dang / phar bslang ba tshur bsres pas bcos pa rnams la smon pa 'bul te/ bzang ste don yod do zhes sgro 'dogs pa byed pa'i gang zag rnams so// mkhas pa la mi mkhas par skur pa 'debs pa ni/ lta bas chos nyid gnyis su med
281b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don rtogs nas/ shes bya la ye ma rmongs pas/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas shing / dbang po rab tu gyur pa rnams kyis shes rab rnam gsum la rgyud sbyangs nas/ rgyud dkrugs pa dang lung gcus pa dang / min ngag gab pa rnams la/
281b7(rnying rgyud): song/ phrag dog gi dbang gis gzhan gyi yon tan spad par 'dod pa'i phyir/ de ni mkhas pa ma yin no// zhes smod cing rgyu med pa'i skyon brjod par byed pa'o// mi mkhas pa la mkhas par bstod pa ni gang zag sa dag phyogs kyi
282a1(rnying rgyud): bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan la thabs kyis bko' stsal ba dang / pha rol po mtho bar dogs pa'i phyir/ dbang rnam pa lha lta ci smos kyi/ rnal 'byor kha dbang yang ma bskur ba la/ dbang rdzogs zhes
282a2(rnying rgyud): sla ba dang / phyi nang gi bka' mtha' dag lta ci smos kyi/ theg pa chen po 'di'i ming tsam yang ma thos pa la rdo rje rgyal po zhes brjod pa dang / rtsa ba'i dam tshig dang yan lag gi dam tshig lta ci smos kyi/ bka' dang dam la yang zung tsam yang
282a3(rnying rgyud): gnas te/ ral tshong dang gzu lum+ba dang / rang byan dang tshe dag tu spyod pa la mkhas par bstod pa rnams so// theg pa 'og ma la grong mar che ba 'byin pa ni/ bsam gtan rnam par mi rtog pa'i blta ba bden pa la zhugs nas/
282a4(rnying rgyud): pa la khungs 'byin pa la sngags kyang bzhin nyid ting nge 'dzin ci la yang mi rtog pa dang mnyam zheche ba 'byin par smra ba'o// gong ma la 'og ma yin zhes smod pa 'o// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med pa snod du ma gyur pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa la/ 'dzin
282a5(rnying rgyud): theg pa gang bas kyang dma' ba ste/ mu stegs log pa'i chos yin no zhes smong ba dang 'phya ba rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smra ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ci yang mi gsung / mi gsung
282a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni rgya che ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni tsa yang me mdzad/ me mdzad pa ni gting zab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang na yang mi bzhugs/ mi bzhugs pa grangs mang ba'o// zhes brjod pa dang / de'i don zlas
282a7(rnying rgyud): dbeg pa rnams/ de ni bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smra ba dang / gang zag bcud la mi rtog cing / yul la bltab rnams bkang yang dag pas grags pa 'dod pa dang / gzhan la sogs pa la khyad par 'dod pa'i don/ bden pa med pa 'dud chog
282b1(rnying rgyud): smra ba rnamasas// bzung bya cag la bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yan na zhes spa na/ rtogs pa'i lta ba dang ting 'dzin du mi ldan par tan ga N+Da kye las la bab col du rgyad cing bdud kyi las spong ba la/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin nas pa
282b2(rnying rgyud): dang / gsang ba'i dmatshig dang / dra khrong gyi chas la sogs pa rnams mu stegs phul pa dang 'dra bar thogs te bdud kyi spyod pa byed pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las byung ba yin zhes smra ba dang / gsang sngags dang gsang ba'i rgyung 'di dag thams cad stod pa
282b3(rnying rgyud): yin pa lta ci smos kyi dbang mthob pa rdo rje'i lho yod kyang mi bshang la/ dbang ma bsgyur bar stong dang ldan pa la yang mi bstan no// zhes 'byung ba la snod med pa dang / dam med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / 'khrul pa dang / gti mug dang / thug thub du thams cad
282b4(rnying rgyud): lagrangs mang bar bstan nas bdud kyi dbang du btang ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'i yin nI zhes sbu ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sprad de bdud kyi tshig tu smra ba yin no// sems dpa' chen po de ni dper na bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas bcom ldan
282b5(rnying rgyud): 'das kyi cha byang du sprul nas/ dge slong rjes su yi rung ba rnams la sbas pa/ nga yi sangs rgyas zhing 'di stongs la khang // go prat+ta mra'i bskrun par ma nyan par// rno ba'i mtshon thogs drug shul las byas te// pha rol g.yul las su tu rgyal bar bya'o//
282b6(rnying rgyud): zhesra smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bdud kyi tshig yin par shes shing / rjeg cha seM gleng ma ltar smra ba rnams ni bdud kyi tshig yin par blo dang ldan pa rnams la snang ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkra' gas
282b7(rnying rgyud): bgyi ba ci lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni/ nga dang gzhan gnyis su mgyi ba gang yin pa ni/
283a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// phyogs dang ris su ma bzung ba gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// rgyu 'bras gnyis ma song ma phye ba gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no//
283a2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gdul ba chen po ma skyes pa la/ skye 'gag med cing spros pa dang bral ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// thams cad skye chi dang 'gro 'gyur med cing / nga dang bdag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no//
283a3(rnying rgyud): mas sa / ga
283a4(rnying rgyud): med cing / gsum du sdang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang bsum du med cing brjod kyis kyang mi lat+pa la/ brjod du yang med la bgrang du yang med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// spangs
283a5(rnying rgyud): kyang ma spangastsa la/ chags kyang ma chags pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// tsi yang snang ci / khrir yang mgru ba ci / bsam gyis kyang mi khya ba laM/ dpag gis kyang mi ladral/ dpag tu yang med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
283a6(rnying rgyud): bka' yin no// chos ma byung ma skyes pa skye ba med pa'i rtogs pa chen po'i thugs mnyam pa chen po'i sangs rgyas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gyur ba yin te/ sa gzhi nam mkha' la 'phags srid la/ chu klung ldan las ldog
283b1(rnying rgyud): srid kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do// de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ rtsol du med pa'i bdag nyid yin la/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa'i ngang du brdal bas/ don dam pa yang min
283b2(rnying rgyud): no// de ni sgo skur dang gron thebs med de/ grub cing mthar phyin par 'gyur nges pas bden pa yin no// de ni dper na rgya gar gyi yul na bsod nams las grub pa'i rgyal po 'pho'i li ta/ rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun la dbang byed cing chags pa la
283b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen pos chags pa las bzlog pa'i phyir sprang po'i gzugs las bkres pa nyam thag pa cig byung nas/ rgyal pos smras la/ e mnyam thag pa'i sems can bkres skom gyis nyen pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod la cung zad brten nam/
283b4(rnying rgyud): bram ze sprang pos smras pa/ gser gyi ri lag yu yi rdza lhags te/ gram pa la sogs rin chen bcal bkram zhing // chu klung 'di kun bdud rtsir 'bab gyur kyang // nor gyis cho ga dang zas kyis chog shes bzang // dgos pa'i don ni bla med sangs rgyas
283b5(rnying rgyud): so// zhes smras pas/ rgyal po rgyal srid la skyo sems skyes nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod do de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bden pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' lta bu ma yin gyi/ than bya dang ri dgra
283b6(rnying rgyud): dang me skra rlung sgra las grags kyang / kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis bstan pa yin par zhes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thams cad du bzang ngan dang spang len med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ tshad ma zhes
283b7(rnying rgyud): bgyi ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ tshad ma zhes bya ba ni/ drang zhing don dang mthun pa de yin zhing / steng du phebs pa la tshad ma zhes bya ste/ ston pa'i bka' tshad ma ni 'gyur ba med pa'o// rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' tshad ma ni gol
284a1(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'o// rang gi rtogs pa tshad ma ni bcos pa med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ston pa'i bka' tshad ma 'gyur ba med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos nyid la bzhugs pa la/ mu stegs byed
284a2(rnying rgyud): ston pa ltar/ byed pa po dang byed pa'i skyes bu dang / rtag chad kyi mtshan ma can ma yin pa'o// de lta bu'i don 'di thams cad rdo rje slob dpon gyis rtogs nas/ sgo skur med par snod dang ldan pa rnams la bstan na/ des tshad ma thog tu thebs
284a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtha' las 'dres pas/ 'di ltar tshad mes rtogs na/ las dang sdug bsal gyis bac+doMs su med de/ bcos pa med pa na// tshad ma shes bya ba ni ngas pa'o// da ma zhes kyi brtson med par// tshad mazhes bya ba ni ma 'i
284a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / da ltar dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / tshad ma nges pa'i don rtogs nas sangs rgyas so// de bzhin su rabs 'dras pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i rdo rje
284a5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon kyang tshang ma sgron med pa/ 'di dag gi don rtogs nas grub pa brnyes pa yin no// de bzhin du snod dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor phyis 'byung ba yang / tshad ma'i don rtogs na tshe gcig gis rig 'dzin gyi gnas su phangs rgyab
284a6(rnying rgyud): gsalam/ sangs rgyas zhes yul gyi/ 'phrul ba/ sangs rgyas pas byu na/ sems cid la yang bye/ rtogs pagror du gyur te nyams su len pa / sems
284b1(rnying rgyud): cang byang chub kyi snying po can yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad nyid sems can las byung ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa klong dugyur pa ni/ gzung 'dzin rtag zung dang / yod med sdug bsngal la sogs sangs la/ de nyid mi rtog pa'i rig
284b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rang dbang du rgyas pas/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad nyams su lon pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po dang mtshan ma med pa'i sangs rgyas chos nyid la/ de rtogs pa mthar phyin par rgyas
284b3(rnying rgyud): pas sangs rgyas pa'o// gsol pa/ chos nyid skye ba med pa la// gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na// sems can bgyi ba ji lta bu/ bka' stsal pa/ sems can zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad la ma rig pa'i dbang gis mtshan mar bzung
284b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rtog la blo 'chel ba dang // gzhan yang rA tra rnam pa gsum ste/ phyi gzung bar bya ba'i yul med pa la gzung ba'i yul du 'dzin pa ma traM ka ru dra'o// nang 'dzin par byed pa'i sems med pa la/ 'dzin pa'i sems su bzung ba ni a ka da
284b5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin rnam pa gnyis yul sems btas pa las grub pa ni kha trAM kha ru dra'o// ru tra rnam pa gsum yang sems can no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa chos log par spyod pa yang sems can yin no// de la chos log par spong ba zhes bya ba ni/ thog pa
284b6(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rje theg pa 'di stong pa las/ dbang na rgyal po dmangs kyi las spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ theg pa 'og ma pa'i gzhung sprad nas 'di la sgo dang skur pa la sogs pas smod par byed pa dang / gsung ba'i theg pa 'di ltar spyod na yang / lha bas
284b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs shi spyod pas 'di dag 'phyas zlos su spyod cing / tshig gi gzhung med pas gzhan dang ris su zad nas ning ris mi mthun pas rtsod pa dang 'gal zhing 'khrugs pa'i gzhir gyur pa rnams ni mtshan ma 'gyod pas sems can na// de'i phyir na gsang ba
285a1(rnying rgyud): phrang byin pa 'di cig 'aspyod pa nyams pa dang / dmyal bang byed pa dang / nga ngalal bam sa mag dang dzang dad ma pag sgrub nan bu 'brag sus ma yang bstan shA bya na/ ngadag lda ba na
285a2(rnying rgyud): myanar med pa'i dmyal ba dang / sems nan dmyal bzhis bya ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de la nig la rnying ba te bas pa zhes kyang / b+h+ra ma'i bka' bas thog ring po sa ni gang la bste thams cang du rje 'i nyid drug ngam pa yin
285a3(rnying rgyud): na pa thams cad log par snang bas/ thig gi stong ba nyams zhes rba ste/ rtsa ba'i dmachog gsus nyams pa dang / thang par drizla ma'i gzungs pa dang / byA grus gnas gas dbyel stong bad/ rdorje ma rjod nga dgas dpaganyen du
285a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' la/ ma rig pa'i las spyad pa dang / gsang ba'i bka' des pa la bka' rgan dang lung med pa dang / dbang mo mnos par mtha' dag la ston cing / 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir ldogs pa rnams ni// khyang bar du theg la
285a5(rnying rgyud): panyam sA pa ste/ 'di dag la bstan na gnyis ka dmyal bar snang ngo // dmyal ba rdo rje zhes bya no/ shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i mi lus thob pa la/ mi la sogs pa g.yo sgra med pa'i drang po dang bzhin gyis dge ba la grangs pa las/
285a6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis spod pa la zhugs te/ dge sdig dron la yang 'dzem pa med cing / de dag la cher mi blta zhing ma rtogs pas thun po byal song dang 'dra bar spyad pa dang / gzhan yang mir skyes nA yang byin tu chags shing zhen pa'i dbang gis/
285a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad du 'dod pa la chags te/ gzhan la mi dbang bar spyad pa dang / gzhan las dam du 'bog pa dang / ser sA la sogs pa 'jungs pas yi dwags 'dra ba'i las byang ba dang / mi'i lus thob pa la bsang ba dang bzang ba la sogs
285b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs dmyal ba dang 'dra ba'i las byed pa ni/ dmyal ba'i rdo rje byed pa zhes bya'o// snying rje'i lam las grol ba zhes bya ba ni/ rAg Na la sogs pa'i las la snying rje chen pos ma zin par 'dod chags rang ga
285b2(rnying rgyud): mas yul mtha' 'khob kyi gling dang 'dra bar spyod pa dang / zhing bcur gyur pa la snying rje chen pos ma zin par bsnyad dang chags 'brel phran tshogs tsam la ta na'i las spyod pa dang / gzhan yang sems can thams cad la gnod cing mi dge
285b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi las byed pa rnams ni/ zhing bcur gyur pa'o// snod ma yin pa ni/ snod du ga tan dang / zhabs brdol ba dang / kha stabs lnga sogs pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis gsang ba ste/ gro bar mi 'gyur bas/ de bas na/ bdud
285b4(rnying rgyud): rtse'i theg pa rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di/ su la bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor gsang ba'i snod ldan 'ga' tsam las// kun la bstan pa ma yin gter du bcang // zhes gsungs pa'o// lha min dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud rdzogs so//
285b5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon rdo rjeg mod rtsal dang / l-I ts+tsha ba zhing drung gis 'gyur// phya gar skad du/ serba ta thA ga tA rak+ta rA ga tAnA tA nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi dak+ta da mar gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal khrag bzung gi
285b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ kun tu bzang mu ba~M b+ha ga yangs pa'i klong na/ yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po he ru ka dang / yu ma kro d+hi shwa rI ma dang / b+had+d+ha he ru ka dang / rat+na he ru ka dang / @
285b7(rnying rgyud): ruka dang / karma he ru ka dang / d+hud+d+ha gr-i d+hI ShA rI ma dang / rat+na krod+d+hi shwa rI ma dang / pad+me kr-i d+hi shwa rI ma dang / ka pro d+hI shwa d+hi ma dang / gnyis su med pa thugs las byung ba'i 'khor gor mi dang / sing ha ma dang / sgom dang / dbang phyug ma dang / mtha
286a1(rnying rgyud): nga/ / sa/ nga/ dang / na gag nga / 'bya

286b4(rnying rgyud): bu'i dak+ta tsit+ta'i khrag/ grangs kyi rak+ta sum cu lnga// sa yi rak+ta rdza dang shing gi rak+ta lnga// me to gA dab+ta lnga dang rtsi li rak+ta lnga// srog las byung ba'i dak+ta lnga// sman gyi rigs kyi rak+ta lha// 'bras bu'irak+ta lnga zhes so/ sa'i rak+ta lnga ni/ bcag dang li wi
286b5(rnying rgyud): dmar po dang // ldong ros dmar po mtshal dang ni// rdo rjeg dmar po le sogs lnga// shing gi rik+ta lnga la kun b+hai ra// go shiR+Sha dang tsan dan dmar// 'da' mur dmar po btsod dang ni// hI tsa ba tsa ta pa ta// D+ha s+yeg dang / mo dmar po 'om bu
286b6(rnying rgyud): dang // kar+d+ha ka ring mar po seng ldeng lnga// me tog rak+ta rnam lnga ni/ ha lo l+le yangase pa'i me tog dang // 'ogra chu ha puSha la ug chos// ling ling ha'i bub pa me tog lnga// dmar po myu gu'i brel pa srad ma'i me tog dang // shir ta'i buSh+Ta ba lug rngu
286b7(rnying rgyud): dmang po'i me tog dang // rtsi'i dak+ta rnam lnga ni// tshangs pa'i rak+ta b+hU rung // e li ka zla ba'i rak+ta dang // nyi ma'i rak+ta star bu dang // sA la hi k+ta rgun 'bru dang // khyab 'jug rak+ta 'bra ma ha la lnga// 'bras bu'i rik+ta rnam lnga ni// shang gi lha mo 'diSh+Ta/
286b8(rnying rgyud): ga bar 'di
287a1(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i 'bras d+ha/ nags ma ma'i shAng ma thu dang / ba snyam 'dakun sbyin dang / srad mal ma'ing// brang dang / ba'am ma'i gzham dang / 'bras bu dag zhags pa/ mthabata' kya dang /

287a3(rnying rgyud): kyai nas g.yas kyi khrug/ yum gyi bad+ma'i dkyu dang // 'bras bu chen po bskul ba'i khrag/ ma khrag dak+Sha pa bzhi// glang po ma he stag dang de// mchog gi zhag dang bzang // dak+ta dmar gyi chung las/ rak+ta'i rnam grangs

287a5(rnying rgyud): stsal to// me tog rak+ta lnga la/ ha lo ug chos kha byed lam bu me tog ut+pal dang lnga/ sA'i rak+ta lnga la/ mtshal cog lam dang / l+r-i khri dang / ldong ros dang / sang mi dang / btsag dang lnga'o// 'bras bu'i rak+ta lnga sargyan 'bru
287a6(rnying rgyud): dang / ba ma khe la dang / bu ma dang / stang bu dang / lags la bro ba dang lnga'o// rtsa ba'i dak+ta wa la/ ra mo shag rtsu ba dang / nye shing rtsa ba dang / ram bu'i rtsa ba dang / rta lo'i rtsa ba dang / lci ba'i rtsa ba dang lnga'o// shing gar
287a7(rnying rgyud): lnga la/ seng ldeng dang / star bu dang / khags la bri bo dang / shASh+ma shrId nag po dang / sre shing sngam lnga'o// de'i ka wa la/ me shal dang / chu shel dang / mchong rngom 'byin dang / rdo bra ma tshal dang / mtshal kha dang lA /
287b1(rnying rgyud): de kun gyi khungs ni/ dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas/ ma mo b+ha ga hri ti ma des srid rtse lha gnas man chad nas/ na rag dmyal khams yan chad kun/ thugs rjes ma bzung ba gcig kyang med de/ ma mo'i rgyal mo e ka dz+nyA TI ma byung ste/ de
287b2(rnying rgyud): las khrag dngas snyigs gsum du phyes te/ dngas ma las sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bskyed/ bar ma las lha dang mi bskyed/ tha ma las ngan song gsum bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i dpral ba'i dbyings nas/ sme
287b3(rnying rgyud): ba dmar po gcig phyung ste/ sme ba de'i nang nas gsang ba'i yum bzhi phyung ste/ mkha' la gshog gcig ma ni nam mkha'i dbyings pu rgyu/ gtsug na ral gcig ma ni dpal chen po'i dpral ba'i dbyings na bzhugs so// gling bzhi drag mo rgyal ni kun tu rgyu'o//
287b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' la gshog gcig mo las ni/ me tog gi rak+ta lnga byung ste/ khud byed lam du dpyid s+ye/ ug chos dbyar s+ye/ ud pa la ston skye// ha lo dgun skye/ me tog rgya skyegs kha thams cad du skye'o// gtsug gi ral gcig ma'i rak+ta lnga ni/ rtsa ba'i
287b5(rnying rgyud): rak+Sha lnga ste/ ra mo shag dang nye shing ram bu lba ba d+ha lo'i rtsa ba lnga'o// dbyings kyi ra la gcig ma'i rak+ta lA ni/ rdo'i rak+ta lnga ste/ me shel dmar po dang / chu shel dmar po dang / mchod rdo me 'byin dang / rdo bra mtshal dang mtshal kha dang lnga'o// gling
287b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi drag mo rgyal gyi rak+ta lnga ni/ 'bras bu'i rak+ta lnga ste/ dpyid chu bo'i gzhung la 'phyo zhing rlung nag 'tshubs ma'i sna 'dren pa'i dus na/ rak+ta babs pa ni/ khags pa bra bo te dpyid smin no// dbyar gyi ring bar snang mkha' la gnas te/ zhal nas
287b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i char pa 'beb pa'i dus na rak+ta byung ba ni ram bu ste dbyar smin no// ston gyi ring ri rab zom la gnas shing lo thig kun gyi bcud len pa'i dus na/ rat+ta byung ba ni sngar bu ste ston smin no// dgun rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas shing klu rnams kun dang sbyor ba
288a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i dus na/ rak+Sha 'bab pa ni kun 'bru ste dgun smin no// dus thams cad du sbyin pa ni gtsug gi ral gcig mA'i rak+ta s+ye lnga'o// sa'i dku lnga la/ mtshal cog la ma ni yu ma kro d+he shA n+ti ma'i rak+ta'o//
288a2(rnying rgyud): lil+li ni drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i rAk+Sha'o// ldong ros ni gnod sbyin gsang ba'i rak+ta'o// sa dmar po ni lha mo nag mo'i rak+ta'o// btsag ni rgya za ldong bu'i gsang ba'i rak+ta'o// de la shing gI rak+ta lnga ni// tsan dan dmar po kun tu bzang
288a3(rnying rgyud): mo'i rak+ta'o// shing shing spre'u ha nu man+tha'i yin/ sri shing sna ma ni lha tshe ring gi khrag yin/ mdze mo phra men ma smad 'tshong ma'i khrag yin no// rak+ta dmar kyi rgyud las/ dak+ta'i byung khungs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang
288a4(rnying rgyud): gsol ba/ rak+ta'i byung khungs de lags na// rak+ta'i bsdu thabs ji ltar lags// ston pa khrag pa thur bshad du gsol// nyon cig chags pa ral pa can// brko ba'i dus ni 'di lta ste// ston zla ra ba'i nya gsum la// brko ba'i nus ni de
288a5(rnying rgyud): la bstan// stan zla ra ba nam zla dus bzhi'i nang na gnyen// bcom ldan de nyid de na bzhugs pa la// gzhan gyi dug thul mi thub pas// sman bcud thams cad gcig tu 'dus// dus rnams de la brko bar bya// de yang shin tu gnyen pas ni//

288a7(rnying rgyud): ni s+sa bA ye shes lnga// dag chags pa'i rang bzhin la// skul rtsa ba'i dngos grub stsol// bu rtse bu rtse bsod nams kyi// tshogs ni zad par mi shes pas// de ltar bzlas la brko // swA hA zhing chen pa'o// dngos grub myu du stsol cig
288b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rakya mul khrag gi nyung ma zhes// mang phral khri babs pong yul gyi// glang thang sgrol ma'i gnas su b+ha// 'di yang srid pa'i rak+ta yin// me tog dag dus gcig baH// 'bras bu'i rak+ta dus bzhir brgya// rdzi yi bya nges pa med//

288b3(rnying rgyud): ba can// yid 'ong bar chad med pa'i gnas// yang na zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi// phun sum tshogs pa ldan pa ru// sa yi bya ba kun rdzogs nas// bsod nams tshogs gsog mchod sbyin bya// phyi nang bar chad bsal nas kyang // rang kun gyis
288b4(rnying rgyud): mtshams bcad nas// stegs bu mda' gang gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga yis skyang nul bya// yang na khrag chen thug par bya// thig gdab tshon rnams rim par dgye// pho thod mo thod kha sbyar du// rak+ta sna tshogs 'byor par bsags// dkyil

288b6(rnying rgyud): thun mong las brgyad rdzogs par sbyar// bzlas pa mthar dbyung bshags bstab bya// dngos grub ci rigs blangs byas nas// dbang bskur byin rlabs khyad par can// rigs kyi bu mchog de la sbyin// de dag bsrung ba'i slob dpon

289a5(rnying rgyud): la bdang / sangs can ma rdzogs sa sa la/ tshal ma na kyis da// nga po dang gyung ba/ rab shes rgya dang ma zhes// yang yams lasogs par blo sheng shesashes da bldan gshegs
289a6(rnying rgyud): rigs// rin chen parla pas TI rig snga la sogs// bsgrub par bya ba'i dmatshig mtha' ru byung // bsungs pa'i yon tan ba ma mi r+g+hag// nyams pa'i rnam smin pasam myi thag// dashes par byas la kun gyis spyad// rdo 'di nyid la sangs rgya'o//
289a7(rnying rgyud): dgang mar gyi rlung bas/ dmacig sa ma thas bdu du// da nas chags pa byas/ byas thams/ ma bzung bas lags na/ pa'
289b1(rnying rgyud): sa// ny-i ga ga // yang nas gyur// da gan da gas// rnabyang rgyags na sa// ga na gsan gdasus// sa das
289b2(rnying rgyud): ra ga tsud bkrigs rnams bsal byas te// grogs mchog mtshan ldan btsal byas nas// rjes dang po brang khyer nas sra// yon tan brgyad sbyin tha ma la// snron drug spangs pa'i slob ma yis// rab tu yad 'ang rab tu 'byus// @
289b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor rim bzhin brtsigs nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga phyis chag rtag gang pe// thig btab dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang // dbang rdzas dam par bkod nas kyang // hrIn brgyung gzung bya srang bsnyen pa bzlas// bdun 'bum te khri sngon du song/
289b4(rnying rgyud): rab 'a b+h+ring tha ma rtags zin nas// bsgru ba ba chen po'i las la 'dug/ dngas klub zhal zas bsgyur thas nas// mtshan ston brdzun pa rdzogs pa dang // slob ma dkyil ba khor nas bton nas// slob dpon sangs ches bzhugs pa des/
289b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi ngas pa sa rdzogs das su// rigs kyi bu mchog mang na byedag/ bden padang mtshams bcang bsagru bshud hU~M// dmapas dbu rnams pasgyur bar bya// byi nang dab rnams rdzogs pa dang // dbang rgyas pa te ma ldan drug
289b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin// mi dmigs blta ba 'don la gnas// rgyal po rgyal rigs dbang bskur ba// 'khor pos sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin// rigs kyi suM mchog slob ma de// sangs rgyas sal 'khor lo bsgyur// 'jig rten dbang lta smos ci dgos/
289b7(rnying rgyud): sa gsangs sa// dab ma gyi byud las/ dbang gi u brgyang ba'o// / de nas yang chags pa sa pa can ces / sbyin pa thag bang rgyal po lags// dbang gi rim pa de lags na// dkyil
290a1(rnying rgyud): pa ji ltar lags// khrag bzung rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sku yi dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang // khrag 'thung rgyal po'i sku la 'dus// dbus zhal mthing ba dpal chen nyid kyi zhal// g.yas dkar khro mo
290a2(rnying rgyud): kokau ri ma// g.yon dmar lha mo bA mo ha// phyag mtshan drug po lha mo drug/ rgyan chas 'khor gyi lha rnams tAM// wa bcu tham pa tshang bar bsgom// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bsam las kyang // khrag 'thung rgyal po'i gsung du 'dus// ru lu 'bru
290a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad gsung gi sngags// A~M ni ye shes khrag 'thung lnga// ru lu gong mgo ri brgyad// ru lu 'ag ma sid ha brgyad// hU~M ni phyag rgya sgom bzhi// b+h+yo narnal 'byor nyi shu brgyad// hU~M ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs// bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor
290a4(rnying rgyud): gsung gi lha// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang // khrag 'thung rgyal po'i thugs la 'dus// ye shes sems dpa' thugs dam lha// sangs rgyas rtsa gnyis thugs kyi dngos// thig le byang chub sems nyid de// bya 'atsal med
290a5(rnying rgyud): par gun la gnas// 'dzin chags med pa thugs kyi mchog/ ma 'gags shar ba thugs kyi rgyan// rang sar rdzogs pa thugs kyi gnas// zhes gsungs so// rak+ta dmar gyi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//

295a4(rnying rgyud): d+hI shA ra mar byin gyis brlabs nis sgor yum byas so// sram gzhan pa brgya po rgyam bas nas byu / kI rabi d+hang dang / mngog sa dang / sgo m+b+ha dang / dbang phyug sa nyi shwa rtsa brgyad drung / mkha' 'gros mdzartsa gnyis dang / 'bar ya dang /
295a5(rnying rgyud): mi bdun dang / sring bzhi dang / ma mo khrag gshog can du byin gyis brlabs so// drar khrod gnas ni gzhal las khang du byin gyis brlabs so// mi gtsang rdzas ni dang rdzas ldan byin gyis brlabs so// yab ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'khor
295a6(rnying rgyud): par byin gyis brlabs nas bzhag go// pa bskal ma la skA ra/ mi gtsang smeb zas sra gsol bas/ sle brtsegs zhes bye'o// yu ma dang 'khor rnams khrag thung gi lhar sangs rgyas so// rak+ta mar gyi rgyud las// khrag 'thung gi le
295a7(rnying rgyud): slobarna bzhi pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung gis chags par la bcan pa 'di sa ba san 'di'i rkang pa nam gyu ma/ maung nga langs dang // nang baphyogs pa sogs sbom ci dgos// 'jog rten
295b1(rnying rgyud): ya sa pa 'jug/ ba snang ldanas bya sa// rtsub cag dang thus pag/ ga 'donarnam pa dus man // da nga ba dang sa dang// na na byud // / mthom pa 'as ba dang na/
295b2(rnying rgyud): 1na// phye ma sangs rgyas zhing du m+b+hi// 'dil mi mas ma sbyangs na// khrag 'byung zin pas snying khrag 'thung // rdo rlung rgyal bar gtan du la khyor// rmugs pa'i dul cam khyod la gter// ces gsungs nas/ dgongs pa med ma
295b3(rnying rgyud): pa gshegs sa// dab+h+ya mar rgyung las/ man gA sbyin pa'i len sa bcom pa 'o// da mar gyi rgya rdzogs so// khyod rnam gyis sgyu // rtag skad d+he/ rAd+d+ha ASh+NI ts+tshak+tsi tA la tan
295b4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ bod skad du/ rin po che malha zho bar gyur pa 'byur ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyis grub pa'i rgyal po pa phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid ni// rang bzhin ldan grub gnas rje/ chos dbyings ston pa chen pongs
295b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes 'khor rnams lnga// slong po chen po de bstan pa bshad// rig pa rang gsal chen po'i dus// g.yos pa med pa'i gnas de na// ye shes chen po'i ston pa rjes// rig pa da kyi 'khor ma la// sbyong bzhi par bstan pa shAs
295b6(rnying rgyud): rig partsal du skang dus su// reg pa'i khor med ga nas nyid du// 'ongs spyod rdzogs pa'i ston pangs// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams lnga// sgrib pa stong ba'i bstan pa bshad// snang bas ngul ba'i drus nyi dr-i// rang bzhin 'og sbyin/

296a2(rnying rgyud): ldan tu bdang po la// gsheng bslad lan chags stong ba bad // ston pa'i stan pa kran tu bzang po ngas// bregags bskrad pa la rnas pa gsum yin DI// ting 'dzin sngags dang bsgril gyis bskrang ba'o// kun tu bzang po che ba yi// zha yi
296a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal dag gis bskrad// de bzhin sngags kyis bskrad pa ni// ye shes khyo b+hU'i sngags kyis bskrad// hU~M bi sho bod+hA dza la maN+Da la/ ha la t+pa la/ hrISh+Thatet+ta/ ba d+he ben d+ha/ han han// hU l+r-i dz+wa wa/ badz+ra d+hiSh+Tha trA~MphaT/ rol
296a4(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis btub nas yang / sbrel tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod// hU~M hU~M nAM/ tshe 'das rigs kyi bu 'dri la// thog ma med nas gnas pa yi// rtag tu srog la dbang byed pa'i// bgegs kyi rgyal po gang long kyang // zas su sreg za dbugs
296a5(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'i// tshe 'das gshed mar byed pa yi// tshe 'das lus nyid btsung nas su// kun tu 'khyams shing kun tu gnod // bgegs kyi rgyal po khyod song zhig/ snying yi bka' las 'da' nas su// tshe 'das gshed mar byed pa na// ye shes
296a6(rnying rgyud): hUM chen po yi sa// rus la gnas bzhi sdang bgegs// zhe sdang mtshan gyi char po baT+wA~Mg/ khrag la gnas pa 'dod chags bgegs// myos byeng drug gi char po ba cig/ shal gnas pa'i gti brag bgegs// khro chung nyung dkar char mong

296b1(rnying rgyud): drang lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// hU~M zhe sdang mnar med las byas pan gyis// sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su skyeb na// las dang thugs rje dam chog gis// ye shes thugs rjes drangs shi rang grag/ dza a sha
296b2(rnying rgyud): dzahUM/ skye bar nges pa'i sems can khyod// 'gro drug gnas su 'khyams pa na// stong gsum mun nag rig pa lakhyams// bag chags snang phyir dgug par bya'o// sho tan ti badz+ra sho tra hUM hUM/ tshe 'das lus brjes rigs kyi bu

296b4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dkyil 'khor gsal// bag chags sbyang phyir ye shes bdud rtsi'i chus// tshe 'das bag chags gtA nA nas sbyang bar mdzod// AM AHhUM badz+ra amr-i ti he sho dan tI sho d+ha ya swA hU~M// b+h+rUM bcom ldan thub pa dmyal
296b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i garje chen po// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu 'di nyid// tsha grang sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs pas na// kun bzang thub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi'o// badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hUM 'bru bcud stong dang ldan pa'i gser s+t+wa~M mes 'di// gshin lag shing du
296b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i 'asregs// gson la bdud du byed pa'i 'dre// 'bru bcud gser skye mas 'di longs la// tshe 'das bla bzung gtad du gsol// hUM glud kyi gtor ma byin can 'di// srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal ba'i gnas yan chad// 'phags pa'i

299b2(rnying rgyud): pa tshur nyon dang // da ni rdo rje bla ma ste// nga yi bka' nyid ma bcag par// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// 'di ni kun bzang dkyil 'khor te// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i pho brang yin// gnas mchog 'di ni bsgrub pa'i gnas// tshe 'das

300b1(rnying rgyud): brgya ldan lha ye zas// bdud rtsile zhal zas dag pa 'di// me lha 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// tshe 'das sgrib pa dag par mdzod// badz+ra ag+ne no bi d+ha pA dza sa ma ya hUM// hU~M gdung bsgyel ba'i skra mchog ni// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi sgra stan 'di// me wa
300b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// tshe 'das sgrib pa sbyang bar mdzod// badz+ra ag+ne shab+da rat+na b+hu dza sa ma ya ho// me lha'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la// nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba ni// hU~M dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// me lha'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas//

300b5(rnying rgyud): phung thor tshugs can// sku mdog dmar po 'od 'bar ba// phyag na mo yi 'khor lo bsnams// sems can bag chags bsreg mdzad pa// dam rdza snga 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// me lha'i rgyal po rnams la 'bul// badz+ra agre ba nA ka ye swA hA/
