300b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// hUM rnam shes phung po mngo na sangs rgyas pa'i sku// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gsung nyid can// chos dbyings ye shes rnam par dag pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di//
301a1(rnying rgyud): kun thubazang po'i sbrul mchod par 'bul// d+hu hUM badz+raHhrIhUMsarba pra pa shAn+ti ku rba bA nga s+yAhA/ chos nyid skyeb med pa'i hom khrang du// nyon mongs gti mug sha li yAm shed la// rang byung ye shas me spang bas//
301a2(rnying rgyud): rig pag chags thams cad bsreg sbyang rol// hUM badz+ra tsat+tA raM/ hUM gzugs kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'i sgo// nyin me pa zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gsung // chos nyid ye shes mi long lta bu'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba
301a3(rnying rgyud): mtshang ba 'di// rdo rje kun tu bzang la mchod par 'bral// tshe 'das las kyi sgrim pa dag kya TIg/ bye d+h+r-igs sa pa pe shA kA ru swA te/ hUM sleb med pa'i com khrungs// zhe sdang rus pa'i lam shing la// me long ye shes mi spang bas/
301a4(rnying rgyud): 'das bag chags thim skyeng rol// hUM badz+ra tig dz+wa la re/ hU~M tshor ba'i phung po gnas su dag pa'i sgra// nyon mongs nga rgal gnas su dge pa'i gsung // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thugs mnga' bar// ngam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di/
301a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen kun tu bzang la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ sA ra t+na d+h+r-ig sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ 'gag pa med pa'i hom khyad du// nga rgyal rtsa yi yam shing la// mnyam nyid ye shes me sbar bas// tshe radas bag
301a6(rnying rgyud): chags thim sbyang rol// s+pha ra d+ha dz+nyA na dz+wa la raM/ hUM 'du shes phung po gnas su dag pa'i sra// nyon mongs 'dod chags gnas su dag pa'i gsung // so sar rtog pa'i ye shes thugs mnga' bar// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di/
301a7(rnying rgyud): bad+ma kun bzang srul mchod par 'brel// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa dag par mdzod// e yA ro lig chags papa po tshig+sa ru swAHdri chos nyi gnas pa med pa'i nyom khung du// long chags khrag gi lam shing 'o// so sor rtog pa'i
301b1(rnying rgyud): sangs// rdzu rgyas cug garnams da / shA sa// sam ma gdapar/ rdzu' bya rung ba gnasas drag pa'o// / nyan dus ga su ga ba ba spya/ sa sus gzugs sa shA / yu
301b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtse 'byung ba'i mchod pa 'di// kun bzang don yong grub la mchong bar 'thal// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib bdag ltar rtog/ hU~M bA trog cheg mo sarba bA pa gni kr-ir+tha s+t+wa~Mt+ma/ hU~M chos ning dmigs pa med pa tsam khrang du// nyon mongs phrag ngosas
301b3(rnying rgyud): seng pos shing la/ thabasab pa'i ye shes me sa bas/ dza 'das las kyi bag chags kyis byung ral/ madz+dza ga dul pa hU~Mng ba rnam pa pa gyunas sri na pad+d+haH// mabyin ldad pa gnas sa dgu pa'i gsung // chos nyid mtha
301b4(rnying rgyud): me pa'i thugs mnga' bar// dmardzas bdud rtsi 'jar ba'i mchod pa 'di// kun bzang dbyings lhag mA la mchod par 'bral// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa dag gyur cig/ dz+nyA chos nyid skye ba med pa'i hom khrang du// chos can skye bar blang
301b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam shing la// chos nyid mtshan ma med pa'i me sku bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag rgyags thim snang rol// d+hi 'thung ba sa nyid gnas su dag pa'i sgra// nyon mongs 'dod chags gnas su drug pa'i gsang // chas nyid stong ba nyid kyi rnas
301b6(rnying rgyud): mungang bar// dmathus bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa'o// rnangasangs nas spyan la mdzad par 'dra'o// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa dag zung cig/ chos nyid stong pa'i ma byung du// mtshan ma 'dang par chog pa'i lam shings/
301b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ye shas chen po'i me sbar bas// tsa 'das bag chags thams cid brim sbyang rol// hUM 'byung ba cu nyid gnas su dag pa'i ste// rdzun du smrab gnas suM dag pa 'i gsung // ces nyid smon pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba// da ma rdzas bsu/
302a1(rnying rgyud): rgya'abar ba martang pa dri// 'dza lta ga la mchong bar 'brub// ma'ang mas kyi sgru bya dag zung byarnas nyid ston pa med pa'i tas byung // nan mongs pa tu snang ba'i lam gangs// rig na
302a2(rnying rgyud): shes chen po'i masbyar bas// ni 'das pagacags pa nga ga blang sa// 'byung ba gdas srings bu'i sa// nyo 'angs tshigs sems gnas su dag pa'i gsung // cis nyi 'grug/ med pa nas ng+ge dag pa gas// dmangs
302a3(rnying rgyud): 'ab ba'i mtshang bu 'di// badrags da/ rol mdzad par 'phrul/ 'dis skye kyi bdag med can pa'i / mangs chags mams lam shing la// bdag yi med pa'i sa ba /
302a4(rnying rgyud): 'das bgazugs nim snang rlol// rje 'byung ba rnyad nyid gnas su dag pa'i sgra/ nyon mongs gnod ni mas gnas su dag pa'i gsung // rang bsnyen 'dags la lta bu'i thags mda' bar// dmardzas bdud rje 'bar ba'i mchong ba 'ang
302a5(rnying rgyud): dmachog sus pa'i rnal mdzad par jam/ cirangs las kyi gzugs kyad byu cigs nyid 'dags ladzin pa sa rjong du// na sangs paru pa byed pa la shi // dag pa 'ang gsu na pa'i mtha pas
302a6(rnying rgyud): das las bgatags ces par drus/ sa ku sa sa mas su ngapa tshad ba la/ da pa'i gas bdag sems da'i gis// ldan pa'i thu pa na pa
302a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus ba kyi gzugs byung ba'i phyir// rdo ba 'i tshogs pa tshod pa 'brab pa sa ni// rton pa'i nyon thaM ba gi mas// sbyin pa 'i byen pa rnam par dag pa'i ma// dga' ba'i sems tu chung bajigapa/
302b1(rnying rgyud): bsel ba rig pa'i thugs 'chang bar// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rjes snying skul mchod par 'bul// cho 'das las kyi bag chags dag gyur cig/ hU~M chos nyid skye ba med pa'i hom khung du// mig gi dbang po'i rtog pa'i yam
302b2(rnying rgyud): shing la// rang byung ye shes chen po'i me sbar bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags thim spyad rol// hUM tshul khrims pha rol byin pa rnam par dag pa'i sku// nyon mongs sel byed dpa' bo chen po'i gsung // dri med sa la spyod pa'i thugs mnga'
302b3(rnying rgyud): bar// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje nam mkha'i sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags dag gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid spros pa med pa'i hom khung du// rna ba'i dbang po'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// rang byur ye shes
302b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i me sbar bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags thim sbyang rol// hUM bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sku// bye ba sel mdzad zhi ba lta bu'i gsung // 'od 'phro'i sa la rab tu spyod pa'i thugs// da ma rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i
302b5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'di// byang sems kun bzang sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags dag gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid g.yos pa med pa'i hom khung du// sna yi dbang po'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// rtog med rig pa chen po'i me sbar bas//
302b6(rnying rgyud): 'das las kyi bag chags thim sbyang rol// hUM brtson 'grus pha rol byin pa rnam par dag pa'i sku// le lo sel mdzad rtun pa'i gsung nyid can// 'od byed sa la rab tu spyod pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje spyan
302b7(rnying rgyud): ras gzigs la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags dag gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid thig le chen po'i ho ma khung du// lce yi dbang po'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes me sbang bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags
303a1(rnying rgyud): thim phyung rol// hUM shes rab pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra// gti mug sel mdzad ye shes chen po'i gsung // sbyang bar dka' ba'i sA la spyod pa'i thugs// dam rdzam bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di/
303a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'jam dpal sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags ngag gyur cig/ hU~M chos nyid stong pa chen po'i hom khung du// lus kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// rtog med mnyam pa chen po'i mi sbyar bsdu// tshe 'das las kyi
303a3(rnying rgyud): bag chags thim sbyang rol// hUM bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sku// bying rgod sel ba'i chos nyid dag pa'i gsub// mngon gyur sa la rab tu spyod pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// byams pa mi hri'i sku
303a4(rnying rgyud): la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags dag gyur cig/ hUM chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu'i hom khung du// rtog par snang ba yid kyi yam shing la// rtog med nam mkha' chen po'i me sbar bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags thim
303a5(rnying rgyud): sbyang rol// hUM smon lam pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra// skye ba sel mdzad rang nyid rig pa'i gsung // ring du song ba'i sa la spyod pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// phyag na rdo rje'i sgra la mchod par 'bul//
303a6(rnying rgyud): tshe 'das las kyi bag chags dag gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid slob med pa'i hom khung du// gzugs su snang ba'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// gnyis su med par rtog pa'i mi spang bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags thim sbyang rol// hUM stobs kyi pha rol
303a7(rnying rgyud): phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra// gdug pa sel mdzad gzhan rgyud 'dzin pa'i gsung // chos kyi sprin gyi si la rtsod pa'i thugs// dmardzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje 'gag med sku la mchod par 'dul// tshe 'dis las kyi sgrib pa
303b1(rnying rgyud): da zur cig/ b+h+rarmas nyid 'gags pa meng pa'i shomakhrang du// A r+ra snang ba'i rtog pa'i yam shang sa// 'gag pA med pa'i ye shes ma spang bas// tshe 'das las kyi bug chags bsreg kyang ral// tr-I bI shes pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra/
303b2(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa sel mdzad gsal ba'i rgyud rig gsung // legs pa'i blo gros ma la spyod pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje bde ba'i sbrul mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa dag gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid
303b3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa med pa'i hom khung du// dri ru snang ba'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// rtog med rig pa chen pa'i me sbar bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags bsreg sbyang rol// hUM yan lag ma 'gags pha rol phyin pa'i sgra// rig pa sel mdzad rig med
303b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gsung // bde ba legs pa'i sa la spyod pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje rol pa'i skul mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa dag gyur cig/ b+h+rUM chos nyid mnyam pa chen po'i ho ma rung du/
303b5(rnying rgyud): ro ru snang ba'i rtog pa'i yam shing la// dmigs med ye shes chen po'i me sbar pas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags bsreg sbyang rol// b+h+rUM sbal pa gang 'dul pha rol phyin pa'i sgra// 'gro ba'i log par rtog pa sel ba'i gsung // pad+ma tsan
303b6(rnying rgyud): sa la stong pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje sprul pa'i sgra la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'angs las kyi sgrib pa dag gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid 'gro ba med pa'i hom khung du// reg byar snang ba'i lus kyi yam shing la/
303b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid 'dod pa mang ba'i me sbar bas// tshe 'das las kyi bag chags bsreg sbyang rol// hU~M 'di sdang pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra// sgra nyid sdang bas sgrib pa sel ba'i gsung // ye shes tshogs cheni 'khor lo'i sa la spyod pa'i
304a1(rnying rgyud): du/ na / sa pa smra na na du tu
304a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnas shing la// ba ci ga tu yin pa'i m+b+ha gas/ sa sa pa myed pa gang pa ma pa'i gsung//
304a3(rnying rgyud): ma tha~Mng pa gyug / rnas ba 'du sa dus la ma 'dang/ ga
304a4(rnying rgyud): shing la// dadasartson na shes shes bste// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa jim ma / shes ra 'ab ma byin pa sa med phyi shas ga mdzu phel ba'i gsu/ skye thab 'ad sa la snang ba gags
304a5(rnying rgyud): dam thas bdud rtsi 'bar bu'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje spyan gab sgra la mtshang bar 'bral// tsha 'das las kyi sgrib bri ga kyang gyisam pa nyid sgo med pa'o na mkhrang // 'dzin par snang brtag pa'i lam shing pa// dgas la na chen po
304a6(rnying rgyud): sgrar bas/ tshe 'das las kyi sleb pa bim myang dol// hrI chos daskye sa mi 'byur bar lasbyin pa'i rtsa// ris pa 'ang de ga nyis me sel ba'i gsuMng // pa bcas nam mkha' dadape snang pa'i thugs// dmathus bad rtsi 'bar ba'i mdzod pa 'di//
304a7(rnying rgyud): phyim dpral sa mang por 'phrul// 'das las thoslab pa dag da kyi'o ba pa tu dru/ yu' ga pas pa shing sa shes rig pa'i mthar bas// tshe 'dus pa
304b1(rnying rgyud): tu sems ma byung na dang 'di sems da con byung bzangs mtshad sa dgas sa mang byad/
304b2(rnying rgyud): chags bsreg sbyang rol// tshe 'das bag chags sbyang zhing rdo rje'i sems dpa' rnams la mchod par 'bul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / spang pa'i gsang ba dag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston
304b3(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa sbyang pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems ma rnams la mchod pa ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// hUM kun gzhi'i rnam shes gnas su dag pa'i sku// nyon mongam mer sna gnas
304b4(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i gsung // mig gi rnam shes gnas su dag pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje sgeg mo'i sgra la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM nyon mongs yid ni gnas su
304b5(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i sku// nyon mongs chags pa gnas su dag byed gsung // rna ba'i rnam shes gnas su dag pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje phreng ba'i sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur
304b6(rnying rgyud): cig/ hUM yid kyi rnam shes gnas su dag pa'i grwa// nyon mongs dri ma gnas su dag byed gsung // sA y-i rnam shes gnas su drag pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje dbyangs ma'i sku yi mchod par 'phrul//
304b7(rnying rgyud): tshwa 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM mig gi rnam shes gnas su dag pa'i sku// nyon mongs bag med gnas su dgra pa'i gsung // mig gi skye mched gnas su drag pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'ab re ba'i mchod pa 'di//
304b8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gar ma'i bla la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM rna ba'i rnam shes gnas su dag pa'i sgra// nyon mongs phra ma gnas su dag pa'i gsung // rna ba'i skye mched gnas su dag pa'i thugs// dam
305a1(rnying rgyud): sa 'a ma na na sa nga / sa sa sa sa na / sa sa ga
305a2(rnying rgyud): gang/ sa sa ca garnas pa pa gas// dam y-i'i bar ba'i myed pa 'i/ la nga mas pa me brgya / seM shes gnas ga pa
305a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
305a4(rnying rgyud): dag pa // sa byin pa pa gnas sa dge pa'i // ma da nas su dag pa'i jigs// dam rnas bdu 'im no pa 'i sbrul mamyong par 'jal/ rgya'angs las kyi sgrub pa kya
305a5(rnying rgyud): mig sa dbang gyi gnas sangag 'dziH// can mangs chags sems gnas su dag parjig steng // mA li mam cing gi nas sri rig pa'i gas// dmanas 'byi byu ba'i mchod pa'adi// do mau dang sgral mtshor par 'phrul
305a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa kyi sgrub ma mi dbang ba gan smras dag dang// dngas sa gnasus dag bsdig na/ skyes bye gdas sring ga pa thugs// dmangs bdu bar na nga pang/
305a7(rnying rgyud): 'dan sgral mtshad par 'jung// cha 'das sa kyi sgrib pabyang chu // hUM grus kyi dbang po gnas su dag pa'i sgra legapa'i btul gnas sre na pa'i gzung // lus kyi rlom ze gnas spangs pa'i thugs// dmadzes bdud rtse
305b1(rnying rgyud): pa 'di// rdo rje 'joms pa mo la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM yid kyi dbang po gnas su dag pa'i sgra// nyon mongs brnab sems gnas su dag pa'i gsung // chos kyi skye mched gnas su dag pa'i thugs// dam
305b2(rnying rgyud): rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje yid spyod ma la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa kyang gyur cig/ hU~M dngos por snang ba gnas su dag pa'i sku// nyon mongs gnod sems gnas su dag pa'i gsung // yul du
305b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma 'joms pa'i thugs// dA mdzes bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje brjid pa mo la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i sku// ngag gi nyes pa gnas su dag
305b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsung // bdag med nam mkha' lta bu'i thugs mnga' bar// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje bdug pa'i sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM mtshan mar 'dzin pa gnas su dag pa'i sku/
305b5(rnying rgyud): lus kyi nyes pa gnas su dag pa'i gsung // mtshan med nam mkha' lta bu'i thugs mnga' bar// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje me tog ma la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM rgyu ru 'dzin pa
305b6(rnying rgyud): gnas su dag pa'i sku// yid kyi nyes pa gnas su dag pa'i gsung // rgyu med 'dzin pa gnas su dag pa'i thugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje mar me ma la mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM log par
305b7(rnying rgyud): blta ba gnas su dag pa sku// grub pa'i longs spyod gnas su dag pa'i gsung // ye shes dag pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa can// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di// rdo rje dri chang mas mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig
306a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa sa ba sung ba sa nga// byung sa nas nga // rlung sa mas thaslab pa dngag/ glo// t+ta // brda'anarban/
306a2(rnying rgyud): sarbathA pa shAn+d+ha g+han swAH/ las 'das pa'i bag chags bsgrag sa/ ngasams sa rnams la mdzod pa bul ba'i phre'u ste bcu gnyis pan// ba gas bya gi rdzasams dpa' mas stong pa kAng
306a3(rnying rgyud): tsha'adas las pagatsigs snang ba rjid// thub ba drug pa rjod pa sgrug// rten pa'i rtson pa nga bzang ba des// rnargyam skyon grangs gnasas dag blan/ de spyod ba dbu'i gzus/ rig la shes thugs sa
306a4(rnying rgyud): lha rnams 'dul// 'joms mdzad lha yi thub sa mchod per 'khrus/ oM 'angs las kyi bag chags kyang ba dang / hU~M ga dog rtson spangs gnas su dag pa'i/ rjong 'a longs stong na pa rin pa'i gsung // dpa' bo lha le thugs rdzas lha min
306a5(rnying rgyud): 'dral// rdo rje lha min thub la mchod par 'bral// hUM rgyal sbyin sbyangs gnas mu dag pa'i sgra// khro bo'i rig pa'i phongs spyod 'dzin pa'i gsung // 'gro ba'i gnyen pos mi rnams 'dul ba'i thugs// 'dul byed thub pa'i skal mchod par yul/
306a6(rnying rgyud): ga gi myug sngon spangs gnas su dag pa'i sgra// gnyis med longs spyod 'dzin pa'i rig pa'i gsung // glen lugs sgrib pa gcod pa'i rig pa'i thugs// 'joms byed thub pa'i sgra la mchod par 'bul// hUM 'dod chags skyon spangs gnas su dag pa'i
306a7(rnying rgyud): grong 'i 'dzing 'phrul ba srung ba'i gsas// nyid kyis mi dgas su sa gcing sa dzang midags rgyal ba pani mas gas ga pa 'gro/ bang sdig la
306b1(rnying rgyud): gsung // rigs mchog dmyal ba 'dren mdzad dpa' bo 'thugs// dpa' brtan dmyal ba'i thub la mchod par 'bul// tshwa 'das las kyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ hUM chos nyid skye ba med pa'i hom khung du// nyon mongs rgyud drug ton
306b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i yam shing la// rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i me sbar bas// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa thim sbyang rol// a nr-i su tri pre du shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// tshe las 'das pa'i bag chags sbyangs shing // sbrul sku thub pa la mchod pa'i le'u ste bcu
306b3(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// // sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'dis las kyi bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo rnams la mchod pa 'bul ba gang // ston pa'i stan/
306b4(rnying rgyud): pa kun tu bzang po des// hUM khro la khros pas zhi ba'i sgra// khro dpung chen po 'joms pa'i gsung // khros pas nyo bo'i sprin chen thugs// zhi mdzad khro bo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// hUM lha rnams 'dul ba gtso bo'i sku// 'joms byed dbang
306b5(rnying rgyud): phyug chen po'i gsung // zhi mdzad rab tu 'jigs pa'i thugs// 'joms byed khro la mchod par 'bul// hUM shar phyogs dregs pa kun 'dul sla// dri zla'i gtso gzungs brdzis pa'i gsung // 'joms byed dbang phyug 'dul ba'i thugs//
306b6(rnying rgyud): gshed mdzad 'dul la mchod par 'bul// dri shar lho dregasnga pa 'dul ba'i sku// bden bral gtso gzungs 'dul ba'i gsung // 'joms byed dbang phyug rig pa'i thugs// bden bral 'dul la mchod par 'bul// hU~M lho phyogs
306b7(rnying rgyud): dregs pa 'dul ba'i sku// gshin rje gtso gzungs 'dul ba'i gsung // 'joms byed dbang phyug 'dul ba'i thugs// cho gshed khro la mchod par 'bul// hUM lho nub dregs pa 'dul ba'i sku// srin po 'dul ba rig pa'i gsung //
307a1(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed dbang phyug drugs rje'i bdag/ mthar byed khro la mchod par 'bul// hU~M nub phyogs dregs pa 'dul ba'i sku// klu yi gtsogazungs gdan bting gsung // 'joms byed dbang phyug yid
307a2(rnying rgyud): thugs// 'dul byed khro la mtshud par 'bul// d+hi nIb byang dregs pa 'dul ba'i sku// rlung lha'i gtsogazungs gdan ba ting gsung // 'joms byed rgyal po thugs kyi bdag/ 'dul byed khrol mchod par 'bul// bur phyogs
307a3(rnying rgyud): dregs pa 'dul ba'i sku// gnod sbyin gtso gzungs gdan po ting gsung // 'dul byed dpong phyug thugs kyi bdag/ dbang mchog khro la mchod par 'bul// hUM byang shar dregs pa 'dul ba'i sgo// dbang ldan gdan bting rig pa'i gsung //
307a4(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed stobs kyis gnon pa'i thugs// stobs ldan khro la mchod par 'bul// hU~M phrin las 'joms bu'i hom khung du// gdug pa nyon mongs yum shing la/ 'joms byed khro bo'i me spang bas// tshe 'das gshed ma bsreg
307a5(rnying rgyud): sbyang rol// hU~M badz+ra lo ta bi dza la che ge sarba b+hA paM mA rA ya~M dz+wa la ri/ tshe las 'das pa'i gshed ma sbyang zhing / ye shes khro bo la mchod pa dbul ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / sbyang ba'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i
307a6(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun tu bzang po la// zhing skyong rdo rje 'gro ba'i drab la mdzad la// tshe 'das sgrib pa sbyang zhing mchod phrag pa// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzung po des// hU~M bde gshegs thams cad 'odi las sprul pa'i sgra// rgyal bkran gyi zhi khams sbyar ba'i
307a7(rnying rgyud): gsung // yon tan 'gag med thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs// dmadzes bdud rtsi 'bang po'i mcho nga 'di// zhing skyong dpal mdzad spel mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar mdzad// e badz+ra ba hram tshi ge mai shAn+ti kuru wA hA/
307b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med blag ma rung // bzung bzad kyim sbyar bas// tshe 'das bgra chags batheg byung rlol// badz+rams tsug mardal // rkang stong dpal yang da ma'i la rmang par byal ba'i grus tum pa // / nga ba'i gsang bya dag
307b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' yas// don pa'i ston pa krung tu bzang po la// tshe 'das las kyi bag zugs snang ba'i phyir// ye shes tho ba rnams pa mchod par 'bral ba gang // rton pa'i ston bklan podas// dz+ha log par blta ba'i mtshan ma 'joms pa'i
307b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa 'dzin pa 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsung // ma 'gasus ye shes rige pa'i thugs mnga' ba// rnam par rgyas pa'i sgra la mchod par 'bral// hUM mtshan pa bralta ba mtshan med dag pa'i sgra// rnam pa'i yul gyis 'grob 'dral ba'i gsung /
307b4(rnying rgyud): g.yob yi ye shes thugs mnga' ba// gshin rjeg shed po'i chu la mchod par 'bral// b+hu ba dag tu blta ba'i mtshan ma 'joms pa'i sgra// yul du 'dzin pa'i rig pa med pa'i gsung // rgya ma chad pa'i ye shes thugs mnga' ba// dbang sbed rta ma sbyin sul
307b5(rnying rgyud): mchod par 'bul// b+h+rUM chad par bltab bde byas spel ba'i sku// dmigs pa med pa rig pa chen po'i gsung // mi 'gyur ba li ye shes thugs mnga' ba// gsol mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil la mchod par 'phrul// tshe 'das las myi sgrib pa byed gyur cig
307b6(rnying rgyud): srinags las la grub pa 'i na ma khung du// log rtog d+hu ra snang ba'i lam shing la// 'joms mdzad ye shes chen po'i mi sbar byas// tshwa 'das bag chags thams cad bsreg steng rol// d+hu badz+ra krod+ha N+De ge me shaun+ta kA ru swA hA/ ye shes slob la mchod pa dngul
307b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// ye shes sgom rnams la mchod pa 'bul ba dang // tshe 'dis sgrib pa skyong ba rgya// ston pa'i stan pa kun tu bzung
308a1(rnying rgyud): ng+yas/ na / du na na/ na sa na sa rgyas su // da sa dun nan
308a2(rnying rgyud): nan pa mngon sangs rgyas pa'i// / shes 'gas pas pas na pa nas/ tham pa da pa gas / dag sa byam pa med par 'phrus/ bdag ma na ya na sang+yas na /
308a3(rnying rgyud): zugs drug 'brub rnyan ga s+ho// dga'adu na mang shA 'im ga/ rdorjesngags sgrigs da pa dun dugs pa pad+man sangs rgyas pa'i hU~M/ sa 'das pa
308a4(rnying rgyud): sa tshod pa 'gyu ba din ma thugs// 'dams byed byis rnams sachud par 'bral/ 'angs las tu sbyid drug pa sa/ oMbad+ma d+hi hrI sam pa hU~M/ sa nyid kyi mang po'i tog zungs// ga pachen pa
308a5(rnying rgyud): shing la// gA mang mi shes phyin pa'i sa snang sa// tshabang sasas mye gnags sreg byung sa/ hrI/ yi shes smra pa 'i 'is stsagams mi chod par byal ba'i larnasas du
308a6(rnying rgyud): sna ma gas ba sa sa dab rnams// smon pa'i/ sa sa gcigs ba ma rna pa'i theg na / yang pa'i di kya pongs ma 'i ba
308a7(rnying rgyud): mapa// mig sa kyim du mas pa// 'gas zhing 'arnams// na mangs bag ga // dab sa ga papa da/ nga ji rgyal ci ba la na pa ldan/ mam rnamam
308b1(rnying rgyud): zhesdang rus pa'i yam shing la// kun pazang thugs kyi me spangar bas// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur// rA shA rti ku ru swA hA/ hUM gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo bcu mdung rtse zur bzhi// logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms pas/
308b2(rnying rgyud): yon tan ma lus rgyas par 'gyur// rgyas mdzad lha la mchod par 'brul// puSh+TiM ku ru swA hU~M/ hUM phrin l-is saM yoM ho ma khung du// nyon mongs nga rgyal yam shing la// kun bzang rdzogs pa'i me sba rabs// skye ba'i bag chags
308b3(rnying rgyud): bsreg sbyang rol// swa pASh+TiM ku ru swAb+hA/ hUM zangs sam dmar po'i sh+yaing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtsi zla gram// log ma la dbang gi lha bsgoms pas// grang 'dod ye shes dbang du sbyar// dbang spyad lhal mchod par 'bral/
308b4(rnying rgyud): ba shang ku ru swA hA/ hU~M phrin las moM yaM ho ma khung du// nyon mongs 'dod chags yam shing la// kun bzang rig pa'i me sbar bas// gnas pa'i bag chags bsreg sbyang rol// pre me ta~M ku drA swA hA/ hU~M lcags sam dag po'i shing
308b5(rnying rgyud): rnams pa// mgo bo rgya mdungad rtse zur gsum// logs la drug po'i lnga bsgoms pas// gnod gdug nyon mongs brnag par 'gyur// brlag mdang lha la mchod par dbul// badz+ra kro d+ha sum+b+ha g+nid+b+ha ba pa hU~M/ b+h+rUM phrin las rlung gi
308b6(rnying rgyud): khrung du// nyon mongs brag dog yam shing lnga// kro N+Dal 'joms pa'i me smar bas// gnod byed nyid mongs bsreg sbyang rol// oM badz+ra kr-id+d+hi sAm+b+ha b+h+r-i d+b+ha ba ya ga mo dz+wa la ro// brinA las rnam pa bzhi'i lha la mchod pa dbul ba'i lA'u
308b7(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// bsreg rdzas sngags kyis dbul ba ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la// rdzas kyi mchod
309a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'di rnamasaldan// lha rnams kun par dad bral// dang pa la shes ltang zhal zas bdud ci mar gyis mdzad/ oM ak+Sha / ts+tsha swAt+ma/ oM amra sa/ au d+ha yang ya swAH/ rasaH/
309a2(rnying rgyud): de nas ngur ba'i myu gu lA// sngags 'di bzlas te mchod pa 'bul// AM ag+na ye/ badz+ra A yu She shA n+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de nas nas kyi snying po la// sngags 'di bzlas la mchod par 'bul// oM ag+na ye swA hA/ mi hA be bA ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA
309a3(rnying rgyud): hA/ de bzhin gyi yi snying po la// sngags 'di bzlas te mchod par dbul// oM ag+na ye/ badz+ra g+hA sma ri shIn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ti la dang yungs kar mar rnams la/ sngags 'di bzlas la mchod par dbu la// oM a ga ye badz+ra sarba pA paM da ha na
309a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra wAH/ hU~M kA ru swAH/ de nas zho nga zan nyid la/ sngags 'dib zlas te mchod dar 'bru // A~M at+pa 'i sbyings rba de tis ruh+NahA/ de nas rtsa mchog kusha pa// sngags 'di bzlas te mchod par 'bral// A~M athA ya/ #
309a5(rnying rgyud): ta badz+ra ya/ shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ de nas 'bru rnams thams cad pa// sngags 'di bzlas shing mchod par 'bul// oM ag+na ye/ badz+ra bI dzA ya/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de nas ma sha ka tid la/ sngags 'di bzlas shing mchod par 'bul// oM a
309a6(rnying rgyud): ye ma hA ba lA ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de nas 'bras kyi lde gu la// sngags 'di bzlas te mchod par 'bul// oM ap+pa yaM/ badz+ra puSh+Ta ya shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de nas zho sha rnam lnga la// sngags 'di bzlas te mchod par 'bul// A~M a g+na ya/
309a7(rnying rgyud): shrI ba yaM shAn+tiM ku ru swA r+tha/ de nas lha rnams thams cad la// sngags dang sbyar te dbul bar bya// phyi dang nang gi mchong pa yang // gyi rnams kun pa ring dbul// rang gi sngags dang mchod pa'i sngags// sbyar te thim par rgyas pa
309b1(rnying rgyud): rdzas dbul ba bstan pa'i ya'u b+ha bcung dgub da// spa d+ma ba'i gsang bdag rdoH sems dpung yis// ston pa'i sngon pa kun tu bzang po la// hrI yi mchod ba sngags kyis dbul ba dang // tshang das sdig skyi ba snang baji lta bu// ston pa'i/
309b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa kun tu bzang pongs// de nas zhabs pasi yang 'alwa ba ni/ ni hrI \u0f7f/ de nas mi tog dbul ba nI/ nga du m+bu sh-in ru saH/ de nas 'dreg po se dbu la dzi na/
309b3(rnying rgyud): um/ de nas mar me dbul pon / ma pa/ ni ma bdag pa na/ \u0f7f/ ngan sa slong
309b4(rnying rgyud): pUdz+ra shAn+ti~M kur+yaM swA hA/ de nas til dang mar dbul lo// hUM hU~M badz+ra hrId+hI/ sarba hA bI ga na swA hA/ ku sha 'bru rnams la sogs kyang // mAM ga~M sa~M kyi rim par sbyor te dbul/ sdig pa srung zhing kun tu bzang po la mi tshad bu dbul
309b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // skung pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'das zan nyid gtad pa ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// tshe 'das rigs kyi du
309b6(rnying rgyud): khyod yang // dri ma 'di na sku yi rten// 'phan phran 'di ni lus kyi hAd// tsu ta 'dri ni zla yi shing // gdugs phubs 'di ni sku yi khebs// gnas mchog 'di ni bsgrub pa'i gnas// dkyil du khor dam bya dadi la lhosra// kun bzang
309b7(rnying rgyud): dam lha mchog bsgom// snying po yi ge dbru bcu bzlas// rang gi slob dpon 'di la nyon// me mar gsal ba'i mdangs laM ltos// lu gu chud kyi phyag rgya chings// rdo rje gnyen po'i ming nas pos// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor
310a1(rnying rgyud): bskor// gdung ba'i sems kyis lha bsrung ste// ma tha'i 'du shes nyer zhog la// rdo rje'i spyan la nye bar dgongs// rdzas mchog longs spyod 'di la rol// bshos dang gal phyi dza gang dang // zla khrom
310a2(rnying rgyud): zla rgyas zla tshogs dang // tshe yi snying po tshimA byed dang // longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// kun gyi zas su thob bya'i phyir// rang nyid rdo rje dpon slob ste// zhal zas yongs spyod 'di la rol// tshe las 'das pa'i zan tshogs su
310a3(rnying rgyud): gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / skud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// khyad par zan dang nor bsngo ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// tshe 'das
310a4(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi bu la chu bsngo ba ni// de ring cho 'phos lus kyi ri bas te// gdung ba'i gnyen dang 'grogs par ma gyur te// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa las// bag chags bkru phyir bsil chab 'di bsngos pas// lus ngag yid
310a5(rnying rgyud): gsum sdug bsngal dag gyur cig/ tsha zhing gdung ba'i sdug bsngal dag gyur cig/ hUM de ring las kyi 'brel pa'i bu smad dang // mi yul 'di na smon lam mthu med nas// gtan du 'grogs pa'i dbang dang skal med pas// 'jig rten pha
310a6(rnying rgyud): rol gnas su phyin pa la// yid gzugs gdungs pas bsams te mchi ma phrar// sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis sems bskyed nas// ser sna chags pa med pa'i mdud pa grol// ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas 'di// nam
310a7(rnying rgyud): gzhag gtan gyi bshos kyi skal bar bsngo// hU~M de ring yid gcugs 'dris pa'i sha rogs pos// pha ma so sos bskyed kyang yid gcugs sems 'dris pas// mthun par zas zos dga' ba'i rtsed mo byas// bskal par 'grogs kya
310b1(rnying rgyud): skad cig skyo med na// tshe 'phos lus brjes las kyi rebs te// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa la// nam gzhag gtan gyi bzhes pa 'dren lags kyi// ro mchog brgya dang snyan pa'i zhal zas 'di// dar cig gsol bas phung po bklag
310b2(rnying rgyud): mdangs gsal// lus kyi nad skyon thams cad zhi bar bsngo// nam gzhag yun gyi bzhes pa'i skal par bsngo// hUM 'jig rten las kyis 'brel ba'i grogs po dang // gtan du 'grogs pa'i dbang dang skal med nas// 'jig rten pha rol gnas
310b3(rnying rgyud): su phyin pa la// brtse zhing gdung ba'i grogs pos 'bed lags kyi// las 'phro gcig pa'i grogs po 'dir kyonani// dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i bka' drin gyis// dam tshig bdud rtsi gsung rab gnyen po bstub// tshogs kyi zhal zas longs
310b4(rnying rgyud): spyong rgya mtsho la// ci ba der rol zhing spyad par 'di ru sbron// mthun pa'i zas za gsang ba'i gros bya yi// bsod bu sngo mthar 'byams su dkarare bting steng // dga' sdug bde ba'i longs spyod tshe lo drage// pham par mi dogs rgyal thabs thob par nges//
310b5(rnying rgyud): spyod lam gcig pa'i grogs po 'di ru ston// g+hi mo zos kyi dbyings kyi 'phen cig btsukA// ye shes rtogs pa'i mda' zhig 'o skol 'phangs// yang dag tshwa suM dkyil du brdeg 'tshal gyi// spyod lam gcig pa'i grogs po da tshur spyon//
310b6(rnying rgyud): btsa'o dang nyur mo lcags las me zhig phyung // btang snyoms sgra yi shing la me zhig srung // thugs rje bdag med drong la lhan cig bsro// spyod lam gcig pA'i grogs po de tshur spyon// bkres sgom gdung ba bsal phyir 'dzar ba bshams/
310b7(rnying rgyud): dang cig gsol bas lus kyi nad rnams byang // gdungs pa tshims pas lus kyi bkrag mdangs gsal// 'khor ba'i gcong rong de na ci zhig byed// mtho ris dga' ldan gnas mchog yod bzhin du// na rag sdug bsngal gnas kyis
311a1(rnying rgyud): seMnag byeng // zang zang thugs la dgong sA la 'din byus// d+ha cha gcig las ni 'grel ba'i grogs mo dang // yun du 'grogs kyang sbyad cig bya mangs// mgan bgran pa dang 'grogs pa skal medan// 'a
311a2(rnying rgyud): ten pha rol gnas su phyin pa las// sang sang gsal ba tshangs pa'i sgra ldan zhing // byang chub rgyan thag bsgrengs pas nad dang sdug bsngal zhi// thugs rjes 'dab mas yid bzhin gos dang zas// gdung ba'i klu yis byang chub rjes dran nas/
311a3(rnying rgyud): sba ba'i tshig gis sku gsung thugs dang 'bres// zas dang btung bas sku yi bkrag mdangs rnyed// nam gzhag gtan gyi zas kyi skal bar bsngo// b+ha gser dngul mu tig zangs dang mchod// gzig yu shel zangs ra kun dang // rkyes
311a4(rnying rgyud): yul spad pa'i bang tshe dang // bstang ma 'khor gsum srab mda' dang // mda' gzhu mtshon na drim chor dang // ska gakhri gsag ga cha dang // tor nan drung rtagase' btsad dang // stag gzig grang sra ba phub mog dang // sagA ti shwa sta ma su rag rnam/
311a5(rnying rgyud): brtse gdung bya mas pa'i sha rogs pos// mi zad gtan gyi nor du bsngo// kun tu bzang po'i thugs rje yis// bskal pa du mar mi zad cing // bde srid longs spyod ldan par shog/ hUM de ring rtse gcig las kyis 'brel pa'i bu sring gis// gtan
311a6(rnying rgyud): du 'grogs pa'i dbang dang skal med de// mi lus 'di nas 'jig rten tsho'i bos te// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa las// tshe bas lus brjes rang gi rebs te// gdung zhing brtse bar bsam pa'i lham dang sring // gapung po 'i sems kyis
311a7(rnying rgyud): yid dran mchim phyung // sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis sems bkyed nas// yid bzhin bdud rtsi longs spyod zhal zas 'di// nam gzhag gtan gyi bzhes pa'i skal du bsngo// rje yid bzhin longs spyod bdud rtsi zhal skyems ladi// sdug bsngal 'du
311b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas nas grol ba'i phyir// bsil ba'i bdud rtsi ba tu sbyar ba yis// 'bras bu'i chos dang sbyar ba ma yin byung // dkon mchog gsum po'i thugs rje byin rlabs kyis// rab tu gdung ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma byung // sngon du bsgrubs pa'i bsod
311b2(rnying rgyud): nams mthu yin te// mchu la reg na sgo gsum dbang po rno// lce la reg na dran zhing shes pa gsal// khong du bathudu na nad dang sdug bsngal zhi// khazas skom du sbyar bas lus kyi sdug bsngal zhi// byams gdung brtse ba'i bsam pas gnyen bshes
311b3(rnying rgyud): gyis// yi la gzugs pa'i sdug bsngal dris bskal ba'i// brtse ba'i bas ma bAs na dang sdug bsngal zhe// mthul rlog pas shes rab bdu nan// khong du chud pas rlung zhe 'ang sas bde// kha bas dz+nyA m-i du sbyang bas mdog dang 'thod tu
311b4(rnying rgyud): gsas// yang bdin bdud 'i sbyar bgasol ba skyes// bzlas pad+ma ma'i bad+ma rdzi 'a gyu cig/ rnam gzhag gtan gyi sgyums kyi skal bar ba/ tshe 'dus pa deste nang ga tang pa'i phre ste gnyis badz+ra// ltung ba
311b5(rnying rgyud): gsang bad rdo rje sems dpa'i yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzung ba la// tshe'ad snga la ma nyid bstan pa'i stsu Ta// smyon pa'i ston pa gan ta babang ba dris// TI so zhig song zhig rigs kyi bri// tsa 'das rigs mi bu khyod ni// 'jig rten
311b6(rnying rgyud): rtag par ma b+hir te// dAny+dzal+le shing las la bu bas// sa 'di bcad bu man mad+ha ni// 'jig rten pa yis yin hU~M/ del chags pa sa skye zhig/ rgyo 'das rigs kyi bu khyod la// rnam par thar pa'i lam bstan pas// sgrib gnyis
311b7(rnying rgyud): spangs nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa la// der yang shin tu mi gnas pas// sa ba dra'i ye shes mthar phyin te// kun tu 'od kyis las 'das// pad+ma can du gyur pa las// yi ge tshogs chen sa las 'ang
312a1(rnying rgyud): rung shA ya shes pa rla badra 'ardul// sang+yas rgyas sa gas su ldan thub ste/ byang chubartson po'i pa las 'das// sdug pa bkang pa zhing khams na// 'og min ldan thub pa brang du// byas batshan
312a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen yin// skye med chos kyi dbying sa nyid du// gdong nas dag bzung bste// nga dru sa chen po thob// tsal dmed par spyad kyis rdzogs// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas pa // dbyer med kun pazang gcig tu byung // 'di
312a3(rnying rgyud): dang druganas// ma brdul gyis spa / yinas dag pa'ad nyid // 'byu b+h+ya/ sa m+mA ng+ge ngas kyiga'// ga ste shes thabs sa dal/ thabs de shes rab kyil ba mis/
312a4(rnying rgyud): mongs drug gsum gnangal 'debs// da mangs pag mgrus bung byung naste// byang chub chen po'i mi'i rdzu gig/ 'das dgas ni bu thong bangam shes can tha'i mam sangs// rjes rnying skyem gnas su mang // gnas ma na
312a5(rnying rgyud): las ma 'du // tsalas 'das pa lam bsnyen pa ky-i la 'a gsum bam// snang ba'igs na mams / pa'i spyon sa sung chu bzang ba l+la/ 'das nyan mongs sungs te ga shegs sas pa byed
312a6(rnying rgyud): gang // sbyin pa'i ston pargan tu bzung po ngas// hUM dam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor das// rdul bams dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor de// tshe 'das ldas parjes rigs kyi tha kyang la// thugs ce sngags rgyas ma shes dzas dngas
312a7(rnying rgyud): nas// mdun sem kha' sa byur gyi phrin sa hA// kr-in pa zang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'amang rab cagapa la// rgyal ba'i dkyila'i khor thugs gnas// pha gyi 'ong bang dag sems// 'das pagachags gtan na / bani gas pa bya
312b1(rnying rgyud): za ni sreg par byed pa'i mchog/ mtho ris sgo 'geg ngan song sgo 'byed pa'i// dngos grub gegs su byed pa thams cad dang // las kyi sgrib pa bag chag ma thams cad kun// phaT rgya 'od zer rngag pos bsreg par bya'o// tshe 'das rigs kyi
312b2(rnying rgyud): las dang nyon mongs bag chags kun byeng nas// 'bras bu chos sku chen po thob bya'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi thig le gcig tu gyur// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i sras su byin brlabs pas// sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i yig 'gu gsum//
312b3(rnying rgyud): le byang chub sems la rab tu thim// gru gsung thugs kyi skas su skye bskyed do// / sku gsung thugs las bskyed pa'i sras po khyod// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sgra thob pa dang // 'grod rje rdzogs pa'i sprul pa thob phyir du// ri mor dris
312b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhal yas 'dir zhugs pas// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod kyisaM// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor thob gyur cig/ chos sku longs su spel sku gsum thob pas// sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i sras po khyod// gzugs spa dri ro reg kya
312b5(rnying rgyud): ma yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo thim par ros// nyon mongs pag chags byang byas nas// sangs rgyas sras thob pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / srung ba'i srasang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun hA bzang po la
312b6(rnying rgyud): tshe 'das lus pa rjes rigs kyi bu de la// sbyin sreg byas pas 'bram bu thob pa ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po res// rigs drug gnas nas drangs pa yis// nyon mongs drug nyid dag nas su// thob pa drug gi gnas su
312b7(rnying rgyud): rigs drug gtor ma phul ba yis// nyon mongs las dang bag chags dang // bdud kyi zas dang longs myod 'ong // bdud rtsi ye shes chen po'i khrus byas pas// nyon mongs bag chags kun byang nas// zag pa med pa'i lus kyi 'bras bu
313a1(rnying rgyud): thub// sbal klu thub pa rnams la skabs su gsol bA lis// 'bras bu sbrul sku chen po'i lus thob bo// tshe 'das sems bsrung byas pa yis// bag chags sna tshogs sems nyid las nas yang // 'bras
313a2(rnying rgyud): budang zung ye shes sems thob dro// tshe 'dis dbang bsrur byin brlab byas pa yis// 'kha~M raba'i byug bsngal gtan nas byung nas kyang // 'bras bu bde gshegs rnams kyi sras su 'gyur// rang gi rtag tshogs dkyil 'khor zhal
313a3(rnying rgyud): srul ba yis// 'bras bu rtog med lha yi lus thob bo// rang gi phung pos me lha/ mchod pa yis// sgrib pa mang po dag ste gnyis med thob// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la// mchod bstong bye brag mang po byas pa
313a4(rnying rgyud): yis// 'bras bu sku gsum ldan grub dbyer med thob// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa yis// theg pa kun gyi dkyil 'khor zhugs pa yin// 'bras bu theg pa kun gyi yang rtse thob// tshe 'das zan nyid gtid pa yis// bdud rtsi
313a5(rnying rgyud): zas la rtag tu longs spyad cing // bag chags sbyangs te gnas nyid sbar ba yis// 'bras bu kun tu bzang po'i sras su 'gyur// tshe 'das lus kyi phung po la// mchod pa sbyin bsreg byas pa yis// bde gshegs kun gyi sras su
313a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'khor ba'i 'dam las thar nas kyang // lhag med byang chub chen po 'thob// sbyin sreg byas pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// / srung po'i gamang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun
313a7(rnying rgyud): rgya bzang po la// rgyud 'di gang la gtad cing gang du brgyad nas gang gi 'bras bu thob// ston pa'i stan pa kun tu bzang po des// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// bsreg tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i bag chags bsregs// thob tu med pa'i spyan
313b1(rnying rgyud): ba kyi med thod// btud du med pa'i ye shes me ltar gtang // rang byung ye shes rig pa chen pongs// bsreg tu med pa'i rig pa'i bag chags bsngags// thob tu med pa'i rig gsal ched po thob// brgyad du med pa'i longs sgra chel gtad// longs
313b2(rnying rgyud): spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi ston pa des// bsreg tu med pa'i 'od kyi sgrib pa bsregs// thob tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad thob// brgyud du med pa'i byang sems che la gtad// byang chub chen po'i longs spyod ston pa des// bsreg tu med pa'i shes bya'i
313b3(rnying rgyud): sleb pa bsregs// thob tu med pa'i byang chub chen po thob// brgyud du med pa'i 'od lus sprul la gtad// 'od snang 'dus pa sprul pa'i lha mo des// bsreg tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i bag chags bsregs// thob tu med pa zhing skyong lha mo thob// brgyud
313b4(rnying rgyud): du med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma la gtad// ye shes rig pa chos skyong mkha' 'gro mas// bsreg tu med pa'i nyon mongs dug gsum bsregs// thob tu med pa'i chos skyong lha mo grub// gtad du med pa'i mchod rten tshol gtad// rgyal ba bde
313b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs mchod pa dang // sgrib pa rnam gsum skyong ba'i rgyud// sreg myong zhi ba'i rgyud chen 'di// bde gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'bar ba'i klong nas bka' stsal to// rin po che me lha zhi bar gyur pa'i rgyud las//
313b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud gtang ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// / zhi ba bai sbyin sreg gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so// / bod skad du/ rdo rje phu mo'i tAn+t+ra zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
313b7(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'og min gyi gnas/ stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs te/ rigs lnga'i
314a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / dpal phyug na rdo rje la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / dgang ldan gyi lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs
314a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa las/ sdud pa po phyag na rdo rjes/ mchod pa rgya che ba dpag tu med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas lan brgya stong du mar phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces zhus so// ston pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
314a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten du dkon mchog gsum gyi dbu 'phang bstod pa dang / las rnam bzhi'i byin rlabs brtan par mdzad pa dang / dgra ba ge gros gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir drag po'i phrin las bka' stsal du gsol zhes
314a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhus pa dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gdan seng ge'i steng na/ sku mdun dang rgya ba med par thams cad du thal le gsal zhing / mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad du ldan pa/ thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab
314a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum du bzhugs nas/ gdul dka'i sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ nyid kyi gsang ba'i phrin las
314a6(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung nas/ gdul dka' ba'i sems can thams cad la/ thugs brtse bar dgongs pas bka' stsal to// bdag dang gzhan gyi dbang du rgyud 'di gsungs so// thog mar brtag pa'i sa dpyad de/
314a7(rnying rgyud): bla ga ma yod pa'i gnas su ni// sa gzhi byin du nag po la// dang por sa bslang ba dang / sbyang ba dang brtan dang byin rlabs drag por bya/ hom khung dbyibs ni gru gsum du brko/ ngos ni ring po che drug tu bya ba dang / jug la chag gang bar bya ste/ thur
314b1(rnying rgyud): du khru gang brko bar bya/ de'i dbus su me thab bca'/ kha khyer zur gsum pa zhig byas la/ kha ra na rim pa gsum po yang / zheng tshad sor gsum par byas te// de la rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// de yi phyi rim mdzub gang la// bang rim gsum du
314b2(rnying rgyud): hANad par bya// stegs bu khru lnga gru bzhi la// 'phang du chag gang yan chad bya// de nas zhal ni nag por bgyi// ngos ni dmar por byug par bya// sgo ni byang gi phyogs su bstan// kha rAn gsum gyi dang po lA/ A33/ de yi phyi
314b3(rnying rgyud): rim par rim la// thod pa mda' gzhu spel mur btang // de yi phyi rim pang rim la// 'bar ba'i me lce 'khrigs pa bris pa la// de yi phyi rim badra rim ngos gsum du// sgo gsum dag ni dod par bya// de yi phyi rim par khyam
314b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis// sgo bzhi dgu dang ldan par bya// tshon rtsi dmar po me 'od btang // rtse mo thams cad lhor bstun no// thab kyi zhabs su rdo rje dgod// rdo rje'i tshad du sor brgyad pa// sbom du tshad ni sor gsum pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni zlu ma
314b5(rnying rgyud): leb la// 'byim 'byil yang 'phar du bskor// dkyil 'khor dag gi dbus su bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su bkram// shar lho'i mtshams su yi ge raM// nub byang mtshams mu yi ge yi// kha khyer nang du me 'od bri// dan
314b6(rnying rgyud): lha rnams dgod par bya// kha khyer dang po mthon po la// badz+ra mA le la sogs dgod// de yi phyi rim pa rI mA lA// ko re la sogs ma brgyad dang // ser ha la sogs phra men dgod// de yi phyi rim pa rim la// khro bo chen po bcu dag dgod/
314b7(rnying rgyud): de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi la// lcags kyu ma dang zhags pa dang // lcags glog dril bu bzhi dag dgod// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi dgod// de skad gsungs
315a1(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di rnams rab dag
315a2(rnying rgyud): bAs/ 'khor rnams pa rol rdzo / rdo rje mo'i tAn+ta las/ gleng ga 'a nga khyad par dkyil khan gyi ladu ste dang pat+t+ya// de nas tshor mnag po'am/ sakyur la sogs pa lan// mar mtshan/
315a3(rnying rgyud): gyi shing nyid la// chag drug pa yi tshad du bya// mgo mjug ma nor bar byas la// dr-i chu gtsang mas bsang gtor bya// khro bo bcu yi sngags bzlas shing // kho bo'i shing rtsi brdzang bar bya// bgegs kyi dbang du mi gtang bar// mtshams bcang
315a4(rnying rgyud): drug tu bskrad par bya// gdon bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags la// tig A d+hi swA hA/ b+h+rUM hrIHla nA gsum babya'o// khro bo'i rtsi shrI 'di brdungs pa dang / sngags 'dis sbyang zhing shis par b+ha'o// A~M sarba tig ni ye yaM/ oM badz+ra la~M/ oM
315a5(rnying rgyud): prar+d+ha dz+wa lA b+he d+hA dz+ha lo/ maN+Da ra~M rI hUM ma bzo/ dred nAm be le/ yah+Na / ya~M dz+wa la re/ oM badz+rI ga shing / ri re a ga ni ti / yai \u0f7f zhes bzlas/ zab tu me gzhug pa'i snying po'o// oM b+h+ya b+h+rU~M hU~M hU~M zhes bzlas/ yang ni mo blo zlaH/
315a6(rnying rgyud): smar ba'i snying po'o// A~M la te shi/ du be ta btsab+h+rU~M/ bram bu sA ma sa pas hUM// A d+hi pr-i kha nan/ hUM sarba nan shanga? ya staM ba la/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ yang na rnam pa gcig la/ A tihU~M hrI hriM ha~M/ hUM he phaT/ yang na/ oM raM rA t+na
315a7(rnying rgyud): sa / ga tshig nga sgyus/ zhes

315b3(rnying rgyud): nI// sngags kyi chas gos rnam pa lta// sngags byed sngags thod stong ga yogs skad dpes dang // sngags kyi phyi dung la sogs pa// dar rI ma sa sa mA ra ba'am// nan tan gyis ni kri par bya// g.ya ba dar sngon dmAr kha rnon no//
315b4(rnying rgyud): me 'dren mda' dang bcas par bya// de nas 'byung po'i gzugs sa ma dgra bo'i gzugs// grog 'am ru sa sam shing shun la// gzabs la legs par bri bar bya// yang ne rjes kyi sa dag las// ban+de'i shing rtsa dag dang ni// ri
315b5(rnying rgyud): dag gi rel ma bse// de la gzugs su byas nas ni// de yi snying gar med dus bya// snying po dang ni bcas par bri'o// de la sbrul nagazhag lnga pas bcings// yan lagu lha ni bci ngas bzhin du// jo bo'i sbrul brjod de bzhag/ de nas
315b6(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas brtsam pa ni// mchod pa rnam lnga tshul bzhin brtsam// mar khu dang ni sbrad rtsi dang // 'bras chen 'bras kyi thug pa dang // shug gu rtid dkar dang ni la du ba// me tog dang ni til mar dang // 'bru brug dang ni lags ma dang /
315b7(rnying rgyud): chol kon dang ni ya bze'u rnams su bcas// rin chen lde dang spos lnga spun lnga dang // snying po lnga dang 'bras kyi lag pa na dang // gzhan yang sman gyi stong pa sogs// thams cad ma lus tshogs par bya// de nas khro ba'i mchod rgyas brtsam
316a1(rnying rgyud): pa ni// mar khu dang ni thub pa nag po dang // yam shing nag po mar b+he'u dang // drug gsum gyi ni mchung rdzas dang // ril bu gcig la bdun gsum tshogs pa dang // g+hA shan cha rdung ros dang // ti la ma tsha dang /
316a2(rnying rgyud): spring dang // sha khru dang ni lcags bye do phye dang // sran chen dang ni mu gul dkar nag dang // de la sogs pa'i mchod rngas chags pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ rdo drur mo t+yar+b+ha las// khyad par dkyil 'khor gyi markyen dang // mchod pa'i
316a3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i las brtsams pa// lcags bye zangs sde rdo drug dang // radug stang drug btsan dug dang // sha drug dag dang 'o drug dang // dug gi rigs su gtogs pa thams cad do// drug gi
316a4(rnying rgyud): zas su snod dang bcas par brtsams// de nas gsang bar bya ba'i phur ba ni// lugs sa ma nag po'i shing rnams sam// gdug pa'i dug shing tsher ma can// mgo gzhug ma nor bar bzhogs te// zur gsum rgya mdung bcas par bya//
316a5(rnying rgyud): dug gi gtor ma nag po dang // rdo rje tho ba ral gri dang // brdud bzhi ha ru ni g.yang gzhi dang // ha sna g.yas pa dag dang ni// bud med lham mam bdud gos nag po'am// de la sogs te phyag cha tshang bar bsog/ de nas mchod pa rnam

316a7(rnying rgyud): dang // khro bo bcu yis mtshams bcad do// de nas 'od chen shar ba dang // drag po'i las su khyad par bstan// khro bo rnams kyis byin yang bskyed// sems btsan por gzung ngo // rdo rjeng bsgo ba phams bu 'tsho // sku gsung thugs

316b5(rnying rgyud): ldan nI lha yi sprul pa yin// spyan gyis gang zhigags par byed// tsas brjod de sman stong ba slar thug ste migasan// migs pa'i las rtag la~M/ ga po lan ma kA da / yang dgar tshungs shig slar migs

317a1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// su ma dag sngon ga ral ba can// dril chen 'bar ba phyag na bsnams// me yi ral bsdu bar snang khebs// shangs nas ngu ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// zhal nas me pri rbA grong 'khyil//
317a2(rnying rgyud): yi phyogs nas me drongs shig/ nub N+DI phyogs nas bskul ba ni// pad+ma rigs kyi me lha ste// sku mdog dmar la ral pa can// shing rta bltabs pa'i khri la bzhugs// phyag ni pad+ma dkar po bsnams// me yi ral bas bar snang
317a3(rnying rgyud): khebs// shangs nas ngu ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// zhal nas me yI rba klong 'khyil// nub kyi phyogs nas me drongs shig/ byang gi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// me lha'i rgyal po chen po ste// sku mdog ljang ser ral ba can// klu lug
317a4(rnying rgyud): gro mo'i khri la bzhugs// rdo rje rgya gram phyag na bsnams// me yi ral pas bar snang khebs// shangs nas dru ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// zhal nas me yi rba klong 'khyil// byang gi phyogs nas me drongs shig/ dung spud ma dang dud mchu
317a5(rnying rgyud): mA// dung gi mi mo chen mo dang // dung gi srung mchu chen mo ni// g.yas na dung gi sprad pa thogs// g.yon na khyung gi kha thogs shing // gshog pa g.yobs la me bus shig/ mched wa'i tshig bskul ba ni// a glaing mar med ma~M yi ny+tsa/
317a6(rnying rgyud): me dpung 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// sbyin chen kham pa'i khril bzhugs// ma~M yi ral byas par snang khebs// spyan nas me stag phyogs bzhir 'phros// zhal nas mu yin klong 'khyil// lpags nas me yi dkyil 'khor 'dri la/
317a7(rnying rgyud): phyag na me yi bgrang phreng 'dzin// rgyal chen rigs pa'i phyogs bzhi bsrungs// bram ze pho mo lnga bgyi yang // 'khor ni gnas pa'i 'khor lags kyi// kha 'bar mas ni me bus la// bram ze rgyal gos 'gal skul cig/ ma yi
317b1(rnying rgyud): bon ma bcug kyang // 'byung ba chen po me yi rgyu// so so'i rgyu las mthongs la// rgya mtsho'i gting nas mye drongs la// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sbrum pa dang // nyon mongs bud shing bsregs pa dang // snang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i
317b2(rnying rgyud): bgegs// de yi bag chags bsreg dgos kyis// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ skul cig skul cig 'gal stsal cig/ ma ma ma mo'i tshogs 'bad pa// chu klung skem par byed pa ste// rgya mtsho'i gting du me bus pas//

317b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs// khyed rnams 'dus la las rnams kyis// drug po'i las la khyad par bskul ba'i le'u ste tha ma'o// / de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpas sreg las kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// thugs rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du/
317b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'bar ba'i mi byung bas// du ba mngon lnga thing chos kyi sprin// zhi ba'i mchod pa bug pa ni// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// bsam gtan gsal ba'i gnas rnams su// skye mched phyogs kyi bugs dam bskang // dkon mchog
317b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi thugs dam mchod sprin rgyu// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs 'phel bar shog/ me lce 'apar ba'i mchod pa 'dis// bde gshegs lha yul dga' ldan du// dgra bcom 'gro ba'i don byas nas// rgyal ba'i bka' dang byang chub sems//
317b7(rnying rgyud): thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang rig 'bras bu bskyed pa dang // dpal gyi byin rlabs 'phel bar shog/ me 'od 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'dis// lha dang bcas pa'i slob dpon dang // srog
318a1(rnying rgyud): nargyu na tu na na rgyu tu na
318b1(rnying rgyud): 'khris rnams// las kyi bam spang 'thabs pas// grag sung byagasas kyi lul khor du// gas ma grangs smra bskangs gyur nas// byung chub skyong bar rtags gyu // / man+ta drang thang 'khor brgyas dang // byang chub mchogan
318b2(rnying rgyud): sum cu bdun// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs 'phel bar shog/ 'drajug yid bzhin rin zhen gter/ skye 'gro kun gyi ljongs spyod gsos// longs spyod mchod pa min pa 'dis// mAny+tsa drung skyong 'khor brgyas dang // byang chung mchog
318b3(rnying rgyud): chen sum rje bdun// thugs dam yongs su bskrar gyur te// bdag dang deng gi yon bdag rnams// rin chen gter la spyod par shog/ lag chen 'bru yi snying po ste// 'dod pa kun gyi snying po mchog/ 'gro brgya mtsho tshim pa'i phyir/
318b4(rnying rgyud): kyar mchod po chen po 'dri// me lha drang srong 'khod bcas dang // byang chub mchog chen sum du bdun// thugs dam yongs su bskrad gyur te// deng gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// dbang gi spyod yul tshim byed shog/ 'o skol bdud rtsi
318b5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'dis// skye 'gro kun gyi spun dang gsos// yid bzhin longs spyod 'phel ba'i sngan// bdud rtsi zhal zas rin chen 'dis// me lha drang srong 'khor bcas dang // byang chub mchog chen sum cu bdun// nyon mongs dug sel ldan gyi
318b6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rnam par rdzog pa'i drug bcom nas// byang chub mchog chen sum cu bdun// thugs du ma yongs su bskyang gyur te// yon bdag 'khor dang bzlas pa rnams// khams gsum 'khor ba'i bdud btsem nas// byang chub snying po
318b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sngar shog/ zhib shi ku ru swAhA/ zhing ladram kur swA hA/ shig zo'u yi rabs 'di skad do// thugs rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// deng gi yon bdag 'khar bcas rnams// lus ngag yid gsum rang bzhin no// sgobasum
319a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i nyes byas kyis// lus ngag yid gsum 'bras bur smin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyun yang yin// ngan song ltung ba'i gzhi yid yin// de yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// yum ze 'thabs
319a2(rnying rgyud): drang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang // dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i me sa bsregs te// byang chub snying por rdzogs par shog/ phung po lnga yi rang bzhin
319a3(rnying rgyud): ni// rtog pas 'khrul pa'i nyes byas kyis// phung po lnga ni 'bras bur smin// ngan song lce yi gzhi yang yin// rgyung lngar 'khor ba'i rgyu yang yin// de yi sgrib pa srung ba'i phyir// yab ze'u thabs dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i
319a4(rnying rgyud): nyes byas dang // dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs nas// sku lnga 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// byang chub snying por rdzogs par shog/ rnam shes brgyad kyi
319a5(rnying rgyud): spyod yul ni// 'khor ba lnga dang dug gsum gyis// rnam shes brgyad kyi 'bras bur sprin// sdug bsngal brgyad kyi gzhi yang yin// nyon mongs brgyad kyi rgyu yang yin// de yi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs dang shes rab kyis//
319a6(rnying rgyud): tshe rabs bzang ba'i nyes bya sda dang // dus 'dri'i lus kyi bag chags rnams// ye shes brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'byung ba'i mesna bsregs te// rnam par shes pa brgyad snyi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur cig/
319a7(rnying rgyud): mched bcu gnyis rang bzhin ni// su ma rtog pa'i 'dzin chags kyis// skye mched bcu gnyis 'bras bur smin// 'du shes tshol ba'i rgyud yang yin// gti mug 'khor ba'i lam yang yin// de yi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs
319b1(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang // dus 'dri'i las kyi bag chags rnams// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs nas// mdzes pa'i lha mo zung gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// thugs rje'i
319b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings su rdzogs gyur cig/ khams chen bco brgyad spyod yul ni// bying tshugs las kyi rnam smin gyis// khams chen bco brgyad 'bras bur smin// byang chub ltung ba'i gnas kyang yin// ngan 'gror skye ba'i las yang yin//
319b3(rnying rgyud): de yi sdug bsngal sbyang ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang // dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// stong pa poco brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi// ye shes chen po'i mes bsregs
319b4(rnying rgyud): nas// lus kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyangs// thugs dam dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// thugs dam yongs su bslangs gyur nas// byang chub chen por rdzogs gyur cig/ ku sha bsdigs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// rgyal ba'i bka'
319b5(rnying rgyud): dang sngags kyi dbang // mi shes tshul khrims gzhung nyams pa'i/ byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur te// deng gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// dbang dang dngos grub bskyed pa'i phyir// skyed mos tshal gyi ljon pa ldang // rma
319b6(rnying rgyud): ma'i stan la 'dug par shog/ til 'bru bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// ding gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// bskal par bsags pa'i sdig sbyangs te// kun gyi gnas su zhon pa las// thugs kyi sprul pa'i byin rlabs
319b7(rnying rgyud): kyis// bla ma'i gnas su 'byor bar shod// snying po bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// bdag cag rig 'dzin sdigs mkhan gyi// lus ngag yid gsum ldan pa yis// phrin las yo byad gzhung bsrang ste// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad
320a1(rnying rgyud): nas// rdo rjes gtams pa yan chad du// ma lce dpal gyis tshig pa rnams// gso zhing gnas su bskang ba'i phyir// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur te// bdag cag sngags mkhan rgyal pa rnams//
320a2(rnying rgyud): chag/ nyams pha ma lhung 'phro bsabs nas// yun gyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ sbyin sreg las kyi le'u las// rdzas kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste tha ma'o// // de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ sha khrag bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis/
320a3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// khro mchog rgyal po spyan drangs te// sngon gyi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// phrin las rnam bzhir mda' gsol gyis// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// sran chen bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis//
320a4(rnying rgyud): phra men tshogs dang dbang phyug 'khor// pho nya drug cu phyag rgya'i tshogs// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dbang byin nas// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// lcags phye bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis//
320a5(rnying rgyud): lha srin sde brgyad gnas sgo rnams// gnod cing 'dul ba'i rkyen byed rnams// rdo rje lcags kyi'i 'phro 'du 'dis// gdug pa'i lus dgu rgyung brlags nas// byang chub klong du bsgral byas nas// tshe tshogs 'bar ba'i zhal du bstab
320a6(rnying rgyud): rdo phye bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// dam 'das sri dang las ngan bsregs// gAtum chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mgyogs pa'i tshigs rnams bsdus byas nas// rdo phyes phye mar brlag byas nas// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil
320a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams zhal du bstab// tshwa dang rwa snying bsregs pa yis// dug gsum las kyi rnam smin gyis// ngan song gsum gyi 'bras bur smin// phra men rgya mtsho'i mtshon cha 'dis// 'khor ba'i chu lnga ba rlag pa'i
320b1(rnying rgyud): dang byang drug pa'i mtshon ma 'das// brel nas drangs byas nas/ sagasu ma mthed na ga kyil 'kho dang // thabs kyi phyag rgyas drangs nas su// rnams pa'i tshogs kyi zhal du btag/ zlacha bgrags pa'i mdzad pa dang sa
320b2(rnying rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rnam shes sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// dam tshig las kyi pham ljang gis// srid pa'i dam dral sdig byed rnams// gshin rje gdug pa'i 'khor bcas rnams// su gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor du// rngab
320b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas bskal byas nas// rage'i tshogs kyi zhal du stob// ldeng ros bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// bdag dang deng gi yon bdag la// mthor sa suM dang 'byung po'i gdon// rnal 'byor dum sring ma bdung dang // las kye nyes byas 'am lgang
320b4(rnying rgyud): rnams// rdo rje gshog pa'i phyag rgya dang // mche ba sder ma zang yag 'dis// dkar nag mtshams nas drangs byas nas// las ngan gdug pa brlag pa ni// mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// pha men tu mtsho spyan drangs nas/
320b5(rnying rgyud): ngan song rgyad lnga brlag pa'i phyir// a dza le yi dogs pa ltar// sa bdag chen po'i zhal du bstag/ khro bo'i sbyin skyeg gi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'di skad du/ da ni sngags mkhan dz+wa la pa ste// khams
320b6(rnying rgyud): gsum thugs rje dpal gyi zhing // nga ni phyag cha chen po ste// rgyal ba rigs kyi thugs dam yin// da ni sman pa'i rgyal po ste// thugs rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i me byung bas// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas/
320b7(rnying rgyud): dmyal khams gnas nges yan chad du// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems/ 'jig rten lha dang srid pa'i dpal// gnas ris klu dang dug ris spyan// sgra srin sde bcu'i gnas ris su// me lce mtshon gyis sbas parda ma
321a1(rnying rgyud): na/ / ba // gas sugs sa san sa// ts+tsha byagags padan/ na la sa// rnanam tshagang stsalas thas nas// bgags kyang na
321a2(rnying rgyud): dus byang chub sa/ dug kyang blang skyes na / nadu pa stsur byung yang med// mi \u0f88\u0f90sa chum pa gsas shog/ dpal gyag cig pagasas par byed/ denas ma ska gshegasas sa
321a3(rnying rgyud): lag // sa gas na/ ba thug la tha
321a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan kyi cig bzhis pa dang / da 'a gagags pags mam sa pa ste/ yin sa 'phrun rte nga bdi// la pan pa
321a5(rnying rgyud): gal par blta pa dang / hrulas pa rgya bstar pagasas ma su ngas na sa di na // ga gsapa sa nyi pas pa ba / sa ning ma chag byar
321a6(rnying rgyud): nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par 'bar ba'i m-ig khang sbyin lha ga shed pas la zh-i sngags swA pa/ stan dungs sa// denas rgyag na brnam la 'dzin ga/ dang pa dang ni mjig saso// rgyag
321a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs btsam ldan 'das// 'bang pa'i yang du ba ga sa des dang // bzlogs na pa bas pa des gsas// ga sa dri ga bya/ ma sahA/ bam mi
321b1(rnying rgyud): gsunas smyan dang // da nas byon pa dang mnyag cig zab dus / btas mA la sa nas gang nadrung tings la/ bcom ldan 'das sgra'i ched du sbyin skrag sbal na/ ma 'bar bu'i nang du bzhugs su gsol nas brjod/ de nas sag rdzas kyis
321b2(rnying rgyud): sags ga ma// da / dun dag btsu mas gru / da na shugs sa sa la/ de sa maung sa spyad/ de nas sa kyilarna las
321b3(rnying rgyud): garis grong sa sbyar bya'o// drug la sa b+h+yo ma las/ mab+ha du dang / yun dngas pa dang / gdan dbul zhing brtun par bzhugs sags la ba dang / macad pa 'bul ba'i lang+gA da pa / de
321b4(rnying rgyud): bstod pa bya ba 'di skad do// d+hI khyod ni mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// khyod ni glang po na bcan// khyod ni bzang po rkyen dang ldan// khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin// yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas khyod// khyod ni bde basbyin pa ste// khyod ni
321b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs ni mdzes pa'i chun// khyod ni ma lha ral pa can// khyod ni gzugs ni mdzes pa yin// de nas drag pa sbyor ba'i las dang slar gshegs su gsol/ de nas yang me sbyang / phyi mu snyan drangs gang na dpral ba dang // bzhugs
321b6(rnying rgyud): su gsol ba dang // sreg rdzas mchod pa re re dang / rtsa ba'i sngags re re dang sbyar zhing / bdun gsum nyi shur dbul lo// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs rjes 'gro don du// 'jigs byed 'brar ba'i rol pa'i srang ston pa// ye shes bskal
321b7(rnying rgyud): pa mtshan 'bar ba'i 'od// sreng gsum ma rig mun bsal gteng nas 'joms// gzhan gyis me thub sgra gsung thugs dang ldan// khro rgyal thugs rjes rol la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M mi g.yo mgon po ri rib 'dzin// nam tog pa yi rlu
322a1(rnying rgyud): gas bskyod// rtog pa'i drubs dkrim pa'i bdud rnams 'joms// sri dag snyam pa med gnas pa sgrol mdzad pa// rngan pas deb skrong mdad pa// ye shes 'bar ba'i dbyung sprul phag 'tshal lo// rlu da /
322a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'jigs byed dri sgra can// thugs rje chen po nyon mongs kun gyi dgra// marje ba zil gnon 'jigs byed rgyan gyis bzhugs// yan lag drug ldan 'jigs byed ga shin rdo'i gshed// ye shes sbyin gyis ma rig mun sel ba// gzhon
322a3(rnying rgyud): chu'i tshul 'chang nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM b+hu gsung thugs kyi byin rgyabaskyabs mu mi khyab// mA rig mun pa sel ba'i mthus pa rtabyas pa// dang ba'i tshul gyis cho 'phrul ston// ye shes dbyug pas drug grasum dul du dog/ thar pa'i
322a4(rnying rgyud): gnas su sgrol bar mdzad pa yi// rdo rje dbyug to bsdams la phyag 'tshal lo// s+t+rai ye shes ha ya mI pa ta ma chog dpal// sgyu mdog chags med nub ka'i dmar thag dadre// 'bar 'thod ba wA lnga pa gyen du brjes// me rig tshungs pa khad+d+hahA
322a5(rnying rgyud): bsngal ba'i lha// pad+ma rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM chags pa'i thabs la dbang bsgyur bya// pad+ma 'dam gyis me gos drag pa bzhin// 'dod chags kun la dbang bsgyur 'bang ba'i sra// mthong thos dran pas re ba kun gong zhing //
322a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes nam mkha' lta bur dbang bsgyung ba// khyo rgyal 'dod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// kr-i thapas kyis ma mongs phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// sku mdog dmar nag bskul pa'i mi ltar 'bar// bru~M mug sung thugs kyi byin rlabs byug
322a7(rnying rgyud): rjes rol// srid pa gsum gyi sde gnas rdul rnyog/ g.yon pas zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma ltar 'bar// ngan song gnas nas 'gro drug 'dren cing sgrol// ye shes mi g.yod rje dreg/ 'od grang brjid pas don mdzad 'bar ba'i rtsa// khro rtsal
322b1(rnying rgyud): bas po rmil phyag 'tshal lo// sgo ma chags pad+ma lakhor lo 'bar ba'i sgra// log 'dren bgegs kyi bdud dpung 'joms mdzad pa// log rtog 'dam sres bla med gnas stobs pa// rnal pad+ma 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM mdzad gsang
322b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// lha dang lha min dbang po nye dbang bcas// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems dregs pas khengs pa yi// srid gsum gtso bo dpung dang bcas pa'i tshogs// badz+ra hU~M gis bdud
322b3(rnying rgyud): dpung 'doms mdzad cing // thar pa'i gnas su sgrol bar mdzad pa yi// hU~M mdzad 'bar ba'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// gong ma bzhin du lha re re la bstod pa'i rjes la drag po'i sbyin sreg bya'o// las kyi rim pa las/ bstod pa'i
322b4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas drag po'i sbyor ba'i las b+ha ba ni/ 'di skad brjod do// oM yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bur ba'i gtum chen 'bar ba la// khro bo'i yid kyis mchod sbyin b+ha// sangs rgyas
322b5(rnying rgyud): bsod nams sgra yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zag rngus la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phrar pas btab// rdul du byas la tshogs su bstab// sangs rgyas kun gyi zla gsung thugs// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor brdzas
322b6(rnying rgyud): bran// bajig rten byams ni rab 'byams kren// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// skad cig yud la brtag mdzad de// brlag par ma byung gang yang med// dar tsar bu nang swa a b+hi tsa ra mA ra Ne trA~M phaT/ zhes bskul lo// e yi
322b7(rnying rgyud): gas kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu kra rgyang ngu 'brel ba sdams nas// bcing bsgyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos// myos nas bsad de tshig par 'gyur// zhes brjod do// las kyi le dza las/ drag por sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
323a1(rnying rgyud): de nas sku tshogs re re rdzogs pa dang / drag po'i las bya bar gsungs so// de la dang por drang ba ni/ gong du mchod pa'i khro bo rnams tshigs su bcad pas re re nas bskul te 'di skad brjod do// hU~M khro bo nyi ma'i
323a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba// rngam pa'i 'od zer dkyil nas grub pa thog thog 'phro// thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul du gsol/ Ar+ya kro d+ha na hU~M phaT/ khro chen mi phub 'bar ba'i sku// thugs rje'i byin rlabs dpal gyi sgra mnga' bas// thugs rje chen
323a3(rnying rgyud): po dbu gsum sdang mig can// mche grwa tsigs N+De was rdo rje rgan sa lcags 'bebs// rngam pa'i zhal nas rdo rje me stag 'phro// bdud 'dul rgyal po gdug pa 'dul du gsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni/ dz+wa la ni ting pa ta hU~M phaT/ hUM khams
323a4(rnying rgyud): gsum snang mdzad sku gsung thugs kyi gtso/ hUM mdzad hU~M gi dbul rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bkod// hU~M gis dus gsum tshul ba'i gsung las skyes pa yi// me dpal sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin can// me dpal sngon pos bgegs rnams
323a5(rnying rgyud): 'dul du gsol// trai lo kya bi dz+nyA ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad 'phags pa ta kr-i ta mi g.yo mgon// shes rab ral gri bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar// me lhar la pa can dang biSh+Ta sru la bzhugs// mi ga yo ral gri 'dzin pas gdug pa rdul du brlag/
323a6(rnying rgyud): Ar+ya a tsa la kro d+ha ni hUM phaT// hU~M mdzad rin chen mchog ste ya ma gshin rje'i gshed// byams dang thugs rje ldan pa'i 'jam dpal rnon po yis// ma rig dug gsum dra ba gcod mdzad pa'i// dam tshig sgrol bar mdzad cing dpal gyi gnas su 'don//
323a7(rnying rgyud): brjid pa ma he'i sgo me dri khengs pa gzir// gshin rje thod dbyug 'bar bas bdud 'dul mdzad// ya mAn ta kr-ita kro ta pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ hU~M mdzad ta kr-id dbyug sngon 'bar ba'i sku// dbyug sngon 'bar ba dang ni rdo rje zhags pas sdigs// chu tshil dang
323b1(rnying rgyud): dang khong khrag dmar po gsol// ri rab tu mtsho 'dril zhing nya la'i drug kyang gsol// chu srin rgyal po'i gtsug nas yid bzhin 'bar ba phrog/ ta kr-i tang byug sngon can gyis 'dul bar mdzod// nI lad Na kro d+hA da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad rig pa'i rgyal
323b2(rnying rgyud): bonA mgrin 'phags pa'i sku// amra gA ra b+ha'i dkyil nas rdo rje 'bar ma 'dren// dbul rta skad rngam zhing 'tsher bas ni// stong gsum g.yo zhing klu rgyal 'dul bar mdzad// khyod kyis lha ma yin gyis sdug bsngal srung du gsol/
323b3(rnying rgyud): ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdod ta kr-i ta rgyal po 'bar ba'i sku// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha lpags kyu 'bar ba 'dzin// dam tshig 'dral ba bskal te snying dang thod khrag gsol// bgegs kyi snying nas drangs te khrag 'thung thal bar
323b4(rnying rgyud): brlag/ phra men kun dang rol pas dug gi sprul pas nam mkhal 'gengs// maM yi skye mched gdug pa 'dul ba'i dus la bab// DA ki rA dza ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dpal 'bar ltas kyi sku// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram dang
323b5(rnying rgyud): ni bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// dngos grub dpal gyi bdud rtsi mchog gsol ba// hUM mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis gnod sbyin gdug pa gdul du gsol// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da hUM phaT/ hUM ma hA ba la 'phags pa'i
323b6(rnying rgyud): phyag na rnga yAb dang ni klu yi rgyal po 'don// mche/ tsigs rtse lus rdo rje gan ma lcags 'bebs// bgegs kyi rgyal po bi nA ya ka gnon// btsun mo 'phrog cing sbyor ba'i thabs kyis rol// khro hral stobs po che yi thugs dam bskul/
323b7(rnying rgyud): mahA ba la s+phoT s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po ka ma la yi mtshan// khros pa'i spyan bgrad sprin ma glog bzhin 'gyu// dbu gsum phyag drug 'tshor bas bdud 'khyil mun khang 'joms// gzi byin 'bar bas na ma mkha' khengs// phyag drug mtshan
324a1(rnying rgyud): chas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal se la// zhabs phyag 'tshor bas ngan song kun bskal te// thugs rje thabs kyis 'gro ba 'don rnam sa mdzod// ka mA la krat+tA la~M hU~M phaT// d+hU mdzang sdig rgyal badz+ra k+Shar// dz+nyAn nurmA
324a2(rnying rgyud): pa yi chos nyid can// hU~M ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i gsung las kyis// me dpal sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin can// goms pa'i stabs kyis brkyang bsku mgar byed cing // rgyal badz+ra kA ra li thugs dam bskul// d+hekA ra gar dza gar dza hU~M phaT/ ces
324a3(rnying rgyud): brjod la 'gugs 'dren drag tu bya'o// drug po las kyi le wa las/ skul ba 'grugs 'dren gyi le'u ste dang ze'o// / de ltar 'grags 'dren lag na phur pa'i las bya ba ni// lcags sna lnga'amu shrIng dzed ma n+dan la sogs pas sor
324a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad dang bcu gnyis par byas la/ mgo mjug ma nor bar rtsa ba'i ngos su mgo byas te/ mgo sor gci ga la rgya mdud/ stad kur brgyad/ rked pa sor gcig la bya mdud/ slad thar gsum par byas pa la/ dang po kho nar stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/
324a5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sgrar byin gyis brlab/ de nas spyi bo'i rgya mdud gzhal yas khang du bsgo ma/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang ljar hU~M basbrel ma lngar bsgom/ de las dpal he ru ka dang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / gshin rje'i gshed po dang rta mgrin dang /
324a6(rnying rgyud): stobs po rje dang / 'di rnam so so'i snying po brjod pas/ yum dang gnyis su med par bsgom mo// de nas he ru ka'i thugs ka nas phye mthing nag las sras phur bu ldes te/ ltob man chad mthed nag la/ dbu ral pa kham na gzung gsum du 'greng ba/ sprul
324a7(rnying rgyud): dkar nag gis brtsan pa/ bod rnon gyi phreng bas brgyan pa/ sran gsum bgrang nas g.yon du gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsigs nas zhal rngams pa/ phyag bzhi pa la dang po gnyis na dgra sgra rdo rje bsdams pa/ 'og ma gnyis na ri rab phung buzur gsum
324b1(rnying rgyud): bsngams pa/ skabs dang mthung phu la sogs pa ni tho ba thams cad 'dus pa las kyang che ba gcig panom so// demi gnas sngar 'bralas byi kyis brdab/ thug srung zags su byon gyis brlab/ denas ma ga gi 'dun tu bya pa bya ga dang brgya
324b2(rnying rgyud): la/ 'di srung brjod do// lugs sa mngag po'i shing rnams la// mge ba rgya mdzad rtsebar gsum// khrab po mo'i 'khor bsgoms nas// drag por snar pa'i thar ba skye// btab ma na yang brtag par 'gyur// gdug tu bgazhan lta smos rdzi dgros// 'dus
324b3(rnying rgyud): khyo rtso \u0f7f/ mAr tA stAr d+ha d+hu Ta/ zhes dzad dag nga ba gnas sar gad ba// gzhan yang gyur pa'i rgyud las zung babazhin bzla gdang // drug ga las la rnams// babang po pa'i 'gag nyis
324b4(rnying rgyud): ba'o// / de nas bcu ga'i las ni lcags sam/ rno nag po'i gtun khung grag sum nang du/ gang la b+hA ba'i gzugs bcug la/ lcags sama?/ seng ldeng ngam/ shing tshor ma can mi gtun bras zhib legs su brjeng zhing /
324b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab kyi mtshan nyid du rtogs par byas la/ 'di sa brjod de/ lcags sa ma nag po'i gzham thad nI// khro mo rnams kyi gtan zung du// khro bo'i thobs brdungs zas na// drag por gyur pa'i nabye ste// brdung nal+lA yang badz+ran
324b6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// gnod byed gzhan lta ci zhig spos// badz+ra kha the badz+ra kro d+ha kha paM/ mA ra rdza kha thaM/ zhes bdung ngo // drag po'i las las/ gsang ba'i bdud pa'i la~M rnga ste gsum pa'o//

325a1(rnying rgyud): gtad ma pa/ bsnyebya dgags pa cad la/ gangs tha ba de/ ga pa dang / gtong ga pa sgrubs dag gangs pas pa pa ma la// gang sa thang pag tams cang gnam rnag pa mams la// 'di gang ba / lcags mang dgang rje rnams// lcagags

325a3(rnying rgyud): drag po'i las las/ bshig rdul ga tu ma'i len sde bzhi pa'o// / de nas gtub pa'i las na/ gtan mdzan na tshanang las kyi 'gyur l-i gr-I lcags snga las byas pa sgra ga sung thugs dang ldan pa'am/ ye shes kyi

325a5(rnying rgyud): las// ye shes no dpal mtshan ma ste// drag por gyur pa'i mtshon cha 'dis// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti muga~M r+b+ha// 'bras bu dran mongags mjal khor// log rtog 'khor brgyan gcong ngo // tsarba oM t+ma sarba/ hU~M tsheg swA hU~M/

325a7(rnying rgyud): rdzas su bsngo ste/ rgyal ba rigs lnga'i gdani khrir gyung bar bsngo/ sems ni rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed pa 'di skad do// 'dod chags zhi sdang gti mug d+hA// 'bras bu ngan song gsum du 'khor// dug gsum rgya 'bras sbar ba'i phyir/
325b1(rnying rgyud): sha rus la sogs khrag bcas pastab// de nas gnas skur ba ni// 'di skad du/ drag po'i las kyis bskul ba rnams// 'khor ba'i lam rnams sgo bcad de// rnam shes dz+riM gis bsdus nas ni// hU~M gIs ngan song stongs par
325b2(rnying rgyud): byed// chags pa'i bde ba bla na med// rgyal ba thams cad hU~M gis bskyed// 'og min bla na med pa'i gnas mchog tu// khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i mtshams su phaT kyis 'phang // ho yis g.yeng zhing yaM gis 'digs//
325b3(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod la slar nas hU~M gis bstab po// ta nA ga ta/ badz+ra ra tsi rat+na ra tsa zhes gnas spar ro// drag po'i las las/ gnas sbar ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas drag po sbyor ba'i las ni/ gzugs gtubs pa ltar/

325b6(rnying rgyud): che ge mo zhig mA ra Na phaT/ zhes brjod do// drag po'i lus las/ rjes drag po'i las bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdzogs nas las kyi lhag chad skong pa'i phyir/ me wA lan gcig spyan drangs nas/ dkyil 'khos
325b7(rnying rgyud): dubazhugs su gsol/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / sbyin sreg gi rdzas ci lhag pas mchod do/ las ma dag pa bzod par gsol/ me lha slar gshegs su gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha byin la bzod par gsol te/ ma rig bdag
326a1(rnying rgyud): cag lus dang ngag sems kyis// bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje'i tshe mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// khyed kyi thugs rje nam mkha'i mtha' dang

326a3(rnying rgyud): nam/ phug zod bcug la/ thod pa'i nang dra dgra bgegs kyi ming dras bcag ste/ g.yum pa sngon po pa dbus su 'khor lo bri/ grogs bzhir byas mthi/ zlar bzhi ri rab bris la mnan no// dzIg tu yang / mnan no rI rab brjid kyi sa ma nan/

326b1(rnying rgyud): dgags d+hang thags sanas rgyud cad pa 'ad bar mtshams pacad/ mchad pa'i mthad sdu te/ skabags dag cang ga tu dang lan chags su gtod pa dang / sod pa dzin/ tha~Mdwa dang / blang ba dang / cam

328a6(rnying rgyud): hUM de dkar ba ni bud+d+ha he ru ka'i thugs/ ser ba ne rat+na he ru ka'i thugs/ mthing ba ni badz+ra he ru ka'i thugs/ ldang ba ni karma he ru ka'i thugs so// de re la sna tshogs su 'bar ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs so//

328b1(rnying rgyud): kyad ma pa hadu dres/ bcom ldan 'das dbadag rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi tshul ba che/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag nyid dag rten pas
