329b1(rnying rgyud): yol bres 'od ldan la// rdul gyi gser chen lu gu rgyud// sems kyi yi ge IM dkar la// mtha' mahu lu'i yig 'brus bskor// gser gyi ba thag gzengs pa ltar// 'phro 'du'i dgongs pa rgyun mi gcad// phar 'phras pas ni
329b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thags dam bskul// slar 'dus pas ni dngos grub 'bebs// A~M hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra le hUM hrI dzaH/ de yang dbang gi bka' yi bzlas pa yin// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo 'dab bcu drug/ lte ba ge sar pad+ma
329b3(rnying rgyud): 'bur du dod// mtha' ma 'dab ma btu drug mtshon// lte ba AM dmar 'od 'bar la// mtha' ma hu lu'i yig 'brus bskor ba'o// pho brang pad+ma 'bur gyi lte ba la// yi ge AM dmar 'od du ldan// mtha' ma yig 'grus bskor ba ni//
329b4(rnying rgyud): mag la me klad la bskor ba bzhin// 'phro 'du'i dgongs pa rgyan mi gcad// phar spros pas ni rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus pas ni sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// 'di yang gsung gi bzlas pa yin// AM hu lu hu lu phaT/
329b5(rnying rgyud): e A ra li hUM hI dzaH/ tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas la/ dbus ni dpal be'u rdo rje bskyed// yi ge hUM dmar 'od ldan pa'o// mtha' mchos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// da la hu lus bskor ba'o// hUM tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas khang // chos
329b6(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// thugs kyi dpal be'u lte ba la// ston pa'i yi ge hUM dmar de// mtha' la rin chen gser gyi skud pa la// hu lu'i yig phreng bcu gsum brgyas// phar 'phros pas ni rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul//
329b7(rnying rgyud): slar 'dus pas ni dngos grub 'bebs// 'phro 'du'i dgongs brgyad mi gcad// 'di yang dbang gi thugs kyi bzlas pa yin// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di yis bsgrub// oM hu lu hu lu phaT/ a A ra li hUM hrIHdzaH/ lte ba sprul pa'i

343b4(rnying rgyud): gyi ni 'bru tsam dag/ drug dang rtsub pa'i mel bsreg/ me lde dmar nag phyogs brgyar 'phro// de yi 'du 'phros bag chags bsregs// 'bar zhing mched pa ngur thod me// nyon mongs bsreg pa'i me sba bas// khams gsum nyon mongs bsreg par
343b5(rnying rgyud): byed// khams gsum dgra bgegs lus ngag bsreg/ 'di ltar sbyor ba cher byas na// sangs rgyas dag kyang brlag par byed// dug gi 'bru'am ske tshe'am// mar las byung ba'i rdzas chen 'dis// rgyal ba thams cad bsang ba la// mchog ga spor ba 'di
343b6(rnying rgyud): dag gis// khrag dang dus phye drug rnams bsres nas su// rang gi lus labyugs par bya// ling+ga la ni nang pas mnanA// de nas srin po po mo cher// srin po'i las chen shAl dga'// srin po'i las can khrag la dga'// srin po'i las chen rus la dgal/
343b7(rnying rgyud): srin po'i las chen don snying 'byin// srin po'i las men nang grol za// srin po'i las ni srog ca gcod// srin po'i las ni ngu zhing chug/ g.yab mo 'dor zhing 'o dod 'bong // mi yi ker rus phung por bcig/ mi yi thod pa phreng bar rdzogs// mi
344a1(rnying rgyud): yi khrag gis rgya mtshar bskyil// gzugs khams lha tshogs thams cad kyang // thal mo brngub pas rdul du zlog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // rab tu 'jigs shing brgyal bar 'gyur// srin po sdug nag chen pa yang // rad+ya/
344a2(rnying rgyud): chu mra'i grwa yang len// snyan pa'i cho ga dang snyan pa'i khrus// dga' ba'i rol ma sna tshogs byed// dpa' bo rgod po 'jigs par byed// ma lus par ni rdul du rlog/ khrag gan drug gi sa rjes chen la// dgra la gzugs brtan gyis byung na// sangs rgyas

344b1(rnying rgyud): yid gzungs kyis// byas na 'chi bar gdon miza// srin po srin mo khro ba'i tshogs// 'khrugs gtum pa mi bzang pas// ting 'dzin khro ba'i cha lugs bya// ting ba nan lo sbyar ra byas gyur na// sangs rgyas yags can yang 'dzi// zad

344b4(rnying rgyud): ni brjod bya ba// oM na aHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM la~M hU~M laM mo hA ya rak+Sha sta~M b+ha ya nan/ rkang pa g.yon pas ping+ga mnan// snying gar lcags kyi phur ba gda'// thobs pardung zhing sta res gcad// sbrul nag gdengs pa mang pos kyang //

344b6(rnying rgyud): sreg cha rnams mchod par dbul// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la// dgra bgegs de dag gtang bar bya// phrin las rnam bzhis mnan cing bsad// de nas sems kyi skal bde ru// ting 'dzin khros pa'i gzugs can dang // gal te ma rungs pa rnams

345a5(rnying rgyud): yi sbyor ba chen po ni// bdag nyid 'jigs tshal rab tu rngam// gshin rje khos shing gdug par bya// lag na lcags kyu rdo bsdams nas// lha yi snying gnas ni bzung // dbab cing / rdo rje chen pos brdungs// phyag na rdo rje'ang 'chi 'gyur na// lha rnams la ni

345b2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi dpral ba'i dbyings nyid du// yi gaM b+h+rUM gi tshogs 'dus nas// phyag na rdo rje mang po 'gros// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang nas kyang // gnod sngon pho mo'i laganas 'dzin// snying nas 'dren cing rgyab nas 'phral// bros pa'i gzugs can mang pos yang /

345b4(rnying rgyud): ce dgos// bdag nyid khros shing 'khrugs pa yis// gsang sngags 'di dag bzla bar bya// yak+Sha dza la sa ma ya na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ badz+ra kI li kI la ye/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ de skad ces ni brjod
345b5(rnying rgyud): gyur na// gnod sbyin srog lta smos ci dgos// thob rdo rje lag na thogs// bshang gci zas sra bza' ba dang // sku gsum rdo rje ster ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas drag po mthu chen che// sangs rgyas kun kyang gnon par byed// des na gsod pa'i las mchog yin//
345b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun kyang 'gug gyur na// gnod sbyin po mo spras ci dgos// cho ga 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub mchog gsum thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ gnod sbyin lo mo dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'u stebacu pa'o//
345b7(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding // lto 'phye dri za gul bum tshogs// 'di dag zhi bar bya ba'i don// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ stobs chen tho bo chen po 'i gzugs/

346a3(rnying rgyud): lha ma yin sogs smos ci dgos// rdo rus sol ba 'am sa 'ang rung // ta la'i shun pa 'am mAM sa la// lha ma yin sogs gzugs bris te// 'di yi sngags ni brjod byas te/ a nr-i dza dzo/ kro d+ha dz+wa la/ kI la ya/ mA ra ya nun phaT/ oM tshin d+ha tshin d+ha phaT/ ngi k+ta
346a4(rnying rgyud): tsakra ru lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi ko rlon gon// thod pa'i phreng ba se ral kha// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'phyar// g.yon na lcags kyi phur bu brdeg/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpang 'che// lha ma yin

346a7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yi ge hU~M gi tshogs bskyed nas// de nas sna yi dbugs su dri// phyogs bcur 'phros pas rgyal ba'i thugs// slar bsdus gnyis su med par sbyar// de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid// khros shing 'khrugs nas rngam pa'i tshul//

348a5(rnying rgyud): 'di dag brjod// tri sa ma ya dza/ oM k+Shi ni k+Shi ti/ A~M nA maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ A~M g+ha g+ha/ bA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hU~M badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA ba ya ti/ k+Sha ya wA kaN+DiH/ badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ A~M badz+ra badz+ra/

348a7(rnying rgyud): zhing khrag tu skrag nas kyang // 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// dngos grub 'byor pa 'di byas na// kun tu bzang po'i dngos grub len// bdag nyid gshin rje ltar byas la// sdang mig khro zhing 'jigs par blta// pha rol dmag tshogs gzhom 'dod na// bdag nyid phyag na
348b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer bsgom// bdag nyid snying gi dkyil 'khor nas// maM ge d+hi chen mthing nag 'phros// phyag na rdo rje grangs med pas// pha rol dmag tshogs 'joms par bsams// gsang sngags 'di dag brjod par bya// oM badz+ra rAng hUM badz+ra kI la ya ma ra ya phaT/ cho ga 'di'i rlu/
348b2(rnying rgyud): ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ byol song gi dmag dpung gzhom pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yi dgas kyi spya
348b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal ni ji ltar zhi bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag nyid gshin rje'i tshul du bya// dbang du bsdu zhing dgug par bya// khrag gi zhing chen las byas pa'i// skem zhing ring pa'i gzugs bris la// yi dges rnam par dgug par bya// sa mA dza dza/ oM sarba
348b4(rnying rgyud): dut+pan phaT/ ya ma kro na duSh+Ta na phaT/ 'jigs shing bgrang ba'i gzugs su bsam// des ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang khrug/ yi dgas sdug bsngal rnam pa rnams// ma lus par ni khrugs par 'gyur// de nas gzugs la bab nas kyang // lcags kyi phung bu song brgyad pa/
348b5(rnying rgyud): snying gi dkyil du brgyab nas kyang // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma bcas// rgyal ba'i tshogs su dbul bar bya// de ltar sbyor ba cher byas na// dngos grub rnam gsum thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las/ yi dgas gdul ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas
348b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// tsha grang sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// 'di yi sbyor ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag nyid gshin rje khros pa'i tshul// khro bo gshin rje gshed por bsgom// grong zhing
348b7(rnying rgyud): zhing 'dar pa'i gzugs// grog 'am shing tsun ras la bri// gzhin rjegashed po'i thugs kanas// yi ge jo zhes byung nas kyang // de la lcags kyu dkar po 'gros// lcags kyu de dag thams cad la// dbang gi lha mo bas ma mi khyab// rang rtags 'bang ba'i phyag mtshan bsdams// thugs
349a1(rnying rgyud): rje'i lcags su de dag gis// dmyal ba'i gnas nas bkug nas kyang // margam nam ba nas kyang // rdo rje'i bu ni blangs b+has te// yonas / m-i thugs rje'i bdag/ bad bdag zhags pal ma nyams// ci grang sdug pasngal gnas nas bkug/ rdza
349a2(rnying rgyud): zang lhag pasngal zhib du mdzan// de nas bdag nyid ni ba'i sra// cha grags 'dzum par byas nas naM// dngus kyi phung ba can pa zhig/ de yi snying gi dkyil drug dag/ sI na mams man brdzun/ badz+ra kI la ya/ AM s+ya thA/ b+hU ta ya/ g+hAta la~M/ sabadu tug la/ kI la la/ kAl
349a3(rnying rgyud): ya/ sarba m+b+ha paM phaT/ hU~M badz+ra trai la ya badzin pa AnA pa ya t+te/ kA ya wA ka tsid+ha badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaT// mchogs sbyong ba de byas na// sangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'a khrugs// tshe phreng sdug bsngam rlos ci dgas// de yi sbyo ba rgyas gyung na// su gsung thugs kyi
349a4(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thob// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las// tsha grang gi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i le'u stebatu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bgegs chen bzhi po 'di dag dang /
349a5(rnying rgyud): thegs pa mthu chen ma rungs pa// 'di dag rab tu ji wAr gzhig/ rdo rje slob dpon spang byed dang // theg pa mchog las log pa yi// madrangs sgo spyir 'debs pa rnams// 'di dag brlag pa'i sar rab kyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan
349a6(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis pa sapa d+ha// la dang rnam par 'gas sa gcinas sogs mapa pan// rnam pa smin pa sbyin ma // do rnaM ma thang yod// bcom ldan 'das kyis dzin gyi ga/ thog 'amangs sa su shi ldan pa// gtsigs sam me dus thos
349a7(rnying rgyud): nas ni// lamar ba can gyi gzhal yas sa// thu gang gu bzhi'i tshad dpa// drin mtshan la gus bsre// wa rnams ris par dgod par bya// yab sum bcu ba tshul bzhin gnas// gnas dang phral gyi phrag tu rnams// so ma'i gnas su dgod par bya// grob sa ni yang
349b1(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin dgod// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// bgegs chen 'di dag dgug pa'i phyir// bdag nyid khros shing rngam pa'i tshul// khros pa'i tshul gyis bkug gyur na// bgegs rnams 'di dag smos ci dgos// de yi gsang sngags brjod par bya// mA ra ya
349b2(rnying rgyud): sa mA dza/ A~M badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ shrI he ru ka dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ bdag nyid khros shing bskul gyur na// rdo rje sems dpa'ang brag tu phyug/ bgegs chen rnams ni khros ci dgos// sbyor ba chen po de byas na// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las
349b3(rnying rgyud): bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigla dang // dmangs rigs gdol pa can gyi rigs// mu stegs ral pa gcer bu dang // kat+ya bu dang nog can dang // bu mo
349b4(rnying rgyud): mig re dra ma lus dang // lha mo klu mo rigs ngan sogs// bshan pa gsod pa'i rigs can dang // ma rungs gnod pa'i rigs can gang // 'di dag gsod pa'i sbyor ba bya// tshad med snying rje bskyed nas kyang // byang chub sems ni gzung bar bya// de yi sbyor ba chen po ni// bdag
349b5(rnying rgyud): nyid khros shing 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ba glang khyi sha rta sha dang // sha rnams gtsang sme med par bza'// sems can srog kyang gnad par bya// rnal 'byor rig pa 'dzin bdag/ 'byung po khrag gi dri sdom tshul// ma kun rngam pa'i cha lugs su// srin mo me sdug 'jig pa'i
349b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs// ling+ga srin mo'i tshul ltar bsgom// sbrul nag tsan+da chen por bsgom// de nas las kyi stegs bu dang // las kyi skyes bu chags byed pas// me ris bskor te bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi maN+Da la ni// sum brtsegs zla ba'i dbus zla gam// 'khor lo

350a1(rnying rgyud): 'ogazod pa char gsum dang // sgo khyams dur khrod rgyas kyis bskor// nam bzhi'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ba rna ma// dkyil 'khor bskal ba 'jigs byed du// phyag tu 'bar ba za byed byas// thar par chad nas bskal bar bya// bdag nyid
350a2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// ma rungs pa rnams dgug par bya// oM nr-i dzaM/ badz+ra a~M ku sha dza~M/ nr-i dza nr-i dza nr-i dza/ sa ma ya nr-i dza/ ling+ga smug nag 'tshor ba la// nr-i zhes bya bas dbab par bya// gong ma'i sngags dang tshig gis bskul// de ltar bayul zhing bsrubs gyur/

350a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ldan pa la// dur khrod go ma ye ru bya// gru bzhir maN+Dal bzhi byas la// bzhi las de bzhin chag de bsreg/ de la ma hUM gzugs su bya// dbus su snying gi man chad bsnol// maN+Dal chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/ 'khor lo 'bar
350a5(rnying rgyud): ba bzhi yi thig/ dpal chen wa yi phyag rgya bca'// 'bar ba'i bar byams bzhi dag la// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod// sgo bzhi rdo rje rA ba bzhi// mgo brtan yan lag sprul pa'i gnas// de nas kyi khyams chen po la// rdo rje me ri phreng chen btang // skam dang ra
350a6(rnying rgyud): rlon pas bskor// me dpung bskal pa'i bu yug bri// sgo bzhir gru gu rdul dang sbal gyi phreng // b+han+ta dpal chen ldan pa la// dpal chen yig bris kha sbyar yum// ka ba bcu la sogs pa la// brgyad bri dbus su gnod par bya// las byed brgyad dam bcu gnyis bri// 'byung
350a7(rnying rgyud): po gdol pa nga rgyal can// chags sdang gti mug chu yis bslang // 'byung po rug gsum bshig pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor srub pa chen po bshad// ru dra wa yi nyon mongs can// ye shes chen po was gzhom phyir// tshogs bdag dpal chen he ru ka/ 'jigs chi
350b1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs par// khra ba'i mig can snga tha pags// ma rig sun pa' gro rgya nas// rtsa ya dbus nas bzung nas kyang // snying rje chen pa mnyam pa yis// dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang // 'khor ba'i dgra bgegs gsad pa'i phyir// khro tshogs rngam pa'i sprin 'gros pas//
350b2(rnying rgyud): rngam pag tum 'breng ma gyogs pa'i tshul// seng ge sag dang do ma dang rjed// phyag brnyan phyag chen phab nas ni// sha dang rus pa khrag la dga'// ma lus par ni gsang nas su// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang ba byang shar mtshams su bting // dung khrod dang
350b3(rnying rgyud): phrug nga nyid che// ye shes spu ste sangs rgyas mchog/ gnon pa'i dmag tshogs thugs rje can// ye shes rnon po mtshon cha yis// dgra bgegs ma lus chun bcad nas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thab bzhi pa rtsig/ zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spod bzhin// dbus su 'khor lo
350b4(rnying rgyud): thig tu bcig/ shang lho nub byang dkar sed dmar// mthing gA nag po tha lu mchog spar// shar sgrogs zlum po pang bya'i// go phyogs blag mazur brjid nas// nub kyogs blag ma gzhung byibs dbang // byang phyogs bur gsum mang na spyad drag/ skyi ga 'khor bar
350b5(rnying rgyud): thab tu b+ha// rigs kyi yab lnga brtsigs par wa// mi shes 'brel pa lA yi ho sa// thugs rje lnga yi hom khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la// ye shes lnga yi me skur nas// 'bar ba'i bsreg rdzas 'di rnams kun// rgyal ba kun la rab 'bral lo// rnam dag
350b6(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings ho ma khung du// mtshan ma'i chos can yam shing la// ye shes chos nyid dag pa'i mes// bag chags mtshan ma bsreg sbyangs te/ bag chags ngan pa'i hom khung du// sprul pa chags pa'i yam shing la// byang chub par chen me sbar te// 'a
350b7(rnying rgyud): ba 'khor bsreg yam shing byung // he ru zhal gyi hom khung du// dug lnga lnga yi yam shing la// 'joms pa wa yi me srang te// rnam par rtog rdzas bsreg byas te// snang srid b+ha ga'i hom khung du// dbang phyug yum bzhi'i yam shing la// rdo rje su mchog ma la te/
351a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dngos mthun pa sreg sbyangs zim// phrin las rnam bzhi'i rdzas rnams ni// zhi ba la ni dkar po 'tshul// rgyas pa la na ser po 'tshul// dbang la dmang po rab tu shes// mngan spyod lan nag por bya// zha rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rnams// sa song
351a2(rnying rgyud): lha rnams so sor bsgom// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba dpyas na// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // zhag ni bcu gcig tshun chad kyis// skabs sam khrag tu skrag nas 'chi// mchog gi sbyor ba 'di byas pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom/

351a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // ling+ga sha chen sbyar nas kyang // de dag sreg pa'i rdzas su bya// de ltar sbyor ba byas gyur na// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
351a5(rnying rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes khro bo bcu mthar phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di thon to// kun tu gru bzhir ldan pa la// che chung chad med gnas kyis sbyar// ma tra gzugs chen bsgyel ba ni// de yi snying gar bang rim gsum// dang po bu bzhi dmar
351a6(rnying rgyud): por brtsig/ gnyis pa gru gsum mtha' nag bya// gsum bzlag ma skrag nag bya// mgo bo yan lag drug dang ni// gsang ba'i sgo chen gnyis brgyad la// chag phyed skyegs bu gru bzhi brgyad// de la yab yum brgyad rnams dgod// gru bzhi gru gsum zla gam la// sa gsung
